”Parã Akꞌõre Waibɨa kꞌĩra atua pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨɨrã, kꞌĩsíatɨ mɨa etꞌewa jaradade mãikꞌaapa parãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata oo amáatɨ. Maa–e pɨrã mɨa parã jõpikꞌooi ne–animal kꞌachia bɨpa awaraa ne–animal peekꞌãri, jõtꞌaaparikꞌa. Madeepa apidaapa parã pꞌoyaa kꞌaripa atada–e pai.
Eperãpa mɨmaa gracias jarakꞌãri, akꞌɨpipari wãara mɨde ijãapari. Irua ne–inaa kꞌachia ooamaa bakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa mɨa oopi bɨkꞌa ookꞌãri, mɨa iru ichita kꞌaripaitꞌee.”
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ chupɨria kꞌawáaji pɨa mɨ kꞌinia iru bapari perã. Mɨ chupɨria kꞌawáaji mãikꞌaapa mɨa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooda wẽpapíji.
Mɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopari wẽpapíji taipa jayoo wẽpapatakꞌa kꞌapꞌɨa pi–ia sɨɨdakꞌãri. Mãgá mɨ pɨ kꞌĩrapite pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe beei.
Kꞌawa bɨ mɨa oo–e bɨ pɨ leyde jara bɨkꞌa. Mɨa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopariida ichita kꞌirãpapari.
Pɨ kꞌĩrapite ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooji, pɨa jaraji mĩda mãga oonaamerã. Mapa pɨa ichita ne–inaa pia oopari jarakꞌãri mɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda mãikꞌaapa ma kꞌaurepa mɨ miapiipia bɨ.
Wãara, mɨ tꞌodadeepa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopari. Mɨ nawe bide bɨweda mɨa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopari.
Pɨa kꞌinia bɨ tꞌãripa mɨa wãara pedee jaramerã. Mapa pɨa mɨchi tꞌãride mɨmaa jarateepachi kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beemerã.

Pꞌaarepa hisopo juapa ne–animal waa eperã ɨ̃rɨ jĩapꞌeparikꞌa irua kꞌawaamerã pɨa irua pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopariida ãyaa bɨda, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopariida ãyaa bɨ́ji, pɨ kꞌĩrapite mɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe beemerã. Mãgá pɨa mɨ sɨɨ pɨkꞌakꞌãri, mɨ tꞌo–tꞌoora beeitꞌee nieve kꞌãyaara.
Mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩapíji mɨmaa pedee pia jara bɨpa. Mɨ tꞌãri pꞌua nɨ̃bɨ pɨa mɨ bɨɨrɨ kꞌõra pɨkꞌa iru bairã ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopariida kꞌaurepa.
Akꞌɨnáaji mɨa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopariida mãikꞌaapa mɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopariida jõmaweda wẽpapíji.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ¡mɨ tꞌãri chiwidi pɨkꞌa papíji tꞌãripa pɨa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia bapariimerã!
¡Pɨ ikꞌaawaapa mɨ ãyaa pëináaji mãikꞌaapa pɨ Jaure pia ãyaa atanáaji!
Mɨ waya tꞌãri o–ĩapíji pɨ Jaure kꞌapꞌɨa, mɨa waapɨara ijãamerã pɨa mɨ kꞌaripapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa mɨa oopariimerã pɨa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Mãgá mɨa pɨ o akꞌɨpiitꞌee pɨ leyde jara bɨkꞌa oodakꞌaa beerãmaa mãikꞌaapa ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarãpa pɨde ijãa pꞌaneedaitꞌee.
Mɨ Akꞌõre Waibɨa, pɨ mɨ kꞌaripapari. Mapa mɨ piupináaji mɨa eperãarã peepariida kꞌaurepa. Mãgá jõmaarãmaa mɨa jaraitꞌee pɨa ichita ne–inaa jõma pia oopari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ kꞌaripáji mɨa pɨmaa pedee pia jaramerã.
Wãara pɨa kꞌinia–e bɨ eperãpa pɨ–itꞌee ne–inaa paapimerã maa–e pɨrã ne–animalaarã peepꞌeda, pɨ–itꞌee paa jõpimerã. Mãga kꞌinia bada paara, mɨa mãga ookꞌaji.
Mãga kꞌinia bai kꞌãyaara, pɨa kꞌinia bɨ eperã tꞌãri pꞌua beemerã mãikꞌaapa pɨmaa chupɨria iidimerã ichia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopariida kꞌaurepa. ¡Pɨa mãgee eperã ichita pia akꞌɨpariitꞌee!
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã, Sión pꞌuuru, Jerusalén, pia akꞌɨ́ji mãikꞌaapa ma pꞌuuru waya murallapa tꞌɨakꞌau bɨpíji.

Mãgá pɨa oopi bɨkꞌa oopataarãpa pɨ–itꞌee ne–inaa paapidaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ne–animalaarã ateedaitꞌee pɨ–itꞌee paa jõpidaitꞌee, pɨa ãra pia akꞌɨpariimerã. Maapai pꞌakꞌa peedapꞌeda, pɨ altar ɨ̃rɨ paa jõpidaitꞌee.
Eperã waibɨakꞌa bɨ, ¿sãapꞌeda pɨa audua pedee jara bɨma pɨa kꞌachia kꞌĩsia bɨ? ¡Pɨa mãga oo bɨ Tachi Akꞌõredeerã ãpɨte, irua ãra kꞌinia iru bapari mĩda!
Aba pɨa kꞌĩsia bɨ ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee. Pɨ kꞌĩrame lowero pꞌewedee bɨkꞌa bɨ, madeepa seewa uchiapari perã.
Pɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌiniara iru bapari ne–inaa pia kꞌãyaara. Seewa jarapari wãarata jarai kꞌãyaara.
Pedee kꞌachia jarai awaa bapari chĩara kꞌũrayaa bapari perã.
Maperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ jõpiitꞌee. ¡Pɨchi tedeepa ãyaa wãpiitꞌee mãikꞌaapa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema chokꞌai beerã tꞌãideepa jëretꞌaaitꞌee piudaimerã!
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãpa mãga unudakꞌãri, ãchobee pꞌaneedaitꞌee. Mamĩda pɨ oo iru pꞌanɨde nãga jaradaitꞌee:
“Nama bɨ eperã Tachi Akꞌõremaa kꞌaripa iidi–e pada. Mãga ooi kꞌãyaara, ichia netꞌaa pia iru badade ijãapachi. Mãgá akꞌɨpiji ichi tꞌãri kꞌachia baparida” adaitꞌee.
Mamĩda mɨata Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapari perã, olivo pakꞌuru Tachi Akꞌõre te ãukꞌidaa uudákꞌapɨ bɨ. Ichita ijãapariitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ kꞌinia iru bapari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ichita pɨmaa gracias jaraitꞌee pɨa ne–inaa pia oopari pari. Awaraa ijãapataarã taide mɨa pɨ tꞌɨ̃ jaraitꞌee, pɨ tꞌɨ̃ jõmaweda tꞌɨ̃ kꞌãyaara pipɨara bairã.
Kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa ichi tꞌãridepai kꞌĩsiapari: “Tachi Akꞌõre wẽ–e.” Mãgeerãpa ne–inaa pia oodaamaa pꞌanapata, ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanapata perã. ¡Apida wẽ–e ichita ne–inaa pia oopari!
Ɨtꞌariipa Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã akꞌɨpari kꞌawaaitꞌee apida kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ mãikꞌaapa iru kꞌawa kꞌinia bɨ.
Mamĩda jõmaweda ijãadaamaa pꞌanɨ, iru ikꞌaawaapa uchiadapꞌedaa perã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanapata perã. ¡Eperã apidaapa ne–inaa pia ookꞌaa!
Ne–inaa kꞌachia oopataarã pia kꞌĩsiadakꞌaa. Mãgɨɨrãpa mɨ eperãarã jõpipata, eperãarãpa pan jõpipatakꞌa kꞌotꞌaadakꞌãri. ¡Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dakꞌaa, irude ijãadakꞌaa perã!

Mãgeerã pꞌera jõnɨpa kꞌapꞌɨa wëredaipata, ne–inaa pꞌerapiitꞌee wẽ–e mĩda. Ãra parã ome chõo chedakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra jõpiji mãikꞌaapa ãchi bɨɨrɨ tꞌɨmɨ́ batꞌapikꞌooji. Mãgá parãpa ãra kꞌĩra nejasiapijida, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra yiaraa iru bada perã.

Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ Sión eedeepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi israelitaarã kꞌaripa chemerã. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi pꞌuuru pidaarã, israelitaarã, waya kꞌaripakꞌãri, ãra, Jacobdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã, o–ĩa pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ¡mɨ kꞌaripáji pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã!
Tachi Akꞌõre, ũríji mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ. Mɨ pedee ũríji.
Audua beerãpa chĩara peepataarã ome mɨ jɨrɨmaa pꞌanɨ peedaitꞌee. Mãɨrãpa oodaamaa pꞌanapata Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre mɨ kꞌaripapari. Irua mɨ chokꞌai bapipari.
Irua mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã baaipiitꞌee ãchia mɨmaa oodaitꞌee kꞌĩsia kꞌachia iru pꞌanɨde. ¡Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa jara bɨkꞌa ichita oopari perã, mãɨrã jõpikꞌóoji!

Pɨa mãga ookꞌãri, mɨa ne–animalaarã peepꞌeda, paapiitꞌee akꞌɨpiitꞌee pɨ kꞌinia iru bɨ mãikꞌaapa pɨmaa pedee pia jaraitꞌee, pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã. Mãgá jõmaarãpa pɨ tꞌɨ̃ pia tꞌo pꞌanadaitꞌee.
Pɨa mɨ uchiapiji mɨ kꞌĩsia nɨ̃badadeepa. Mɨchi taupa unuji pɨa mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã pꞌoyaakꞌãri.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ũríji mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ. Ũri–e pɨkꞌa banáaji.
Mɨ pedee ũríji mãikꞌaapa pꞌanáuji, mɨ audú kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bairã.
Ãchobee nɨ̃bɨ mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru baparipa awaraa ijãadakꞌaa beerã ome mɨ ɨ̃rɨ chepata perã mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri kꞌachiapa mɨ ɨmɨateepata perã.
Mɨ audú tꞌãri pꞌua nɨ̃bɨ mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri ma–ãri nɨ̃bɨ, mɨ peedai jĩakꞌaapa.
Ãchobeepa mɨ kꞌapꞌɨa wëre nɨ̃bɨ.
Mãga nɨ̃bɨde mɨa jara bɨ: “Mɨ palomakꞌa isia kꞌara iru bada paara, ãyaa wãabaikꞌaji mãikꞌaapa jɨrɨkꞌaji sãma ɨ̃iitꞌee.
Tꞌɨmɨ́ wãabaikꞌaji mãikꞌaapa eujã pania wẽe bɨde eperãarã pꞌanadakꞌaamaa banakꞌaji.
Mamaa isapai wãkꞌaji, na nepɨra nãumia pa ome pɨkꞌa nɨ̃bairã.”
Tachi Akꞌõre, ma ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã jõpíji. Ãchi pedee awara–awaraa pedeepataarãkꞌa papíji ãra kꞌaurepa pꞌuuru pidaarã kꞌĩrau para bairã mãikꞌaapa chõo para bairã.

Ãstaawa, pꞌãrikꞌua pida ãchia kꞌĩsia kꞌachia iru pꞌanɨ pꞌɨrrɨa pɨkꞌapata pꞌuuru muralla tꞌɨakꞌau bɨ ɨ̃rɨ mãikꞌaapa ma kꞌaurepa pꞌuuru jãde eperãarã chõo para beepari mãikꞌaapa awaraarãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata.
Maperã ma pꞌuuru pidaarãpa chĩara ãchi jua ekꞌari kꞌachia iru pꞌanapata mãikꞌaapa awaraarã kꞌũrapata.
Mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru baparipa mɨ ãpɨte ikꞌachia jarada paara, mɨa chookꞌaji. Eperã tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa bɨpa mɨ oo iru bada paara, iru bɨmãiipa mɨ mirukꞌaji.
Mamĩda pɨ, mɨ kꞌõpꞌãyo piara bɨpa mãga ooji.
¡Tachi Akꞌõre tede tꞌãri aukꞌa nipapachida awaraa ijãapataarã tꞌãide! Maapai tꞌãri pia, pedee sia pedeepachida.
¡Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ atu pꞌanɨde mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã piukꞌoodaidamerã audú tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa pꞌanadairã mãikꞌaapa ãchi tꞌãide audú ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata perã!
Mamĩda mɨa Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨamaa ɨtꞌaa iidiitꞌee. Kꞌawa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrépata mɨ kꞌaripaitꞌee.
Ãstaawa, imatꞌɨpa, pꞌãrikꞌua paara, taubade irumaa chupɨria iidipari. Mãpai irua mɨ pedee ũripari.
Mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã cho–kꞌara ome mɨ chõoru pɨjida, irua mɨ ãchi juadeepa chokꞌai uchiapiitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, jõmaarã rey ichita baparipa mɨ pedee ũriitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ãchi kꞌĩra nejasiapiitꞌee, irua jara bɨkꞌa pꞌanadakꞌaa perã mãikꞌaapa iru waaweedakꞌaa perã.
Mɨ kꞌõpꞌãyo piara badapa ichi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã yiaraa iru beeji, tai ome pedeeteeji mĩda chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Tai ome pedee sia pedeeji mĩda, ichi tꞌãridepai kꞌĩsia kꞌachia iru baji tai ome chõoitꞌee. Iwarraa pedeeji mĩda, ma pedee espadakꞌa baji, ichi tꞌãridepai kꞌĩsiapachi perã tai peeitꞌee.

Ijãapari, pɨ kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõremaa jaráji. Iruata pɨ kꞌaripaitꞌee. Eperãpa irua jara bɨkꞌa ookꞌãri mãikꞌaapa irude ijãakꞌãri, irua ma eperã kꞌachiade baaipi–e paitꞌee mãikꞌaapa atabëi–e paitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨde ijãadakꞌaa beerã, chĩara peepataarã mãikꞌaapa seewa jarapataarã chonaa padai naaweda, piudaitꞌee. Pɨa mãɨrã jõpiitꞌee. Mamĩda mɨata ichita pɨde ijãapariitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ chupɨria kꞌawáaji, eperãarãpa mɨ jɨrɨ pꞌanadairã peedaitꞌee. Ewari chaa jɨrɨpata mɨ ome chõodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pꞌoyaadaitꞌee.
Ewari chaa mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa mɨ mãgá jɨrɨpata. Ma audua beerã mɨ ɨ̃rɨ chepata.
Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa, mɨ ãchobee nɨ̃beekꞌãri, pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pari.
Mɨa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapari mãikꞌaapa irua pedee jaradadé mɨa pedee pia jarapari. Mãgɨde kꞌĩsiakꞌãri, mɨ ãchobee nɨ̃bada wẽpadaipari. ¿Kꞌãata eperãarãpa mɨmaa oodaima?
Ewari chaa mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa mɨa jara bɨ pedee seewakꞌa papipata. Aba kꞌĩsiapata mɨmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee.
Mɨ ãpɨte pedeeteepata mãikꞌaapa mɨa ne–inaa oo bɨ akꞌɨpata mɨ tꞌẽe miru wãdaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa mɨ peetꞌaadaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mãgá kꞌachia oomaa pꞌanɨde ¿kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨkꞌã ãchi pɨ juadeepa uchiadai? Ma kꞌãyaara mãgee pꞌuuru pidaarã kꞌĩra nejasiapíji. Kꞌachiade baaipíji, pɨ ãchi ome kꞌĩrau bairã.
Mɨ biapi mãikꞌaapa mɨ jẽeda kꞌirãpáji. ¿Mɨ tauba aba–abaa pꞌã iru bɨ–ekꞌã ɨtꞌaripema librode?
Pɨa mɨ mãgá akꞌɨpari perã, mɨa pɨmaa chupɨria iidikꞌãri, mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã jĩchoodaitꞌee. Mɨa nãga kꞌawa bɨ: Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ kꞌaripapariitꞌee.
Mɨa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapari mãikꞌaapa irua pedee jaradadé mɨa pedee pia jarapari.
Mãgɨde kꞌĩsiakꞌãri, mɨ ãchobee nɨ̃bada wẽpadaipari. ¿Kꞌãata eperãarãpa mɨmaa oodaima?
Tachi Akꞌõre, tꞌãripa ooitꞌee mɨa pɨmaa jaradakꞌa. Nãgá mɨa pɨmaa gracias jaraitꞌee. Pɨ–itꞌee ne–inaa ateeitꞌee mãikꞌaapa paapiitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨata mɨ kꞌaripaji mɨ kꞌachiade baaiitꞌee badadeepa mãikꞌaapa mɨ piu wãdadeepa. Mãga ooji kꞌinia bairã mɨ pɨ kꞌĩrapite chokꞌai nipapariimerã pɨ ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨ ode.

Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ chupɨria kꞌawáaji. Mɨ chupɨria kꞌawáaji mɨa pɨde ijãapari perã. Ipana chakꞌeerã mirupatakꞌa chi nawe isia ekꞌari ãchi jɨ̃amerã, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ miru pɨkꞌaitꞌee pɨ jua ekꞌari, pɨa mɨ jɨ̃amerã waa mɨ peedaitꞌee jɨrɨ pꞌanɨɨrãpa jɨrɨda–ee pꞌaneerutamaa.
Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨamaa mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ, ne–inaa jõmaade irua mɨ kꞌaripapari perã.
Ɨtꞌariipa irua mɨ kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mɨ jɨrɨpataarã juadeepa mɨ uchiapiitꞌee. Mãgá akꞌɨpiitꞌee mɨ wãara chupɨria kꞌawaa bɨ mãikꞌaapa mɨ kꞌinia iru bɨ.
Mɨ ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã tꞌãide bakꞌãri, león tꞌãide bɨkꞌa bɨ. Ãchi kꞌida miasu kꞌidakꞌa wa sia kꞌidakꞌa bee; jõdee chi kꞌĩrame espada pꞌewedee bɨkꞌa bee.
¡Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ pajã ɨtꞌɨara bɨde bapari! ¡Na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõmaade pɨ kꞌĩra wãree unupata!

Eperãarãpa tꞌɨrɨ tꞌɨapatakꞌa chikꞌo peedaitꞌee, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa ne–inaa oojida mɨ kꞌachiade baaipidaitꞌee. Mapa mɨ kꞌĩra pia–ee beeji. Eperãpa uria kꞌoro ataparikꞌa ne–animal aɨde baaimerã, mãga pɨkꞌa oojida mɨ kꞌachiade baaimerã. Mamĩda ãchita ma ne–inaa kꞌachiade baaijida.
Tachi Akꞌõre, tꞌãripa mɨa pɨde ijãapari. Mapa tꞌãripa mɨa pɨmaa kꞌariitꞌee.
¡Tapꞌeweda mɨ ɨ̃rɨmaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌariitꞌee arpa, salterio ome chaa nɨ̃bɨde!
Tachi Akꞌõre, pꞌuuru pidaarã kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo tꞌãide pɨmaa kꞌariitꞌee. Awara–awaraa eujãdepemaarã tꞌãide mɨa pɨmaa kꞌariitꞌee.
¡Pajã audú ɨtꞌɨa bɨkꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa pɨa eperãarã audú kꞌinia iru bapari! ¡Jɨ̃arara ichita pajãde wãyaapatakꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa pɨa ichita oopari pɨa jara bɨkꞌa!
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ pajã ɨtꞌɨara bɨde bapari. ¡Na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõmaade pɨ kꞌĩra wãree unupata!
Eperãarã poro waibɨarã, ¿wãara parãpa eperãarãpa oopata kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa akꞌɨpatakꞌã jaradaitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia?
Mãga–epɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌĩsia kꞌachia kꞌĩsiapata. Parã kꞌaurepa na eujãdepemaarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata.
Ãchi tꞌorutaweda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanapata; ãchi nawe bide bɨweda seewa jarai awaa pꞌanapata.
Neera kꞌachia taama kꞌidadeepa uchiaparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa ãchi itꞌaideepa pedee kꞌachia uchiapari. Cobra chiparipa música chaakꞌãri, cobra bainɨ̃ beei kꞌãyaara, kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua beeparikꞌa,
mãga pɨkꞌa ãchi kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua pꞌanɨ ũraa ũridaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ¡ma ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã pꞌoyáaji! ¡Kꞌõrakꞌóoji ma leonkꞌa beerã kꞌida!
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ mãɨrã wẽpadamerã, pania wẽpaparikꞌa eperãpa eujã pꞌoo bɨde weekꞌãri, maa–e pɨrã ãchi sia mɨmaa trɨdaitꞌee pakꞌãri kꞌõradaidamerã.
Kꞌinia bɨ jõdaidamerã kꞌooro jõdaiparikꞌa chi te wẽe beekꞌãri maa–e pɨrã warra ɨratɨada jõdaiparikꞌa tꞌoi naaweda.
Eperãarãpa ne–ɨɨrɨ, pꞌoo bɨ wa pꞌoo–e bɨ paamaa pꞌanɨde, atu pꞌanɨde nãumiapa ma ne–ɨɨrɨ urua bɨ kꞌĩipiparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨa kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã jõpimerã.
Mãga unukꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari o–ĩa beeitꞌee ma ijãadakꞌaa beerã jõdapꞌedaa perã. Mãɨrã waade iru tꞌɨaitꞌee.
Mãpai eperãarãpa jaradaitꞌee: “¡Piara bɨ oopataadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa mãɨrãkꞌa bai kꞌãyaara! ¡Wãara Tachi Akꞌõrepa na eujãdepemaarãpa oopata akꞌɨpari jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia!”
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ kꞌaripáji mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã juade baainaamerã. Mɨ jɨ̃́aji mãɨrã mɨ ɨ̃rɨ chedakꞌãri.
Mɨ kꞌaripáji ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã, ma chĩara peepataarã juade baainaamerã.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa mɨ otꞌa nɨpata peedaitꞌee, mɨa ãramaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–e bɨ mĩda mãikꞌaapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo–e bɨ mĩda.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa mãgá ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–e bɨ mĩda, mãɨrãpa jɨrɨpata mɨ ɨ̃rɨ chedaitꞌee. ¡Mapa mɨ akꞌɨ́ji mãikꞌaapa mɨ kꞌaripa chéji!
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa; israelitaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa. Chéji mãikꞌaapa jã awaraa eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerã miapíji. ¡Ãchi chupɨria kꞌawaanáaji mɨ traicionaaruta perã!
Pꞌãrikꞌua pꞌuuru jãde usaarãpa ne–inaa kꞌodaitꞌee jɨrɨ nipapatakꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa pꞌuuru jãde ãchia jɨrɨ nipapata ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee.
Ikꞌachia pedee jara nipapata mãikꞌaapa audua pedeepata: “Apidaapa tachi pedee ũrida–eda” apata.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa ma awaraa eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerã oo iru bɨ. Pɨ mãɨrã–itꞌee ëipari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa nɨmaa bɨ pɨa mɨ kꞌaripa chemerã, pɨa mɨ jɨ̃apari perã.
Mɨ Akꞌõre Waibɨapa mɨ kꞌinia iru bapari. Mapa iru mɨ naa wãitꞌee mãikꞌaapa mɨmaa unupiitꞌee ichia mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã pꞌoyaakꞌãri.

Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre, mãɨrã peenáaji, maa–e pɨrã mɨchi aukꞌaarãpa kꞌĩra atuadaridai ãrapa oopatapꞌedaa. Ma kꞌãyaara pɨ juapa mãɨrã jĩchoopíji kꞌĩra nejasia, pariatua nipadamerã. ¡Escudopa soldao jɨ̃aparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa pɨa tai jɨ̃apari!
Mãɨrãpa pedee kꞌachia jaradakꞌãri, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata. Mapa mɨa kꞌinia bɨ ãchimaa pꞌasamerã ãchia pedee audua jaradapꞌedaakꞌa. Ãchia mãgá pedee kꞌachia mãikꞌaapa seewa jarapata perã,

pɨ ãchi ome kꞌĩrau bɨ. ¡Mapa ãchi jõpíji! ¡Jõpíji na eujãdeepa wẽpadaidamerã! ¡Mãgá na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaarãpa, chi tꞌɨmɨara pꞌanɨɨrãpa paara, kꞌawaadai ãchi mãikꞌaapa Jacobdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã Tachi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata!
Pꞌãrikꞌua pꞌuuru jãde usaarãpa ne–inaa kꞌodaitꞌee jɨrɨ nipapatakꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa pꞌuuru jãde ãchia jɨrɨ nipapata ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee.
Usaarãpa ne–inaa kꞌodaitꞌee unuda–e pꞌanadakꞌãri, bia nipapatakꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa ãchi bia nipapata ãchia jɨrɨ pꞌanɨ unuda–e pakꞌãri.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre, kꞌaride mɨa jaraitꞌee pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Tapꞌeda mɨa jaraitꞌee pɨa mɨ kꞌinia iru bapari. Mɨ kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bakꞌãri, pɨa mɨ jɨ̃apari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa pɨmaa salmo kꞌariitꞌee pɨata mɨ jɨ̃apari perã. Mɨchi Akꞌõre Waibɨa, pɨata mɨ kꞌinia iru bapari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa tai yiaraa iru bɨ mãikꞌaapa jĩchoopiru tai ome kꞌĩrau bairã. ¡Waya tai pia akꞌɨ́ji!
Pɨa eujã wërepiparikꞌa mãikꞌaapa tꞌoopiparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa ooji tai ome. ¡Ɨ̃rá tai kꞌaripáji tai pꞌanapatamãi atꞌãri wëre pɨkꞌa nɨ̃bairã!
Pɨchi pꞌuuru pidaarã nepɨra waibɨade baaipiji. Taimaa vino audú asia pɨkꞌa bɨ to pɨkꞌapiji.
Pɨa pɨ waaweepataarãmaa akꞌɨpipari sãgá ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa sia trɨ pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨmãiipa jĩchoodai.
Mãgá pɨ juarapa tai kꞌaripáji tai kꞌinia iru bapari perã. Na nepɨradeepa tai uchiapíji.
Tachi Akꞌõre tede ichia jaraji: “Tꞌãri o–ĩa mɨa mɨchi eperãarãmaa Siquén pꞌuuru mãikꞌaapa Sucot eujã jewedaa teeitꞌee.
Galaad eujã mëré, Manasedeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã eujã paara. Efraindeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã eujã mɨ cascokꞌa bɨ mãikꞌaapa Judadeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã eujã mɨ rey cetrokꞌa bɨ.
Jõdee Moab eujã mɨchi jua sɨɨpari pailakꞌa bɨ
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa tai nãgá yiaraa iru bɨ misa mãikꞌaapa tai soldaorã ome waa nipa–e bɨ misa, ¿kꞌaipa mɨ ateeima pꞌuuru murallapa tꞌɨakꞌau bɨmaa? ¿Kꞌaipa mɨmaa Edom eujãdee wãpari o akꞌɨpiima?
Tai kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã taimaa pꞌoyaapíji, eperã apidaapa tai pꞌoyaa kꞌaripada–e pꞌanadairã.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌaripakꞌãri, tachia pꞌoyaadai. ¡Iruata tachi kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã jõpiitꞌee, soldaorãpa eperãarã kꞌapꞌɨa jõpipatakꞌa aɨ ɨ̃rɨ tꞌɨadakꞌãri!
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ biapi ũríji, mɨ tꞌãri pꞌua nɨ̃bairã. ¡Ũríji mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ!
Nama tꞌɨmɨɨpa mɨa pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa iidipari, mɨa waa pꞌoyaa choo–e bairã. ¡Ara eperã toida ɨ̃yapa jɨ̃a wãru kꞌaripadapꞌeda, mãu ɨ̃rɨ ata bɨrutakꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ kꞌaripáji!
Pɨa mɨ jɨ̃apari. Ara soldaorã torrede tꞌĩupatakꞌa ãchi kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa peenaadamerã, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ pɨ jua ekꞌari tꞌĩupari.
Mɨ ichita pɨ tede ba kꞌinia bɨ. Pɨ jua ekꞌari mɨ ba kꞌinia bɨ, etꞌerre chakꞌeerã chi nawe isia ekꞌari pꞌanapatakꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa ũriji mɨa pɨmaa jarada. Mapa mɨmaa teeji ne–inaa jõmaweda pɨa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ teeitꞌee pɨ waaweepataarãmaa.
Chupɨria kꞌawáaji mãikꞌaapa pɨa mɨ rey bɨda taarã bapiparíiji, mɨ chonaa parumaa bapariimerã.
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ pɨ kꞌĩrapite mɨ jua ekꞌari pꞌanapataarã pia akꞌɨpariimerã. ¡Mɨ jɨ̃aparíiji pɨa mɨ iru kꞌinia iru bapari perã mãikꞌaapa pɨa wãarata jarapari perã!
Mãgá mɨa ichita pɨmaa salmo kꞌariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ewari chaa mɨa pɨmaa jaradakꞌa oopariitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepapai mɨ kꞌãiwee bapii, iruata mɨ kꞌaripapari perã.
Mɨ–itꞌee iru mãu choma bɨkꞌa bɨ, irua mɨ jɨ̃apari perã. Iruapai mɨ mãgá kꞌaripapari perã, mɨ kꞌachiade baai–e paitꞌee.
¿Sãapai parã jõmaarãpa waa mɨ jɨrɨda–ee pꞌaneedaitꞌeema kꞌachiade baaipidaitꞌee? Mɨ cercao ãri wã́kꞌapɨ bɨ maa–e pɨrã muralla tꞌee wã́kꞌapɨ bɨ.
Aba kꞌĩsiapata mɨ ekꞌariara papidaitꞌee. Mapa mɨ ãpɨte seewa jarapata. Itꞌaipa mɨmaa pedee pia jarapata. Mamĩda ãchi tꞌãride mɨmaa pedee kꞌachia jarapata.
Tachi Akꞌõrepapai mɨ kꞌãiwee bapii. Mɨa nɨpari irua mɨ kꞌaripamerã.
Mɨ–itꞌee iru mãu choma bɨkꞌa bɨ, irua mɨ jɨ̃apari perã. Iruapai mɨ mãgá kꞌaripapari perã, mɨ kꞌachiade baai–e paitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrépata mɨ kꞌaripapari. Iru kꞌaurepa eperãarãpa mɨ pia akꞌɨpata. Eperã mãu choma bɨ ãpɨte miruparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ irude miru pɨkꞌapari.
¡Mɨchi aukꞌaarã, irude ijãapatáatɨ! ¡Iru kꞌĩrapite pꞌanadakꞌãri, parã tꞌãride iru pꞌanɨ waawee–ee irumaa jarátɨ! ¡Tachi Akꞌõrépata tachi jɨ̃apari!
Taarã–e nɨde eperãarã wẽpadaipata. Chupɨria beerã, pꞌaratꞌara beerã paara na pꞌekꞌau eujãde taarã pꞌanadakꞌaa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ɨtꞌaripema balanzade eperãarã chaada paara, maarepida chaada–e pakꞌaji.
Maperã, jɨrɨnáatɨ chĩara jita atadaitꞌee pꞌaratꞌa pari maa–e pɨrã chĩara netꞌaa chɨa atadaitꞌee. Pꞌaratꞌara pꞌaneeruta pɨjida, ma pꞌaratꞌade ijãanáatɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara Tachi Akꞌõredeta ijãapatáatɨ.
Ipꞌii mɨa ũridoo nãgɨ́ pedee, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada: Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ.
Irua eperãarã kꞌinia iru bapari. Irua eperãarãmaa pia ooitꞌee ãchia ne–inaa pia oopatapꞌedaa pari mãikꞌaapa ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa pari kꞌachia ooitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ mɨchi Akꞌõre Waibɨa. Ɨ̃i–ee mɨa pɨ jɨrɨpari, pɨ kꞌawa kꞌinia bairã. Ara eujã pꞌoo bɨde eperãpa pania jɨrɨparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨa pɨ jɨrɨpari.
Pɨ tede mɨa pɨ unupachi. Mama pɨ jua mãikꞌaapa pɨ kꞌĩra wãree unupachi.
¡Ne–inaa piara wẽ–e kꞌawaai kꞌãyaara wãara pɨa mɨ kꞌinia iru bapari! Mapa mɨa pɨmaa o–ĩa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pariitꞌee.
Mɨ chokꞌai bɨde pɨmaa pedee pia jarapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa jua ɨtꞌaa ɨapꞌeda, pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pariitꞌee.
Tꞌãri o–ĩa beeitꞌee eperã chikꞌo waibɨa kꞌopꞌeda, o–ĩa beeparikꞌa. Tꞌãri o–ĩapa pɨmaa pedee pia jarapariitꞌee.
Pꞌãrikꞌua mɨ jẽra beekꞌãri, mɨa pɨ kꞌirãpapari mãikꞌaapa pɨde kꞌĩsiapari.
Etꞌerre chakꞌe o–ĩa baparikꞌa chi nawe isia ekꞌari bakꞌãri, mãga pɨkꞌa pɨ jua ekꞌari mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩa bapari, pɨata mɨ kꞌaripapari perã.
Pɨ ome mɨ tꞌãri a–ba bapari. Pɨ juarapa mɨ jɨ̃apari.
Mamĩda mɨ pee kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrã piukꞌoodaitꞌee. Piudapꞌedaarãmaa pꞌananadaitꞌee.
Espadapa piudaitꞌee. Maapꞌeda usapꞌãpa ãra kꞌapꞌɨa kꞌokꞌoodaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãɨrã mãgá pꞌoyaakꞌãri, iru jua ekꞌari rey o–ĩa bapariitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapataarãpa irumaa pedee pia jaradaitꞌee. Jõdee seewa jarapataarã kꞌĩupꞌee pꞌaneedaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ũríji mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ. Mɨ kꞌaripáji mɨ pꞌera nɨ̃bairã mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã kꞌaurepa.
Mɨ jɨ̃́aji ma ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa pedeeteemaa pꞌanadairã mɨmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee. Mɨ kꞌaripáji ãchi juade baainaamerã.
Ãchi kꞌĩrame pꞌewedee pɨkꞌa iru pꞌanɨ espadakꞌa mãikꞌaapa soldaorãpa sia trɨpatakꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa ãchia mɨmaa ikꞌachia pedee jarapata.
Ara eperãarãpa otꞌa nɨpatakꞌa chĩaramaa trɨdaitꞌee, mãga pɨkꞌa ãchia waawee–ee eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–ee bɨ nɨpata, atu bɨde ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee.
Pedeeteepata ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa jɨrɨpata sãgá awaraarã kꞌachiade baaipidaitꞌee. Mãga oomaa pꞌanɨde jarapata: “¿Kꞌaipa na trampa unuima?”
Mãgá kꞌachia kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ misa, jarapata: “¡Ichita uchiaitꞌeeda apata, taipa kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanɨkꞌa!” ¿Kꞌaipa mãgee kꞌĩsia kꞌachia kꞌĩsiapataarã kꞌawaima?

¡Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrépata kꞌawapari mãgee eperã tꞌãride kꞌĩsia iru bɨ! Ara atu pꞌanɨde soldaorãmaa sia kꞌidapa su jira ba cheparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa atu pꞌanɨde, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã miapiitꞌee.
Ãchia audua pedee jaradapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa irua ãra jõpiitꞌee. Eperãarãpa mãga unudakꞌãri, ãchobeepa jĩchoodaitꞌee.
Mãga pakꞌãri, jõmaarãta pꞌeradaitꞌee. Nepɨrɨdaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopariida mãikꞌaapa made kꞌĩsiadaitꞌee.
Maapai Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapataadaitꞌee. Iididaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi jɨ̃apariimerã. Tꞌãri o–ĩa irumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadaitꞌee.
Sión eedepema Akꞌõre Waibɨa, ¡pɨmaa aupai eperãarã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daipia bɨ! ¡Ichita ãchia pɨmaa jaradapꞌedaakꞌa oodaipia bɨ!
Pɨa eperãarãpa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata ũripari perã, eperãarã jõmaarãta pɨmaa chedaipia bɨ
ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa jarade. Wãara, tai pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata. Mamĩda pɨa ãyaa bɨpari taipa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata pɨmaa chupɨria iididakꞌãri.
¡Eperã tꞌãri o–ĩadaipari pɨa iru jɨrɨtꞌerakꞌãri pɨ te tꞌɨakꞌau bɨde bapariimerã! Tai pɨ temaa wãdakꞌãri, o–ĩa pꞌanadaitꞌee mama kꞌachia wẽe bairã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa pia unudaitꞌee perã.

Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ tai kꞌaripapari. Pɨmaa chupɨria iididakꞌãri, pɨa ichita ne–inaa pi–ia oopari tai kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mapa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa pɨde ijãapata, pꞌusa kꞌĩraikꞌa eere tꞌɨmɨ́ pꞌanapataarã paara.
Pɨ juapa ee ooji ãyaa wãnaadamerã pɨa bɨdamãiipa.
Pɨa pꞌusa tꞌumãtɨpiji mãikꞌaapa awara–awaraa pꞌuuru pidaarã pɨa jara bɨkꞌa oodaamaa pꞌaneedakꞌãri, oopi–e paji ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa.

Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde tꞌɨmɨara pꞌanapataarã paara waaweepa wëredaipata pɨa ne–inaa pi–ia oopari unudakꞌãri, eperãarãpa mãgee ne–inaa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa perã. Eperãarãpa ma ne–inaa unudakꞌãri, o–ĩapa kꞌaripata oriente eereepa occidente eere parumaa.
Pɨa na pꞌekꞌau eujã pia akꞌɨ bapari. Kꞌoi chepipari ne–uu tꞌonomerã mãikꞌaapa chaumerã; pania papipari to chakꞌede, madepema pania trigo uu ɨ̃rɨ weekꞌãri, warimerã.
Eujã ne–uudaitꞌee pꞌanɨ ɨ̃rɨ kꞌoi chepipari jewedaa beemerã. Eujã chaaree bɨ kꞌoipa pꞌorekꞌeepipari. Maapꞌeda aɨde uuruta pia chaupari pɨa mãgá pia akꞌɨ bada perã.
Año chaa pɨa mãgá eujã pia akꞌɨ bapari. Jɨ̃arara pëipari aɨdeepa kꞌoi chemerã.
Mapa eujã pꞌoo bɨde, ee jẽra bɨmãi paara taipa pꞌũajara pꞌãwaraa unupata.
Eujã jewedaade ovejaarã unupata. To chakꞌe ide ne–uu chokꞌara unupata. ¡Ma ne–inaapa pɨmaa kꞌari pɨkꞌapata eperãarãpa o–ĩapa pɨmaa kꞌaripatakꞌa!
Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã, Tachi Akꞌõremaa tꞌãri o–ĩa kꞌarítɨ.
Irumaa salmo kꞌarítɨ mãikꞌaapa pedee pia jarátɨ iru tꞌɨ̃ jõmaweda tꞌɨ̃ kꞌãyaara pipɨara bɨ.
Kꞌaride irumaa jarátɨ: “Pɨa ne–inaa oopari jõmaweda pi–ia bɨ. Pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã, pɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa pɨ ome chõodaamaa pꞌanapata.
Jõmaarãta pɨ kꞌĩrapite bedabaipata ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pɨmaa salmo kꞌaripata.”
Chétɨ akꞌɨde ne–inaa pi–ia Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopari eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Ma ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa.
Irua pꞌusa, to paara pꞌoopiji tachi chonaarã aɨde jĩte sĩadamerã. Mapa iru ome o–ĩa pꞌanadáma.

Iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã, eperãarã jõmaarãta ichita iru jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata. Irua awara–awaraa eujãdepemaarã akꞌɨ bapari. Mapa ijãadakꞌaa beerã audua pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ irua jara bɨkꞌa ooda–e pakꞌãri.
Pꞌuuru pidaarã jõmaweda, ¡Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jaradáma! ¡Irumaa golpe kꞌaridáma jõmaarãpa ũridamerã!
Irua tachi jɨ̃apari piunaadamerã mãikꞌaapa awaraarã juade baainaadamerã.

Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa tai nepɨrade baaipiji kꞌawaaitꞌee wãara ijãa pꞌanɨ wa mãga–e. Pꞌaratꞌa tꞌɨpɨtaude torrabaipatakꞌa nejarra jõmaweda wẽpadaimerã, mãga pɨkꞌa pɨa tai nepɨrade baaipiji ne–inaa kꞌachia oo amaadamerã.
Ara eperãarãpa chikꞌo tꞌɨrɨde baaipipatakꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa pɨa tai ma nepɨrade baaipiji. Mãga ookꞌãri, tai kꞌĩra pia–ee pꞌaneejida.

Pɨa tai kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãmaa tai pꞌoyaapiji. Eperã toida ɨ̃yapa jɨ̃adai wãkꞌãri maa–e pɨrã tꞌɨpɨtaude paadai wãkꞌãri, chupɨria nɨ̃baparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa pɨa tai chupɨria iru baji. Mamĩda ma tꞌẽepai ɨ̃ipiji.
Mapa mɨ pɨ temaa wãitꞌee ne–animalaarã pɨ–itꞌee paa jõpide. Ma ne–inaa pɨmaa ateeitꞌee mɨa pɨmaa jaradakꞌa.
Mɨ audú kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bakꞌãri, mɨa mãga ooitꞌeeda aji.
Pɨ altarde ne–animalaarã poreera bee pɨ–itꞌee paa jõpiitꞌee. Pꞌakꞌaarã, chivoorã mãikꞌaapa ovejaarã paapiitꞌee, ma nari ɨ̃kꞌãri, pɨ tꞌãri o–ĩa beemerã.
Chétɨ jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõre waaweepataarã. Ũrítɨ, mɨa nepɨrɨitꞌee perã jõmaweda irua oopariida mɨ kꞌaripaitꞌee.
Mɨa irumaa ɨtꞌaa iidiji mãikꞌaapa pedee pia jaraji.
Mɨ tꞌãride kꞌĩsia kꞌachia iru bada paara, irua mɨ pedee ũri–e pakꞌaji.
Mamĩda irua mɨ pedee ũriji mãikꞌaapa ooji mɨa iididakꞌa.
¡Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara tꞌãri piara bapari! ¡Ichia mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidida yiaraa iru ba–e! ¡Ma kꞌãyaara mɨ kꞌinia iru bapari!
Tachi Akꞌõre, tai chupɨria kꞌawáaji mãikꞌaapa tai bendiciaparíiji. Tai pia akꞌɨparíiji
na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema jõmaarãpa kꞌawadamerã pɨa ãramaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ mãikꞌaapa pɨa wãara awara–awaraa eujãdepemaarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa kꞌinia bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa kꞌinia bɨ awara–awaraa pꞌuuru pidaarã jõmaweda pɨmaa gracias jarapataadamerã mãikꞌaapa pɨmaa pedee pia jarapataadamerã.

Kꞌinia bɨ awara–awaraa eujãdepemaarã o–ĩapa pɨmaa kꞌaridamerã, pɨa ichita ne–inaa pia oopari perã ãchia oopata akꞌɨkꞌãri jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Ãra jõmaarãmaa pɨa akꞌɨpipari kꞌãata oodaipia bɨ pɨ jua ekꞌari pia pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa kꞌinia bɨ awara–awaraa pꞌuuru pidaarã jõmaweda pɨmaa gracias jarapataadamerã mãikꞌaapa pɨmaa pedee pia jarapataadamerã.
Mãga ooruta pɨrã, tai ne–uudapꞌedaa pia chauitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre, tai Akꞌõre Waibɨapa tai bendiciapariitꞌee.
Mãgá tai bendiciakꞌãri, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema jõmaarãpa iru waaweepataadaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai kꞌaripa chekꞌãri, iru kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã iru naa jĩchoopata.
Nãu pꞌuakꞌãri, nari jɨ̃rakꞌawaa wẽpadaiparikꞌa mãikꞌaapa tꞌɨpɨtau wãsiapa vela torrabaidaiparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa iru kꞌĩrapite ma ijãadakꞌaa beerã jõdaipata.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã, iru kꞌĩrapite tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanátɨ. ¡O–ĩapa jɨ̃tɨpatáatɨ!
Tachi Akꞌõremaa kꞌarítɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌaride iru tꞌɨ̃ jarátɨ. Iru, chi jɨ̃arara ɨ̃rɨ nipaparimaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ. ¡Iru kꞌĩrapite tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapatáatɨ, iru tꞌɨ̃ Tachi Akꞌõre perã!
Tachi Akꞌõre ichi te awara bɨdade bapari. Iruta akꞌõre wẽe beerã akꞌõre. Iruata pꞌẽtrãarã jɨ̃apari.
Irua ituaba pꞌanapataarãmaa te teepari. Awaraarã jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã uchiapipari ãra jita atadapꞌedaarã juadeepa. Mamĩda irude ijãadaamaa pꞌanɨɨrã eujã pania wẽe bɨde pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, eujã pania wẽe bɨde pɨ pɨchi pꞌuuru pidaarã naa wãkꞌãri,
ma eujã wëredachi mãikꞌaapa kꞌoi cheji pɨ Sinaí eedepema Akꞌõre Waibɨa, israelitaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa perã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨchi eperãarã sẽdaidakꞌãri, ãchi eujãde pɨa kꞌoi waibɨa chepipachi o–ĩa pꞌaneedamerã.
Pɨchi eperãarã na eujãde pꞌaneedakꞌãri, pɨa ãchidepema chupɨria beerã pia akꞌɨ bapachi.
Tachi Akꞌõre pedeeji. Maapꞌeda wẽraarã chokꞌaraarãpa irua jarada jaranajida:
“Parã eere pꞌanɨɨrã naa reyrã ãchi soldaorã ome jĩchoo wãruta. Ma awara teeda wẽraarãpa nãgee netꞌaa mãɨrã juadeepa jãri atadapꞌedaa tꞌoomaa pꞌanɨ:
paloma isia kꞌara pꞌaratꞌapa pꞌẽeda mãikꞌaapa isia uchiterree bee nẽedee ooda. Mãɨmisa parã kꞌãi jõnɨda ajida, ovejaarã pꞌe atadapꞌedaa kꞌaitꞌa.”
Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨapa ma reyrã pꞌoyaakꞌãri, Salmón eede ãra kꞌapꞌɨa piuda audú chokꞌara paraada perã, nieve baaidákꞌapɨ baji.
Basán eujãdepema ee waibɨa bee mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌɨa bee.
¿Sãapꞌeda ma Basandepema eepa Sinaí ee unuamaa pɨkꞌa iru bɨma? Tachi Akꞌõrepa Basandepema ee jɨrɨtꞌera–e paji mama bapariitꞌee. Sinaí eeta jɨrɨtꞌeraji ma eede ichita bapariitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa chõopata carreta caballopa jidiupata millón waa iru bɨ. Sinaí eedeepa made cheji ichi tedee.

Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ ee nokꞌodee wãkꞌãri, pɨa pꞌoyaadaarã chokꞌara pɨ ome ateeji. Maapꞌeda eperãarãpa pɨmaa netꞌaa pia teejida mãikꞌaapa ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa paara pɨmaa netꞌaa pia teejida, pɨ jua ekꞌari pꞌaneedapꞌedaa perã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa; tai kꞌaripapari. ¡Pɨ tꞌãri pia bapari perã, ewari chaa tai kꞌaripapari!
Tachi Akꞌõrépata tachi kꞌaripapari. Eperãarã jõmaarãta Tachi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata. Iruata tachi kꞌaripapari piunaadamerã.
Mamĩda ichi kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã poro piarsĩitꞌee, ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanapata perã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachimaa jara bɨ: “Mɨa parã Basán eujãdeepa chepiitꞌee; pꞌusa nãpɨa pɨkꞌa bɨdeepa chepiitꞌee
parãpa pãchi kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã jõpidamerã mãikꞌaapa usaarãpa ãchi waa senedamerã.”
Mɨchi Akꞌõre Waibɨa, pɨ eperãarã pɨ tede aukꞌa tꞌĩudakꞌãri, akꞌɨpipata pɨ waawee pꞌanɨ, pɨ tai rey perã.
Mãgá tꞌĩudakꞌãri, kꞌaripataarã jõmaarã naa wãpata. Ãra tꞌẽe música ne–inaa cuerdapa chaapataarã wãpata. Mãɨrã ome awẽraarãpa pandero chaa wãpata.
Chipꞌedaidakꞌãri, ¡Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarátɨ! Israeldeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã jõmaweda, ¡irumaa kꞌarítɨ!

Israelitaarã naa nipapata Israel warra tꞌẽepema, Benjamindeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã; aɨ eere nipapata Judadeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã poro waibɨarã; aɨ eere Zabulondeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã poro waibɨarã mãikꞌaapa aɨ eere Neftalideepa uchiadapꞌedaarã poro waibɨarã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ichita pɨa pɨchi eperãarã juataura papipachi. ¡Waya naawedapemakꞌa tai kꞌaripáji!
Pɨ te Jerusalende bairã, mamaa reyrãpa netꞌaa pia ateepata.
Ma tedeepa pɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã ɨtrɨ́aji. Mãɨrã ne–animal kꞌachia beerã totora–idaade miru pꞌanapatákꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ.
Mãgá Egipto eujãdeepa ãchi poro waibɨarã pɨmaa chedaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Etiopiadepemaarãpa ãchi jua pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa ɨadaitꞌee, ãchi chupɨria kꞌawaamerã.
Maperã na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã, Tachi Akꞌõremaa salmo kꞌarítɨ.
Iru pajã ɨtꞌɨara bɨde nipapari. Ma pajã ichita baji. Ma pajãdeepa iru pedeekꞌãri, pa jĩwaaparikꞌa nɨ̃beepari.
Jarapatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Iru israelitaarã rey. Ne–inaa pajãde nɨ̃bɨde iru jua unupata.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ baparimãiipa pɨ jua unupikꞌãri, eperãarãpa pɨ waawee pꞌaneepata. Pɨ israelitaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa perã, awaraa pꞌuuru pidaarã kꞌãyaara pɨa ãra juataura papipari.
¡Jõmaarãpa pɨmaa pedee pia jaradaipia bɨ!
Mɨchi Akꞌõre Waibɨa, mɨ kꞌaripa chéji mɨ eperã toida ɨ̃yapa jɨ̃a piu wã́kꞌapɨ bairã.
Yooro susuade mɨ jaudarúkꞌapɨ bɨ; pꞌoyaa bainɨ̃ bee–ee. Nãpɨade tꞌaa nɨ̃bɨ́kꞌapɨ bɨ. Kꞌida chaareepa mɨ to barree atee wãrúkꞌapɨ bɨ.
Bia nɨ̃bɨpa mɨ sẽdaru mãikꞌaapa mɨ o pꞌoo nɨ̃bɨ. Taarã akꞌɨ nɨ̃bɨpa mɨchi tau tꞌũmaadaru, nɨmaa bɨ misa mɨchi Akꞌõre Waibɨapa mɨ kꞌaripa chemerã.

Chokꞌaraarãpa mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanɨ, mɨa ãramaa maarepida ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–e bɨ mĩda. Mãɨrã chokꞌaraara pꞌanɨ mɨ puda kꞌãyaara. Mɨ kꞌãyaara juataura pꞌanɨ. Mɨ ãpɨte seewa jarapata mãikꞌaapa ichi kꞌinia pedeeteepata mɨ jõpidaitꞌee. Jara pꞌanɨ mɨa ãchi netꞌaa chɨada pari ãchimaa ne–inaa teemerã, ãra netꞌaa maarepida chɨa–e paji mĩda.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa kꞌawa bɨ mɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee badoo. Mɨa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopariida pꞌoyaa mera–e, pɨa jõmaweda kꞌawapari perã.

Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Mɨa ne–inaa oopariida kꞌaurepa pɨ waaweepataarã kꞌĩra nejasiapináaji. Israelitaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa, mɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopariida kꞌaurepa pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataarã kꞌĩra nejasiapináaji.
Pɨde ijãa bɨ kꞌaurepa mɨmaa ikꞌachia jarapata mãikꞌaapa mɨ kꞌĩra nejasiapipata.
Mɨchi aukꞌaarãpa, mɨ nawe warrarãpa pida mɨ kꞌĩra tewaraakꞌa unu pꞌanɨ.
Mɨa pɨ te audú kꞌinia iru bapari perã, mɨmaa ikꞌachia jarapata, pɨ ãpɨte ikꞌachia jarapatakꞌa.
Mɨ tꞌãri pꞌuapa jẽekꞌãri mãikꞌaapa nekꞌo–ee ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃kꞌãri, mɨmaa ikꞌachia pedee jarapata.
Chi–ɨapata pꞌaru jɨ̃kꞌãri, mɨ oo iru pꞌaneepata.
Pꞌuurudepema puerta chaa pꞌuuru pidaarãpa mɨ ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jarapata. Itꞌuapa piu beerãpa kꞌaripata mɨ oo iru pꞌanadaitꞌee.

Mamĩda, Tachi Akꞌõre, tꞌãripa mɨa pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pariitꞌee. Pɨa kꞌinia bakꞌãri, mɨa iidi bɨ pꞌanáuji. Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ kꞌaripáji pɨa mɨ kꞌinia iru bapari perã mãikꞌaapa pɨa jara bɨkꞌa ichita oopari perã.
Eperã yooro susuade jaudaiparikꞌa maa–e pɨrã nãpɨade tꞌaadaiparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ baai wã mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã juade. Mapa mɨ kꞌaripáji.

Kꞌida chaaree bɨpa eperã ãyaa ateeparikꞌa maa–e pɨrã pania pꞌɨrrabai jira bɨpa eperã sõ ataparikꞌa maa–e pɨrã uria nãpɨade eperã baaiparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mãɨrãpa mɨ jõpi kꞌinia pꞌanɨ. Mapa mɨ kꞌaripáji.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ pꞌanáuji pɨ tꞌãri pia bapari perã mãikꞌaapa mɨ kꞌinia iru bapari perã. Mɨ kꞌaripáji pɨa mɨ chupɨria kꞌawaapari perã.
Mɨ pɨ mimiapari. Maperã mɨ yiaraa iru banáaji. Isapai mɨ kꞌaripa chéji, mɨ audú kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bairã.
Mɨ kꞌaitꞌa chéji mãikꞌaapa mɨ kꞌaripáji mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã juade baainaamerã.
Pɨa kꞌawa bɨ mɨ ãpɨte ikꞌachia jarapata, mɨ kꞌĩra nejasiapipata mãikꞌaapa mɨ oo iru pꞌanapata. Pɨata mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã kꞌawa bɨ.
Mɨmaa mãgá ikꞌachia jaradakꞌãri, mɨ tꞌãri pꞌuapipata. Mapa mɨ juatau wẽe nɨ̃bɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌapꞌɨa tꞌũmaa nɨ̃bɨ. Mɨa unu–e apidaapa mɨ chupɨria kꞌawaamerã mãikꞌaapa mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩapimerã.
Mãɨrãpa mɨmaa chikꞌo teedakꞌãri, asia baji neera kꞌachiakꞌa. Opisia bakꞌãri, vino achuchua bɨta topijida.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa kꞌinia bɨ ãchia chikꞌo pia kꞌo pꞌanɨ misa mãikꞌaapa kꞌãiwee pꞌanɨ misa, pɨa ãchi kꞌachiade baaipimerã, eperãpa ne–animal trampade baaipiparikꞌa.
¡Kꞌinia bɨ pɨa ãchi tau pꞌãriupimerã mãikꞌaapa ãchi ichita juatau wẽe pꞌanapimerã!
Akꞌɨpíji pɨ ãchi ome kꞌĩrau bɨ. Tꞌɨpɨtau uruapa ne–uu paa jõtꞌaaparikꞌa nãupa atee wãkꞌãri, ¡mãga pɨkꞌa ãchi jõpíji pɨ kꞌĩraupa!
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ ãchi te jẽra bɨmãi eperãarã wẽe pꞌaneedamerã mãikꞌaapa ãchi te ne–edee oodade apida pꞌananaadamerã.
Ãchimaa mãga pꞌasaipia bɨ mɨ, chi eperã pɨa kꞌĩra pia–ee papida jɨrɨpata perã peedaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa mɨ, chi eperã pɨa tꞌãri pꞌuapida oo iru pꞌanapata perã.
Ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa kꞌirãpáji mãikꞌaapa pꞌã bë́iji. Ãchia ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa ãyaa bɨnáaji.
Ãchi tꞌɨ̃ chokꞌai pꞌanɨɨrã tꞌɨ̃ ɨtꞌari pꞌã iru bɨdeepa wẽpapíji. Ãchi tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã bɨnáaji pɨa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã jẽra bɨde.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ chupɨria kꞌawáaji, mɨ mia nɨ̃bairã. Mɨ kꞌaripáji kꞌachiade baainaamerã.
Kꞌaride mɨa jaraitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌɨ̃ jõmaweda tꞌɨ̃ kꞌãyaara pipɨara bɨ. Kꞌaride irumaa gracias jaraitꞌee.
Mãga ũrikꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõre audupɨara o–ĩara beeitꞌee, iru–itꞌee pꞌakꞌa kꞌapꞌɨa, chi cacho, bɨɨrɨ paara paapida kꞌaurepa o–ĩa bai kꞌãyaara.
Chupɨria chedeerãpa unudakꞌãri mɨa mãgá Tachi Akꞌõremaa kꞌarimaa bɨ, o–ĩa pꞌaneedaitꞌee. Mapa parã, Tachi Akꞌõre jɨrɨpataarã, o–ĩa pꞌanéetɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa chupɨria chedeerã pedee ũripari mãikꞌaapa awaraarã jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã kꞌaripapari.
Mapa jõmaweda chokꞌai beerã, Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ; ɨtꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã; na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨɨrã; pꞌusade pꞌanɨɨrã paara,
Tachi Akꞌõrepa Sión eedepemaarã kꞌaripaitꞌee perã. Irua Judá eujãdepema pꞌuuru waya chiwidi oopiitꞌee. Mama ichi pꞌuuru pidaarã pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Iru–itꞌee mimiapataarã warrarãpa ma eujã jɨ̃adaitꞌee. Iru kꞌinia iru pꞌanapataarã mama pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Aai Tachi Akꞌõre, ¡mɨ kꞌaripa chéji! ¡Isapai na nepɨradeepa mɨ uchiapíji!

Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ mɨ peedaitꞌee jɨrɨ pꞌanɨɨrãpa kꞌawada–ee pꞌaneedamerã kꞌãata kꞌĩsiadai mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra nejasia pꞌaneedamerã. Kꞌinia bɨ mɨmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrã kꞌĩra nejasiapa ãpɨtee jĩchoodamerã.
¡Kꞌinia bɨ mãgá kꞌĩra nejasiapa mɨ oo iru pꞌanapataarã ãpɨtee wãdamerã!
Mamĩda kꞌinia bɨ pɨ jɨrɨpataarã o–ĩa pꞌaneedamerã mãikꞌaapa pɨa kꞌaripadaarãpa ichita jaradamerã: “¡Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ!”
Aai Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ chupɨria nɨ̃bɨ. ¡Isapai mɨ kꞌaripa chéji! Pɨa aupai mɨ kꞌaripai mãikꞌaapa na nepɨradeepa uchiapii. Maperã ¡taarãnáaji!
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa ijãa bɨ pɨa mɨ jɨ̃apari. ¡Maperã mɨ kꞌĩra nejasiapináaji!
Pɨa ichita ne–inaa jõma pia oopari perã, mɨ kꞌaripa chéji mãikꞌaapa na nepɨradeepa mɨ uchiapíji. Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ ũríji mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripáji.
Mãu choma bɨ ãpɨte tachi miruparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ pɨde miru kꞌinia bɨ. Mɨ kꞌaripáji mɨ–itꞌee pɨ murallapa pꞌuuru tꞌɨakꞌau bɨkꞌa bairã.
Mɨchi Akꞌõre Waibɨa, mɨ kꞌaripáji pɨde ijãadakꞌaa beerã juade baainaamerã, mãɨrãpa chĩara peepata perã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanapata perã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ne–inaa jõmaweda pɨ jua ekꞌari nɨ̃bɨ. Kꞌũtrãaweda mɨa pɨde ijãapari.
Mɨ tꞌodakꞌãriipa pɨata mɨ akꞌɨ bapari. Pɨata mɨ tꞌopiji. ¡Maperã ichita mɨa pɨmaa pedee pia jarapariitꞌee!
Eperãarã chokꞌaraarãpa mɨmaa akꞌɨdakꞌãri, pꞌera akꞌɨtrua para beepari. Mamĩda pɨata mɨ jɨ̃apari.
Mɨa pɨmaa pedee pia jarapari mãikꞌaapa ewari chaa mɨa jara bɨ pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ.
Mɨ yiaraa iru banáaji chonaa pakꞌãri. Mɨ juatau wẽe beekꞌãri, mɨ atabëináaji.
Mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa mɨ ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia pedeepata mãikꞌaapa pedeeteepata mɨ peedaitꞌee.
Mãgapata: “Iru tꞌẽe wã́tɨ mãikꞌaapa jita atátɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ituaba atabëida perã. ¡Eperã apidaapa iru kꞌaripada–e paitꞌee!”
Mɨchi Akꞌõre Waibɨa, ¡mɨ ikꞌaawaapa ãyaa wãnáaji! Isapai mɨ kꞌaripa chéji.

Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ mɨ ɨmɨateepataarãpa kꞌawada–ee pꞌaneedamerã kꞌãata kꞌĩsiadai mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra nejasia pꞌaneedamerã. Kꞌinia bɨ awaraarãpa mɨ kꞌachiade baaipi kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãkꞌa unudamerã.
Mamĩda ewari chaa mɨa ichita pɨde ijãapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa waapɨara pɨmaa pedee pia jarapariitꞌee.
Ewari chaa mɨa jaraitꞌee pɨa ichita ne–inaa pia oopari mãikꞌaapa jaraitꞌee sãgá pɨa tai kꞌaripapari. Tꞌãripa mɨa mãga ijãa bɨ. Mamĩda mɨa pia kꞌawa–e bɨ sãgá pɨa mãga oopari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ne–inaa jõmaweda pɨ jua ekꞌari nɨ̃bɨ. Mɨa nepɨrɨitꞌee pɨ juapa ne–inaa pi–ia oopari. Jaraitꞌee pɨa aupaita ichita ne–inaa pia oopari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ kꞌũtrãaweda pɨa mɨmaa ne–inaa pia jarateepari. Mapa atꞌãri mɨa eperãarãmaa jarapari ma ne–inaa pia mãikꞌaapa pɨa ne–inaa pia oopari.

Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ chonaa pakꞌãri, poro tꞌorroodaikꞌãri, mɨ ituaba atabëináaji. Mɨa nãgawedapemaarãmaa atꞌãri jara kꞌinia bɨ pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ mãikꞌaapa tꞌẽe tꞌodaitꞌeerãmaa jaratee kꞌinia bɨ pɨa ne–inaa pia oopari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, eperãarãpa pajã audú ɨtꞌɨa bɨ pꞌoyaa kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨkꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa pꞌoyaa kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ sãgá pɨa ichita ne–inaa pia oopari. ¡Awaraa pɨkꞌa wẽ–e!
Pɨa mɨ nepɨrade baaipipachi mĩda, ¡mɨ waya chokꞌai pɨkꞌapiitꞌee jãɨrade wãnaamerã!
Waya mɨ eperã waibɨakꞌa papiitꞌee mãikꞌaapa mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩapiitꞌee.

Mɨchi Akꞌõre Waibɨa, pɨa ichita oopari perã pɨa jara bɨkꞌa, mɨa pɨmaa kꞌariitꞌee, arpa chaa nɨ̃bɨde. Israelitaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa, pɨ kꞌachia wẽe bapari perã, mɨa pɨmaa salmo kꞌariitꞌee cítara chaa nɨ̃bɨde.
Tꞌãri o–ĩapa mɨa pɨmaa salmo kꞌariitꞌee, pɨa mɨ kꞌaripada perã piunaamerã.

Ewari ãree mɨa jaraitꞌee pɨa ne–inaa pia oopariida mɨ kꞌaripaitꞌee. Ma kꞌaripada kꞌaurepa mɨ kꞌachiade baaipi kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa kꞌawada–ee pꞌaneejida kꞌãata kꞌĩsiadai mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra nejasia pꞌaneejida.
Tachi Akꞌõre, tai reymaa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaapíji irua ne–inaa pia oomerã mãikꞌaapa pɨa ooparikꞌa eperãarãpa oopata akꞌɨmerã jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Chi warra rey beekꞌãri, aukꞌa kꞌaripáji.
Pɨa mãga ooru pɨrã, irua pɨ pꞌuuru pidaarã pɨa jara bɨkꞌa akꞌɨpariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa chupɨria chedeerã chupɨria kꞌawaaitꞌee.
Ee jẽra bɨmãiipa kꞌoi cheitꞌee na eujãde ne–uudapꞌedaa pia chaumerã mãikꞌaapa eperãarã pɨa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa pꞌanapataadamerã.
Tai reypa chupɨria chedeerã chupɨria kꞌawaaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripaitꞌee. Ichiaba ne–inaa falta pꞌanɨɨrã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mamĩda miapiitꞌee chi chĩara kꞌachia iru pꞌanapataarã ãchi jua ekꞌari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, akꞌõrejĩru nɨ̃bɨ misa mãikꞌaapa atane nɨ̃bɨ misa, mɨa kꞌinia bɨ tai, pɨ pꞌuuru pidaarãpa ichita pɨ waawee pꞌanapataadamerã.
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ tai reypa ichi jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã tꞌãri o–ĩapimerã, kꞌoipa eperãarã tꞌãri o–ĩapiparikꞌa ãchi ne–uu ɨ̃rɨ mãikꞌaapa na eujã ɨ̃rɨ baaikꞌãri.
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ iru rey bɨde, irua ichi jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã akꞌɨmerã pɨa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãgá ichi jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadai atane waa ɨ̃daa–e parumaa.
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ eujã iru jua ekꞌari beemerã pꞌusa aba ideepa awaraa pꞌusa i parumaa mãikꞌaapa Éufrates todeepa eujã tꞌɨmɨara bee parumaa.
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ eujã pania wẽe bɨde pꞌanapataarã iru kꞌĩrapite bedabaidamerã mãikꞌaapa irua ichi kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã pꞌoyaakꞌãri, ãra audua–ee pꞌaneedamerã
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ Tarsidepemaarã reypa, pꞌusa idepema eujã tꞌɨmɨ́ beede pꞌanapataarã reyrãpa, Sabadepemaarã reypa mãikꞌaapa Sebadepemaarã reypa tai reymaa ne–inaa pi–ia tee chedamerã.
Kꞌinia bɨ reyrã jõmaweda iru kꞌĩrapite bedabaidamerã mãikꞌaapa awara–awaraa eujãdepemaarã jõmaweda iru jua ekꞌari pꞌanapataadamerã.
Mãgá chupɨria chedeerã mãikꞌaapa netꞌaa falta beerã nepɨrade baaidakꞌãri, irua ãra kꞌaripai.
Irua audua–ee beerã mãikꞌaapa chupɨria chedeerã chupɨria kꞌawaaitꞌee ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã juadeepa chokꞌai uchiadamerã.
Mãgá ãra kꞌaripaitꞌee ãra kꞌachia iru pꞌanɨɨrã juadeepa, ãra kꞌinia iru bapari perã.

¡Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ tai rey ichita bapariimerã! Kꞌinia bɨ Sabadepema nẽe irumaa tee chedamerã. Kꞌinia bɨ iru pari eperãarãpa ichita ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadamerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌinia bɨ ewari chaa nejõmaade Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru bendiciamerã.

Kꞌinia bɨ iru rey bɨde, na eujã jõmaade trigo waibɨa paraamerã Líbano eujãde paraaparikꞌa mãikꞌaapa ee jẽra beede paara nãupa trigo kꞌarra nẽunẽuwaapimerã. Kꞌinia bɨ na eujãdepema pꞌuurude eperãarã chokꞌara pꞌanapataadamerã, pꞌũajara kꞌɨmɨ chakꞌeerã cho–kꞌara chaupatakꞌa.

Kꞌinia bɨ eperãarãpa tai rey tꞌɨ̃ ichita kꞌirãpadamerã mãikꞌaapa iru tꞌɨ̃ ichita tꞌo pꞌanadamerã, akꞌõrejĩru ichita ɨ̃daaparikꞌa. Kꞌinia bɨ iru kꞌaurepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã chikꞌaripa pꞌanapataadamerã mãikꞌaapa jõmaarãpa tꞌãri o–ĩa iru tꞌɨ̃ jarapataadamerã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, israelitaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa, jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Irua aupaita oopari ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa.
¡Iru tꞌɨ̃ jõmaweda tꞌɨ̃ kꞌãyaara ichita pipɨara baitꞌee, iru kꞌĩra wãree bapari perã! ¡Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ jõmaarãpa iru kꞌĩra wãree unudamerã! ¡Wãarapɨ!
Mãgapai paji Isaí warra Davidpa kꞌaride ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃da.
¡Wãara, Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌãri pia bapari israelitaarã ome; chi tꞌãripa irua jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã ome!
Mɨa naaweda kꞌĩsia badakꞌa atꞌãri kꞌĩsia bada paara, kꞌachiade baaikꞌaji, pꞌãrikꞌua eperã eujãde baaidaiparikꞌa.
Mɨa unukꞌãri ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa netꞌaa pia pꞌe ata wãda, ma audua beerã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru beeji ma netꞌaa pꞌe wãdapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa.
Mãɨrã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapata mãikꞌaapa kꞌapꞌɨa pia pꞌanapata.
Awaraarãkꞌa kꞌĩsia jõnadakꞌaa mãikꞌaapa nepɨrade baaidakꞌaa.
Maperã eperãpa collar jɨ̃parikꞌa jõmaarãpa iru pia unudamerã, mãga pɨkꞌa mãɨrã audua nipapata mãikꞌaapa eperãpa pꞌaru jɨ̃parikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mãɨrãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopata.
Tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa pꞌanɨ perã, ichi kꞌinia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata ãchia kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanɨkꞌa.
Chĩara ooyaa pꞌanapata mãikꞌaapa audua pꞌanadairã, jarapata awaraarã ãchi jua ekꞌari kꞌachia iru pꞌanapata.
Tachi Akꞌõre ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jarapata mãikꞌaapa na eujãdepemaarãmaa jarapata ãchia kꞌinia pꞌanɨkꞌa oopataadamerã.
Maperã Tachi Akꞌõre eperãarãpa paara mãɨrã tꞌo pꞌanapata mãikꞌaapa ãra pedee ijãapata.
Mãɨrãpa nãga jarapata: “¿Sãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawaima tachia ne–inaa oopata? ¿Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨapa kꞌawaikꞌã?” apata.
Mãgee Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa mãga oopata mãikꞌaapa kꞌãiwee pꞌanapata ãchi–itꞌee pꞌaratꞌa ata wãruta misa.
Mãga pɨrã, ¿kꞌãare–itꞌee mɨa ooipia bɨma Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa? ¿Kꞌãare–itꞌee ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–ee baipia bɨma
ewari chaa irua mɨ ichiakꞌau bɨru pɨrã wɨdamerã mãikꞌaapa tapꞌeda chaa mɨ ichiakꞌau bɨru pɨrã miapidamerã?
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa ma ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãkꞌa kꞌĩsiada paara wa pedeeda paara, pɨ eperãarã traicionaakꞌaji, ãrakꞌa ijãa–e bakꞌaji perã.
Ma jõmaade kꞌĩsiakꞌãri, mɨa pꞌoyaa kꞌawa–e paji.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre tede tꞌĩukꞌãrita, mamata mɨa kꞌawaaji mãɨrãmaa kꞌãata pꞌasaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, wãara pɨa ãchi eujã pirukꞌua pɨkꞌa bɨde pëiru aɨde wãdakꞌãri, jõdaidamerã.
Taarã–e nɨde jõdaitꞌee. ¡Pꞌera jõnɨpa jõdaitꞌee!
Eperãpa kꞌãimokꞌaraapꞌeda, aɨde unuda aɨ norema kꞌirãpakꞌaakꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa pɨa mɨ kꞌaripa chekꞌãri, mɨa ma ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã waa kꞌirãpa–e paitꞌee.
Mɨ tꞌãri ãrii, kꞌĩra pia–ee baji, pɨa mãgɨɨrãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–e pada perã.
Mãga baji wãara kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bada perã mãikꞌaapa pɨ pia kꞌawa–e bada perã. ¡Pɨ kꞌĩrapite mɨ ne–animalkꞌa baji!
Mãga baji mĩda, mɨ ichita pɨde ijãapari, pɨa mɨ juaraarepema juadeepa mɨ ateepari perã.
Mɨmaa pɨ ũraa kꞌawapipari mɨa kꞌawaamerã kꞌãata ooipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa tꞌẽepai mɨmaa pɨ kꞌĩra wãree akꞌɨpiitꞌee.
¿Pɨ awara mɨa kꞌaita ɨtꞌari iru bɨma? ¡Pɨa aupaita mɨ kꞌaripapari! Maperã mɨ–itꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ne–inaa apida vale–e bɨ.
Mɨ kꞌapꞌɨa mɨ tꞌãri ome jõdariitꞌee. Mamĩda mɨ ichita bapariitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre ome, irua mɨ jaure jɨ̃apari perã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨde ijãadaamaa pꞌanɨɨrã mãikꞌaapa pɨa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oodakꞌaa beerã pɨa jõpiitꞌee.

Mamĩda mɨta Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌaitꞌa bapariitꞌee. Ne–inaa jõma nɨ̃bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari nɨ̃bairã, mɨ–itꞌee iru pꞌuuru murallapa tꞌɨakꞌau bɨ́kꞌapɨ bɨ. Maperã mɨa jõmaarãmaa jaraitꞌee irua ne–inaa oopari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ¿sãapꞌeda tai yiaraa iru bɨma? ¿Ichita tai nãgá iru baitꞌeekꞌã? ¿Sãapꞌeda pɨchi eperãarã ome kꞌĩrau bɨma? Tai pɨ ovejaarã́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ.
Pɨchi pꞌuuru pidaarã akꞌɨ́ji, chonaarãweda pɨa tai jɨrɨtꞌerada perã pɨchi eperãarã pamerã. Sión ee akꞌɨ́ji, pɨ mama bapachi perã.
¡Pɨ bapariidamãi akꞌɨ chéji, tai kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa ma jõma; pɨ te, netꞌaa jõmaweda aɨde nɨ̃bada paara, jõpidapꞌedaa perã!
Mama pɨ tai ome unupariidamãi ãchi o–ĩa kꞌari pꞌanɨ pɨ pꞌuuru pidaarã pꞌoyaadapꞌedaa perã. Awaraa eujãdepemaarã bandera mama baijira bɨ pꞌanɨ.
Ãchi mẽe pakꞌuru tꞌupeepataarã́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ.
Chaarapa mãikꞌaapa martillopa pɨ tedepema pakꞌuru nonoree beeda paara ãrikꞌoojida.
Pɨ te tꞌeedapꞌeda, tꞌɨpɨtaupa paatꞌaajida. Mãga oojida mama apida pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃naadamerã.
Ãchi tꞌãridepai mãgajida: “¡Na jõmaweda yooro pꞌorakꞌa papidaitꞌee!” Mapa ichiaba paakꞌoo wãjida jõmaweda pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patapꞌedaamãi na eujãde pꞌanadapꞌedaa.

Ɨ̃rá unudakꞌaa ne–inaa taipa mama iru pꞌanadapꞌedaa pɨ kꞌirãpadaitꞌee. Ichiaba pɨ pedee jarapari apida unudakꞌaa, waa wẽ–e perã. Mapa kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ sãapai jõitꞌee na ne–inaa kꞌachia taimaa pꞌasa nɨ̃bɨ.
Aai Tachi Akꞌõre, ¿sãapai tai kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa pɨ waa oo iru pꞌanada–e paima? ¿Ichita pɨ ãpɨte ikꞌachia pedeedaitꞌeekꞌã?
¿Sãapꞌeda pɨchi jua merã pɨkꞌa iru bɨma? ¿Sãapꞌeda pɨa tai kꞌaripa–ema?
Aai Tachi Akꞌõre, chonaarãwedadeepa pɨ mɨ rey. Pɨata na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã kꞌaripa kꞌinia bɨ.
Pɨ juapa pꞌusa tꞌooji aɨ esajĩakꞌa eujã pꞌoo uchiamerã mãikꞌaapa mãgá nemĩsiarã pꞌanapatapꞌedaamãi jõpiji.
Leviatán
Pɨa ooji pania poátrɨ uchia bee, to mãikꞌaapa to chakꞌe. Jõdee to ichita weepatapꞌedaa pꞌoopiji.
Pɨa ewari mãikꞌaapa pꞌãrikꞌua ooji. Ichiaba pɨa atane mãikꞌaapa akꞌõrejĩru ooji.
Pɨa na pꞌekꞌau eujã ookꞌãri, eujã pꞌusadeepa uchiapiji pɨa bɨdamãi beemerã. Ichiaba pɨa pꞌoojara mãikꞌaapa kꞌoijara ooji.
Tachi Akꞌõre, kꞌirãpáji pɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa pɨ oo iru pꞌanapata mãikꞌaapa ma kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerãpa pɨ ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jarapata.
Tai kꞌĩra atuanáaji tai, pɨchi eperãarã tortolakꞌa pꞌanadairã. Juatau wẽe, chupɨria pꞌanapata. Tai baaipináaji ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã juade, mãɨrã ne–animal kꞌachia beerãkꞌa pꞌanadairã.
Kꞌirãpáji pɨa pacto ooda tai chonaarã ome, na eujã jõmaade tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa beerãpa ne–inaa audú kꞌachia oomaa pꞌanadairã.
Ma tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa beerãmaa pɨ eperãarã kꞌĩra nejasiapináaji. Ma kꞌãyaara chupɨria chedeerã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa falta beerã jɨ̃́aji, ãrapa pɨmaa pedee pia jarapataadamerã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, tai kꞌaripa chéji. Taimaa akꞌɨpíji pɨa wãara ne–inaa pia oopari pɨ eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Kꞌirãpáji ewari chaa kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerãpa pɨ ãpɨte ikꞌachia pedeepata.
Kꞌĩra atuanáaji pɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa oomaa pꞌanɨ. Mãgɨ́ ijãadakꞌaa beerã pɨa jara bɨkꞌa oodaamaa pꞌanadairã, pɨ ãpɨte ikꞌachia bia wãpata.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨmaa gracias jarapata, pɨ tai kꞌaitꞌa bapari perã. Jõmaarãpa jarapata pɨa ne–inaa pia oopari; ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa nãga jara bɨ: “Mɨa ewari jɨrɨtꞌeraitꞌee bɨ ewate eperãarãpa oopata akꞌɨpꞌeda, jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Mɨa mãga ookꞌãri, ne–inaa pia ooitꞌee mɨa ichita ne–inaa pia oopari perã.
Na pꞌekꞌau eujã aɨde pꞌanapataarã ome wëre nɨ̃beekꞌãri, mɨata waa wërepi–e paitꞌee jõnaadamerã.”
Audua beerãmaa mɨa jara bɨ: “Audua pedee jaranáatɨ.” Jõdee mɨde ijãadakꞌaa beerãmaa mɨa jara bɨ: “Audua pꞌananáatɨ.”
“Audua pꞌananáatɨ pãchi juapa ne–inaa jõma oodai jĩakꞌaapa. Ma awara audua pedee jaranáatɨ.”
Eperãarã waibɨara papipari wa ekꞌariara papipari bakꞌaa oriente eere, occidente eere, norte eere wa sur eere.
Ɨtꞌariipa Tachi Akꞌõrépata akꞌɨpari eperãarãpa oopata jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Irua ũkꞌuru kꞌĩra nejasiapipari; ũkꞌuru waibɨa papipari.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa copa iru bɨ ichi juade. Ma copa ipuru bɨ ichi kꞌĩraupa. Irua ma copa weekꞌãri, jõmaweda na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema irude ijãadakꞌaa beerãmaa mãgee vino topiitꞌee jõdarumaa.
Mɨa ichita jaraitꞌee Jacobpa ijãada Akꞌõre Waibɨapa ne–inaa oopari mãikꞌaapa tꞌãripa irumaa salmo kꞌariitꞌee.
Iruata irude ijãadakꞌaa beerã, ma audua beerã ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata jõpiitꞌee. Jõdee irua jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã juataura papiitꞌee.
Judá eujãdepemaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawapata. Israelitaarãpa iru waaweepata.
Iru te Salén
Mama iru kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã jura chõopata arma ãrikꞌooji; escudo, espada mãikꞌaapa ematrɨma, sia kꞌida ome.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ ee ɨtꞌɨa beedeepa chekꞌãri, pɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã pꞌoyaapꞌeda, pɨ wãara jõmaarã kꞌãyaara kꞌĩra wãreera bɨ mãikꞌaapa jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ.
Mãɨrã soldaorã sõcharra pꞌanajida mĩda, pɨa ãra piupiji. Chõo kꞌawaa pꞌanajida mĩda, ãchi netꞌaa wẽe pꞌaneejida. Waa ãchi juapa awaraarã netꞌaa jãri atada–e paitꞌee.
Jacobpa ijãada Akꞌõre Waibɨa, pɨa ãchi ɨtrɨakꞌãri, pꞌera jõnɨpa ãchi caballoorã, aɨ ɨ̃rɨ wãdapꞌedaarã paara piukꞌoodachida.
¡Wãara, jõmaarãpa pɨ aupai waaweedaipia bɨ! ¿Kꞌaita pɨ kꞌĩrapite akꞌɨnɨ̃ baima pɨ kꞌĩrau bakꞌãri?
Ɨtꞌariipa pɨa jaraji chisãgɨ́ eperãarãpa ne–inaa pia oopata mãikꞌaapa chisãgɨɨrãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata. Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde nɨ̃bɨ jõmaweda kꞌĩupꞌee beeji
pɨa chupɨria chedeerã, awara–awaraa eujãdepemaarã jua ekꞌari kꞌachia pꞌanapatapꞌedaarã kꞌaripa chekꞌãri. Pɨa ãra mãgá kꞌaripaji ãrapa pɨ kꞌĩrapite ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.

Edom eujãdepemaarã pɨ ome kꞌĩrau pꞌanajida. Mamĩda pɨa ma chupɨria chedeerã mãɨrã juadeepa uchiapikꞌãri, ãrapa pɨmaa o–ĩa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pachida. Mapa ãra mãikꞌaapa awaraa chupɨria chedeerã Jamat pꞌuuru pidaarã juadeepa uchiapidaarã pɨ poro jɨ̃rákꞌapɨ bɨ.

Israelitaarã, ɨ̃rá óotɨ parãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa jaradapꞌedaakꞌa, atꞌãri mãɨrã jua ekꞌari kꞌachia pꞌanapataadakꞌãri. Na eujã ikꞌaawa pꞌanapataarãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa netꞌaa pia aneedaipia bɨ, iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ perã. Eperãarãpa iru waaweedaipia bɨ.
Iruata eperãarã poro waibɨarã audua–ee papipari mãikꞌaapa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema reyrã pꞌerapipari.
Mɨa Tachi Akꞌõremaa golpe ɨtꞌaa iidipari kꞌinia bairã irua ũrimerã.
Mɨ kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõre jɨrɨpari. Pꞌãrikꞌua ichita mɨ jua irumaa ɨtꞌaa ɨapari ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ nɨ̃bɨde. Mamĩda mɨ tꞌãri pꞌua nɨ̃bɨ wẽpa–e.
Mɨa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌirãpakꞌãri, jẽedaipari mãikꞌaapa irude kꞌĩsia nɨ̃beepari. Mamĩda mɨchi tꞌãride pꞌoyaa chookꞌaa.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa mɨ kꞌãipi–e. Mɨ pꞌoyaa pedee–e audú kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bairã.
Mɨa kꞌirãpapari mɨ ewari bapariida mãikꞌaapa año wãyaadapꞌedaa.
Kꞌirãpa bɨ sãgá naaweda pꞌãrikꞌua mɨa música chaapachi. Mɨchi tꞌãridepai iidi bɨ:
“¿Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichita tai yiaraa iru baitꞌeekꞌã? ¿Waa tai pia akꞌɨ–e paitꞌeekꞌã?
¿Waa tai kꞌinia iru ba–e paitꞌeekꞌã? ¿Irua tai chonaarãmaa jarada jõpijikꞌã? ¿Waa tai mãikꞌaapa taideepa uchiadaitꞌeerã kꞌaripa–e paitꞌeekꞌã?
¿Kꞌirãpa–ekꞌã ichia taimaa pia oopariida? Audú kꞌĩrau bairã tai ome, ¿waa tai chupɨria kꞌawa–e paitꞌeekꞌã?”
Ma awara mɨa kꞌĩsia bɨ: “Mɨ audupɨara kꞌĩsia paraa nɨ̃beepari, kꞌĩsiakꞌãri Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa juarapa waa tai kꞌaripa–e bɨ.
Made kꞌĩsiai kꞌãyaara, ɨ̃rá mɨa kꞌirãpaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa chonaarãweda ne–inaa pia oopariida tai pꞌuuru pidaarã kꞌaripaitꞌee; ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa.
Made kꞌĩsiaitꞌee. Kꞌirãpaitꞌee irua ne–inaa pi–ia oopariida.”
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ kꞌachia wẽe bapari perã, ichita ne–inaa jõma pia oopari. Awaraa akꞌõre waibɨa pɨkꞌa wẽ–e.
Pɨ juapa ne–inaa pi–ia oopari; ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa. Mãgá pɨ jua akꞌɨpipari pꞌuuru pidaarã chokꞌaraarãmaa.
Pɨ juapa pɨ pꞌuuru pidaarã, Jacobdeepa mãikꞌaapa Josedeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã kꞌaripa ataji awaraa eujãdepemaarã jua ekꞌariipa.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pꞌusapa pɨ unu pɨkꞌakꞌãri, pꞌɨrrabai nɨ̃beeji waaweepa; nãpɨa bɨmãi paara.
Jɨ̃araradeepa kꞌoi cheji mãikꞌaapa pajãde pa audú jĩwaa nɨ̃beeji. Eperãpa sia pariatua trɨkꞌajikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa pa baai wãji.
Pa pururua nɨ̃baji mãikꞌaapa pa tau pꞌorepꞌorepari nɨ̃baji. Mãga bɨde na eujã wëre nɨ̃beeji.
Pɨa pꞌusa tꞌooji eujã pꞌoo uchiamerã. Mamĩda apidaapa pɨ bɨɨrɨ unuda–e paji.
Pɨ pꞌuuru pidaarãmaa ma o akꞌɨpiji. Oveja akꞌɨparipa ichi ovejaarã ateeparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa Moisés kꞌapꞌɨa mãikꞌaapa Aarón kꞌapꞌɨa pɨa ãra ateeji.
Mɨchi aukꞌaarã, ũrítɨ mɨa jarateeru. Mɨ pedee ũrítɨ.
Mɨa nepɨrɨitꞌee jarateeitꞌee. Jaraitꞌee ne–inaa parãpa waide kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ, chonaarãwedadeepa ɨ̃rá parumaa nepɨrɨda–e pada perã.
Na ne–inaa tachi chonaarã itꞌaideepa ũridapꞌedaa mãikꞌaapa kꞌawaadapꞌedaa meranaadáma.

Ma kꞌãyaara tachi warrarãmaa jarateedáma, ãchia chi waide tꞌoda–e pꞌanɨɨrãmaa ma jõmaweda nepɨrɨdamerã. Mãgá ãchi jõmaarãpa kꞌawaadai Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ, irua ichita ne–inaa pi–ia oopari mãikꞌaapa irua oopari ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ley jara bëiji Jacobdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã–itꞌee. Ma ley jara pëiji ma israelitaarã made jara bɨkꞌa pꞌanapataadamerã. Jaraji tachi chonaarãpa ma ley ãchideepa uchiadaitꞌeerãmaa jarateedamerã.
Mãgá ãra tꞌẽe tꞌodaitꞌeerãpa ma ley aukꞌa kꞌawaadai mãikꞌaapa ãchideepa uchiadaitꞌeerãmaa jarateedai.
Kꞌinia baji ma jõmaarãpa irude ijãapataadamerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌirãpadamerã irua oopariida tachi pꞌuuru pidaarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Kꞌinia baji ichi eperãarãpa ma leyde jara bɨkꞌa oopataadamerã.

Kꞌinia–e paji ãchi ijãadaamaa pꞌaneedamerã ãchi chonaarãkꞌa. Mãɨrãpa oodaamaa pꞌanapachida irua jara bɨkꞌa. Kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerãkꞌa pꞌanapachida tꞌãride chooda–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. ¡Mãɨrãpa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa amaajida!
Maapai jura chõo jõnɨde Efraindeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã, chi ematrɨmapa chõo kꞌawaa beerã chõodapꞌedaamãiipa ãpɨtee wãjida.
Ooda–e paji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi ome pacto oodade jaradakꞌa. Ma kꞌãyaara irua jarateedakꞌa oodaamaa pꞌaneejida.
Ãchia kꞌĩra atuatꞌaajida irua ne–inaa pi–ia oopariida; ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa.
Mãga pꞌaneejida ãchi chonaarãpa ma ne–inaa pi–ia ooda ãchi taupa unujida mĩda, Egipto eujãde mãikꞌaapa Zoán eujãde pꞌanadakꞌãri.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa pꞌusa tꞌoopiji ãra eujã pꞌoo bɨde wãyaadamerã, ãchi ikꞌaawa irua pania pꞌusadepema murallakꞌa bɨru misa.
Ãstaawa jɨ̃ararade iru ãra naa wãji o kꞌawaa wãdamerã. Jõdee pꞌãrikꞌua tꞌɨpɨtaude mãga wãji.
Eujã pania wẽe bɨde wãyaadakꞌãri, irua peña tꞌoopiji aɨdeepa pania uchiamerã mãikꞌaapa ãrapa todamerã.
Ma peña bideepa pania uchiapiji tokꞌa weemerã.
Mãga unujida mĩda, ãchia iru kꞌĩrapite waapɨara pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oojida. Ma eujã pania wẽe bɨde ãchia oodaamaa pꞌaneejida Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨapa jaradakꞌa.
Irua ãchimaa chikꞌo teeji mĩda, ãchia chikꞌo kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaata iidijida.
Iru ãpɨte nãgá pedee kꞌachia pedeejida: “¿Na eujã pania wẽe bɨde Tachi Akꞌõrepa chikꞌo teeikꞌã?” ajida.
“Wãara irua peña wɨpikꞌãri, madeepa pania tokꞌa weeji. Mamĩda ¿ichi eperãarãmaa pan mãikꞌaapa nechiara teeikꞌã?” ajida.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma pedee ũrikꞌãri, kꞌĩraudachi Jacobdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã ome; ma Israeldeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã ome.
Ãra ome mãgá kꞌĩrau baji irude ijãada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. ¡Ijãada–e paji irua ãchi kꞌaripai!
Mãga pꞌanajida mĩda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaraji jɨ̃araradeepa baaimerã
ɨtꞌaripema pan, mãgɨ́ maná ãrapa kꞌodamerã.
Mãgá ãchi jõmaarãpa angeleerã chikꞌo kꞌojida. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgee chikꞌo waibɨa ãramaa pëiji, ãchi bi jãwaadarutamaa kꞌodamerã.
Iru juapa nãu pꞌuapiji oriente eereepa mãikꞌaapa sur eereepa.

Mãgá nechiara baaipiji ichi pꞌuuru pidaarã pꞌanadapꞌedaamãi. ¡Pajãdeepa kꞌoi baaipiparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa irua ipanaarã baaipiji! ¡Cho–kꞌara baaipiji yooro pꞌorakꞌa mãikꞌaapa pꞌusa idepema ipu nãusaakꞌa!
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma ipanaarã baaipiji ichi eperãarã pꞌanadapꞌedaamãi; ãchi te ne–edee oodapꞌedaa ikꞌaawa.
Kꞌojida bɨ jãwaadarutamaa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa teeda perã ãchia kꞌo kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaata.
Mamĩda taarã o–ĩa pꞌanada–e paji. Mapa ma chikꞌo kꞌo pꞌanɨ misa, atꞌãri itꞌaide bɨde,
Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩraudachi ãchi ome mãikꞌaapa ãchidepema juataura beerã peekꞌooji. Mãgá israelitaarã kꞌapꞌɨa piara pꞌanadapꞌedaarã piupiji.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi jua ãramaa mãgá akꞌɨpiji mĩda, waya pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopachida mãikꞌaapa ijãadakꞌaa paji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa pi–ia oodade; ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa.
Maperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra taarã pꞌanapi–e paji. Ĩyapa aba taarã–ee wãyaaparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa irua ãra taarã pꞌanapi–e paji. Taarã–e nɨde, ãra pꞌera jõnɨde irua ãra jõpiji.
Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra ũkꞌuru piupikꞌãri, waya iru jɨrɨpachida mãikꞌaapa waya tꞌãripa irude ijãa pꞌaneejida.
Mãga nɨde kꞌirãpajida ãchi–itꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre mãu choma bɨkꞌa baji irua ãchi jɨ̃apariida perã mãikꞌaapa kꞌirãpajida iru, Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨapa ãchi kꞌaripada awaraarã jua ekꞌariipa.
Maperã irumaa pedee pia jarajida. Mamĩda seewa paji.
Wãara tꞌãripa ijãadakꞌaa paji mãikꞌaapa oodakꞌaa paji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi chonaarã ome pacto oodade jara bɨkꞌa.

Mãga pꞌanajida mĩda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra chupɨria kꞌawaaji mãikꞌaapa ãrapa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa ãyaa bɨji. Atꞌapai ãrapa iru kꞌĩraupijida mĩda, irua ma kꞌĩrau tꞌumãtɨji mãikꞌaapa ãra jõpi–e paji.
Kꞌirãpaji ãra jĩpꞌa eperãarã; taarã–ee pꞌanadapꞌeda, nãukꞌa wẽpadaipata.
Eujã pania wẽe bɨde wãyaadakꞌãri, atꞌapai irua jaradakꞌa oo amaajida mãikꞌaapa ee jẽra bɨde wãyaadakꞌãri, iru tꞌãri pꞌuapijida.
Ijãadakꞌaa pada perã, atꞌapai iidijida iru jua ãchimaa akꞌɨpimerã. Mãgá israelitaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bɨta kꞌĩraupijida.
Kꞌirãpada–e paji iru juapa oopariida ãchi kꞌaripa ataitꞌee ãchi kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapatapꞌedaarã juadeepa.
Ma awara kꞌirãpada–e paji irua Egipto eujãde mãikꞌaapa Zoán eujãde ne–inaa pi–ia ooda; ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa.
Maapai irua toidapema pania waa papiji, Egipto pidaarãpa pania todaitꞌee wẽe pꞌaneedamerã.
Ichiaba irua mãɨrãmaa sĩta chokꞌara pëiji kꞌaakꞌoodamerã mãikꞌaapa baso chokꞌara pëiji ãra ne–inaa ãrikꞌoodamerã.
Ichiaba sisi chokꞌara pëiji ãra ne–uudapꞌedaa kꞌokꞌoodamerã.
Ichiaba hielo kꞌoi taukꞌa pëiji ãra uva kꞌãi mãikꞌaapa higuera pakꞌuru ãrikꞌoomerã.
Mãga bɨde ãra pꞌakꞌaarã piujida ma hielo tau baaidapa mãikꞌaapa ãra ovejaarã piujida pa baaidapa.

Ma jõma oodapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi jua mãɨrãmaa akꞌɨpiji. Akꞌɨpiji ichi ãra ome kꞌĩrau bada, ãra pia–ee akꞌɨ bada mãikꞌaapa ãra jõpiitꞌee bada. Irua ma ne–inaa kꞌachia ãramaa pëiji ichi angeleerã eperãarãmaa pëiparikꞌa.
Ãra ome iru audú kꞌĩrau bada perã, ãra ma ne–inaa kꞌachiadeepa chokꞌai uchiapi–e paji. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌayaa kꞌachiapa ãra kꞌiniipiji.
Te bee chaa Egipto pidaarã warrarã naapemaarã jõmaweda piupiji. Ma Camdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã warrarã naa tꞌodapꞌedaarã jõpiji.
Jõdee ichi pꞌuuru pidaarã, israelitaarã mamãikꞌaapa ateeji eujã pania wẽe bɨdee. Oveja akꞌɨparipa ichi ovejaarã pꞌe ateeparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa irua ãra ateeji.
Ãra pꞌoo bɨde ateeji pꞌeranaadamerã. Mamĩda ãra kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapatapꞌedaarã pꞌusade kꞌiniipiji.
¡Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi juarapa na ee jẽra bɨdepemaarã pꞌoyaapꞌeda, ichi pꞌuuru pidaarã aneeji namaa ichia jɨrɨtꞌerada eujãde!
Awaraa eujãdepemaarã na eujãde pꞌanapatapꞌedaarã jërekꞌooji israelitaarã naa. Mãpai mãɨrã eujã tꞌoopiji israelitaarã ëreerã chaachaa aɨde pꞌanapataadamerã ãchi te ne–edee oodade.
Mamĩda irua oo–e pada perã ãchia kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa, ãchia irude ijãadaamaa pꞌaneejida mãikꞌaapa oodaamaa pꞌaneejida Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa leyde jara bɨkꞌa.
Ãchi chonaarãpa oodapꞌedaakꞌa, ooda–e paji ãchia irumaa oodaitꞌeeda adapꞌedaakꞌa mãikꞌaapa iru traicionaajida. Ematrɨma jõree bakꞌãri kꞌachia uchiaparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa ãchi kꞌachia uchiajida.
Tachi Akꞌõre audú kꞌĩraupijida ee nokꞌode altar oodakꞌãri ne–inaa juapa ooda–itꞌee, awaraa akꞌõre waibɨa apatade ijãa kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.
Mãga unukꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõre audú kꞌĩrau beeji mãikꞌaapa ma israelitaarã yiaraa iru beeji.
Ichi te ne–edee ooda Siló eede bada atabaibëiji, eperãarã tꞌãide ma te ichi te paji mĩda.
Ma tede ichi kꞌĩra wãree baji mĩda mãikꞌaapa made ichi jua akꞌɨpiji mĩda, ma te jãri atapiji ichi kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapatapꞌedaarãmaa.
Ichi pꞌuuru pidaarã ome audú kꞌĩrau bada perã, ãra kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapatapꞌedaarãmaa espadapa peepiji, irua ãra jɨrɨtꞌeraji mĩda ichi eperãarã padamerã.
Mãgá israelitaarã kꞌũtrãarã jõpijida, tꞌɨpɨtaupa pꞌũajara pꞌooda jõpiparikꞌa. Mapa ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã wẽ–e paji ãra awẽraarã ome miakꞌãidaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa miakꞌãipata kꞌari kꞌaridakꞌaa paji.
Ichiaba mãɨrãpa pꞌaareerã espadapa peekꞌoo wãjida. Mapa ãra wẽraarãpa pꞌoyaa chi ɨada–e paji.
Mamĩda ma tꞌẽepai Tachi Akꞌõre ɨ̃rɨma pɨkꞌaji, tachi kꞌãimokꞌaraadeepa ɨ̃rɨmapatakꞌa maa–e pɨrã soldao vinopa piu bapꞌeda, biaparikꞌa.
Mãpai Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapatapꞌedaarã pꞌoyaaji mãikꞌaapa jërekꞌooji. Kꞌĩra nejasiapiji ichita mãga pꞌanapataadamerã.
Mamĩda Josedeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã yiaraa iru baji. Ma Efraín ëreerãdepemaarã jɨrɨtꞌera–e paji.
Mãgɨ́ israelitaarã jɨrɨtꞌerai kꞌãyaara, Judá ëreerãdepemaarã jɨrɨtꞌeraji Sión, irua ee kꞌiniara bɨ, ãchi eujãde bada perã.
Mama ichi te oopiji, pajãkꞌa ɨtꞌɨa bamerã mãikꞌaapa na pꞌekꞌau eujãkꞌa ichia bɨdamãi ichita beemerã.
Ichi mimiapari David jɨrɨtꞌeraji, ma eperã oveja akꞌɨpari aupai paji mĩda.
Ma eperã ataji ovejaarã akꞌɨ badamãiipa irua ichi pꞌuuru pidaarã, Jacobdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã akꞌɨpariimerã, ovejaarã akꞌɨparipa ichi ovejaarã akꞌɨparikꞌa. Mãgá Davidpa israelitaarã akꞌɨpachi.
Ãra tꞌãri jĩpꞌa akꞌɨpachi mãikꞌaapa ãramaa jarateepachi sãga pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Aai Tachi Akꞌõre, ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa pɨchi eujã jãri ata chejida. ¡Pɨ tede, ma te pɨ–itꞌee awara bɨdade, ne–inaa kꞌachia oojida mãikꞌaapa Jerusalén pꞌuuru jõtꞌaajida!
Peekꞌoojida pɨ mimiapataarã, chi pɨa jara bɨkꞌa oopatapꞌedaarã. Mãpai ãra kꞌapꞌɨa piuda taawa atabaibëijida ãkosoorãpa mãikꞌaapa mẽepema ne–animalaarãpa kꞌokꞌoodamerã.
Eperãpa pania weeparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mãɨrãpa Jerusalendepemaarã waa batꞌapijida. Apida bee–e paji ma piudapꞌedaarã ɨaitꞌee.
Tai ikꞌaawa pꞌanapataarãpa tai awaraa eperãarã kꞌãyaara ekꞌariara unupata mãikꞌaapa tai oo iru pꞌanapata.
Aai Tachi Akꞌõre, ¿sãapai pɨ tai ome waa kꞌĩrau–ee beeitꞌeema? ¿Ichita pɨ kꞌĩrau tꞌɨpɨtau urua nɨ̃bɨkꞌa baitꞌeekꞌã tai audú jiwaa bapari perã?
Tai ome kꞌĩrau bai kꞌãyaara, ijãadakꞌaa beerã ómeta kꞌĩrau béeji. ¡Mãɨrãpa pɨ kꞌawadakꞌaa mãikꞌaapa pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dakꞌaa!
Maperã Jacobdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã peekꞌoojida mãikꞌaapa ãra eujãde nɨ̃bɨ ãrikꞌoojida.
Tachi Akꞌõre, taimaa kꞌachia oonáaji tai chonaarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa. ¡Tai chupɨria kꞌawáaji mãikꞌaapa isapai tai kꞌaripa chéji, tai audú tꞌãri pꞌua pꞌanadairã!

Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ tai kꞌaripapari. Pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã, tai kꞌaripáji mãikꞌaapa tai kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã juadeepa uchiapíji. Taipa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata ãyaa bɨ́ji pɨde ijãapata perã.

Pɨa mãga ooru pɨrã, ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa waa jarada–e pai: “¿Sãma bɨma pãchi Akꞌõre Waibɨa?” Tachi Akꞌõre, mãɨrã kꞌachia óoji ãchia pɨ mimiapataarã peedapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa. Taipa mãga unudakꞌãri, kꞌawaadaitꞌee wãara pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Ma ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa aukꞌa kꞌawadaitꞌee.
Chĩara juade pꞌanɨɨrã biapi ũríji mãikꞌaapa pɨ juapa ãra peedaitꞌee pꞌanɨɨrã juadeepa kꞌaripa atáji.
Tachi Akꞌõre, tai eujã ikꞌaawa pꞌanapataarã kꞌachia ooma siete kꞌachia óoji, pɨ ãpɨte ikꞌachia pedee jarapata perã.
Mãpai tai, pɨ pꞌuuru pidaarã, pɨ ovejaarãkꞌa pꞌanɨɨrãpa ichita pɨmaa gracias jarapataadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ichita pɨmaa tꞌãri o–ĩa kꞌaripataadaitꞌee.

Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa israelitaarã akꞌɨpari oveja akꞌɨparipa ichi ovejaarã akꞌɨparikꞌa. Pɨa Josedeepa uchiadapꞌedaarãmaa jarateepari pɨa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa pꞌanapataadamerã. Pɨ ɨtꞌari bapari ɨtꞌaripemaarã, querubín apata, tꞌãide. ¡Maperã taipa pɨmaa iidiruta ũríji!
¡Pɨ jua unupíji Efraindeepa uchiadapꞌedaarãmaa, Benjamindeepa uchiadapꞌedaarãmaa mãikꞌaapa Manasedeepa uchiadapꞌedaarãmaa! ¡Tai kꞌaripa chéji tai kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã juadeepa!
Tachi Akꞌõre, tai pꞌuuru pidaarã waibɨa papíji naaweda pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa. Tai pia akꞌɨ baparíiji mãikꞌaapa na nepɨradeepa kꞌaripáji.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa. ¿Sãapai ũriitꞌeema pɨ pꞌuuru pidaarãpa ɨtꞌaa iidi jõnɨ? ¿Sãapai tai ome waa kꞌĩrau–ee baitꞌeema?
Taimaa nekꞌopii kꞌãyaara pɨa tai tꞌãri pꞌuapipari mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa topii kꞌãyaara, pɨa taubara uchiapipari.
Pɨa tai nãgá iru bairã, na eujã ikꞌaawa pꞌanapataarãpa chõo pꞌanɨ tai eujã jãri atadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa tai kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa tai oo iru pꞌanɨ.
Mapa Tachi Akꞌõre, Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa, tai pꞌuuru pidaarã waibɨa papíji naaweda pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa. Tai pia akꞌɨ́ji mãikꞌaapa na nepɨradeepa kꞌaripáji.
Pɨata tai Egipto eujãdeepa uchiapiji. Uva kꞌarra awara ãi ateepatakꞌa jaudaitꞌee, mãga pɨkꞌa pɨa tai pꞌuuru pidaarã ijãadakꞌaa beerã eujãdee ateeji. Mãɨrã jërekꞌooji, tai ãra eujãde pꞌanapataadamerã.

Eperãpa ichi eujã puparikꞌa uva kꞌarra jau naaweda, mãga pɨkꞌa pɨa ooji ma eujã ome. Mapa uva kꞌarra eujã piade jaupꞌeda, chi kꞌarra edú wariparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa tai pꞌuuru pidaarã ma eujãde pꞌanapachida mãikꞌaapa ĩwajida.
Ma eujã jõmaade pꞌanapachida; ee jẽra bɨmãi paara. Pia pꞌanapachida uva kꞌarra jua tꞌai chokꞌara ome pi–ia unupatakꞌa.
Pꞌanapachida Mediterráneo pꞌusa i parumaa mãikꞌaapa Éufrates to i parumaa.
Ɨ̃rá, ¿sãapꞌeda pɨa na eujã ikꞌaawa pꞌanapataarã na eujãde tꞌĩupijima? Eperã uva kꞌãide wãyaa wãpa uva oro ataparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mãɨrãpa pɨ eperãarã pee wãda.
Mãɨrã pidokꞌa pꞌanɨ eujã ãrikꞌoo wãpata perã. Ichiaba mãɨrã ne–animal kꞌachia beerãkꞌa pꞌanɨ taipa ne–uudapꞌedaa jõmaweda kꞌokꞌoo chepata perã.
Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa, waya chéji tai ome bapariimerã. ¡Ɨtꞌariipa tai akꞌɨ́ji mãikꞌaapa tai chupɨria kꞌawáaji, tai pɨa uva kꞌarra jaudákꞌapɨ pꞌanadairã!
Pɨ juarapa tai na eujãde jau pɨkꞌa bɨji nama pɨ warrarãkꞌa pꞌanapataadamerã.
Mamĩda ɨ̃rá ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa tai, pɨa uva kꞌarra jaudakꞌa pꞌanɨɨrã tꞌɨapꞌe chejida mãikꞌaapa paa jõjida. Mãɨrãpa oodapꞌedaa akꞌɨ́ji mãikꞌaapa ãra miapíji.
Mãgá pɨa eperãarã jɨrɨtꞌerada kꞌaripáji pɨa tai, pɨchi warrarãkꞌa, awaraa eperãarã kꞌãyaara juataura papida perã.
Pɨa tai mãgá kꞌariparu pɨrã, taipa waa ijãa amaada–e paitꞌee. Na nepɨradeepa tai chokꞌai uchiapíji. Mãpaipɨ pɨmaa ichita ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa. Tai pꞌuuru pidaarã waibɨa papíji naaweda pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa. Tai pia akꞌɨ baparíiji mãikꞌaapa na nepɨradeepa kꞌaripáji.
Israelitaarã, ¡Tachi Akꞌõremaa tꞌãri o–ĩa kꞌarítɨ, tai–itꞌee iru pꞌuuru murallapa tꞌɨakꞌau bɨ́kꞌapɨ bairã! ¡O–ĩapa bíatɨ Jacobpa ijãada Akꞌõre Waibɨamaa!
Pandero, arpa mãikꞌaapa salterio cháatɨ salmo kꞌaridaitꞌee perã.
Trompeta cháatɨ ai ewarikꞌãri mãikꞌaapa atane pꞌãriu pakꞌãri, tachi fiesta waibɨa ewate perã.
Jacobpa ijãada Akꞌõre Waibɨapa ma ley jaraji israelitaarãpa oodamerã.
Mãga jaraji Josedeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã ome pacto oodade, ãra Egipto eujãdeepa uchiadakꞌãri.
Mama ãchia kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ pedeede nãga ũrijida:
“Mɨa parã kꞌaripaitꞌeeda aji, waa audú mimianaadamerã eperãarã audú mimiapatakꞌa ne–inaa chɨkꞌɨa kꞌoraade uadakꞌãri.

Kꞌĩsia jõnadakꞌãri, mɨmaa ɨtꞌaa iidijida. Mapa mɨa parã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã juadeepa uchiapiji. Pa jĩwaa nɨ̃badamãiipa mɨa pꞌanauji. Maapꞌeda pania poátrɨ uchia badamãi Meribade mɨa parã nepɨrade baaipiji kꞌawaaitꞌee wãara mɨde ijãa pꞌanɨ wa mãga–e.
’’Mɨchi pꞌuuru pidaarã, pia ũrítɨ mɨa jararu. ¡Aai israelitaarã, taawa parãpa mɨ pedee ũridai!
Awaraa eujãdepemaarã akꞌõre waibɨa apata parã tꞌãide iru pꞌananáatɨ. Mãgee akꞌõre waibɨa apata kꞌĩrapite bedabaináatɨ ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daitꞌee.
¡Mɨta Tachi Akꞌõre; parã Akꞌõre Waibɨa! Mɨata parã Egipto eujãdeepa uchiapiji. Ipana chakꞌeerãpa ãchi i ãapatakꞌa, chi nawepa netawamerã, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃́tɨ, mɨa parã kꞌaripamerã.
’’Mamĩda mɨa mãga jarakꞌãri, mɨ pꞌuuru pidaarãpa ũri kꞌiniada–e paji. Israelitaarãpa oodaamaa pꞌanajida mɨa jaradakꞌa.
Maperã mɨa ãchi ituaba atabëiji ãchia oo kꞌiniata oodamerã.
Mɨ pꞌuuru pidaarã, israelitaarãpa mɨ pedee ũridapꞌedaa paara mãikꞌaapa mɨa jaradakꞌa oodapꞌedaa paara,
taarã–e nɨde mɨa ãra kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapatapꞌedaarã pꞌoyaakꞌaji mãikꞌaapa miapikꞌaji.
Ma awara mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã pꞌera jõnɨpa mɨ kꞌĩrapite bedabaikꞌajida mãikꞌaapa kꞌachiadee wãkꞌajida.
Jõdee mɨa parãmaa ne–inaa pia ookꞌaji. Trigo pia parãmaa teekꞌaji kꞌodamerã mãikꞌaapa mẽepema miéle teekꞌajida aji, senedamerã o–ĩa pꞌaneerutamaa.”
Tachi Akꞌõre eperãarã poro waibɨarã ome chipꞌedaidakꞌãri, ichi ãra poro waibɨa. Irua akꞌɨpari ãrapa oopata jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Ãramaa mãgapari:
“¿Sãapai parãpa waa pia akꞌɨda–e paitꞌee eperãarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata? ¿Sãapai waa mɨde ijãadakꞌaa beerã pia akꞌɨda–e paitꞌeema?
Mãɨrã pia akꞌɨdai kꞌãyaara, kꞌaripátɨ akꞌõre wẽe beerã mãikꞌaapa juatau wẽe beerã. Chupɨria chedeerã mãikꞌaapa chĩara jua ekꞌari kꞌachia pꞌanapataarã pia óotɨ.
Mãɨrã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa falta beerã mɨde ijãadakꞌaa beerã jua ekꞌariipa uchiapítɨ.
’’Parã, mɨ eperãarã poro waibɨarã, kꞌĩsia kꞌawada–ee pꞌanɨ. Eperã pꞌãriude pariatua nipaparikꞌa, parã mãga pɨkꞌa nipapata. Maperã na pꞌekꞌau eujã parã ome chookꞌaa.”
Mɨa parãmaa jaraji: “Parã mɨkꞌa pꞌanɨda aji, Akꞌõre Waibɨarãkꞌa, parã Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa warrarã perã.
”Mamĩda parã eperãarã jĩpꞌaarãkꞌa piudaitꞌee. Piudaitꞌeeda aji, awaraa eperãarã poro waibɨarãkꞌa.”
Tachi Akꞌõre, akꞌɨ chéji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa oopata jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia, awara–awaraa eujãdepemaarã jõmaweda pɨ jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata perã.
Aai Tachi Akꞌõre, ¡waa kꞌĩupꞌee banáaji, maarepida ne–inaa oo–ee tai kꞌaripaitꞌee!
Akꞌɨ́ji pɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã kꞌĩrau biukꞌa para nɨ̃bɨ pɨa jara bɨkꞌa oodaamaa pꞌanapata perã.
Ikꞌawaa pꞌanadairã pedeeteepata pɨ pꞌuuru pidaarãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee, pɨa ãra jɨ̃apari mĩda.
Nãga jarapata: “¡Wãdáma ãra eujã jõpide! ¡Mãgá apidaapa Israel tꞌɨ̃ kꞌirãpada–e paitꞌeeda!” apata.
Aukꞌa mãga kꞌĩsiapata perã, nãgɨɨrãpa pacto oojida pɨ ome chõodaitꞌee:
Edom eujãdepemaarã; Ismaeldeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã, awaraa Agardeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã ome; Moab eujãdepemaarã;
Guebal eujãdepemaarã, Amón eujãdepemaarã, Amalec eujãdepemaarã; Filistea eujãdepemaarã; Tiro pꞌuurudepemaarã;
Asiria eujãdepemaarã mãikꞌaapa Lotdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã.
Mãɨrã ome óoji pɨa Madián eujãdepemaarã ome oodakꞌa maa–e pɨrã Sísara ome oodakꞌa maa–e pɨrã Jabín ome oodakꞌa Quisón to chakꞌede.
Mãɨrã jõjida Endorde mãikꞌaapa ãchi kꞌapꞌɨa piuda taawa pꞌaneejida ãkꞌa.
Mãɨrã poro waibɨarã ome óoji pɨa Oreb ome mãikꞌaapa Zeb ome oodakꞌa. Mãɨrã poro waibɨarã ome óoji pɨa Zeba ome mãikꞌaapa Zalmuna ome oodakꞌa.
Pɨa mãga ooji ãchia jaradakꞌãri: “Tachi Akꞌõre eujãdepema pꞌũajara jẽra bɨmãi jãri atanadáma.”
Mɨchi Akꞌõre Waibɨa, ¡mãɨrã papíji kꞌiru pꞌooda, nãupa ãyaa ateeparikꞌa!
¡Tꞌɨpɨtaupa pakꞌuru jẽra bee paa jõparikꞌa,
mãga pɨkꞌa mãɨrã tꞌẽe wã́ji mãikꞌaapa ãra pꞌerapíji nãumiapa maa–e pɨrã papa!
Tachi Akꞌõre, mãɨrã kꞌĩra nejasiapíji, pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨda arutamaa.
¡Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ mãɨrã ichita mãgá kꞌĩra nejasia pꞌaneedamerã ãchi piurutamaa!
¡Mãgá jõmaarãpa kꞌawaadai pɨ aupai Tachi Akꞌõre, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa!
Tachi Akꞌõre, Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa, ¡pɨ te pi–ia bɨ!
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ tede mɨ audú ba kꞌinia bɨ. Mɨa tꞌãripa o–ĩa kꞌarimaa bɨ pɨ, chi ichita chokꞌai baparimaa.

Tachi Akꞌõre, Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa, pɨ mɨ rey mãikꞌaapa mɨchi Akꞌõre Waibɨa. Ipanaarã paara pɨ tede pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanapata, mama pɨ altar kꞌaitꞌa golondrinaarãpa ãchi te oopata perã mãikꞌaapa chi chakꞌeerã waripata perã.
O–ĩa pꞌanɨ pɨ tede pꞌanapataarã. Ichita pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadai, ɨ̃ida–ee.
O–ĩa pꞌanɨ eperãarã pɨa ãra juataurapikꞌãri. Ãra pɨ temaa wãpari ode Sión eede ɨtꞌaa wã kꞌinia pꞌanapata.
Ãra eujã jewedaa Lagrimade wãyaadakꞌãri, pɨa ma eujã pania poátrɨ uchia pɨkꞌa beemãi papipari mãikꞌaapa kꞌoijara pai naaweda, pɨa ãchi ɨ̃rɨ kꞌoi pëipari.
Mãgá juataura pꞌaneepata Sión eede pɨ kꞌĩrapite panadaitꞌee, pɨ akꞌõre waibɨa apataarã jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa, pɨ Jacobpa ijãada Akꞌõre Waibɨa. Mapa ũríji mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõre, tai–itꞌee pɨ escudokꞌa bɨ, tai jɨ̃apari perã. Tai rey pia akꞌɨ́ji, pɨa iru jɨrɨtꞌerada perã.
Piara bɨ ewari aba pɨ tede baitꞌee, awara ãi ewari mil bai kꞌãyaara. Piara bɨ mɨchi Akꞌõre Waibɨa tedepema puerta jɨ̃aitꞌee, pɨde ijãadakꞌaa beerã tꞌãide bai kꞌãyaara.

Tachi Akꞌõre akꞌõrejĩrukꞌa bɨ ichi o tachimaa akꞌɨpipari perã. Ichiaba iru escudokꞌa bɨ tachi jɨ̃apari perã. Irua tachi pia akꞌɨpari mãikꞌaapa tachi kꞌinia iru bapari. Tachi Akꞌõrepa irua jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãmaa ne–inaa pia oopari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa, ¡pɨde ijãapataarã o–ĩa pꞌanapata!
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa ne–inaa pia ooji pɨ eujãde pꞌanapataarã–itꞌee, ãra, chi Jacobdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã awaraa eujãdepemaarã jua ekꞌari pꞌanapatapꞌedaamãiipa waya aneekꞌãri.
Pɨ pꞌuuru pidaarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa perdonaaji mãikꞌaapa ãrapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa ãyaa bɨji.
Aɨ naaweda ãchi ome kꞌĩrau baji mĩda, waa kꞌĩrau–ee beeji.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ tai kꞌaripapari. Mapa tai ɨ̃rapemaarã waya pia akꞌɨ́ji mãikꞌaapa tai kꞌaripáji pɨa naaweda oodakꞌa. Tai ome waa kꞌĩrau banáaji.
¿Ichita kꞌĩrau baitꞌeekꞌã tai ome mãikꞌaapa taideepa uchiadaitꞌeerã ome?
¿Tai, pɨ pꞌuuru pidaarã waya pia pꞌanapi kꞌinia–e bɨkꞌã, mãgá pɨ jua ekꞌari o–ĩa pꞌanapataadamerã?
Tachi Akꞌõre, akꞌɨpíji pɨa wãara tai kꞌinia iru bɨ. Na nepɨradeepa tai kꞌaripáji.
Ɨ̃rá mɨa ũriitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨ: ichide ijãapataarã waya kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee pꞌaneeda–e pɨrã, ichia ãra kꞌãiwee pꞌanapiitꞌee.
Wãara, Tachi Akꞌõre bapari ichi waaweepataarã kꞌaitꞌa mãikꞌaapa irua tachi kꞌaripapari. Ichi kꞌĩra wãree tachi eujãde bapariitꞌee.
Ichia tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã, irua tachi, irude wãara ijãapataarã ome unuitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ichia ne–inaa pia ichita oopari perã, tachi kꞌãiwee pꞌanapiitꞌee.
Ne–inaa kꞌarra ewari chaa wariparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa tachia wãara irude ijãapataadaitꞌee. Jõdee ɨtꞌariipa kꞌoi baaiparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa ɨtꞌariipa irua tachi pia oopariitꞌee.
Maapai Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi pia akꞌɨ bapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa tachi eujãde ne–uudapꞌedaa pia chauitꞌee.
Iru chei naaweda, tachi pia oopariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa iru chekꞌãri, eperãarã iru ode nipapataadaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ũríji mɨa jararu, mɨ chupɨria, kꞌĩra pia–ee nɨ̃bairã.
Mɨ piupináaji pɨa jara bɨkꞌa mɨa oopari perã. Pɨ mɨchi Akꞌõre Waibɨa. Mɨa pɨde ijãapari. ¡Mapa mɨ, pɨ mimiapari kꞌaripáji!
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ chupɨria kꞌawáaji, ewari chaa pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa iidipari perã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ, pɨ mimiapari, tꞌãri o–ĩapíji, pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pari perã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ tꞌãri pia bapari mãikꞌaapa eperãarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata ãyaa bɨpari, pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataarã kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Maperã Tachi Akꞌõre, ¡ũríji mɨa chupɨria iidi bɨ!
Mɨ kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bakꞌãri, pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa iidipari, pɨa ũripari perã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ¡awaraa eujãdepemaarã akꞌõre waibɨa apata apida pɨkꞌa wẽ–e! ¡Apidaapa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa pɨa ooparikꞌa!
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa awara–awaraa eujãdepemaarã ooji. Mãɨrã jõmaweda pɨ kꞌĩrapite bedabai chedaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pɨmaa pedee pia jaradaitꞌee.
¡Pɨ aupaita Tachi Akꞌõre! ¡Pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ mãikꞌaapa pɨa oopari ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa!
Tachi Akꞌõre, jaratéeji pɨa mɨmaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ, mɨ pɨ wãara pedeede jara bɨkꞌa nipapariimerã mãikꞌaapa tꞌãripa pɨmaa aupai ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pariimerã.
Mɨchi Akꞌõre Waibɨa, tꞌãripa pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pɨ tꞌɨ̃dé pia pedeepariitꞌee.
¡Pɨa mɨ audú kꞌinia iru bapari perã, mɨ kꞌaripaji piudaarãmaa wãnaamerã!
Aai Tachi Akꞌõre, audua beerã mɨ ɨ̃rɨ che pꞌanɨ; ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanapataarã pedeetee pꞌanɨ mɨ peedaitꞌee. Mãɨrãpa pɨ kꞌawadakꞌaa.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ tꞌãri pia bapari; eperãarã chupɨria kꞌawaapari mãikꞌaapa isapai kꞌĩraudaikꞌaa, pɨa eperãarã audú kꞌinia iru bapari perã mãikꞌaapa wãara pedee aupai jarapari perã.
Mapa mɨ akꞌɨ́ji mãikꞌaapa chupɨria kꞌawáaji. Mɨ, pɨ mimiapari, juataura papíji. ¡Mɨ kꞌaripáji pɨde ijãapari perã!
Akꞌɨpíji mɨ wãara kꞌinia iru bapari. Mãga unudakꞌãri, mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã kꞌĩra nejasia pꞌaneedaitꞌee pɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ kꞌaripari perã mãikꞌaapa mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩapipari perã.
Tachi Akꞌõre pꞌuuru ichia ee awara bɨdade bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa Sión pꞌuurudepema puerta kꞌiniara iru bapari awaraa Jacobdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã pꞌanapatamãi kꞌãyaara.
Eperãarãpa Tachi Akꞌõre pꞌuurudé pedee pia jarapata mãikꞌaapa ma pꞌuurudé irua nãga jara bɨ:

“Sión pꞌuuru kꞌaurepa nãgɨ́ eujãdepemaarãpa mɨ kꞌawapata: Egipto eujãdepemaarãpa; Babilonia eujãdepemaarãpa; Filistea eujãdepemaarãpa mãikꞌaapa Etiopía eujãdepemaarãpa, Tiro pꞌuurudepemaarãpa paara. Mãgá mɨ kꞌawapata perã, ãra Sión pꞌuurude tꞌo pɨkꞌajidada” a bɨ.
Mapa Sión pꞌuurudé jaradaitꞌee: “Nãgɨ́ pꞌuuru pidaarã mãikꞌaapa jãgɨ́ pꞌuuru pidaarã mama tꞌo pɨkꞌajida. Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨapa Sión pꞌuuru oojida” adaitꞌee.
Ichi ɨtꞌaripema librode Tachi Akꞌõrepa awara–awaraa pꞌuuru pidaarã tꞌɨ̃ pꞌãkꞌãri, jaraitꞌee: “Nãgɨ́ Sión pꞌuurude tꞌoji.”
Mapa kꞌaripataarãpa mãikꞌaapa pëirapataarãpa nãga jarapata: “Sión pꞌuurude pꞌanɨde tai tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapatada” apata.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ mɨ kꞌaripapari. Ãstaawa, pꞌãrikꞌua pida mɨa pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa iidipari.
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ pɨa ũrimerã mɨa pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa bɨ. Ũríji mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidimaa bɨ.
Mɨ audú nepɨra kꞌachiade baaida perã, mɨ piuitꞌee ewari kꞌaitꞌa pɨkꞌa bɨ.
¡Ɨ̃raweda mɨ piu pɨkꞌa bɨ, juatau wẽe bairã!
Pɨa mɨ atabëiji piudaarã pꞌanɨmãi. Chõo jõnɨde soldaorã piudapꞌeda, abaamãi jaupatakꞌa mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra atuapatakꞌa, ãchi jãɨra jɨ̃ada–ee, mãga pɨkꞌa pɨa mɨ kꞌĩra atuaji mãikꞌaapa mɨ waa jɨ̃a–e.
Pɨa mɨ batꞌa pɨkꞌaji uria nãpɨa bɨde, mama pꞌãriude beemerã.
Pꞌusara nɨ̃beeparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa pɨ mɨ ome kꞌĩraudachi.
Pɨa mɨ kꞌõpꞌãyoorã ãyaa pëiji mɨ ikꞌaawaapa. Ãramaa mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapiji.
Mɨ presokꞌa bɨ, pꞌoyaa ãyaa wãkꞌaa perã.
Taubapa pia unu–e bɨ, audú tꞌãri pꞌua nɨ̃bairã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ewari chaa mɨa pɨmaa chupɨria iidipari mãikꞌaapa mɨchi jua pɨ baparimaa ɨtꞌaa ɨapari.
¿Pɨa ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ooikꞌã piudaarã kꞌaripaitꞌee? ¿Piudaarã pꞌirabaidaikꞌã pɨmaa gracias jaradaitꞌee?
