Eperãpa ichi akꞌõrepa ne–inaa bëida jɨ̃aparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨa pɨ ley ichita jɨ̃aitꞌee, ma kꞌaurepa mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩa bapari perã.
Tꞌãripa mɨa ichita ooitꞌee pɨa jara bɨkꞌa mɨchi piurumaa.
Tꞌãri jĩpꞌa nipadakꞌaarã mɨa kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bɨ. Mamĩda mɨa pɨ ley kꞌinia iru bapari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ pɨde miru pɨkꞌapari. Escudopa eperã jɨ̃aparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa pɨa mɨ jɨ̃apari mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripapari. Maperã pɨa pedee jara bɨde mɨa ijãapari.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia oopataarã, mɨ ikꞌaawaapa ãyaa wã́tɨ, mɨa oo kꞌinia bairã mɨchi Akꞌõre Waibɨapa jara bɨkꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ kꞌaripáji pɨa pɨchi eperãarãmaa jaradakꞌa. Mãgá mɨ atꞌãri chokꞌai baitꞌee. ¡Mɨ kꞌaripa–eda anáaji, mɨa nɨmaa bairã pɨa mɨ kꞌaripamerã!
Mɨ kꞌaripáji piunaamerã. Mɨa ichita ooitꞌee pɨa jara bɨkꞌa.
Eperãarãpa pɨ leyde jara bɨkꞌa oodaamaa pꞌaneedakꞌãri, pɨa ãra yiaraa iru beepari, seewatapai pɨde ijãapatada apata perã.
Pɨ–itꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerã ne–inaa kꞌachíakꞌata pꞌanɨ; nejarra eperãarãpa batꞌapatákꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ. Maperã mɨa pɨ ley kꞌinia iru bapari.
Mɨ pɨ kꞌĩrapite bakꞌãri, waaweepa mɨ kꞌapꞌɨa wëredaipari. Mapa mɨa pɨ leyde audú ijãapari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa ne–inaa pia oopari pɨa jara bɨkꞌa. Mapa mɨ baaipináaji mɨmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrã juade.
Mɨ, pɨ mimiapari jɨ̃́aji, audua beerãpa mɨmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oonaadamerã.
Ara tachi tau tꞌũmaadaiparikꞌa eperã tꞌɨmɨɨpa chewã akꞌɨ bakꞌãri, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨa nɨmaa bɨ pɨa mɨ kꞌaripa chemerã, pɨa pɨchi eperãarãmaa jaradakꞌa.
Mɨ pɨ mimiapari perã, mɨmaa óoji pɨa kꞌinia iru bɨɨrãmaa ooparikꞌa. ¡Pɨ leyde jara bɨ mɨmaa jaratéeji!
Mɨ pɨ mimiapari. Mɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaapíji, mɨa pɨ leyde jara bɨkꞌa oo kꞌawaamerã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, tai kꞌaripa chéji, eperãarãpa oodaamaa pꞌanadairã pɨa jara bɨkꞌa.
Awaraa ne–inaa kꞌãyaara pɨa pedee jara bɨ mɨa kꞌiniara iru bapari. Nẽe pi–ia iru bai kꞌãyaara, mɨa pɨ ley kꞌiniara iru bapari.
Mapa mɨa pɨ ley jõmaweda pia akꞌɨpari mãikꞌaapa seewa jarapataarã ode mɨ nipakꞌaa.
Pɨ ley jõmaarã pedee kꞌãyaara pipɨara bairã, mɨa aɨde jara bɨkꞌa oopari.
Pɨ ley jarateedakꞌãri, ma pedee ũripataarã kꞌĩsia ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌadaipata mãikꞌaapa eperãarã jĩpꞌaarã paara kꞌĩsia kꞌawaadaipata.
Warra chakꞌe i ãaparikꞌa chikꞌo kꞌo kꞌinia bakꞌãri, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨa nɨpari pɨ ley kꞌawaaitꞌee.
Maperã mɨmaa akꞌɨ́ji mãikꞌaapa mɨ chupɨria kꞌawáaji, pɨ kꞌinia iru pꞌanapataarã ome ooparikꞌa.
Pɨa jara bɨkꞌa mɨmaa oopíji, mɨ ne–inaa kꞌachiade baainaamerã.
Mɨmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrã jua ekꞌariipa mɨ kꞌaripa atáji, mɨa oo kꞌinia bairã pɨa jara bɨkꞌa.
Mɨ pɨ mimiapari perã, ¡mɨ pia akꞌɨ́ji mãikꞌaapa pɨ leyde jara bɨ mɨmaa jaratéeji!
Mɨ audú jẽedaipari, eperãarãpa pɨ leyde jara bɨkꞌa oodaamaa pꞌanapata perã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa ichita ne–inaa jõma pia oopari. Pɨ ley jõmaweda pia bɨ, pɨa jarada perã.
Pɨa ley jarada pia bɨ, wãara pedee aupai pɨa jarapari perã. Mapa mɨa pɨ leyde jara bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia bɨ.
Mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã ome mɨ kꞌĩrau bɨ, ãrapa pɨ ley kꞌawa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadairã.
Apidaapa pꞌoyaa jarada–e pai pɨa oo–e pɨa jara bɨkꞌa. Mapa mɨ, pɨ mimiaparipa pɨ pedee kꞌinia iru bapari.
Mɨ eperã poro waibɨa–e mĩda mãikꞌaapa eperãarãpa mɨ yiaraa iru pꞌanɨ mĩda, mɨa pɨ ley kꞌirãpapariitꞌee.
Pɨa ichita ne–inaa pia oopari mãikꞌaapa pɨ ley wãarapɨ.
Mɨ kꞌĩra pia–ee, kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bakꞌãri, pɨ leyde kꞌĩsiapari mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri o–ĩa beepari.
Pɨa jarakꞌãri eperãarãpa ne–inaa oodamerã, ichita ne–inaa pia oopari. ¡Mɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaapíji, pɨa jara bɨkꞌa mɨ bapariimerã!
Tachi Akꞌõre, tꞌãripa mɨa pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa iidipari. Pꞌanáuji mɨa pɨ leyde jara bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia bairã.
Pɨmaa chupɨria iidimaa bɨ. Mɨ kꞌaripáji, pɨa jara bɨkꞌa mɨa oo kꞌinia bairã.
Akꞌõrejĩru uchiai naaweda, mɨ pꞌirabaipari pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa iidiitꞌee. Nɨmaa bɨ pɨa kꞌaripa chemerã, pɨa pɨchi eperãarãmaa jaradakꞌa.
Pꞌãrikꞌua paara mɨ ɨ̃rɨmadaipari kꞌĩsiaitꞌee pɨa jarada pedeede.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa mɨ kꞌinia iru bapari perã, mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ ũríji. Pɨa ichita ne–inaa pia oopari perã, mɨ atꞌãri chokꞌai bapíji.
Mɨ jɨrɨ pꞌanɨɨrã; mãgɨ́ tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa beerã, kꞌaitꞌa cheruta mɨ peede. Mamĩda mãɨrãpa pɨ leyde jara bɨkꞌa oodakꞌaa, ma ley ikꞌaawaapa tꞌɨmɨ́ pɨkꞌa pꞌanadairã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ mɨ kꞌaitꞌa bɨ mãikꞌaapa pɨa jara bɨ pedee wãarapɨ.
Taarãru mɨa pɨ ley kꞌawa bɨ. Pɨa ma ley jaraji ichita bapariimerã.
Mɨ akꞌɨ́ji mɨ chupɨria nɨ̃bairã mãikꞌaapa na nepɨradeepa mɨ uchiapíji, mɨa pɨ ley kꞌĩra atua–e bairã.
Mɨ kꞌaripáji na nepɨradeepa chokꞌai uchiamerã, pɨa pɨchi eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌeeda ada perã.
Pɨa pɨde ijãadakꞌaa beerã kꞌaripa–e paitꞌee, ãchia oodakꞌaa perã pɨ leyde jara bɨkꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa eperãarã audú chupɨria kꞌawaapari. Pɨ kꞌĩrapite mɨ pia niparu pɨrã, mɨ atꞌãri chokꞌai bapíji.
Mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã chokꞌara pꞌanɨɨrãpa mɨ jɨrɨ pꞌanɨ mĩda peedaitꞌee, mɨa pɨ leyde ijãa amaa–e paitꞌee.
Mɨ choo–e pɨde ijãadaamaa pꞌanɨɨrã ome, pɨa jara bɨkꞌa oodaamaa pꞌanadairã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ akꞌɨ́ji kꞌawaaitꞌee sãgá mɨa pɨ ley kꞌinia iru bapari. Mɨ atꞌãri chokꞌai bapíji mɨ kꞌinia iru bairã.
Pɨ pedee jõmaweda wãara mãikꞌaapa pɨ ley jõ–e paitꞌee pedee pipɨara bairã.
Eperãarã poro waibɨarãpa ichi kꞌinia mɨ jɨrɨpata peetꞌaadaitꞌee. Mamĩda tꞌãripa mɨa pɨ pedeede ijãa bɨ.
Eperã o–ĩadaiparikꞌa nẽe unu atakꞌãri, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ o–ĩa bapari pɨchi eperãarã ome pacto ooda jara bɨde kꞌirãpakꞌãri.
Mɨa seewa ũriamaa bapari, seewa unuamaa iru bapari perã. Mamĩda mɨa pɨ ley kꞌinia iru bapari.
Ewari chaa mɨa pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃da siete ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pari, pɨa ley jaraparide maarepida kꞌachia wẽ–e perã.
Pɨ ley kꞌinia iru pꞌanapataarã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapata. Apidaapa ãra kꞌachiade baaipida–e paitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa nɨmaa bɨ pɨa mɨ kꞌaripa chemerã mãikꞌaapa mɨa oopari pɨa jara bɨkꞌa.
Mɨa pɨ ley kꞌinia iru bapari perã, tꞌãripa oopari made jara bɨkꞌa.
Pɨa mɨ bapari kꞌawapari perã, mɨa pɨ leyde jara bɨkꞌa oopari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa kꞌinia bɨ pɨa mɨ biapi ũrimerã pɨ baparimãiipa. ¡Mɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaapíji pɨ pedee pia kꞌawaamerã!
Kꞌinia bɨ mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ ũrimerã pɨ baparimãiipa. ¡Mɨ kꞌaripáji pɨa pɨchi eperãarãmaa jaradakꞌa!
Tꞌãri o–ĩapa mɨa pɨmaa kꞌari kꞌinia bɨ, pɨ ley mɨmaa jarateeda perã.
Pɨ pedee jõmaweda pia bɨ, pɨa jarada perã. Mapa mɨa pɨ pedee kꞌari kꞌinia bɨ.
Kꞌinia bɨ pɨchi juapa mɨ kꞌaripamerã, mɨa pɨ leyde jara bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia bairã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ¡mɨ kꞌaripáji! ¡Mɨ o–ĩa bɨ pɨ ley ome!
Mɨ atꞌãri chokꞌai bapíji pɨmaa pedee pia jarapariimerã. Pɨa ichita ne–inaa pia oopari perã, ne–inaa pia óoji mɨ kꞌaripaitꞌee.
Ara oveja o atuaparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ pɨ odeepa uchiadaipari. ¡Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ, pɨ mimiapari jɨrɨ chéji, mɨa pɨ ley kꞌĩra atua–e bairã!
Mɨ kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa iidiji. Mãpai irua pꞌanauji.
Nãga ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ji: “Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ kꞌaripáji seewa–idaa beerãpa mãikꞌaapa kꞌũrayaa beerãpa mɨ ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jara pꞌanadairã.
Seewa–idaa bɨta, ¿kꞌãata pɨmaa pꞌasaitꞌee pɨa seewa jara bɨ kꞌaurepa?
¡Soldaorã juapa irua sia kꞌida misua bee mãikꞌaapa tꞌɨpɨtau kꞌĩra urua bee pɨmaa pëipiitꞌee!
¡Mɨ chupɨria nɨ̃bɨ, Mésec eujãde mɨ awaraa eujãdepemakꞌa nɨ̃bairã! ¡Cedar eujãdepemaarã te ne–edee oodapꞌedaa tꞌãide baparíkꞌapɨ bɨ!
¡Mɨ audú taarã nɨ̃bɨ mãgee kꞌãiwee pꞌana kꞌiniadakꞌaa beerã ome!
Mɨ kꞌãiwee ba kꞌinia bɨ. Mamĩda mãgeerãmaa jararu pɨrã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadamerã, ãchia: ‘¡Chõodáma!’ apata.”
Mɨa ee jẽra beemaa akꞌɨkꞌãri, mɨchi tꞌãridepai kꞌĩsiapari: “¿Sãmãikꞌaapa mɨ kꞌaripapari cheitꞌeema?” apari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pajã mãikꞌaapa na pꞌekꞌau eujã oodapa mɨ kꞌaripa cheitꞌee.
Eperã wãara ijãapari, irua pɨ kꞌachiade baaipi–e paitꞌee, chi pɨ akꞌɨpari kꞌãikꞌaa perã.
Israelitaarã akꞌɨpari tapꞌokꞌeekꞌaa mãikꞌaapa kꞌãikꞌaa.
Tachi Akꞌõrépata pɨ akꞌɨpari mãikꞌaapa jɨ̃apari. Iru pɨ kꞌaitꞌa bɨ kꞌaripaitꞌee. Pɨ–itꞌee iru pakꞌuru ekꞌari kꞌũrasaa baparíkꞌapɨ bɨ, akꞌõrejĩru golpe jẽrakꞌãri.
Maperã ãstaawa akꞌõrejĩrumaa pɨ paapi–e paitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pꞌãrikꞌua maarepida atanemaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopi–e paitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ jɨ̃apariitꞌee ne–inaa kꞌachiade baainaamerã mãikꞌaapa pɨ piunaamerã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichita pɨ jɨ̃apariitꞌee pɨchi wãrumaa, teeda bakꞌãri paara.
¡Mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩadaipari mɨmaa jaradakꞌãri: “Wãdáma Tachi Akꞌõre tedee!”
¡Ɨ̃rá tachi Jerusalén murallapa tꞌɨakꞌau bɨ edajãde pꞌanɨ!
Jerusalén pꞌuuru oojida mãdepemaarã araa pꞌanapataadamerã.
Tachi Akꞌõre eperãarã ëreerã chaachaadepemaarã na eede ɨtꞌaa chepata irumaa pedee pia jaradaitꞌee, irua tachi chonaa, Israelmaa jaradakꞌa.
Na pꞌuurude tachi reyrã pꞌanapata eperãarã akꞌɨdaitꞌee. Nama pꞌanɨ tachi israelitaarã poro waibɨarã, Daviddeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã.
Israelitaarã, tꞌãripa nãga jarapatáatɨ: “Kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Jerusalén pꞌuurudepemaarã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadamerã. Kꞌinia pꞌanɨ na pꞌuuru kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨɨrã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadamerã.
Kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Jerusalén murallapa tꞌɨakꞌau bɨde pꞌanapataarã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadamerã. Kꞌinia pꞌanɨ na pꞌuurudepema palaciode pꞌanapataarã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadamerã.”
Ɨ̃rá mɨchi aukꞌaarã mãikꞌaapa mɨchi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã nama pꞌanapata perã, mɨa nãga jara bɨ: “Jerusalendepemaarã, kꞌãiwee pꞌanapatáatɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõre te nama bairã, mɨa parã pari mãgá ɨtꞌaa iidipari.”
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ tai rey. Pɨ su–akꞌɨ beepari ɨtꞌari bɨ. Mapa ɨtꞌaa akꞌɨpꞌeda, mɨa pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa iidimaa bɨ.
Ara esclavopa wa esclavapa nɨparikꞌa chiparipa jaramerã kꞌãata ooipia bɨ, mãga pɨkꞌa taipa nɨpata Tachi Akꞌõre, Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨapa tachi chupɨria kꞌawaamerã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, tai chupɨria kꞌawáaji waa chooda–e perã eperãarãpa tai ãpɨte ikꞌachia pedee jara jõnɨ.
¡Audupai pꞌaratꞌa paraa beerãpa tai oo iru pꞌanapata mãikꞌaapa audua beerãpa tai ekꞌariara unupata!
Israelitaarã, jaradáma: “Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌaripa–e pada paara”; Israelitaarã, waya nãga jaradáma:
“Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌaripa–e pada paara, eperãarã tachi ome chõo chedakꞌãri,
mãikꞌaapa tachi ome kꞌĩrau pꞌaneedakꞌãri, tachi peekꞌookꞌajida.
Ara to chedaikꞌãri, ne–inaa jõmaweda barree ateeparikꞌa,
¡mãga pɨkꞌa mãɨrãpa tachi jõpikꞌajida!
Jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jaradaipia bɨ irua mãɨrãmaa mãga oopi–e pada perã. Irua mãɨrãmaa tachi jõpi–e paji.
Tachi kꞌaripaji mãɨrã juade baaidai naaweda. ¡Ipana uchiadaiparikꞌa chi jita iru bada juadeepa, mãga pɨkꞌa tachi uchiajida!
Tachi Akꞌõre, pajã mãikꞌaapa na pꞌekꞌau eujã oodapa tachi kꞌaripapari.
Ara Sión ee ichita abaamãi baparikꞌa, ãyaa wã–ee, mãga pɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichide ijãapataarã ichita jɨ̃apariitꞌee.
Ara ee chokꞌara Jerusalén pꞌuuru ikꞌaawa ichita pꞌɨrrabai jẽra beeparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi eperãarã ichita jɨ̃apariitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichia jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãmaa eujã atapida ijãadakꞌaa beerã jua ekꞌari ichita ba–e paitꞌee. Ma eujã mãɨrã jua ekꞌari beeda paara, ichi eperãarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo pꞌaneekꞌajida.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pia akꞌɨ́ji tꞌãri pia beerã; chi tꞌãri jĩpꞌa nipapataarã.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨde ijãadaamaa pꞌanɨɨrã kꞌachiadee pë́iji awaraa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanɨɨrã ome.
¡Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ israelitaarã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadamerã!
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi eperãarã uchiapikꞌãri awaraa eujãdepemaarã juadeepa waya Sión pꞌuurudee chedamerã, tachi kꞌãimokꞌaraa bɨde pɨkꞌa pꞌanajida.
Maapai tachi ëipachida mãikꞌaapa o–ĩapa kꞌaripachida. Ichiaba maapai ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa jarapachida: “¡Akꞌõre Waibɨapa ne–inaa pi–ia oojida apachida, ãchi kꞌaripaitꞌee!”
Wãara, Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨapa ne–inaa pi–ia oopachi tachi kꞌaripaitꞌee. Maperã tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõre, waya tai mãgá kꞌaripáji. Tai waya bendicíaji. ¡Óoji tai ome kꞌoipa ooparikꞌa eujã pania wẽe bɨde baaipꞌeda, to chakꞌe pꞌoo beede weekꞌãri!
Eperãarã jẽe jõnɨde ne–uuruta pɨjida, o–ĩapa bia jõnɨde chi chau bɨ ewadaitꞌee.
Jẽe jõnɨde netꞌa tau pꞌoruta pɨjida, tꞌẽepai ewadakꞌãri, o–ĩapa kꞌaridaitꞌee chi kꞌõrajɨ̃ma teedaa ateeruta misa.
Te oopataarãpa te ooda–e pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa, ichi kꞌinia mimiapata. Mãga pɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi pꞌuuru jɨ̃a–e pɨrã, ichi kꞌinia jɨ̃apataarã bɨpata ma pꞌuuru jɨ̃adamerã.

Pari tapꞌedaweda parã pꞌirabaipata mimiadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ɨ̃ida–ee pꞌãrikꞌua pida atꞌãri chokꞌai pꞌaneepata ne–inaa oo kꞌiniapa. ¿Mãga pꞌanapata–ekꞌã kꞌĩsia pꞌanadairã pãchi juadoopa pꞌanapataadaitꞌee? ¿Kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichia kꞌinia iru bɨɨrã kꞌãiwee kꞌãipipari?
Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachimaa warrarã teekꞌãri, ne–inaa pia oopari. Tachi–itꞌee tachi warrarã eujã bëidapꞌedáakꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ.
Ara sia soldao chõoyaa bɨ juade pꞌanɨkꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ warrarã tachia kꞌũtrãaweda ooda.
¡Eperã o–ĩa bɨ warrarã chokꞌara iru bakꞌãri! Mãga bakꞌãri, iru kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa pꞌoyaada–e pai, charraarã kꞌĩrapite ateedakꞌãri.
Eperã Tachi Akꞌõre waawee bakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa irua jara bɨkꞌa ookꞌãri, ma eperã tꞌãri o–ĩa bapari.
Ma eperã mãga bakꞌãri, ichi juapa mimia ooda kꞌaurepa nekꞌopariitꞌee. O–ĩa bapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ichia ne–inaa ooru pia uchiaitꞌee.
Ichi tede chi wẽra uva kꞌarra chauyaa baparikꞌa baitꞌee, warrarã chokꞌara tꞌoitꞌee perã. Chi warrarã olivo jua tꞌaikꞌa pꞌanadaitꞌee, ichi ikꞌaawa chokꞌara pꞌanadaitꞌee perã.
Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperã ichi waaweepari bendiciapari.
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ Sión eedeepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma eperã mãgá bendiciapariimerã. Kꞌinia bɨ ma eperã na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bɨ misa, irua unumerã Jerusalén pꞌuurudepemaarã pia pꞌanapata.
¡Kꞌinia bɨ irua ichi ãichakꞌeerã unumerã!
¡Kꞌinia bɨ israelitaarã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadamerã!
Israelitaarã, nãga jaradáma: “Tachi israelitaarã pꞌuurukꞌa awara pꞌaneedakꞌãriipa, tachi kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa tachi jɨrɨpata jõpidaitꞌee.” Israelitaarã, waya nãga jaradáma:
“Tachi israelitaarã pꞌuurukꞌa awara pꞌaneedakꞌãriipa, tachi kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa tachi jɨrɨpata jõpidaitꞌee.” Mamĩda mãɨrãpa tachi pꞌoyaada–e paji.
Ara eperãarãpa eujã aradopa poreetɨpatakꞌa ne–uudai naaweda, mãga pɨkꞌa mãɨrãpa tachi ekꞌarramaa soopa audú pꞌua oopachida.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre, chi ichita ne–inaa pia ooparipa, tachi uchiapiji ma ijãadakꞌaa beerã juadeepa.
Ɨ̃rá tachia kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Sión eedepemaarã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã kꞌĩra nejasia pꞌaneedamerã mãikꞌaapa jĩchoodamerã.
Kꞌinia pꞌanɨ mãɨrã pꞌaneedamerã pꞌũajara te porosãude tꞌonopꞌeda, akꞌõrejĩrupa isapai pɨɨtꞌaaparikꞌa.
Ne–uupataarãpa mãgee pꞌũajara tꞌɨɨda–e kꞌõrajɨ̃made pꞌe atadaitꞌee, netꞌa tau ome oopatakꞌa ewadakꞌãri.
Apidaapa ãchi kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãmaa jarada–e: “Kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã pia oopariimerã. Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã bendiciaipia bɨ.”
Aai Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ uria audú nãpɨa pɨkꞌa bɨde bɨ. Mapa pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa iidimaa bɨ.
Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa, ũríji mɨa chupɨria iidi nɨ̃bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa pꞌekꞌau oopata jõmaweda pꞌãda paara, eperã apida pꞌekꞌau wẽe unu–e pakꞌaji.
Mamĩda pɨa ãyaa bɨpari taipa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata. Maperãpɨ pɨ waaweepata.
Tꞌãripa mɨa nɨmaa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ kꞌaripa chemerã. Mɨa ijãa bɨ irua ooitꞌee ichia jara bɨkꞌa.
Pꞌuuru jɨ̃apataarãpa audú nɨpatakꞌa isapai ewarimerã, ma kꞌãyaara audupɨara mɨa nɨmaa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ kꞌaripa chemerã.
Israelitaarã, mãgá nɨ́tɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌaripa chemerã, iruata tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã mãikꞌaapa tachi na nepɨradeepa uchiapiitꞌee perã.
Iruata tachi israelitaarã uchiapiitꞌee tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata jua ekꞌariipa.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ audua nipa–e. Jɨrɨ–e awaraarãpa mɨ pia akꞌɨdamerã. Jɨrɨ–e eperãarã poro waibɨa paitꞌee maa–e pɨrã ne–inaa pi–ia ooitꞌee; ne–inaa mɨa pꞌoyaa oo–e bɨ.
Mãga nipai kꞌãyaara, mɨ kꞌãiwee bapari, warra jutopꞌeda, chi nawe juade kꞌãiwee baparikꞌa. ¡Mãga pɨkꞌa bɨ mɨ!
Israelitaarã, ichita nɨpatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌaripamerã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, kꞌĩra atuanáaji rey David mia nɨ̃bada, pɨa te iru bamerã.
Jacobpa ijãada Akꞌõre Waibɨa, kꞌirãpáji Davidpa pɨmaa juraada nãga jarakꞌãri:
“Mɨ teeda ɨ̃ide tꞌĩu–e paitꞌeeda aji, mãikꞌaapa
mɨchi tau kꞌãi–e paitꞌee; pia jaraitꞌeera kꞌãiwee kꞌãi–e paitꞌee
Tachi Akꞌõre, Jacobpa ijãada Akꞌõre Waibɨa–itꞌee te unu–emaa.”
Maapꞌeda tai Efrata pꞌuurude pꞌanɨde, kꞌawaajida Tachi Akꞌõre baaltekꞌa bɨ Quiriat Yearín pꞌuuru kꞌaitꞌa baji.
Mãga kꞌawaadakꞌãri, mãgajida: “¡Wãdáma ajida, Tachi Akꞌõre baaltekꞌa bɨmaa! ¡Mama bedabaidáma iru kꞌĩrapite, irumaa nãga ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daitꞌee!
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨchi te awara bɨdamaa wãpáde ajida, ɨ̃ide pɨchi baaltekꞌa bɨ ome, ma baaltekꞌa bɨ kꞌaurepa taipa pɨ jua unupata perã.
Taipa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨ pꞌaareerãpa ichita ne–inaa pia oopataadamerã, ãchi pꞌaru awara bɨda ichita jɨ̃patakꞌa. Kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨde ijãapataarã tꞌãri o–ĩapa bia para bamerã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ, pɨ mimiapari Davidmaa jarada kꞌaurepa mɨ, pɨa rey jɨrɨtꞌerada yiaraa iru banáaji.”
Tachi Akꞌõrepa Davidmaa juraadakꞌa, ichita ooitꞌee. Nãga juraaji: “Eperã pɨdeepa uchiaitꞌee bɨ rey bɨitꞌeeda aji, pɨ pari.
Pɨ warrarãpa ooruta pɨrã ãchi chonaarãpa mɨ ome pacto oodapꞌedaade jaradapꞌedaakꞌa mãikꞌaapa ooruta pɨrã mɨa ãramaa jarateeitꞌee bɨkꞌa, pɨ pari ichita rey padaitꞌee; ãchi warrarã paara.”
¡Tachi Akꞌõrepa Sión ee jɨrɨtꞌeraji mama bapariitꞌee! Irua mãgaji:
“Na eede mɨ ichita ba kꞌinia bɨda aji. Nama bapariitꞌee, mɨa mãga kꞌinia bairã.
Namapemaarãmaa ne–inaa kꞌoparii unupiitꞌee mãikꞌaapa chupɨria beerã pia akꞌɨ bapariitꞌee jarra oonaadamerã.
Pꞌaareerã bɨitꞌee mɨ ley eperãarãmaa jarateedamerã mãikꞌaapa ãra pari mɨmaa kꞌaripa iidipataadamerã. Mãpai mɨde ijãapataarã o–ĩapa kꞌaridaitꞌee.
Nama rey papiitꞌee David jĩakꞌa. Mɨa ma rey jɨrɨtꞌeraji lamparakꞌa ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bamerã.
Mɨa mãgɨ́ rey kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã kꞌĩra nejasiapiitꞌee. Jõdee iru kꞌapꞌɨa pari mɨ kꞌĩra wãree unupiitꞌeeda” aji.
¡Pi–ia bɨ ijãapataarã ɨ̃pemaarãkꞌa araa pꞌanapataadakꞌãri!
Aceite ne–inaa tꞌũa bapari ome pꞌoiradákꞌapɨ bɨ mãgee aceite weedakꞌãri pꞌaareerã poro waibɨa Aarón porode mãikꞌaapa ma aceite edaa chorebaikꞌãri ichi idakꞌarade chi pꞌaru jɨ̃ bɨ i parumaa.
Ichiaba sereno Hermón ee ɨ̃rɨ maa–e pɨrã Sión ee ɨ̃rɨ baaiparíkꞌapɨ bɨ. Mama Sión eedeepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã bendiciapari, akꞌɨpikꞌãri sãgá ichi ome ichita pꞌanapataadai.
Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee mimiapataarã, chi pꞌãrikꞌua iru te jɨ̃apataarã, irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ.
Iru te kꞌĩrapite pãchi jua ɨtꞌaa ɨapatáatɨ mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ.
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ Sión eedeepa Tachi Akꞌõre, chi pajã mãikꞌaapa na pꞌekꞌau eujã oodapa parã bendiciamerã.
¡Aleluya! ¡Jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ!
Jarátɨ iru tꞌɨ̃ jõmaweda tꞌɨ̃ kꞌãyaara pipɨara bɨ. ¡Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee mimiapataarã, irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ!
Parã, Tachi Akꞌõre tede mimiapataarã mãikꞌaapa ma te tꞌɨakꞌau bɨde mimiapataarã,
Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ, iru tꞌãri pia bapari perã. Irumaa salmo kꞌaripatáatɨ, mãga oodakꞌãri, tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapata perã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jacob, ichiaba tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Israel, ichi–itꞌee jɨrɨtꞌeraji ma eperãdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã ichi eperãarã pꞌaneedamerã.
Mɨa pia kꞌawa bɨ Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa, Tachi Akꞌõre, jõmaweda akꞌõre waibɨa apataarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichia oo kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oopari ɨtꞌari, na pꞌekꞌau eujãde, pꞌusade, pꞌusa nãpɨara bɨde paara.
Irua jɨ̃arara tꞌɨmɨ́ bee pꞌe atapari pajãde nɨ̃bamerã. Pa baaipipari kꞌoi chekꞌãri mãikꞌaapa nãu pꞌuapipari.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa Egiptodepema Faraón mãikꞌaapa iru–itꞌee mimiapataarã pꞌerapiji ãchi kꞌĩrapite ne–inaa pi–ia ookꞌãri; ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa. Iruata Egiptodepemaarã warrarã naapemaarã mãikꞌaapa ne–animalaarã naapɨara tꞌoda piupiji.
Maapꞌeda awara–awaraa eujãdepemaarã chokꞌara jõpiji, ãchi rey waibɨarã ome.
Mãga ooji amorreorã rey Sijón ome mãikꞌaapa Basán eujãdepema rey Og ome; ichiaba Canaán eujãdepema reyrã jõmaarã ome.
Ma pꞌuuru pidaarã eujã jãri atapiji ichi eperãarãmaa, israelitaarãpa ma eujã jɨ̃adamerã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ ichita bapari. Eperãarãdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã jõmaarãpa pɨ tꞌɨ̃ ichita kꞌirãpadaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi eperãarãpa oopata akꞌɨpꞌeda, jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Mãga oo bɨ misa, ichi mimiapataarã chupɨria kꞌawaaitꞌee.
Ijãadakꞌaarã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite; nẽedee maa–e pɨrã pꞌaratꞌadee.
Ma ne–inaa itꞌai iru pꞌanɨ mĩda, pꞌoyaa pedeedakꞌaa; tau iru pꞌanɨ mĩda, pꞌoyaa unudakꞌaa;
kꞌɨɨrɨ iru pꞌanɨ mĩda pꞌoyaa ũridakꞌaa, ¡chokꞌai pꞌanɨ–e perã!
Mãgee ne–inaa kꞌĩsia atua pꞌanɨkꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa ma ne–inaa oopataarã mãikꞌaapa aɨde ijãapataarã kꞌĩsia atua pꞌanapata.
Israelitaarã, Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ. Aarondeepa uchiadapꞌedaa pꞌaareerã, Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ.
Levideepa uchiadapꞌedaarã, Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ. Jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapataarã, irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ.
Mãgá pedee pia jarapatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõre, chi Sión eede Jerusalén pꞌuurude baparimaa.
¡Aleluya! ¡Jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapataadaipia bɨ!
Tachi Akꞌõremaa gracias jaradáma, iru tꞌãri pia bapari perã mãikꞌaapa ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Gracias jaradáma jõmaweda akꞌõre waibɨa apataarã kꞌãyaara Akꞌõre Waibɨara bɨmaa, irua ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Gracias jaradáma jõmaarã poro waibɨarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨmaa, irua ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Irua aupaita ne–inaa pi–ia oopari; ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa. Mãga oopari irua ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bairã irua pajã ooji, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Irua na pꞌekꞌau eujã pꞌusa kꞌãyaara ɨtꞌɨara bɨji, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Irua akꞌõrejĩru mãikꞌaapa atane ooji, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Irua akꞌõrejĩru ooji ãstaawa ɨ̃daamerã, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Irua atane mãikꞌaapa lucero ooji pꞌãrikꞌua ɨ̃daadamerã, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Irua Egipto eujãdepemaarã warrarã naapemaarã piupiji, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Irua israelitaarã Egipto eujãdeepa uchiapiji, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Tachi chonaarãmaa ichi jua unupiji, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Irua Mar Rojo tꞌooma omeede tꞌoopiji, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Irua ma pꞌusa esa–aukꞌa pꞌoo bɨde israelitaarã wãyaapiji, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Mamĩda Faraón ichi soldaorã ome Mar Rojode jõpiji, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Ichi eperãarã ateeji eujã pania wẽe bɨde, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Irua rey waibɨarã piupiji, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Rey juataura pꞌanadapꞌedaarã jõpiji, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Amorreorã rey Sijón jõpiji, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Basán pidaarã rey Og jõpiji, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Mãɨrã eujã tachi chonaarãmaa jãri atapiji, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Israeldeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã, ichi–itꞌee mimiapataarãmaa mãɨrã eujã jɨ̃apiji, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Irua tachi kꞌĩra atua–e, chĩara jua ekꞌari chupɨria chitoonadakꞌãri, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Tachi uchiapipari tachi kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã juadeepa, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Irua eperãarãmaa, ne–animalaarãmaa paara chikꞌo unupipari, ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
¡Gracias jaradáma tachi ɨtꞌaripema Akꞌõre Waibɨamaa, irua ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã!
Babilonia eujãdepema to ide tai su–akꞌɨ pꞌanɨde Sión ee kꞌirãpadakꞌãri, jẽepachida.
Tꞌãri pꞌuapa tai arpa waa chaada–e paji. Ma kꞌãyaara álamo pakꞌurude baijira bɨjida.
Mama tai ateedapꞌedaarãpa iidijida taipa mãgɨ́ arpa chaadamerã. Tai chokꞌapataarãpa kꞌinia pꞌanajida taipa Sión eedepema kꞌari kꞌaridamerã, mãgá ãchi o–ĩa pꞌaneedamerã.
Mamĩda ¿sãgá mɨa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌari kꞌariima awaraarã eujãde bɨde?
Aai Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa Jerusalén pꞌuuru kꞌĩra atuadaru pɨrã, kꞌinia bɨ mɨ jua juaraarepema pɨɨdaimerã. ¡Mãgá mɨa waa arpa chaa–e pai!
Mɨa Jerusalén pꞌuuru kꞌĩra atuadaru pɨrã mãikꞌaapa ma pꞌuurudeepa tꞌɨmɨ́ bɨde tꞌãri o–ĩadaru pɨrã, ¡kꞌinia bɨ mɨ kꞌĩrame mɨchi itꞌai edajãde kꞌaradaimerã! ¡Mãgá mɨa waa kꞌari–e pai!

Tachi Akꞌõre, kꞌirãpáji Edom eujãdepemaarãpa jaradapꞌedaa Jerusalén pꞌuuru tai kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã juade baaikꞌãri. Mãɨrãmaa biajida: “¡Jã pꞌuuru jõtꞌaadapáde!” ajida. “¡Jõtꞌaadapáde ajida, aɨdepema te basa paara!”
Babiloniadepemaarã, ¡parãta mãgá jõidatꞌeepɨ! ¡O–ĩa pꞌanadaipia bɨ parã jõpidaitꞌeerã, parãpa tai kꞌachia oodapꞌedaa perã!
¡O–ĩa pꞌanadaipia bɨ pãchi warrarã jita atadapꞌeda, mãumaa batꞌa peerutaarã!
Tachi Akꞌõre, tꞌãripa mɨa pɨmaa pedee pia jaraitꞌee mãikꞌaapa salmo kꞌariitꞌee jõmaweda ɨtꞌaripema angeleerã kꞌĩrapite.

Mãɨmisa bedabaiitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pɨ te bɨmaa akꞌɨitꞌee, tꞌɨmɨ́ bɨ mĩda. Pɨmaa pedee pia jaraitꞌee, pɨa mɨ kꞌinia iru bapari perã mãikꞌaapa ichita pɨa jara bɨkꞌa oopari perã. Pɨa mɨmaa akꞌɨpiji wãara pɨ tꞌɨ̃ ne–inaa jõmaweda kꞌãyaara pipɨara bɨ mãikꞌaapa pɨ pedee ne–inaa jõmaweda kꞌãyaara pipɨara bɨ.
Mɨa pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa iidikꞌãri, pɨa ũriji mãikꞌaapa mɨ juataura, sõcharra papiji.
Tachi Akꞌõre, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema reyrã jõmaarãpa pɨ pedee ũridakꞌãri, pɨmaa pedee pia jaradaitꞌee.
Kꞌaride ne–inaa pɨa oopari jaradaitꞌee, pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ perã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ mãgá waibɨara bɨ mĩda, pɨa audua–ee beerã akꞌɨ bapari. Jõdee pɨa audua beerã tꞌɨmɨɨpa akꞌɨpari.
Mɨ nepɨrade baairu pɨjida, pɨa mɨ jɨ̃apariitꞌee, madeepa chokꞌai uchiamerã. ¡Mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã mɨ ome kꞌĩraudaidakꞌãri, pɨ juarapa mɨ kꞌaripaitꞌee ãra juade baainaamerã!
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa mɨ ome ooitꞌee pɨchia kꞌĩsia iru bɨkꞌa. Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa mɨ ichita kꞌinia iru bapariitꞌee. ¡Mapa pɨa ooda ituaba atabëináaji!
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨa mɨ akꞌɨpari mãikꞌaapa mɨ tꞌãri kꞌawapari.
Pɨa kꞌawapari mɨ su–akꞌɨ beekꞌãri mãikꞌaapa pꞌirabaikꞌãri. Pɨ bapari tꞌɨmɨ́ bɨ mĩda, pɨa kꞌawapari mɨa kꞌĩsia bɨ.
Pɨa kꞌawapari mɨ ãyaa wãkꞌãri mãikꞌaapa teeda ɨ̃imaa beekꞌãri. Pɨa kꞌawapari jõmaweda ne–inaa mɨa oopari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ pedeei naaweda, pɨa kꞌawapari mɨa jaraitꞌee bɨ.
Pɨa mɨ wapꞌɨra pɨkꞌa iru bapari mãikꞌaapa pɨ juapa mɨ jɨ̃apari.
Ma jõmaade kꞌĩsiakꞌãri, mɨa pꞌoyaa kꞌawa–e sãgá pɨa mɨ mãgá kꞌawapari, mɨchi tꞌãride kꞌĩsiapari paara.
Pɨ jaure perã, ¿sãmaa mɨ miruima pɨa mɨ ununaamerã? ¿Sãmaa wãima pɨa mɨ ununaamerã?
Pajã ɨtꞌɨara nɨ̃bɨdee mɨ wãda paara, pɨ mama bakꞌaji. Jõdee piudaarãmaa
Akꞌõrejĩru uchiaparimaa mɨ wãda paara maa–e pɨrã akꞌõrejĩru baaiparimãi pꞌusade tokꞌesaa banada paara, pɨ ichiaba mama bakꞌaji.
¡Mɨ mamaa banaru pɨjida, pɨ juapa mɨ ateekꞌaji mãikꞌaapa pɨ juarapa mɨ kꞌaripakꞌaji!
Ma awara mɨa kꞌĩsiada paara: Pꞌãriu nɨ̃bɨde mɨ miruitꞌee maa–e pɨrã mɨa kꞌinia bada paara na ɨ̃daa nɨ̃bɨ pꞌãriudaimerã,
ma pꞌãriude mɨ pꞌoyaa miru–e pakꞌaji, pɨ ichiaba mama bairã. ¡Pɨ–itꞌee ɨ̃daa, pꞌãriu ome aukꞌa bɨ!
Pɨata mɨ kꞌapꞌɨa edajãde nɨ̃bɨ jõmaweda ooji. Eperãpa pꞌaru pi–ia kꞌaparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa pɨa mɨ kꞌapꞌɨa ooji mɨ nawe bide bakꞌãri.
Ne–inaa pi–ia ooji mɨ mãgá ookꞌãri; ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi kꞌĩradoopa. ¡Tꞌãripa mɨa mãga kꞌawa bɨ!
Mãgá mɨ nawe bide bakꞌãri, awaraarãpa mɨ unuda–e paji mĩda, ma pꞌãriu nɨ̃bɨde pɨa akꞌɨ baji mɨ bɨɨrɨ mãikꞌaapa mɨ kꞌapꞌɨade nɨ̃bɨ, uchia wãdakꞌãri pꞌaru chi kꞌapari juadeepa uchia wãparikꞌa.
Mãgá pɨchi taupa unuji mɨ kꞌapꞌɨa wari wãda mɨ nawe bide. Jõmaweda pꞌã iru baji pɨchi ɨtꞌaripema librode. Mɨ tꞌoi naaweda mãikꞌaapa año apida bai naaweda, pɨa kꞌawa baji mɨ año jõmasaa bapariitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ¡mɨa pɨ kꞌĩsia pꞌoyaa kꞌawa–e, audú pi–ia, chokꞌara pꞌanadairã!

Mɨa pɨ kꞌĩsia juasia kꞌinia bada paara, ipu nãusaa tau chokꞌara nɨ̃bɨ kꞌãyaara chokꞌaraara uchiakꞌajida. Ma kꞌĩsia jõmaweda pꞌoyaa juasiada paara, atꞌãri pɨ kꞌĩsia pia kꞌawa–e pakꞌaji, pɨ mɨ ome bapari mĩda.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa kꞌinia bɨ pɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã jõpimerã mãikꞌaapa chĩara peepataarã mɨ ikꞌaawaapa tꞌɨmɨ́ pëimerã.
Mãga ooipia bɨ mãɨrãpa pɨ ãpɨte ikꞌachia pedeepata perã mãikꞌaapa pɨ tꞌɨ̃ ichi kꞌinia jarapata perã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bɨ pɨ unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã mãikꞌaapa pɨa jara bɨkꞌa oodaamaa pꞌanapataarã.
¡Tꞌãripa mãɨrã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bɨ! ¡Mɨ–itꞌee mãɨrã mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ!
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ tꞌãri akꞌɨ́ji kꞌawaaitꞌee mɨa kꞌĩsia bɨ pia bɨ wa kꞌachia bɨ.
Mɨ o kꞌachiade wãru pɨrã, mamãikꞌaapa uchia atáji mãikꞌaapa pɨchi ode bɨ́ji, ichita mɨ pɨ ome nipapariimerã.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ kꞌaripáji ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã juade baainaamerã. Mɨ jɨ̃́aji mɨ pee kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrãpa mɨmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oonaadamerã.
Kꞌĩsia kꞌachia kꞌĩsiapata mãikꞌaapa ichita jɨrɨpata chõodaitꞌee.
Taama kꞌĩrame audú misua bɨkꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mãɨrã pedee misua pɨkꞌa bɨ. Mãɨrã pedee taamapa neera kꞌachia iru bɨ́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ jɨ̃́aji pɨde ijãadakꞌaa beerã juade baainaamerã. Mɨ jɨ̃́aji mɨ pee kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrãpa mɨmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oonaadamerã, mãɨrãpa kꞌĩsia pꞌanadairã mɨ kꞌachiade baaipidaitꞌee.
Ara nejɨrɨparipa lazo oga jira bɨparikꞌa maa–e pɨrã eperãpa tꞌɨrɨ tꞌaaparikꞌa, aɨde ne–inaa baaimerã, mãga pɨkꞌa ma audua beerãpa trampa oga pɨkꞌa jira bɨpata mɨ aɨde baaimerã.
Mɨa Tachi Akꞌõremaa jarapari: “Pɨ mɨ Akꞌõre Waibɨa. Tachi Akꞌõre, ¡ũríji mɨa chupɨria iidi bɨ!
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Pɨ mɨ kꞌaripapari waibɨara bɨ. Mɨ chõo bakꞌãri, pɨa mɨ jɨ̃apari peenaadamerã.”
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨde ijãadakꞌaa beerãmaa oopináaji ãchia kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanɨkꞌa oodaitꞌee. Mãga–e pɨrã ãchi audua nipadaitꞌee, ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa.
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ pɨa ãra baaipimerã ãchia kꞌachia oodaitꞌee jara pꞌanɨde.
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ pɨa tꞌɨpɨtau urua nɨ̃bɨ ãchi ɨ̃rɨ baaipimerã. Kꞌinia bɨ pɨa ãchi tꞌɨpɨtau urua nɨ̃bɨde batꞌakꞌoomerã. Kꞌinia bɨ ãchi pozo nãpɨade batꞌakꞌoomerã, madeepa waa uchianaadamerã.

Kꞌinia bɨ chĩara ãpɨte ikꞌachia pedeepataarã na eujãde pꞌanapinaamerã, mãɨrã pedee taama neera kꞌachiakꞌa bairã. Kꞌinia bɨ pɨa mãgee ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanapataarãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oomerã mãikꞌaapa jõpimerã.
Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichita ne–inaa pia oopari chupɨria beerã mãikꞌaapa mia chitoonɨɨrã kꞌaripaitꞌee.
¡Pɨa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã ichita pɨmaa pedee pia jarapataadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipapataarã ichita pɨ ome pꞌanapataadaitꞌee!
Tachi Akꞌõre, isapai mɨ kꞌaripa chéji. ¡Ũríji mɨa pɨmaa chupɨria iidi bɨ!
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ na ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa bɨ ne–inaa tꞌũa bapari pɨ kꞌĩrapite bɨpatakꞌa bamerã. Kꞌinia bɨ mɨa pɨmaa jua ɨtꞌaa ɨamaa bɨ bamerã kꞌewarapema ne–inaa pɨ–itꞌee paapatakꞌa, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ pꞌanɨ misa.
Tachi Akꞌõre, carcelde jɨ̃apari bɨpatakꞌa mamãikꞌaapa preso uchianaamerã, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ itꞌai jɨ̃́aji, aɨdeepa pedee kꞌachia uchianaamerã.
Mɨ tꞌãride kꞌĩsia kꞌachia kꞌĩsiapináaji mãikꞌaapa mɨ ne–inaa kꞌachia oopataarã ome nipapináaji. Mɨmaa mãgeerã kꞌõpꞌãyaapináaji nekꞌopata fiesta oodakꞌãri ãchi akꞌõre waibɨa apataarã–itꞌee.

Pia bɨ eperã pɨa jara bɨkꞌa ooparipa mɨ ɨtrɨakꞌãri mɨ kꞌinia iru bapari perã, mãga ookꞌãri, kꞌera tꞌũa mɨ porode weemaa pɨkꞌa bairã. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa mɨmaa iwarraa pedee jaradakꞌãri, mɨa ma kꞌera tꞌũa pɨkꞌa bɨ mɨ porode weepi–e paitꞌee, mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidipari perã mãɨrã kꞌachiade baaidamerã, ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa.
Eperãpa mãu peñadeepa batꞌa pëiparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãɨrã poro waibɨarã ãchi mimiadeepa ãyaa pëiitꞌee. Irua mãga ookꞌãri, mãɨrãpa kꞌawaadaitꞌee mɨa wãara pedee jara baji mãikꞌaapa
jaradaitꞌee: “Ara tꞌɨpɨ puudakꞌãri chi pite pɨrɨɨchoo jẽra beeparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa jãɨra ikꞌaawa tachi bɨɨrɨ pɨrɨɨchoo jẽra beedaitꞌeeda” adaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Mɨa nɨmaa bɨ pɨa mɨ kꞌaripamerã. Mɨ jɨrɨ pꞌanɨɨrãmaa peepináaji.
Mɨ kꞌaripáji ne–inaa kꞌachia oopataarãpa trampa oga iru pꞌanɨde baainaamerã.
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ ãchita baaidamerã ãchia trampa oga iru pꞌanɨde, mɨ kꞌãiwee ma trampa ikꞌaawa wãyaaru misa.
Mɨa golpe Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ. Mɨa golpe Tachi Akꞌõremaa chupɨria iidi bɨ.
Mɨa kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bɨ irumaa jara bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ audú kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bakꞌãri, pɨa kꞌawa bɨ mɨ sãga nipapari. Mɨ o nipaparide eperãarãpa mɨ nɨpata kꞌachiade baaipidaitꞌee.
Mɨ juaraare akꞌɨkꞌãri, apida unu–e. Apida che–e mɨ kꞌaripaitꞌee. Unu–e sãma mirunaitꞌee. Apidaapa kꞌĩsia–e bɨ mɨ kꞌaripaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa pɨmaa chupɨria iidi bɨ. Pɨmaata mɨa jara bɨ: “Pɨa mɨ jɨ̃apari. Pɨa aupaita mɨ kꞌaripapari, mɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãde chokꞌai bɨ misa.”
Mɨ biapi ũríji mɨ juatau wẽedaru perã. Mɨ kꞌaripáji mɨ jɨrɨ pꞌanɨɨrã juade baainaamerã, ãchi mɨ kꞌãyaara juataura pꞌanadairã.
Mɨ uchiapíji na carcelde pɨkꞌa bɨdeepa. Pɨa mɨ mãgá kꞌariparu pɨrã, awaraa pɨa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã ome pɨmaa pedee pia jarapariitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ũríji mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ. Ũríji mɨa chupɨria iidimaa bɨ. Mɨ kꞌaripa chéji pɨa jara bɨkꞌa oopari perã mãikꞌaapa pɨa ichita ne–inaa pia oopari perã.
Mɨ pɨ mimiapari. Mɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopariida kꞌaurepa mɨ miapináaji, pɨ kꞌĩrapite eperã apida kꞌachia wẽe bakꞌaa perã.
Mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa mɨ jɨrɨpata mãikꞌaapa eujãde batꞌatꞌaadapꞌeda, mɨ ome ãchia oo kꞌiniata oopata. Ãrapa mɨ pꞌãriu bɨde bapipata. Mapa mɨ eperãarã taarã piudapꞌedaarã́kꞌapɨ bɨ.
Mɨ kꞌĩra pia–ee nɨ̃bɨ mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri pꞌua nɨ̃bɨ.
Mɨa kꞌirãpa bɨ mɨ naaweda bapariida; sãgá pɨa mɨ kꞌaripapachi. Kꞌĩsiamaa bɨ pɨa ne–inaa pi–ia oopariidade.
Mɨ jua ɨtꞌaa ɨapari, pɨ jua waya unu kꞌinia bairã. Ara eujã pꞌoo bɨpa pania nɨparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨa pɨ nɨpari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ¡isapai mɨ kꞌaripa chéji, mɨ ɨ̃yapa jɨ̃adaru perã! Mɨ kꞌaripa–eda anáaji, mɨ piudapꞌedaarãmaa wãrúkꞌapɨ bairã.
Tapꞌeweda akꞌɨpíji pɨa mɨ wãara kꞌinia iru bapari, mɨa pɨde ijãapari perã. Kꞌawapíji pɨa mɨmaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ, ma–itꞌee mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidipari perã.
Mɨ uchiapíji mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã juadeepa. Mɨa pɨ jɨrɨpari mɨ jɨ̃amerã.
Jaratéeji mɨa oo kꞌawaamerã pɨa oopi bɨkꞌa, pɨ mɨ Akꞌõre Waibɨa perã. Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ pɨ jaurepa pɨ o piade mɨ ateemerã, eperã eujã jewedaade kꞌãiwee nipaparikꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ atꞌãri chokꞌai bapíji, jõmaarãpa pɨ tꞌɨ̃ tꞌo pꞌanadamerã. Pɨa ichita ne–inaa pia oopari perã, na nepɨradeepa mɨ uchiapíji.
Pɨa mɨ kꞌinia iru bapari perã, mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã jõpíji. ¡Ãchi jõmaweda jõpíji, mɨ pɨ mimiapari perã!
¡Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌãri pia bapari! Mɨ–itꞌee iru mãu choma bɨkꞌa bɨ, mɨ jɨ̃apari perã. Irua mɨ chõo kꞌawaapipari mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã ome.

Irua mɨ kꞌinia iru bapari mãikꞌaapa mɨ kꞌaripapari. Mɨ jɨ̃apari mãikꞌaapa nepɨradeepa mɨ uchiapipari. Irumaa mɨ miru pɨkꞌanapari. Mɨ–itꞌee iru escudokꞌa bɨ, mɨ jɨ̃apari perã. Iruata awara–awaraa pꞌuuru pidaarã mɨ jua ekꞌari bɨji.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ¿kꞌaima eperã pɨ–itꞌee, pɨa iru akꞌɨ bapariimerã? ¿Kꞌaima eperã, pɨa irude kꞌĩsiapariimerã?
Eperã taarã–ee bapari; ĩyapa aba pɨkꞌa bɨ. Eperã isapai wẽpadaipari, tachi jaure isapai wẽpadaiparikꞌa, akꞌõrejĩru baai wãkꞌãri.
Tachi Akꞌõre, pajã ewáji mãikꞌaapa edaa chéji. Ee jẽra bɨ tꞌõbáiji, aɨdeepa nari uchiamerã.
Eperãpa sia trɨparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa pa tau baaipíji, pɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã pariatua ãpɨtee jĩchoodamerã.
Ɨtꞌariipa pɨchi juapa mɨ uchiapíji na pꞌusa nãpɨa pɨkꞌa bɨdeepa; pia jaraitꞌeera awaraa eujãdepemaarã juadeepa.
Ãra pedeedakꞌãri, seewa jarapata. Ãchi juaraarepema jua ɨtꞌaa ɨaruta pɨjida juraadaitꞌee wãara pedee jaradaitꞌee, seewa jarapata.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa pɨmaa kꞌari chiwidi kꞌariitꞌee. Salmo kꞌariitꞌee arpa diez cuerda ome chaa nɨ̃bɨde.
Pɨata reyrãmaa chõo pꞌoyaapipari. Pɨata pɨ mimiapari David uchiapiji iru kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapatapꞌedaarã juadeepa, espadapa peenaadamerã.

Ɨ̃rá mɨ ome mãga óoji ichiaba. Mɨ uchiapíji awaraa eujãdepemaarã juadeepa. Mãɨrã pedeedakꞌãri, seewa jarapata mãikꞌaapa ãchi juaraarepema jua ɨtꞌaa ɨaruta pɨjida juraadaitꞌee wãara pedee jaradaitꞌee, seewa jarapata.
Pɨa mɨ kꞌariparu pɨrã, tai warrarã ne–inaa kꞌarra kꞌiru–idaa beekꞌa pꞌanadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa tai kꞌaurã pi–ia pꞌanadaitꞌee, palaciodepema columna pi–ia sĩdakꞌa.
Ichiaba tai netꞌa tau ɨapata te ipuru pꞌanadaitꞌee, ne–inaa kꞌopata kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo paraaitꞌee perã. Ma awara tai ne–animalaarã ĩwadaitꞌee, mil chokꞌara paraarumaa pꞌũajara paraamãi.

Tai pꞌakꞌaarã juataura pꞌanadaitꞌee perã, ne–inaa chɨkꞌɨa jidiudaitꞌee. Awaraa eujãdepemaarãpa tai pꞌuuru tꞌɨakꞌau bee muralla ãrida–e paitꞌee, pꞌuuru jãde tꞌĩudaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa netꞌaa wa eperãarã ãyaa ateedaitꞌee. Mapa tai pꞌuuru jãde, pꞌera jõnɨpa eperãarã biada–e paitꞌee.
¡Pꞌuuru pidaarã o–ĩa pꞌanɨ mãga pꞌanapataadakꞌãri! ¡O–ĩa pꞌanɨ pɨ, Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa, Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadakꞌãri!
Tachi Akꞌõre, pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Pɨ mɨ Akꞌõre Waibɨa; pɨ mɨ rey. Pɨmaa mɨa ichita pedee pia jarapariitꞌee.
Ewari chaa pɨmaa pedee pia jaraitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pɨmaa ichita gracias jarapariitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã, jõmaarãpa irumaa pedee pia jarapataadaipia bɨ. Apidaapa iru jua pꞌoyaa kꞌawada–e, audú waibɨa bairã.
Akꞌõre Waibɨa, tai warrarãpa, ãradeepa uchiadaitꞌeerãpa paara, tꞌãri o–ĩapa jaradaitꞌee pɨa ne–inaa pi–ia oopari.
Jaradaitꞌee pɨ kꞌĩra wãree mãikꞌaapa jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Mɨa kꞌĩsiaitꞌee pɨa ne–inaa pi–ia oopariidade; ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa.
Ãrapa jaradaitꞌee ne–inaa pɨa oopari. Mɨa jaraitꞌee pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã, mãgee ne–inaa oopari.
Jaradaitꞌee pɨ ãchi ome audú tꞌãri pia bapariida mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri o–ĩapa kꞌaridaitꞌee, pɨa ichita ne–inaa pia oopari perã.
Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌãri pia bapari; chupɨria kꞌawaayaa bapari; isapai kꞌĩraukꞌaa mãikꞌaapa eperãarã kꞌinia iru bapari.
Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌãri pia bapari jõmaarã ome; ichia ooda jõmaweda akꞌɨ bapari mãikꞌaapa chupɨria kꞌawaapari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, ¡mɨa kꞌinia bɨ pɨa ooda kꞌaurepa jõmaarãpa pɨmaa pedee pia jarapataadamerã! ¡Kꞌinia bɨ pɨde ijãapataarãpa pɨmaa pedee pia jarapataadamerã!
¡Kꞌinia bɨ pɨ trua kꞌĩra wãreedé pedeedamerã mãikꞌaapa pɨa ne–inaa pi–ia oopariidadé pedeedamerã!
Mãgá eperãarã jõmaarãpa kꞌawaadaitꞌee pɨa ne–inaa pi–ia oopari mãikꞌaapa pɨ trua kꞌĩra wãree bɨ.
Jõmaarãta pɨ jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata, pɨ ichita jõmaarã rey paitꞌee perã. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichita oopari ichia jara bɨkꞌa. Tꞌãri pia mãga oopari.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã kꞌaripapari kꞌachiade baaidakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri o–ĩ–ĩapipari kꞌĩra pia–ee pꞌanadakꞌãri.
Tachi Akꞌõre, jõmaweda chokꞌai pꞌanɨɨrãpa nɨpata pɨa ãchimaa ne–inaa kꞌoparii unupimerã. Pɨa kꞌinia bakꞌãri, mãga oopari.
Pɨ juajã eratɨpari mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri piapa jõmaweda chokꞌai pꞌanɨɨrãmaa ne–inaa kꞌopipari.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichita ne–inaa pia oopari mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri pia ne–inaa jõmaweda oopari.
Tachi Akꞌõre irumaa tꞌãripa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataarã kꞌaitꞌa bapari.
Irua oopari iru waaweepataarãpa iidipatakꞌa. Iididakꞌãri irua kꞌaripamerã, ũripari mãikꞌaapa ãchi kꞌaripapari.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jɨ̃apari jõmaweda iru kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨɨrã. Mamĩda jõmaweda ijãadakꞌaa beerã jõpiitꞌee.
¡Tachi Akꞌõremaa mɨa pedee pia jarapari! ¡Jõmaweda chokꞌai pꞌanɨɨrãpa irumaa pedee pia ichita jarapataadaipia bɨ, iru tꞌɨ̃ jõmaweda tꞌɨ̃ kꞌãyaara pipɨara bairã!
¡Aleluya! ¡Jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapataadaipia bɨ! Tꞌãripa mɨa Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapariitꞌee.
Mɨa ichita Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapariitꞌee. Mɨ chokꞌai bɨ misa, mɨchi Akꞌõre Waibɨamaa salmo kꞌaripariitꞌee.
Ijãanáatɨ eperãarã poro waibɨarãde Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapatakꞌa, eperãarãpa tachi pꞌoyaa kꞌaripada–e perã irua kꞌaripaparikꞌa.
Eperãarã piudakꞌãri, yooro pꞌora padaipata mãikꞌaapa oodakꞌaa ãchia kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa.
Eperã o–ĩa bɨ Jacobpa ijãada Akꞌõre Waibɨapa ichi kꞌaripakꞌãri. Eperã o–ĩa bɨ nɨkꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõre, ichi Akꞌõre Waibɨapa ichi kꞌaripa chemerã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooji pajã aɨde nɨ̃bɨ ome; na pꞌekꞌau eujã aɨde nɨ̃bɨ ome mãikꞌaapa pꞌusa aɨde nɨ̃bɨ ome. Irua ichita oopari ichia jara bɨkꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripapari chupɨria chedeerã, chĩara jua ekꞌari kꞌachia pꞌanapataarã. Irua nekꞌopipari jarrapisia pꞌanɨɨrã. Irua awaraarã jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã uchiapipari chi jitadapꞌedaarã juadeepa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa tau pꞌãriu beerã pia unupipari. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩra pia–ee beerã tꞌãri o–ĩapipari. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia iru bapari ichia jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jɨ̃apari awaraa eujãdepemaarã tachi tꞌãide pꞌanapata. Irua akꞌõre wẽe beerã mãikꞌaapa pꞌẽtrãa beerã kꞌaripapari. Mamĩda ijãadakꞌaa beerãmaa oopi–e ãchia kꞌachia kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanɨkꞌa.
Siondepemaarã, pia jaraitꞌeera israelitaarã, ¡Tachi Akꞌõre ichita tachi rey paitꞌee, na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõru pɨjida!
¡Aleluya! ¡Jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapataadaipia bɨ!
¡Aleluya! ¡Jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapataadaipia bɨ!
Pi–ia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa salmo kꞌaridaitꞌee. ¡Pi–ia bɨ tꞌãripa irumaa pedee pia jaradaitꞌee!
Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jerusalén pꞌuuru chiwidi oopimaa bɨ mãikꞌaapa israelitaarã aneemaa bɨ ãra kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa ateedapꞌedaamãiipa.
Tꞌãri pꞌua pꞌanɨɨrã tꞌãri o–ĩ–ĩapimaa bɨ mãikꞌaapa ãra tꞌãri pꞌua wẽpapimaa bɨ, pꞌua wẽpapiparikꞌa tachi pꞌua oodamãi jɨpakꞌãri.
Irua lucero jõmaweda bɨji pajãde mãikꞌaapa ma chaachaa tꞌɨ̃ bɨji.
Tachi Akꞌõre juataura bɨ, iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã. Ne–inaa wẽ–e irua kꞌawa–e.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa chupɨria beerã mãikꞌaapa audua–ee beerã kꞌaripapari. Mamĩda irude ijãadakꞌaa beerã ekꞌariara papipari.
Kꞌaride Tachi Akꞌõremaa gracias jarapatáatɨ. Salmo kꞌaripatáatɨ arpa chaa pꞌanɨde.
Irua jɨ̃arara pëipari pajã wãkꞌadamerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌoi pëipari mẽepema pꞌũajara warimerã.
Ne–animalaarãmaa mãikꞌaapa cuervo chakꞌeerãmaa nekꞌopipari, ãchi biadakꞌãri.
Tachi Akꞌõre o–ĩadaikꞌaa caballoorã juataura bee wa soldaorã kꞌapꞌipꞌia pꞌira bee chõode uchiaruta unukꞌãri, eperãarãpa made audupɨara ijãaruta pɨrã, irude ijãadai kꞌãyaara.
Iru o–ĩadaipari unukꞌãri ichi waaweepataarã, ijãapata perã irua ãchi kꞌinia iru bapari.
Jerusalendepemaarã, Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ. Parã Sión eedepemaarã, pãchi Akꞌõre Waibɨamaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ.
Irua parã pꞌuuru jɨ̃apari, eperãpa ichi te jɨ̃aparikꞌa puertade pakꞌuru tꞌɨakꞌau bɨkꞌãri. Ma awara irua parã warrarã ma pꞌuurude pꞌanapataarã bendiciapari.
Irua pãchi eujã paara jɨ̃apari, aɨde parã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadamerã mãikꞌaapa bi jãwaa pꞌaneedamerã ichia trigo pi–ia chaupidapa.
Iru pedee na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee pëikꞌãri, ma pedee isapai panapari irua pëirumaa.
Nieve pëipari eujãde oveja kꞌarakꞌa jẽra beemerã. Hielo nãusaa eujãde pꞌopari, eperãpa itꞌabarre pꞌora pꞌoparikꞌa.
Pajãdeepa hielo kꞌoi taukꞌa pëikꞌãri, mãu chakꞌeerãkꞌa baaipata. Na eujã audú kꞌũrasaapikꞌãri, ¿kꞌaipa chooima?
Mamĩda irua pedeekꞌãri, ma hielo torrabaidaipari mãikꞌaapa nãu pꞌuapikꞌãri, ma nieve hielo ome waya pania padaipari.
Jacobdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarãmaa ichi pedee jara pëiji. Mãgɨ́ Israeldeepa uchiadapꞌedaarãmaa ichi ley jaraji.
Awaraa eujãdepemaarã ome mãga oo–e paji. Maperã mãɨrãpa iru ley kꞌawadakꞌaa.
¡Aleluya! ¡Jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapataadaipia bɨ!
¡Aleluya! ¡Jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapataadaipia bɨ!
Ne–inaa jõmaweda ɨtꞌari nɨ̃bɨ, irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ.
Angeleerã, irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ. Parã, chi ɨtꞌaripema soldaorã, irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ.
Akꞌõrejĩru, atane mãikꞌaapa lucero ɨ̃daa jõnɨ, irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ.
Pajã, pania aɨde nɨ̃bɨ ome, irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ.
Ma jõmaweda irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ, irua ma ne–inaa jõmaweda ooda perã ichi pedee jaradapa.
Ma jõma mãgá ooji, ichita bamerã irua bɨdakꞌa.
Irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ ne–inaa na pꞌekꞌau eujãde nɨ̃bɨ, ne–inaa pꞌusa nãpɨade nɨ̃bɨ, nemĩsia paara.
Pa, hielo kꞌoi taukꞌa bee, nieve, jɨ̃arara mãikꞌaapa nãumia, irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ.
Irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ ee ɨtꞌɨara bee, eera jẽra bee, nejõ bɨɨrɨ cedro pakꞌuru ome,
ne–animalaarã tausaaree mãikꞌaapa taunomaa, ne–animalaarã bipa urtꞌĩu nĩuteepataarã mãikꞌaapa ipanaarã.
Irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã reyrã, awara–awaraa eujãdepemaarã jõmaweda, eperãarã poro waibɨarã,
kꞌũtrãarã, awẽraarã, chonaarã, mãikꞌaapa warrarã.

Parã jõmaweda, Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ, iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã. Iru kꞌĩra wãreera, waibɨara bɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãde nɨ̃bɨ ne–inaa jõmaweda kꞌãyaara mãikꞌaapa pajãde nɨ̃bɨ ne–inaa jõmaweda kꞌãyaara.
Irua ichi pꞌuuru pidaarã awaraa pꞌuuru pidaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara, juataura papiji.
Maperã Israeldeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã, chi irua jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã, irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ. ¡Iru ichi pꞌuuru pidaarã kꞌaitꞌa baparipɨ!
¡Aleluya! ¡Jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapataadaipia bɨ!
¡Aleluya! ¡Jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapataadaipia bɨ!
Tachi Akꞌõremaa kꞌari chiwidi kꞌarítɨ. Ijãapataarã, parã chipꞌedaidakꞌãri, irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ.
Israelitaarã, tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapatáatɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã ooda perã. Sión pꞌuurudepemaarã, tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapatáatɨ pãchi rey ome.
Iru–itꞌee tꞌãri o–ĩa pëirapatáatɨ mãikꞌaapa salmo kꞌaripatáatɨ arpa mãikꞌaapa pandero chaa pꞌanɨde.
Mãga oopatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõre o–ĩa bairã ichi pꞌuuru pidaarã ome. Irua audua–ee beerã kꞌaripapari awaraarã pꞌoyaadamerã.
Ijãapataarã, o–ĩa pꞌanapatáatɨ, irua parãmaa mãgá pꞌoyaapida perã. Parã kꞌãipatamãi ichiaba o–ĩapa irumaa kꞌarítɨ.
Parãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapataadaipia bɨ, espada kꞌĩraichaaweda pꞌewedee bɨ juade ateeruta misa.
Ma espadapa parã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã pꞌoyaadai mãikꞌaapa awaraa pꞌuuru pidaarã miapidai.
Mãɨrã reyrã, poro waibɨarã ome jita atadai mãikꞌaapa cadenapa jɨ̃ atadai.
Mãgá parãpa mãɨrã miapidakꞌãri, pꞌasaitꞌee irua mãɨrã ãpɨte pꞌãpidakꞌa. Parã, irude ijãapataarã, awaraa pꞌuuru pidaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara pꞌaneedaitꞌee.
¡Aleluya! ¡Jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapataadaipia bɨ!
¡Aleluya! ¡Jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapataadaipia bɨ!
Tachi Akꞌõre tede irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ. Iru juapa ooda pajã ewaraa kꞌobɨdepema ne–inaa jõmaapa akꞌɨpítɨ iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ.
Irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ irua ne–inaa pi–ia oopariida pari. Irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã.
Irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ trompeta, arpa mãikꞌaapa salterio chaa pꞌanɨde.
¡Iru–itꞌee pëirapatáatɨ pandero chaa pꞌanɨde! ¡Irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ pꞌipꞌana mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa cuerdapa chaa pꞌanɨde!
Irumaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ címbalo kꞌĩra omeeweda
¡Jõmaweda chokꞌai pꞌanɨɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapatáatɨ!
¡Aleluya! ¡Jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa pedee pia jarapataadaipia bɨ!
Na ũraa pꞌãdapꞌedaa Salomonpa jarada. Iru Israeldepema rey David warra paji.
Irua na ũraa jaraji eperãarãpa na pedee ũridapꞌeda, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌaneedamerã; ne–inaa pia oo kꞌawaa pꞌaneedamerã; na pedee jara kꞌinia bɨ pia kꞌawaadamerã;
kꞌawaadamerã kꞌãare ne–inaa pia bɨ, kꞌãare ne–inaa kꞌachia bɨ; kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipapataadamerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa;
kꞌũtrãarã kꞌĩsia atua beerã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌaneedamerã mãikꞌaapa awaraarãmaa kꞌũrapinaadamerã.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa na ũraa ũrikꞌãri, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaara bapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa eperã poro wẽsaa bɨpa na ũraa ũrikꞌãri, ne–inaa pia oo kꞌawaa wãitꞌee.
Ma awara ãrapa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerã pedee kꞌawaadaitꞌee kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨ, ma pedee adivinanzakꞌa bɨ mĩda.

Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa ba kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã, naapɨara Tachi Akꞌõre waaweeipia bɨ. Kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerãpa ũridaamaa pꞌanapata kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãpa jarateepata mãikꞌaapa oodaamaa pꞌanapata ãrapa ũraa pꞌanɨkꞌa.
Warra, ichita kꞌirãpáji pɨchi akꞌõrepa ũraa bɨ mãikꞌaapa pɨchi nawepa jaratee bɨkꞌa oo–eda anáaji.
Pɨ–itꞌee ãra ũraa poro jɨ̃ra pi–ia baparikꞌa baitꞌee mãikꞌaapa otaude collar nẽedee ooda pi–ia jɨ̃patakꞌa baitꞌee.
Warra, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarãpa pɨ kꞌũra kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã, ¡pɨchi kꞌũrapináaji!
Ãrapa pɨmaa nãga jaradai: “Tai ome chéji otꞌa nɨdaitꞌee perã eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–e bɨ peedaitꞌee.
Ma eperã jãɨradee pëidáma iru kꞌapꞌɨa pia, maarepida kꞌayaa wẽe bɨ mĩda.
Mãgá iru netꞌaa pia jõmaata iru pꞌanadai. ¡Tachi Akꞌõre te ipurutꞌaadai netꞌaa chɨadapꞌedaapa!
Tai ome chéji poro pia bapariimerã. Mãgá madepema netꞌaa tachi chaachaa atadaitꞌeeda” adai.
Mamĩda warra, ¡ãra ome wãnáaji! ¡Ma kꞌãyaara ãra o kꞌachiadeepa ãyaa wã́ji
mãgeerãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo kꞌinia pꞌanapata perã mãikꞌaapa waa batꞌa kꞌinia pꞌanapata perã!
Pari eperãarãpa tꞌɨrɨ taawa baijira bɨpata aɨde ipanaarã baaidamerã, ipanaarãpa ma tꞌɨrɨ unu ataruta pɨrã, aɨde baaida–e paitꞌee perã.

Mãga pɨkꞌa mãgeerãpa otꞌa nɨpata mĩda eperã ãchi juade baaimerã, maarepida baai–e paitꞌee ma eperãpa ãra unuruta pɨrã. Ma kꞌãyaara ãchi itu baaidaitꞌee ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanadapꞌedaade.
Mãga pꞌasapari netꞌaa audú ata kꞌinia pꞌanapataarã ome. Ma netꞌaa ata kꞌinia pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa, mãgá piupata.
Eperãpa calle jãde biaparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedeepa biapari. Plaza jãde golpe pedeepari.
Calle jã ikꞌaawa eperãarã chipꞌepatamãi biapari. Pꞌuuru tꞌĩupatamãi nãga jarapari:

“Kꞌũtrãarã, kꞌĩsia atua beerã, ¿parãpa ne–inaa chiwidi kꞌawadaamaa pꞌanapata–ekꞌã? Chĩara ooyaa beerã, ¿parã chĩara ooi awaa pꞌanapata–ekꞌã? Kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerã, ¿parã ne–inaa kꞌawa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanapata–ekꞌã?
Ũrítɨ mɨ, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedeepa ũraa bɨ. Mãgá mɨa parãmaa mɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaapiitꞌee.
Mɨa parãmaa ũraakꞌãri, mɨ pedee ũri kꞌiniada–e paji. Mɨa parã kꞌaripaitꞌee pakꞌãri, apidaapa mɨa jara bɨ ũridakꞌaa paji.
Mɨ ũraa ũridai kꞌãyaara, parãpa ũridaamaa pꞌanajida mãikꞌaapa mɨa jara bɨkꞌa oodaamaa pꞌanajida.
Maperã mɨ ëiitꞌee parã kꞌachiade baaidakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa parã oo iru baitꞌee pꞌera jõneedakꞌãri.
Mɨa mãga ooitꞌee parã pꞌeradaidakꞌãri nãumia kꞌaurepa pꞌerapatakꞌa mãikꞌaapa nepɨrade baaidakꞌãri, pꞌerapatakꞌa, ma awara kꞌĩsia pꞌua jõnadakꞌãri wa kꞌĩsia paraa jõnadakꞌãri, pꞌerapatakꞌa.
“Maapai parãpa mɨ tꞌɨ̃daitꞌee. Mamĩda mɨa pꞌanau–e paitꞌee. Ma ewate mɨ jɨrɨdaitꞌee. Mamĩda mɨ unuda–e paitꞌee.
Mãga pꞌasaitꞌee parã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌana kꞌiniadakꞌaa pada perã; Tachi Akꞌõre waawee kꞌiniadakꞌaa pada perã;
mɨ ũraa ũri kꞌiniadakꞌaa pada perã mãikꞌaapa mɨa parã ɨtrɨakꞌãri, ũridaamaa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.
¡Pãchia oopata kꞌaurepa chupɨria pꞌaneedaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pãchi kꞌĩsia kꞌachia kꞌaurepa sẽ pꞌaneedaitꞌee!
Warra chakꞌeerãkꞌa kꞌĩsiapataarã piupata ãchia kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedee ũridaamaa pꞌanapata perã mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerã piupata ãchi–itꞌee kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedee pꞌua–e bairã.
Mamĩda chi mɨ pedee ũri bɨ kꞌãiwee bapariitꞌee, pꞌera–ee, ne–inaa kꞌachia pꞌasaru pɨjida.
Warra, mɨ pedee kꞌawáaji mãikꞌaapa mɨa pedee jara bɨ pɨchi tꞌãride ɨa iru baparíiji.
Pia ũríji kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedeepa jara bɨ mãikꞌaapa aɨde kꞌĩsíaji kꞌawaaitꞌee kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨ.
Tꞌãripa jɨrɨ́ji poro wẽsaa bapariitꞌee. Ichiaba jɨrɨ́ji kꞌawaaitꞌee chisãgɨ́ ne–inaata pia mãikꞌaapa chisãgɨ́ ne–inaata kꞌachia bɨ.
Mãgá jɨrɨ́ji kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapariitꞌee eperãpa pꞌaratꞌa wa nẽe chokꞌo jɨrɨparikꞌa.
¡Mãga ooru pɨrã, kꞌawaaitꞌee sãgá Tachi Akꞌõre waaweeipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa wãara iru kꞌawa wãitꞌee!
Tachi Akꞌõrépata eperãmaa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaapipari. Ichia ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌawa bɨ mãikꞌaapa poro wẽsaa pedeepari.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichia oopi bɨkꞌa oopataarã kꞌaripapari mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipapataarã jɨ̃apari.
Irua pia akꞌɨpari ichia jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã mãikꞌaapa jɨ̃apari ichide ijãapataarã.
Pɨ mãga bapari pɨrã, kꞌawaitꞌee chisãgɨ́ ne–inaata pia mãikꞌaapa chisãgɨ́ ne–inaata kꞌachia bɨ iru kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa jɨrɨitꞌee ne–inaa pia aupai oopariitꞌee.
Mãpai kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beeitꞌee mãikꞌaapa mãgá ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌawaakꞌãri, tꞌãri o–ĩa beeitꞌee.
Pɨa mãgá ne–inaa pia jɨrɨ kꞌawaa bairã mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bairã, kꞌachiade baai–e paitꞌee.
Mãga bakꞌãri, ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã ode tꞌĩu–e paitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌũrayaa beerãpa oopatakꞌa oo–e paitꞌee.
Mãgeerã o piadeepa uchiapata o pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨde nipapataadaitꞌee.
Ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oodakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa awaraarã kꞌũradakꞌãri, o–ĩadaipata eperãarã fiesta oodakꞌãri o–ĩadaipatakꞌa.
Ãchi o jõree pɨkꞌa bɨde nipapata, kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipadakꞌaa perã.
Warra, pɨ mãgá kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bakꞌãri, wẽra taunemayaa bɨ ome tꞌĩu–e paitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ma wẽrapa iwarraa pedee jara bɨ ũriamaa baitꞌee.
Mãgee wẽrapa ɨmɨkꞌĩra awẽraweda atada atabëipari mãikꞌaapa ooamaa bapari ichia Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite miakꞌãikꞌãri jaradakꞌa.
Pɨa iru temaa wã bɨ o jitaru pɨrã, kꞌachiade baaiitꞌee mãgɨ́ o piudaarãmaa wãpari perã.
Iru temaa wãpataarã mãgá piudaarãmaa wãpari ode wãrutákꞌata pꞌanɨ ma o kꞌachiadeepa pꞌoyaa uchiadakꞌaa perã waya o piade tꞌĩudaitꞌee. Iru tede tꞌĩudapꞌedaarã mamãikꞌaapa pꞌoyaa uchiadakꞌaa.
Maperã warra, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã ome nipaparíiji.
Mãgee Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã ichita na eujãde pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oodaamaa pꞌanɨɨrã na eujãde pꞌanada–e paitꞌee, na eujãdeepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra jërekꞌooitꞌee perã.
Warra, mɨa pɨmaa ũraa bɨ kꞌĩra atuanáaji. Mɨ ũraa pɨchi tꞌãride ɨa iru baparíiji.
Mãga ooru pɨrã, na pꞌekꞌau eujãde ewari teesoo bapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pia bapariitꞌee.

Kꞌĩra atuanáaji awaraarã kꞌinia iru bapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa wãara pedee jarapariitꞌee. Ara eperãpa collar ichi wãrumaa jɨ̃ nipaparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa ma ũraa pɨchi wãrumaa kꞌirãpaparíiji eperãarãpa pedee pꞌãpatakꞌa kꞌirãpadaitꞌee.
Mãga ooru pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ pia akꞌɨpariitꞌee; eperãarãpa pida pɨ tꞌo pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Tꞌãripa ichita Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãaparíiji pɨchi kꞌĩsiade ijãai kꞌãyaara.
Ne–inaa jõmaweda oorude, Tachi Akꞌõrede kꞌĩsíaji. Mãgá irua pɨ o piadee ateeitꞌee.
Kꞌĩsianáaji pɨ audú kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapari. Ma kꞌãyaara Tachi Akꞌõre waaweeparíiji mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo amáaji.
Mãgá pɨ kꞌapꞌɨa pia bapariitꞌee, eperãpa neera pia tokꞌãri, kꞌapꞌɨa pia beeparikꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõremaa téeji pɨa netꞌaa iru bɨdepema mãikꞌaapa pꞌaratꞌa iru bɨdepema; ma awara ne–uuda naapɨara ewadadepema.
Mãgá trigo tau ɨapatamãi trigo waibɨa paraaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa vino ewaa ooda chi ɨapatamãi ipuru jẽra baitꞌee.
Warra, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ ɨtrɨakꞌãri, iru ome tꞌãri ãrii wa kꞌĩrau banáaji.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ɨtrɨapari ichia kꞌinia iru bɨɨrã, eperãpa ichi warra kꞌinia iru bɨ ɨtrɨaparikꞌa.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beekꞌãri mãikꞌaapa poro wẽsaa beekꞌãri, tꞌãri o–ĩa bapari.
Piara bɨ mãga bapariitꞌee pꞌaratꞌa iru bai kꞌãyaara mãikꞌaapa nẽe iru bai kꞌãyaara.
¡Piara bɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapariitꞌee mãu pi–ia perla iru bai kꞌãyaara mãikꞌaapa netꞌaa audú kꞌinia iru bai kꞌãyaara!

Eperãpa tachimaa netꞌaa pia teeparikꞌa ichi juarapa wa ichi juabipa, mãga pɨkꞌa pɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bakꞌãri, nãgɨ́ ne–inaa pia iru bapariitꞌee: ewari teesoo bapariitꞌee; netꞌaa pia iru bapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa eperãarãpa pɨ tꞌo pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Mãgá kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa o piade nipakꞌãri, tꞌãri o–ĩa, kꞌãiwee bapari.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bakꞌãri, iru pakꞌuru tachi chokꞌaipiparíkꞌapɨ bɨ. ¡Mapa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerã tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapata!
Kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bairã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujã ooji mãikꞌaapa poro wẽsaa bairã pajã ooji.
Irua ne–inaa jõma kꞌawa bairã, pꞌusamaa jaraji tꞌoodaimerã mãikꞌaapa jɨ̃araradeepa sereno baaimerã.
Warra, ichita jɨrɨparíiji kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa baitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌawaitꞌee kꞌãata ooipia bɨ.
Mãga ooru pɨrã, pɨ ewari teesoo bapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pɨ–itꞌee kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedee collar pi–ia eperãpa jɨ̃parikꞌa baitꞌee.
Kꞌãiwee nipapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa kꞌachiade baai–e paitꞌee.
Pɨ jẽra beekꞌãri, waawee–ee baitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌãikꞌãri, kꞌãiwee kꞌãipariitꞌee.
Waawee nɨ̃ba–e paitꞌee atu bɨde pꞌerai jĩakꞌaapa maa–e pɨrã kꞌachiade baai jĩakꞌaapa ijãadakꞌaa beerãkꞌa.
Pɨ mãga ba–e paitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ kꞌaripapariitꞌee perã mãikꞌaapa pɨ jɨ̃apariitꞌee perã kꞌachiade baainaamerã.
Apidaapa pɨmaa kꞌaripa iidikꞌãri, kꞌaripa–eda anáaji. Ma kꞌãyaara iru kꞌaripáji pꞌoyaa kꞌaripaita bɨ pɨrã.
Pɨa idiweda ne–inaa iru bɨ pɨrã kꞌaripaitꞌee, kꞌaripáji. Nupema–itꞌee atabɨnáaji.
Kꞌĩsianáaji ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee pɨ ikꞌaawa baparimaa, irua pɨde ijãapari perã.
Chĩara ome aupedeenáaji, pɨmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–e bɨ pɨrã.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru banáaji ãchia ne–inaa iru pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa. Ma awara mãgeerãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopatakꞌa oonáaji.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgee eperãarã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bapari. Mamĩda irua jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã pia akꞌɨpari. Ichi kꞌõpꞌãyoorãkꞌa unupari.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌachia oopari ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã ãchideerã ome. Mamĩda bendiciapari irua jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã ãchideerã ome.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa chĩara ooyaa beerã aukꞌa oo iru bapari. Mamĩda audua–ee beerã kꞌaripapari.
Eperãarãpa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerã tꞌo pꞌanapata. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerã kꞌĩra nejasiapipata.
Warrarã, ũripatáatɨ akꞌõrepa ũraa bɨ. Pia ũripatáatɨ kꞌawaadamerã mɨ pedee kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨ
mɨa ũraa bɨ pia bairã. Maperã ma ũraa kꞌĩra atuanáatɨ.
Mɨ aukꞌa mɨ akꞌõre warra paji. Mɨ nawepa mɨ kꞌinia iru bapachi mãikꞌaapa pia akꞌɨpachi warra apai bɨ akꞌɨpatakꞌa.
Mɨ akꞌõrepa mɨmaa nãga ũraapachi: “Mɨa pɨmaa jarapari pɨchi tꞌãride ɨa iru baparíiji mãikꞌaapa mɨa jara bɨkꞌa ooparíiji, mãgá ewari teesoo bapariimerã.
Jɨrɨ́ji kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa poro wẽsaa bapariitꞌee. Mɨa ũraa bɨ kꞌĩra atuanáaji.
Kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãpa pedee jarapata ũriamaa banáaji. Ma pedee kꞌinia iru báji, ma pedeepa pɨ jɨ̃a pɨkꞌaitꞌee perã kꞌachiade baainaamerã.
Awaraa ne–inaa jɨrɨi kꞌãyaara, naapɨara jɨrɨ́ji kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa poro wẽsaa bapariitꞌee.
Jɨrɨparíiji kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapariitꞌee. Mãga beeru pɨrã, pɨ eperã waibɨa paitꞌee mãikꞌaapa awaraarãpa pɨ tꞌo pꞌanadaitꞌee.
Ara reymaa poro jɨ̃ra teepatakꞌa jɨ̃pariimerã eperãarã taide, mãga pɨkꞌa pɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bakꞌãri, poro jɨ̃ra kꞌĩra wãree jɨ̃ pɨkꞌa baitꞌeeda” aji.
Warra, mɨ pedee ũríji mãikꞌaapa óoji mɨa jara bɨkꞌa. Mãgá ewari teesoo bapariitꞌee.
Mɨa pɨmaa ũraa bɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bamerã mãikꞌaapa mãgá o piade nipapariimerã.
Mãgɨ́ ode nipakꞌãri, eperã o trokꞌoo bɨde nipaparikꞌa baitꞌee maa–e pɨrã eperã pꞌirakꞌãri maarepida bɨɨrɨ tꞌĩutɨ–e bɨkꞌa baitꞌee, pɨa ne–inaa oo bɨ pia uchiaitꞌee perã.
Mɨa ũraa bɨ kꞌĩra atuanáaji mãikꞌaapa na ũraade jara bɨkꞌa ichita ooparíiji na ũraa kꞌaurepa pɨ pia bapariitꞌee perã.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã wãpata ode wãnáaji mãikꞌaapa ãchia oopatakꞌa oonáaji.
Ãchi wãpata o kꞌaitꞌa wãnáaji. ¡Ãchi ikꞌaawaapa ãyaa béeji mãikꞌaapa pɨchi o piade jĩpꞌa wã́ji!
Mãgeerã kꞌãidakꞌaa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda–emaa. Pꞌoyaa kꞌãidakꞌaa chĩara ne–inaa kꞌachiade baaipida–emaa.
¡Mãgeerã–itꞌee ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee chikꞌo kꞌorutákꞌata bɨ mãikꞌaapa chĩara peedaitꞌee vino torutákꞌata bɨ!
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã wãpata o ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨ, ãsá pawãkꞌãri, akꞌõrejĩru ɨ̃daapɨara wãparikꞌa.
Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã wãpata o audú pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bairã, kꞌawadakꞌaa kꞌãare kꞌaurépata ãchi kꞌachiade baaipata.
Warra, mɨ ũraa pia ũriparíiji.
Kꞌĩra atuanáaji. Ichita pɨchi tꞌãride ɨa iru baparíiji mãikꞌaapa aɨde kꞌĩsiaparíiji.
Na ũraa kꞌaurepa pɨ kꞌapꞌɨa pia mãikꞌaapa ewari teesoo bapariitꞌee.
Awaraa ne–inaa kꞌãyaara pɨchi tꞌãri jɨ̃aparíiji, madeepa kꞌĩsia uchia bɨ kꞌaurepa pɨ pia bapariitꞌee perã wa kꞌachiade baaiitꞌee perã.
Kꞌĩra kꞌaupai pedee kꞌachia jarai. Seewa jaraitꞌee kꞌĩsianáaji.
Ichita kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedeede kꞌĩsiaparíiji, eperã ode wãkꞌãri ichi nokꞌoore unuitꞌee kꞌĩsia wãparikꞌa.
Pia akꞌɨparíiji sãmata pɨ bɨɨrɨ bɨitꞌee. Mãga ooru pɨrã, pɨ wãrumaa pia nipapariitꞌee.
Pɨ o pia nipaparideepa ãyaa wãnáaji. Ma kꞌãyaara ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã ikꞌaawaapa ãyaa wã́ji.
Warra, ũríji mɨa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedee jara bɨ. Pia ũríji mɨa poro wẽsaa pedee jara bɨ.
Pɨa mãga ooru pɨrã, jɨrɨ kꞌawaaitꞌee ne–inaa pia, ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌãyaara mãikꞌaapa awaraarãmaa poro wẽsaa pedee jara kꞌawaa baitꞌee.
Wẽra taunemayaa bɨpa iwarraa pedeepari mãikꞌaapa ichi pedee kꞌũ–ũa pɨkꞌa bapari mielekꞌa. Aceite pirukꞌua baparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa ma wẽra iwarraa pedee pirukꞌua pɨkꞌa bapari.
Mamĩda tꞌẽepai ma pedee ne–inaa asia kꞌãyaara asiara pɨkꞌa beepari mãikꞌaapa pꞌewedeera pɨkꞌa beepari espada kꞌĩraichaaweda erapꞌeda, pꞌewedee beeparikꞌa.
Pɨ iru ome wãru pɨrã, irua pɨ peede ateerúkꞌapɨ bɨ, iru wãpari o jĩpꞌa piudaarãmaa wãpari perã.
Iru o piade nipa kꞌiniakꞌaa. Ma kꞌãyaara o jõree bɨde nipapari, kꞌĩsia–ee ma o sãmaata wã. Kꞌawakꞌaa o kꞌachiade ni.
Maperã warra, mɨ ũraa pia ũríji mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra atuanáaji.
Mãgee wẽra taunemayaa bɨ ikꞌaawaapa ãyaa béeji. Ichi te puerta tꞌai kꞌaitꞌa pida wãnáaji.
Mɨa mãga jara bɨ ma wẽra kꞌaurepa eperãarãpa pɨ eperã kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa–e bɨkꞌa ununaadamerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra tewaraa tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa beerã kꞌaurepa pɨ año chokꞌara atuanaamerã.
¿Kꞌãare–itꞌee kꞌĩra tewaraarãmaa ichiakꞌau kꞌũrapidaima pɨchi juadoopa netꞌaa atada jãri atadamerã?
Mãgeerã ome tꞌĩuru pɨrã, kꞌĩsia paraa nɨ̃baitꞌee pɨchi kꞌapꞌɨadeepa ewari chaa juatau jõ wãkꞌãri.
Mãpai jaraitꞌee: “¿Sãapꞌeda mɨ ɨtrɨadapꞌedaa ũriamaa bajima? ¿Sãapꞌeda mɨa oo–e pajima mɨ ũraadapꞌedaakꞌa?
¡Mɨmaa jarateepatapꞌedaarãpa jaradapꞌedaa ũriamaa baji! ¡Ãrapa ũraadapꞌedaakꞌa oo kꞌinia–e baji!
¡Ɨ̃rá ne–inaa kꞌachiade baaiitꞌee nɨ̃bɨ mɨchi pꞌuuru pidaarã kꞌĩrapite!”
Opisiadaikꞌãri, pɨchi pozodepema maa–e pɨrã pɨchi pania poátrɨ uchia bɨmãidepema toparíiji.
Ma pania poátrɨ uchia bɨmãiipa pania weepináaji calle jãde wa plaza jãde pariatua atuanaamerã.
¡Ma pania përé aupai! ¡Mapa kꞌĩra tewaraarãmaa teenáaji!
¡Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨchi pania poátrɨ uchia bɨ bendiciamerã! ¡O–ĩa baparíiji pɨchi kꞌũtrãaweda wẽra atada omepai!
Ma wẽra bigi wẽra pi–ia baparíkꞌapɨ bɨ.
Mãga bɨta warra, ¿kꞌãare–itꞌee chĩara wẽra jɨrɨima? ¿Kꞌãare–itꞌee wẽra taunemayaa bɨ o jõi ataima mãikꞌaapa aɨ ome kꞌãima?
Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarãpa oopata ichita akꞌɨpari. Tachia ne–inaa oopata jõmaweda kꞌawa bɨ irua ne–inaa jõmaweda akꞌɨpari perã.
Eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌachiade baaipari ichia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopariida kꞌaurepa. Ichia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopariida kꞌaurepa ichi ma kꞌachiade baaipari lazopa ne–animal jita ataparikꞌa.
Ichi mãgá pariatua nipapari perã, piuitꞌee. Ichia kꞌiniata oopari kꞌaurepa o pia atuaitꞌee.
Warra, pɨa pedeeteeji pɨrã pɨchi kꞌõpꞌãyo pari maa–e pɨrã kꞌĩra tewaraa pari tewe pꞌaaitꞌee,
mãikꞌaapa pɨa ma pedee jarada kꞌaurepa kꞌachiade baairu pɨrã,
nãga ooipia bɨ. Pɨ kꞌõpꞌãyomaa wã́ji mãikꞌaapa iru kꞌĩrapite bedabai nɨ̃beepꞌeda, jaráji pɨa iru pari ma tewe pꞌaa–e paitꞌee.
Mãga ooi naaweda kꞌãináaji mãikꞌaapa ɨ̃ináaji.
Isapai uchíaji ma nepɨradeepa bigi nejɨrɨpari naa isapai pꞌiradaiparikꞌa maa–e pɨrã ipana tꞌɨrɨdeepa uchiadaiparikꞌa.
Eperã kꞌoo–idaa bɨ, wã́ji tꞌãa akꞌɨde. Pi–ia akꞌɨ́ji ãchia oo pꞌanɨ ãrakꞌa mimia kꞌawaa bamerã. Mãgá pɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapariitꞌee.
Ãra poro waibɨarã wẽe pꞌanɨ, mãɨrãpa ãra akꞌɨdamerã maa–e pɨrã jaradamerã kꞌãata oodaipia bɨ.
Mãga bɨ mĩda, ãchia chikꞌo pꞌepata pꞌoojara pakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa chikꞌo waibɨa paraakꞌãri.
¡Kꞌoo–idaa bɨ, waa kꞌãináaji! ¡Waa pꞌarude jẽra banáaji!
Pɨ kꞌãimokꞌaraa bɨ misa, arakꞌatɨa kꞌãi bɨ misa, arakꞌatɨa ɨ̃i bɨ misa mãikꞌaapa jua bɨra akꞌɨ bɨ misa,
pɨ chupɨria ne–inaa wẽe baibeeitꞌee chupɨria bakꞌajikꞌa nechɨ–idaa bɨ arma anipaparipa pɨchi netꞌaa jãri ata cheda paara.
Eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi awaa bairã, ichita seewa jara nipapari.
Mãga oo bɨ misa, ichi tau pꞌinapari mãikꞌaapa juapa maa–e pɨrã bɨɨrɨpa ne–inaa jarapari.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨpa ichita kꞌĩsiapari ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee mãikꞌaapa awaraarã ome nepɨra jɨrɨitꞌee.
Mãga bapari perã, taarã–eweda kꞌachiade baaiitꞌee. Taarã–e nɨde jõmaweda jõdariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa irua maarepida oo–e paitꞌee mãgá jõnaamerã.
Ne–inaa seis paraa Tachi Akꞌõrepa unuamaa iru bapari. Ma ne–inaa seis apꞌeda, irua awaraa ne–inaa aba audú unuamaa iru bapari. Nãga pꞌanɨ:
taupa chĩaramaa kꞌachia akꞌɨpari kꞌĩsia bairã ichi waibɨara bɨ apema kꞌãyaara; kꞌĩramepa seewa jarapari; juapa eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–e bɨ waa batꞌapipari;
tꞌãride ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee kꞌĩsiapari; bɨɨrɨpa isapai pꞌira wãpari ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee;
charra kꞌĩrapite seewa jarapari awaraa eperã nepɨrade baaipiitꞌee; mãikꞌaapa ichi kꞌinia ɨ̃pemaarã aupedeepipari.
Warra, ichita kꞌirãpáji pɨchi akꞌõrepa ũraa bɨ mãikꞌaapa oo–eda anáaji pɨchi nawepa jaratee bɨkꞌa.
Na ũraa pɨchi tꞌãride ɨa pɨkꞌa iru baparíiji mãikꞌaapa pɨchi otaude jɨ̃ pɨkꞌa iru baparíiji.
Mãgá pɨ awara ãyaa wãkꞌãri, na ũraa kꞌaurepa o piade nipapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌãi bakꞌãri, na ũraapa pɨ jɨ̃a pɨkꞌaitꞌee; ma awara ɨ̃rɨmakꞌãri, na ũraapa pɨmaa jara pɨkꞌaitꞌee kꞌãata ooipia bɨ.
Pɨmaa jaradapꞌedaa lamparakꞌa bɨ mãikꞌaapa ãrapa ũraadapꞌedaa ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨ. Pɨ ɨtrɨadakꞌãri, akꞌɨpipata sãgata bapariipia bɨ.
Ma ũraa kꞌirãpakꞌãri, wẽra kꞌachia bɨ juade baai–e paitꞌee. Wẽra taunemayaa bɨpa iwarraa pedee jarakꞌãri, ũri–e paitꞌee.
Iru kꞌĩra wãree bairã, irumaa kꞌũrapináaji. ¡Iru taupa pɨmaa pi–ia akꞌɨ bairã, iru kꞌinianáaji!
Prostituta ɨmɨkꞌĩra ome kꞌãikꞌãri, chikꞌo kꞌoitꞌee iru bapari. Mamĩda wẽra taunemayaa bɨ chi kꞌima–ee bɨ ome kꞌãikꞌãri, ma eperã kꞌo pɨkꞌaitꞌee, ma kꞌaurepa iru piudarii perã.
Eperãpa ichi bolsillode tꞌɨpɨtau ateeikꞌã ¿ichi pꞌaru paa–ee?
Maa–e pɨrã, ¿eperã tꞌɨpɨtau ɨ̃rɨ tꞌɨaikꞌã, ichi bɨɨrɨ paa–ee?
Mãga pɨkꞌa eperã chĩara wẽra ome araa paru pɨrã, ichi kꞌaurepa miaitꞌee.
Eperãpa nechɨaru pɨrã jarrapa bada perã, ma kꞌaurepa apidaapa iru kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanada–e paitꞌee.

Mamĩda mãgɨ́ nechɨamaa unu ataruta pɨrã, irua netꞌaa chɨada pari aba teepidapꞌeda, awaraa seis teepidaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre ley pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Mãga oopidaipia bɨ ma kꞌaurepa ma chupɨria chɨ netꞌaa wẽe beeru pɨjida.
¡Eperã chĩara wẽra ome kꞌãiru pɨrã, ma eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ! ¡Chi mãga oo bɨ ichi itu piudariitꞌee!
Mãga ooda kꞌaurepa ma eperã pꞌua oodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa iru ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jaradaitꞌee. Ma awara iru kꞌĩra nejasia bapariitꞌee.
Ɨmɨkꞌĩra miajiwaa–idaa bɨ tꞌɨpɨtau urua nɨ̃bɨkꞌa bapari. Kꞌĩra jõ–ee beepari mãikꞌaapa ma eperã chi wẽra ome kꞌãi bada chupɨria kꞌawaakꞌaa.
Iru kꞌĩrau wẽpa–e paitꞌee chi kꞌachia oodapa ma kꞌachia ooda pari netꞌaa pia cho–kꞌara irumaa teeru pɨjida.
Warra, mɨa jara bɨkꞌa ooparíiji. Ma awara mɨa ũraa bɨ pɨchi tꞌãride ɨa iru baparíiji.
Mɨa ũraa bɨkꞌa ooparíiji. Mãgá ewari teesoo bapariitꞌee. Na ũraa pia jɨ̃́aji pɨchi tau pia jɨ̃aparikꞌa.
Na ũraa pɨchi juade jɨ̃ pɨkꞌa bɨ́ji sortija jɨ̃parikꞌa mãikꞌaapa pɨchi wãrumaa kꞌirãpaparíiji eperãarãpa pedee pꞌãpatakꞌa kꞌirãpadaitꞌee.
Kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedee kꞌinia iru baparíiji pɨchi ɨ̃pewẽra kꞌinia iru baparikꞌa mãikꞌaapa poro wẽsaa pedee kꞌinia iru baparíiji pɨchi ëreerã kꞌinia iru baparikꞌa.
Na pedeede jara bɨkꞌa ooru pɨrã, wẽra taunemayaa bɨ juade baai–e paitꞌee, ma kꞌĩra tewaraa bɨpa pɨmaa iwarraa pedee jararu pɨjida.
Ewari aba mɨchi tedepema ventanadeepa akꞌɨmaa baji.
Unuji kꞌũtrãarã makꞌɨara kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerã. Mamĩda ãradepema aba apemaarã kꞌãyaara kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–eera baji.
Ma kꞌũtrãa calle jã sĩaji mãikꞌaapa ma calle esquinade panakꞌãri, wãji wẽra taunemayaa bɨ temaa.
Mãga nɨde akꞌõrejĩru baai wã nipaji mãikꞌaapa kꞌeu wã nipaji.
Mãga nɨde ma wẽra iru kꞌĩrapite uchiaji. Ma wẽra prostitutaarã pꞌaru jɨ̃patakꞌa jɨ̃ baji mãikꞌaapa ichi tꞌãride kꞌĩsia chewãji ma kꞌũtrãa kꞌũraitꞌee.
Mãgee wẽra aupedeei awaa bapari mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe pedeepari. Ichi tede pꞌoyaa ipꞌii bakꞌaa.
Ma kꞌãyaara pꞌuuru jãde mãikꞌaapa plaza jãde nipai awaa bapari. Calle esquina chaa nɨpari eperã naapɨara wãyaaru kꞌũra ataitꞌee.
Mãgá mɨa ma kꞌũtrãa akꞌɨmaa bɨde ma wẽrapa iru o jõi atapꞌeda, kꞌĩra ɨ̃tꞌaaji mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe mãgaji:
“Teeda mɨa nechiara iru bɨda aji, idi Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee mɨa ne–animal paapida perã mɨa irumaa jaradakꞌa.
Maperã mɨ pɨ kꞌĩrapite uchiaji. ¡Mɨa pɨ audú unu kꞌinia baji mãikꞌaapa nama pɨ unu ataji!
Mɨ pꞌaru kꞌãipari tꞌõji Egiptodepema pꞌaru pi–ia lino nãusaadee kꞌadapa.
Ma pꞌaru ɨ̃rɨ weeji kꞌera tꞌũa ooda mirradee, aloedee, mãikꞌaapa caneladee.
Mɨ ome chéji. Kꞌãinadáma mãikꞌaapa tachi tꞌãride kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanɨkꞌa oodáma ewarirumaa.
Mɨ ɨmɨkꞌĩra teeda wẽ–e. Taarãitꞌee tꞌɨmɨ́ wãda perã.
Irua pꞌaratꞌa chuspa aba ateeji. Mapa ai ewarirumaata iru cheitꞌeeda” aji.
Ma wẽrapa iwarraa pedee jara nɨ̃bɨpa ma kꞌũtrãa kꞌũra ataji.
Aramata iru ma wẽra tꞌẽe wãji. Ara pꞌakꞌa atee wãpatakꞌa chi peepatamaa, mãga pɨkꞌa ma kꞌũtrãa ateeji. Maa–e pɨrã bigi lazode baaiparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa iru ma wẽra juade baaiji.
Ara ipana tꞌɨrɨde tꞌĩudaiparikꞌa, kꞌawa–ee ichi mama piuitꞌee sia trɨdapa, mãga pɨkꞌa ma kꞌũtrãa ma kꞌachiade baaiji, kꞌawa–ee ichi mama piudariitꞌee.
Maperã warrarã, mɨa jara bɨ ũripatáatɨ.
Mãgee wẽrade kꞌĩsianáatɨ. Mãgeerã ome tꞌĩunáatɨ. Maa–e pɨrã, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerã o piadeepa uchiadaitꞌee.
¡Mãgee wẽrapa eperãarã chokꞌara kꞌachiade baaipipari mãikꞌaapa iru kꞌaurepa chokꞌara piupata!
Pɨ mãgee wẽra ome wãru pɨrã, irua pɨ peede ateerúkꞌapɨ bɨ, iru wãpari o jĩpꞌa piudaarãmaa wãpari perã.
Eperãpa awaraa eperãarã tꞌɨ̃parikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedeepa eperãarã tꞌɨ̃maa bɨ. Ma poro wẽsaa pedeepa golpe jara bɨ.
Ma pedee pꞌuuru jãdepema ɨtꞌɨa beemãi mãikꞌaapa o bi ikꞌaawa, esquinade paara akꞌɨnɨ̃ beepari.
Pꞌuurudepema puerta chaa nãga jarapari:
“Mɨa eperãarã jõmaarãmaa na pedee jararu:
Parã warra chakꞌeerãkꞌa kꞌĩsia pꞌanapataarã, kꞌawáatɨ kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipapataadamerã mãikꞌaapa parã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerã, jɨrɨ́tɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌaneedamerã.
Pia ũrítɨ, mɨa pedee pi–ia jaraitꞌee perã. Mɨa ichita pedee pia jarapari.
Mɨa ichita wãara pedee jarapariitꞌee, seewa jarakꞌaa perã.
Na pedee jõmaweda pia bɨ; maarepida seewa wẽe.
Kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerã–itꞌee mãikꞌaapa poro wẽsaa beerã–itꞌee mɨ pedee bëi–sãa bɨ.
Pꞌaratꞌa maa–e pɨrã nẽe jɨrɨdai kꞌãyaara jɨrɨpatáatɨ mɨ, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedeepa jaratee bɨ ũridamerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌawaadamerã.
Piara bɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa baitꞌee mãu pi–ia bɨ iru bai kꞌãyaara. ¡Ma kꞌãyaara awaraa ne–inaa parãpa kꞌinia pꞌanapata pipɨara wẽ–e!
“Mɨ, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedee aukꞌa bapari poro wẽsaa pedee ome. Chi mɨ jɨrɨ bɨmaa mɨa ũraa pia teepari.
Tachi Akꞌõre waaweeparipa ne–inaa kꞌachia unuamaa iru bapari. Mɨ, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedeepa unuamaa iru bapari audua pedee, seewa pedee mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa oopata.
Eperãpa mɨa ũraa bɨkꞌa ookꞌãri, ichia pia kꞌĩsiaitꞌee ne–inaa ooi naaweda mãikꞌaapa kꞌawaitꞌee kꞌãata ooipia bɨ. Ne–inaa pia oo kꞌawaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa juataura bapariitꞌee.
Mɨ kꞌaurepa reyrãpa ãchi jua ekꞌari beerã pia akꞌɨpata mãikꞌaapa eperãarã poro waibɨarãpa ãchi jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrãmaa ley pia jarateepata.
Mɨ kꞌaurepa reyrãpa mãikꞌaapa awaraa poro waibɨarãpa eperãarã pia akꞌɨpata mãikꞌaapa charraarãpa kꞌawapata eperãarã nepɨra akꞌɨdaitꞌee.
Mɨa kꞌinia iru bapari chi mɨ kꞌinia iru pꞌanapataarã. Chi mɨ jɨrɨrutaarãpa mɨ unudaitꞌee.
Mɨ kꞌaurepa eperãarãpa ne–inaa pia iru pꞌaneepata mãikꞌaapa awaraarã kꞌĩrapite waibɨara pꞌaneepata. Ma awara ne–inaa taarã choopari iru pꞌaneepata mãikꞌaapa pia pꞌanapata.
Mɨa eperãarãmaa ne–inaa teepari piara bɨ nẽe pi–iara bɨ kꞌãyaara maa–e pɨrã pꞌaratꞌa pi–iara bɨ kꞌãyaara.
Mɨ o jĩpꞌaa bɨde wãpari; Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã ode.
Mɨ kꞌinia iru pꞌanapataarãmaa mɨa ne–inaa pia teepari. Ma ne–inaa piapa mɨa ãra te ipurupipari.
“Tachi Akꞌõrepa awaraa ne–inaa jõmaweda ooi naaweda, mɨ ooji.
Na pꞌekꞌau eujã aɨde nɨ̃bɨ ome ooi naaweda, irua mɨ ooji.
Pꞌusa waibɨa bee mãikꞌaapa pania poátrɨ uchia bee paraai naaweda, irua mɨ ooji.
Ee kꞌaipee jẽra bee mãikꞌaapa ee ɨtꞌɨa jẽra bee ooi naaweda, irua mɨ ooji.
Mɨ ookꞌãri, irua atꞌãri oo–e baji na pꞌekꞌau eujã, mẽe, yooro pꞌora paara.
Irua pajã pꞌusa ɨ̃rɨ ookꞌãri, mɨ jãma baji.
Mɨ baji irua jɨ̃arara pajãde bɨkꞌãri mãikꞌaapa pꞌusa jãde pania poátrɨ uchiapikꞌãri, pꞌusa nãpɨa beemerã.
Mɨ baji irua jarakꞌãri na pꞌekꞌau eujã irua bɨdamãiipa ãyaa wãnaamerã mãikꞌaapa pꞌusadepema pania irua pꞌusa i bɨdamãiipa ãyaa weenaamerã.
Irua ma jõma ookꞌãri, mɨ iru ikꞌaawa baji te ooparipa akꞌɨparikꞌa mãikꞌaapa mɨa iru tꞌãri o–ĩapiji. Ewari chaa irua ne–inaa oo bɨ unukꞌãri, iru kꞌĩrapite mɨ o–ĩapa pairapachi.
¡Mɨ o–ĩa bapachi na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ne–inaa jõma ooda ome mãikꞌaapa eperãarã irua ooda ome!
“Ɨ̃rá warrarã, mɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedee ũrítɨ mãikꞌaapa mɨa jara bɨkꞌa óotɨ. Mãgá tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Mɨa jaratee bɨ pia ũrítɨ. Mãgá parã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanapataadaitꞌee. Ma awara mɨ pedee yiaraa iru pꞌananáatɨ.
Chi mɨ pedee ũrirutaarã o–ĩa pꞌanapataadaitꞌee ewari chaa mɨ te tꞌĩupatade nɨdakꞌãri mɨ pedee ũridaitꞌee
eperãpa mɨ unukꞌãri, ewari teesoo bapariitꞌee perã mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pia akꞌɨpariitꞌee perã.
¡Mamĩda eperãpa mɨ pedee ũriamaa bɨ pɨrã, ichi kꞌaurepa piudaarãmaa wãpari ode wãitꞌee, mɨ unuamaa iru bapari perã!
Eperãpa ichi te ooparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedeepa ichi te ooji. Ma tede columna siete oo bɨji.
Fiesta ookꞌãri, ne–animalaarã peeji mãikꞌaapa vino pi–ia ooji. Maapꞌeda mesade bɨji.
Mãpai ichi mimiapataarã pëiji pꞌuuru jãde ɨtꞌɨara beemãiipa nãga biadamerã:
“¡Warra chakꞌeerãkꞌa kꞌĩsia pꞌanapataarã, namaa chétɨ!” Ichiaba kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerãmaa irua nãga jara pëiji:
“Mɨ pan kꞌo chétɨ mãikꞌaapa mɨa vino awaraa ne–inaa ome pꞌoirada to chétɨ.
Chokꞌai pꞌanee kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã, waa kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee pꞌananáatɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌawáatɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanadamerã.”
Chĩara ooyaa bɨ ɨtrɨakꞌãri, irua pɨmaa pedee kꞌachia jarakꞌooitꞌee. Ma awara ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ ɨtrɨakꞌãri, ũriamaa bɨ pɨrã, iru pɨ ome kꞌĩra ëree beeitꞌee.
Mapa chĩara ooyaa bɨ ɨtrɨanáaji, maa–e pɨrã irua pɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bapariitꞌee. Jõdee kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ ɨtrɨaru pɨrã, irua pɨ kꞌinia iru bapariitꞌee.
Kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨmaa jarateeru pɨrã, iru kꞌĩsia kꞌawaara beeitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ooparimaa jarateeru pɨrã, irua ne–inaa audupɨara kꞌawaaitꞌee.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa ba kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõre waawee baparíiji. Iru, chi kꞌachia wẽe bapari kꞌawa beerã, poro wẽsaadaipata.
Pɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ kꞌaurepa ewari teesoo bapariitꞌee.
Pɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapari pɨrã, piara bapariitꞌee. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bapari pɨrã, ma kꞌaurepa pia–ee bapariitꞌee.
Wẽra kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ nãga bapari: pedee–idaa; ne–inaa kꞌawa–ee mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe.
Mãgee wẽra ichi te puerta tꞌaide su–akꞌɨ beepari maa–e pɨrã ichi sillade su–akꞌɨ beepꞌeda, pꞌuuru jãde ɨtꞌɨara beemãiipa
nãga jarapari eperãarã ãchi ode kꞌãiwee wãrutaarãmaa:
“¡Chétɨ warra chakꞌeerãkꞌa kꞌĩsiapataarã!” Ichiaba kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerãmaa nãga jarapari:
“Pania chɨada warraara bɨ mãikꞌaapa pan merã kꞌoru warraara bɨda” apari.
Mamĩda ãchia kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ mamaa wãruta pɨrã, piudaitꞌee iru ome tꞌĩurutaarã piudaarãmãi wãpata perã.
Salomonpa na ũraa jaraji.
“Warra kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa chi akꞌõre tꞌãri o–ĩapipari. Jõdee warra kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa chi nawe tꞌãri pꞌuapipari.
Pꞌaratꞌa wa netꞌaa pia atada ne–inaa kꞌachia oo bɨpa, chi mãga iru bɨ–itꞌee mãgee netꞌaa vale–e baibɨ. Mamĩda eperãpa jɨrɨkꞌãri ichita ne–inaa pia oopariitꞌee, iru ewari teesoo bapariitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichia jara bɨkꞌa ooparimaa jarra oopikꞌaa. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨmaa isapai chikꞌo unupikꞌaa.
Eperã kꞌoo–idaa bɨ chupɨriadaipari. Jõdee eperã mimiayaa bɨ pꞌaratꞌaradaipari.
Warra kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa ichia ne–uuda ewapari pꞌoojarade. Mamĩda warra kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe bɨ kꞌãipari awaraarãpa ãchia ne–uudapꞌedaadepema ewa pꞌanɨ misa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperã bendiciapari ichia jara bɨkꞌa ookꞌãri. Mamĩda eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ pedeekꞌãri, kꞌĩsia kꞌachia ichi tꞌãride iru bɨ merã pɨkꞌapari.
Eperãarãpa kꞌirãpadakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari bapariida, ne–inaa pia Tachi Akꞌõrepa teedákꞌapɨ bɨ. Mamĩda kꞌĩra atuadaipata eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ bapariida.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa ũraa pia ũripari mãikꞌaapa aɨde jara bɨkꞌa oopari. Mamĩda eperã pariatua kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee pedeepari kꞌachiade baaiitꞌee.
Eperã tꞌãri jĩpꞌa nipaparipa ne–inaa apida waaweekꞌaa. Mamĩda eperãarãpa kꞌawapata chi o kꞌachiade ni ichia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopari kꞌaurepa.
Eperã tau pꞌina bɨde seewa jarakꞌãri, awaraarã tꞌãri pꞌuapipari. Mamĩda wãara pedee jarakꞌãri, awaraarã tꞌãri o–ĩ–ĩapipari, ma pedee ɨtrɨa pɨkꞌa bɨ mĩda.

Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari pedee pania poátrɨ uchia bɨ́kꞌapɨ bɨ, ma pedee ũridakꞌãri, eperãarã pipɨara pꞌanapata perã. Mamĩda eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ pedeekꞌãri, kꞌĩsia kꞌachia ichi tꞌãride iru bɨ merã pɨkꞌapari.
Eperãpa chĩara kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bakꞌãri, mãgɨ́ ome chõo jɨrɨpari. Mamĩda eperãpa chĩara kꞌinia iru bakꞌãri, ichimaa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda kꞌĩra atuapari.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedee jarapari. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee pedee jarada kꞌaurepa, potrepa iru wɨpata.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌawaakꞌãri, ichi tꞌãride ɨa pɨkꞌa iru bapari. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa pariatua pedee jara bɨ kꞌaurepa, iru kꞌachiade baaipari.
Pꞌaratꞌara bɨ pꞌaratꞌapa iru jɨ̃a pɨkꞌapari murallapa pꞌuuru jɨ̃aparikꞌa. Jõdee chupɨria chɨ chupɨria bapari pꞌaratꞌa wẽe bairã.
Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari ewari teesoo bapariitꞌee. Mamĩda chi ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ miaitꞌee ichia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopari kꞌaurepa.
Eperãpa ũraa pia ũriru pɨrã mãikꞌaapa ma ũraade jara bɨkꞌa ooru pɨrã, o piade nipapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ewari teesoo bapariitꞌee. Mamĩda ũraa pia ũriamaa bɨ pɨrã, o kꞌachiade nipapariitꞌee.
Nãgee eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ: chi seewa jarapari merã kꞌinia bairã ichia chĩara kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bapari mãikꞌaapa chi pedee kꞌachia chĩara ãpɨte jarapari.
Eperã pedee–idaa baparipa isapai pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopari. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ kꞌĩupꞌee beepari.
Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ooparipa pedee jara bɨ pꞌaratꞌa pi–ia bɨ́kꞌapɨ bɨ. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨpa kꞌĩsia bɨ maarepida vale–e bɨ.
Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ooparipa awaraarã ũraakꞌãri, chokꞌaraarã kꞌaripapari. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa pedee pariatua jarada kꞌaurepa, chonaa padai naaweda, piudaipari.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperã bendiciakꞌãri, ma eperãmaa ne–inaa pi–ia teepari. Ma awara ma eperã tꞌãri pꞌua bakꞌaa.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ o–ĩadaipari chĩaramaa ne–inaa kꞌachia ookꞌãri. Jõdee chi kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ o–ĩa bapari kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bairã.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨpa ne–inaa audupɨara waawee bɨ, irumaa mãga pꞌasapari. Mamĩda eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ooparipa ne–inaa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa uchiapari.
Nãumia chekꞌãri, ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ pꞌira uchiapari. Mamĩda eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari choopari.
Eperã chokꞌapari–itꞌee eperã kꞌoo–idaa bɨ vinagre ichi kꞌidade achuchua beeparikꞌa bɨ maa–e pɨrã naripa ichi tau sooparikꞌa bɨ.
Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapari ewari teesoo bapari. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã año chokꞌara–ee pꞌanapata.

Eperãarã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã o–ĩadaipata kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri ãchia ewari cherude ne–inaa oodaitꞌee pꞌanɨde. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanɨ oodaitꞌee kꞌachia uchiaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichia jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã jɨ̃apari. Mamĩda irua ne–inaa kꞌachia oopataarã jõpipari.
Apidaapa eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari ãyaa pëida–e paitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa teeda eujãdeepa. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ ma eujãde taarã ba–e paitꞌee, jõitꞌee perã.
Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ooparipa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedee jarapari. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨpa seewa jarapari kꞌaurepa iru kꞌĩupꞌeepidaitꞌee.
Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ooparipa kꞌawa bɨ pedee pia jarapariitꞌee. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨpa seewa pedee aupaita jarapari.
Eperãpa balanzade ne–inaa aukꞌa chaa–e bakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma eperã yiaraa iru bapari. Mamĩda chi ne–inaa aukꞌa chaapari pia akꞌɨpari.
Eperã audua bakꞌãri, kꞌĩra nejasia beeitꞌee. Mamĩda audua–ee beerã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanapata.
Eperãarã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã tꞌãri jĩpꞌa pꞌanapata. Mamĩda kꞌũrayaa beerã jõdaitꞌee ãchia seewa jarapata kꞌaurepa.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã miapikꞌãri ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa, pꞌaratꞌara beerãpa iru pꞌanɨ maarepida servi–e paitꞌee. Mamĩda madepema pꞌaratꞌara bɨpa jɨrɨru pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ooitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru piupi–e paitꞌee.
Eperãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa ookꞌãri, iru o piade nipapari. Mamĩda eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌachiade baaipari ichia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopari kꞌaurepa.

Eperãarãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oodakꞌãri, irua ãra uchiapipari ne–inaa kꞌachia jua ekꞌariipa. Mamĩda kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipadakꞌaarã ãchia netꞌaa kꞌɨ̃a pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa kꞌachiade baaipata, ne–animal trampade baaiparikꞌa.
Eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ piukꞌãri, ichia kꞌĩsia iru bada ooitꞌee jõmaweda jõdaipari, ichi netꞌaa paara.
Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari kꞌachiade baaikꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru kꞌaripapari madeepa uchiamerã. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ mãgá kꞌaripa–e. Mapa iru jõdee audú kꞌachiade baaipari.
Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãakꞌaa bɨpa awaraamaa pedee jarada kꞌaurepa ma eperã kꞌachiade baaipipari. Mamĩda eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari ma kꞌachiade baai–e, poro wẽsaa bapari perã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã pia pꞌanadakꞌãri, ãchi pꞌuuru pidaarã o–ĩadaipata. Jõdee pꞌuuru pidaarã audupɨara o–ĩadaipata ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã piudakꞌãri.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã kꞌaurepa eperãarãpa ãra pꞌuuru tꞌo pꞌanapata. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa pedee kꞌachia jarapata kꞌaurepa ãra pꞌuuru jõdaipari.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa awaraarã ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jarapari. Mamĩda eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ kꞌĩupꞌee beepari.
Eperã chĩara ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jarayaa bɨpa ichia ũrida awaraarãmaa jarakꞌoopari. Mamĩda eperã tꞌãri jĩpꞌa nipaparipa ichia ũrida awaraarãmaa jarakꞌaa.
Pꞌuuru pidaarã poro waibɨarã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee pꞌanɨ pɨrã, ãchi pꞌuuru pidaarã jõdariitꞌee. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãmaa ũraa pia iidiruta pɨrã, ãchi pꞌuuru pidaarã jõpida–e pai.
Kꞌĩra tewaraapa ichi tewe pꞌaa–e pakꞌãri, apidaapa iru kꞌapꞌɨa pari ma tewe pꞌaaitꞌeeda aru pɨrã, ma eperã kꞌachiade baaiitꞌee. Mamĩda chi chĩara tewe pꞌaakꞌaa bɨ kꞌãiwee bapariitꞌee.
Wẽra jõmaarã ome tꞌãri pia bakꞌãri, jõmaarãpa iru tꞌo pꞌanapata. Jõdee ɨmɨkꞌĩra audú netꞌaa pꞌe kꞌinia bɨpa ichi netꞌaa aupai iru bapariitꞌee.
Eperã tꞌãri pia bɨpa awaraarã chupɨria kꞌawaakꞌãri, ichi itu kꞌaripapari. Mamĩda tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa bɨpa chĩaramaa ne–inaa kꞌachia ookꞌãri, ichi itu miapari.
