Eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ mimiaru pɨjida, ne–inaa pia ata–e, ichi itu kꞌũrapari perã. Mamĩda chi Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ooparipa ne–inaa pia ataitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã ewari teesoo pꞌanapataadaitꞌee. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã piudaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanapataarã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bapari. Mamĩda ichia jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã pia akꞌɨpari.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã ichita miadaitꞌee ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã miada–e paitꞌee.
Wẽra kꞌĩra wãree, mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa–ee bakꞌãri, sortija nẽedee ooda sina kꞌɨ̃de jɨ̃ bɨ́kꞌata bɨ.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãpa kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanadakꞌãri ne–inaa oodaitꞌee, ma ne–inaa pia uchiapari. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanadakꞌãri ne–inaa oodaitꞌee, ma kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩraudaipari.
Eperãarãpa tꞌãri piapa awaraarãmaa ne–inaa waibɨa teedakꞌãri, ãchia teedapꞌedaa kꞌãyaara waibɨara jitapata. Awaraarã chupɨria pꞌaneepata ãchi tewe paara pꞌaadaamaa pꞌanapata perã.
Eperã awaraarã ome tꞌãri pia bakꞌãri, ne–inaa falta–ee bapari. Ichiaba eperãpa awaraarãmaa netꞌaa teekꞌãri, awaraarãpa aukꞌa irumaa teedaitꞌee.
Eperãarãpa trigo neto kꞌinia pꞌanadakꞌãri, chi trigo chiparipa netoamaa bɨ pɨrã, iru ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jarapata. Mamĩda pedee pia jarapata chi trigo neto pëiparimaa.
Eperãpa jɨrɨkꞌãri ne–inaa pia ooitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pia akꞌɨpariitꞌee. Mamĩda chi jɨrɨparipa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee kꞌachiade baaiitꞌee.

Eperãpa kꞌĩsia bɨ pɨrã ichia pꞌaratꞌa iru bɨ kꞌaurepa pia bapariitꞌee, iru kꞌachiade baaiitꞌee kꞌiru pꞌooda pakꞌurudeepa baaiparikꞌa. Mamĩda eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari pia bapariitꞌee, pakꞌuru juade kꞌiru pꞌãwaraa nɨ̃baparikꞌa.
Eperãpa ichideerã kꞌachiade baaipiru pɨrã, maarepida jɨ̃a–e paitꞌee. Mãgee kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerã jua ekꞌari mimiapariitꞌee.
Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari pakꞌuru tachi chokꞌaipiparíkꞌapɨ bɨ. Mamĩda chĩara peepataarãpa eperãarã jõpipata.

Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨde Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãpa ne–inaa pia atapata ãchia ne–inaa pia oopata pari. ¡Audupɨara irude ijãadakꞌaa beerã mãikꞌaapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã kꞌachiade baaidaitꞌee ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa!
Eperãpa kꞌinia bakꞌãri ichi ɨtrɨadamerã ichia ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda kꞌaurepa, ma eperã poro wẽsaa bɨ. Mamĩda eperãpa kꞌinia–e bakꞌãri ichi ɨtrɨadamerã, ma eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa tꞌãri pia beerã pia akꞌɨpari. Mamĩda tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa beerã miapiitꞌee.
Eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ pꞌoyaa kꞌãiwee bakꞌaa. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapata, ne–inaa jõma pꞌasarutade choopata perã.
Wẽra chokꞌekꞌee, tꞌãri pia bakꞌãri, ma wẽra chi ɨmɨkꞌĩra poro jɨ̃rákꞌata bɨ, iru reykꞌa iru bapari perã. Mamĩda wẽra kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe bakꞌãri, ichi ɨmɨkꞌĩra pee pɨkꞌa wãpari.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãpa kꞌĩsiapata awaraarãmaa ne–inaa pia oodaitꞌee. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa ũraadakꞌãri, kꞌĩsiapata awaraarã kꞌũradaitꞌee.

Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa pedee jarapata trampakꞌa bɨ chĩara kꞌachiade baaipipꞌeda, piupipata perã. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãpa pedee jarapata kꞌaurepa awaraarã kꞌaripapata kꞌachiade baainaadamerã.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã kꞌachiade baaipata mãikꞌaapa mãgá jõdaipata. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã, ãchi warrarã paara, ewari teesoo pꞌanapata.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ tꞌo pꞌanapata. Mamĩda tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa bɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapata.
Piara bɨ pɨchi mimiapari aba iru baitꞌee mãikꞌaapa chikꞌo kꞌoitꞌee iru baitꞌee seewata pꞌaratꞌa paraa bɨkꞌa bai kꞌãyaara, chikꞌo wẽe, pɨ–itꞌee mimiapari wẽe.
Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ooparipa ichi ne–animalaarã pia akꞌɨ bapari. Mamĩda eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨpa ichi ne–animalaarã chupɨria kꞌawaakꞌaa.
Eperã ichi eujãde mimiakꞌãri, ne–inaa kꞌoitꞌee waibɨa iru baitꞌee. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa ne–inaa pariatua oopari kꞌaurepa maarepida ata–e.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã kꞌachiade baaipata ãchia kꞌĩsia kꞌachia kꞌĩsiadapꞌedaakꞌa oodapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã pia pꞌanapata ãchi tꞌãride choopata perã.
Eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨpa seewa jarada kꞌaurepa kꞌachiade baaipari, ne–animal trampade baaiparikꞌa. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari mãgee kꞌachiade baai–e.
Eperãpa pedee pia jarakꞌãri, ichia ne–inaa pia iru baitꞌee. Ma awara eperãpa ichi juadoopa mimiakꞌãri, ne–inaa pia jitaitꞌee.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa kꞌĩsiapari ichia ne–inaa oo bɨ jõmaweda pia bɨ. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa ũripari ichi ũraadakꞌãri.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ isapai kꞌĩraudaipari. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ kꞌĩraudaikꞌaa, ichimaa ikꞌachia pedee jararuta pɨjida.
Charraarã kꞌĩrapite eperã tꞌãri jĩpꞌa baparipa wãara pedee jarapari. Mamĩda eperã wãara pedee jarakꞌaa bɨpa seewa jarapari.
Eperãpa kꞌĩsia–ee pedeekꞌãri, ichi pedeepa chĩara tꞌãri pꞌuapipari espadapa tꞌuparikꞌa. Mamĩda eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ pedee neera pia bɨkꞌa bɨ.
Wãara pedeeta ichita bapariitꞌee. Mamĩda seewa pedee taarã ba–e paitꞌee.
Tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa beerãpa kꞌĩsiapata chĩara kꞌũradaitꞌee. Mamĩda chi kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadamerã ũraapataarã o–ĩa pꞌanapata.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã kꞌachiade baaida–e paitꞌee. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoode baaidaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa seewa–idaa beerã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bapari. Mamĩda wãara pedee jarapataarã ome tꞌãri o–ĩa bapari.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa jõmaarãmaa jarakꞌaa ichia ne–inaa kꞌawa bɨ. Mamĩda eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa pariatua jõmaarãmaa jara wãpari.
Eperã mimiayaa bɨpa awaraarã ichi jua ekꞌari iru baitꞌee. Mamĩda eperã kꞌoo–idaa bɨ awaraarã jua ekꞌari bapariitꞌee.
Eperã ichi tꞌãride audú kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bakꞌãri, kꞌĩra pia–ee beepari. Mamĩda irumaa pedee pia jaradakꞌãri, tꞌãri o–ĩadaipari.
Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ooparipa awaraarãmaa o pia akꞌɨpipari. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa ma o unuda–e, o kꞌachiade nipapata perã.
Eperã kꞌoo–idaa bɨ nejɨrɨde wãkꞌãri, maarepida pee–e paitꞌee. Mamĩda chi mimiayaa baparipa ne–inaa pi–ia iru bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã iru ode nipapata perã, ewari teesoo pꞌanapataadaitꞌee. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerã o kꞌachiade nipapata perã, chonaa padai naaweda, piudaitꞌee.
Warra kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ akꞌõrepa iru ɨtrɨakꞌãri, chi akꞌõrepa ũraa bɨ ũripari. Mamĩda warra kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ akꞌõrepa iru ɨtrɨakꞌãri, chi akꞌõrepa ũraa bɨ ũriamaa bapari.
Eperãpa pedee pia jarakꞌãri, ichia ne–inaa pia iru baitꞌee. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa jĩpꞌa kꞌĩsiapata chĩaramaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee.
Eperã pedeei naaweda pia kꞌĩsiaru pɨrã, ma eperã ewari teesoo bapariitꞌee. Mamĩda chi pedee–idaa bɨ kꞌachiade baaiitꞌee.
Eperã kꞌoo–idaa bɨpa netꞌaa kꞌɨ̃apari, mamĩda pꞌoyaa atakꞌaa. Mamĩda chi mimiayaa bɨpa ichia ne–inaa kꞌinia bɨ atapari.
Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ooparipa seewa pedee unuamaa iru bapari. Mamĩda chi ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨpa seewa jara bɨ kꞌaurepa kꞌĩra nejasia beeitꞌee.
Eperã kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre ode nipakꞌãri, irua kꞌaripapari ne–inaa kꞌachiade baainaamerã. Mamĩda eperã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌachiade baaipari ichia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopari kꞌaurepa.
Eperãarã ũkꞌuru seewata pꞌaratꞌa paraa beerãkꞌa audua nipapata, pꞌaratꞌa wẽe pꞌanɨ mĩda. Jõdee awaraarã seewata chupɨria beerãkꞌa nipapata, pꞌaratꞌara iru pꞌanɨ mĩda.
Eperã pꞌaratꞌara bɨmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa pꞌaratꞌa iididakꞌãri, irua teepari peenaadamerã. Mamĩda chupɨria bɨpa ũrikꞌaa ichi peedaitꞌeeda a pꞌanɨ, ichi pꞌaratꞌa wẽe bairã.
Eperãarã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã audú ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa pꞌanapata. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã lámpara kꞌĩidai wã́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ.
Eperã audua pedeekꞌãri, chõo jɨrɨpari. Mamĩda chi ũraa pia ũripataarã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanapata.
Chĩara kꞌũra pꞌanɨɨpa pꞌaratꞌa atada taarã–ee jõdaipari. Mamĩda eperã mimiapꞌeda, ichi pꞌaratꞌa jitada ma–ãrima–ãrii ɨa wãkꞌãri, ma pꞌaratꞌa waibɨara wãitꞌee.
Taarã nɨdakꞌãri tachia ne–inaa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pꞌasamerã, tꞌãride kꞌĩsia paraa jõneepata. Mamĩda tachia ne–inaa kꞌinia pꞌanɨkꞌa uchiakꞌãri, ewari chokꞌaraara pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanapata.
Eperãpa ichimaa jaradapꞌedaakꞌa ooamaa bɨ pɨrã, kꞌachiade baaiitꞌee. Mamĩda eperãpa ichimaa jaradapꞌedaakꞌa ooru pɨrã, ma pari ne–inaa pia ataitꞌee.
Eperãarãpa oodakꞌãri kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa baparipa ũraade jara bɨkꞌa, ewari teesoo pꞌanapata ma ũraa pania poátrɨ uchia bɨmãipemákꞌata bɨ perã. Ma eperãarã kꞌachiade baairuta pɨjida, piuda–e paitꞌee.
Eperãpa pia kꞌĩsiakꞌãri ne–inaa ooi naaweda, awaraarãpa iru pia akꞌɨpata. Mamĩda chi chĩara kꞌũrayaa bɨ pia akꞌɨdakꞌaa o kꞌachiade nipapari perã.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa ne–inaa poro wẽsaa oopari. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa ne–inaa jõmaweda pariatua oopari.
Eperã chokꞌa pëidapꞌedaa chokꞌekꞌee–e bakꞌãri, kꞌachiade baaipari. Mamĩda chi chokꞌa pëida chokꞌekꞌee bakꞌãri, neera piakꞌa bɨ.
Eperã ũraa pia ũriamaa bɨ chupɨria baitꞌee mãikꞌaapa awaraarãpa iru pia akꞌɨdakꞌaa paitꞌee. Mamĩda chi ũraa pia ũri kꞌinia pꞌanapataarã pia akꞌɨpataadaitꞌee.
Eperãpa ne–inaa kꞌinia bada atakꞌãri, tꞌãri o–ĩa beepari. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee pꞌanapataarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo amaa kꞌiniadakꞌaa.
Kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerã ome kꞌõpꞌãyo meraaru pɨrã, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beeitꞌee. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerã ome kꞌõpꞌãyo meraaru pɨrã, kꞌachiade baaiitꞌee.
Pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã ne–inaa kꞌachiade baaipata. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãpa ne–inaa pia iru pꞌanadaitꞌee.
Eperã tꞌãri pia baparipa ichi netꞌaa iru bɨ atabëipari ichi ãichakꞌeerã–itꞌee. Mamĩda eperã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨpa netꞌaa iru bada pꞌaneedaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã ome.
Eperã chupɨria chɨpa ichi eujãde ne–inaa uudadepema waibɨa ewapari mĩda, irua ewadadepema wẽe beepari ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa irua ewada jãri ata chepata perã.

Eperãpa ichi warra ɨtrɨakꞌaa pɨrã ne–inaa kꞌachia ookꞌãri, mãgara ichi warra kꞌinia–e bɨ. Mamĩda eperãpa ichi warra ma–ãriweda ɨtrɨapari pɨrã ne–inaa kꞌachia ookꞌãri, ma eperãpa ichi warra kꞌinia iru bapari.
Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari nekꞌopari bi jãwaa beerumaa. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ jarra oopari.
Wẽra kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa ichi te pidaarã pia akꞌɨpari. Mamĩda wẽra kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa ichi te pidaarã pia akꞌɨkꞌaa, kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee ne–inaa jõma oopari perã.
Eperã tꞌãri jĩpꞌa nipaparipa Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oopari. Mamĩda eperã tꞌãri jĩpꞌa nipakꞌaa bɨpa Tachi Akꞌõre yiaraa iru bapari.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa audua pedee jarapari kꞌaurepa iru kꞌachiade baaipari. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapari pedee pia jaraparipa iru jɨ̃a pɨkꞌapari.
Eujã chiparipa pꞌakꞌa eujã poreetɨpipari wẽe bakꞌãri, trigo wẽe beepari. Mamĩda pꞌakꞌa juataura bɨ kꞌaurepa, trigo waibɨa ewapari.
Eperã tꞌãri jĩpꞌa baparipa ichia unuda wãara jarapari. Mamĩda eperã seewa–idaa bɨpa ichia unuda ichita seewa jarapari.
Chĩara ooyaa bɨpa jɨrɨpari kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beeitꞌee, mamĩda pꞌoyaa mãga ba–e paitꞌee. Jõdee eperã poro wẽsaa bɨpa taarã–eweda ne–inaa kꞌawa–e bɨ kꞌawaa atapari.
Ãyaa béeji kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ ikꞌaawaapa, irua pedee jara bɨ kꞌaurepa maarepida ne–inaa pia kꞌawa–e paitꞌee perã.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bakꞌãri, kꞌawapari chisãgɨ́ ode nipapariitꞌee. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa ichi itu kꞌũrapꞌeda, pariatua nipapari.
Kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerã ëipata ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata–itꞌee. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌanapataarã pia akꞌɨpari.
Tachi tꞌãridepai kꞌawapata tꞌãri ãrii pꞌanadakꞌãri maa–e pɨrã tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanadakꞌãri. Mamĩda mãga pꞌanadakꞌãri, kꞌĩra tewaraarãmaa jaradakꞌaa.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã te pidaarã jõdaitꞌee. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã te pidaarã pia pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Eperãarãpa kꞌĩsiapata ãchita o jĩpꞌa bɨde nipapata. Mamĩda ma ode nipapataarã piudaitꞌee.
Eperã ëi nɨ̃bɨde tꞌãri pꞌua bai mãikꞌaapa o–ĩa bapꞌeda, kꞌĩra pia–ee beei.

Eperã ne–inaa pia ooamaa baparipa kꞌĩsiapari ichia oo bɨ pia bɨ. Mamĩda ichi kꞌachiade baaiitꞌee ichia ne–inaa pia ooamaa bapari kꞌaurepa. Jõdee eperã tꞌãri pia bapari kꞌãiwee bapari, ichia ne–inaa pia oopari kꞌaurepa ichi pia bapariitꞌee perã.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa ijãapari jõma ichimaa jararuta. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa pi–ia akꞌɨpari sãmata nipaitꞌee.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ waawee bapari ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ãyaa beepari ne–inaa kꞌachia ikꞌaawaapa. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa pariatua ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo wãpari, kꞌĩsia–ee.
Eperã isapai kꞌĩraudaiparipa pariatua ne–inaa oopari, kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee. Mamĩda eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ choopari; isapai kꞌĩraudaikꞌaa.

Warrarãpa ãchi akꞌõrepa atabëida jɨ̃apatakꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ warra chakꞌeerãkꞌa kꞌĩsiapataarã. Ãchia kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerã kꞌĩsia jɨ̃a pɨkꞌapata. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãpa ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌawaa wãpata.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã bedabaidaitꞌee ne–inaa pia oopataarã kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa chupɨria iididaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã te tꞌaide.
Chupɨria chɨ ikꞌaawa pꞌanapataarãpa paara iru kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapata. Mamĩda pꞌaratꞌara bɨpa kꞌõpꞌãyoorã chokꞌara iru bapari.
Eperãpa ichi ikꞌaawa bapari kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bɨ pɨrã, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oomaa bɨ. ¡Mamĩda eperãpa chupɨria beerã chupɨria kꞌawaayaa bakꞌãri, tꞌãri o–ĩa bapari!
Eperãarãpa jɨrɨdakꞌãri ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee, kꞌachiade baaipata. Mamĩda jɨrɨdakꞌãri ne–inaa pia oodaitꞌee, jõmaarãpa ãra pia akꞌɨpata mãikꞌaapa kꞌawapata ãrapa wãara oopata ãchia jara pꞌanɨkꞌa.
Eperã mimiayaa bɨpa ne–inaa pia atapari. Mamĩda pedeepapai jarakꞌãri ne–inaa ooitꞌee, mamĩda ookꞌaa, mãgɨ́ eperã chupɨria beeitꞌee.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ kꞌawapata ichia netꞌaa pi–ia iru bɨ ichia poro jɨ̃rakꞌa jɨ̃ bairã. Mamĩda eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ kꞌawapata irua kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee pedee jarapari kꞌaurepa.
Charraarã kꞌĩrapite eperãpa wãara pedee jarakꞌãri, awaraarã kꞌaripa atapari ãra piudaitꞌee padadeepa. Mamĩda seewa jara bɨpa awaraarã traicionaapari.
Eperãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ookꞌãri, kꞌawapari Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru jɨ̃apariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa chi warrarãpa aukꞌa mãga kꞌawapata.
Eperãpa Tachi Akꞌõre waaweekꞌãri, ewari teesoo bapariitꞌee ichia ijãa bɨ pania poátrɨ uchia bɨmãipemakꞌa bɨ perã. Irua mãgá ijãapari kꞌaurepa chonaa pai naaweda piu–e paitꞌee.
Reypa eperãarã chokꞌara ichi jua ekꞌari iru bakꞌãri, jõmaarãpa iru tꞌo pꞌanapata. Mamĩda ichi jua ekꞌari chokꞌara–ee iru bakꞌãri, ichi juatau jõ wãpari.
Eperã isapai kꞌĩraukꞌaa bɨ poro wẽsaa bapari. Mamĩda chi isapai kꞌĩraudaiparipa akꞌɨpipari iru poro wẽsaa–e bɨ.

Eperãarã kꞌãiwee pꞌanadakꞌãri, kꞌapꞌɨa pia pꞌanapata. Mamĩda chĩara kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanadakꞌãri ne–inaa iru bɨ kꞌaurepa, ma tꞌãri kꞌachiapa ãchi piu pɨkꞌa wãruta eperã kꞌayaa kꞌachiapa piu wãparikꞌa.

Eperãpa chupɨria chitoonɨɨrã waapɨara chupɨriapiru pɨrã, ma eperãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, iruata ma chupɨria chitoonɨɨrã ooda perã. Mamĩda eperãpa chupɨria chitoonɨɨrã kꞌaripakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma eperã pia akꞌɨpari.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa kꞌachiade baaipata. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichia jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã jɨ̃apari, ãra kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipapata perã.
Eperã poro wẽsaa bɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapari. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerãpa mãgee kꞌĩsia kꞌawadakꞌaa.
Pꞌuuru pidaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataadakꞌãri, jõmaarãpa ãchi pꞌuuru pidaarã pi–ia bɨda apata. Mamĩda pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanadakꞌãri, jõmaarã kꞌĩrapite kꞌĩra nejasia pꞌanapata.
Rey–itꞌee mimiapari chokꞌekꞌee bakꞌãri, reypa iru pia akꞌɨpari. Mamĩda kꞌĩraudaipari ichi–itꞌee mimiaparipa ne–inaa pariatua ookꞌãri.
Eperã kꞌĩrau bɨpa pedee jarada tꞌãri pia pꞌanauru pɨrã, iru kꞌĩrau wẽpapii. Mamĩda kꞌĩrau pꞌanauru pɨrã, audupɨara kꞌĩraudariitꞌee.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ pedeekꞌãri, awaraarãpa ne–inaa waapɨara kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ pedeekꞌãri, kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee pedee aupai jarapari.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaweda unu bapari; pia beerã, kꞌachia beerã paara.
Pedee tꞌãri pia jarada pakꞌuru tachi chokꞌaipiparíkꞌapɨ bɨ. Mamĩda seewa pedee jarada kꞌaurepa eperãarã tꞌãri pꞌua pꞌaneepata.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ akꞌõrepa iru ɨtrɨakꞌãri, ũriamaa bapari. Mamĩda akꞌõrepa ichi warra ɨtrɨakꞌãri, ũriru pɨrã, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapari.
Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari tede ne–inaa pia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo paraapari. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨpa netꞌaa pia atakꞌãri, ma netꞌaa kꞌaurepa iru kꞌachiade baaipari.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ pedeekꞌãri, chi ũri pꞌanɨɨrãpa waapɨara kꞌawaa kꞌinia pꞌanapata irua ne–inaa jara bɨ. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerãpa pꞌoyaa mãga oodakꞌaa, pariatua pedeepata perã.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa unuamaa iru bapari ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa ne–animalaarã aneepata iru–itꞌee paapidaitꞌee pꞌaareerãmaa. Mamĩda tꞌãri o–ĩadaipari ichia jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãpa irumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dakꞌãri.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa unuamaa iru bapari ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa oopata. Mamĩda kꞌinia iru bapari ichia jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã.
Eperã o piadeepa uchiaru pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru audú ɨtrɨaitꞌee waya mãgɨ́ ode nipapariimerã. Mamĩda ma ɨtrɨa pedee ũriamaa beeru pɨrã, ma eperã piuitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawapari piudapꞌedaarãmãi pꞌasapari mãikꞌaapa tachi piudaitꞌee ewate. ¡Audupɨara kꞌawa bɨ tachi tꞌãride kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanɨ!
Chĩara ooyaa bɨpa kꞌiniakꞌaa ichi ɨtrɨadamerã. Mapa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãmaa wãkꞌaa ichi ũraadamerã.
Eperã tꞌãri o–ĩa bakꞌãri, kꞌĩra o–ĩa nipapari. Mamĩda tꞌãri pꞌua bakꞌãri, kꞌĩra pia–ee nipapari.
Eperã poro wẽsaa bɨpa jɨrɨpari ne–inaa waapɨara kꞌawaaitꞌee. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerãpa kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee pedee aupai jara nipapata.
Eperã kꞌĩsia paraa bapari–itꞌee, ewari jõmaweda aukꞌa kꞌachia bapari. Mamĩda tꞌãri o–ĩa bapari–itꞌee, ewari chaa fiestakꞌa bapari.
Piara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa bɨde pꞌaratꞌa ma–ãripai iru baitꞌee, pꞌaratꞌa waibɨa iru bɨde kꞌĩsia paraa bai kꞌãyaara.
Piara bɨ eperã tachi kꞌinia iru bɨ ome verdura aupai kꞌoitꞌee, eperã tachi unuamaa iru bɨ ome nechiara waibɨa kꞌoi kꞌãyaara.
Eperã kꞌĩrauyaa bɨpa awaraarã aupedeepipari. Mamĩda chi isapai kꞌĩraukꞌaa bɨpa awaraarã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapipari waa aupedeenaadamerã.
Eperã kꞌoo–idaa bɨ nipapari o ne–ɨɨrɨ–idaa pɨkꞌa bɨde. Mamĩda eperãarã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã nipapata o tro–kꞌoo pɨkꞌa bɨde.
Warra kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa chi akꞌõre tꞌãri o–ĩapipari. Mamĩda warra kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa chi nawe kꞌinia–ee iru bapari.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ o–ĩadaipari ne–inaa pariatua ookꞌãri. Mamĩda eperã poro wẽsaa bɨpa jɨrɨpari ne–inaa kꞌachia jõmaweda oo amaaitꞌee.
Ne–inaa oodai naaweda ũraa pia iidida–e pɨrã, tachia oodaitꞌee kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanɨ pia uchia–e paitꞌee. Mamĩda pia uchiaitꞌee kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerã chokꞌaraarãmaa ũraa iidiruta pɨrã.
Eperã tꞌãri o–ĩadaipari awaraapa irumaa iidida pia pꞌanaukꞌãri. Chi iidida–itꞌee ma pedee pi–ia bɨ ma ũraa ũri kꞌinia bada perã.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ ɨtꞌaa wãpari ode nipapari perã, ewari teesoo bapariitꞌee. Ma o piade wãpari perã, piudaarãmaa wãpari ode tꞌĩu–e paitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa chĩara eujã kꞌɨ̃apataarã te jõpipari. Mamĩda pꞌẽtrãarã eujã jɨ̃apari.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa unuamaa iru bapari ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda pia akꞌɨpari ichia jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãpa tꞌãri pia pedee jarapata.
Eperãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda pari pꞌaratꞌa jitai awaa baparipa ichideerã kꞌachiade baaipipari. Mamĩda chi pꞌaratꞌa jitaamaa bapari ne–inaa kꞌachia oo bɨ pari ewari teesoo bapariitꞌee.
Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ooparipa pꞌanaui naaweda, pia kꞌĩsiapari. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨpa kꞌĩsia–ee pedee kꞌachia aupai jarapari.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã ikꞌaawaapa Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌɨmɨ́ pɨkꞌa bapari. Mamĩda ichita ũripari irua jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãpa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata.
Eperã kꞌĩra ëipꞌipꞌitꞌaa bakꞌãri, awaraarã o–ĩadaipata mãikꞌaapa pedee pia ãchimaa jara pëida ũridakꞌãri, juataura pꞌaneepata.
Eperã ɨtrɨadakꞌãri, ũriru pɨrã, ma eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beeitꞌee.
Eperã ɨtrɨadakꞌãri, ũriamaa bɨ pɨrã, ichi itu yiaraa iru bɨ. Mamĩda ɨtrɨadakꞌãri, ũriru pɨrã, poro wẽsaa beeitꞌee.
Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãakꞌãri, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapari. Pɨa kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã awaraarãpa pɨ tꞌo pꞌanadamerã, audua–ee baparíiji.
Eperãpa kꞌĩsiapari ne–inaa ooitꞌee. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrépata ichia kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oopari.
Eperãpa kꞌĩsiapari ichia ne–inaa oo bɨ jõmaweda pia bɨ. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrépata ma eperã tꞌãride kꞌĩsia bɨ akꞌɨpari jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia.
Pɨa ne–inaa oo bɨ jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõre juade bɨ́ji. Mãgá pɨa ne–inaa oopari ichita pia uchiaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa jõmaweda ooji ichia kꞌĩsia iru badakꞌa ooitꞌee. Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã paara ooji ichi ewari waibɨa ewate miapiitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa audua beerã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bapari. Ichita irua mãgeerã miapiitꞌee.

Eperãpa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia iru bakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa irumaa wãara pedee jarakꞌãri, irua ma eperãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopari ãyaa bɨpari. Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa oodakꞌãri, eperãarã ne–inaa kꞌachia ikꞌaawaapa ãyaa pꞌaneepata.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãpa ne–inaa oopari pia akꞌɨkꞌãri, ma eperã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa paara iru ome pedeeteepata kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Piara bɨ mimiapꞌeda, netꞌaa chokꞌara–ee iru baitꞌee, chĩara kꞌũrapꞌeda, netꞌaa chokꞌara iru bai kꞌãyaara.
Eperãpa kꞌĩsiapari ne–inaa ooitꞌee. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrépata irumaa kꞌawapipari ma ne–inaa ooipia bɨ wa ooikꞌaraa bɨ.
Reypa ichi jua ekꞌari beerã nepɨra akꞌɨkꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa akꞌɨpari. Mapa irua jarakꞌãri chisãgɨ́ pia ooda, chisãgɨ́ kꞌachia ooda, wãara pedeeta jarapari.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨ ne–inaa balanzade chaadakꞌãri, jõmaweda aukꞌa chaadamerã, irua balanza mãgá oopida perã.
Reyrãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaamaa pꞌanapata, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra ma mimiade bɨda perã kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa oodamerã.
Reyrã o–ĩadaipata ãramaa wãara pedee jaradakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa ãchia chi tꞌãri jĩpꞌa pedeepataarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanapata.
Rey kꞌĩraudaikꞌãri, eperã piupii. Mamĩda eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa baparipa tꞌãri pia pedee jara bɨpa ma kꞌĩrau wẽpapii.

Rey tꞌãri o–ĩa bakꞌãri, ichi jua ekꞌari pꞌanapataarã ewari teesoo pꞌanapataadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapataadaitꞌee. Mãga bakꞌãri, jɨ̃ararapa kꞌoi aneeparíkꞌata bɨ, ichi jua ekꞌari pꞌanapataarã pia akꞌɨpari perã.
Piara bɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapariitꞌee nẽe iru bai kꞌãyaara mãikꞌaapa piara bɨ poro wẽsaa bapariitꞌee pꞌaratꞌa iru bai kꞌãyaara.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã o jĩpꞌaa bɨde nipapata mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia ikꞌaawaapa ãyaa pꞌaneepata. Ãrapa ãchi kꞌapꞌɨa jɨ̃apata ne–inaa kꞌachiade baaida–e paitꞌee.
Audua beerãpa ne–inaa oopata pia uchia–e paitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ãra audua nipadakꞌãri, kꞌachiade baaidaitꞌee.
Piara bɨ audua–ee nipaitꞌee chupɨria beerã ome, pꞌaratꞌa paraa beerã ome audua nipai kꞌãyaara.
Eperãpa ũraa pia ũrikꞌãri mãikꞌaapa aɨde jara bɨkꞌa ookꞌãri, pia bapariitꞌee. ¡Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa bakꞌãri, tꞌãri o–ĩa bapari!
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bakꞌãri, poro wẽsaa bɨda apata. Eperãpa tꞌãri pia pedee jarakꞌãri, chi ũri pꞌanɨɨrãpa ijãapata.
Eperã poro wẽsaa bakꞌãri, ichia kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedee jara bɨ pania poátrɨ uchia bɨmãipemákꞌata bɨ. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerã kꞌachiade baaipata.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ pedee kꞌawaa bapari perã, pia kꞌĩsiapari pedeei naaweda. Irua tꞌãri pia pedee jarapari kꞌaurepa awaraarãpa irua jara bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌanapata.
Eperãpa tꞌãri pia pedeekꞌãri, miéle kꞌũ–ũa baparíkꞌata bɨ. Eperãarãpa mãgee pedee ũridakꞌãri, tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌaneepata mãikꞌaapa mãgee pedee kꞌaurepa ãra kꞌapꞌɨa pia pꞌanapata.
Eperãarãpa kꞌĩsiapata o ũkꞌuru jĩpꞌa pɨkꞌa bɨde nipapata. Mamĩda ma ode nipapataarã piudaitꞌee.
Eperã mimiapari jarra oo kꞌinia–e bairã mãikꞌaapa ichi mimia aupakꞌãri, nekꞌoitꞌee perã.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi awaa bɨpa kꞌĩsia iru bapari ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee. Mapa ichi pedee tꞌɨpɨtáukꞌata bɨ.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi awaa bɨpa eperãarã aupedeepipari. Jõdee chĩara ãpɨte pedeeyaa baparipa kꞌõpꞌãyoorã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapipari.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨpa ichi kꞌõpꞌãyo kꞌũra atapari aukꞌa ichi ome o kꞌachiade nipapariimerã.
Eperãpa ichi tau pꞌinakꞌãri, kꞌĩsiamaa bɨ ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee.
Eperã kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa bapari poro tꞌorroodaikꞌãri, ichi–itꞌee ma poro tꞌorroo poro jɨ̃rakꞌa bɨ.
Piara bɨ isapai kꞌĩraukꞌaa paitꞌee juataura bai kꞌãyaara. Piara bɨ tꞌãride chooitꞌee pꞌuuru pꞌoyaai kꞌãyaara.
Eperãpa suerte jemenepari ne–inaa kꞌawaaitꞌee. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrépata ma ne–inaa uchiapiitꞌee ichia kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Piara bɨ pan chaaree bɨ kꞌoitꞌee kꞌãiwee pꞌanapatamãi, aupedee para bɨmãi fiesta ooi kꞌãyaara.

Mimiapari chokꞌekꞌee bapari waibɨara pai chi poro waibɨa warra ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌãyaara mãikꞌaapa chi poro waibɨa piukꞌãri, ma warra pari iru netꞌaa atabëida ma warra ɨ̃pemaarãkꞌa aukꞌa jɨ̃aitꞌee.
Eperãarãpa nẽe mãikꞌaapa pꞌaratꞌa tꞌɨpɨtaude torrabaipata kꞌawadaitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrépata tachi tꞌãride kꞌĩsiapata akꞌɨpari kꞌawaitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa pedee kꞌachia ũrii awaa pꞌanapata mãikꞌaapa seewa–idaa beerãpa seewa pedee ũrii awaa pꞌanapata.
Eperãpa chupɨria chɨ oo iru bakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõre, chi ma chupɨria chɨ oodamaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa bɨ. Eperã o–ĩadaru pɨrã awaraarã kꞌachiade baaidakꞌãri, ma pari ichita iru miaitꞌee.
Chonaarã–itꞌee ãchi ãichakꞌeerã ãchi poro jɨ̃rakꞌa bɨ. Warrarã tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapata ãchi akꞌõreerã kꞌaurepa.
Pia–e bɨ eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa poro wẽsaa pedee jarakꞌãri. ¡Audupɨara pia–e bɨ eperãarã poro waibɨapa iwarraa pedee jarakꞌãri kꞌũraitꞌee!

Eperãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa kꞌĩsiapata ãchia ichita ãchia kꞌinia pꞌanɨkꞌa oodai awaraamaa pꞌaratꞌa teeruta pɨrã mãgɨpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oomerã ãchi pari. Kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ ãchia mãga oo pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa, ãchi ne–inaa jõmaade pia uchiadaitꞌee.

Eperãpa chi kꞌõpꞌãyopa ichimaa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda kꞌĩra atuaru pɨrã, chi kꞌõpꞌãyo kꞌinia iru bapari. Mamĩda ma ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda awaraarãmaa jarakꞌooru pɨrã, chi kꞌõpꞌãyo ome waa tꞌãri aukꞌa pꞌanada–e paitꞌee.
Eperã poro wẽsaa bɨpa ũripari ichi ɨtrɨadakꞌãri. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa ũrikꞌaa, soopa iru wɨda cien wɨruta pɨjida.
Eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ ichi poro waibɨapa jara bɨkꞌa ooamaa bapari. Mapa ma poro waibɨapa ichi chokꞌapari irumaa pëiitꞌee miapimerã.
Pia–e bɨ oso wẽra kꞌĩrau bɨ ome unuitꞌee. Mamĩda audupɨara pia–e bɨ unuitꞌee eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ ne–inaa pariatua oomaa bɨ ome.
Eperãpa awaraamaa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooru pɨrã ichimaa ne–inaa pia ooda pari, ichi te pidaarã ichita kꞌachiade pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Piara bɨ ichiakꞌau bɨitꞌee chĩara ome aupedeei kꞌãyaara, eperã aupedeemaa beeru pɨrã, to choma cheparíkꞌata baitꞌee perã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa nãgɨ́ ne–inaa kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bɨ: charraarãpa eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda arajãgaa kꞌena pëidakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–e badata miapidakꞌãri.
¿Kꞌãare–itꞌee eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa pꞌaratꞌa pꞌaaima kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beeitꞌee, ichi poro wẽsaa–e bɨta?
Kꞌõpꞌãyo pia bɨpa ichita tachi kꞌinia iru bapari. Jõdee tachi nepɨrade baaidakꞌãri, tachi ɨ̃pemapa tachi kꞌaripapari.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa ichi kꞌõpꞌãyo tewe paraa bɨ iru pari pꞌaaitꞌeeda apari.
Eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi awaa bɨ ichiaba chõo jɨrɨi awaa bapari. Chi audua pedeepari ichi itu kꞌachiade baaipari.
Eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi awaa bɨ pꞌoyaa o–ĩa ba–e. Eperã seewa–idaa bɨ kꞌachiade baaipariitꞌee.
Warra kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bakꞌãri, chi akꞌõre tꞌãri pꞌuapipari. Warra kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ akꞌõre tꞌãri o–ĩa bakꞌaa.
Eperã tꞌãri o–ĩa bakꞌãri, ichi kꞌapꞌɨa–itꞌee neera pia bɨkꞌa bɨ. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia paraa bakꞌãri, ichi kꞌapꞌɨa juatau wẽe pɨkꞌadaipari.
Eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨpa pꞌaratꞌa merã jitapari seewaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–ee bɨta charra kꞌĩrapite ɨmɨateeitꞌee.
Eperã poro wẽsaa bɨpa jɨrɨpari kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa baitꞌee. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa jɨrɨkꞌaa awaraa ne–inaa kꞌawaaitꞌee pariatua kꞌĩsiapari perã.
Warra kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bakꞌãri, chi akꞌõre tꞌãri pꞌuapipari mãikꞌaapa chi nawe tꞌãri ãrii bapipari.
Pia–e bɨ eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–e bɨmaa multa pꞌaapidaitꞌee maa–e pɨrã eperã kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa bapari wɨpidaitꞌee.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ makꞌɨara pedeekꞌaa mãikꞌaapa chi poro wẽsaa bɨ kꞌĩupꞌee beepari.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ paara kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pɨkꞌadaipari maa–e pɨrã poro wẽsaa pɨkꞌadaipari kꞌĩupꞌee beekꞌãri.
Eperã ichi pꞌuuru pidaarã awara bakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa jõma ichi–itꞌee aupai jɨrɨkꞌãri, mãgɨ́ eperãpa ũraa pia ũriamaa bapari.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa ne–inaa kꞌawa kꞌiniakꞌaa. Jĩpꞌa ichia kꞌĩsia bɨta jarapari.
Eperãarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapata mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa–e nipapataarã kꞌĩra nejasiapipata.

Eperã pedeekꞌãri, ichi pedee pania nãpɨa bɨkꞌa bɨ awaraarãpa pꞌoyaa kꞌawadakꞌaa perã. Mamĩda eperãpa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedee jarakꞌãri, ma pedee awaraarã–itꞌee pania poátrɨ uchia bɨmãipemákꞌata bɨ maa–e pɨrã to kꞌida chaaree jira baparíkꞌapɨ bɨ.
Pia–e bɨ charraarãpa eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌaripadamerã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–e bɨ kꞌaripada–ee pꞌaneedamerã.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa pedee jara bɨ kꞌaurepa iru ome chõo jɨrɨpata maa–e pɨrã iru wɨ kꞌinia pꞌaneepata.
Mãgee kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ pedee jarada kꞌaurepa iru kꞌachiade baaipari mãikꞌaapa ichi–itꞌee ma pedee trampa oga jira bɨ́kꞌata bɨ.
Eperãpa ne–inaa kꞌũ–ũa kꞌo kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa eperãarãpa chĩara ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jaradakꞌãri, awaraarãpa ũri kꞌinia pꞌanapata.
Eperã ichi mimiade kꞌoo–idaa bɨ aukꞌa bɨ eperã ne–inaa ãriyaa bɨ ome.
Tachi Akꞌõre torre pꞌoyaa ãridakꞌáakꞌata bɨ. Maperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãpa irumaa kꞌaripa iididakꞌãri, irua ãra kꞌaripapari.
Eperã pꞌaratꞌara bɨ–itꞌee ichi pꞌaratꞌapa iru jɨ̃a pɨkꞌapari murallapa pꞌuuru jɨ̃aparikꞌa. Irua kꞌĩsiapari apidaapa ichi pꞌaratꞌa jãri atada–e pai.
Audua beerã kꞌachiade baaipata. Mamĩda audua–ee beerãpa ne–inaa oodakꞌãri, eperãarãpa ãra pia akꞌɨpata.
Eperãpa pꞌanauru pɨrã ũrii naaweda jõmaweda awaraapa jara kꞌinia bɨ, ma eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe bɨ.
Eperã kꞌayaa bɨde, tꞌãride jɨpa bee kꞌinia bakꞌãri, irua ma kꞌayaa choopari. Mamĩda tꞌãri pꞌua beeru pɨrã, ¿kꞌaipa iru o–ĩapiima?
Kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerã poro wẽsaa beerã ome ãchia ne–inaa kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ waapɨara kꞌawaapata.
Eperãpa regalo teenakꞌãri, puerta ewapata mãgá iru tꞌĩumerã poro waibɨarã kꞌĩrapite.
Charra kꞌĩrapite chi naapɨara ichi nepɨra jara bɨpa wãarakꞌa jarapari. Mamĩda chi tꞌẽe cherupa ma eperãpa jarada seewada apari.

Eperãarã poro waibɨarãpa nepɨra iru pꞌanɨde suerte jemenedakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawapipari chisãgɨpa ne–inaa pia ooda mãikꞌaapa chisãgɨpa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda. Mãgá ma nepɨra iru pꞌanadapꞌedaa jõdaipari.
Tachi ɨ̃pema kꞌĩrau nɨ̃bɨde, iru ome pedeeitꞌee chaareera bɨ pꞌuuru murallapa tꞌɨakꞌau bɨde tꞌĩui kꞌãyaara. Eperãarã audú kꞌĩrau jõnadakꞌãri, palaciodepema rejákꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ.
Eperã bi jãwaa bakꞌãri, tꞌãri o–ĩa beeparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa eperãpa pedee pia jarada ũridakꞌãri, tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌaneepata.
Eperãpa awaraamaa pedee jarada kꞌaurepa iru piudarii maa–e pɨrã waapɨara chokꞌai baparii. Mamĩda chi pedeei awaa pꞌanapataarã audupɨara kꞌachiade baaipata.
Ɨmɨkꞌĩrapa ichi–itꞌee wẽra unu atakꞌãri, ne–inaa pia bɨ unu ataji. Mãgá kꞌawai Tachi Akꞌõrépata ichimaa ma wẽra teeda.
Eperã chupɨria chɨpa pꞌaratꞌa paraa bɨmaa chupɨria iidikꞌãri, imeraa pedee jarapari. Mamĩda pꞌaratꞌa paraa bɨpa kꞌĩrau pꞌanaupari.
Tachia kꞌõpꞌãyoorã iru pꞌanɨdepema ũkꞌuruurãpa tachi ne–inaa kꞌachiade baaipipata. Mamĩda awaraa kꞌõpꞌãyoorã piara paraa tachi ɨ̃pema kꞌãyaara.
Piara bɨ chupɨria, tꞌãri jĩpꞌa bapariitꞌee, kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee mãikꞌaapa seewa–idaa bai kꞌãyaara.
Pia–e bɨ isapai ne–inaa ooitꞌee kꞌawa–e bɨ pɨrã sãgá ma ne–inaa ooipia bɨ. Ne–inaa mãgá kꞌĩsia–ee isapai ooru pɨrã, ma ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa ne–inaa pariatua oo bɨ kꞌaurepa o pia unu–e. Mãgee eperã Tachi Akꞌõre ome tꞌãri ãriidaipari mãikꞌaapa iru kꞌaurépata ichi mãga bɨda apari.
Eperã pꞌaratꞌa paraa bakꞌãri, kꞌõpꞌãyoorã chokꞌara iru bapari. Mamĩda chupɨria bakꞌãri, chi kꞌõpꞌãyoorãpa paara iru atabaibëipata.
Charra kꞌĩrapite seewa jarapataarã mãikꞌaapa seewa–idaa beerã miadaitꞌee ãchia seewa jaradapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa.
Eperãarã chokꞌaraarãpa jɨrɨpata ãchi poro waibɨarãpa ãchi pia akꞌɨdamerã mãikꞌaapa eperã tꞌãri pia baparipa awaraarãmaa netꞌaa teekꞌãri, jõmaarãpa jɨrɨpata iru kꞌõpꞌãyo padaitꞌee.
Chupɨria chɨ ɨ̃pemaarãpa iru yiaraa iru pꞌanɨ pɨrã, audupɨara chi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã iru ikꞌaawaapa ãyaa wãdaitꞌee. Ãra ome pedeeitꞌee jɨrɨnaru pɨjida, unu–e paitꞌee.
Eperãpa jɨrɨkꞌãri ne–inaa kꞌawaaitꞌee, akꞌɨpipari ichi kꞌapꞌɨa kꞌinia iru bɨ mãikꞌaapa irua kꞌawakꞌãri ne–inaa pia ooitꞌee, ichia ne–inaa ooru pia uchiaitꞌee.
Charra kꞌĩrapite seewa jarapataarã miadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa seewa–idaa beerã piudaitꞌee ãchia seewa jaradapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa.
Pia–e bɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ pꞌaratꞌa paraa bɨkꞌa bapariimerã. Audupɨara pia–e bɨ esclavopa eperãarã poro waibɨarã ichi jua ekꞌari iru bamerã.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapari isapai kꞌĩraudaikꞌaa. Eperãarãpa iru tꞌo pꞌanapata ichimaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodakꞌãri, irua kꞌĩra atuatꞌaapari perã.
Rey kꞌĩrau bakꞌãri, imama biamaa bɨ́kꞌapɨ bɨ. Mamĩda tꞌãri pia bakꞌãri, sereno pꞌũajara ɨ̃rɨ baaidákꞌapɨ bɨ.
Warra kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa chi akꞌõre kꞌĩsia pꞌuapipari. Jõdee wẽra aupedeeyaa bɨ te porosãudeepa kꞌoi tau tꞌeutꞌewaa nɨ̃baparíkꞌapɨ bɨ.
Tachi akꞌõreerã piudakꞌãri, ãra te, netꞌaa mãikꞌaapa pꞌaratꞌa tachia jɨ̃apata. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrépata ɨmɨkꞌĩramaa wẽra kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ teepari.
Eperã kꞌoo–idaa bɨ kꞌãiyaa bapari. Mapa ichita iru jarra ooitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre leyde jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã ewari teesoo pꞌanapataadaitꞌee. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre ley ũriamaa pꞌanapataarã piudaitꞌee.
Eperãpa chupɨria chedeerã chupɨria kꞌawaakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõremaa ne–inaa presta pëirúkꞌata bɨ. Ma pari Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma eperãmaa ne–inaa pia teeitꞌee.
Atꞌãri pɨchi warrapa pɨa oopi bɨkꞌa oopari pɨrã, irua ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda pari wɨipia bɨ waa mãga oonaamerã. Mãgá pɨa iru kꞌaripai o kꞌachiade tꞌĩunaamerã mãikꞌaapa mãgá piunaamerã.
Eperã kꞌĩrauyaa bɨ ichi itu kꞌachiade baaipari. Mãga bɨde pɨa iru ma kꞌachiade baaidadeepa kꞌariparu pɨrã, waapɨara mãgá bapariitꞌee.
Pɨ ɨtrɨadakꞌãri, ũríji mãikꞌaapa pɨmaa ũraa jaradakꞌãri, ma jaradapꞌedaakꞌa ooparíiji. Mãgá ewari cherude pɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapariitꞌee.
Eperãpa kꞌĩsia iru bapari ne–inaa chokꞌara ooitꞌee. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrépata irumaa oopiitꞌee ichia oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Jõmaarãpa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ eperã tꞌãri pia bapariimerã. Piara bɨ chupɨria baitꞌee seewa–idaa bai kꞌãyaara.
Eperãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ookꞌãri, ewari teesoo bapariitꞌee. Ma eperã tꞌãri o–ĩa bapariitꞌee, kꞌachiade baai–ee mãikꞌaapa nepɨra wẽe.
Eperã kꞌoo–idaa bɨpa ichi jua pꞌaratꞌude tꞌɨpari. Mamĩda iru audú kꞌoo–idaa bairã, ichi jua jirakꞌaa nekꞌoitꞌee.
Chĩara ooyaa bɨ wɨru pɨrã, warra chakꞌeerãkꞌa kꞌĩsiaparipa kꞌawaaitꞌee ma ne–inaa kꞌachia ooikꞌaraa bɨ. Jõdee eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ ɨtrɨaru pɨrã, iru kꞌĩsia kꞌawaara baitꞌee.
Eperãpa chi akꞌõre netꞌaa jõmaweda jãri ataru pɨrã mãikꞌaapa chi nawe iru tedeepa jëretꞌaaru pɨrã, ma eperã kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe bɨ.
Warra, pɨa ũraa pia ũriamaadaru pɨrã, kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee baitꞌee.
Charra kꞌĩrapite eperãpa seewa jarakꞌãri, ma eperãpa charra, ley paara oo iru bɨ. Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa pedee kꞌachia jarai awaa pꞌanapata eperãarãpa chikꞌo kꞌoi awaa pꞌanapatakꞌa.
Chĩara ooyaa beerã miapipata mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerã soopa wɨpata.
Eperãpa vino tokꞌãri, aupedeei awaadaipari; itꞌua tokꞌãri, chõo jɨrɨpari. Eperã mãgee ne–inaa topari kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bapari.
Rey kꞌĩrau bakꞌãri, imama biamaa bɨ́kꞌapɨ bɨ. Chi rey kꞌĩraupiru piudarii.
Eperã kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa bɨ aupedeekꞌaa perã, iru tꞌo pꞌanapata. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa nepɨra jɨrɨpari.
Ne–uujara pakꞌãri, eperã kꞌoo–idaa bɨ mimiakꞌaa. Mapa ne–uudapꞌedaa ewadakꞌãri, irua maarepida unu–e paitꞌee.
Eperã kꞌĩsia to nãpɨa bɨkꞌa bɨ. Mamĩda eperã poro wẽsaa bɨpa ma kꞌĩsia kꞌawaai.
Eperãarã chokꞌaraarãpa jarapata ãchita tꞌãri pia pꞌanapata. Mamĩda eperã ichia jara bɨkꞌa oopari, ¿kꞌaipa unudaima?
¡Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipakꞌãri, ichi warrarã tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapata!
Rey su–akꞌɨ beekꞌãri eperãarã nepɨra akꞌɨitꞌee, ichia akꞌɨrupapai kꞌawaa atapari kꞌaipa chi ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda.
¿Kꞌaipa nãga jaraima: “Mɨ tꞌãride kꞌĩsia kꞌachia wẽe; mɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bɨ”?
Tachi Akꞌõrepa unuamaa iru bapari eperãpa balanzade ne–inaa aukꞌa chaa–e bɨ mãikꞌaapa metropa aukꞌa chaa–e bɨ.
Warrapa ne–inaa oo bɨ unudakꞌãri, kꞌawaadai iru o piade ni wa mãga–e.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌɨɨrɨ ooji ũridamerã; jõdee tachi tau ooji unudamerã.
Kꞌãiyaa banáaji, maa–e pɨrã chupɨria bapariitꞌeepɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara pꞌirabáiji mãikꞌaapa mimiaparíiji pɨchi tede chikꞌo kꞌoparii paraamerã.
Eperãpa ne–inaa neto atakꞌãri, mãgai: “Na netꞌaa kꞌachia baibɨda” ai, chiparipa edaara neto pëimerã. Mãpai mãgá neto atapꞌeda, tꞌãri o–ĩa beepari mãikꞌaapa ichi tꞌãridepai: “Pia bɨda” apari.
Piara bɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedeeitꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema nẽe, mãu pi–ia jõmaweda iru bai kꞌãyaara.
Eperãpa jararu pɨrã ichia kꞌĩra tewaraa tewe pꞌaaitꞌee, chi ɨ̃rɨpema pꞌaru jãri atadaipia bɨ, irua ma tewe pꞌaaru misa.
Kꞌũra bɨpa eperãpa chikꞌo atada warraa bɨ mĩda, chi itꞌai ipupa ipuru pɨkꞌa beepari.
Pɨa ne–inaa ooitꞌee pakꞌãri, kꞌawaa beerãmaa ũraa pia iidíji. Audupɨara mãga óoji jura chõonaitꞌee pakꞌãri.
Chĩara ãpɨte pedeeyaa baparipa ichia ũrida awaraarãmaa jarakꞌoonapari perã, mãgee eperã ome nipanáaji.
Eperãpa chi akꞌõremaa wa chi nawemaa pedee kꞌachia jararu pɨrã piudaridamerã, ma eperã piuitꞌee mãikꞌaapa audú pꞌãriu nɨ̃bɨde banaitꞌee.
Eperãpa chi akꞌõrepa atabëida audupai isapai jɨ̃a atakꞌãri, tꞌẽepai ma ne–inaa ome iru tꞌãri o–ĩa ba–e paitꞌee.
Jaranáaji: “Mɨmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda pari mɨa aukꞌa ooitꞌee.” Ma kꞌãyaara Tachi Akꞌõre juade ichiakꞌau bɨ́ji irua pɨ kꞌaripamerã ichia kꞌĩsia bɨkꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa unuamaa iru bapari eperãpa balanzade aukꞌa chaa–e bɨ mãikꞌaapa metropa aukꞌa chaa–e bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõrepapai kꞌawa bɨ eperã sãga bapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa irua ooitꞌee bɨ. Eperãpa pꞌoyaa kꞌawa–e ichi sãga bapariitꞌee.
Eperã ichi itu kꞌachiade baai Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee ne–inaa ooitꞌeeda apꞌeda, tꞌẽepai ooamaa beeru pɨrã.

Rey kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa baparipa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã ichi ikꞌaawaapa ãyaa pëipari, nãupa trigo e ãyaa ateeparikꞌa ɨtꞌaa batꞌadakꞌãri, mãikꞌaapa irua ãra ome oopari ruedapa ooparikꞌa ne–inaa ɨ̃rɨ wãyaakꞌãri.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperã jaure ooji lamparakꞌa bamerã tachi kꞌapꞌɨade. Ma lamparakꞌa bɨ kꞌaurepa irua kꞌawapari eperãpa tꞌãride kꞌĩsia bɨ.
Reypa ichi jua ekꞌari beerã kꞌinia pꞌe iru bɨ pɨrã mãikꞌaapa ãramaa wãarata jarapari pɨrã, apidaapa iru ichi mimiadeepa jëretꞌaada–e paitꞌee. Tꞌãri pia bairã ichi rey mimiade taarã baitꞌee.
Jõmaarãpa kꞌũtrãarã pia akꞌɨpata juataura pꞌanapata perã mãikꞌaapa chonaarã poro tꞌorroo pꞌanɨɨrã pia akꞌɨpata kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanapata perã.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia oopataarã wɨdakꞌãri, ma kꞌachia oodaamaa pꞌaneepata mãikꞌaapa ãchi kꞌĩsia kꞌachia wẽpapari.
Rey tꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõre juade bapari. Tachi Akꞌõrepa to weepiparikꞌa ichia weepi kꞌinia bɨmaa, mãga pɨkꞌa ichia reymaa kꞌĩsiapipari ooitꞌee ichia oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Eperã–itꞌee ichia ne–inaa oopari pia bɨ. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrépata kꞌawa bɨ ma eperã tꞌãri pia bɨ wa tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee piara bɨ eperã kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipapariimerã, irua oopi bɨkꞌa oomaa, ne–inaa iru–itꞌee paapii kꞌãyaara.
Audua nipapataarã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã ipuru pɨkꞌapata pꞌekꞌau kꞌachiapa, lámpara aceitepa ipurupatakꞌa.
Eperãpa ne–inaa ooitꞌee pia kꞌĩsiapꞌeda, ma ne–inaa ookꞌãri, ataitꞌee netꞌaa pia ichia kꞌinia bɨ. Mamĩda eperãarãpa isapai ne–inaa kꞌĩsia–ee oodakꞌãri, chupɨria pꞌaneedaitꞌee.
Eperã seewa jara bɨpa pꞌaratꞌara beekꞌãri, ma pꞌaratꞌa taarã–ee jõdaipari mãikꞌaapa ma seewa jara bɨ kꞌaurepa iru piuitꞌee.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa awaraarãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa, jõdaitꞌee. Mãga pꞌasaitꞌee ãchia Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oodaamaa pꞌanapata perã.
Eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bapari o jõree pɨkꞌa bɨde nipapari. Mamĩda eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari o jĩpꞌaa bɨde nipapari.
Piara bɨ te ãukꞌidaa sotejade bapariitꞌee, te waibɨa bɨde wẽra aupedeeyaa bapari ome bai kꞌãyaara.
Eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa baparipa ichita kꞌĩsiapari ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee. Ichi kꞌawa beerã paara chupɨria kꞌawakꞌaa.
Chĩara ooyaa bɨ miapidakꞌãri, warra chakꞌeerãkꞌa kꞌĩsiaparipa kꞌawaapari ma ne–inaa kꞌachia ooikꞌaraa bɨ. Jõdee eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨmaa jarateedakꞌãri, irua waapɨara kꞌawaa wãpari.
Tachi Akꞌõre, chi ichita ne–inaa jõma pia ooparipa akꞌɨpari ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã tede oomaa pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa ma kꞌaurepa ãra miapiitꞌee.
Eperãpa kꞌaripaamaa bɨ pɨrã ichimaa chupɨria beerãpa kꞌaripa iididakꞌãri, aukꞌa awaraarãpa kꞌaripadaamaa pꞌanadaitꞌee irua kꞌaripa iidikꞌãri.
Netꞌaa pia merã teekꞌãri pɨ ome kꞌĩrau bɨmaa, iru kꞌĩrau jõ wãitꞌee.
Charraarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã miapidakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã tꞌãri o–ĩadaipata. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia oopataarã pꞌera jõneepata.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerã ode nipapꞌeda, waa ma ode nipa kꞌinia–e beeru pɨrã, ma eperã piudaarã pꞌanɨmaa banaitꞌee.
Eperãpa jɨrɨkꞌãri ichia kꞌinia bɨ aupai ooitꞌee, chupɨria baitꞌee. Aukꞌa pꞌaneedaitꞌee vino toyaa beerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌera pia pꞌuruyaa beerã.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã miadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã kꞌãyaara. Ichiaba seewa–idaa beerã miadaitꞌee kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipapataarã kꞌãyaara.
Piara bɨ eujã pania wẽe bɨde banaitꞌee wẽra kꞌĩrauyaa mãikꞌaapa aupedeeyaa bɨ ome bai kꞌãyaara.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ tede netꞌaa pi–ia mãikꞌaapa aceite

Eperãpa jɨrɨkꞌãri kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa bapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa awaraarã kꞌinia iru bapariitꞌee, ma eperã pia bapariitꞌee. Ewari teesoo bapariitꞌee, ne–inaa pia iru bapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa awaraarãpa iru tꞌo pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa pꞌuuru murallapa pi–ia tꞌɨakꞌau bɨ pꞌoyaapari. Mamapema soldaorã chõoyaa pꞌanɨ pɨjida, chi kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ eerepemaarãpa ma pꞌuurudepema muralla ãrikꞌoopata jõkꞌoodarutamaa.
Eperã pedeei naaweda pia kꞌĩsiaru pɨrã, kꞌachiade baai–e paitꞌee ichia jarada kꞌaurepa.
Eperãpa ichita awaraarã ichi ekꞌariara akꞌɨkꞌãri, mãgɨ́ ãpɨte nãga jarapata: “Jãgɨ́ auduayaa mãikꞌaapa chĩara ooyaa baparida” apata.
Eperã kꞌoo–idaa bɨpa audú netꞌaa ata kꞌinia nɨ̃bɨ kꞌaurepa piuitꞌee, ichi juapa mimia kꞌiniakꞌaa perã.
Ewari chaa irua waa ata kꞌinia bapari. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãpa netꞌaa chokꞌara iru pꞌanapata tꞌãri piapa awaraarãmaa teedaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa unuamaa iru bapari ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa ne–animalaarã ateepata iru–itꞌee paapidaitꞌee. Audupɨara mãga bapari kꞌĩsia kꞌachia iru pꞌanɨde ma ne–inaa ateedakꞌãri.
Charraarã kꞌĩrapite eperãpa seewa jarakꞌãri, waa pedeepida–e paitꞌee. Mamĩda chi awaraarã pedee pia ũripari ichiakꞌau pedeepidaitꞌee.
Eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨpa seewata ichiata kꞌawa bɨda apari, kꞌãata ooipia bɨ. Mamĩda eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ooparipa ichita kꞌĩsiapari pedeei naaweda mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa ooi naaweda.
Kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapari, poro wẽsaa bapari wa ũraapari apidaapa Tachi Akꞌõre ome pꞌoyaada–e pai.
Eperãarãpa caballo juataura bee jɨrɨpata chõode wãdaitꞌee pakꞌãri. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrépata ãramaa ma chõo pꞌoyaapipari.
Piara bɨ tachi tꞌɨ̃ tꞌo pꞌanadamerã ne–inaa pia chokꞌara iru bai kꞌãyaara. Piara bɨ tachi pia akꞌɨdamerã pꞌaratꞌa wa nẽe iru bai kꞌãyaara.
Eperã pꞌaratꞌa paraa bɨ eperã chupɨria chɨ ome nãgá aukꞌa pꞌanɨ. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi omeeweda ooji.

Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa ne–inaa kꞌachia pꞌasa bɨ unukꞌãri, made tꞌĩukꞌaa. Mamĩda chi kꞌĩsia atua bɨpa ne–inaa kꞌachia pꞌasa bɨ unukꞌãri, jĩpꞌa wãpari aɨde tꞌĩuitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ma kꞌaurepa iru kꞌachiade baaipari.
Eperã audua–ee bakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre waawee bakꞌãri, irua netꞌaa pia iru bapari, awaraarãpa iru tꞌo pꞌanapata mãikꞌaapa iru ewari teesoo bapari.
Eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ wãpari o ne–ɨɨrɨ–idaa pɨkꞌa bɨ mãikꞌaapa trampa oga jira bɨde wãrúkꞌata bɨ, iru kꞌachiade baaipari perã. Mamĩda eperã kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipapari mãgeede baaikꞌaa.
Warra ma–ãri bɨmaa o pia jaratéeji. Mãgá iru chonaa pakꞌãri, ma o kꞌĩra atua–e paitꞌee.
Chupɨria beerã pꞌaratꞌara beerã jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata. Jõdee tewe paraa beerã pꞌaratꞌa prestapataarã jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata.
Eperãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia ookꞌãri, kꞌachiade baaiitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõre ma eperã ome kꞌĩrau bapꞌeda, ichi juapa iru jõtꞌaaitꞌee.
Eperãpa chĩara chupɨria kꞌawaakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa irumaa chikꞌo teekꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma eperã bendiciapari.
Eperãarã tꞌãideepa chĩara ooyaa bɨ jëretꞌaadakꞌãri, waa chõoda–e, aupedeeda–e mãikꞌaapa ikꞌachia pedee jarada–e.
Eperã tꞌãri jĩpꞌa nipakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri pia pedee jarakꞌãri, iru rey kꞌõpꞌãyo paitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ pia akꞌɨpari. Mamĩda irua oopikꞌaa seewa–idaa beerãpa kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanɨkꞌa oodaitꞌee.
Eperã kꞌoo–idaa bɨ mimiade wãamaapa nãga jarapari: “¡Taawa leonpa mɨ nɨmaa bɨda!” apari. “¡Calle jãde mɨ peetꞌaaitꞌee nɨmaa bɨda!” apari.
Wẽra taunemayaa bɨpa pedee jarapari uria nãpɨa pɨkꞌa bɨ chi ma pedee ũri bɨ–itꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩraupirutaarã ma uriade baaidaitꞌee.
Warrapa ne–inaa pariatua oopari kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bairã. Mamĩda wɨdakꞌãri, waaweepa mãgá ooamaa beepari.
Pꞌaratꞌa ata kꞌiniapa eperãpa chupɨria beerãmaa chupɨriara papiru pɨrã maa–e pɨrã pꞌaratꞌara beerãmaa netꞌaa pia teeru pɨrã, iruta chupɨria beeitꞌee.
Pia ũríji na ũraa pia kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãpa jaradapꞌedaa mãikꞌaapa mɨa jara bɨ pedee tꞌãride kꞌĩsiaparíiji.
Pia bɨ pɨchi tꞌãride mãikꞌaapa pɨchi porode na ũraa ɨa pɨkꞌa iru bapariimerã. Mãgá awaraarãmaa pɨa aukꞌa jarai.
Idi mɨa na ũraa pɨmaa kꞌawapiru Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapariimerã.
Mɨa pɨmaa na ũraa treinta pꞌã teeji; ũraa pia, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedee.
Na ũraa wãara perã, pɨa na pedee kꞌawaakꞌãri, pia pꞌanauitꞌee, apidaapa pɨmaa iidiru pɨrã kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨ.
Chupɨria chedeerã kꞌũranáaji ãra chupɨria pꞌanɨ perã mãikꞌaapa ãrapa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda–eeta charraarã kꞌĩrapite ateenáaji,
Tachi Akꞌõrépata ãra kꞌaripapari perã. Irua ãra chupɨria iru pꞌanapataarã miapiitꞌeepɨ.
Kꞌĩrauyaa pꞌanapataarã ome kꞌõpꞌãyo meraanáaji mãikꞌaapa mãgeerã ome nipanáaji.
Mãga ooru pɨrã, ãrapa oopatakꞌa pɨa oomaa beei mãikꞌaapa pɨ kꞌachiade baai.
Pedeeteenáaji chĩara tewe pꞌaaitꞌee.
Pɨa ma tewe pꞌaa–e pɨrã, pɨchi pꞌaru kꞌãipari paara jãri ata chedai.
Chonaarãpa lindero bɨdapꞌedaamãiipa awara ãyaa ateenáaji.
Eperãpa ichi mimia pia ookꞌãri, reyrã–itꞌee mimiapariitꞌee. Eperãarã jĩpꞌaarã–itꞌee mimia–e paitꞌee.
Poro waibɨa ome nekꞌoitꞌee su–akꞌɨ beekꞌãri, chikꞌo irua pɨmaa teeru pia akꞌɨ́ji.
Pɨ nekꞌoyaa bɨ pɨjida, waibɨa kꞌonáaji.
Iru chikꞌo warraa bɨ mĩda, kꞌɨ̃anáaji, ma kꞌaurepa irua pɨ kꞌũrai perã.
Audú mimianáaji pꞌaratꞌara bapariitꞌee. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa baparíiji mãikꞌaapa waa made kꞌĩsianáaji.
Eperãpa pꞌaratꞌa mãikꞌaapa netꞌaa pia atakꞌãri, taarã–ee jõdaipata. Nejɨ̃pɨ pajãde tꞌɨmɨ́ wãabaipꞌeda, wẽpadaiparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa ma netꞌaa pia taarã–ee wẽpadaipari.
Eperã ãtau pꞌãimaa bɨ ome nekꞌonáaji. Iru chikꞌo warraa bɨ mĩda, kꞌɨ̃anáaji.
Mãgee eperãpa ichita kꞌĩsiapari ne–inaa jõmasaa vale bɨde. Irua “nekꞌopáde” aru pɨjida mãikꞌaapa “ne–inaa topáde” aru pɨjida, wãara ichi tꞌãride pɨmaa teeamaa bɨ.
Iru chikꞌo kꞌoru pɨrã, ãpꞌotꞌaaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pɨa irumaa tꞌãri pia pedee jarada pari jarai.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ ome pedeenáaji, irua pɨ pedee ũriamaa baitꞌee perã.
Chonaarãpa lindero bɨdapꞌedaamãiipa ãyaa ateenáaji mãikꞌaapa akꞌõre wẽe beerã eujã jãri atanáaji.
Ãra kꞌaripapari jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Iruata ãra kꞌachiade baaipipataarã miapiitꞌee.
Tꞌãripa kꞌawáaji pɨmaa jarateepata mãikꞌaapa ũriparíiji kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãpa ũraapata.
Warrapa ne–inaa kꞌachia ookꞌãri, ũráaji waa mãga oonaamerã. Iru wɨda chokꞌara–ee wɨrupapai piu–epɨ.
Mãgá iru wɨru pɨrã, iru kꞌaripai piudaarãmaa wãnaamerã.
Warra, pɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beeru pɨrã, mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩa beeitꞌee.
Mɨ audú tꞌãri o–ĩa bapariitꞌee ũrikꞌãri pɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedee bɨ.
Pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru banáaji ãchia ne–inaa iru pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa. Ma kꞌãyaara ewari chaa ne–inaa pia ooparíiji Tachi Akꞌõre waaweepari perã.
Mãga ooru pɨrã, ewari cherude pɨa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa ichita pꞌasaitꞌee.
Warra, na ũraa pia ũríji. Mãgá pɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa o piade tꞌãri jĩpꞌa nipapariitꞌee.
Itꞌua toyaa beerã ome maa–e pɨrã nekꞌoyaa beerã ome nipanáaji.
Mãgee eperãarãpa itꞌua todapꞌeda mãikꞌaapa audú nekꞌodapꞌeda, tapꞌokꞌeepa audú kꞌãidaipata mãikꞌaapa mãga oo jõnɨpa chupɨria pꞌaneepata mãikꞌaapa pꞌaru soreta jɨ̃ pꞌaneepata.
Pɨ akꞌõre pedee ũriparíiji iruata pɨ ooda perã. Pɨ nawe chõtrãa pakꞌãri, yiaraa iru banáaji.
Neto pɨkꞌa atáji wãara pedee, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedee, poro wẽsaa pedee mãikꞌaapa ũraa pia. ¡Awaraarãmaa neto pɨkꞌanáaji!
Warrapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopariikꞌãri mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bakꞌãri, chi akꞌõre tꞌãri o–ĩa bapari.
¡Mãga baparíiji, pɨ akꞌõre pɨ nawe ome tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapataadamerã! ¡Mãgá pɨ tꞌoda tꞌãri o–ĩa bapiparíiji!
Warra, mɨa pɨmaa ũraa bɨ tꞌãripa ũriparíiji mãikꞌaapa mɨa ooparikꞌa ooparíiji.
Mɨa mãga jara bɨ prostituta uria nãpɨa pɨkꞌa bairã mãikꞌaapa wẽra taunemayaa bɨ pozo nãpɨa, pꞌĩrupꞌee pɨkꞌa bairã.
Ara nechɨayaa bɨpa ota nɨparikꞌa chi wãyaarutaarã netꞌaa jãri ataitꞌee, mãga pɨkꞌa mãgee wẽrapa nɨpari ɨmɨkꞌĩra kꞌũrapꞌeda, kꞌachiade baaipiitꞌee.

¿Kꞌáipata mɨ chupɨria nɨ̃bɨda aparima? ¿Kꞌaita jẽe nɨ̃baparima? ¿Kꞌaita aupedeeyaa nipaparima? ¿Kꞌáipata ikꞌachia pedee jara nipaparima? ¿Kꞌaita pariatua pꞌu oodaiparima? ¿Kꞌaita tau pꞌoree nipaparima?
Mãgee eperãarã vino toyaa pꞌanapata mãikꞌaapa jɨrɨ nipapata vino awaraa ne–inaa ome pꞌoirada todaitꞌee.
Maperã akꞌɨnáaji vino tau pꞌoree, vasode uchiterree ũu beekꞌãri. Kꞌĩsianáaji sãgá warraa ũu bɨ.
Mãgɨ́ topꞌeda, taama kꞌidakꞌapɨdariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa taamapa kꞌaakꞌãri, pꞌuapiparikꞌa pꞌuaitꞌee.
Jã vino toda kꞌaurepa pɨa ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo unuitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩsia kꞌachia kꞌĩsiaitꞌee.
Ara tokꞌesaa velero kꞌɨ̃de kꞌãi bɨ́kꞌata baitꞌee
mãikꞌaapa mãgaitꞌee: “¡Mɨ pꞌu oojida, mamĩda pꞌua senti–e paji! ¡Mɨ wɨjida, mamĩda kꞌawa–e paji, senti–e pada perã! ¿Sãapai ɨ̃rɨmaima aitꞌee, waya tonaitꞌee?”
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru banáaji ãrapa ne–inaa iru pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa. Ma awara kꞌĩsianáaji mãgeerã ome nipapariitꞌee
ãchi tꞌãridepai kꞌĩsiapata perã chĩaramaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee aupai pedeepata perã.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa ichi te pi–ia oopari.
Ma eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bairã netꞌaa pi–ia pꞌe atapari ichi te jãde bɨitꞌee.
Piara bɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa baitꞌee, juataura bai kꞌãyaara. Piara bɨ poro wẽsaa baitꞌee netꞌaa oo kꞌawaa bai kꞌãyaara.
Eperãpa jura chõoitꞌee pakꞌãri, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãmaa ũraa pia iidipari. Ãrapa ũraa pꞌanɨkꞌa ooru pɨrã, chõo pꞌoyaaitꞌee.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedee pꞌoyaa kꞌawakꞌaa. Mapa ichi pꞌuuru pidaarã chipꞌedaidakꞌãri, iru kꞌĩupꞌee beepari.
Eperãpa ichita kꞌĩsiakꞌãri ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee, awaraarãpa iru ãpɨte jarapata: “kꞌĩsia kꞌachia kꞌĩsiayaa bɨ”.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa kꞌĩsiapari pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooitꞌee. Eperãarãpa chĩara ooyaa beerã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapata.
Nepɨrade bɨde pɨ choo–e pɨrã, pɨ juatau wẽe bapari.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda–e pꞌanɨɨrã ateedakꞌãri piupidaitꞌee, ma eperãarã kꞌaripa atáji.

Pɨa jararu pɨjida: “Mɨa ma nepɨra kꞌawa–e bɨ,” Tachi Akꞌõrépata wãarata kꞌawa bɨ. Irua pɨ tꞌãridepema kꞌĩsia jõmaweda kꞌawa bɨ ichita pɨ akꞌɨpari perã. Iruata eperãpa ne–inaa ooda pari aukꞌa pꞌasapiitꞌee; ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda pari, ne–inaa kꞌachia mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa pia ooda pari, ne–inaa pia.
Warra, jɨrrɨ miéle senéji warraa bairã mãikꞌaapa pɨ kꞌĩramede ma jɨrrɨ tedepema miéle kꞌũ–ũa bairã.
Mãga pɨkꞌa pɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beeru pɨrã, pɨchi tꞌãride kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedee kꞌũ–ũa pɨkꞌa baitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ewari cherude pɨa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa pꞌasaitꞌee.
Oonáaji ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa oopatakꞌa pedeeteedakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari temaa wãdaitꞌee netꞌaa chɨade. Iru baparimãi ne–inaa kꞌachia oonáaji.
Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari baaida siete
O–ĩa banáaji pɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bapari kꞌachiade baaikꞌãri maa–e pɨrã nepɨrade baaikꞌãri.
Pɨa mãga ooru pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga unui mãikꞌaapa ma kꞌaurepa pɨ pia akꞌɨ–e pai, ma awara mãgɨ́ eperã ome waa kꞌĩrau ba–e pai.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã kꞌaurepa kꞌĩrau banáaji. Ijãadakꞌaa beerã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru banáaji ãrapa ne–inaa iru pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa pꞌoyaa nɨda–e Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi kꞌaripamerã, ma ijãadakꞌaa beerã kꞌĩidaridaitꞌee perã lámpara kꞌĩidaiparikꞌa.
Warra, Tachi Akꞌõre mãikꞌaapa tachi rey waawéeji. Ichita ãrapa oopi pꞌanɨkꞌa ooparíiji. Ma awara ãrapa oopi pꞌanɨkꞌa oodaamaa pꞌanapataarã ome nipanáaji
atu pꞌanɨde Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi rey ome mãgeerã miapidaitꞌee perã. ¿Kꞌaipa kꞌawaima ãrapa mãgeerãmaa kꞌãare ne–inaa kꞌachia oodai?
Ichiaba kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãpa nãgɨ́ ũraa jarajida.
Eperãarã charra kꞌĩrapite wãdakꞌãri, pia–e bɨ charrapa eperã aba pipɨara akꞌɨmerã apema kꞌãyaara.
Eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia oodamaa charrapa jararu pɨrã: “Pɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–e paji,” pꞌuuru pidaarã jõmaarãpa ma charra ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jaradaitꞌee.
Mamĩda charrapa chi ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda miapikꞌãri, iru o–ĩa bapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa eperãarãpa iru pia akꞌɨpataadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgee charra bendiciaitꞌee.
Eperãpa tachia iidi pꞌanɨ tꞌãri jĩpꞌa pꞌanaukꞌãri, tachi kꞌĩra ɨ̃rúkꞌata bɨ.
Pɨchi te oo atai naaweda, ma te bainɨ̃ bɨitꞌee bɨmãi pi–ia púji mãikꞌaapa aɨ ikꞌaawa bɨ eujãde ne–úuji. Maapꞌeda pɨchi te ooipia bɨ.
Pɨchi kꞌiniapai pɨ ikꞌaawa bapari ɨmɨateenáaji. Seewa jaranáaji iru kꞌachiade baaipiitꞌee.
Nãga jaranáaji: “Aukꞌa irumaa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee irua mɨmaa oodakꞌa. Iru ome kꞌĩra jõ–ee baitꞌee.”
Eperã kꞌoo–idaa bɨ ne–uu kꞌãide mɨ wãyaaji. Ma eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ uva kꞌãide nipaji.
Ma eujã ne–ɨɨrɨ–idaa, sirua baji. Ma eujãde mãupa tꞌɨakꞌauda ɨradai baji.
Mãga unukꞌãri, kꞌĩsia bapꞌeda, nãga kꞌawaaji:
Eperã kꞌãimokꞌaraa bɨ misa, arakꞌatɨa kꞌãi bɨ misa, arakꞌatɨa ɨ̃i bɨ misa mãikꞌaapa jua bɨra akꞌɨ nɨ̃bɨ misa,
iru chupɨria ne–inaa wẽe baibeeitꞌee chupɨria bakꞌajikꞌa nechɨ–idaa bɨ arma anipaparipa ichi netꞌaa jãri ata cheda paara.
Nãgɨ́ awaraa ũraa rey Salomonpa jarada. Nãgɨ́ ũraa pꞌãjida Judadepema rey Ezequías jua ekꞌari pꞌanadapꞌedaa ne–inaa pꞌãpatapꞌedaarãpa.

Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã, ichia eperãarãmaa ne–inaa jõma kꞌawapikꞌaa. Jõdee reyrã eperãarã poro waibɨarã perã, ne–inaa jõma kꞌawapi kꞌinia pꞌanapata jaradakꞌãri eperãarãpa oopata pia wa kꞌachia.
Pajã ɨtꞌɨa bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa eujãde uria nãpɨa bɨkꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa tachia rey kꞌĩsia pꞌoyaa kꞌawadakꞌaa.
Pꞌaratꞌadeepa nejarra ãyaa ataru pɨrã, netꞌaa pꞌaratꞌadee oo kꞌawaa bɨpa netꞌaa pi–ia oo atai.
Mãga pɨkꞌa rey kꞌĩrapiteepa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã ãyaa ataruta pɨrã, iru kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa mimiaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Rey kꞌĩrapite eperãarã poro waibɨakꞌa banáaji mãikꞌaapa akꞌɨnɨ̃ banáaji poro waibɨarã akꞌɨnɨ̃ pꞌanapatamãi.
Piara bɨ reypa pɨmaa jaramerã: “Nama mɨ kꞌaitꞌa su–akꞌɨ ba chéji” poro waibɨarã kꞌĩrapite irua jarai kꞌãyaara pɨ ãyaa wãmerã.
Charramaa isapai wãnáaji pɨa unuda jarade. Mãga ooikꞌaraa bɨ awaraa eperãpa jarai perã pɨ seewamaa bɨ mãikꞌaapa pɨ kꞌĩra nejasiapii.
Chĩara ome tꞌãri arree bakꞌãri, mãgɨ́ omepai pedéeji. Mamĩda parãpa pedeedapꞌedaa awaraa eperãmaa jaranáaji.
Mãga ooru pɨrã, chi pɨ ome pedee badapa pɨ kꞌĩra nejasiapii ma pedee jarakꞌoonada kꞌaurepa mãikꞌaapa maadamãiipa apidaapa pɨmaa nepɨrɨda–e paitꞌee.
Awaraa eperãpa pɨa ũraa pia jara bɨ ũri kꞌinia bakꞌãri, ma ũraa manzana nẽedee ooda pꞌaratꞌapa pꞌẽedákꞌapɨ bɨ.

Irua kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa ũraa pia jara bɨ audú ũri kꞌinia bakꞌãri, ɨtrɨa pedee jararu pɨjida, chi ũri bɨ–itꞌee ma ũraa sortija nẽe piara bɨdee ooda wa awaraa chi–oo jɨ̃pata nẽe piara bɨdee oodákꞌapɨ bɨ.
Ne–uudapꞌedaa ewapata ewari mimiaparipa pania kꞌũrasaa topꞌeda, o–ĩa beeparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa eperã o–ĩa beepari ichia chokꞌa pëidapa ichia jara pëida kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa jaranakꞌãri.
Jɨ̃arara nɨ̃bɨde mãikꞌaapa nãumiara nɨ̃bɨde maarepida kꞌoi che–e bɨkꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa bɨ eperãpa ne–inaa teeitꞌeeda apꞌeda, maarepida tee–e pakꞌãri.
Eperãpa ichi tꞌãride kꞌĩrau–ee chooru pɨrã, ichi poro waibɨamaa kꞌĩsia awara kꞌĩsiapii. Mãgɨ́ poro waibɨapa iru pedee ũriamaa bɨ pɨjida, irumaa tꞌãri pia pedeeru pɨrã, irua ma pedee ũriitꞌee.
Jɨrrɨ miéle unuru pɨrã, waibɨa senenáaji maa–e pɨrã audú sene bɨpa ãpꞌodariitꞌee.
Mãga pɨkꞌa pɨchi kꞌõpꞌãyo temaa audupai wãnáaji, maa–e pɨrã iru sẽdarii mãikꞌaapa pɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru beei.
Charra kꞌĩrapite eperãpa ichi kꞌõpꞌãyo ãpɨte seewa jarakꞌãri, iru pakꞌuru choma bɨpa wɨmaa bɨkꞌa bɨ maa–e pɨrã espadapa sumaa bɨkꞌa bɨ maa–e pɨrã miasupa sumaa bɨkꞌa bɨ.
Eperã nepɨrade nɨ̃bɨde awaraapa iru kꞌaripaitꞌeeda apꞌeda, kꞌaripa–e pakꞌãri, iru–itꞌee kꞌida kꞌõradakꞌa wa bɨɨrɨ bɨadákꞌapɨ bɨ.
Eperã tꞌãri pꞌua bɨmaa kꞌarikꞌãri, iru tꞌudade vinagre weerúkꞌapɨ bɨ maa–e pɨrã iru jĩsua nɨ̃bɨde iru pꞌaru jãri atarúkꞌata bɨ.
Pɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bɨ jarrapa bɨ pɨrã, irumaa chikꞌo téeji kꞌomerã. Pania opisia bɨ pɨrã, pania téeji tomerã.
Mãga ooru pɨrã, pɨa iru kꞌĩra nejasiapii. Ma awara mãga ooda pari Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨmaa ne–inaa pia ooitꞌee.
Nãumia chekꞌãri, pꞌusara nɨ̃beeparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa eperãpa chĩara ãpɨte seewa jarakꞌãri, iru ome awaraarã kꞌĩraudaipata.
Piara bɨ te ãukꞌidaa sotejade bapariitꞌee, te waibɨa bɨde wẽra aupedeeyaa bapari ome bai kꞌãyaara.
Eperã o pꞌoo nɨ̃bɨpa pania kꞌũrasaa tokꞌãri, o–ĩadaiparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa tꞌɨmɨɨpa pedee pia jara chedakꞌãri, tachi o–ĩadaipata.

Pania poátrɨ uchia bɨmãiipa nejarra ome uchiaparikꞌa maa–e pɨrã pania kꞌõdoo bɨ pozo bɨmãiipa uchiaparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa bɨ eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨmaa kꞌũrapikꞌãri.
Pia–e bɨ audupai jɨrrɨ miéle seneitꞌee. Ichiaba pia–e bɨ jɨrɨitꞌee awaraarãpa pɨ tꞌo pꞌanadamerã.
Eperãpa pariatua ichia kꞌiniata ookꞌãri, ma eperã pꞌuuru murallapa tꞌɨakꞌau–ee bɨ́kꞌapɨ bɨ.
Eujã wãsia bakꞌãri, nieve baaiikꞌaraa bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa pꞌoojarade ne–uudapꞌedaa ewapata ewari pakꞌãri, kꞌoi cheikꞌaraa bɨkꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa eperãarãpa kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ tꞌo pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ.
Ipana chakꞌe abaamãi su–akꞌɨ beekꞌaakꞌa pariatua wãabai nipapari perã, mãga pɨkꞌa eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–ee bɨmaa pedee kꞌachia jarakꞌãri, ma pedee jaradapa iru kꞌachiade baaipi–e paitꞌee.
Caballo soopa wɨpatakꞌa mãikꞌaapa burro itꞌaide freno bɨpatakꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa ¡eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ potrepa wɨdaipia bɨ!
Kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ pedeeparikꞌa pariatua pꞌanaunáaji maa–e pɨrã pɨ jida irukꞌa kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–eedarii.
Kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ pariatua pedeekꞌãri, kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌanáuji irua kꞌĩsianaamerã iruata kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedee kꞌawa bɨ.
Eperãpa kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ ome pedee jara pëikꞌãri, ichi bɨɨrɨ tꞌɨapꞌekꞌoorúkꞌapɨ bɨ maa–e pɨrã chõo jɨrɨrúkꞌapɨ bɨ.
Kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa ũraakꞌãri, ma ũraa eperã bɨɨrɨ chiwa bɨ pꞌoyaa tꞌɨa–e bɨ́kꞌapɨ bɨ.
Vale–e bɨkꞌa mãu hondade jɨ̃ bɨdaitꞌee, mãga pɨkꞌa vale–e bɨ eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ tꞌo pꞌanadaitꞌee.
Kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa ũraa jarada ne–ɨɨrɨ eperã itꞌuapa piu bɨ juade awa bɨkꞌa bɨ.
Eperãpa kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨmaa wa ichi te ikꞌaawa wãyaa wãmaa mimia teeru pɨrã pꞌaratꞌa pari, ematrɨmapa pariatua ichi kꞌĩrapite wãyaarutaarãmaa trɨmaa bɨ́kꞌata bɨ.
Usapa ichi ãpꞌoda kꞌoparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa ne–inaa pariatua oopari.
¿Pɨa unudookꞌã eperãpa ichi itu jara bɨ: “Mɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara kꞌĩsia kꞌawaara bapari”? Kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ piara bɨ mãgee eperã kꞌãyaara.
Mimiade wãamaapa eperã kꞌoo–idaa bɨpa nãga jarapari: “¡Mɨ pꞌoyaa uchia–e león calle jãde bairã!”
Puerta chi bisagrapa pꞌɨrrabaipiparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa eperã kꞌoo–idaa bɨ pɨrabai nɨ̃bapari ichi pꞌaru kꞌãiparide.
Eperã kꞌoo–idaa bɨpa ichi jua pꞌaratꞌude tꞌɨpari. Mamĩda audú kꞌoo–idaa bairã, pꞌoyaa ichi jua atee–e itꞌaide.
Eperã kꞌoo–idaa bɨpa kꞌĩsiapari ichita kꞌĩsia kꞌawaara bɨ eperãarã siete
Chĩara aupedee jõnɨde tꞌĩuitꞌee usa chipari wẽe bɨ kꞌɨɨrɨde jita atarúkꞌata bɨ.
Eperã poro kꞌawa–ee bɨpa pariatua sia kꞌida tꞌɨpɨtau ome trɨparikꞌa,
mãga pɨkꞌa bɨ eperã chi kꞌõpꞌãyo kꞌũrapꞌeda, jarakꞌãri: “¡Jĩpꞌa mɨ jemene bajipɨ!”
Tꞌɨpɨ wẽe tꞌɨpɨtau kꞌĩidaipari. Mãga pɨkꞌa pedee–idaa bɨ wẽ–e pakꞌãri, nepɨra jõdaipari.
Okꞌokꞌĩra urua bɨpa maa–e pɨrã tꞌɨpɨpa tꞌɨpɨtau uruapiparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa eperã aupedeeyaa bɨpa nepɨra jɨrɨpari.
Eperãpa ne–inaa kꞌũa kꞌo kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa eperãarãpa chĩara ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jarada ũri kꞌinia pꞌanapata.
Eperãpa seewata pedee sia jarakꞌãri, kꞌuuru yoorodee ooda mãikꞌaapa taawaikꞌa eere pꞌaratꞌapa pꞌẽedákꞌapɨ bɨ.
Pɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bɨpa pɨmaa pedee pia jararu pɨjida, ichi tꞌãride kꞌĩsia kꞌachia iru bapari.
Iwarraa pedee jararu pɨjida, ijãanáaji, ichi tꞌãride ne–inaa audú kꞌachia ooitꞌee kꞌĩsia bairã.
Ichi tꞌãride kꞌĩsia kꞌachia merã bɨ pɨjida, pꞌuuru pidaarã chipꞌedaidakꞌãri, iru kꞌĩsia kꞌachia kꞌawaa atadaitꞌee.
Eperãpa uria kꞌoro ataru pɨrã chĩara aɨde baaimerã, ichita ma uriade baaiitꞌee. Ichiaba mãu choma bɨ pɨratꞌaaru pɨrã chĩara ɨ̃rɨ baaimerã, ichita ma mãupa chiratꞌɨ ataitꞌee.
Eperãpa chĩaramaa seewa jarakꞌãri, ma eperã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bɨ. Iwarraa pedeekꞌãri, kꞌĩsia bɨ ma eperãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee.
Jaranáaji: “Nu mɨa ne–inaa ooitꞌee” pɨa kꞌawa–ee bairã kꞌãata pꞌasaitꞌee aɨ norema.
Awaraa eperãpa jaraipia bɨ pɨa ne–inaa pia ooda, pɨchi itu mãga jarai kꞌãyaara.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ kꞌĩraudaikꞌãri, ichia pariatua ne–inaa oo bɨ chɨkꞌɨara pɨkꞌa bɨ, mãu chɨkꞌɨa wa ipu nãusaa chɨkꞌɨa bai kꞌãyaara.

Eperã kꞌĩrau bakꞌãri, awaraarãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopari mãikꞌaapa audupɨara kꞌĩrau bakꞌãri, perá iru ome pꞌoyaa chooda–e. Mamĩda apidaapa pꞌoyaa chooda–e eperãpa awaraa kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bakꞌãri irua ne–inaa iru bɨ kꞌaurepa.
Piara bɨ awaraapa pɨ jĩpꞌa ɨtrɨamerã, seewata pɨ kꞌinia iru bɨda ai kꞌãyaara.
Piara bɨ pɨ kꞌõpꞌãyopa pɨ ɨtrɨamerã pɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bɨpa seewata pɨ kꞌĩra ɨ̃i kꞌãyaara.
Eperã bi jãwaa bakꞌãri, miéle jida seneamaa bapari. Mamĩda jarrapa bakꞌãri, ne–inaa asia bɨ pɨjida kꞌũ–ũa pɨkꞌa bɨ kꞌokꞌãri.
Eperã ichi tedeepa tꞌɨmɨ́ nipapari ipana ichi tedeepa tꞌɨmɨ́ nipaparíkꞌapɨ bɨ.
Kꞌera pꞌurukꞌãri maa–e pɨrã ne–inaa tꞌũa bapari paakꞌãri, eperã tꞌãri o–ĩa beeparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa tꞌãri o–ĩa beepari ichi kꞌõpꞌãyopa ichimaa ũraa pia jarakꞌãri.

Atabëináaji pɨchi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã mãikꞌaapa pɨ akꞌõre kꞌõpꞌãyoorã. Nepɨra iru bakꞌãri, pɨchi ɨ̃pema temaa wãnáaji. Piara bɨ kꞌaripa iidiitꞌee pɨ ikꞌaawa pꞌanapataarãmaa, ɨ̃pema tꞌɨmɨ́ baparimaa iidinai kꞌãyaara.
Warra, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa baparíiji. Mãgá mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩa baitꞌee mãikꞌaapa mɨmaa pedee kꞌachia jaradakꞌãri, pia pꞌanauitꞌee.

Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa ne–inaa kꞌachia pꞌasa bɨ unukꞌãri, made tꞌĩukꞌaa. Mamĩda chi kꞌĩsia atua bɨpa ne–inaa kꞌachia pꞌasa bɨ unukꞌãri, jĩpꞌa wãpari aɨde tꞌĩuitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ma kꞌaurepa iru kꞌachiade baaipari.
Eperãpa jararu pɨrã ichia kꞌĩra tewaraa tewe pꞌaaitꞌee, chi ɨ̃rɨpema pꞌaru jãri atadaipia bɨ, irua ma tewe pꞌaaru misa.
Eperãpa tapꞌedaweda pedee pia golpe jararu pɨrã ichi kꞌaitꞌa baparimaa, mãgɨpa pedee kꞌachiakꞌa ũriitꞌee.
Wẽra aupedeeyaa bɨ ewari ãree te porosãudeepa kꞌoi tau tꞌeutꞌewaa nɨ̃baparíkꞌapɨ bɨ.
Iru kꞌĩupꞌeepiitꞌee nãu jita atarukꞌa maa–e pɨrã aceite juaraarepema juade jita atarúkꞌata bɨ.
Ne–inaa hierrodee ooda awaraa hierropa erapatakꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa ɨmɨkꞌĩra abaapa awaraa ɨmɨkꞌĩramaa kꞌĩsia pia kꞌĩsiapipari.
Eperãpa higuera pakꞌuru pia akꞌɨru pɨrã, higojõ jõitꞌee. Mãga pɨkꞌa eperãpa ichi poro waibɨa pia akꞌɨru pɨrã, mãgɨpa iru pia ooitꞌee.
To jãde tachi kꞌĩra akꞌɨkꞌãri, unuparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa awaraarãpa tachia ne–inaa oopata unudakꞌãri, kꞌawadai tachi tꞌãri pia pꞌanɨ wa tꞌãri kꞌachia pꞌanɨ.
Piudaarã pꞌanɨmãiipa eperãarã kꞌɨ̃a pɨkꞌaparikꞌa ichimaa ateeitꞌee, mãga pɨkꞌa eperãpa ichita netꞌaa waapɨara kꞌɨ̃apari.
Eperãarãpa nẽe mãikꞌaapa pꞌaratꞌa tꞌɨpɨtaude torrabaipatakꞌa kꞌawaadaitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia, mãga pɨkꞌa eperãmaa pedee pia jaradakꞌãri, kꞌawaadaitꞌee iru audua bɨ wa audua–e bɨ.
Arrosa pilonde pakꞌurupa piarsĩpatakꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–e bɨ pakꞌurupa wɨruta pɨjida, ichita kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–e baitꞌee.
Pɨchi ovejaarã mãikꞌaapa cabraarã pia akꞌɨparíiji
pɨa netꞌaa pia iru bɨ ichita iru ba–e paitꞌee perã.

Pꞌũajara ɨtꞌɨa pꞌoo bee unukꞌãri, tꞌɨapꞌéji, ee jẽra bɨdepema pꞌũajara ome mãikꞌaapa ɨa bɨ́ji tꞌẽepai pɨchi ne–animalaarãpa kꞌodamerã. Mãpai waya tꞌonokꞌãri, pɨchi oveja chakꞌeerã cabra chakꞌeerã ome made kꞌopataadaitꞌee.
Ma ovejaarã kꞌara tꞌɨɨpꞌedakꞌãri, madeepa pɨchi pꞌaru kꞌapii mãikꞌaapa ma cabra ũkꞌuru netopꞌeda, pꞌaratꞌa atai eujã waapɨara neto ataitꞌee.
Ma awara cabra juba iru bai pɨa, pɨchideerãpa mãikꞌaapa wẽraarã pɨ–itꞌee mimiapataarãpa todamerã.
Eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ ichita miru nipapari, apidaapa iru jɨrɨda–e pꞌanɨ mĩda. Jõdee eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari pꞌerakꞌaa; león pꞌera–ee baparikꞌa.

Pꞌuuru pidaarãpa ãchi poro waibɨapa jara bɨkꞌa oodaamaa pꞌanadakꞌãri, irua poro waibɨarã chokꞌara bɨpari ichi kꞌaripadamerã. Mamĩda poro waibɨa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa, poro wẽsaa bakꞌãri, pꞌuuru pidaarã ichi jua ekꞌari taarã pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Eperãarã poro waibɨapa chupɨria beerã ichi jua ekꞌari kꞌachia iru bakꞌãri, iru nãga bɨ: kꞌoi golpe chekꞌãri, ne–uudapꞌedaa jõtꞌaaparíkꞌata bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõre ley ũridaamaa pꞌanapataarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã pia akꞌɨpata. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre leyde jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãpa mãgeerã pia akꞌɨdakꞌaa.

Ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa kꞌawadakꞌaa sãgá charraarãpa akꞌɨpata eperãarãpa oopata jaradaitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Mamĩda chi jɨrɨpataarãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa leyde jara bɨkꞌa oodaitꞌee mãga pia kꞌawapata.
Piara bɨ chupɨria, tꞌãri jĩpꞌa bapariitꞌee pꞌaratꞌara, ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bai kꞌãyaara.
Warrapa Tachi Akꞌõre leyde jara bɨkꞌa ookꞌãri, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beepari. Jõdee warra pꞌaratꞌa pariatua gastapataarã ome nipakꞌãri, chi akꞌõre kꞌĩra nejasiapipari.
Eperãpa pꞌaratꞌa prestapꞌeda, aɨ ɨ̃rɨ pꞌaapiru pɨrã, ma pꞌaratꞌa chupɨria beerã chupɨria kꞌawaayaa bɨ juade beeitꞌee.
Eperãpa Tachi Akꞌõre leyde jara bɨkꞌa ooamaa bɨ pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa irua ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ bɨ ũriamaa baitꞌee.
Eperãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã o kꞌachiade ateeru pɨrã, ichi itu ichia kꞌachia ooitꞌee kꞌĩsia iru badade baaiitꞌee. Mamĩda chi kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipapataarãpa ne–inaa pia jɨ̃adaitꞌee.
Eperã pꞌaratꞌara bɨpa kꞌĩsiapari ichita awaraarã kꞌãyaara kꞌĩsia kꞌawaara bɨ. Mamĩda chupɨria chɨ poro wẽsaa bakꞌãri, kꞌawapii ma pꞌaratꞌa paraa bɨ wãara kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã eperãarã poro waibɨarã pꞌaneedakꞌãri, eperãarãpa fiesta waibɨa oopata. Mamĩda ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa pꞌoyaadakꞌãri, eperãarã mirukꞌoodaipata.

Eperãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopꞌeda, Tachi Akꞌõremaa ichia ooda jaraamaa beekꞌãri, kꞌachiade baaiitꞌee. Mamĩda eperãpa ichia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooda jarakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa mãga oo amaa beekꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru chupɨria kꞌawaaitꞌee.
Eperã ichita Tachi Akꞌõre waawee bakꞌãri, tꞌãri o–ĩa bapari. Mamĩda chi kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua bɨ kꞌachiade baaipariitꞌee.
Eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨpa chupɨria chedeerã ichi jua ekꞌari kꞌachia iru bakꞌãri, ma eperã león bia nɨ̃bɨ́kꞌapɨ bɨ maa–e pɨrã osopa tachimaa orra bɨ́kꞌapɨ bɨ.
Eperãarã poro waibɨa kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bakꞌãri, ichi jua ekꞌari beerã audupai chupɨria iru bapari. Mamĩda chi pꞌaratꞌa jitaamaa baparipa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda pari ewari teesoo bapariitꞌee.
Eperã chĩara peeda, abaamãi bakꞌaa. Ichi piurumaa awara ãi nipapariitꞌee. Apidaapa iru kꞌaripadaikꞌaraa bɨ.
Eperã tꞌãri jĩpꞌa nipakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru kꞌaripapari. Mamĩda chĩara kꞌũrayaa bapari kꞌachiade baaiitꞌee.
Eperã ichi eujãde mimiaparipa nekꞌoitꞌee waibɨa iru baitꞌee. Mamĩda kꞌoo–idaa beerã ome niparu pɨrã, chupɨria, chikꞌo wẽe bapariitꞌee.
Eperã kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru bendiciapari. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa chi pꞌaratꞌa atai awaa bapari miapiitꞌee.
Eperã aba piara akꞌɨdaikꞌaraa bɨ awaraa kꞌãyaara. Mamĩda ũkꞌuru eperãarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oodai pan pite abaa pari.
Eperãpa netꞌaa ichi–itꞌee aupai ataparipa audú pꞌaratꞌa ata kꞌinia bapari. Mamĩda kꞌawa–e bɨ ma kꞌaurepa ichi chupɨria beeitꞌee.
Taarã pakꞌãri, tachia piara akꞌɨdaitꞌee tachi ɨtrɨada, tachimaa imeraa pedee bada kꞌãyaara.
Eperãpa chi akꞌõre wa chi nawe netꞌaa chɨapꞌeda, kꞌĩsiaru pɨrã: “Mɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–ee baji”, ma eperã kꞌõpꞌãyo nechɨ–idaa beerã ome.
Eperã netꞌaa atai awaa bapari jõmaarã ome aupedeepari. Mamĩda chi Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapari pia bapari.
Eperãpa ichi kꞌĩsiadepai ijãa bakꞌãri, ma eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ. Jõdee eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bakꞌãri, ma eperã kꞌachiade baai–e paitꞌee.
Eperãpa chupɨria beerã kꞌaripakꞌãri, ichi–itꞌee ne–inaa falta–e paitꞌee. Mamĩda chi chupɨria beerã kꞌaripaamaa bɨmaa pedee kꞌachia jarapataadaitꞌee.
Ijãadakꞌaa beerã eperãarã poro waibɨarã pꞌaneedakꞌãri, eperãarã mirukꞌoodaipata. Mamĩda mãgeerã jõdaidakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã eperãarã poro waibɨarã pꞌaneedaitꞌee.
Eperã ipꞌiipai ɨtrɨadapꞌeda, atꞌãri kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua bɨ pɨrã, taarã–ee jõdariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa irua pꞌoyaa maarepida oo–e pai mãgá jõnaamerã.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãpa ãchi jua ekꞌari pꞌanapataarã pia akꞌɨdakꞌãri, ma pꞌuuru pidaarã tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapata. Mamĩda ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa ãchi jua ekꞌari pꞌanapataarã pia akꞌɨda–e pꞌanadakꞌãri, ma pꞌuuru pidaarã chupɨriapa jẽepata.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bakꞌãri, chi akꞌõre tꞌãri o–ĩa bapari. Mamĩda chi prostitutaarã ome nipapari; ichi pꞌaratꞌa pariatua jõpari.
Reypa ichi jua ekꞌari pꞌanapataarã tꞌãri jĩpꞌa akꞌɨkꞌãri, ãra pia pꞌanapata. Mamĩda chi impuesto audú pꞌaapiparipa ichi jua ekꞌari pꞌanapataarã kꞌachiade baaipipari.
Eperãpa awaraamaa audú iwarraa pedeeru pɨrã, trampa ogamaa pɨkꞌa bɨ chi apema aɨde baaimerã.
Eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ trampade bɨ́kꞌapɨ bɨ ichia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopari kꞌaurepa. Mamĩda chi Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopari tꞌãri o–ĩapa kꞌaripari.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãpa chupɨria beerã chupɨria kꞌawaapata. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa chupɨria beerãdé maarepida kꞌĩsiadakꞌaa.
Chõo jɨrɨyaa beerãpa pꞌuuru pidaarã kꞌĩraupipata. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãpa ãchi pꞌuuru pidaarã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapipata.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ ome nepɨra iru pꞌanɨde, pedee kꞌachia jararu pɨjida maa–e pɨrã ëiru pɨjida, maarepida ma nepɨradeepa uchiada–e.
Chĩara peeyaa beerãpa kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌanapataarã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapata. Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã jɨrɨpata peedaitꞌee.
Eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ kꞌĩraudaipari mãikꞌaapa pariatua ne–inaa oopari, kꞌĩsia–ee. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ ichi tꞌãride choopari, kꞌĩrau–ee.
Eperãarã poro waibɨapa seewa jara pꞌanɨ ijãakꞌãri, ichi jua ekꞌari mimiapataarã aukꞌa seewa–idaa pꞌaneepata.
Eperã chupɨria bɨ nãgɨ́ ne–inaade aukꞌa bɨ eperãpa iru kꞌachia iru bapari ome. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi tau aukꞌa ooji akꞌɨdamerã.
Reypa ichi jua ekꞌari pꞌanapataarã jõmaarãpa oopata akꞌɨkꞌãri, chupɨria beerãpa oopata awaraarãpa oopata kꞌãyaara kꞌachiara bɨda a–e pɨrã jĩpꞌa ãra chupɨria pꞌanadairã, iru ichita rey paitꞌee.
Eperãpa ichi warra wɨkꞌãri ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda kꞌaurepa, ma warra kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa baitꞌee. Mamĩda ichiakꞌau bɨru pɨrã, ma warrapa chi nawe kꞌĩra nejasiapiitꞌee.
Ijãadakꞌaa beerã chokꞌaraara pꞌaneedakꞌãri, ichiaba pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia chokꞌaraara uchiapata. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãpa mãgeerã kꞌachiade baairuta unudaitꞌee.
Pɨ warrapa ne–inaa kꞌachia ookꞌãri, ɨtrɨ́aji. Mãgá iru pɨ ome kꞌãiwee bapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pɨ tꞌãri o–ĩapiitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre ley wẽe pꞌanɨmãi pariatua pꞌanapata. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre leyde jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapata.
Pedeepapai pɨ esclavo kꞌĩsia awara kꞌĩsiapi–e. Pɨ pedee ũri bɨ mĩda, irua oo–e paitꞌee pɨa jara bɨkꞌa.
¿Pɨa unudookꞌã eperãarã kꞌĩsia–ee pedeepataarã pedee pꞌanadakꞌãri? Kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ piara bɨ mãgee eperã kꞌãyaara.
Eperãpa ichi esclavo warraweda audú kꞌinia iru bɨ pɨrã, tꞌẽepai kꞌĩra pia–ee baitꞌee ma esclavo kꞌaurepa.
Eperã kꞌĩrauyaa bɨpa jõmaarã ome aupedeepari mãikꞌaapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooi awaa bapari.
Eperã audua bakꞌãri, kꞌĩra nejasia beeitꞌee. Mamĩda eperãarãpa audua–ee beerã pia akꞌɨ pꞌanapata.
Eperãpa nechɨayaa bɨ kꞌariparu pɨrã, ichi itu kꞌachiade baaiitꞌee, charra kꞌĩrapite ateedakꞌãri juraamerã wãara pedee jaraitꞌee, iru kꞌĩupꞌee beeitꞌee perã.
Pɨa eperãarã waawee bɨ pɨrã, trampade pɨkꞌa bɨ. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre waawee bɨ pɨrã, irua pɨ kꞌaripaitꞌee.
Eperãarã chokꞌara wãpata ãchi poro waibɨarãmaa chupɨria iidide. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepapai eperãarãpa oopata akꞌɨpari kꞌawaitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapata. Mãga pɨkꞌa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oopataarã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapata.
Jaqué warra Agurpa nãgɨ́ kꞌĩsia paraa pedee jaraji: “Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨ audú sẽ nɨ̃bɨ mãikꞌaapa juatau wẽe nɨ̃bɨ.
Mɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–eera bɨ. Awaraa eperãarã kꞌĩsiapatakꞌa mɨ kꞌĩsiakꞌaa.
Apidaapa mɨmaa jarateeda–e paji kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bamerã. Mapa mɨa chi kꞌachia wẽe bapari kꞌawa–e bɨ.

¿Kꞌaita ɨtꞌaa wãpꞌeda, waya na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee chejima? ¿Kꞌaipa nãu jita atapꞌeda, ichi jua jãde paraju iru beeima? ¿Kꞌaipa pꞌusa ichi pꞌarude pɨraju iru beeima? ¿Kꞌaipa na pꞌekꞌau eujã i bɨjima waawí wãnaamerã? ¡Iru tꞌɨ̃ mãikꞌaapa chi warra tꞌɨ̃ kꞌawa bɨ pɨrã, jaráji!
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada pedee jõmaweda pia bɨ, ma pedee wãara perã. Irua jɨ̃apari chi ichide ijãapataarã.
Iru pedee awara, awaraa jaranáaji. Mãga ooru pɨrã, irua pɨ ɨtrɨaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa akꞌɨpiitꞌee pɨ seewa–idaa bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa ne–inaa omeepai iidi bɨ pɨa oomerã mɨ piui naaweda. Mɨmaa mãga oo–eda anáaji.
Mɨ ikꞌaawaapa seewa jarapataarã ãyaa atéeji apida kꞌũra kꞌinia–e bairã mãikꞌaapa mɨ chupɨria maa–e pɨrã pꞌaratꞌara papináaji. Jĩpꞌa kꞌinia bɨ ewari chaa pɨa mɨmaa chikꞌo teemerã.
Maa–e pɨrã pꞌaratꞌara beeru pɨrã, pɨ kꞌĩra atuadarii. Jõdee netꞌaa wẽe bɨ pɨrã, chĩara netꞌaa chɨamaa beei mãikꞌaapa mãgá pɨ kꞌĩrapite ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi.
Esclavo ãpɨte ikꞌachia pedee jaranáaji chipari kꞌĩrapite. Mãga ooru pɨrã, ma esclavopa pɨmaa pedee kꞌachia jarai mãikꞌaapa pɨ kꞌachiade baaipii.
Paraa eperãarã chi akꞌõremaa pedee kꞌachia jarapata mãikꞌaapa chi nawemaa pedee pia jaradakꞌaa.
Ichiaba paraa eperãarã nãga kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ: ‘Tai tꞌãri pia pꞌanɨda’ apata. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mãgeerãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata.
Ichiaba paraa nãgee eperãarã: kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ ãchita awaraarã kꞌãyaara pipɨara pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa awaraarã ekꞌariara unupata.

Ichiaba paraa eperãarã chupɨria beerã ãchi jua ekꞌari kꞌachia iru pꞌanapata. Mãgeerã kꞌida espadákꞌapɨ bee mãikꞌaapa ãchi idatꞌu lowerókꞌapɨ bee na eujãdepema chupɨria beerã kꞌo pɨkꞌapata perã ãra kꞌũradakꞌãri jõpirutamaa.
Ĩkꞌapa kꞌaurã omé iru bɨ. Mãgɨɨrãpa irumaa jarapata: “Mɨmaa téeji, mɨmaa téeji”.
Ne–inaa õpee paraa o–ĩa pꞌanadakꞌaa waa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ perã; ma õpee eerepemapa pida jãgapaida akꞌaa.
Nãga pꞌanɨ: jãɨra; wẽra warra tꞌokꞌaa bɨ; eujã pania iru bɨ mĩda, waa kꞌinia bapari mãikꞌaapa tꞌɨpɨtaupa ichita netꞌaa waapɨara paa jõ kꞌinia bapari.
Warrapa chi akꞌõre oo iru bɨ pɨrã mãikꞌaapa chi nawe pedee ũriamaa bɨ pɨrã, eujã jewedaadepema cuervoorãpa iru tau ẽtꞌa atadaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa ãkosoorãpa iru kꞌapꞌɨa piuda kꞌodaipia bɨ.
Mɨ pꞌera pɨkꞌa beepari ne–inaa õpeede kꞌĩsiakꞌãri; ma ne–inaa õpee eerepema jida mɨa pꞌoyaa kꞌawakꞌaa.
Nãga pꞌanɨ: nejɨ̃pɨ ɨtꞌɨ́ wãabaikꞌãri; taama mãu ɨ̃rɨ bipa urtꞌĩu nipakꞌãri; barco tokꞌesaa wãkꞌãri mãikꞌaapa ɨmɨkꞌĩra wẽra ome pedida pedeekꞌãri.
Nãga bapari wẽra taunemayaa bɨ. Nekꞌopꞌeda, ichi itꞌai jaripari mãikꞌaapa nãga jarapari: ‘Mɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–e baji.’
Ne–inaa õpee paraa na pꞌekꞌau eujã wëre pɨkꞌapipata; ma ne–inaa õpee eerepema jida na pꞌekꞌau eujãpa pꞌoyaa chookꞌaa.
Nãga pꞌanɨ: eperã esclavo bapꞌeda, rey padaikꞌãri; eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ chikꞌo waibɨa iru bakꞌãri;
wẽra jõmaarãpa kꞌiniada–ee pꞌanapata miakꞌãikꞌãri mãikꞌaapa esclava chipari kꞌãyaara waibɨara beekꞌãri.
Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde ne–inaa kꞌĩmari paraa ma–ãri bee. Mamĩda ma ne–inaa audú kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanapata.
Nãga pꞌanɨ: nepꞌisi, makꞌɨara juatau wẽe pꞌanɨ mĩda, pꞌoojarade ãchi chikꞌo pꞌe atapata kꞌoijara pai naaweda.
Kꞌurijiwakꞌa bee tꞌɨ̃jarapata tejón ichiaba makꞌɨara juatau wẽe pꞌanɨ mĩda, ãchi te peña–idaa bɨde oopata.
Sisi rey wẽe pꞌanɨ mĩda, soldaorã wãpatakꞌa aukꞌa erkꞌa wãpata.
Bichipoporomia tachi juade jita atapata mĩda, aukꞌa rey palaciode bapari.
Ne–inaa õpee paraa pi–ia nipapata; ma ne–inaa õpee eerepema jida pi–ia tꞌɨapari.
Nãga pꞌanɨ: león awaraa ne–animalaarã chokꞌara kꞌãyaara juataura bapari perã, ne–inaa apidaapa iru waaweepikꞌaa.
Ichiaba etꞌerre pi–ia nipapari chi wẽraarã kꞌĩrapite tꞌɨakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa chivo pi–ia nipapari ichi cabraarã naa tꞌɨakꞌãri, ma awara rey pi–ia nipapari ichi soldaorã kꞌĩrapite tꞌɨakꞌãri.
Kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerãkꞌa pɨ audua nipadoo pɨrã maa–e pɨrã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee kꞌĩsiadoo pɨrã, mãgɨde pia kꞌĩsiapꞌeda, waya mãga oonáaji nãga perã.
Leche siradakꞌãri, chi crema mantequilla padariparikꞌa mãikꞌaapa tachi kꞌɨ̃maa golpe sĩdakꞌãri, waa uchiaparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa pɨa awaraarã kꞌĩraupiru pɨrã, chõo para baitꞌee.”
Rey Lemuelpa jaraji nãgɨ́ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedee, chi nawepa irumaa jarateeda.
“Mɨchi warra, mɨa tꞌoda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨa chupɨria iidida ũripꞌeda, pɨ mɨmaa tꞌopiji. ¿Kꞌãata mɨa pɨmaa ũraaima? Na ũraa ũríji.
Pɨ juatau jõnáaji wẽraarã ome kꞌãi kꞌiniapa. Wẽraarã pꞌe ata kꞌiniapa reyrã chokꞌara kꞌachiade baaipata.
Lemuel, ichiaba reyrã vino toyaa pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ mãikꞌaapa eperãarã poro waibɨarã itꞌua toi awaa pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ.
Maa–e pɨrã vino to pꞌanɨɨpa, piudaruta pɨrã, kꞌĩra atuadaridai ãchi pꞌuuru pidaarã ley mãikꞌaapa ãchi jua ekꞌari chupɨria beerã kꞌaripada–e pai.
Itꞌua teeipia bɨ chi juakꞌaya piuitꞌee bɨmaa mãikꞌaapa vino teeipia bɨ chi audú kꞌĩsia paraa bɨmaa.
¡Mãgá ãchia kꞌĩra atuadaridai ãchi chupɨria chitoonɨ mãikꞌaapa waa kꞌirãpada–e pai ãchi audú kꞌĩsia paraa jõnɨ!
Pedéeji chupɨria chitoonɨɨrã kꞌapꞌɨa pari mãikꞌaapa netꞌaa wẽe beerã kꞌapꞌɨa pari, ãchi itu pꞌoyaa kꞌaripada–e pꞌanadairã.
Pedéeji mãgeerã kꞌapꞌɨa pari mãikꞌaapa ãra kꞌaripa atáji ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa beerã jua ekꞌariipa. ¡Mãgá chupɨria beerã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa wẽe beerã kꞌaripáji!”
¿Sãma unuima wẽra kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ? ¡Mãgee wẽra pi–iara bɨ mãu pi–ia bɨ kꞌãyaara!
Ma wẽrade chi ɨmɨkꞌĩrapa ijãapari, ne–inaa apida falta–e bairã.
Ma wẽrapa chi ɨmɨkꞌĩra–itꞌee ne–inaa pia oopari ichi piurumaa.
Oveja kꞌara lino ome jɨrɨ atapari mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri o–ĩa ichi juapa pꞌaru kꞌapari.
Barcopa ne–inaa tꞌɨmɨɨpa aneeparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa ma wẽrapa chikꞌo tꞌɨmɨɨpa aneepari.
Tapꞌedapodopa iru pꞌirabaipari chikꞌo joomaa beeitꞌee ichi te pidaarã–itꞌee. Ma awara ichi mimiapataarã chokꞌapari.
Eujã pia jɨrɨpꞌeda, neto atapari mãikꞌaapa pꞌaratꞌa ichia mimiada pari jita atadapa, ma eujãde uva kꞌarra jaupari.
Ma wẽra kꞌoo–idaa bakꞌaa. Tꞌãripa ichi mimia oopari perã, juataura bapari.
Ichi negocio pia akꞌɨpari pia uchiamerã mãikꞌaapa pꞌãrikꞌua pida lámpara urua bɨ misa, mimiapari.
Ichi juadoopa hilo oopari mãikꞌaapa pꞌaru kꞌapari.
Chupɨria beerã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa falta beerã ichita kꞌaripapari.
Nieve baaikꞌãri mãikꞌaapa kꞌũrasaadaikꞌãri, iru waawee–e, ichideerãpa pꞌaru mõtaa jɨ̃pata perã.
Ichi juadoopa poroba oopari mãikꞌaapa jɨ̃pari pꞌaru pi–ia linodee ooda, pꞌupꞌuchia tꞌɨdadee.
Ãchi pꞌuuru pidaarãpa iru ɨmɨkꞌĩra pia akꞌɨpata ãchi pꞌuuru tꞌĩupatamãi iru su–akꞌɨ bapari perã ma eujãdepema poro waibɨarã ome.
Ma wẽrapa pꞌaru linodee kꞌapari mãikꞌaapa kꞌɨrrɨde jɨ̃pata kꞌaatꞌɨpari ma jõma neto pëiitꞌee netꞌaa netopataarãmaa.
Ichi kꞌapꞌɨa pia, kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipapari. Mapa waaweekꞌaa ewari cherude ne–inaa kꞌachia pꞌasai jĩakꞌaapa.
Pedeekꞌãri, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pedeepari mãikꞌaapa jarateekꞌãri, tꞌãri pia jarateepari.
Ichi te pidaarã pia akꞌɨpari. Ichita chikꞌo iru bapari, mimiayaa bapari perã.
Chi warrarãpa iru tꞌãri pia akꞌɨpata mãikꞌaapa chi ɨmɨkꞌĩrapa irumaa na pedee pia jarapari:
“Wẽraarã chokꞌara paraa ne–inaa pia oopata kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanɨ perã. Mamĩda pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara pipɨara bɨda” apari.

Eperãarãpa wẽra pia unudai iru tꞌãri pia pedeepari perã maa–e pɨrã kꞌĩra wãree bapari perã. Mamĩda mãgɨ́ wẽra ichita mãga ba–e paitꞌee. Mamĩda wẽrapa Tachi Akꞌõre waawee bakꞌãri, ichita irudé pia pedeepataadaitꞌee.
¡Iru pia akꞌɨpatáatɨ irua ne–inaa pia oopari kꞌaurepa! ¡Pꞌuuru pidaarã jõmaarãmaa irua ne–inaa pia oopariida jarapatáatɨ!
Judá eujãdepema rey Joacim año õpee rey bɨde, Babilonia eujãdepema rey Nabucodonosorpa ichi soldaorã ome Jerusalén pꞌuuru wapꞌɨra atanajida.

Mãga nɨde Tachi Akꞌõrepa rey Joacim Nabucodonosor eerepemaarãmaa jita atapiji. Ichiaba netꞌaa chokꞌara ichi tede nɨ̃bada jãri atapiji. Nabucodonosorpa rey Joacim mãikꞌaapa iru eere pꞌanadapꞌedaarã Babilonia eujãdee ateeji mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre tedepema netꞌaa ateedapꞌedaa bɨnaji ichi netꞌaa pia ome ichi akꞌõre waibɨa apata tede.
Maapꞌeda ichi jua ekꞌari mimiapataarã poro waibɨa Aspenamaa jaraji ma israelitaarã aneedapꞌedaarãdepema jɨrɨmerã rey ëreerãdepemaarã maa–e pɨrã awaraa pꞌaratꞌa paraa beerãdepemaarã.

Jɨrɨipia bɨda aji, kꞌũtrãarã kꞌĩra wãree, kꞌapꞌɨade ne–inaa kꞌachia wẽe, poro wẽsaa, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌawapata rey palaciode mimiadamerã. Aspenapa mãɨrãmaa Babiloniadepemaarã pedee jarateeipia bɨda aji, mãikꞌaapa Babiloniadepemaarã libro pꞌã iru pꞌanadapꞌedaa lee kꞌawaapiipia bɨda aji.
