Ichiaba tai kꞌaripáji kꞌayaa beerã jɨpapataadamerã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa oopataadamerã Jesús tꞌɨ̃de. Iruata pɨchia oopi bɨkꞌa ichita oopari.

Ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ aupadakꞌãri, ãchi pꞌanadapꞌedaamãi wɨrrɨwɨrrɨa nɨ̃beeji. Mãpai jõmaweda Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌaneejida mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda Jesús piuda kꞌaurepa waawee–ee jarateepachida.
Maapai ijãapataarã jõmaweda aukꞌa kꞌĩsiapachida mãikꞌaapa chikꞌaripa pꞌanapachida. Apidaapa ãchi netꞌaa iru pꞌanɨ ãchi–itꞌee aupaida adakꞌaa paji. Jĩpꞌa jõmaarã–itꞌee paji.
Mapa Akꞌõrepa ãchi pia oopachi. Kꞌaripaji Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãpa jarateedamerã Jesús chokꞌai pꞌirabaida mãikꞌaapa oodamerã ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa.
Ãchi chupɨria pꞌanadakꞌaa paji. Chi eujã iru beerãpa mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa awaraa iru beerãpa netotꞌaapachida.
Mãpai ma pꞌaratꞌa Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãmaa teepachida, jedenadamerã wẽe beerãmaa.
Mãga ooji Leví ëreerãdepema Josepa. Mãgɨ́ eperã Chipre isladepema paji. Mãgɨmaa Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãpa pedida tꞌɨ̃ bɨjida Bernabé (jara kꞌinia bɨ “Tꞌãri O–ĩapipari”).
Mãgɨ́ eperãpa eujã iru bada netotꞌaaji mãikꞌaapa ma pꞌaratꞌa Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãmaa teeji.
Mamĩda Bernabepa oodakꞌa ooda–e paji Ananías chi wẽra Safira ome. Mãgɨɨrãpa ãchi eujã netotꞌaajida.
Mamĩda mãgɨ́ eperã chi wẽra ome pedeeteejida pꞌaratꞌa jõma teeda–e paitꞌee Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãmaa. Ananiapa mãgɨ́ pꞌaratꞌa ũkꞌurupai teenakꞌãri,
Pedropa mãgaji:
—Ananías, ¿pɨ seewa cherukꞌã aji, Akꞌõre Jauremaa, pꞌaratꞌa jõma tee che–ee? ¿Sãapꞌeda oojima Satanapa oopi bɨkꞌa?
¿Jã eujã pɨchide paji–ekꞌã netotꞌaai naaweda? ¿Ma pꞌaratꞌa pɨchide paji–ekꞌã netotꞌaapꞌeda? ¿Sãapꞌeda nãga oo kꞌiniadachima? Pɨa eperãarãmaa seewa–e paji. Akꞌõremaata seewajida aji.
Mãga ũriruta, Ananías eujãde piu baainaji. Arii pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa unudakꞌãri, pꞌerakꞌoodachida.
Mãpai kꞌũtrãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa chi piuda beda atajida mãikꞌaapa ateejida ɨade.
Hora õpeemaa Ananías wẽra tꞌĩuji, chi ɨmɨkꞌĩra piuda kꞌawa–ee.
Mãpai Pedropa irumaa iidiji:
—¿Wãara nãgɨ́ pꞌaratꞌa pari eujã netotꞌaajidakꞌã? aji.
Ichia pꞌanauji:
—Netotꞌaajidapɨ.
Pedropa mãgaji:
—¿Sãapꞌeda parã pedeeteejida Akꞌõre Jauremaa seewadaitꞌee? Ara cherutada aji, pɨ ɨmɨkꞌĩra ɨadeepa. Naade pɨ jida aukꞌa ateedaitꞌeeda aji.
Aramata Safira piu baainaji Pedro bɨɨrɨ ikꞌaawa. Kꞌũtrãarã tꞌĩudakꞌãri, unujida piu bɨ. Maapꞌeda ɨanajida chi ɨmɨkꞌĩra ikꞌaawa.
Jõmaweda ijãapataarã mãikꞌaapa awaraarã mãga kꞌawadapꞌedaarã pꞌera para beeji.

Atꞌãri Jerusalende pꞌanɨde Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãpa oopachida ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa. Maapai jõmaweda Cristode ijãapataarã cheepurupachida Salomón Pórtico apatapꞌedaamãi, Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨa ãukꞌidaa.
Apemaarã judiorã Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨade tꞌĩupataarã waaweepa araa pꞌanada–e paji ãchi ome. Mamĩda pia pedeepachida ãchi ãpɨte, apemaarã Jerusalendepemaarã ome.
Mãɨrã mãgá tꞌĩuda–e paji mĩda ãchi ome, Cristode ijãapataarã ĩwajida, wẽraarã mãikꞌaapa ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã.

Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãpa ne–inaa pia oo pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, eperãarãpa ãchi kꞌayaa beerã calle jã ikꞌaawa uchia atapachida joipꞌarukꞌa bɨ ɨ̃rɨ, Pedro wãyaa wãkꞌãri, chi jaurepa pida ãra tꞌõbaimerã mãikꞌaapa jɨpamerã.

Ichiaba pꞌuuru kꞌaitꞌa beerãpa Jerusalendee kꞌayaa beerã chokꞌara aneepachida mãikꞌaapa ichiaba eperã netuara merãtɨa bee aneepachida. Tachi Akꞌõrepa jõmaweda jɨpakꞌoopachi Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã juapa.
Unudakꞌãri jõmaweda Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãpa oopata, judiorã pꞌaareerã poro waibɨa mãikꞌaapa ũkꞌuru saduceorã iru ome nipapatapꞌedaarãpa Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌaneejida.
Mapa Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨa jɨ̃apataarãmaa atapijida carcelde tꞌɨkꞌoonadamerã.
Mamĩda pꞌãrikꞌua angelpa carcelde tꞌĩupata ewatꞌaa cheji. Maapꞌeda ãchi taawaa uchiapikꞌooji. Mãpai mãgaji:
—Wã́tɨ Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨadee mãikꞌaapa arii pꞌanɨɨrãmaa jaratéetɨ Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee ɨtꞌaa wãdamerã.
Mãgá aɨ norema tapꞌeweda tꞌĩujida Akꞌõre tede mãikꞌaapa jarateemaa pꞌaneejida.
Mãɨmisa ma pꞌaareerã poro waibɨapa mãikꞌaapa ichi ome pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa tꞌɨ̃ pëijida Junta Supremadepemaarã jõmaweda. Ichiaba carceldeepa Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã atapijida.
Mamĩda Akꞌõre te jɨ̃apataarãpa carcelde jɨrɨnadakꞌãri, unuda–e paji. Maperã nepɨrɨ chejida:
—Ununajidada ajida, carcel te pia jɨ̃a nɨ̃bɨ, mãikꞌaapa chi jɨ̃apataarã aɨ tꞌaide jɨ̃a pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda ewa atadakꞌãri, apida unuda–e paji.
Mãga ũridakꞌãri, ma pꞌaareerã poro waibɨa apemaarã pꞌaareerã poroorã ome mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõre te jɨ̃apataarã poropa kꞌawada–e paji kꞌãata oodai.
Mãga nɨde eperã pacheji mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:
—Parãpa carcelde tꞌɨkꞌoodapꞌedaarã Akꞌõre te waibɨade eperãarãmaa jarateemaa pꞌanɨda aji.
Aramata Akꞌõre te waibɨa jɨ̃apataarã poro apemaarã jɨ̃apataarã ome wãjida jita pꞌe atade. Mamĩda kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌe aneejida, eperãarãpa ãchimaa mãupa batꞌadai jĩakꞌaapa.
Pachedakꞌãri, akꞌɨnɨ̃ pꞌaneepijida Junta Suprema kꞌĩrapite. Mãpai ma pꞌaareerã poro waibɨapa mãgaji:
—Taipa parãmaa jarajida waa jarateenaadamerã jã eperãpa oopata. Mamĩda mãga ooda–e pꞌanɨ. Waapɨara jõmaweda Jerusalén pidaarãmaa jarateemaa pꞌanɨ. Ma awara táipata jã eperã peetꞌaajidada a jõnɨ.
Apemaarã pari Pedropa pꞌanauji:
—Taipa ichita Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa oodaitꞌeeda aji, eperãpa jara bɨkꞌa oodai kꞌãyaara.
Tachi chonaarãwedapema Akꞌõrépata Jesús, parãpa kurusode peepidapꞌedaa, chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiji.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pꞌirabai atapꞌeda, su–akꞌɨ bɨji ichi juaraare, jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã. Mama bɨji eperãarã akꞌɨpariimerã mãikꞌaapa o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atamerã. Kꞌinia baji Jesús piuda kꞌaurepa Israel pidaarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata oo amaadamerã. Mãgá irua wẽpapikꞌooi ãrapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata.
Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa ma jõma kꞌawa bɨda aji. Taipa pida ichiaba mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨda aji, Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, Akꞌõrepa ichi Jaure taimaa pëida perã.
Judiorã poroorãpa mãga ũridakꞌãri, Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã peekꞌoo kꞌiniadachida.
Mamĩda ãra tꞌãide baji fariseo
Tꞌẽepai mãgaji apemaarã judiorã poroorãmaa:
—Israel pidaarã, pia kꞌĩsíatɨ ne–inaa oodai naaweda jã eperãarãmaa.

Kꞌirãpátɨ makꞌɨara taarã–e bɨ eperã Teudas apatapꞌedaapa kꞌĩsiaji ichita jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara pai. Mãgɨ́ eere cuatrocientos ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã pꞌanajida. Mamĩda mãgɨ́ peetꞌaadakꞌãri, iru ome nipapatapꞌedaarã jĩchoodachida. Mãgá ãchia kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanadapꞌedaa jõdachi.

Aɨ tꞌẽepai, Romadepemaarãpa eperãarã tꞌɨ̃ pꞌãpimaa pꞌanadakꞌãri, ichiaba Judas Galileadepemapa mãga kꞌĩsiaji. Eperãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa iru pedee ijãajida. Mamĩda ichiaba peetꞌaadakꞌãri, iru ome nipapatapꞌedaarã ãyaa erreudachida.
Mapa mɨa parãmaa ũraaitꞌee jã eperãarã kꞌachia oonaadamerã. Ãchia jaratee pꞌanɨ pɨrã ãchi kꞌĩsiadeepa mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa oo pꞌanɨ pɨrã ãchi juadoopa, ãchia oopata jõdariyada aji.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrépata ãchimaa mãga oopi bɨ pɨrã, parãpa pꞌoyaada–eda aji. Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai, Tachi Akꞌõre ome chõomaa pꞌaneedai.
Ãchia Gamaliel ũraa ijãajida.
Maapꞌeda Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã tꞌɨ̃ pꞌe atajida mãikꞌaapa wɨkꞌoojida. Jarajida waa jarateenaadamerã Jesupa ooda. Maapꞌeda kꞌena pëijida.
Mamĩda Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã judiorã poroorã kꞌĩrapiteepa o–ĩa uchiajida, Akꞌõrepa ãchi ita–aria miapida perã Jesús kꞌaurepa.
Maapꞌeda ewari chaa jarateepachida Jesucristota Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëida eperãarã kꞌaripamerã. Mãga jaratee wãpachida Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨade mãikꞌaapa te bee chaa.

Maapai ijãapataarã chokꞌarapɨara ĩwajida. Judiorã griego pedee pedeepataarãpa ɨmɨateejida judiorã hebreo pedee pedeepataarãmaa, ãchia griego pedee pedeepataarã pꞌẽtrãarã pia akꞌɨdakꞌaa pada perã ewari chaa ne–inaa jededakꞌãri kꞌaripadaitꞌee.
Maperã chi doce jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãpa tꞌɨ̃ pëijida jõmaweda Cristode ijãapataarã cheepurudamerã. See nɨ̃beekꞌãri, mãgajida:
—Kꞌõpꞌãyoorã, tai jua araada–e ijãapataarã jõmaweda akꞌɨdaitꞌee. Pia–e bɨda ajida, taipa waa jarateeda–e paitꞌee Akꞌõrepa jara pëida Jesucristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari, chi ne–inaa wẽe beerã akꞌɨ kꞌiniapa.
Mapa eperãarã siete jɨrɨtꞌerátɨ ma mimia oodamerã. Jɨrɨdaipia bɨ nãgee eperãarã: kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerã; tꞌãri pia beerã mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia beerã.
Tai jõdee ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa pꞌanadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõrepa jara pëida jarateedaitꞌeeda ajida.
Mãpai ãchia pꞌanaujida:
—Pia bɨda ajida.

Maapꞌeda jɨrɨtꞌerajida Esteban. Ma eperã Cristode pia ijãaji mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa oopachi. Ichiaba jɨrɨtꞌerajida Felipe, Prócoro, Nicanor, Timón, Pármenas mãikꞌaapa Nicolás Antioquiadepema. Naaweda mãgɨ́ Nicolás Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãakꞌaa bapꞌeda, judiorãpa ijãapatade ijãa baji.
Ma tꞌẽepai ateejida Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã pꞌanadapꞌedaamaa. Mãgɨɨrã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃jida ãchi pari mãikꞌaapa jua bɨjida ãchi ɨ̃rɨ. Mãga oojida akꞌɨpidaitꞌee ma mimia ãchimaa teeruta.
Ma tꞌẽepai, Akꞌõrepa ooda Cristo piuda kꞌaurepa waapɨara jarateepachida mãikꞌaapa ijãapataarã waapɨara ĩwapachida Jerusalende. Judiorã ũkꞌuru, pꞌaareerã jida ichiaba Cristode ijãajida.
Maapai Jerusalendepemaarã tꞌãide Estebanpa oopachi ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa. Mãga oopachi Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru kꞌaripa bada perã.

Mamĩda ewari aba pachejida judiorã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata tedepema. Ma te tꞌɨ̃jarapachida Esclavoorã Pꞌanadapꞌeda Uchiadapꞌedaa. Mãɨrãpa nepɨra jɨrɨ chejida Estebanmaa. Ãchi ome chejida aukꞌa Cirene pꞌuurudepemaarã, Alejandría pꞌuurudepemaarã, Cilicia eujãdepemaarã mãikꞌaapa Ásia eujãdepemaarã.
Mamĩda aupedeedakꞌãri, Esteban pꞌoyaa kꞌĩupꞌeepidakꞌaa paji, Akꞌõre Jaurepa iru kꞌĩsia kꞌawaapida perã ãchia iidida pꞌanautꞌee.
Mapa awaraarãmaa pꞌaajida seewa jaradamerã ichia pedee kꞌachia pedeemaa bɨ Moisés ãpɨte mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre ãpɨte.

Mãgá pꞌuuru pidaarã, judiorã poro waibɨarã mãikꞌaapa Moisepa pꞌãda jarateepataarã kꞌĩraupikꞌoojida Esteban ome. Mãɨrãpa Esteban jita atadapꞌeda, atadachida Junta Suprema kꞌĩrapite Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨade.
Mãpai ma pꞌaadapꞌedaarã aneejida seewa jaradamerã. Mãɨrãpa mãgajida:
—Nãgɨ́ eperãpa ikꞌachia pedeeparida ajida, Tachi Akꞌõre te ãpɨte mãikꞌaapa Moisepa pꞌãda ãpɨte.
Jara bɨ Jesús Nazaretdepemapa nãgɨ́ te tꞌeetꞌaaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa tachimaa waa oopi–e paitꞌee Moisepa pꞌãdade jaradakꞌa, tachia oodamerã.
Judiorã poroorãpa mãikꞌaapa arii pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa Esteban akꞌɨdakꞌãri, chi kꞌĩra ángel kꞌĩrakꞌa unujida.
Mãpai pꞌaareerã poro waibɨapa iidiji Estebanmaa:
—¿Wãarakꞌã aji, na eperãarãpa jara pꞌanɨ?
Irua pꞌanauji:
—Mɨchi aukꞌaarã mãikꞌaapa chonaarã, ũrítɨ. Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree bɨpa ichi unupijida aji, tachi akꞌõchona Abrahammaa Mesopotamia eujãde bakꞌãri, Harande banai naaweda.
Akꞌõrepa jaraji:
‘Atabëipáde aji, pɨ eujã pɨ ëreerã ome mãikꞌaapa wãpáde aji, mɨa akꞌɨpiitꞌee eujãmaa.’
Mãpai Abraham uchiaji Caldea eujãdeepa mãikꞌaapa banaji Harande. Tꞌẽepai chi akꞌõre piukꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa Abraham aneeji na eujãdee tachi ɨ̃rá pꞌanɨmãi.
Mamĩda na eujã maarepida waide tee–e paji irumaa; bɨɨrɨ aba tꞌɨaitꞌee pida. Jĩpꞌa jaraji teeitꞌee irudeepa uchiadaitꞌeerãmaa iru piuda tꞌẽepai, Abraham waide warra wẽe baji mĩda.
Ma awara Akꞌõrepa jaraji:
‘Pɨdeepa uchiadaitꞌeerã pꞌanapataadaitꞌeeda aji, awaraa eujãde mimiamaa chĩara–itꞌee. Mama esclavoorã pꞌanadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa jãpemaarãpa ãra miapi iru pꞌanadaitꞌee cuatrocientos años.’
Mamĩda Akꞌõrepa ichiaba jaraji:
‘Mɨa kꞌachia ooitꞌeeda aji, ãra esclavoorã papirutaarã. Tꞌẽepai ãra mamãikꞌaapa uchiadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa mɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daitꞌeeda aji, na eujãde.’

Mãgá pedee nɨ̃bɨde Abraham ome, Akꞌõrepa jaraji Abrahampa tauchaa bɨmerã ichi warra kꞌapꞌɨade. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia baji mãga oodamerã ichi eperãarãpa akꞌɨpidaitꞌee ichide ijãa pꞌanɨ. Mapa Abraham warra Isaac tꞌokꞌãri, kꞌãima ocho parumaa iru kꞌapꞌɨade tauchaa bɨji. Isaacpa mãga ooji ichi warra Jacob ome. Ichiaba Jacobpa mãga ooji chi warrarã doce ome. Mãɨrãdeepa Israel pidaarã ëreerã doce uchiajida.
ʼMãgɨ́ Jacob warrarã pada, tachi chonaarãpa, ãchi ɨ̃pema José kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapachida. Maperã netotꞌaajida esclavokꞌa Egiptodee wãyaa wãdapꞌedaarãmaa. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre José ome baji.
Maperã kꞌaripa ataji jõmaweda ne–inaa kꞌachiadeepa. Ma awara kꞌĩsia kꞌawaapiji mãikꞌaapa kꞌinia iru bapiji rey Egiptodepema Faraonmaa. Mãgɨpa José Egiptodepemaarã poro waibɨa papiji ichi palaciode.
ʼMa tꞌẽepai jarra oojida Egipto eujãde mãikꞌaapa Canaán eujãde. Maperã makꞌɨara nekꞌodaitꞌee wẽ–e paji.
Mamĩda Jacobpa kꞌawaakꞌãri Egiptode ne–inaa kꞌoitꞌee paraa, jãmaa pëiji ichi warrarã, ne–inaa netode. Mãgɨ́ paji tachi chonaarã naapɨara wãdapꞌedaa.
Aɨ tꞌẽepai wãdakꞌãri, Josepa ichi ɨ̃pemaarãmaa kꞌawaapiji. Madeepa Faraónpa José ëreerã kꞌawaji.
Tꞌẽepai, Josepa jara pëiji chi akꞌõre Jacob mãikꞌaapa chi ëreerã jõmaweda chedamerã Egiptodee. Ãchi setenta y cinco paji.
Mãgapɨ Jacob banaji Egiptode. Mama jai–idaaji. Ichiaba mama tachi chonaarã jai–idaajida.
Jacob bɨɨrɨ mãikꞌaapa chi warrarã bɨɨrɨ ateejida Siquem pꞌuurudee mãikꞌaapa mama ɨajida Abrahampa Hamor ëreerã juakꞌaawa netoda jãɨrade.
ʼEwari kꞌaitꞌa pakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa uchiapiitꞌee Abrahamdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã Egiptodeepa ichia jaradakꞌa, ãchi chokꞌara pꞌanajida, ĩwa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.
Maapai Egiptodepema reypa José kꞌawa–e pada Faraón paji.
Mãgɨ́ reypa tachi chonaarã kꞌũraji waa ĩwanaadamerã. Ãchi chupɨria ooji. Jaraji ãchi warrarã ewaa tꞌo kꞌedeerã ita–aria piupidamerã.
Maapai tꞌoji Moisés. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ warra chai pia akꞌɨji. Mapa chi akꞌõreerãpa atane õpee warimaa iru pꞌanajida ãchi tede.
Mamĩda pꞌoyaa waa merada–e paji. Mapa ituaba atabëidakꞌãri, Faraón kꞌaupa unu ataji mãikꞌaapa wari ataji ichi warrakꞌa.

Mãgapɨ Moisés wariji Egipto pidaarã tꞌãide mãikꞌaapa kꞌawaa wãji ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo Egiptodepemaarãpa kꞌawa pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa. Mãpai jõmaarãpa iru kꞌawajida, irua pedeeda kꞌaurepa mãikꞌaapa ooda kꞌaurepa.
ʼ‘Cuarenta años iru bakꞌãri, kꞌĩsiaji wãitꞌee Israel pidaarã akꞌɨde, ichi aukꞌaarã pada perã.
Mamĩda unukꞌãri Egiptodepemapa ichi aukꞌaa sĩmaa bɨ, Moisepa kꞌaripanaji mãikꞌaapa ma Egipto pida pee atapëiji.’
Moisepa kꞌĩsiaji ichi aukꞌaarãpa ijãadai Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi pëida ãchi kꞌaripamerã. Mamĩda ãchia mãga ooda–e paji.
‘Aɨ norema unuji Israel pidaarã omé chõomaa pꞌanɨ. Mãgá chõonaadamerã mãgaji: “¿Pãchi aukꞌaarã–ekꞌã aji, jãgá chõo jõnadaitꞌee?”
Mãpai chi kꞌõpꞌãyo sĩmaa badapa Moisés sĩatꞌaaji mãikꞌaapa mãgaji: “¿Kꞌaipa pɨ tai porokꞌa bɨjima aji, taipa oopata akꞌɨmerã?
¿Mɨ peetꞌaa kꞌinia bɨkꞌã aji, nuweda Egipto pida peetꞌaadakꞌa?” ’
Mãga ũrikꞌãri, Moisés mirudachi. Maapꞌeda tꞌɨmɨ́ wãji Madián eujãdee. Mama banaji kꞌĩra tewaraakꞌa. Ariipema wẽra atapꞌeda, warrarã omé paraaji.
ʼCuarenta años wãyaapꞌeda, ewari aba Moisés baji eujã pania wẽe bɨmãi Sinaí ee kꞌaitꞌa. Mama bɨde unuji pakꞌuru jepꞌeda tꞌɨpɨtaukꞌa urua nɨ̃bɨ, angelpa aɨde ichi unupi bada perã.
Mãgá urua unukꞌãri, Moisés kꞌaitꞌaara wãji pi–iara akꞌɨitꞌee kꞌãata mãga bɨ. Mãga nɨde ũriji Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgaru:
‘Mɨ pɨ chonaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa; Abraham, Isaac, Jacob ijãadapꞌedaa Akꞌõre Waibɨa.’
Mãga ũrikꞌãri, Moisés bɨɨrɨ wëre nɨ̃beeji pꞌera nɨ̃bɨpa mãikꞌaapa pꞌoyaa akꞌɨkꞌaa paji ma pakꞌurumaa.
Mãpai Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgaji:
‘Pɨchi chancla ẽratꞌaapáde aji, nama pɨ mɨ kꞌĩrapite bainɨ̃ bairã.
Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ mɨ eperãarã chupɨria chitoonɨ Egiptode. Ũri bɨ ãchi bia chitoonɨ. Mapa cheji kꞌaripaitꞌee. Pɨa aukꞌa kꞌaripanáji. Mɨa pɨ Egiptodee pëiitꞌeeda aji.’
ʼAɨ naaweda ãchia Moisés pedee ũri kꞌiniada–e paji nãga pꞌanauda perã:
‘¿Kꞌaipa pɨ tai porokꞌa bɨjima ajida, taipa oopata akꞌɨmerã?’

Mãgá yiaraa pɨkꞌa iru pꞌanajida mĩda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ángel pakꞌuru ɨɨrɨ–idaade unupida kꞌapꞌɨa pari Moisés pëiji ãchi porokꞌa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia baji Moisepa ãchi uchia atamerã Egipto pidaarã juadeepa.

Mãgá Moisepa tachi chonaarã uchia pꞌe ataji Egiptodeepa. Ichia ne–inaa ooji eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa mãgɨ́ eujãde, Mar Rojode mãikꞌaapa cuarenta años wãyaaruta misa eujã pania wẽe bɨde.
Mãgɨ́ Moisepa jaraji Israel pidaarãmaa:
‘Parãdeepa Akꞌõrepa uchiapiitꞌee ichi pedee jarapari mɨ jĩakꞌa.’

Pꞌanadakꞌãri eujã pania wẽe bɨde, Israel pidaarã pari Moiseta pedeeji ángel ome Sinaí eede. Ichiata Akꞌõrepa jarada naapɨara pꞌãji, tachi chonaarãpa mãikꞌaapa tachia mãgɨ́ ũraa ijãadapꞌeda, ichita pꞌanapataadamerã.
ʼMamĩda tachi chonaarãpa iru pedee ijãa kꞌiniada–e paji. Ma kꞌãyaara waya Egiptodee wã kꞌiniadachida.
Mapa Moisés wẽ–e pakꞌãri, ichi ɨ̃pema Aaronmaa mãgajida:
‘Tachi–itꞌee akꞌõre waibɨarã oopáde ajida, tachi naa o jaratee wãdamerã, kꞌawada–e pꞌanadairã sãgataji jã Moisés ome, Egiptodeepa tai ãyaa aneeda.’
Mãpai oojida pꞌakꞌa chakꞌekꞌa aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daitꞌee. Ne–animalaarã peejida aɨ kꞌĩrapite paadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa fiesta oojida o–ĩapa, ma pꞌakꞌa chakꞌekꞌa ooda–itꞌee.
Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõre ãchi ikꞌaawaapa ãyaa wãji. Mapa pajãde nɨ̃bɨ ne–inaamaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pachida, Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dai kꞌãyaara. Oojida Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa pꞌãdapꞌedaade jara bɨkꞌa:
‘Israel pidaarã, parã cuarenta años eujã pania wẽe bɨde pꞌanadakꞌãri, ¿mɨ–itꞌee ne–animalaarã peedapꞌeda, paapachidakꞌã, mɨde ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã?

Ma kꞌãyaara parãpa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pachida Canaandepemaarã akꞌõre waibɨa Molocmaa mãikꞌaapa Egiptodepemaarã akꞌõre waibɨa Refanmaa. Mɨa mãga kꞌawa bɨ ne–inaa pãchi juapa oodapꞌedaa atee pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã pãchi wãrutamaa. Mapa mɨa parã ãyaa jërekꞌooitꞌeeda aji, Babilónia pꞌuuru kꞌãyaara tꞌɨmɨara.’

ʼTachi chonaarã eujã pania wẽe bɨde pꞌanadakꞌãri, ateepachida Tachi Akꞌõre te ne–edee ooda, kꞌirãpadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre arii bɨ ãchi ome. Mãgɨ́ te oojida Tachi Akꞌõrepa Moisemaa akꞌɨpidakꞌa. Oojida aɨde ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõremaa.

Ma tꞌẽepai tachi chonaarã mãgɨ́ tede ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pachida ãchi chonaarãpa oodapꞌedaakꞌa. Mapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa awaraa pꞌuuru ome jura chõo pꞌoyaapikꞌãri, Josué ome chedapꞌedaarãpa ãchi ome aneejida mãgɨ́ te ne–edee ooda. Mãgá iru pꞌanapachida David rey parumaa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa Rey David kꞌinia iru bapachi. Mapa Davidpa iidiji Tachi Akꞌõremaa te waibɨa oo teeitꞌee, te pia oo kꞌinia bada perã Jacobpa ijãadapꞌedaa Akꞌõre–itꞌee.
Mamĩda David warra Salomonpa Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨa ooji.
Salomonpa mãgɨ́ te ooji mĩda, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨa bakꞌaa te eperãarã juapa oodade. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Akꞌõre pedee jaraparipa jarada perã:
‘Mɨ, Jõmaarã Rey, ɨtꞌarita baparida aji, mãikꞌaapa eujã mɨ jua ekꞌari bɨ. ¿Te kꞌãaredeeta mɨmaa oo teedaitꞌeema? ¿Sãmata mɨ ɨ̃inaitꞌeema?
¿Mɨchi juadoopa jõmaweda ooji–ekꞌã? aji.’
Mãpai Estebanpa mãgaji:

—Parãpa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa pꞌanɨda apata mĩda, tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa pꞌanapatada aji, ijãadakꞌaa beerãkꞌa. Ma awara kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua pꞌanapata, oo kꞌiniadakꞌaa perã Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Pãchi chonaarã́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ.

Parã chonaarãpa ichita Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarã jɨrɨjida peedaitꞌee. Peejida chi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bɨ cheitꞌee bɨda apatapꞌedaarã. Maapꞌeda chi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bɨ chekꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa ooitꞌee, iru ichiaba jita atapidapꞌeda, peepijida parãpa.
Parã́pata Akꞌõre Ũraa iru pꞌanapata angeleerã kꞌaurepa. Mamĩda atꞌãri ooda–e pꞌanɨda aji, mãgɨ́ ũraa jara bɨkꞌa.
Mãga ũridakꞌãri, tꞌãri kꞌachiapa Esteban peetꞌaa kꞌinia pꞌaneejida.
Mamĩda Akꞌõre Jaure ichi ome bada perã, ɨtꞌaa akꞌɨji mãikꞌaapa unuji Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõre juaraare Jesús bainɨ̃ bɨ.
Mãpai mãgaji:
—Akꞌɨdapáde aji. Mɨa unu bɨ pajã ewa nɨ̃bɨ mãikꞌaapa unu bɨ Eperã Akꞌõre Truadepema Akꞌõre Waibɨa juaraare.
Mamĩda ãchi kꞌɨɨrɨ tꞌapꞌakꞌoodachida mãikꞌaapa golpe biadapꞌeda, jõmaweda iru ɨ̃rɨ wãjida.

Jerusalén pꞌuurudeepa uchia atadapꞌeda, mãupa batꞌamaa pꞌaneejida iru peetꞌaadaitꞌee. Aukꞌa kꞌaripajida Esteban ɨmɨateedapꞌedaarãpa. Ãchi ɨ̃rɨpema pꞌaru jɨ̃patapꞌedaa ata bɨjida eperã Saulo apatapꞌedaa bɨɨrɨ ikꞌaawa irua akꞌɨmerã, ãchia mãu batꞌaruta misa.
Mãupa batꞌamaa pꞌanɨde Esteban ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ji:
—Tachi Waibɨa Jesús, mɨ jaure pɨchimaa atéeji.
Tꞌẽepai bedabaiji mãikꞌaapa golpe ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ji:
—Tachi Waibɨa, ãchi chupɨria kꞌawáaji, mɨ nãgá kꞌachia oo pꞌanɨ mĩda.
Mãga jarapꞌeda, piuji.
Esteban peedakꞌãri, Saulo mama baji akꞌɨitꞌee, ichi judiorã poroorã eere bada perã. Esteban piupꞌeda, ũkꞌuru Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapataarãpa ɨajida; ichiaba audú jẽejida iru–itꞌee.

Ma ewatedeepa Jerusalende Cristode ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa irude ijãapataarã jɨrɨjida peedaitꞌee. Mapa jõmaweda mirukꞌoodachida Judea eujãdee mãikꞌaapa Samaria eujãdee. Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã aupai miruda–e paji.
Mãgá jɨrɨ pꞌanɨ misa, Saulopa Cristode ijãapataarã aukꞌa jɨrɨpachi. Te chaa tꞌĩu wãpachi wẽraarã ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã ome jita pꞌeitꞌee. Maapꞌeda carcelde tꞌɨpikꞌoopachi.
Saulopa mãga oo baji mĩda, chi Jerusalendeepa mirudapꞌedaarãpa jaratee wãpachida Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee ãchi wãrutamaa.
Felipe wãji Samaria eujãdee mãikꞌaapa Cristopa ooda jarateepachi.
Arii pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa mãga ũridakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa unudakꞌãri irua ooda eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa, waapɨara kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanajida.

Mama Felipepa uchiapikꞌoopachi netuaraarã merãtɨa bee eperãarã chokꞌara kꞌapꞌɨadeepa. Mãgɨ́ netuaraarã ãra kꞌapꞌɨadeepa bia uchia wãpachida. Ma awara Felipepa jɨpakꞌoopachi eperãarã chokꞌara chiwa beerã mãikꞌaapa pꞌoyaa ãchi bɨɨrɨpa pia nipadakꞌaarã.
Maperã ma pꞌuurudepemaarã o–ĩa pꞌanapachida.
Mamĩda mama bapachi eperã tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Simón. Mãgɨpa petau tau kꞌawaa baji mãikꞌaapa ma eujãdepemaarã kꞌũra pꞌe iru bapachi ichia oo bɨ kꞌaurepa. Mapa ãchi tꞌãide eperã waibɨakꞌa bapachi.
Waibɨara beerã, ekꞌariara beerãpa paara iru pedee ũri kꞌinia pꞌanapachida mãikꞌaapa mãgapachida:
—Tachi Akꞌõrépata irumaa nãga oopi bɨ.
Irua jararu ijãapachida, ichi petau taupa kꞌũrapꞌe iru bada perã. Taarãji ma kꞌapɨte bɨ.

Mama bɨde Felipepa jarateeji: Jesucristo Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëida mãikꞌaapa iru kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapikꞌoopari. Mãga ijãadakꞌãri, mãpema ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã mãikꞌaapa wẽraarã poro choopijida.
Simonpa pida ijãaji. Maapꞌeda poro choopiji mãikꞌaapa nipaji Felipe ome. Unukꞌãri Felipepa ne–inaa oo bɨ eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa, ichia kꞌawa–e bapachi sãga kꞌĩsiai.
Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã Jerusalende pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa ũridakꞌãri Samaria pidaarãpa ijãaruta Akꞌõrepa ooda Cristo piuda kꞌaurepa, mamaa pëijida Pedro Juan ome.
Arii panadakꞌãri, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃jida Samaria pidaarã Cristode ijãapataarã pari, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure ãra ome ba chemerã,
waide Akꞌõre Jaure ãra kꞌapꞌɨade ba che–e bada perã. Jĩpꞌa poro choopijida Tachi Waibɨa Jesús tꞌɨ̃de, akꞌɨpidaitꞌee irude ijãadapꞌedaa.
Mãpai Pedropa mãikꞌaapa Juanpa jua bɨdakꞌãri ãra ɨ̃rɨ, mãgá Akꞌõre Jaure ba cheji ãra ome.
Simonpa unukꞌãri Akꞌõre Jaure che bɨ Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãpa jua bɨrutade eperãarã ɨ̃rɨ, pꞌaratꞌa teeitꞌee paji, ichia aukꞌa mãga ooitꞌee.
Mãgaji:
—Mɨmaa kꞌawaapidapáde aji, ichiaba mɨa jua bɨkꞌãri eperã ɨ̃rɨ, Akꞌõre Jaure iru ome ba chemerã.
Mãpai Pedropa pꞌanauji:
—¡Pɨchi pꞌaratꞌa ome atua baibeepáde aji, kꞌĩsia bairã neto atai Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopipari ichi jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãmaa!
Pɨa na mimia pꞌoyaa oo–e, Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa kꞌĩsia–e bairã.
Mãgá kꞌĩsia amáaji mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõremaa chupɨria iidíji. Mãga oorura, Tachi Akꞌõrepa perdonaaipɨ pɨa kꞌachia oo kꞌinia bɨ.
Mɨa mãga jara bɨ kꞌawa bairã pɨ tꞌãride tai ome kꞌĩrau bɨ, waibɨara paruta perã pɨ kꞌãyaara nãpemaarã kꞌĩrapite. Wãara pɨ atꞌãri pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌari bɨ.
Mãpai Simonpa pꞌanauji:
—Parãpa Akꞌõremaa chupɨria iididapáde aji mɨ pari, mɨ baainaamerã parãpa mɨmaa jaradapꞌedaade.

Maapꞌeda Pedropa Juan ome ma pꞌuurudepemaarãmaa jarajida ãchia unudapꞌedaa Jesús ome nipadakꞌãri. Ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida jarateejida. Ma tꞌẽepai chejida Jerusalendee. Mamĩda ode Samariade pꞌuuru bee chaa jaratee che wãpachida Tachi Akꞌõrepa pedee pia jara pëida Cristode.
Ma tꞌẽepai, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ángel pëiji Felipemaa jaramerã:
—Wã́ji barree, Jerusalendeepa chonaarãwedapema Gaza pꞌuurudee wãpari ode. Mãgɨ́ o wãyaapari eujã pania wẽe bɨde.
Mãpai Felipe wãji mãikꞌaapa ode unuji eperã Etiopía eujãdepema. Mãgɨ́ Etiopiadepemaarã poro waibɨara paji. Ãchi reina pꞌaratꞌa jɨ̃apari paji. Ichi wã baji Jerusalendee Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃de.
Mata waya che wãji ichi eujãdee. Su–akꞌɨ baji ichi caballopa jidiupata carrode mãikꞌaapa lee wãji chonaarãwedapema Akꞌõre pedee jarapari Isaíapa pꞌãda.
Mãgá wãde, Akꞌõre Jaurepa mãgaji Felipemaa:
—Wã́ji jã carro kꞌaitꞌa.
Felipe ma carro ikꞌaawa pakꞌãri, ũriji Etiopiadepemapa Isaíapa pꞌãda leemaa bɨ. Mãpai iidiji:
—¿Kꞌawa bɨkꞌã aji, kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨ pɨa leemaa bɨ?
Etiopiadepemapa pꞌanauji:
—¿Sãga mɨa kꞌawaayama aji, apidaapa mɨmaa jarateeda–eeta?
Mãpai Felipemaa chupɨria iidiji bataumerã mãikꞌaapa ichi ikꞌaawa su–akꞌɨ beemerã.
Isaíapa pꞌãdadepema ichia leemaa badade nãga pꞌã baji:
‘Iru ateejida oveja ateepatakꞌa chi peepatamaa. Ara oveja kꞌĩupꞌee baparikꞌa chi kꞌara tꞌɨɨmaa pꞌanadakꞌãri, mãga pɨkꞌa iru kꞌĩupꞌee baji.

Iru kꞌĩra nejasiapijida mãikꞌaapa maarepida chupɨria kꞌawada–e paji. Ãchi audú tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, pee atapëijida. Maperã irudeepa warra apida uchiada–e paji. Mãgá iru peedakꞌãri, uchiapijida na pꞌekꞌau eujãdeepa.’
Mãpai Etiopiadepemapa Felipemaa iidiji:
—Mɨ chupɨria kꞌawáaji. ¿Kꞌaideta pedeemaa bɨma aji, na Akꞌõre pedee jaraparipa; ichide wa awaraa eperãde?
Mãpai Felipepa ma Etiopiadepemamaa mãgaji:
—Pɨa leemaa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Warrade; Jesús pꞌasada.
Mãpai Felipepa jarateemaa beeji jõma Jesupa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee.
Maapꞌeda waawipai ode wãyaadakꞌãri pania paraamãi, mãgɨ́ eperãpa mãgaji:
—Nama pania paraa. ¿Sãapꞌeda mɨ poro choo–ema? aji.
[Felipepa pꞌanauji:
—Pɨa wãara Jesucristode ijãa bɨ pɨrã, pia bɨda aji.
Ma eperãpa mãgaji:
—Mɨa ijãa bɨda aji, Jesucristo Tachi Akꞌõre Warra.]
Ma carro tꞌɨbaipipꞌeda, ãchi omee weda ɨrabaijida mãikꞌaapa wãjida pania paraamaa. Mama Felipepa poro chooji.
Paniadeepa uchiadakꞌãri, Felipe wẽpadachi Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa ateeda perã. Ma Etiopiadepemapa waa unu–e paji. Mamĩda ichi o–ĩa wãji ichi eujãdee.
Mãɨmisa Akꞌõre Jaurepa Felipe uchiapiji Azoto pꞌuurude. Mamãikꞌaapa pꞌuuru bee chaa Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee jaratee wãpachi Cesarea pꞌuurude panarumaa.
Felipepa mãga oo bɨ misa, Saulopa Cristode ijãapataarã peekꞌooitꞌeeda apachi. Mapa wãji judiorã pꞌaareerã poro waibɨamaa

mãikꞌaapa iidiji kꞌartꞌa pꞌã teedamerã. Kꞌĩsia iru baji wãitꞌee Damasco pꞌuurudee Tachi Akꞌõre Ode Pꞌanɨɨrãda apata jɨrɨde, ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã wẽraarã ome, mãgɨɨrã jita pꞌe ateeitꞌee Jerusalendee. Ma kꞌartꞌa pꞌãdapꞌedaade jaraji Saulopa oo kꞌinia bɨ, judiorã poroorãpa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata te bee chaa kꞌawaadamerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripadamerã.
Ma kꞌartꞌa pꞌãdapꞌedaa atapꞌeda, Saulo wãji. Damasco kꞌaitꞌa pa wãkꞌãri, ɨtꞌariipa ichi ɨ̃rɨ ɨ̃daa jẽra tꞌĩudachi.
Mãga unukꞌãri, Saulo eujãde baainaji. Maapꞌeda pedee ũriji:
—Saulo, Saulo ¿sãapꞌeda mɨchideerã jɨrɨ nima? aji.
Saulopa iidiji:
—¿Pɨ, kꞌaima? aji.
Chi pedee badapa pꞌanauji:
—Mɨ Jesupɨ, pɨa jɨrɨ ni eperãarã poro waibɨa.
Pꞌirabáiji mãikꞌaapa wã́ji pꞌuurudee. Mama jaradai pɨa kꞌãata ooitꞌee.
Saulo ome wã nipadapꞌedaarã pedee wẽe akꞌɨnɨ̃ pꞌaneejida pꞌera jõnɨpa, ãrapa pedee ũridapꞌedaa perã. Mamĩda unuda–e paji kꞌaipata pedee bɨ.
Ma tꞌẽepai Saulo pꞌirabaidachi. Mamĩda tau ẽekꞌãri, maarepida unukꞌaa paji. Mãgá juade jitadapꞌeda, ateejida Damascodee.
Kꞌãima õpee mama baji tau pꞌãriu; maarepida ne–inaa to–ee mãikꞌaapa nekꞌo–ee.
Ma pꞌuurude bapachi eperã Cristode ijãapari, tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Ananías. Saulo mãga bɨ misa, Akꞌõrepa kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌa bɨde Ananías tꞌɨ̃jaraji. Ichia pꞌanauji:
—Tachi Waibɨa, mɨ nama bɨda aji.
Akꞌõrepa mãgaji:
—Wã́ji calle tꞌɨ̃jarapata Derechamaa mãikꞌaapa Judas tede iidíji Tarso pida, tꞌɨ̃jarapata Saulo. Mãgɨpa mɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa bɨda aji.
Mãgɨmaa kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌa bɨde mɨa unupijida aji, eperã tꞌɨ̃jarapata Ananías wãru irumaa mãikꞌaapa jua bɨru iru ɨ̃rɨ, waya pia unumerã.
Mãga ũrikꞌãri, Ananiapa mãgaji:
—Tachi Waibɨa, mɨa ũridooda aji, jã eperãpa pɨde ijãapataarã miapida Jerusalende.
Ɨ̃rá nama che bɨ pꞌaareerã poroorãpa kꞌaripa kꞌinia pꞌanadairã. Maperã pëijidada aji, pɨde ijãapataarã jita pꞌe atade.
Mamĩda Akꞌõrepa pꞌanauji:
—Wãpáde aji, mɨa iru jɨrɨtꞌerada perã mɨ ũraa jarateenamerã awaraa eujãdepemaarãmaa mãikꞌaapa ãchi reyrãmaa, ichiaba Israel pidaarãmaa.
Mɨa irumaa kꞌawapiitꞌeeda aji, sãgapɨ iru mia iru pꞌanapataadaitꞌee, mɨa ooda jaratee kꞌinia bɨ kꞌaurepa.
Maapꞌeda Ananías wãji Saulo badamaa. Teeda panapꞌeda, jua bɨji iru ɨ̃rɨ mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:
—Kꞌõpꞌãyo Saulo, pɨa unuda ode che wãkꞌãri, Tachi Waibɨa Jesupata mɨ pëijida aji, pɨa waya unumerã mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure ome beemerã.
Aramata Saulo taudeepa chikꞌo escamakꞌa baaijida mãikꞌaapa waya pia unu beeji. Maapꞌeda poro choopiji Ananiamaa.
Tꞌẽepai nekꞌoji waya juatau paraaitꞌee. Ewari chokꞌara–ee beeji Damascodepemaarã Cristode ijãapataarã ome.
Saulopa jarateenapachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata tede. Jarapachi Jesuta Tachi Akꞌõre Warra.
Mãga ũridakꞌãri, jõmaarãpa akꞌɨtrua para beepachi mãikꞌaapa mãgapachida:
—¿Nãgɨ́ paji–ekꞌã ajida, Jerusalende jɨrɨ nipapata peeitꞌee jõmaweda Jesude ijãapataarã? ¿Ichiaba nama cheji–ekꞌã ajida, ijãapataarã jita pꞌe ateede pꞌaareerã poroorãmaa?
Mãga jarapachida mĩda, Saulopa ewari chaa waapɨara jarateepachi Jesuta Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëida eperãarã kꞌaripamerã. Mapa judiorã Damascode pꞌanapatapꞌedaarãpa kꞌawadakꞌaa paji kꞌãata kꞌĩsiadai.
Ma tꞌẽepai taarã pakꞌãri, judiorãpa pedeeteejida Saulo peetꞌaadaitꞌee.
Mamĩda ichia kꞌawaa ataji. Ãstaawa mãikꞌaapa pꞌãrikꞌua pꞌuuru tꞌĩupata chaa otꞌewa pꞌanapachida uchiakꞌãri jita atadaitꞌee.
Mamĩda ijãapataarãpa kꞌoraa choma bɨde tꞌɨ atajida mãikꞌaapa chi pꞌuuru ikꞌaawa tꞌɨakꞌau jẽra bɨ ɨ̃rɨɨpa ɨrabai pëijida. Mãgá mirudachi.
Mamãikꞌaapa Saulo Jerusalendee wãji. Mama ijãapataarã ome kꞌõpꞌãyo meraa kꞌinia baji. Mamĩda jõmaarãpa iru waawee pꞌanapachida. Ijãadakꞌaa paji wãara irua Cristode ijãa bɨ.

Awaraa ijãapataarã mãga pꞌanajida mĩda, Bernabepa ateeji Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãmaa. Nepɨrɨji Saulopa Tachi Waibɨa unuda Damasco ode mãikꞌaapa Jesupa irumaa pedeeda. Maapꞌeda nepɨrɨji Saulo Damascode bakꞌãri, waawee–ee jarateemaa bada Jesupa ooda.
Mãgá Saulo beeji Jerusalende mãikꞌaapa nipapachi Cristode ijãapataarã ome. Mama bɨde Cristopa ooda waawee–ee jarateepachi judiorãmaa.
Ichiaba aupedeepachi judiorã griego pedee pedeepataarã ome. Mapa ãrapa iru peetꞌaa kꞌinia pꞌanapachida.
Cristode ijãapataarãpa mãga kꞌawaadakꞌãri, ateejida Cesarea pꞌuurudee. Mamãikꞌaapa pëijida Tarso pꞌuurudee.

Maapai ijãapataarã Judeadepemaarã, Galileadepemaarã mãikꞌaapa Samariadepemaarã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapachida. Akꞌõre Jaurepa ãchi kꞌaripapachi perã, waapɨara oo kꞌawaa wãpachida Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨ mãikꞌaapa chokꞌaraara ĩwa wãpachida.
Maapai Pedropa Cristode ijãapataarãmaa pꞌasia nipakꞌãri, panaji Lida pꞌuurude.
Mama ununaji eperã tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Eneas. Mãgɨ́ ocho años iru baji chiwa bɨ.
Ma eperã unukꞌãri, Pedropa irumaa mãgaji:
—Eneas, Jesucristopa pɨ jɨparupɨ. Pꞌirabaipáde aji, mãikꞌaapa pɨchi pꞌaru bedáji.
Aramata Eneas pꞌirabaidachi.
Chokꞌara Lida pꞌuurude pꞌanapatapꞌedaarãpa mãikꞌaapa Sarón eujãde pꞌanapatapꞌedaarãpa Eneas jɨpa bɨ unudakꞌãri, Jesucristode ijãajida.
Maapai Jope pꞌuurude baji wẽra Cristode ijãapari, tꞌɨ̃jarapachida Tabita; griego pedeede Dorcas
Ma wẽra kꞌayaadachi mãikꞌaapa jai–idaaji. Judiorãpa oopatapꞌedaakꞌa iru kꞌapꞌɨa kꞌuitꞌaadapꞌeda, te ɨtꞌɨpema pisode bɨnajida.
Maapai Pedro Lida pꞌuurude baji. Lida Jope pꞌuuru kꞌaitꞌa bada perã, ijãapataarãpa eperãarã omé pëijida irumaa. Mãganajida:
—Isapai chepáde ajida, Jopedee.
Pedro wãji ãchi ome mãikꞌaapa panadakꞌãri, ateejida piuda bɨmaa. Jõmaweda pꞌẽtrãarã jẽe para baji iru ikꞌaawa mãikꞌaapa Pedromaa akꞌɨpijida Dorcapa pꞌaru kꞌaatꞌɨda chokꞌai bakꞌãri.
Pedropa jõmaweda taawaa uchiapikꞌooji. Mãpai bedabaipꞌeda, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ji. Tꞌẽepai jai–idaa badamaa akꞌɨji mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:
—¡Tabita, pꞌirabáiji!
Iru tau ẽeji mãikꞌaapa Pedro unukꞌãri, su–akꞌɨ beeji.
Pedropa juadeepa pꞌirabai ataji mãikꞌaapa tꞌɨ̃ pꞌeji chi pꞌẽtrãarã mãikꞌaapa awaraa ijãapataarã, ãchimaa akꞌɨpiitꞌee chokꞌai bɨ.
Jopedepemaarãpa mãga kꞌawaadakꞌãri, chokꞌara Cristode ijãajida.
Maperã Pedro kꞌãima chokꞌara beeji ma pꞌuurude, ne–e pꞌoopari tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Simón tede.
Pedro Jope pꞌuurude bɨ misa, Cesarea pꞌuurude baji eperã tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Cornelio. Mãgɨ́ Romadepema soldaorã batallondepema poro paji. Ma batallón tꞌɨ̃jarapachida Italiadepema.
Mãgɨ́ eperã tꞌãri pia bapachi. Ichi tedepemaarã ome Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapachida. Ichiaba pꞌaratꞌa teepachi judiorã kꞌaripaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pachi.
Ewari aba a las tres, kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌa bɨde taawapemakꞌa unuji ɨtꞌaripema ángel ichimãi tꞌĩuru mãikꞌaapa jararu:
—¡Cornelio!
Corneliopa waaweede mãgɨ́ ángel kꞌĩra akꞌɨ nɨ̃beepꞌeda, iidiji:
—¿Kꞌãata kꞌinia bɨma? aji.
Pꞌanauji:
—Tachi Akꞌõrepa ũrijida aji, pɨa ɨtꞌaa iidida mãikꞌaapa unu bɨ pɨa pꞌaratꞌa teepari chupɨria beerãmaa. Pɨa pia oo bɨ iru kꞌĩrapite.
Eperã pë́iji Jope pꞌuurudee aneemerã Simón Pedro apata.
Irua pɨmaa Akꞌõre netꞌaa jarateeitꞌee. Awaraa Simón, ne–e pꞌoopari tede bɨ. Mãgɨ́ pꞌusa ide baparida aji.
Ma ángel ichi ome pedeemaa bada wãkꞌãri, Corneliopa tꞌɨ̃ pëiji ichi mimiapataarã omé mãikꞌaapa Romadepema soldao aba Akꞌõrede ijãa bada.
Ichia kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌa bɨde unuda nepɨrɨpꞌeda, ãchi pëiji Jopedee.
Aɨ norema imatꞌɨpa ãchi Jope pꞌuuru kꞌaitꞌa wãrutade, Pedro wãji terrazade ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃de.
Mama bɨde jarrapisia nɨ̃beeji. Nejoomaa pꞌanɨ misa, ichia kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌa bɨde
unuji pajã ewadaru. Madeepa ɨtꞌariipa che wãji lienzokꞌa bɨ. Ma kꞌɨ̃ chaa jɨ̃ beeji.
Mãgɨ́ pꞌarude ne–animalaarã kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo pꞌanajida: bɨɨrɨpa nĩuteepata, bipa nĩuteepata mãikꞌaapa wãabaipata.
Pedropa mãga akꞌɨ bɨde pedee ũriji:
—Pedro, pꞌirabáiji. Péeji mãikꞌaapa kꞌopáde aji.
Pedropa pꞌanauji:
—Tachi Waibɨa, kꞌo–eda aji, mɨchi tꞌoru weda waide kꞌokꞌaa perã jãgee ne–animalaarã, pɨa kꞌoikꞌaraa bɨda ada.
Waya pedee ũriji:
—Akꞌõrepa kꞌoipia papida kꞌoikꞌaraa bɨda anaapáde aji.
Jarada õpee mãga jarapꞌeda, mãgɨ́ lienzokꞌa bɨ waya ɨtꞌaa wãji.
Pedropa kꞌĩsia beeji kꞌãata jara kꞌinia baji ichia unuda mãgɨ́ kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌa badade. Mãga nɨde Simón te iidi wãdapa Cornelio mimiapataarã pachejida te tꞌĩupata tꞌaide.
Arii panadakꞌãri, iidijida:
—¿Nama bɨkꞌã ajida, eperã tꞌɨ̃jarapata Simón Pedro?
Atꞌãri Pedro kꞌĩsiamaa bɨde ichi kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌa badade, Akꞌõre Jaurepa mãgaji irumaa:
—Eperã õpeerãpa pɨ jɨrɨ nidada aji.
Pꞌirabáiji mãikꞌaapa ɨrabáiji. Wã́ji ãra ome kꞌĩsia–ee, mɨata ãra pëida perã.
Pedro ɨrabaipꞌeda, mãgaji ma eperãarãmaa:
—Mɨda aji, parãpa jɨrɨ pꞌanɨ. ¿Kꞌãata oo che pꞌanɨma? aji.
Pꞌanaujida:

—Tai chejida Cornelio, Romadepema soldaorã poropa pëida perã. Iru Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapari mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri pia bapari. Mapa jõmaweda Cesareadepema judiorãpa iru kꞌinia iru pꞌanapata. Ɨtꞌaripema angelpa jaraji irumaa tai pëimerã pɨ atade, pɨ iru temaa wãmerã jarateede.
Mãpai Pedropa teeda tꞌĩupipꞌeda, nekꞌopiji mãikꞌaapa pꞌaru teeji kꞌãidamerã. Aɨ norema, Pedro wãji ãchi ome. Jopedepema ijãapataarã ũkꞌuruurãpa iru kꞌõpꞌãyanajida.
Aɨ norema panajida Cesareade, Corneliopa nɨmaa badamãi, ichi te pidaarã ome mãikꞌaapa ichia tꞌɨ̃ pëida kꞌõpꞌãyoorã kꞌiniarã ome.
Pedro aɨ temaa panakꞌãri, Cornelio taawaa cheji mãikꞌaapa Pedro kꞌĩrapite bedabaidachi, irumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃itꞌee.
Mamĩda Pedropa pꞌirabaipiji, mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:
—Mɨ jida pɨkꞌa, eperã jĩpꞌaada aji.
Maapꞌeda pedee wãdapa teeda tꞌĩujida eperãarã see nɨ̃badamãi.
Mãpai Pedropa mãgaji:
—Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨda aji, tai judiorã tꞌĩudaikꞌaraa bɨ judio–eerã tede mãikꞌaapa kꞌõpꞌãyo meraadaikꞌaraa bɨ parã ome. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨmaa kꞌawapijida aji, jõmaarã ome kꞌõpꞌãyo meraaipia bɨ.
Maperã jararutata mɨ cheji, kꞌĩsia–ee. Ɨ̃rá kꞌawa kꞌinia bɨda aji, ¿kꞌãare–itꞌeeta mɨ tꞌɨ̃ pëiji?
Corneliopa pꞌanauji:
—Kꞌãima kꞌĩmari paruda aji, na horakꞌa kꞌewara, mɨ ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa bɨ misa, eperã pꞌaru uchiterree jɨ̃ bɨ mɨ kꞌĩrapite bainɨ̃ ba cheji.
Jaraji ma eperãpa: “Cornelio, Akꞌõrepa ũrijida aji, pɨa ɨtꞌaa iidida mãikꞌaapa unu bɨda aji, pɨa pꞌaratꞌa teepari chupɨria beerãmaa. Pɨa pia oo bɨ iru kꞌĩrapite.
Eperã pëipáde aji, Jope pꞌuurudee eperã tꞌɨ̃jarapata Simón Pedro atade. Iru baparida aji, awaraa Simón ne–e pꞌoopari tede pꞌusa ide.”
Maperã mɨa isapai pëiji pɨ jɨrɨde mãikꞌaapa pɨ tꞌãri pia bairã, cheji. Ɨ̃rá nama jõmaweda pꞌanɨ misa Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, taipa ũri kꞌinia pꞌanɨda aji, jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨmaa jarapiru.
Mãpai Pedro pedeemaa beeji:
—Ɨ̃rá wãara mɨa kꞌawaaruda aji, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ aukꞌaarã apemaarã kꞌãyaara pipɨara akꞌɨ–e bɨ.
Awaraa eujãdepemaarã jida kꞌinia iru bapari ichide ijãadakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa pia oodakꞌãri.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawapiji Israeldeepa uchiadapꞌedaarãmaa ichia ãchi kꞌãiwee pꞌanapiitꞌee Jesucristo kꞌaurepa, iru jõmaarã Waibɨa perã.
Parãpa pia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda Galilea eujãde mãikꞌaapa Judea eujãde, Juanpa poro chooipia bɨda a nipada tꞌẽepai.

Ichiaba kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesús Nazaretdepema pëida ichia oopi bɨkꞌa oomerã, ichi Jaurepa kꞌaripapꞌeda. Mãgɨ́ Jesupa ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa oo nipaji mãikꞌaapa jɨpapachi eperãarã netuara merãtɨa beerã. Mãga oopachi Tachi Akꞌõre iru ome bada perã.
Tai iru ome nipapatapꞌedaarãpa unujida jõmaweda irua ooda Judea eujãde mãikꞌaapa Jerusalén pꞌuurude. Ichiaba pꞌanajida iru kurusode peedakꞌãri.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru chokꞌai pꞌirabai ataji kꞌãima õpeemaa, maapꞌeda taimaa unupiji.
Judiorã jõmaarãmaa unupi–e paji. Jĩpꞌa taimaapaita unupiji, Tachi Akꞌõrepa aɨ naaweda tai jɨrɨtꞌerada perã iru unudamerã. Chokꞌai pꞌirabaida tꞌẽepai iru tai ome nekꞌoji akꞌɨpiitꞌee wãara chokꞌai bɨ.

Aɨ tꞌẽepai irua tai pëiji judiorãmaa jaranadamerã taipa unudapꞌedaa mãikꞌaapa jarateenadamerã iruta Tachi Akꞌõrepa bɨda jõmaarã Waibɨa. Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate chokꞌai pꞌanɨɨrãpa oopata mãikꞌaapa piudapꞌedaarãpa oopatapꞌedaa akꞌɨitꞌee.
Jõmaweda Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa irua ooitꞌee bada kꞌawa pꞌanajida mãikꞌaapa jarapachida Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru kꞌaurepa wẽpapipariitꞌee irude ijãarutaarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata.
Atꞌãri Pedro pedeemaa bɨde, Akꞌõre Jaure cheji chi ũrimaa pꞌanadapꞌedaarãmaa.
Judiorã ijãapataarã Pedro ome chedapꞌedaarã akꞌɨtrua para beeji, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Jaure ba chepida perã judio–eerã kꞌapꞌɨade.
Ũripachida pedee para bɨ ãchia kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ pedeede mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa iidi para bɨ.
Mãpai Pedropa mãgaji:
—Tachi Akꞌõrepa na eperãarãmaa ichi Jaure pëiru taimaa pëidakꞌa. Mãga bɨta, ¿kꞌaipa poro choonaapáde adayama? aji.
Mãpai Pedropa jaraji Jesucristo tꞌɨ̃de poro choopidamerã. Maapꞌeda Corneliopa chupɨria iidiji Pedromaa ãchi ome taarã beemerã.
Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã mãikꞌaapa apemaarã ijãapataarã Judea eujãde pꞌanɨɨrãpa ũrijida judio–eerãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida ũridapꞌeda, ichiaba Cristode ijãadapꞌedaa.
Mapa Pedro waya chekꞌãri Jerusalendee, ũkꞌuru judiorã Cristode ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaarã kꞌĩrau pꞌanajida irua ooda kꞌaurepa judio–eerã tꞌãide.
Iidijida:
—¿Sãapꞌeda judio–eerã akꞌɨnajima? ajida. ¿Sãapꞌeda ãra ome nekꞌojima? ajida.
Mãpai Pedropa nepɨrɨmaa beeji jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichimaa kꞌawapida:
—Mɨ bajida aji, Jope pꞌuurude. Ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa bɨde kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌa bɨde unuji lienzokꞌa bɨ ɨtꞌariipa mɨmaa che wã. Ma kꞌɨ̃ chaa jɨ̃ beeji.
Pi–ia akꞌɨji kꞌawaaitꞌee kꞌãata edajãde paraaji. Unuji ne–animalaarã kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo, bɨɨrɨpa nĩuteepata, kꞌachia beepata, bipa nĩuteepata mãikꞌaapa wãabaipata.
Maapꞌeda pedee ũriji: “Pedro, pꞌirabáiji. Peepꞌeda, kꞌóji.”
Mãpai mɨa pꞌanauji: “Waide jãgee ne–animalaarã pɨa kꞌoikꞌaraa bɨda adadepema kꞌokꞌaada” aji.
ʼMãpai ɨtꞌariipa waya pedeeji: “Akꞌõrepa kꞌoipia papida kꞌoikꞌaraa bɨda anáaji.”
Jarada õpee mãga jaraji. Maapꞌeda ma lienzokꞌa bɨ waya ɨtꞌaa jidiu ataji.
Aramata eperãarã õpee pëidapꞌedaa Cesareadeepa mɨ jɨrɨ chejida mɨ te badamãi.
Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa mɨmaa jaraji wãmerã ãra ome, kꞌĩsia–ee. Na kꞌõpꞌãyoorã seis wãjida ichiaba mɨ ome. Jõmaweda tꞌĩujida ma eperã ichi mimiapataarã pëi bada temãi.
Ma eperãpa taimaa nepɨrɨji ichia ángel unuda mãikꞌaapa ma angelpa jarada: “Eperã pëipáde aji, Jope pꞌuurudee eperã tꞌɨ̃jarapata Simón Pedro atanadamerã.
Irua jarayada aji, sãga Akꞌõrepa pɨ o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atai pɨchi te pidaarã ome.”
ʼMɨ pachepꞌeda, pedeemaa beekꞌãri, Akꞌõre Jaure ãramaa cheji, naaweda tachi judiorãmaa chedakꞌa.
Mãga pakꞌãri, mɨa kꞌirãpaji Tachi Waibɨapa jarada: “Wãara Juan Bautistapa poro choopachi paniapa. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Jaure ba chepiitꞌee parã kꞌapꞌɨade.”

Mãgá mɨa kꞌawaaji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Jaure ba chepi kꞌinia bɨ ãra ome tachi ome ba chepidakꞌa, aukꞌa ijãapata perã Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristode. Mãga bɨta ¿sãga mɨa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda kꞌachia bɨda ayama? aji.
Jerusalendepema ijãapataarãpa mãga ũridakꞌãri, kꞌĩupꞌee para beeji. Maapꞌeda ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃jida Tachi Akꞌõremaa. Mãgajida:
—¡Mãgara Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Jaure judio–eerã kꞌapꞌɨade ichiaba ba chepiitꞌee, kꞌachia oodaamaa pꞌaneedakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa Jesucristode ijãadakꞌãri! ¡Mãgá ichita iru ome chokꞌai pꞌanapataadaitꞌee!

Esteban piuda tꞌẽepai, Jesucristode ijãapataarã jɨrɨmaa pꞌanadakꞌãri peedaitꞌee, ũkꞌuru mirukꞌoodachida Fenicia eujãdee, Chipre isladee mãikꞌaapa Antioquía pꞌuurudee. Ãchi wãdapꞌedaa chaa Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee jarateepachida judiorãmaa aupai.
Mamĩda Cristode ijãapataarãpa Chipredepemaarã mãikꞌaapa Cirene pꞌuurudepemaarã chedapꞌeda Antioquía pꞌuurude, Jesupa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee jarateepachida judio–eerãmaa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra kꞌaripaji. Mapa judio–eerã chokꞌara Jesucristode ijãa pꞌaneejida.
Ijãapataarã Jerusalendepemaarãpa mãga ũridakꞌãri, Bernabé pëijida Antioquiadee.
Panakꞌãri, Bernabepa unuji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra kꞌaripada. Mapa o–ĩadachi. Ũraaji tꞌãripa Cristode ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa irua oopi bɨkꞌa oodamerã.
Bernabé eperã tꞌãri pia bapachi. Cristode pia ijãapachi mãikꞌaapa oopachi Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Maperã eperãarã chokꞌara Cristode ijãajida iru kꞌaurepa.
Ma tꞌẽepai Bernabé wãji Tarso pꞌuurudee Saulo jɨrɨde.

Unu atakꞌãri, ateeji Antioquiadee. Mama pꞌaneejida año aba ijãapataarã ome jarateemaa Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Eperãarã chokꞌaraarãpa ãchia jarateeda ũripachida. Antioquía pꞌuurude naapɨara Cristode ijãapataarã tꞌɨ̃ bɨjida Cristodeerã.
Maapai Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarã ũkꞌuru wãjida Jerusalendeepa Antioquiadee.

Mama pꞌanɨde mãɨrãdepema aba tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Agabo, ijãapataarã kꞌĩrapite bainɨ̃ beepꞌeda, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarapiji jarra oodaitꞌee jõmaweda Roma jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã eujãde. Wãara, aɨ tꞌẽepai mãgɨpa jaradakꞌa pꞌasaji César Claudio Romadepema reyrã poro waibɨa bakꞌãri.
Antioquiadepema Cristode ijãapataarãpa mãga ũridakꞌãri, pedeeteejida Judeadepema ijãapataarã kꞌaripadaitꞌee, ãchia pꞌaratꞌa teedai pitapai.
Mãgɨ́ pꞌaratꞌa pꞌedapꞌeda, Judeadepema ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarãmaa tee pëijida Bernabé ome mãikꞌaapa Saulo ome.
Bernabé Saulo ome Antioquía pꞌuurude atꞌãri pꞌanɨ misa, Rey Herodepa
Jaraji Juan ɨ̃pema, Santiago espadapa peetꞌaadamerã.
Herodepa kꞌawaakꞌãri judiorã o–ĩa pꞌanɨ ichia oo bɨ unudapꞌeda, ichiaba Pedro jita atapiji. Mãga ooji judiorãpa fiesta pan levadura wẽe kꞌopata oo pꞌanɨde.

Pedro jita atadapꞌeda, Herodepa carcelde tꞌɨ nɨ̃bɨpiji. Mama Romadepema soldaorã dieciséis pꞌepachida kꞌĩmarikꞌĩmarii carcel jɨ̃adamerã. Herodepa kꞌĩsia iru baji Pedro ɨmɨateeitꞌee eperãarã taide Pascua fiesta tꞌẽepai.
Mãgá Pedro baji carcelde jɨ̃apari paraa. Mamĩda awaraa Cristode ijãapataarãpa ewari chaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pachida iru pari.

Herodepa Pedro ɨmɨateeitꞌee pada ewate aɨ noreweda pꞌãrikꞌua, Pedro jua cadenapa soldao jua kꞌĩraichaa jɨ̃pꞌeda, kꞌãi baji ãchi esajĩakꞌa. Mãɨmisa apemaarã soldaorã taawa jɨ̃amaa pꞌanapachida chi tꞌĩupatamãi.
Mãga nɨde Pedromãi ɨ̃daadachi mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaripema ángel bainɨ̃ ba cheji. Mãgɨpa Pedro orromãi tꞌõbaiji mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:
—¡Isapai pꞌirabáiji!
Mãga jararuta, cadena baaikꞌoodachida Pedro juadeepa.
Mãpai ma angelpa mãgaji:
—Pꞌaru jɨ̃ beepꞌeda, pɨchi chancla jɨ̃ béeji.
Mãga ooji Pedropa. Maapꞌeda mãgaji angelpa:
—Pɨchi ɨ̃rɨpema pꞌaru jɨ̃ beepꞌeda, mɨ ome chéji.
Pedro uchiaji iru tꞌẽe, kꞌawa–ee wãara wa seewa angelpa oo bɨ. Ichi kꞌĩsia–itꞌee kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌa baji.

Mamĩda wãyaajida chi jɨ̃apari naapema, maapꞌeda araarepema ichiaba. Carcel puerta hierrodee ooda badamãi pachedakꞌãri calle jãdee uchiadaitꞌee, ma puerta ichi itu ewadachi. Uchiadapꞌeda, calle jãde wãjida mãikꞌaapa ma angelpa ituaba atabëiji.
Mãpai Pedropa kꞌawaaji kꞌãimokꞌaraa–e bɨ. Mapa mãgaji:
—Ɨ̃rá mɨa kꞌawa bɨda aji, wãara Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ángel pëiji mɨ kꞌaripaitꞌee Herodes juadeepa mãikꞌaapa judiorã poroorã kꞌachia oodaitꞌee padadeepa.
Mãga kꞌawaakꞌãri, Pedro wãji María temaa. Mãgɨ́ Juan nawe paji. Ma Juan ichiaba tꞌɨ̃jarapachida Marcos. Arii ijãapataarã chokꞌara ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa pꞌanajida Pedro pari.
Ma te tꞌĩupata taawaikꞌa eereepa Pedropa tꞌɨ̃ji. Mãpai te akꞌɨpari awẽra Rode apatapꞌedaapa akꞌɨ cheji kꞌawaaitꞌee kꞌaita mãga ni.
Pedro otau kꞌawaakꞌãri, o–ĩadachi. O–ĩapa puerta ewa–ee, edaa pꞌiradachi jarade Pedro taawa bɨ.
Mãga ũridakꞌãri, mãgajida:
—¿Kꞌĩra kꞌawa–ee nɨ̃bɨkꞌã? ajida.
Mamĩda ichia wãarada akꞌãri, ãchia mãgapachida:
—Iru–epɨ, Tachi Akꞌõre angelpɨ; iru ome nipaparida ajida.
Mãɨmisa Pedropa taawaikꞌa eereepa tꞌɨ̃maa bapachi. Mãpai puerta ewadapꞌeda, unudakꞌãri, pꞌeradachida.
Mamĩda ichi juapa jaraji kꞌĩupꞌee pꞌaneedamerã mãikꞌaapa nepɨrɨji sãga Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi carceldeepa uchia atada. Maapꞌeda mãgaji:
—Nepɨrɨde wã́tɨ Santiagomaa mãikꞌaapa apemaarã Cristode ijãapataarãmaa.
Tꞌẽepai Pedro wãji awara ãyaa.
Ewarikꞌãri, carcelde kꞌĩraupikꞌa para beeji, kꞌawada–e pada perã sãmaa wãji Pedro.

Herodepa kꞌawaa atakꞌãri, jaraji jɨrɨnadamerã. Mamĩda pꞌoyaa unuda–e pada perã, chi soldaorã jɨ̃a pꞌanadapꞌedaarãmaa iidipꞌeda, jita pꞌe atapiji mãikꞌaapa peepikꞌooji. Ma tꞌẽepai Herodes uchiaji Judeadeepa mãikꞌaapa Cesarea pꞌuurude banaji.

Maapai Herodes kꞌĩrau baji Tiro pꞌuurudepemaarã ome mãikꞌaapa Sidón pꞌuurudepemaarã ome. Mapa ãchi wãjida iru ome pedeede. Mamĩda panadakꞌãri, pꞌaajida Herodes mimiapataarã poro aba, Blastomaa, irua naapɨara chupɨria iidinamerã ãchi pari, chõoda–e paitꞌee. Mãga oojida ãchia ne–inaa kꞌodaitꞌee netonapachida perã Herodes jua ekꞌari pꞌanadapꞌedaarã eujãde.
Ma eperãpa iidinakꞌãri, Herodepa jaraji ichia jararu ewate chedamerã. Ma ewate pakꞌãri, ichi pꞌaru pia jɨ̃ beepꞌeda, rey su–akꞌɨ beeparide su–akꞌɨ banaji mãikꞌaapa pedeemaa beeji.
Ichi pedeemaa ũridakꞌãri, eperãarã biukꞌa nɨ̃beeji mãikꞌaapa mãgapachida:
—Nãgɨ́ eperã nama pedeemaa bɨ eperã–eda ajida. Akꞌõre waibɨ́akꞌata bɨda apachida.
Aramata, angelpa Herodes kꞌayaapitꞌaaji, irua ɨtrɨa–e pada perã mãga jaradakꞌãri. Mapa mokꞌitꞌa kꞌida pꞌuapa piuji.
Maapai ijãapataarã chokꞌaraara ĩwa wãpachida. Tꞌɨmɨpɨara jaratee wãpachida Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda Cristo piuda kꞌaurepa.

Bernabé Saulo ome Jerusalendepema ijãapataarãmaa tee chejida ma pꞌaratꞌa ijãapataarãpa teedapꞌedaa Antioquiade. Maapꞌeda waya wãjida Antioquiadee. Ãchi ome ateejida Juan. Mãgɨ́ ichiaba tꞌɨ̃jarapachida Marcos.

Antioquiadepema Cristode ijãapataarã tꞌãide paraaji Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarã mãikꞌaapa jarateepataarã. Mãgɨɨrã paji Bernabé, Simón (ichiaba tꞌɨ̃jarapata Nerro), Lucio Cirene pꞌuurudepema, Menahem (aukꞌa warida Galilea pidaarã poro Herodes ome) mãikꞌaapa Saulo.
Ewari aba mãɨrã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa pꞌanɨde nekꞌoda–ee, Akꞌõre Jaurepa mãgaji:
—Awara bɨdapáde aji, Bernabé mãikꞌaapa Saulo, mɨa ãra jɨrɨtꞌerada perã oodamerã mimia mɨa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ãchi–itꞌee.
Ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dapꞌeda nekꞌoda–ee, mãgɨɨrã ɨ̃rɨ jua bɨjida, maapꞌeda pëijida.
Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa mãgá pëida perã, Bernabé Saulo ome wãjida Seleucia pꞌuurudee. Mama barcode bataudapꞌeda, Chipre isladee wãjida.
Salamina pꞌuurude panadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda Cristo piuda kꞌaurepa judiorãmaa jarateemaa pꞌaneejida, Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata tede. Ichiaba Juan Marcos mama nipaji ãchi ome kꞌaripaitꞌee.

Chipre isla jõmaweda bɨɨrɨpa wãyaa wãdapa, jaratee wãjida Pafos pꞌuurude panarutamaa. Mama ununajida judío tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Barjesús. Mãgɨpa petau tau kꞌawaa baji. Seewa–idaa bapachi, ichia Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jaraparida apachi perã.

Mãgɨ́ Romadepema poro Sergio Paulo kꞌõpꞌãyo paji. Sergio Paulo kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa baji. Mapa tꞌɨ̃ pëiji Bernabé mãikꞌaapa Saulo, ũri kꞌinia bada perã ãchia jarateepata Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda Cristo piuda kꞌaurepa.
Mamĩda ãchia jarateemaa pꞌanɨ misa, mãgɨ́ petau tau kꞌawaa bɨpa, (griego pedeede Elimas apatapꞌedaa) jarapachi Romadepema poromaa irua ijãanaamerã ãchia jaratee pꞌanɨ.
Mãpai Saulo, ichiaba Pablo apatapꞌedaapa, Akꞌõre Jaure iru ome bapachi perã, mãgɨ́ petau tau kꞌawaa bɨ kꞌĩra pia akꞌɨji mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:
—¡Seewa–idaa, netuara warra! ¡Kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ! ¿Chĩara kꞌũra kꞌinia bɨ–ekꞌã seewa jara bɨpa? ¿Sãapꞌeda Akꞌõrepa jarateepida pɨa seewada aparima?
Ɨ̃raweda Akꞌõrepa pɨ kꞌachia ooitꞌee. Pɨ tau pꞌãriu baibeeitꞌee. Taarã mãgá nipaitꞌeeda aji, akꞌõrejĩru unu–ee.
Aramata Elimas tau pꞌãriudachi mãikꞌaapa pariatua jɨrɨ nipapachi ichi juadeepa jidibai ateedamerã.
Romadepema poropa mãga unukꞌãri mãikꞌaapa ãchia jaratee pꞌanɨ ũrikꞌãri, kꞌawaaji wãarata pedee pꞌanɨ. Mapa Cristode ijãaji.

Pablo mãikꞌaapa ichi ome nipapatapꞌedaarã Pafos pꞌuurudeepa barcode wãjida Perge pꞌuurudee. Mãgɨ́ pꞌuuru Panfilia eujãde bɨ. Mama pꞌanɨde Juan Marcopa ãchi atabëiji mãikꞌaapa ãpɨtee wãji Jerusalendee.
Mamĩda ãchi Pergedeepa wãjida Antioquía pꞌuurudee. Mãgɨ́ pꞌuuru Pisidia eujãde bɨ. Mama pꞌanɨde ɨ̃ipata ewate tꞌĩujida judiorã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata tede mãikꞌaapa su–akꞌɨ pꞌaneejida.
Mãgɨ́ tedepema judiorã poroorãpa Moisepa pꞌãda mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa pꞌãdapꞌedaa pedeedapꞌeda, jara pëijida Pablomaa mãikꞌaapa Bernabemaa:
—Tachi aukꞌaarã, parãpa eperãarãmaa pedee pia jara kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã, ɨ̃raweda jaradapáde aji.
Mãpai Pablo ɨtꞌa akꞌɨnɨ̃ beepꞌeda mãikꞌaapa juapa jarapꞌeda kꞌĩupꞌee pꞌaneedamerã, mãgaji:
—Ũrítɨ Israel pidaarã mãikꞌaapa parã awaraa eujãdepemaarã, Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa pꞌanɨɨrã.

Tai Israel pidaarãpa ijãa pꞌanɨda aji, chonaarãweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai chonaarã jɨrɨtꞌeraji ichi–itꞌee. Ãchi ĩwapiji Egiptode, atꞌãri awaraa eujãdepemaarãkꞌa pꞌanajida mĩda. Ichi juapa ãchi mamãikꞌaapa uchiapiji, ichi jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã.
Ma awara ãchi akꞌɨpachi cuarenta años eujã pania wẽe bɨde wãyaadakꞌãri.
Canaán eujãde panadakꞌãri, ichia Canaandepema awara–awaraa to pidaarã siete kꞌiniipiji, ãra eujã tai judiorã chonaarãpa atadamerã.
Akꞌõrepa tai judiorã jɨrɨtꞌeradakꞌãriipa mãgɨ́ eujã Canaánde atarutamaa cuatrocientos cincuenta años paji.
ʼMa tꞌẽepai Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã charraarãkꞌa bɨji aba–abaa, ãchi akꞌɨpataadamerã, ichi pedee jarapari Samuel ãchi poro waibɨa parumaa.
Mãpai ãchia iidijida Samuelmaa rey bɨmerã ãchi akꞌɨpari. Mapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa Saúl ãchi rey papiji cuarenta años. Mãgɨ́ Quis warra paji, Benjamín ëreerãdepema.
Aɨ tꞌẽepai Saúl uchiapipꞌeda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa Rey David bɨji iru pari. Mãgaji:
‘Mɨa Jesé warra David unujida aji, mɨa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Ichiaba mɨa kꞌawa bɨda aji, irua ooitꞌee mɨa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.’
ʼRey David ëreerãdeepa uchiaji Tachi Kꞌaripapari. Mãgɨ́ Jesús, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëida Israel pidaarã kꞌaripamerã, ichia naaweda jaradakꞌa ichi pedee jarapataarã itꞌaideepa.
Mãgɨ́ Jesús chei naaweda, Juan Bautistapa jarateepachi jõmaweda Israel pidaarãmaa ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo amaadamerã mãikꞌaapa poro choopidamerã.
Mãpai Juanpa, ichi mimia aupa wãkꞌãri, mãgaji:
‘Mɨ parã poro waibɨa–e, parãpa kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨkꞌa. Mamĩda mɨ tꞌẽepai cheitꞌeeda aji, eperãarã poro waibɨara bɨ. Mɨa iru chancla jida ẽraikꞌaraa bɨda aji, iru mɨ kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã.’
ʼMɨchi aukꞌaarã, Abrahamdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã, ichiaba parã judio–eerã, ¡ũrítɨ! Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi jõmaarãmaa jara pëi bɨ sãga ichia tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ata kꞌinia bɨ.

Eperãarã Jerusalende pꞌanapatapꞌedaarãpa mãikꞌaapa ãchi poroorãpa kꞌawada–e pꞌanajida Jesús Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëida eperãarã kꞌaripamerã. Ichiaba kꞌawadakꞌaa paji Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara kꞌinia bada chonaarãwedapema Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa pꞌãdapꞌedaade, ɨ̃ipata ewari chaa judiorãpa mãgɨ́ leepata mĩda Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata tede. Maperã ãchiata oojida ma ũraade jaradapꞌedaakꞌa Jesús peepidakꞌãri.
Irua maarepida kꞌachia oo–e paji. Mamĩda ãchia iru pee kꞌinia pꞌanajida. Mapa Pilatomaa iidinajida peepitꞌaamerã.
Maapꞌeda jõma oodapꞌeda iru ome Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara badakꞌa, awaraarãpa kurusodeepa ɨrabai atadapꞌeda, ɨanajida.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrépata chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiji.
Aɨ tꞌẽepai iru ome chedapꞌedaarãpa Galileadeepa Jerusalendee unuda chokꞌara unupachida, mãikꞌaapa ɨ̃rá tai aukꞌaarãmaa ãchia unudapꞌedaa jara pꞌanɨ.
ʼMapa taipa parãmaa nãgɨ́ pedee pia jara kꞌinia pꞌanɨ. Tai judiorã chonaarãmaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaraji

aba pëiitꞌee eperãarã kꞌaripade. Mamĩda ichia mãgɨ́ pëi–e paji tai chonaarã chokꞌai pꞌanɨ weda. Jĩpꞌa pëiji ãchideepa uchiadapꞌedaarã, tachi ɨ̃rapemaarã chokꞌai pꞌanɨde. Mãgɨ́ pëida paji ichi Warra Jesús, ichia chokꞌai pꞌirabaipida. Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ichi Warra pëiji ichi ũraa pꞌãdadepema Salmode jara bairã:
‘Mɨa idi jõmaarãmaa jara bɨ pɨ mɨ Warra.’
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaraji ichi Warra chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiitꞌee, waa piu–e paitꞌee ichi ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa:
‘Rey Davidmaa jaradakꞌa mɨa ooitꞌee, mɨa wãarata jarapari perã.’
Ichiaba jara bɨ awaraa Salmo pꞌãdade:
‘Pɨa mɨ kꞌapꞌɨa beraupi–e paitꞌee, mɨa oopari perã pɨa mɨmaa oopi bɨkꞌa.’
ʼWãara na eujãde bakꞌãri, Rey Davidpa ooji Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru badakꞌa. Maapꞌeda jai–idaaji. Ɨajida chi akꞌõreerã ikꞌaawa mãikꞌaapa ichi kꞌapꞌɨa beraudachi.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesús chokꞌai pꞌirabaipida kꞌapꞌɨa berau–e paji.
Maperãpɨ, tachi aukꞌaarã, kꞌawaadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapipari Jesús piuda kꞌaurepa.

Ma kꞌaurepa ichide ijãapataarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Moisepa pꞌãdakꞌa oodapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpakꞌaa paji mĩda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesude ijãapataarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapipari, Jesupa ooda kꞌaurepa.
Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai pꞌanadai Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa pꞌãdapꞌedaade jara bɨkꞌa:

‘Ũrítɨ parã chi oo iru pꞌanapataarãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨ. Akꞌɨ́tɨ mãikꞌaapa akꞌɨtrua para bátɨ. Parã atꞌãri chokꞌai pꞌanɨde mɨa ooitꞌee ne–inaa parãpa ijãada–e pai, aɨ naaweda abaapa parãmaa mãga jararu pɨjida.’
Pablo Bernabé ome judiorã Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata tedeepa uchiadakꞌãri, chi waa kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa chupɨria iidijida ɨ̃ipata ewate pakꞌãri waya jaratee chedamerã.

Judiorã mãikꞌaapa judio–eerã Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapataarã uchiadapꞌeda, chokꞌara wãjida Pablo mãikꞌaapa Bernabé tꞌẽe. Maperã ãchia ma Akꞌõrede ijãapatapꞌedaarãmaa ũraajida kꞌirãpadamerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi kꞌaripada Cristo piuda kꞌaurepa.
Apema tomiade ɨ̃ipata ewate, perá jõmaweda pꞌuuru pidaarã cheepurujida Akꞌõrepa jarapida ũride.
Mamĩda judiorãpa unudakꞌãri eperãarã chokꞌara see nɨ̃bɨ, kꞌĩraudachida mãikꞌaapa Pablomaa ikꞌachia jaramaa pꞌaneejida, Cristo ãpɨte paara.
Mãpai Pablopa Bernabé ome waawee–ee pꞌanaujida:

—Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai naapɨara pëijida ajida, parã judiorãmaa ichia jara pëida Cristode jarateedamerã. Mamĩda parãpa ũri kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadairã, pãchi kꞌĩradoopa atuadaitꞌee. Mãga pꞌanadairã, tai wãdaitꞌee judio–eerãmaa jarateede.
Mãga oodaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:

‘Kꞌõpꞌãyoorã ome lámpara pëipatakꞌa ɨ̃daamerã ode pꞌãrikꞌua nipadakꞌãri, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨa pɨ pëiru mɨ o akꞌɨpimerã na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãmaa. Mɨa mãgá pëiru kꞌinia bairã pɨa chi tꞌɨmɨara beerã paara o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atamerã.’
Judio–eerãpa mãga ũridakꞌãri, o–ĩa para beeji mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida pia bɨda apachida. Mãpai Cristode ijãajida chi Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bada ichita chokꞌai pꞌanapataadamerã.
Mãgɨɨrãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda jaratee wãpachida ãchi wãrutamaa. Cristo piuda kꞌaurepa irua tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji.

Mamĩda judiorãpa pedeejida wẽraarã ãchikꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre waaweepataarã ome. Pablo Bernabé ome ãpɨte ikꞌachia pedeejida. Maperã ma pꞌaratꞌara beerãpa mãikꞌaapa ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã chi pꞌuuru pidaarã poroorãpa Pablo Bernabé ome ma eujãdeepa jëretꞌaajida.
Mãɨrãpa mãga oodakꞌãri, Pablo Bernabé ome ãchi bɨɨrɨ pꞌora nẽepꞌejida akꞌɨpidaitꞌee waa jarateeda–e paitꞌee ma judiorãmaa, Cristode ijãadakꞌaa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Maapꞌeda wãjida Iconio pꞌuurudee.
Pablo Bernabé ome mãgá jërekꞌoojida mĩda, chi Cristode ijãapataarã ma eujãde o–ĩa pꞌanajida, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure ãchi ome bada perã.

Iconiode panadakꞌãri, oojida Antioquiade oodapꞌedaakꞌa. Tꞌĩujida judiorã Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata tede mãikꞌaapa jarajida Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarapidakꞌa. Mapa judiorã chokꞌara Cristode ijãajida, judio–eerã jida ichiaba.
Mamĩda judiorã Cristode ijãa kꞌiniada–ee pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa pedee kꞌachia jaramaa pꞌaneejida Pablo mãikꞌaapa Bernabé ãpɨte. Mapa judio–eerã kꞌĩraudachida ãra ome.

Mãga pꞌanajida mĩda, ãchi omé arii taarãjida mãikꞌaapa waawee–ee jarateepachida Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapidakꞌa, Cristopa ãchi kꞌaripa bapachi perã. Jarateepachida Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã pia ooda Cristo piuda kꞌaurepa. Maperã Akꞌõrepa ãchimaa oopiji ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa.
Mamĩda, mãga oo pꞌanajida mĩda, ma pꞌuuru pidaarã kꞌĩsia awara–awaraa pꞌanajida. Ũkꞌuru judiorã eere pꞌanajida, jõdee chi apemaarã Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã eere.
Maapai ũkꞌuru judiorã mãikꞌaapa judio–eerã pedeeteejida ãchi poroorã ome miapidaitꞌee; mãupa batꞌa peedaitꞌee.
Mamĩda Pablopa Bernabé ome kꞌawaadakꞌãri, mirudachida Licaonia eujãdee, Listra pꞌuurude mãikꞌaapa Derbe pꞌuurude, ichiaba ma pꞌuuru ikꞌaawa.
Mama ichiaba Jesupa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee jarateepachida.
Listra pꞌuurude pꞌanɨde unujida eperã pꞌoyaa tꞌɨakꞌaa bɨ, ichi tꞌoru weda chiwa bada perã. Ma eperã su–akꞌɨ baji
ũrimaa Pablopa jarateemaa bɨ. Pablopa irumaa akꞌɨkꞌãri mãikꞌaapa unukꞌãri wãara ijãa bɨ, kꞌawaji jɨpaipia bɨ.
Mapa ma eperãmaa golpe pedeeji:
—Pꞌirabáiji mãikꞌaapa jĩpꞌa bainɨ̃ béeji.
Aramata ma eperã pꞌinajɨ̃tɨ bainɨ̃ beeji mãikꞌaapa pꞌɨrrɨa beeji.
Pablopa ooda unudakꞌãri, arii pꞌanadapꞌedaarã biukꞌa nɨ̃beeji Licaonia pidaarã pedeede. Mamĩda Pablopa Bernabé ome ãrapa jara pꞌanɨ kꞌawada–e paji. Ãrapa mãgajida:
—¡Nãgɨɨrã akꞌõre waibɨarã, ɨtꞌariipa edaa che pꞌanɨ tachi tꞌãide eperãarãkꞌa!
Mãpai Bernabé tꞌɨ̃ bɨjida Greciadepemaarã akꞌõre waibɨa Zeus. Jõdee Pablo tꞌɨ̃ bɨjida Hermes, ichiata pedee bapachi perã.

Ma pꞌuuru tꞌĩupata kꞌaitꞌa Zeumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata te iru pꞌanajida. Maperã atapijida Zeus pꞌaaremaa aneemerã pꞌakꞌa ɨmɨkꞌĩra, paadaitꞌee Pablo mãikꞌaapa Bernabé kꞌĩrapite; ma awara nepꞌono aneemerã teedaitꞌee Pablomaa mãikꞌaapa Bernabemaa, ãchi akꞌõre waibɨarã jĩakꞌaapa.
Mamĩda Bernabé Pablo ome kꞌawaadakꞌãri mãgá oo pꞌanɨ ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daitꞌee ãchi kꞌĩrapite, ãchi pꞌaru jẽtꞌaajida tꞌãri pꞌuapa. Maapꞌeda nãga bia tꞌĩudachida eperãarã tꞌãide:

—Eperãarã, ¿sãapꞌeda nãga oorutama? ajida. Tai ichiaba eperãarãpɨ parãkꞌa. Ma–itꞌeepɨ tai che pꞌanɨ jaradaitꞌee nãgee netꞌaa vale–ee baibɨde ijãa amaadamerã; ma kꞌãyaara Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadamerã, iru ichita bapari perã. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooji pajã, na eujã, pꞌusa mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa jõmaweda aɨde nɨ̃bɨ.
Naaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãmaa ita–aria ãchia oo kꞌiniata oopiji.
Mamĩda ichia ãra akꞌɨ baji. Mãga oo bɨpa akꞌɨpiji ichi Tachi Akꞌõre. Ichiata parã–itꞌee kꞌoi chepipari ne–uu pia chaumerã. Mãgá iru pꞌanɨ nekꞌodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa o–ĩa pꞌanadaitꞌee.
Pablopa Bernabé ome ma jõma jarajida mĩda, perá pꞌoyaada–e paji eperãarã pꞌakꞌa ɨmɨkꞌĩra peenaadamerã mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃naadamerã ãchi kꞌĩrapite.

Aɨ tꞌẽepai pachejida judiorã Antioquía pꞌuurudeepa mãikꞌaapa Iconio pꞌuurudeepa. Eperãarã ãchi eere pa atadapꞌeda, Pablomaa mãupa batꞌajida peetꞌaadaitꞌee. Piu bɨ jĩakꞌaapa, pꞌuuru kꞌidaa jidiu baibɨnajida.
Mamĩda Cristode ijãapataarã Pablomãi seedaidakꞌãri, waya pꞌirabaiji. Maapꞌeda waya wãji pꞌuurudee mãikꞌaapa aɨ norema wãji Bernabé ome Derbe pꞌuurudee.
Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee jarateedakꞌãri Derbede, eperãarã chokꞌara ijãajida. Mama bapꞌeda, ãpɨtee chejida Listradee, Iconiodee mãikꞌaapa Antioquiadee.
Ma nipadapꞌedaa chaa ũraajida Cristode ijãapataarã waapɨara ijãa pꞌaneedamerã mãikꞌaapa mãgajida:
—Ɨtꞌaa wãdai naaweda, tachi ichita miadaitꞌeeda ajida, Cristode ijãapata perã.
Ichiaba ijãapataarã para bee chaa ũkꞌuru jɨrɨtꞌerajida ijãapataarã akꞌɨ pꞌanapataadamerã. Mãpai ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dapꞌeda nekꞌoda–ee, ijãapataarã jõmaweda Akꞌõre juade bɨjida.
Maapꞌeda Pisidia eujãde wãyaajida Panfilia eujãde panarutamaa.
Mama bɨde Akꞌõrepa jarapidakꞌa jarateejida Perge pꞌuurude. Mamãikꞌaapa wãjida Atalía pꞌuurudee.

Mama barcode bataudapꞌeda, wãjida Antioquía pꞌuurudee, chi ijãapataarãpa Akꞌõre juade bɨdapꞌedaamãi, irua ãchi pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã. Mãgá irua kꞌaripapachi perã, ãchia oojida jõma irua kꞌinia badakꞌa oodamerã ma wãdade.
Pachedakꞌãri Antioquiade, Cristode ijãapataarã tꞌɨ̃ pꞌejida mãikꞌaapa nepɨrɨjida Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pari ooda. Ichiaba nepɨrɨjida Akꞌõrepa judio–eerãmaa ijãapida.
Maapꞌeda Pablo Bernabé ome mama taarã pꞌaneejida Cristode ijãapataarã ome.
Maapai eperãarã Judeadeepa chejida Antioquiadee. Mãgɨɨrãpa Jesude ijãapataarãmaa jarateemaa pꞌaneejida. Mãgajida:
—Pãchi ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã kꞌapꞌɨade tauchaa bɨda–e pɨrã Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa, ɨtꞌaa wãda–e paitꞌeeda ajida.

Mãpai Pablo Bernabé ome ijɨ̃atɨ pedeejida ãchi ome. Maapꞌeda Jesude ijãapataarãpa Pablo, Bernabé mãikꞌaapa awaraarã pëijida Jerusalendee mãgɨ́ jarateeda iidinadamerã Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãmaa mãikꞌaapa Jerusalendepema ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarãmaa.

Antioquiadepema ijãapataarãpa ãchi pëidapꞌeda, Fenicia eujãde mãikꞌaapa Samaria eujãde wãyaajida. Nepɨrɨjida judio–eerãpa Cristode ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa. Mãga ũridakꞌãri, mãpema Cristode ijãapataarã o–ĩadachida.

Pablo Bernabé ome Jerusalende pachedakꞌãri, awaraa ijãapataarãpa ãra auteebaijida Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarã ome. Chipꞌedaidapꞌeda ãra ome, Pablo mãikꞌaapa Bernabé nepɨrɨjida jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda ãchi pari.
Mamĩda ũkꞌuru fariseorã Cristode ijãapataarã, pꞌirabaijida mãikꞌaapa mãgajida:
—Judio–eerã ijãa pꞌanɨɨrãmaa tauchaa bɨpidaipia bɨ ãchi ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã kꞌapꞌɨade mãikꞌaapa oopidaipia bɨda ajida, Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa.
Mãpai seedachida Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã mãikꞌaapa ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarã kꞌĩsiadaitꞌee ma pedee jaradade.
Taarã aupedee jõnɨde, Pedro pꞌirabaiji mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:
—Ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨda aji, taarãru Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji Jesucristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee jaranamerã judio–eerãmaa, ãchia aukꞌa Jesude ijãadamerã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi tꞌãride iru pꞌanadapꞌedaa kꞌawa bada perã, akꞌɨpiji ichia ãchi jida kꞌinia iru bɨ, tachi kꞌinia iru bɨkꞌa. Mãga akꞌɨpiji ãchimaa pëikꞌãri ichi Jaure, tachimaa pëidakꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi aukꞌa akꞌɨpari tachikꞌa. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata aukꞌa wẽpapikꞌooda perã Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, tachi ome oodakꞌa.

Ɨ̃rá, ¿tachia sãga oodaima? ¿Oodaipia bɨkꞌã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara–e padata? ¿Jõma ijãapataarãmaa oopidaikꞌã mãgee ne–inaa chaaree Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa? Tachia mãikꞌaapa tachi chonaarãpa mãgee ne–inaa jõmaweda pꞌoyaa ooda–e paji.
Maperã mãga oodaikꞌaraa bɨ. Tachia ijãa pꞌanɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo tachi ome tꞌãri pia bairã, tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataitꞌee ɨtꞌaa wãdamerã. Ãchia aukꞌa mãga ijãa pꞌanɨda aji.
Maapꞌeda jõma kꞌĩupꞌee para beeji Bernabé Pablo ome nepɨrɨmaa pꞌaneedakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopida ãchimaa judio–eerã tꞌãide, eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa.
Pedee aupadakꞌãri, Santiagopa mãgaji:
—Ɨ̃pemaarã, mɨ pedee ũrítɨ.
Simón Pedropa etꞌewa nepɨrɨjida aji, Tachi Akꞌõrepa judio–eerã kꞌaripada. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi jida jɨrɨpari ichideerã pꞌaneedamerã.
Mãga bɨ iru pedee jarapataarãpa pꞌãdapꞌedaade jara bɨkꞌa:

‘Nãga bapꞌeda, mɨa Rey David trua waya papiitꞌee irudeepa uchiada jua ekꞌari. Mɨa ooitꞌee Israel pidaarã tꞌãidepema te kꞌarawapataarãpa oopatakꞌa. Te tꞌeedaikꞌãri, ãrapa tꞌeedeechoo jẽra bada araa pꞌepata te chiwidikꞌa bainɨ̃ bɨdaitꞌee.

Mãga pɨkꞌa Rey Daviddeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã mɨde ijãa pꞌanɨ mɨa araa pꞌeitꞌee apemaarã mɨde ijãa pꞌanɨɨrã ome. Maapꞌeda ma jõmaweda mɨchideerã papiitꞌee mɨ Warra kꞌaurepa. Mãga ooitꞌee chi mɨde ijãa pꞌanɨɨrã, Daviddeepa uchiada–e paji mĩda.
Chonaarãweda mɨa kꞌawapidakꞌa eperãarãmaa, mãga ooitꞌee. Mɨ, Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨapa mãga jara bɨ.’
Mãpai Santiagopa mãgaji:
—Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga jara bairã, mɨa nãga kꞌĩsia bɨda aji. Tachia Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa oopidaikꞌaraa bɨ judio–eerãmaa, mãgɨɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadakꞌãri.

Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌartꞌa pꞌã pëidáma jaradaitꞌee kꞌonaadamerã nechiara ata bɨdapꞌedaa ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite, aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata; wẽra apai ome pꞌanadamerã; ne–animal ɨ̃yapa jɨ̃a piuda chiara kꞌonaadamerã, aɨde waa paraa perã mãikꞌaapa ne–animal waa kꞌonaadamerã.

Mãgɨ́ ũraa aupai pëidaipia bɨ. Awaraa ũraa kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã, ɨ̃ipata ewari chaa ũridai Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata tede. Chonaarãweda Moisepa pꞌãda jarateepachidada aji, mãgee tede mãikꞌaapa ɨ̃rá atꞌãri mãga oopata.

Mãpai Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã, ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarã mãikꞌaapa jõmaweda Jerusalendepema ijãapataarãpa pedeeteejida ũkꞌuru jɨrɨtꞌeradaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pëidaitꞌee Antioquiadee Pablo ome mãikꞌaapa Bernabé ome. Nãgɨ́ eperãarã jɨrɨtꞌerajida: Judas, ichiaba tꞌɨ̃patapꞌedaa Barsabás mãikꞌaapa Silas.
Kꞌartꞌa pꞌãdapꞌedaade nãga jara pëijida:

Tai, Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãpa, ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarã ome na kꞌartꞌade salude pëiruta parã judio–eerãmaa Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨɨrã Antioquía pꞌuurudepema, Siria eujãdepema mãikꞌaapa Cilicia eujãdepemaarã–itꞌee.

Taipa ũrijida nãpemaarã ũkꞌuru parãmaa wãdapꞌedaa, mamĩda taipa pëida–eeta. Mãgɨɨrãpa pariatua ãchi kꞌĩradoopa jaratee nipajida. Maperã parãpa kꞌawada–e paji ijãadaitꞌee Moisepa pꞌãdade wa Pablopa jarateedade.
Mapa taipa pedeeteejida taidepemaarã ũkꞌuru jɨrɨtꞌeradaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pëidaitꞌee parãmaa tai kꞌõpꞌãyoorã kꞌiniarã Bernabé Pablo ome.
Taipa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Pablo Bernabé ome waaweedakꞌaa piudaitꞌee Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristode ijãa pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa.
Mapa ãchi ome parãmaa pëiruta Judas Silas ome. Ãchia parãmaa jõma taipa kꞌĩsiadapꞌedaa na pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa nepɨrɨdaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa tai kꞌaripaji parãmaa ne–inaa audú chaaree oopinaadamerã. Nãgapai jara kꞌinia pꞌanɨ parãpa oodamerã.

Kꞌonáatɨ nechiara ata bɨdapꞌedaa ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite, aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata. Ne–animal ɨ̃yapa jɨ̃a piuda chiara kꞌonáatɨ mãikꞌaapa ne–animal waa kꞌonáatɨ. Ma awara pꞌekꞌau oonáatɨ. Taipa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa ooruta pɨrã, pia oodaitꞌee.
Mãgapai paji.
Mãpai ma kꞌartꞌa pꞌãdapꞌeda, pëijida Antioquiadee wãdapꞌedaarã ome. Mama panadapꞌeda, ijãapataarã jõmaweda tꞌɨ̃ pꞌejida mãikꞌaapa ma kꞌartꞌa ãchimaa teejida.
Ijãapataarãpa ma kꞌartꞌa leedakꞌãri, o–ĩadachida, ãchi–itꞌee ũraa pia bada perã.
Judas Silas ome Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarapiru jarapataarã pada perã, ichiaba ma ijãapataarãmaa ũraajida tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌaneedamerã.
Mama pꞌanadapꞌeda, ijãapataarãpa ãchi despediijida kꞌãiwee wãdamerã.
[Mamĩda Silas arii beeji.]
Pablo Bernabé ome ichiaba pꞌaneejida awaraa ijãapataarã ome Antioquiade, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pedee pia jara pëida Cristode jarateedaitꞌee.
Mãga pꞌanadapꞌeda, ewari aba Pablopa mãgaji Bernabemaa:
—Waya wãdáma aji, ijãapataarã akꞌɨde, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida Cristode jaratee nipadapꞌedaa pꞌuuru chaa. Akꞌɨdaitꞌeeda aji, atꞌãri ijãa pꞌanɨ wa mãga–e.
Bernabepa ichiaba atee kꞌinia baji Juan; mãgɨ́ Juan ichiaba tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Marcos.
Mamĩda Pablopa atee kꞌinia–e paji, ãchi ikꞌaawaapa uchiada perã Panfilia eujãde, ãchi mimia atꞌãri aupada–eeta.
Ijɨ̃atɨ pedeedapꞌeda, ãchi o chaachaa jitakꞌoodachida. Bernabé wãji Chipre isladee Marcos ome.
Jõdee Pablopa jɨrɨtꞌeraji Silas ichi kꞌõpꞌãyo pamerã. Ijãapataarãpa ãchi omé Akꞌõre juade bɨjida irua ãchi pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã. Mãpai Pablo ichi kꞌõpꞌãyo ome wãji.
Wãyaajida Siria eujãde mãikꞌaapa Cilicia eujãde. Ijãapataarã ũraa wãjida ãchi para bee chaa.

Mamãikꞌaapa Pablo Silas ome panajida Derbe pꞌuurude mãikꞌaapa Listra pꞌuurude. Mama unujida ijãapari tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Timoteo. Chi nawe judío wẽra Cristode ijãapari paji. Jõdee chi akꞌõre Greciadepema paji.
Ijãapataarã Listradepemaarã mãikꞌaapa Iconiodepemaarãpa Timoteo pia tꞌo pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã,

Pablopa ichi ome ateeji mamãikꞌaapa. Mamĩda uchiadai naaweda, iru kꞌapꞌɨade tauchaa bɨji mãpemaarã judiorã kꞌaurepa. Ma eujãdepema jõmaarãpa kꞌawajida Timoteo akꞌõre Greciadepema paji mãikꞌaapa ãrapa tauchaa bɨdakꞌaa paji ãchi warrarã kꞌapꞌɨade.
Pꞌuuru bee chaa wãyaa wãdakꞌãri, jara bëi wãpachida Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãpa mãikꞌaapa ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarãpa jara pëidapꞌedaa Jerusalendeepa.
Mãgá ijãapataarãpa pipɨara kꞌawaajida Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨ ãchimaa mãikꞌaapa waapɨara ijãajida irude. Ma awara ewari chaa ijãapataarã chokꞌaraara ĩwa wãjida.
Ma wãrutade wãyaajida Frigia eujãde mãikꞌaapa Galacia eujãde, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarateepi–e pada perã Ásia eujãde.
Misia eujãde panadakꞌãri, wãdaitꞌee paji Bitinia eujãdee. Mamĩda Jesús Jaurepa wãpi–e paji.
Mapa Misia eujãde wãyaajida Troas pꞌuurude parutamaa.
Panadapꞌedaa ewate pꞌãrikꞌua, Pablo kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌa bɨde unuji Macedonia eujãdepema ɨmɨkꞌĩra bainɨ̃ bɨ. Mãgɨpa chupɨria iidiji Pablo wãmerã ichi eujãdee. Mãgaji:
—Chéji Macedoniadee tai kꞌaripade.

Pablo mãgá kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌa bapꞌeda, aramata netꞌaa pꞌe atajida wãdaitꞌee Macedoniadee, kꞌĩsia pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarateepi kꞌinia bɨ Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee ma eujãde. Ma wãdapꞌedaade mɨ jida aukꞌa wãji.
Troas pꞌuurudeepa tai barcode bataujida. Mata Samotracia islade panajida. Mamãikꞌaapa aɨ norema Neápolis pꞌuurude panajida.
Neapolideepa wãjida Filipodee. Mãgɨ́ pꞌuuru waibɨa Macedonia eujãde bɨ. Ma pꞌuurude Romadepemaarã chokꞌara pꞌanapachida. Mama kꞌãima chokꞌara–ee pꞌanajida.

Ɨ̃ipata ewate tai wãjida pꞌuurudeepa to idee, ma pꞌuurudepema judiorã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patamãi unudai jĩakꞌaapa. Unu atadakꞌãri, su–akꞌɨ pꞌaneejida mãikꞌaapa jarateemaa pꞌaneejida wẽraarã cheepurudapꞌedaarãmaa.

Ma wẽraarã tꞌãide baji aba tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Lidia. Ma wẽra Tiatira pꞌuurudepema paji. Mãgɨpa netopachi pꞌaru pia tꞌɨda pꞌupꞌuchia. Mãgɨ́ wẽrapa Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pachi. Maperã Akꞌõrepa irumaa ũripiji Pablopa jaratee bɨ. Pia ũrikꞌãri, Cristode ijãa beeji.
Iru poro choopipꞌeda ichi te pidaarã ome, taimaa mãgaji:
—Parãpa unu pꞌanɨ pɨrã mɨ wãara ijãa bɨ Jesucristode, mɨ tede pꞌana chétɨ.
Mãga jara bɨpa wãjida ichi temaa.

Ewari aba tai waya ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃de wãdakꞌãri ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patapꞌedaamaa, unujida awẽra. Mãgɨ́ awẽra esclava paji. Mãgɨpa ne–inaa pꞌasaitꞌee bɨ jarapachi, ichi kꞌapꞌɨade netuara merãtɨa bada perã. Mapa ma awẽra chiparipa pꞌaratꞌara jitapachi ichi kꞌaurepa.
Mãgɨ́ awẽra tai tꞌẽe bia wãpachi:
—Nãgɨ́ eperãarã Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨapa pëida jarateedamerã sãga eperãarã ɨtꞌaa wãdai.
Ewari chokꞌara mãga oopachi tai wãrutamaa. Mata ewari aba Pablopa ũriamaadaikꞌãri, ãpɨtee akꞌɨji mãikꞌaapa mãgaji ma netuara kꞌapꞌɨade merãtɨa badamaa:
—Jesucristo jõmaarã poro waibɨa perã, ichi tꞌɨ̃de mɨa pɨmaa jara bɨ uchiadaimerã jã wẽra kꞌapꞌɨadeepa.
Aramata ma netuara uchiadachi.

Ma awẽra chipariirãpa mãga unudakꞌãri, kꞌawaajida ãchi pꞌaratꞌa waa pꞌoyaa jitada–e iru kꞌapꞌɨa. Mapa Pablo Silas ome jita atadapꞌeda, ateejida ãchi pꞌuurudepema poroorãmaa, mãgɨɨrã chipꞌedaipatapꞌedaamãi.
Ma Romadepema poroorãmaa ateedapꞌeda, mãgajida:
—Na judiorãpa tachi pꞌuuru pidaarã kꞌĩraupirutada ajida,
mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa jarateemaa pꞌanɨ tachi Romadepemaarãpa oopata awara. Taipa mãga ũri kꞌiniada–e pꞌanɨda ajida.
Mãpai pꞌuuru pidaarã chokꞌara seedachida. Ãchi poroorãpa Pablo Silas ome pꞌaru ẽrapijida mãikꞌaapa wɨpijida pakꞌurupa.
Pia wɨpitꞌaadapꞌeda, carcelde tꞌɨtꞌaajida mãikꞌaapa carceldepema jɨ̃aparimaa jarajida pia jɨ̃amerã, carceldeepa uchiapiamaapa.
Chi jɨ̃aparipa mãga ũrikꞌãri, calabozo edupɨara badade tꞌɨ nɨ̃bɨji mãikꞌaapa ãchi bɨɨrɨ tꞌɨkꞌooji cepode.
Mãgá iru pꞌanajida mĩda, Pablo Silas ome ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa mãikꞌaapa kꞌarimaa pꞌanajida Tachi Akꞌõremaa. Jõdee chi apemaarã carcel pidaarãpa ũrii pꞌanajida.
Esapɨte pakꞌãri, awẽrachai golpe wëre nɨ̃beeji. Ma carcel perá tꞌeedachi. Aramata chi puerta jõmaweda ewakꞌoodachida. Presoorã juade nɨ̃bada cadena mãikꞌaapa cepo ichiaba jõma ẽtꞌakꞌoodachida.
Ma carceldepema jɨ̃aparipa unukꞌãri chi puerta jõma ewa jẽra bɨ, ichi espada ẽtꞌa ataji ichi juadoopa piudariitꞌee, carcel pidaarã jõma uchiadai pꞌanɨ jĩakꞌaapa.
Mamĩda Pablopa biaji ichi badamãiipa mãgɨ́ jɨ̃aparimaa:
—¡Jãgá oonáaji! ¡Tai jõma nama pꞌanɨpɨ!
Mãpai carceldepema jɨ̃aparipa lámpara aneepipꞌeda, tꞌĩudachi Pablo mãikꞌaapa Silas pꞌanadapꞌedaamãi. Ãchi kꞌĩrapite wɨrrɨwɨrrɨa bedabai nɨ̃banaji pꞌera nɨ̃bɨpa.
Uchia pꞌe atapꞌeda calabozo edupɨara bɨdeepa, mãgaji:
—Jarateepataarã, ¿kꞌãata ooipia bɨma aji, mɨ ɨtꞌaa wãitꞌee?
Mãpai pꞌanaujida:
—Jesucristode ijã́aji. Mãgara pɨ, pɨchi tedepemaarã ome ɨtꞌaa wãdayada ajida.
Mãpai Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida Cristode jarateejida ma jɨ̃aparimaa mãikꞌaapa ichi tede pꞌanadapꞌedaarãmaa.
Aramata ma carceldepema jɨ̃aparipa Pablo Silas ome ateeji sɨɨkꞌooitꞌee ãchi kꞌapꞌɨade tꞌudakꞌa jẽra bada. Maapꞌeda iru ichi tedepemaarã ome poro choopijida.
Mãpai teedaa pꞌe ateepꞌeda, nekꞌopiji. Ma carcel jɨ̃apari ichi tedepemaarã ome o–ĩa pꞌanajida Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadapꞌedaa perã.
Aɨ norema tapꞌeda Romadepema poroorãpa ãchi jɨ̃apataarã pëijida ma carceldepema jɨ̃aparimaa, Pablo Silas ome uchia pëimerã.
Maperã carceldepema jɨ̃aparipa mãgaji Pablomaa:
—Mɨ poroorãpa jara pëi pꞌanɨda aji, parã uchia pëimerã. Mapa kꞌãiwee wã́tɨ namãikꞌaapa.
Mamĩda Pablopa mãgaji Romadepema poroorãpa pëidapꞌedaarãmaa:

—Tai aukꞌa Romadepemaarã pꞌanɨta, wɨjidada aji, jõmaarã kꞌĩrapite, charramaa ateeda–ee. Maapꞌeda carcelde tꞌɨpijida. Ɨ̃rá jõdee, ¿merã uchiapi kꞌinia pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã? ¡Mãga–epɨ! Namãikꞌaapa wãda–eda aji, ãchia uchia pëi cheda–emãi ãchi kꞌĩradoopa.
Pablopa jarada ãchi poroorãmaa jaranadakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa jã eperãarã aukꞌa Romadepemaarãda adakꞌãri, mãɨrã poroorã pꞌeradachida, ãchia wɨpidapꞌedaa perã mãikꞌaapa carcelde tꞌɨ nɨ̃bɨdapꞌedaa perã.
Mapa chedapꞌeda, chupɨria iidijida Pablomaa Silas ome perdonaadamerã ãchia oodapꞌedaa. Mãpai uchiapijida carceldeepa mãikꞌaapa pꞌuurudeepa.
Pablo Silas ome ma carceldeepa uchiadapꞌeda, wãjida Lidia temaa. Mama ijãapataarã jõmaarãmaa ũraajida tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌaneedamerã. Maapꞌeda wãjida ma pꞌuurudeepa.
Mamãikꞌaapa ãchi wãdade Pablo Silas ome wãyaajida Anfípolis pꞌuurude mãikꞌaapa Apolonia pꞌuurude. Maapꞌeda Tesalónica pꞌuurude panajida. Mãgɨ́ pꞌuurude baji Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata te.
Maperã Pablo ichia oopatakꞌa pꞌuurude panakꞌãri, jãmaa wãji. Mama beeji tomia õpee mãikꞌaapa ɨ̃ipata ewari chaa aupedeeji arii pꞌanadapꞌedaarã ome.
Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade akꞌɨpipachi sãga Cristo chupɨria nɨ̃baitꞌee mãikꞌaapa piupꞌeda, pꞌirabaiitꞌee. Jarapachi:
—Nãgɨ́ Jesús parãmaa mɨa jaratee bɨ Cristota, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëida eperãarã kꞌaripamerã.

Mãga ũridakꞌãri, judiorã ũkꞌuru Cristode ijãajida mãikꞌaapa araa nipapachida Pablo mãikꞌaapa Silas ome. Ichiaba ijãajida judio–eerã; Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaarã chokꞌara mãikꞌaapa wẽraarã pꞌaratꞌara beerã.

Judiorã Cristode ijãada–ee pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa mãga unudakꞌãri, kꞌĩraudachida. Mapa jɨrɨjida eperãarã mimiadakꞌaa pꞌanadapꞌedaarã, pꞌuuru pidaarã kꞌĩraupitꞌaadamerã Pablo mãikꞌaapa Silas ome, pedee jõnɨpa ãra ãpɨte. Mãgá pꞌuuru pidaarã jõma kꞌĩraupitꞌaadapꞌeda, Jasón tede tꞌĩudachida, Pablo Silas ome uchia atadapꞌeda, pꞌuuru pidaarãmaa teedaitꞌee.
Mamĩda mãgɨ́ tede ãra unuda–e pakꞌãri, uchia atajida Jasonta mãikꞌaapa awaraa ijãapataarã. Maapꞌeda ãchi pꞌuurudepema poroorãmaa ateejida. Mama panadakꞌãri, biapachida:
—¡Ɨ̃rá eperãarã Roma jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã kꞌĩsia awarapipataarã nama che pꞌanɨda! ajida.
Ma awara mãgɨɨrã Jasonpa ichi tede auteebaiji. Mãɨrãpa oodakꞌaa Cesarpa oopi bɨkꞌa. Jĩpꞌa jara pꞌanɨ ichi kꞌãyaara rey aba waibɨara bɨda ajida, tꞌɨ̃jarapata Jesús.
Mãga ũridakꞌãri, ma pꞌuuru pidaarã mãikꞌaapa ãchi poroorã kꞌĩraupikꞌa para beeji.
Mamĩda Jasonpa apemaarã ijãapataarã ome pꞌaajida ãchi uchia pëidamerã. Mãpai kꞌena pëijida.
Ma pꞌãrikꞌua weda ijãapataarãpa Pablo Silas ome Berea pꞌuurudee pëijida. Mama panadakꞌãri, tꞌĩujida judiorã Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata temãi.

Mãpema judiorã Tesalonicadepema kꞌãyaara kꞌĩsia kꞌawaara pꞌanajida. Mapa Pablopa jaratee bɨ ũri kꞌinia pꞌanajida. Mãga ũridapꞌeda, ewari chaa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãda akꞌɨpachida kꞌawaadaitꞌee wãara jara bɨ Pablopa jara bɨkꞌa maa–e pɨrã awara jara bɨ.
Kꞌawaadakꞌãri wãarata jara bɨ, mãgɨdepemaarã judiorã chokꞌara ijãajida. Ichiaba judio–eerã wẽraarã pꞌaratꞌara beerã chokꞌara ijãajida, ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã jida ichiaba.
Mamĩda Tesalonicadepema judiorãpa ũridakꞌãri Pablopa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida jarateemaa bɨ Bereade, wãjida ma pꞌuuru pidaarã kꞌĩraupitꞌaade.
Aramata mãpema ijãapataarãpa Pablo pëijida kꞌõpꞌãyoorã ũkꞌuru ome pꞌusa idee. Jõdee Silas Timoteo ome Bereade pꞌaneejida.
Chi Pablo ome wãdapꞌedaarãpa iru ateejida Atenas pꞌuurudee. Waya ãpɨtee uchiadaitꞌee pakꞌãri, Pablopa jara pëiji Silamaa Timoteo ome taarã–ee chedamerã ichimaa.
Atenas pꞌuurude Pablopa Silas mãikꞌaapa Timoteo nɨmaa beeji. Mama bɨde unukꞌãri chokꞌara ne–inaa iru pꞌanɨ eperã juapa ooda aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata, tꞌãri ãriidachi.
Mapa aupedeepachi judiorã ome mãikꞌaapa judio–eerã Tachi Akꞌõre waaweepataarã ome Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata temãi. Ichiaba mãga oopachi ewari chaa chi unuru ome ma pꞌuurude netꞌaa netopatamãi.
Mama ũkꞌuru poro wẽsaa beerã tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Epicúreo eerepemaarã mãikꞌaapa Estoico eerepemaarã aupedee pꞌaneejida Pablo ome. Mãɨrã ũkꞌuruurãpa mãgapachida:
—¿Kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨma apachida, na pedee–idaa bɨpa?
Awaraarãpa mãgapachida:
—Awaraa eujãdepemaarã akꞌõre waibɨapa ooda jaratee bɨda apachida.
Mãga jarapachida Pablopa jarateemaa bada perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda Jesús piuda kꞌaurepa mãikꞌaapa jarateepachi perã tachi piuda tꞌẽepai waya chokꞌai pꞌirabaidaitꞌee.
Mãpai ãchia Pablo ateejida Areopagomaa, ãchi poro wẽsaa beerã cheepurupatamaa ũraa ũride. Mama iidijida:
—¿Taipa pɨa jaratee bɨ kꞌawaadaikꞌã? ajida.
Taipa waide ũrida–e pꞌanɨda ajida, pedee pɨa jaratee bɨkꞌa. Mapa kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanɨda ajida.
Ma Atenas pidaarã mãikꞌaapa awaraarã arii pꞌanadapꞌedaarã mimiada–e pꞌanadakꞌãri, pꞌanapachida ne–inaa chiwidi pedeemaa mãikꞌaapa ũrimaa.
Mãpai Pablo bainɨ̃ beeji ãchi kꞌĩrapite Areopagode mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:
—Atenas pꞌuuru pidaarã, mɨa unu bɨ parãpa akꞌõre waibɨa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo waaweepata.
Mɨ wãyaakꞌãri parã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patamãi, unuji netꞌaa chokꞌara iru pꞌanɨ aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata. Mama bɨde unuji parã altar bide pꞌã bɨ:
ʼNãgɨ́ Akꞌõrépata ooji na eujã mãikꞌaapa jõma aɨde nɨ̃bɨ. Nãgɨta, Tachi Akꞌõre, jõmaarã Waibɨa na pꞌekꞌau eujãde mãikꞌaapa pajãde. Nãgɨ́ Akꞌõre eperãarãpa te oodade bakꞌaa,
ichi–itꞌee pꞌua–e bairã ne–inaa eperãarãpa oopata ichi–itꞌee. Ichiata eperãarã chokꞌai pꞌanapipari, ĩyapaapipari mãikꞌaapa tachimaa ne–inaa jõmaata teepari pia pꞌanapataadamerã.
ʼEperã abaadeepa eperãarã kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo uchiapiji, na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõmaade pꞌanapataadamerã. Aɨ naaweda kꞌĩsia iru baji sãapai uchiapiitꞌee mãikꞌaapa sãmaata pꞌanapiitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga ooji eperãarãpa iru jɨrɨdamerã. Tachi taupa nãgɨ́ Akꞌõre unuda–e pꞌanɨ mĩda, iru kꞌawadai, wãara tachimãiipa tꞌɨmɨa–ee bairã.
Iru kꞌaurepa tachi chokꞌai pꞌanɨ; pꞌɨrrɨapata mãikꞌaapa na eujãde pꞌanapata. Pãchi kꞌarikꞌa pꞌãpataarãpa jaradapꞌedaakꞌa mãga bɨ: “Tachi, Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨapa ooda”.
Maperã kꞌĩsiadaikꞌaraa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre santokꞌa bɨ, eperãarãpa kꞌĩsiadapꞌeda oopatakꞌa nẽedee, pꞌaratꞌadee maa–e pɨrã mãudee.

Naaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa miapi–e paji mãgee kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patapꞌedaarã, iru waide kꞌawada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Mamĩda ɨ̃rá jõmaarãmaa jara bɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo amaadamerã mãikꞌaapa ichide ijãadamerã.

Ichia mãga jara bɨ na ewari na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa oopata jõmaweda akꞌɨitꞌee perã, kꞌawaaitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Mãga ooitꞌee ichia pëida Jesucristopa. Cristopa eperãarãpa oopata mãgá akꞌɨi, ichia kꞌachia ookꞌaa pada perã na eujãde nipakꞌãri. Tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨda aji, Akꞌõrepa iru jɨrɨtꞌeraji, iru piupꞌeda, chokꞌai pꞌirabaipida perã.
Arii pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa ũridakꞌãri eperã piupꞌeda chokꞌai pꞌirabaida, ũkꞌuru ëi para beeji mãikꞌaapa ũkꞌuruurãpa mãgajida:
—Na ewari waya ũridayada ajida, pɨ pedee.
Mãpai Pablo uchiaji mamãikꞌaapa.

Mamĩda ũkꞌuruurãpa ijãajida Pablopa jarada mãikꞌaapa Cristode ijãa pꞌaneejida. Ma ijãadapꞌedaarã tꞌãide baji ɨmɨkꞌĩra tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Dionisio. Mãgɨ́ Areópago poro wẽsaa beerã cheepurupatadepema paji. Ichiaba baji wẽra tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Dámaris mãikꞌaapa awaraarã.
Ma tꞌẽepai Pablo wãji Atenas pꞌuurudeepa Corinto pꞌuurudee.
Mama ununaji judío tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Áquila. Mãgɨ́ Ponto eujãdepema paji. Ewaa pache baji chi wẽra Priscila ome Italia eujãdeepa, César Claudiopa judiorã jõmaweda jërekꞌooda perã Roma pꞌuurudeepa.
Pablo pꞌasiade wãkꞌãri ma judío badamaa, kꞌawaa ataji ichi jĩakꞌa Aquilapa carpa oopari. Mapa Pablo ãra ome beeji ma mimia oomaa.
Mama bɨde ɨ̃ipata ewari chaa wãpachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata temaa jarateede judiorãmaa mãikꞌaapa judio–eerãmaa Cristode ijãadamerã.
Silas Timoteo ome pachedakꞌãri Macedoniadeepa, Pablopa ewari chaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida Cristode jarateemaa bapachi, judiorãpa ijãadamerã Jesuta Cristo, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëida.
