Mamĩda judiorã, ichi pedee ijãa kꞌiniada–ee pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa ikꞌachia jaramaa pꞌaneejida. Mapa Pablopa ichi pꞌaru jɨ̃ bada jĩapꞌeji akꞌɨpiitꞌee ãchimaa waa jaratee–e. Maapꞌeda mãgaji:
—Pãchi kꞌĩradoopa atuadaitꞌeeda aji, piudakꞌãri. Idideepa mɨ wãitꞌeeda aji, judio–eerãmaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨ jarateede.
Mãga jarapꞌeda, Pablo wãji Ticio Justo apatapꞌedaa temaa jarateede. Mãgɨ́ eperãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pachi. Ichi te baji Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata te ikꞌaawa.

Pablopa mama jarateemaa bɨde, Cristode ijãaji ma Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata tedepema poro, tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Crispo. Chi te pidaarã jida aukꞌa ijãajida mãikꞌaapa apemaarã Corinto pidaarã chokꞌara Pablopa jarateeda ũridapꞌedaarã ichiaba ijãajida. Mapa mãɨrã jõma poro choopijida.
Atꞌãri Corinto pꞌuurude pꞌanɨde ewari aba pꞌãrikꞌua kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌa bɨde Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgaji Pablomaa:
—Waawee–ee jaratéeji na pꞌuurude
mɨchideerã nama chokꞌara nɨ̃bairã. Mɨ pɨ ome bairã, apidaapa pɨ kꞌachia ooda–e.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga jarada perã, Pablo mama beeji año aba apꞌeda esa–aukꞌa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida Cristode jarateemaa.
Mamĩda, mama bɨde, Romadepema Galión apatapꞌedaa Acaya eujãdepema poro waibɨa bakꞌãri, judiorã chokꞌara pedeeteejida mãikꞌaapa Pablo jita ateejida iru kꞌĩrapite.
Mama mãgajida:
—Na eperãpa jaratee bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa irumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadamerã. Mamĩda jaratee–eda ajida, Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa oodamerã.
Mãpai Pablo pedeeitꞌee arude, Galionpa mãgaji ma judiorãmaa:
—Na eperãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo bada paara maa–e pɨrã chĩara pee bada paara, mɨa akꞌɨkꞌajida aji.
Mamĩda jara pꞌanadairã chĩara tꞌɨ̃ mãikꞌaapa parãpa ũraa pꞌãdade, pãchi pitapai ma nepɨra akꞌɨdapáde aji. Mɨa parã nepɨra akꞌɨ kꞌinia–eda aji.
Aramata jërekꞌooji ichimãiipa.
Mãpai arii akꞌɨ pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata tedepema poro Sóstenes jita atadapꞌeda, wɨjida Galión kꞌĩrapite. Mamĩda iru–itꞌee maarepida pꞌua–e paji.

Aɨ tꞌẽepai Pablo taarã beeji Corinto pꞌuurude. Mãpai ijãapataarãmaa despediipꞌeda, Siria eujãdee wãji Priscila mãikꞌaapa Áquila ome. Cencrea pꞌuurude barcode batau naaweda, Pablopa ichi poro bi–si wẽtꞌaaji. Mãga ooji akꞌɨpiitꞌee ichia Tachi Akꞌõremaa ooitꞌeeda ada ooda.
Ma wãrutade Éfeso pꞌuurude panadakꞌãri, Pablo tꞌĩunaji Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata tede judiorã ome pedeeitꞌee.
Ichia jarateeda ũridakꞌãri, chupɨria iidijida ãchi ome taarã beemerã. Mamĩda Pablopa kꞌinia–e paji.
Mãgaji:
—Ɨ̃rá wãitꞌeeda aji. Mamĩda waya cheitꞌeeda aji, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã.
Mãpai Pablo batauji mãikꞌaapa wãji. Jõdee Priscila Áquila ome mama pꞌaneejida.
Pablo Cesarea pꞌuurude panakꞌãri, mamãikꞌaapa wãji Jerusalendee ijãapataarã akꞌɨde. Maapꞌeda wãji Antioquía pꞌuurudee. Mãgɨ́ pꞌuuru Siria eujãde bɨ.
Antioquiade bapꞌeda, wãji ijãapataarã para bee chaa ãchi akꞌɨde mãikꞌaapa ũraade. Mãga oo wãji Galacia eujãde mãikꞌaapa Frigia eujãde.
Maapai judío tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Apolo pacheji. Mãgɨ́ Alejandría pꞌuurudepema paji. Mãgɨ́ pꞌuuru Egipto eujãde bɨ. Mãgɨ́ judiopa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãda pia kꞌawa baji. Ma awara pia jarateepachi.

Mãgɨpa o–ĩ–ĩa jarateepachi Juan Bautistapa jarateedakꞌa, eperãarãpa ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata oo amaadamerã mãikꞌaapa poro choopidamerã akꞌɨpidaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa pꞌanɨ. Ichiaba jarateepachi Jesucristo Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëida.

Apolo Éfeso pꞌuurude pachekꞌãri, waawee–ee jarateemaa beeji judiorã Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata temãi. Mãga ũridakꞌãri, Priscila Áquila ome ãchi temaa ateejida. Mãpai Apolomaa jarateejida jõma ãchia kꞌawadapꞌedaa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda Jesucristo kꞌaurepa.

Maapꞌeda, Apolo Acaya eujãdee wã kꞌinia bakꞌãri, Efesodepema ijãapataarãpa kꞌartꞌa pꞌãjida jãpemaarãmaa iru auteebaidamerã. Mãgá mama panakꞌãri, irua kꞌaripai Cristode ijãapataarã waapɨara ijãadamerã. Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌãri pia bapari perã, ãchimaa Cristode ijãapiji, Apolo mamaa wãi naaweda.
Apolo mama bɨde jõmaarã taide Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãda akꞌɨpachi mãikꞌaapa jarateepachi Jesucristo Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëida eperãarã kꞌaripamerã. Mapa judiorãpa maarepida pꞌoyaa pꞌanauda–e paji.
Apolo Corinto pꞌuurude bɨ misa, Pablo wãyaaji Galacia mãikꞌaapa Frigia eujãde Éfeso pꞌuurude parumaa. Mama Cristode ijãapataarã ununaji.
Mãpai Pablopa iidiji:
—Parãpa Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, ¿Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure parã kꞌapꞌɨade ba chejikꞌã? aji.
Pꞌanaujida:
—Taipa kꞌawada–eda ajida, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure ba chepari ijãapataarã kꞌapꞌɨade.
Mãpai Pablopa iidiji:
—Parãpa poro choopidakꞌãri, ¿kꞌãare–itꞌee poro choopijidama? aji.
Pꞌanaujida:
—Juanpa jaradakꞌa poro choopijida akꞌɨpidaitꞌee pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo amaa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ.
Mãpai Pablopa mãgaji:
—Juanpa wãara poro choojida aji, waa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaarã. Mamĩda Juanpa ichiaba jarapachi ijãadamerã ichi tꞌẽe cheru eperãde. Mãgɨ́ eperã Jesucristo.
Ma eperãarãpa mãga ũridakꞌãri, aramata ãchi poro choopijida Tachi Waibɨa Jesús tꞌɨ̃de akꞌɨpidaitꞌee irude ijãa pꞌanɨ.

Maapꞌeda Pablopa jua bɨji ma poro choodapꞌedaarã ɨ̃rɨ. Mãgá bɨkꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Jaure ãra kꞌapꞌɨade ba chepiji. Mãgɨpa ãramaa pedeepipachi kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ pedeede. Mãgá jarajida Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapidakꞌa.
Chi mãgá poro choodapꞌedaa eperãarã doce paji.

Maapꞌeda Pablo wãji Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata tedee. Mama ɨ̃ipata ewari chaa atane õpee Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa waawee–ee jarateeji. Jaraji Tachi Akꞌõrepa pia ooda Jesucristo pëikꞌãri, judiorãpa irude ijãadamerã.

Mamĩda ũkꞌuruurãpa ijãa kꞌiniada–e paji Pablopa jaratee bada mãikꞌaapa waapɨara pedee kꞌachia jarajida Tachi Akꞌõre Ode Pꞌanɨɨrã ãpɨte. Maperã Pablo mamãikꞌaapa ãyaa wãji ijãapataarã ome. Jaratee banaji eperã tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Tirano escuelade. Mama ewari chaa jarateepachi.
Irua Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateeji año omé. Mãgá judiorã mãikꞌaapa judio–eerã Ásia eujãde pꞌanapatapꞌedaarãpa ũrijida Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida Jesude.
Ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõrepa Pablomaa oopipachi ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa.
Pablo kꞌapꞌɨade pꞌaru tꞌõbaidapapai, kꞌayaa beerã jɨpapachida. Ichiaba netuara eperãarã kꞌapꞌɨade merãtɨa bee uchiapachida.

Mãpema judiorã ũkꞌuru Cristode ijãada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa netuara merãtɨa bee eperãarã kꞌapꞌɨadeepa uchiapikꞌoopachida. Mãga oo nipajida judiorã pꞌaareerã poro Esceva warrarã. Ãra siete paji. Mãɨrãpa kꞌawaadakꞌãri netuaraarã uchia pꞌanɨ Pablo kꞌaurepa ichia Tachi Waibɨa Jesús tꞌɨ̃ jarakꞌãri, aukꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌaneejida. Mapa jarajida netuara merãtɨa bɨmaa:
—¡Pablopa jara bɨ Jesús tꞌɨ̃de uchíatɨ!
Mamĩda mãga oodakꞌãri, ma netuara eperã kꞌapꞌɨade merãtɨa badapa mãgaji:
—Mɨa kꞌawa bɨda aji, Jesús. Ichiaba kꞌawa bɨ kꞌaita Pablo. Mamĩda parã ¿kꞌairã́ma? aji.
Mãpai ma netuara kꞌapꞌɨade merãtɨa bada eperãpa ãchi ɨ̃rɨ cheji mãikꞌaapa ãchi jõmaweda sĩkꞌooji. Mãgá pꞌu oopꞌeda, chi netuara uchiapi chedapꞌedaarã mamãikꞌaapa ãkꞌadaa pꞌira uchiakꞌoodachida.
Éfeso pꞌuurude pꞌanapataarã, judiorã mãikꞌaapa judio–eerãpa mãga ũridakꞌãri, jõmaarãta pꞌerajida mãikꞌaapa Tachi Waibɨa Jesús tꞌɨ̃ pia tꞌo pꞌanajida.
Mãpemaarã ũkꞌuru Cristode ijãa pꞌaneejida. Maapꞌeda Pablomaa jara chepachida ãchia kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa, aɨ naaweda ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã petau tau kꞌawaa beerãpa oo pꞌanadapꞌedaade.
Ichiaba ũkꞌuru petau tau kꞌawaa beerãpa aneepachida ãchi libro jõmaarã taide paakꞌoodaitꞌee. Mãgɨ́ libro valor pꞌaratꞌade juasiadakꞌãri, uchiaji pꞌaratꞌa tau cincuenta mil.
Ma jõma oo pꞌanadapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa ma eujãdepemaarãpa waapɨara ijãapachida Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapidade.
Ma tꞌẽepai, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa Pablomaa kꞌĩsiapiji wãitꞌee Jerusalendee, wãyaapꞌeda Macedonia eujãde mãikꞌaapa Acaya eujãde. Ichiaba Jerusalendeepa Pablo wã kꞌinia baji Romadee.
Mãga kꞌĩsiapꞌeda, Pablopa chi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã Timoteo Erasto ome naa pëiji Macedonia eujãdee. Jõdee ichi Ásia eujãde jarateemaa beeji. Maapꞌeda wãji ãra tꞌẽe.
Maapai Tachi Akꞌõre Ode Pꞌanɨɨrã kꞌaurepa, Éfeso pꞌuurudepemaarã jõma kꞌĩraupikꞌa para baji

ne–inaa pꞌaratꞌadee oopari Demetrio apatapꞌedaapa ãra ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jarada perã. Mãgɨ́ eperãpa ne–inaa ma–ãri santokꞌa pꞌaratꞌadee oopachi, ãchi ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata nawe Artemisa te waibɨa kꞌirãpapataadamerã. Mãga oo bɨpa ichia mãikꞌaapa apemaarã ne–inaa oo kꞌawaa beerãpa pꞌaratꞌa waibɨa jitapachida.
Maperãpɨ Demetriopa mãgɨɨrã mãikꞌaapa awaraa ne–inaa oo kꞌawaa beerã tꞌɨ̃ pꞌe atapꞌeda, mãgaji:
—Kꞌõpꞌãyoorã, parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨda aji, nãgɨ́ mimia oo pꞌanɨpa tachi pꞌaratꞌa jitapata.

Ma awara parãpa unu pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa ũri pꞌanɨ Pablopa jaratee bɨ, ne–inaa ooda eperãarãpa aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata akꞌõre waibɨarã–e. Mãga jara bɨpa eperãarã chokꞌara ichi eere ũraa pꞌe iru bɨ. Mãga jara–e bɨ nama Éfeso pꞌuurudepai. Ichiaba mãga jara bɨ jõma Ásia eujãde.

Iru pedee ijãaruta pɨrã, tachia ooda neto amaadai mãikꞌaapa tachia pꞌaratꞌa waa jitada–e pai. Ma awara tachi nawe Artemisade ijãada–e pai mãikꞌaapa ichiaba waa iru ĩgreste akꞌɨda–e pai. Mãgɨ́ tede na Ásia eujãdepemaarã mãikꞌaapa jõmaweda Roma jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã irumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata. ¿Wãara–ekꞌã aji, mɨa jara bɨ?
Arii pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa mãga ũridakꞌãri, kꞌĩraudachida mãikꞌaapa biukꞌa nɨ̃beeji:
—¡Artemisa Waibɨa; tachi Éfeso pidaarã nawe!

Mãpai eperãarã waapɨara cheepuru nɨ̃beeji mãikꞌaapa pꞌuuru pidaarã jõma kꞌĩraupikꞌa para beeji. Mãpai Gayo, Aristarco ome jita atajida mãikꞌaapa atadachida ãchi chipꞌedaipatamaa. Ma eperãarã omé Macedonia eujãdepemaarã paji. Ichiaba Pablo ome nipapachida.
Pablo wãitꞌee paji ma pꞌuuru pidaarã kꞌĩrapite pedeede. Mamĩda ijãapataarãpa wãpida–e paji.
Ichiaba Asiadepema poroorã ũkꞌuru Pablo ome kꞌõpꞌãyo meraadapꞌedaa perã, jara pëijida wãnaamerã ma eperãarã kꞌĩraupikꞌa para bɨmaa.

Mãɨmisa, chi cheepurudapꞌedaarã waapɨara kꞌĩraupikꞌa para beeji. Ũkꞌuruurãpa ne–inaa jarapachida; awaraarãpa biapachida. Mapa biukꞌa nɨ̃baji. Ũkꞌuruurãpa kꞌawada–e pꞌanajida sãapꞌeda cheepurudapꞌedaa.
Judiorã arii pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa Alejandromaa nepɨrɨdapꞌeda, jõmaarã taide ateejida. Mãpai Alejandropa juapa jaraji kꞌĩupꞌee pꞌaneedamerã, ãchi kꞌapꞌɨa pedeeitꞌee perã.
Mamĩda eperãarã kꞌĩraupikꞌa para badaarãpa ichi judío kꞌawaadakꞌãri, perá hora omé waapɨara biukꞌa nɨ̃beeji. Mãgapachida:
—¡Artemisa Waibɨa; tachi Éfeso pidaarã nawe!
Mãpai aɨ pꞌuurudepema secretariopa eperãarã kꞌĩupꞌee pꞌanapiji mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:
—Éfeso pidaarã, jõmaarãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨda aji, na pꞌuuru pidaarã́pata tachi nawe Artemisa jĩakꞌa ɨtꞌariipa baaida ichi ĩgrestede jɨ̃apata.
Apidaapa nãgɨ́ pꞌoyaa merada–e perã, kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌanéetɨ, ne–inaa kꞌachia pariatua ooda–ee.
Na eperãarã parãpa anee pꞌanɨ tachi ĩgrestedepema netꞌaa maarepida chɨada–e pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa tachi nawe ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jarada–e pꞌanɨ.
Demetrio wa chi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã nepɨra iru pꞌanɨ pɨrã awaraa ome, Romadepema charraarãmaa wã́tɨ. Ãrapa akꞌɨdaipɨ, ma–itꞌee pꞌanadairã.
Mamĩda jõmaarãpa awaraa nepɨra iru pꞌanɨ pɨrã, kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa cheepurudakꞌãri, ma nepɨra jõ pëidai.
Idipema oodapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa Romadepemaarãpa kꞌĩsiadaitꞌee tachi chõoyaa pꞌanɨ. Nãga bɨde ãchia iidi pꞌanɨ pɨrã sãapꞌeda idi nãga oojida, ¿sãga pꞌanaudayama? aji.
Mãga jarapꞌeda, eperãarã jõmaweda ãchi te chaa pëikꞌooji.
Eperãarã ãchi te chaa wãdapꞌedaa tꞌẽepai, Pablopa ijãapataarã tꞌɨ̃ pꞌeji ũraaitꞌee. Maapꞌeda wãji Macedonia eujãdee.
Mama ijãapataarã ũraa nipapꞌeda, panaji Grecia eujãde.
Atane õpee mama beeji. Mamãikꞌaapa barcode wãitꞌee bɨde Siria eujãdee, kꞌawaaji judiorãpa ichi peedaitꞌee otꞌewa pꞌanɨ. Mapa waya ãpɨtee pꞌɨrrabaidachi. Mata wãyaaji Macedonia eujãde.

Ma wãdade iru kꞌõpꞌãyaajida nãgɨ́ ijãapataarãpa: Pirro warra Sópatro, Berea pꞌuurudepema; Aristarco mãikꞌaapa Segundo, Tesalónica pꞌuurudepema; Gayo, Derbe pꞌuurudepema; Timoteo, Tíquico mãikꞌaapa Trófimo, Ásia eujãdepema.
Mãɨrã tai naa wãjida mãikꞌaapa nɨnajida Troas pꞌuurude.

Ma tꞌẽepai tai wãjida Filipos pꞌuurudeepa, fiesta pan levadura wẽe kꞌopata wãyaapꞌeda. Barcode wã nipadapꞌedaa perã, kꞌãima joisomaamaa panajida Troas pꞌuurude. Kꞌĩrachuunadapꞌeda apemaarã ome, mama kꞌãima siete pꞌaneejida.
Tomia ewate tai chipꞌejida apemaarã ijãapataarã ome nekꞌodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Cristo piuda kꞌirãpadaitꞌee. Pablopa ijãapataarãmaa jarateemaa baji esapɨte parumaa, ichi aɨ norema wãitꞌee pada perã.
Te piso ɨtꞌɨpema cuartode chipꞌe pꞌanajida mãikꞌaapa lamparara ɨ̃daa nɨ̃baji.

Pablo jarateemaa bɨ misa, kꞌũtrãa Eutico apatapꞌedaa su–akꞌɨ baji ventanade ũrimaa. Mamĩda Pablopa taarã jarateeda perã, ma kꞌũtrãa kꞌãidaipꞌeda, tudú padachi piso õpeedeepa. Aramata piu jira atanajida.
Mãpai Pablo ɨrabaipꞌeda, ma kꞌũtrãa kꞌapꞌɨa wëre ataji mãikꞌaapa mãgaji chi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã arii pꞌanadapꞌedaarãmaa:
—¡Pꞌeranáatɨ! ¡Iru chokꞌai bɨpɨ!
Mãpai Pablo waya teedaa wãkꞌãri, nekꞌojida mãikꞌaapa Cristo piuda kꞌirãpajida. Mata waya ichi jarateemaa beeji ewarirumaa. Ewarikꞌãri, wãji ichi ode.
Ma kꞌũtrãa piu bada chokꞌai ateedapꞌedaa perã ichi temaa, ijãapataarã o–ĩa pꞌaneejida.
Pablo ode wã kꞌinia baji. Mapa tai naa wãjida barcode Aso pꞌuurudee. Mama nɨjida iru batau atadaitꞌee.
Aso pꞌuurude unudakꞌãri, batauji tai ome mãikꞌaapa wãjida Mitilene pꞌuurudee.
Mamãikꞌaapa uchiadapꞌeda, aɨ norema Quío isla kꞌĩrapite wãyaajida. Ma norema Samos pꞌuurude panajida. Mamãikꞌaapa panajida Mileto pꞌuurude.
Mãgá oojida Pablo waa wã kꞌinia–e bada perã Ásia eujãdee. Ma awara Éfeso pꞌuurude wiibai kꞌinia–e paji, Jerusalende isapai pana kꞌinia bada perã, Pentecostés fiesta ewate pai naaweda.
Mãgá Éfeso pꞌuurude wiibai kꞌinia–e paji taarãi jĩakꞌaapa. Mamĩda Mileto pꞌuurude pachedakꞌãri, Pablopa tꞌɨ̃ pëiji Efesodepema ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarã.
Ãchi pachedakꞌãri, ichia mãgaji:
—Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨda aji, sãgata mɨ nipapari parã tꞌãide, na Ásia eujãde ewaa pachedakꞌãriipa.
Taarãru parã ome Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa oomaa bɨ, chupɨria nɨ̃bɨde mãikꞌaapa nepɨrade nɨ̃bɨde judiorã juapa.
Mamĩda jõmaarã taide waawee–ee jarateeji, parã te chaa paara. Mãga ooji parã ũraaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripaitꞌee.
Aukꞌa jarateeji judiorãmaa mãikꞌaapa judio–eerãmaa, ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata oodaamaa pꞌaneedamerã mãikꞌaapa Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristode ijãadamerã.
Ɨ̃rá wãru Jerusalendee, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa mãga kꞌinia bairã. Wãitꞌee kꞌawa–e bɨ mĩda kꞌãata mɨ ome oodaitꞌee mama.
Nãgapai kꞌawa bɨ. Pꞌuuru bee chaa wãyaarude Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa mɨmaa kꞌawapiru mɨ miaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa carcelde chupɨria nɨ̃banaitꞌee.
Mamĩda mɨa pꞌua–e bɨ, piuru pɨjida Jesupa oopi bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia bairã. Jĩpꞌa jaratee kꞌinia bɨ na pedee pia: Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã kꞌinia iru bairã, tachi kꞌaripaji Jesucristo piuda kꞌaurepa.
ʼMãga jarateeji parã tꞌãide. Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõrepa parãmaa jarateeji ichia oopi kꞌinia bɨ Cristode ijãapataarãmaa. Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ parãpa mɨ kꞌĩra waa unuda–e paitꞌee.
Mapa idi weda Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mɨa jara bɨ: parãdepema aba piukꞌãri atuaru pɨrã, mɨ kꞌaurepada ada–e paitꞌee.
Mãga jara bɨ mɨa jarateeda perã jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapidakꞌa.

Mapa ɨ̃pemaarã, chikꞌaripa pꞌanapatáatɨ mãikꞌaapa ijãapataarã pia akꞌɨ pꞌanapatáatɨ, ma–itꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa parã jɨrɨtꞌerada perã. Tachi Waibɨapa kꞌinia bɨ parãpa akꞌɨdamerã ichide ijãapataarã, ichia ãra o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atada perã, ichi waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa.
Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ ne–animal kꞌachia beerã atu chepatakꞌa eperãarã peede, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ nãikꞌaapa wãda tꞌẽepai awaraarã chedaitꞌee Cristode ijãapataarã ijãa amaapide.
Ichiaba pãchi tꞌãideepa pida uchiadaitꞌee seewa jarapataarã. Mãgɨɨrãpa ijãapataarã ãchi eere atee kꞌinia pꞌanadaitꞌee.
Mapa kꞌĩra ɨbɨa pꞌanátɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌirãpátɨ sãga mɨ chupɨria nɨ̃baji año õpee, parã ũraa bɨ misa pꞌãrikꞌua mãikꞌaapa ãstaawa.

ʼƗ̃rá ɨ̃pemaarã, mɨa parã bɨru Tachi Akꞌõre juade, ichia parã pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã ichi ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Ichi aupaita parãmaa oopii ichia oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, mãgá iru–itꞌee pꞌanapataadamerã chi apemaarã awara bɨdaarãkꞌa.
Mɨa chĩara pꞌaratꞌa, nẽe mãikꞌaapa pꞌaru kꞌɨ̃a–e bɨ.
Parãpa pia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mɨchi juadoopa mimiapari mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa atapari mɨchi–itꞌee mãikꞌaapa mɨ ome pꞌanɨɨrã–itꞌee.
Mɨa parãmaa atꞌapai jarateedoo, aukꞌa mimiadamerã mãikꞌaapa chikꞌaripa para bamerã. Kꞌirãpátɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesupa jarada: “Pipɨara bɨ teeitꞌee, jitai kꞌãyaara.”
Mãga jarapꞌeda, Pablo bedabaidachi mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ji Tachi Akꞌõremaa jõmaarã ome.
Mãpai jõmaweda jẽejida tꞌãri pꞌuapa mãikꞌaapa Pablo wëre atapachida.
Kꞌĩra pia–ee para baji, Pablopa ichi kꞌĩra waa unuda–eda ada perã. Maapꞌeda, barco badamaa kꞌõpꞌãyanajida.
Mãgá despediidapꞌeda, barcode tai bataujida mãikꞌaapa wãjida Cos isladee. Aɨ norema wãjida Rodas isladee. Mamãikꞌaapa panajida Pátara pꞌuurude.
Mama barco Fenicia eujãdee wã nipadade bataujida mãikꞌaapa wãjida.
Ma wãdade Chipre isla unujida tai juabi eere. Mata wãjida Siria eujãde Tiro pꞌuurude panarutamaa, mama netꞌaa barcode atee wãdapꞌedaa atabëidaitꞌee pada perã.

Mama ijãapataarã jɨrɨdakꞌãri, unu atajida mãikꞌaapa ewari siete pꞌaneejida ãra ome. Mama bɨde Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa ma ijãapataarãmaa kꞌawapiji Pablo Jerusalende pꞌasaitꞌee. Mapa irumaa jarajida wãnaamerã.

Mãga jarajida mĩda, tomiamaa tai mamãikꞌaapa uchiajida. Mãpai ijãapataarã ãchi wẽra mãikꞌaapa chi warrarã ome pꞌuurudeepa taawaa tai kꞌõpꞌãya tee chejida pꞌusa ide. Ma ipude bedabaijida mãikꞌaapa jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃jida.
Maapꞌeda, despediidapꞌeda, tai wãjida barcode. Jõdee, ma ijãapataarã ãchi te chaa erreujida.
Tiro pꞌuurudeepa tai wãjida. Mata panajida Tolemaida pꞌuurude. Mama ijãapataarã ome ewari aba pꞌaneejida.

Aɨ norema uchiadakꞌãri, panajida Cesarea pꞌuurude. Mama panadakꞌãri, wãjida Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepari Felipe temaa. Mãgɨ́ Felipe Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã kꞌaripapataarã sietedepema paji. Mama pꞌaneejida.
Felipepa kꞌau kꞌĩmari iru baji, atꞌãri ɨmɨkꞌĩra wẽe. Mãɨrãpa jarapachida Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarapidakꞌa.
Mama taarã pꞌanɨde Judea eujãdeepa cheji Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapari, tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Agabo.
Taimaa pachekꞌãri, Pablo kꞌɨrrɨde jɨ̃pari ẽra ataji. Mãpai Agabopa ichi jua bɨɨrɨ ome pꞌãrajɨ̃ akꞌɨ beeji mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:
—Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jara bɨ: “Jerusalende judiorãpa nãgá oodaitꞌee nãgɨ́ kꞌɨrrɨde jɨ̃pari chipari ome, iru judio–eerã poroorã jua ekꞌari bɨdakꞌãri.”
Taipa mãikꞌaapa Cesareadepema ijãapataarãpa mãga ũridakꞌãri, Pablomaa enenee jõneejida Jerusalendee wãnaamerã.
Mamĩda irua mãgaji:
—¿Kꞌãare–itꞌee jãkꞌɨara jẽe pꞌanɨma? aji. Mɨ tꞌãri pꞌuapitꞌaaruta. Ichita mɨ wãitꞌee Jerusalendee jɨ̃ nɨ̃bɨruta pɨjida, ma awara peetꞌaaruta pɨjida, mɨa Cristopa ooda jaratee bɨ kꞌaurepa.
Tai pedee ũri–e pada perã, ichiakꞌau bɨjida. Jĩpꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre juade bɨjida, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichiakꞌau oomerã ichia oo kꞌiniata.
Maapꞌeda, netꞌaa pꞌe atadapꞌeda, wãjida Jerusalendee.
Cesareadepema ijãapataarã ũkꞌuru wãjida tai ome, ateedaitꞌee Chipre isladepema Mnasón apatapꞌedaa temaa, Jerusalende bɨ. Mãgɨ́ eperã taarã weda Cristode ijãa bapachi.
Jerusalende panadakꞌãri, ijãapataarãpa o–ĩa tai auteebaijida.
Aɨ norema Pablo tai ome Santiagomaa wãji. Mama ichiaba ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarã pꞌanajida.
Pablopa saludaapꞌeda, nepɨrɨji jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda ichi kꞌapꞌɨa pari judio–eerã tꞌãide.
Mãga ũridakꞌãri, o–ĩa para beeji mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃jida Tachi Akꞌõremaa jaradaitꞌee iruta jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Mãpai Pablomaa mãgajida:
—Ɨ̃pema Pablo, pɨa kꞌawa bɨda ajida, nãpema judiorã cho–kꞌara Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda atꞌãri kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa oodaipia bɨ.

Mãgɨɨrãpa ũri pꞌanɨ pɨa judiorã awaraa eujãde pꞌanɨɨrãmaa jaratee ni Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa oonaadamerã, mãikꞌaapa warra kꞌapꞌɨade tauchaa bɨnaadamerã, ma awara ne–inaa chonaarãweda oopatapꞌedaa oonaadamerã.
Maperã, ¿taipa sãga oodaima? Ãrapa pɨ nama che bɨ kꞌawaa atadaitꞌee.
Mapa nãga oopáde aji: nama ijãapataarã kꞌĩmariirãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa jaradapꞌedaakꞌa ewaa oodaitꞌee, waya iru tede tꞌĩu pia pꞌaneedamerã.

Pɨchi ome pꞌe ateepáde aji, mãikꞌaapa pꞌaapáde aji, ãchimaa pꞌaapipataarãpa iidi pꞌanɨ. Oodapáde aji, Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraade jara bɨkꞌa; puda tꞌɨɨpidamerã mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre tede tꞌĩu pia pꞌaneedamerã. Mãgá ooru pɨrã, jõmaarãpa kꞌawaadai pɨ ãpɨte seewa nepɨrɨ pꞌanɨ. Ma awara pɨa mãgá ãramaa akꞌɨpii Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa ichiaba oopari.

Jõdee mãga oopi kꞌiniada–e judio–eerãmaa, ichiaba Cristode ijãadakꞌãri. Jĩpꞌa taipa ãramaa pꞌã pëi pꞌanɨ: kꞌonaadamerã nechiara ata bɨdapꞌedaa ne–inaa eperãpa ooda kꞌĩrapite, aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata; kꞌonaadamerã ne–inaa waa maa–e pɨrã ne–animal ɨ̃yapa jɨ̃a piuda chiara mãikꞌaapa pariatua pꞌekꞌau oonaadamerã.

Aɨ norema Pablopa ma eperãarã kꞌĩmari ateeji Tachi Akꞌõre temaa. Oojida Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa tꞌĩu pia pꞌanadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨade. Maapꞌeda Pablo tꞌĩuji Tachi Akꞌõre tede jaraitꞌee sãapaita Tachi Akꞌõremaa ãchia jaradapꞌedaa jõdaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa sãapaita ãchia ne–animalaarã ateedaitꞌee pꞌaareerãmaa peedapꞌeda, paadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee.

Ewari siete jõitꞌee nɨ̃bɨde ma eperã kꞌĩmari jõdaitꞌee paji ãchia oodaitꞌee bada tꞌĩu pia pꞌaneedamerã Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨade. Mama pꞌanɨde Ásia eujãdepema judiorãpa Pablo unu atajida Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨade. Mapa ãchia arii pꞌanadapꞌedaarã kꞌĩraupikꞌoojida. Pablo jita atadapꞌeda, biajida:

—Israel pidaarã, tai kꞌaripátɨ. Nãgɨ́ eperãpa pꞌuuru bee chaa ne–inaa kꞌachia jaratee ni tachi judiorã ãpɨte. Jaratee bɨ Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa oonaadamerã mãikꞌaapa pedee kꞌachia jara bɨ na te ãpɨte. Ma awara judio–eerã tꞌĩupiji nama, mãgeerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa tꞌĩupiikꞌaraa bɨda a bɨ mĩda. Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨa kꞌachia oomaa bɨ.

Mãga biapachida aɨ naaweda Pablo unudapꞌedaa perã pꞌuuru jãde ni Trófimo ome. Mãgɨ́ Éfeso pꞌuurudepema paji. Ma omé unudapꞌedaa perã mãgá, judiorãpa kꞌĩsiajida Pablopa ma eperã aukꞌa tꞌĩupiji Tachi Akꞌõre tede.

Ma kꞌaurepata pꞌuuru pidaarã jõmaweda kꞌĩrau para beeji. Mãpai eperãarã pꞌĩsua cheepuru nɨ̃beeji. Pablo jita atajida mãikꞌaapa jidi babataa atadachida Tachi Akꞌõre temãiipa. Aramata Tachi Akꞌõre te jɨ̃apataarãpa chi tꞌĩupata jõmaweda jɨ̃ajida.
Mãga nɨde taawa Pablo peetꞌaadaitꞌee pakꞌãri, Romadepema soldaorã poro waibɨamaa jaranajida pꞌuuru pidaarã jõma kꞌĩrau para nɨ̃bɨ.
Aramata ichi soldaorã pꞌe atapꞌeda, awaraa poroorã ome pꞌira chejida see nɨ̃badamaa. Ma soldaorã poro waibɨa chi soldaorã ome cheruta unudakꞌãri, eperãarãpa Pablo ichiakꞌau bɨjida.
Mãpai ma soldaorã poro waibɨa chepꞌeda, Pablo jita ataji mãikꞌaapa cadena omeepa jɨ̃ nɨ̃bɨpiji. Maapꞌeda eperãarãmaa iidiji kꞌasaa tꞌɨ̃jarapata jã eperã mãikꞌaapa kꞌãare kꞌachiata ooji.
Biukꞌa nɨ̃beeji; abaapa ne–inaa jarapachi, awaraapa ne–inaa awara. Mapa chi soldaorã poro waibɨapa pꞌoyaa kꞌawa–e paji kꞌasaa jara para bɨ. Maperã jaraji soldaorãmaa ãchi temaa ateedamerã.
Soldaorã temãi tomede panadakꞌãri, Pablo ɨtꞌɨ́ jira ateejida eperãarã waidoopa,
eperãarã tꞌẽe bia wãdapꞌedaa perã:
—¡Peetꞌáatɨ!
Mamĩda teeda panadai naaweda, griego pedeede Pablopa mãgaji ma soldaorã poro waibɨamaa:
—Mɨ pɨ ome arakꞌatɨa pedee kꞌinia bɨda aji.
Mãpai mãgɨ́ poro waibɨapa pꞌanauji:
—¿Pɨa griego pedee kꞌawa bɨ–ekꞌã? aji.
¿Mãgara pɨ–ekꞌã aji, jã Egipto pidapa mẽepemaarã cuatro mil ateeda eujã pania wẽe bɨmaa?
Pablopa pꞌanauji:
—Mãga–eda aji. Mɨ judiopɨ Tarso pꞌuurudepema. Mãgɨ́ pꞌuuru Cilicia eujãde bɨ. Mɨ ma pꞌuuru pipɨara bɨdepemapɨ. Mɨ chupɨria pedeepipáde aji, eperãarãmaa.
Mãpai mãgɨ́ soldaorã poro waibɨapa pedeepiji. Pablo tomede bainɨ̃ beepꞌeda, juapa eperãarãmaa jaraji kꞌĩupꞌee pꞌaneedamerã. Eperãarã kꞌĩupꞌee para beekꞌãri, Pablo hebreo pedeede pedeeji.
Mãgaji:
—Mɨchi aukꞌaarã mãikꞌaapa chonaarã, ũrítɨ mɨa jararu.
Hebreo pedeede pedeeru ũridakꞌãri, eperãarã kꞌĩupꞌee para beeji. Mãpai Pablopa mãgaji:

—Mɨ judiopɨ, Tarso pꞌuurude tꞌoda. Mãgɨ́ pꞌuuru Cilicia eujãde bɨ. Mamĩda mɨ nama Jerusalende estudiaji Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepari Gamaliel ome. Iru kꞌaurepa mɨa kꞌawaaji Moisepa pꞌãda, tachi chonaarãpa bëidapꞌedaa. Ma awara mɨa oo kꞌinia bapachi Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, parãpa idi oo pꞌanɨkꞌa.
Mapa naaweda mɨa Tachi Akꞌõre Ode Pꞌanɨɨrã apata miapipachi. Ãchi jita atapꞌeda, carcelde tꞌɨ nɨ̃bɨpachi. Wẽraarã mãikꞌaapa ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã aukꞌa mãgá oopachi.

Pꞌaareerã poro waibɨapa mãikꞌaapa jõma nãpema poro waibɨarãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ na jara bɨ wãara. Ãrapa kꞌartꞌa pꞌãjida mãikꞌaapa mɨ ome pëijida judiorãmaa Damascode, mɨa ijãapataarã mama pꞌanɨ pꞌe aneemerã nama miapiitꞌee. Mamĩda mɨ kꞌĩsia awara kꞌĩsiaji.
—Mɨ Damasco kꞌaitꞌa pa wãde, imatꞌɨpa ɨtꞌariipa ɨ̃daa jẽra tꞌĩudachi mɨ ɨ̃rɨ.
Mãpai mɨ eujãde baainaji mãikꞌaapa ũriji pedeeru: “Saulo, Saulo, ¿sãapꞌeda mɨchideerã jɨrɨ nima?” aji.
Mãpai mɨa iidiji: “¿Kꞌaima pɨ?” Pꞌanauji: “Mɨ Jesús Nazaretdepema, pɨa jɨrɨ ni eperãarã poro waibɨa.”
Mɨ ome wãdapꞌedaarãpa ma ɨ̃daa jẽra tꞌĩuda unujida. Mamĩda ũrida–e paji mɨ ome pedeemaa bada.
Mãpai mɨa mãgaji: “Tachi Waibɨa, ¿mɨa kꞌãata ooipia bɨma?” aji. Mãpai ichia pꞌanauji: “Pꞌirabáiji mãikꞌaapa wã́ji Damasco pꞌuurudee. Jãma jaradai pɨa kꞌãata ooitꞌee.”
Ma ɨ̃daa jẽra tꞌĩudapa mɨ tau pꞌãriudachi. Mapa mɨ kꞌõpꞌãyoorãpa juadeepa jidiu ateejida Damascodee.
ʼMama baji eperã tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Ananías. Mãgɨpa oopachi Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Mapa Damascodepema judiorãpa iru pia unupachida.
Irua mɨ akꞌɨ chekꞌãri, mãgaji: “Ɨ̃pema Saulo, waya unupáde” aji. Aramãgá tau eratɨdachi mãikꞌaapa mɨa iru unuji.

Mãpai irua mãgaji: “Tachi chonaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨapa pɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji kꞌawaamerã ichia pɨmaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ. Ma awara pɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji unumerã Jesucristo, chi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bɨ mãikꞌaapa ũrimerã pedee ichi itꞌaideepa.
Mãga ooji pɨta jõmaarã taide irua jararu jarateepari paitꞌee perã, jarakꞌãri na unuda mãikꞌaapa ũrida.
Mapa ɨ̃raweda poro choopipáde aji, mãikꞌaapa Jesumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃páde aji, irua pɨchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapimerã.”
—Waya Jerusalendee chekꞌãri, wãji Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨadee ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃de. Mama kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌa bɨde unuji Jesús.
Ichia mɨmaa mãgaji: “Isapai uchiapáde aji, Jerusalendeepa, nama pɨa jarateekꞌãri mɨa ooda, ũri kꞌiniada–e paitꞌee perã.”
Mãpai mɨa pꞌanauji: “Mamĩda jõmaarãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata te chaa wãkꞌãri, mɨa ijãapataarã pꞌe aneepachi carcelde tꞌɨkꞌoode mãikꞌaapa pꞌu oopide.
Ma awara pɨ mimiapari Esteban peedakꞌãri, mɨ arii baji mãikꞌaapa iru peedapꞌedaarã pꞌaru akꞌɨ baji. Ɨ̃rá pɨde ijãa bɨta, ¿ũridaikꞌã mɨa ãramaa nepɨrɨkꞌãri mɨ pɨ ome unuda?”
Mamĩda ichia mɨmaa mãgaji: “Namãikꞌaapa uchiapáde aji, mɨa pɨ pëiitꞌee perã awaraa eujãdee judio–eerãmaa jarateenamerã.”
Mãgapai eperãarãpa Pablo pedee ũrijida. Mãpai ma ũri para badaarãpa biamaa pꞌaneejida:
—¡Jã eperã chokꞌai baikꞌaraa bɨda! ajida. ¡Peetꞌaadapáde! ajida.
Eperãarã waapɨara biukꞌa nɨ̃beeji. Ãchi pꞌaru jĩapꞌejida mãikꞌaapa eujã pꞌora ɨtꞌaa batꞌapachida, kꞌĩrau para bada perã.

Mãpai chi soldaorã poro waibɨapa jaraji Pablo ateedamerã soldaorã temaa mãikꞌaapa wɨdamerã. Mãga ooji ichia ũri–e pada perã Pablopa jarada judiorã pedeede. Kꞌĩsiaji Pablo wɨdakꞌãri, jarapidai sãapꞌeda eperãarã jãga kꞌĩrau para bɨ iru ome.
Mamĩda jɨ̃maa pꞌanɨde wɨdaitꞌee, Pablopa iidiji chi wɨdaitꞌee pꞌanadapꞌedaarã poromaa:
—Mɨ Romadepema.
Mãgɨ́ capitanpa mãga ũrikꞌãri, isapai wãji ãchi poro waibɨamaa mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:
—¿Pɨa, kꞌãata ooitꞌeema aji, jã eperã Romadepema ome?
Mãpai ãchi poro waibɨa chekꞌãri, Pablomaa iidiji:
—¿Wãara pɨ Romadepemakꞌã? aji.
Pablopa pꞌanauji:
—Wãarada aji.
Mãpai soldaorã poro waibɨapa mãgaji:
—Mɨa pꞌaratꞌa waibɨa pꞌaajida aji, eperã Romadepema paitꞌee.
Mãpai Pablopa pꞌanauji:
—Mɨ Romadepema, mɨ akꞌõre mãga bada perã.
Mãpai chi wɨdaitꞌee pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa ichiakꞌau bɨjida. Ãchi soldaorã poro waibɨa jida pꞌeraji Pablo jɨ̃pi bada perã wɨpiitꞌee, Romadepema bɨta.

Aɨ norema soldaorã poro waibɨapa Pablo cadenapa jɨ̃ bada ẽrapiji mãikꞌaapa uchia ataji carceldeepa, kꞌawa kꞌinia bada perã sãapꞌedata judiorãpa Pablo perá peejida. Mapa pꞌaareerã poroorã mãikꞌaapa Junta Supremadepemaarã jõmaweda tꞌɨ̃ pꞌe atapꞌeda, Pablo uchiapiji ãchi kꞌĩrapite.
Pablopa Junta Supremadepemaarã see nɨ̃badamaa akꞌɨji mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:
—Mɨchi aukꞌaarã, mɨ atꞌãri kꞌĩsia pꞌua–ee ni Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, mɨa oo kꞌinia bairã irua oopi bɨkꞌa.
Mãga ũrikꞌãri, pꞌaareerã poro waibɨa Ananiapa Pablo itꞌaimaa wɨpiji iru kꞌaitꞌa pꞌanadapꞌedaarãmaa.
Mamĩda Pablopa mãgaji:

—¡Tachi Akꞌõrépata pɨ kꞌachia ooyada aji, tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa bairã! Pɨ jãma su–akꞌɨ bɨ mɨa ooda akꞌɨitꞌee Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda irua pꞌãdakꞌa oo–e bɨ. Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨ chupɨria kꞌawaamerã. Mamĩda pɨa mɨ chupɨria kꞌawa–e bɨ. ¡Ma kꞌãyaara mɨ itꞌai wɨpiru!
Mãpai arii pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa mãgajida:
—¿Jãgata ikꞌachia jararukꞌã ajida, Tachi Akꞌõre pꞌaareerã poro waibɨamaa?
Mãpai Pablopa pꞌanauji:
—Mɨchi aukꞌaarã, mɨa kꞌawa–e pajida aji, iru pꞌaareerã poro waibɨa. Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Pedee kꞌachia jaranáatɨ pãchi pꞌuuru pidaarã poroorã ãpɨte.’
Maapꞌeda Pablopa unukꞌãri ma see nɨ̃bɨde para bɨ saduceo eerepemaarã mãikꞌaapa fariseo eerepemaarã, ichi tꞌãridepai kꞌĩsiaji. Maapꞌeda golpe pedeeji:
—Mɨchi aukꞌaarã, mɨ fariseopɨ; fariseorãdeepa uchiada. Mɨa ijãa bɨ tachi piupꞌeda, chokꞌai pꞌirabaidaitꞌee. Maperãta nãgá parã kꞌĩrapite mɨ anee pꞌanɨ, mɨa ijãapari akꞌɨdaitꞌee.
Pablopa mãga jarakꞌãri, fariseo eere pꞌanadapꞌedaarã mãikꞌaapa saduceo eere pꞌanadapꞌedaarã ãchi pitapai aupedee para beeji.
Mãga oojida saduceorãpa jarapata perã piudapꞌedaarã chokꞌai pꞌirabaida–e, angeleerã wẽ–e mãikꞌaapa tachi jaure wẽ–e. Jõdee fariseorãpa ijãapachida mãgɨ́ jõma paraa.
Maperãpɨ biukꞌa nɨ̃beeji. Ũkꞌuru Moisepa pꞌãda jarateepataarã fariseo eere pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa mãgajida:
—Na eperãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–e bɨda ajida. ¿Eperã jaurepa maa–e pɨrã angelpa irumaa pedeeji–ekꞌã? ajida.
Audupai biukꞌa nɨ̃beekꞌãri, soldaorã poro waibɨapa, ewaa Pablo peetꞌaadai jĩakꞌaapa, tꞌɨ̃ji chi soldaorã iru uchia atadamerã ma biukꞌa nɨ̃badadeepa mãikꞌaapa ateedamerã ãchi temaa.
Aɨ norema pꞌãrikꞌua Tachi Waibɨa Jesús Pablo ikꞌaawa bainɨ̃ ba cheji mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:
—¡Waaweenáaji! Mɨa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee pɨa jarateedakꞌa Jerusalende, jãgá ichiaba jaraitꞌee Roma pꞌuurude.
Aɨ norema judiorã ũkꞌuruurãpa pedeeteejida Pablo peetꞌaadaitꞌee. Mãgɨɨrãpa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite nekꞌoda–eda ajida, Pablo peetꞌaarutamaa.
Mãgɨ́ pedeeteedapꞌedaarã cuarenta ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã audú paji.
Ãchi wãjida pꞌaareerã poroorãmaa mãikꞌaapa judiorã poro waibɨarãmaa mãikꞌaapa mãgajida:
—Taipa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite juraajida nekꞌoda–e paitꞌee Pablo peeda–emãi.

Ɨ̃rá parãpa mãikꞌaapa awaraa Junta Supremadepemaarãpa jara pë́itɨ soldaorã poro waibɨamaa nu Pablo aneedamerã, seewata parãpa pipɨara kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanadairã kꞌãare kꞌachiata oo bɨ irua. Ma aneerutade taipa ode peetꞌaadayada ajida.
Mamĩda Pablo ɨ̃pewẽra warrapa kꞌawaakꞌãri mãga pedeeteeruta, wãji soldaorã temaa jaratꞌaade Pablomaa.
Maapꞌeda Pablopa soldaorã poro tꞌɨ̃ji mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:
—Atéeji nãgɨ́ warra pɨchi poro waibɨamaa, ne–inaa jara kꞌinia bairã.
Mapa ma soldaorã poropa ateeji ichi poro waibɨamaa mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:
—Pablo preso bɨpa mɨ tꞌɨ̃ji na warra pɨmaa aneemerã ne–inaa jara kꞌinia bairã.
Chi soldaorã poro waibɨapa warra juade jita atapꞌeda, ãyaa ateeji mãikꞌaapa iidiji:
—¿Kꞌãata mɨmaa jara kꞌinia bɨma? aji.
Mãpai ma warrapa mãgaji:
—Judiorãpa pedeeteejida pɨmaa iididaitꞌee Pablo nu ateemerã Junta Suprema kꞌĩrapite, pipɨara kꞌawaadaitꞌee iru nepɨra.

Mamĩda ijãanaapáde aji, ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã cuarenta audú otꞌewa pꞌanadaitꞌee perã. Ma awara ãchia Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite juraajida nekꞌoda–e paitꞌee Pablo peetꞌaarutamaa. Mapa taarã–e mãga iidi chedaitꞌee, pɨa Pablo ãchimaa ateepimerã.
Mãpai soldaorã poro waibɨapa mãgaji:
—Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai chĩaramaa jarai pɨa mɨmaa nepɨrɨ cheda.
Maapꞌeda ma warra pëiji ichi temaa.
Aramata soldaorã poro waibɨapa tꞌɨ̃ pꞌeji soldaorã poro omé. Mãɨrãmaa mãgaji:
—Pꞌe atadapáde aji, doscientos soldaorã bɨɨrɨpa wãdamerã, ma awara setenta caballo ɨ̃rɨ wãdamerã, ma awara doscientos miasu ome, uchiadamerã pꞌãrikꞌua a las nueve. Wãdaitꞌee Cesarea pꞌuurudee.
Ichiaba Pablo–itꞌee caballo anéetɨ aɨ ɨ̃rɨ wãmerã. Kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa ateedapáde aji, Roma jua ekꞌari eujã akꞌɨpari Felixmaa.
Ma soldaorã poro waibɨapa ichiaba kꞌartꞌa pꞌã tee pëiji. Made jara pëiji:
“Claudio Lisiapa nãga pꞌãru Felixmaa.
Mɨa salude pëiru pɨmaa. Pɨ Roma jua ekꞌari eujã akꞌɨpari pipɨara bɨ. Mapa na nepɨra mɨa jara kꞌinia bɨ pɨmaa.
Na eperã mɨa pëiru pɨmaa judiorãpa jita atajida mãikꞌaapa perá peetꞌaajida. Mamĩda mɨa kꞌawaakꞌãri iru Romadepema, mɨchi soldaorã ome wãdapꞌeda, ãra juadeepa kꞌaripa ataji.
Mɨa kꞌawa kꞌinia baji kꞌãare–itꞌeeta ãrapa iru ɨmɨatee pꞌanajida. Mapa iru ateeji judiorã nepɨra akꞌɨpataarã kꞌĩrapite.

Mamĩda mama bɨde kꞌawaaji na eperã ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–e bɨ. Jĩpꞌa ãra chonaarãwedapema ũraa pꞌãdade jara pꞌanajida. Pedee kꞌachia jarajida iru ãpɨte. Mamĩda irua ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–e bada perã, mɨa kꞌawaji iru peepiikꞌaraa bɨ, ma awara carcelde pida baikꞌaraa bɨ.
Aɨ tꞌẽepai mɨa kꞌawaaji judiorãpa pedeeteedapꞌedaa iru peetꞌaadaitꞌee. Mapa pɨmaa pëiru. Jara pëiji iru ɨmɨatee pꞌanadapꞌedaarãmaa pɨ kꞌĩrapite wãdamerã ãchi nepɨra jarade.
Mãgapai paji.”
Mãpai ma soldaorãpa Pablo pꞌãrikꞌua ateejida Antípatris pꞌuurudee ãchi poro waibɨapa jaradakꞌa.
Aɨ norema soldaorã bɨɨrɨpa wãdapꞌedaarã chejida ãchi temaa. Jõdee chi caballo ɨ̃rɨ wãdapꞌedaarã wãjida Pablo ome.
Cesarea pꞌuurude panadakꞌãri, ma Roma jua ekꞌari eujã akꞌɨpari Felixmaa ma kꞌartꞌa teejida, ichiaba Pablo teenajida.
Felixpa kꞌartꞌa leepꞌeda, iidiji Pablomaa sãmapema mãikꞌaapa kꞌawaakꞌãri Cilicia eujãdepema,
mãgaji:
—Pɨ pedee ũriyada aji, pɨ ɨmɨateepataarã chedakꞌãri.
Maapꞌeda preso jɨ̃apataarãmaa jaraji jɨ̃a paraa bɨdamerã Rey Herodepa oopida palaciode.

Kꞌãima joisomaa tꞌẽepai, pꞌaareerã poro waibɨa Ananías pacheji Cesarea pꞌuurude judiorã poro waibɨarã ome. Ãchi ome cheji Romadepemaarã abogado tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Tértulo. Ma jõmaweda Roma jua ekꞌari eujã akꞌɨparimaa chejida Pablo ɨmɨateedaitꞌee.
Mãpai Pablo ma see nɨ̃badamãi aneedakꞌãri, Tertulopa jõmaarã kꞌĩrapite Felixmaa mãgaji:
—Aai, tachi waibɨa, pɨ kꞌaurepa tai kꞌãiwee pꞌanapata na eujãde mãikꞌaapa ɨ̃rá ne–inaa pipɨara jẽra bɨ na eujãde, pɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bairã.
Tai o–ĩa pꞌanɨ pɨ ome, ne–inaa jõma pipɨara oo bairã.
Makꞌɨara taarã pedee kꞌinia–e bairã, pɨ ewari atuapiamaapa, chupɨria kꞌawáaji mɨ pedee ũrimerã.
Jãgɨ́ eperã nepɨra jɨrɨyaa bapari ichi wãrumaa na eujãde, judiorã chõopi nipapari perã ãchi aukꞌaarã ome. Ma awara ichi nazareno eere pꞌanɨɨrã poro.
Ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨade ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee paji. [Mapata taipa iru jita atapijida ateedaitꞌee tai nepɨra akꞌɨpataarãmaa.
Mamĩda soldaorã poro waibɨa Lisias pachekꞌãri, tai juadeepa jãri ataji, mãikꞌaapa jaraji pɨ kꞌĩrapite chedamerã.]
Ɨ̃rá pɨa jã eperãmaa iidiipia bɨ kꞌawaaitꞌee taipa seewa jarada–e pꞌanɨ.
Judiorã arii see nɨ̃badaarãpa wãarada ajida.
Maapꞌeda ma Roma jua ekꞌari eujã akꞌɨparipa Pablomaa juapa jaraji pedeemerã. Mãpai Pablopa mãgaji:
—Mɨ o–ĩa bɨda aji, pɨ kꞌĩrapite pedeeitꞌee perã mɨchi kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ pɨ taarãru na eujãdepemaarã charra.
Pɨchia kꞌawa kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã, iidíji sãaweda mɨ pache bɨ. Mɨ kꞌãima docepai iru bɨ Jerusalende pacheda Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃de.
Judiorãpa mɨ unuda–e paji chĩara ome aupedee pedeemaa wa eperãarã chõopimaa Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨade. Ichiaba mãga unuda–e paji Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata tede pida, wa awara ãi.
Na eperãarãpa pɨmaa pꞌoyaa akꞌɨpida–e ãchia wãarata jara pꞌanɨ.

Wãara mɨa ijãa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ode Pꞌanɨɨrã apata ijãa pꞌanɨkꞌa. Mɨ ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pari tachi chonaarãwedapema Akꞌõremaa mãikꞌaapa ijãa bɨ Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨ, ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa pꞌãdapꞌedaade jara bɨ. Nata mɨa kꞌachia ooda a pꞌanɨ nama pꞌanɨɨrãpa.
Mɨa ijãa bɨ ãchikꞌa; Tachi Akꞌõrepa piudapꞌedaarã chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiitꞌee, eperã tꞌãri pia beerã mãikꞌaapa eperã tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa beerã.
Mapa mɨa jõma oopari kꞌĩsia pꞌua–ee baitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa eperãarã kꞌĩrapite.
ʼMamĩda taarã nipapꞌeda
Mãpai jõma oopꞌeda Tachi Akꞌõre tede tꞌĩu pia beeitꞌee, mama tꞌĩuji. Maapꞌeda Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee ne–inaa teemaa bɨde, Asiadepema judiorãpa mɨ unujida. Mamĩda chĩara ome pida chõo–e paji.
Maperã ãchita pɨ kꞌĩrapite chekꞌajida mɨ ɨmɨateede, wãara kꞌachia oo baji pɨrã.
Maa–e pɨrã nama see nɨ̃bɨɨrãmaa iidíji kꞌãare kꞌachiata unujida mɨ wãkꞌãri Junta Suprema kꞌĩrapite Jerusalende.
¿Kꞌachia ooji–epaama aji, ãchi kꞌĩrapite mɨa golpe pedeekꞌãri: “Idipema ewari parã kꞌĩrapite mɨ aneeruta ijãa bairã tachi piupꞌeda chokꞌai pꞌirabaidaitꞌee?”
Felixpa mãga ũrikꞌãri, jaraji ma nepɨra ichiakꞌau bɨdaitꞌee soldaorã poro waibɨa Lisias cheru misa. Mãga jaraji pia kꞌawa bada perã sãga pꞌanapata Tachi Akꞌõre Ode Pꞌanɨɨrã.
Mãpai Felixpa soldaorã poromaa jaraji Pablo jɨ̃a paraa bɨdamerã, mamĩda ichiakꞌau akꞌɨ chepipataadamerã chi kꞌõpꞌãyoorãmaa.
Maapꞌeda taarãpai Félix waya pacheji chi wẽra Drusila ome. Mãgɨ́ judío wẽra paji. Pachedakꞌãri, Felixpa Pablo tꞌɨ̃ pëiji kꞌawaaitꞌee irua ijãada Jesucristode.

Mamĩda Pablopa jaramaa bɨde tꞌãri pia nipapariimerã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa bapariimerã, ichiaba tachi piuda tꞌẽepai Tachi Akꞌõrepa akꞌɨitꞌee tachia pia oodapꞌedaa mãikꞌaapa kꞌachia oodapꞌedaa, Félix pꞌeradachi. Mãpai mãgaji:
—Jãgapai pia bɨda aji. Na ewari jua pari bakꞌãri, waya pɨ tꞌɨ̃ pëiitꞌeeda aji.
Ma tꞌẽepai, Felixpa Pablo ipꞌii tꞌɨ̃ pëipachi, kꞌĩsia bada perã Pablopa pꞌaratꞌa pꞌaai, ichi juadeepa uchia pëimerã.
Año omé mãgá wãyaaji. Ma tꞌẽepai Félix pari tꞌĩuji awaraa eujã akꞌɨpari, tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Porcio Festo. Mamĩda Félix judiorã ome pia bee kꞌinia bada perã, Pablo preso bëiji.
Festo pachekꞌãri Cesarea pꞌuurude ma eujã akꞌɨpari bade, kꞌãima õpee mama baji, Jerusalendee wãi naaweda ma pꞌuuru kꞌawade.
Mama bɨde pꞌaareerã poroorãpa mãikꞌaapa judiorã poro waibɨarãpa Pablo ãpɨte pedeejida.
Chupɨria iidijida Festomaa Pablo Jerusalendee pëimerã. Mãga oojida pedeetee pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã ode peetꞌaadaitꞌee.
Mamĩda Festopa mãgaji:
—Pablo preso bɨda aji, Cesarea pꞌuurude. Taarã–ee mɨ araa wãitꞌee.
Mapa parã poro waibɨarã mɨ ome pë́itɨ. Mãgá ma eperãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooji pɨrã, iru kꞌĩrapite ãchi nepɨra jaradayada aji.
Festo Jerusalende baji tomia aba maa–e pɨrã kꞌãima diez. Maapꞌeda cheji Cesarea pꞌuurudee. Ma pacheda norema charra mimiapari tede su–akꞌɨ beeji mãikꞌaapa Pablo atapiji.
Pablo pakꞌãri, judiorã Jerusalendeepa cheepurudapꞌedaarãpa ɨmɨateejida Festomaa. Mamĩda ãchia jara pꞌanadapꞌedaa pꞌoyaa akꞌɨpida–e paji.
Jõdee Pablopa pꞌanauji:
—Mɨa pedee kꞌachia jara–e bɨda aji, judiorã ũraa Moisepa pꞌãda ãpɨte maa–e pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨa ãpɨte. Ma awara César ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jara–e bɨda aji.
Mamĩda Festo, judiorãpa ichi tꞌo pꞌanadamerã, Pablomaa mãgaji:
—¿Wã kꞌinia bɨkꞌã aji, Jerusalendee, mɨa jãma pɨ nepɨra akꞌɨmerã?
Pablopa pꞌanauji:
—Nama mɨ nepɨra akꞌɨdaipia bɨda aji, nama mɨ César charra kꞌĩrapite bairã. Pɨa kꞌawa bɨ mɨa judiorãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–e bɨ.
Kꞌachia oo bɨ pɨrã, mɨ peedaipia bɨ. Waawee–ee piutꞌee. Mamĩda kꞌachia oo–e bɨ pɨrã, apidaapa mɨ ãchimaa teedaikꞌaraa bɨ. Mapa mɨa kꞌinia bɨda aji, Cesarpa mɨ nepɨra akꞌɨmerã.
Mãpai Festo pedeeji ichi ũraapataarã ome mãikꞌaapa mãgaji Pablomaa:
—Cesarmaa wã kꞌinia bairã, pɨ irumaa wãitꞌee.
Maapꞌeda, taarãpai Rey Agripa chi ɨ̃pewẽra Berenice ome Festomaa pꞌasiade wãjida Cesarea pꞌuurudee.
Taarã pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, Festopa Pablo nepɨra nepɨrɨji reymaa:
—Nama bɨda aji, Felixpa preso bëida.
Jerusalende nipakꞌãri, pꞌaareerã poroorãpa mãikꞌaapa judiorã poro waibɨarãpa mɨmaa jarajida Pablo ome nepɨra iru pꞌanɨ. Maapꞌeda jarajida peepitꞌaamerã.
Mamĩda mɨa pꞌanauji Romadepema charraarãpa chĩara peepidakꞌaa, ma presopa ichi kꞌapꞌɨa pedee–emaa ichi ɨmɨateepataarã kꞌĩrapite.
Tꞌẽepai ãra nama pachedakꞌãri, aɨ norema mɨ charra tede wãji maapꞌeda aneepiji ma preso.
Mamĩda iru ɨmɨateepataarãpa pꞌoyaa wãarada ada–e paji ma preso kꞌĩrapite. Mɨa kꞌĩsia baji Pablopa kꞌachia oo bɨ. Mamĩda mãga–e paji.
Jĩpꞌa jara pꞌanapachida ãchia ijãa pꞌanɨ Akꞌõre Waibɨapa ooda mãikꞌaapa Jesuda a pꞌanɨ piuda; mãgɨta Pablopa chokꞌai bɨda a bɨ.
Mɨa kꞌawa–e pada perã sãga ooi, Pablomaa iidiji wã kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã Jerusalendee, jãma mɨa na nepɨra waya pia akꞌɨmerã.
Mamĩda ichia chupɨria iidiji Tachi Rey Waibɨa Cesarpa na nepɨra akꞌɨmerã. Mapa mɨa jaraji atꞌãri preso bamerã, Romadee pëiru misa.
Mãga ũrikꞌãri, Rey Agripapa mãgaji Festomaa:
—Mɨa ma eperã pedee ũri kꞌinia bɨda aji.
Mãpai Festopa pꞌanauji:
—Nu iru pedee pɨa ũriyada aji.

Aɨ norema Agripa Berenice ome, reyrã chi–oo jõmaweda jɨ̃dapꞌeda, tꞌĩujida eperãarã chipꞌedaipata tede. Ichiaba tꞌĩujida soldaorã poroorã mãikꞌaapa ma pꞌuurudepema poro waibɨarã. Mãpai Festopa Pablo aneepiji ãchi kꞌĩrapite.
Festopa mãgaji:

—Rey Agripa mãikꞌaapa kꞌõpꞌãyoorã nama see nɨ̃bɨ, pãchi kꞌĩrapite na eperã unu pꞌanɨ. Judiorã jõmaarãpa ichi ɨmɨatee chepata Jerusalendeepa mãikꞌaapa Cesarea pꞌuurudeepa. Jõmaarãta biukꞌadaipata mɨa ichi peepitꞌaamerã.
Mamĩda mɨ–itꞌee irua kꞌachia oo–e bɨ piumerã. Ma awara ichia chupɨria iidida perã Cesarpa ichi nepɨra akꞌɨmerã, mapa mɨa mamaa pëiitꞌee.

Ichi nepɨrade mɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia unu–e pada perã, pꞌã pëiitꞌee wẽe bɨ mɨchi poro waibɨa Cesarmaa. Mapata mɨa aneeru na eperã parã kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa ma kꞌãyaara pɨ kꞌĩrapite, Rey Agripa. Taipa kꞌawaadakꞌãri kꞌãare kꞌachiata oo bɨ, mɨa pꞌã pëiitꞌee reyrã poro waibɨamaa.
Mɨ–itꞌee pia–e pɨkꞌa bɨ pëiitꞌee preso, jara–ee kꞌãare kꞌachiata ooji.
Mãpai Agripapa Pablomaa mãgaji:
—Pedéeji pɨchi kꞌapꞌɨa pari.
Pablopa ichi jua ɨtꞌaa ɨaji mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:
—Tachi Rey Waibɨa Agripa, mɨ o–ĩa bɨda aji, idi pɨ kꞌĩrapite pedeeru perã. Wãarata jaraitꞌee mɨchi kꞌapꞌɨa pari, judiorãpa mɨ ãpɨte seewa jara jõnapata perã.
O–ĩa bɨ pedeeitꞌee pɨ kꞌĩrapite, pɨa kꞌawa bairã tai judiorã pꞌanapata mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩsiapata. Mapa pɨmaa chupɨria iidiitꞌee ũrimerã mɨ pedeeru misa.
—Judiorã jõmaarãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mɨ bapata ãra ome mɨchi tode mãikꞌaapa Jerusalende.
Ichiaba kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mɨ kꞌũtrãa weda fariseorã eerepema paji, mãɨrãpa jõmaarã kꞌãyaara pipɨara oopata perã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Ãrapa mãga jara kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã, wãarada adai.
Maperãta mɨ parã kꞌĩrapite anee pꞌanɨ, ijãa bairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaradade tai chonaarãmaa.

Tai Israeldeepa uchiadapꞌedaa ëreerã docedepemaarãpa nɨ pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa oomerã ichia jaradakꞌa. Maperãta ewari chaa tai Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata mãikꞌaapa oopata iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Mɨa aukꞌa ijãa bɨ mĩda, mɨ ɨmɨatee pꞌanɨ judiorãpa, ¡mɨchi aukꞌaarãpa pida!
¿Kꞌãata kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨma? ¿Eperã piupꞌeda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pꞌoyaa pꞌirabaipi–e paikꞌã?
—Naaweda mɨa pida kꞌĩsia baji judiorãpa kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨkꞌa. Mapa Jesús Nazaretdepema tꞌɨ̃de ijãapataarã miapipachi.
Mãga oopachi Jerusalende. Ijãapataarã chokꞌara carcelde tꞌɨ nɨ̃bɨpachi, pꞌaareerã poroorãpa mãga oopidapꞌedaa perã. Ma awara ãrapa ijãapataarã peepidakꞌãri, mɨ o–ĩa beepachi.

Ichiaba atꞌapai mɨa ijãapataarã miapipachi Cristode ijãa amaadamerã. Mãga oopachi Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata te chaa, ãra unuamaa pꞌe iru bada perã. Pꞌuuru tꞌɨmɨ́ beemaa, judio–eerã tꞌãide paara, ãra jɨrɨ nipapachi.
—Mãga ooitꞌee paji mɨ wãkꞌãri Damasco pꞌuurudee, pꞌaareerã poroorãpa mɨ kꞌaripadapꞌeda.
Mamĩda ode wãde imatꞌɨpa unuji ɨtꞌariipa ɨ̃daa jẽra tꞌĩudaru akꞌõrejĩru kꞌãyaara ɨ̃daara, mɨ ɨ̃rɨ mãikꞌaapa mɨ ome wãdapꞌedaarã ɨ̃rɨ.

Tai jõmaweda eujãde baainajida. Mãpai mɨa ũriji tai hebreo pedeede pedeeru: “Saulo, Saulo ¿sãapꞌeda mɨchideerã jɨrɨ nima? aji. Pɨchi kꞌĩradoopa kꞌachia oomaa bɨ, pꞌakꞌapa ooparikꞌa ãpɨtee tꞌɨakꞌãri chipari nekꞌida misuamaa.”
ʼMãpai mɨa iidiji: “¿Pɨ, kꞌaima?” aji. Pꞌanauji: “Mɨ Jesupɨ, pɨa eperãarã jɨrɨ ni poro waibɨa.
Pꞌirabaipáde aji, mɨ mimiapari paitꞌee perã. Eperãarã kꞌĩrapite pɨa jaraitꞌee mɨ idi unuda mãikꞌaapa ichiaba jaraitꞌee mɨa ne–inaa na ewari akꞌɨpiitꞌee pɨmaa.
Ma–itꞌee pɨ pëiitꞌeeda aji, judiorãmaa mãikꞌaapa judio–eerãmaa. Mamĩda pɨ kꞌaripa ataitꞌee ãchi juadeepa.

Ãchimaa pëiitꞌeeda aji, kꞌawaadamerã sãga uchiadai o kꞌachia pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨdeepa mãikꞌaapa Satanás juadeepa. Mãgá nipadai ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨde Tachi Akꞌõre juade. Mɨde ijãa pꞌanɨ pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapiitꞌeeda aji, mãikꞌaapa ãchia ɨtꞌari iru pꞌanadaitꞌee jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ichia awara bɨdaarã–itꞌee.”
—Mapa Rey Agripa, mɨa ooji mɨ ome pedee badapa jaradakꞌa.

Naapɨara jaranaji Damasco pꞌuurude, maapꞌeda Jerusalende mãikꞌaapa Judea eujãde. Ichiaba judio–eerãmaa jarateeji. Ma jõmaarãmaa jaraji kꞌachia oo amaadamerã mãikꞌaapa oodamerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa, mãgá awaraarãmaa akꞌɨpidaitꞌee wãara Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa pꞌanɨ.
Maperãpɨ judiorãpa mɨ jita atajida mãikꞌaapa perá peejida Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨade.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ kꞌaripapari perã, atꞌãri nama akꞌɨnɨ̃ bɨ jarateeitꞌee kꞌĩra jĩpꞌaarãmaa mãikꞌaapa waibɨarãmaa. Mɨa jarateepari Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa jaradapꞌedaa mãikꞌaapa Moisepa jarada, mãgɨ́ aupai.

Ãrapa jarajida Cristo piutꞌee mãikꞌaapa naapɨara chokꞌai pꞌirabaiitꞌee. Mãgá pꞌirabaikꞌãri, akꞌɨpiji judiorãmaa mãikꞌaapa judio–eerãmaa ãchi ichiaba ɨtꞌaa wãdai, mãgá ãchi uchiadamerã pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨdeepa ɨ̃daa bɨdee.
Pablopa atꞌãri mãga jaramaa bɨde, Festopa golpe pedeeji:
—Pablo, pɨ kꞌĩra kꞌawa–ee baibɨda aji, audú estudia bɨpa.
Mãpai Pablopa pꞌanauji:
—¡Mãga–epɨ, tachi poro waibɨa Festo! Mɨ kꞌĩra pia bɨda aji. Kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nepɨrɨmaa bɨ mãikꞌaapa wãarata jara bɨ.
Rey Agripapa pia kꞌawa bɨ mɨa jara bɨ. Mapa waawee–ee mɨa nepɨrɨmaa bɨ ichi kꞌĩrapite, kꞌawa bairã nãgɨ́ netꞌaa mera ooda–e paji.
Tachi Rey Waibɨa Agripa, pɨa ijãa bɨda aji, Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa jaradapꞌedaa. ¿Mãga–ekꞌã?
Mãpai Agripapa mãgaji:
—¿Taarã–e weda mɨ Cristode ijãapi kꞌinia bɨkꞌã? aji.
Pablopa pꞌanauji:
—Taarã pedeerupa maa–e pɨrã makꞌɨara pedee–eepa, Tachi Akꞌõremaa mɨa chupɨria iidi bɨ pɨ pari mãikꞌaapa nama jõma see nɨ̃bɨ pari, parã mɨkꞌa papimerã, mamĩda na cadena wẽe.
Mãpai Rey Agripa mãikꞌaapa eujã akꞌɨpari Festo pꞌirabaidapꞌeda, uchiajida Berenice mãikꞌaapa awaraa mama su–akꞌɨ pꞌanadapꞌedaarã ome.
Maapꞌeda ãchi pitapai mãgapachida:
—Na eperãpa kꞌachia oo–e bɨ piumerã maa–e pɨrã carcelde bamerã.
Mãpai Rey Agripapa mãgaji Festomaa:
—Iru carceldeepa uchia pëikꞌajida aji, César kꞌĩrapite wã kꞌinia–e bɨda ada paara.
Pedeeteedapꞌeda, tai pëijida Italiadee. Pablo awaraa presoorã ome bɨjida soldaorã poro juade, Julio apatapꞌedaa. Mãgɨ́ baji soldaorã batallonde tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Reyrã Poro Waibɨadeerã.
Bataujida Adramitio pꞌuurudepema barcode, mãgɨ́ wãitꞌee pada perã Ásia eujãdee, pꞌusa ide pꞌuuru bee chaa. Tai ome ichiaba nipaji Aristarco, Tesalónica pꞌuurudepema. Mãgɨ́ pꞌuuru Macedonia eujãde bɨ.
Tai uchiadapꞌedaa norema Sidón pꞌuurude wiibainajida. Mama soldaorã poro Juliopa Pablo chupɨria kꞌawaapꞌeda, ichiakꞌau chi kꞌõpꞌãyoorãmaa pꞌasiapiji, ãrapa iru akꞌɨdamerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripadamerã.
Waya bataudakꞌãri, uchiajida Sidón pꞌuurudeepa. Mata Chipre isla ãpɨte wãyaajida, taimaa nãu pꞌua nɨ̃bada perã.
Pꞌusa jãde wãyaajida Cilicia mãikꞌaapa Panfilia eujã kꞌĩrapite. Mata panajida Mira pꞌuurude. Mãgɨ́ pꞌuuru Licia eujãde bɨ.
Mama soldaorã poropa unuji barco Alejandría pꞌuurudepema wãru Italiadee. Mapa tai jõma ma barcode bataupiji. Mãgá wãjida tai wãdapꞌedaa ode.
Mamĩda nãu golpe pꞌua nɨ̃bada perã, taarãjida piakꞌãa wãdapa. Mata panajida Cnido pꞌuuru kꞌĩrapite. Atꞌãri nãu taimaa pꞌua nɨ̃bada perã, Creta isla ãpɨte wãdade wãyaajida punto Salmona kꞌĩrapite.
Mãgá isla kꞌaitꞌa piakꞌãa wãdapa, tꞌĩujida Buenos Puertos bahiade. Mãgɨ́ Lasea pꞌuuru kꞌaitꞌa baji.
Maapai judiorã fiesta nekꞌodakꞌaa ewari wãyaa baji. Ewari chokꞌara atuadai baji nãu kꞌaurepa. Maperã kꞌachia baji pꞌusa jãde wãyaadaitꞌee, pꞌusa tꞌojara paitꞌee nɨ̃bada perã. Mapa Pablopa ũraaji:
—Kꞌõpꞌãyoorã, ɨ̃raweda uchiaruta pɨrã namãikꞌaapa, kꞌachia wãdaitꞌeeda aji. Netꞌaa, barco mãikꞌaapa eperãarã paara atuadariita unu bɨda aji.
Mamĩda ma soldaorã poropa Pablo pedee ũri kꞌinia–e paji. Ma kꞌãyaara barco chipari pedee mãikꞌaapa barco pꞌerapari pedeeta ũriji.

Ãchi panadapꞌedaamãi pia–e bada perã pꞌusa tꞌojara wãyaaitꞌee, perá jõmaarãpa kꞌĩsiajida wãyaanadaitꞌee Fenice pꞌuurude. Mãgɨ́ puerto baji Creta islade. Mãgɨdeepa unupachi noroeste mãikꞌaapa suroeste.
Ewari aba baarekꞌaapa nãu pꞌua nɨ̃beeji. Mapa ancla jira atajida mãikꞌaapa uchiajida, ãchia kꞌĩsia pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa. Isla kꞌaitꞌa wãjida tokꞌesaa wãdaamaapa.
Mamĩda taarã–e nɨde nãumia golpe pꞌuaji barcomaa, nokꞌooreepa mãikꞌaapa akꞌõrejĩru uchiapari eereepa.
Mapa barco tꞌɨmɨ́ atadachi. Chi pꞌerapataarãpa pꞌoyaa kꞌĩrapa nãumaa bɨda–e paji. Maperã ichiakꞌau nãumaa ateepijida.
Mãgá wãdapa Cauda isla ãpɨte wãyaajida. Mãpai waa nãu golpe pꞌua–e pakꞌãri, barco ãtauwaare japa jɨ̃ ateedapꞌedaa, ɨtꞌɨ́ barcode jidiu atajida ãripiamaapa.

Mãgɨ́ japa ɨtꞌɨ́ jira atadapꞌeda, barcode mimiapataarãpa barco ekꞌari pꞌɨrrabai jɨ̃ nɨ̃bɨjida jɨ̃kꞌarapa, barco tꞌoopꞌepiamaapa. Ma awara waawee pꞌanajida, pꞌoonɨ pꞌananadai jĩakꞌaapa pꞌusa jãde ipu tꞌɨ̃jarapatapꞌedaa Sirte ɨ̃rɨ. Maperã chi vela pɨratꞌaajida. Maapꞌeda, ichiakꞌau nãumaa ateepijida.
Aɨ norema atꞌãri pꞌusa waapɨara tꞌo nɨ̃bada perã nãumiapa, barcode mimiapataarãpa netꞌaa nɨ̃bada batꞌamaa pꞌaneejida.
Aɨ norema kꞌãima õpeemaa ma nãumia pꞌua nɨ̃bɨde, vela, jɨ̃kꞌara, pakꞌuru paara toidaa ãchi juadoopa batꞌamaadachida.
Kꞌãima chokꞌara akꞌõrejĩru mãikꞌaapa lucero unuda–e paji, eu kꞌachia nɨ̃bada perã. Mapa kꞌĩsia pꞌanajida tai kꞌiniidaitꞌee.
Barco pidaarã jua araadakꞌaa paji nekꞌodaitꞌee pida, audú mimia pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Mapa Pablo bainɨ̃ beepꞌeda ãchi esajĩakꞌa, jõmaarãmaa mãgaji:
—Kꞌõpꞌãyoorã, mɨa jarajida aji, uchiada–e paitꞌee Creta isladeepa. Mɨ pedee ũridapꞌedaa paara, nãga pꞌasada–e pakꞌaji. Netꞌaa chokꞌara ãridai wã mãikꞌaapa atuadai wã.
Mamĩda kꞌĩsia pꞌuanáatɨ. Tachi nama pꞌanɨɨrãdepema apida piuda–e. Mamĩda tachi barco atuadaitꞌee.
Mɨa mãga kꞌawa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨmaa jarada perã ichi ángel itꞌaideepa. Mãga ooji mɨ ichide ijãapari perã mãikꞌaapa ichia oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oopari perã. Pꞌãrikꞌua mɨmaa ichi ángel pëiji.
Mãgɨpa mɨmaa mãgaji: “Pablo, pꞌeranaapáde aji, ichita pɨ César kꞌĩrapite wãitꞌee perã. Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌãri pia bairã, ũriji pɨa chupɨria iidida na barcode pꞌanɨɨrã pari. Mapa maarepida piuda–eda” aji.
Maperã kꞌõpꞌãyoorã, kꞌĩsia pꞌuanáatɨ mɨa ijãa bairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaradakꞌa uchiaitꞌee.
Pꞌusapa isla bɨmaa tachi jira batꞌakꞌooitꞌeeda aji.
Mãgá wãdapa kꞌãima catorcemaa tai pꞌanajida Adriático pꞌusa jãde. Ma ewate pꞌãrikꞌua esapɨte barco pꞌerapataarãpa kꞌĩsiajida eujã kꞌaitꞌa pa pꞌanɨ.
Mapa chaajida chi nãpɨa. Chaadakꞌãri, juachama veinte baji chi nãpɨa. Ma waapai waya chaadakꞌãri, juachama quince baji.
Barcode mimiapataarãpa mãu ɨ̃rɨ pꞌoonɨ pꞌananadai jĩakꞌaapa, barco ãtauwaare ancla kꞌĩmari tꞌaakꞌoojida. Maapꞌeda ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃jida Tachi Akꞌõrepa isapai ewaripimerã.
Mamĩda kꞌĩsia atajida barcodeepa jirabododaitꞌee. Mapa japa jira atajida mãikꞌaapa toidaa batꞌatꞌaajida, seewata kꞌɨ̃maapema ancla toidú batꞌarutakꞌa.
Mamĩda Pablopa mãga kꞌawaakꞌãri, mãgaji soldaorã poromaa mãikꞌaapa chi soldaorãmaa:
—Jã eperãarã barcode pꞌaneeda–e pɨrã, parã nãikꞌaapa chokꞌai uchiada–eda aji.
Mapa soldaorã japa jɨ̃kꞌara tꞌɨɨtꞌaajida mãikꞌaapa toidú batꞌatꞌaajida, eperã wẽe.
Tapꞌeda pa wãkꞌãri, Pablopa jaraji nekꞌodamerã.
—Tomia omé paruta pia nekꞌoda–ee, kꞌĩsia jõnɨpa.
Mapa nekꞌótɨ ma–ãri pida, juatau paraadamerã. Mamĩda kꞌĩsia pꞌuanáatɨ, apida piuda–e paitꞌee perã.
Mãga jarapꞌeda, Pablopa pan ichi juade atapꞌeda, jõmaarã taide Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ji mãikꞌaapa ma pan tꞌookꞌoopꞌeda, kꞌoji.
Mãpai ma jõma barcode nipadapꞌedaarãpa mãga unudakꞌãri, aukꞌa kꞌojida.
Tai ma barcode wãdapꞌedaarã doscientos setenta y seis paji.
Jõmaweda nekꞌodapꞌeda, bi jãwaadaidakꞌãri, barcode atee wãdapꞌedaa trigo toidú batꞌakꞌoojida barco wẽsaatɨmerã.
Ewarikꞌãri, barco pidaarãpa ma eujã kꞌawada–e paji mĩda, unujida ipu i joobai nɨ̃bɨ. Mapa kꞌĩsiajida barco ipude pꞌoo atadaitꞌee.
Mãpai ancla jɨ̃ bada jõmaweda tꞌɨɨkꞌoodapꞌeda, toida atabaibeejida. Ichiaba chi timón jɨ̃ nɨ̃bada ẽratꞌaajida mãikꞌaapa chi vela kꞌɨ̃maapema bainɨ̃ bɨjida. Mãpai barco to idee sɨrrɨa nɨ̃beeji.
Mamĩda barco pꞌoo nɨ̃banaji ipu atꞌãri pꞌoo–ee badamãi. Barco kꞌɨ̃ pia pꞌoo nɨ̃beeji ipude, pꞌoyaa ãyaa mimikꞌa–ee. Mãpai chi tru tꞌodoochookꞌoodachi pꞌusapa.
Aramata soldaorãpa kꞌĩsiajida presoorã jõma peekꞌoodaitꞌee, ipudee mirudaridai jĩakꞌaapa kꞌui wãdapa.
Mamĩda ãchi poropa mãga oopi–e paji, Pablo peepiamaa bada perã. Ma kꞌãyaara jaraji chi kꞌui kꞌawaa beerã toidú jĩchoodamerã, mãgá to idee naapɨara panadamerã.
Jõdee jaraji chi kꞌui atua beerã tabla ɨ̃rɨ maa–e pɨrã barco pakꞌuru pite ɨ̃rɨ wãdamerã. Mãgá tai jõma pia to ide panajida.
Tai jõma ipude panadakꞌãri, kꞌawaajida ma isla tꞌɨ̃jarapata Malta.
Ariipema eperãarãpa tai pia akꞌɨjida. Kꞌoi che nɨ̃bada perã mãikꞌaapa jĩsua nɨ̃bada perã, tꞌɨpɨtau oro jira bɨjida. Maapꞌeda taimaa jarajida tꞌɨpɨtau ikꞌaawa kꞌara pꞌai chedamerã.
Pablopa tꞌɨpɨ jua pꞌũasaa pꞌe atapꞌeda, tꞌɨpɨtaude oromaa baji. Mãga nɨde tꞌɨpɨ wãsiapa taama uchiadaipꞌeda, Pablo juade kꞌaa jira ba cheji.
Mãga unudakꞌãri, ma isladepema eperãarãpa ãchi pitapai mãgajida:
—¿Na eperã chĩara peepari–ekꞌã? ajida. Pꞌusa jãdeepa uchiaji mĩda, tachi eperãarãpa oopata akꞌɨparipa chokꞌai bapi–e pajida ajida.
Mãga jarajida Pablo piudariitꞌee jĩakꞌaapa.
Mamĩda Pablopa taama tꞌɨpɨtaude jĩapꞌetꞌaaji mãikꞌaapa kꞌãiwee beeji.
Jõmaarãpa nɨ jõnapachida sãapaita Pablo jua oorodarii maa–e pɨrã piudarii. Mamĩda maarepida mãga pꞌasa–e pakꞌãri, kꞌĩsia awara kꞌĩsiadachida. Jarajida Pablo akꞌõre waibɨakꞌa.
Tai pꞌanadapꞌedaa kꞌaitꞌa baji ma isladepemaarã poro waibɨa eujã. Mãgɨ́ poro waibɨa tꞌɨ̃jarapachida Publio. Mãgɨpa tai pia akꞌɨji ichi tede kꞌãima õpee.
Tai mama pꞌanɨde Publio akꞌõre kꞌayaa baji kꞌɨamiapa mãikꞌaapa amipa. Mapa Pablopa akꞌɨnakꞌãri, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ji mãikꞌaapa ichi jua bɨji ma kꞌayaa bada ɨ̃rɨ. Mãgá jɨpa beeji.
Mãga kꞌawaadakꞌãri, ma isladepemaarãpa ãchi kꞌayaa beerã pꞌe ateejida mãikꞌaapa Pablopa jõma jɨpakꞌooji.
Mãgá jɨpa pꞌaneedapꞌedaa perã, mãpema eperãarãpa tai pia akꞌɨjida mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa tee chejida tai–itꞌee. Ichiaba mamãikꞌaapa barcode uchiadakꞌãri, netꞌaa jõmaata taimaa teejida ateedamerã.

Atane õpee ma islade pꞌanadapꞌeda, bataujida barco pꞌusa tꞌojara wãyaapimaa badade. Mãgɨ́ barco Alejandría pꞌuurudepema paji. Ma barco kꞌɨ̃maa baji santokꞌa, Romadepemaarã akꞌõre waibɨarã Cástor mãikꞌaapa Pólux
Ma barcode wãjida Siracusa pꞌuurudee. Mama kꞌãima õpee pꞌaneejida.
Ma pꞌuurudeepa wãjida to i kꞌaitꞌa. Mata wiibainajida Regio pꞌuurude. Aɨ norema tai ãpɨteikꞌa eereepa nãu pꞌua nɨ̃beeji. Mapa ma norema wiibainajida Pozzuoli pꞌuurude.
Mama unujida ijãapataarã. Mãɨrãpa tai ãchi temaa ateejida pꞌanade tomia aba. Maapꞌeda, wãjida Romadee.

Romadepema ijãapataarãpa kꞌawa pꞌanajida tai wã nidá. Mapa tai kꞌĩrachuu chejida Romadeepa, ũkꞌuru Foro de Apio apatapꞌedaamãi, jõdee ũkꞌuru Tres Tabernas apatapꞌedaamãi. Pablopa ãchi unukꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pꞌeda, o–ĩadachi.
Roma pꞌuurude panadakꞌãri, Pablo te jĩpꞌaade bɨjida jɨ̃apari abaa ome.
Mama panadapꞌeda, kꞌãima õpeemaa Pablopa Roma pꞌuurudepema judiorã poroorã tꞌɨ̃ pꞌeji. Jõma pachedakꞌãri, mãgaji:

—Mɨchi aukꞌaarã, maarepida mɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–e bɨda aji, judiorã kꞌĩraupiitꞌee maa–e pɨrã tachi chonaarãpa oodapꞌedaakꞌa oo amaadamerã. Mamĩda Jerusalende mɨ jita atadapꞌeda, Romadepemaarã juade bɨjida.
Romadepemaarãpa mɨmaa iididakꞌãri kꞌãare kꞌachiata oo bɨ, kꞌena pëidaitꞌee paji, maarepida kꞌachia oo–e pada perã mɨ peedaitꞌee.
Mamĩda judiorãpa kꞌiniada–e paji mɨ uchia pëidamerã. Mapa mɨa chupɨria iidiji Cesarpa mɨ nepɨra akꞌɨmerã. Mãga ooji mɨchi aukꞌaarã ãpɨte jarai wẽe bɨ mĩda.
Ɨ̃rá parã tꞌɨ̃ pëiji jara kꞌinia bairã mɨ nãgá cadenapa jɨ̃ nɨ̃bɨ, tachi Israel pidaarãpa ijãa pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa.
Mãpai ma judiorãpa pꞌanaujida:
—Taipa kꞌartꞌa pꞌãda apida waide jitada–e pꞌanɨda ajida, Judea pidaarãpa tee pëidapꞌedaa. Ichiaba araapa pache pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa pɨ ãpɨte maarepida kꞌachia jarada–e pꞌanɨ.
Mamĩda taipa kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanɨda ajida, pɨa kꞌĩsia bɨ, kꞌawa pꞌanadairã jõmaarãpa pedee kꞌachia jara pꞌanɨ pɨchi eere pꞌanɨɨrã ãpɨte.

Mãpai ewari aba bɨjida Pablo pedee ũridaitꞌee. Ma ewate pakꞌãri, eperãarã cheepurujida Pablo badamãi. Tapꞌeda weda kꞌewara parumaa Pablopa jarateeji Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapidakꞌa, kꞌawaadamerã sãga Tachi Akꞌõredeerã pꞌaneedai. Jarateeji kꞌaita Jesús, Moisepa pꞌãdadeepa mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa pꞌãdapꞌedaadeepa.
Mãga ũridakꞌãri, ũkꞌuruurãpa ijãajida Pablopa jarateeda Jesude. Mamĩda ũkꞌuru ijãada–e paji.
Ãchi pitapai kꞌĩsia aukꞌa pꞌanada–e paji. Mãpai erreudaitꞌee pakꞌãri, Pablopa mãgaji:
—Wãarata jarajida aji, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa ichi pedee jarapari Isaías itꞌaideepa parã chonaarãmaa jarakꞌãri:
‘Jã eperãarãmaa jaranapáde aji: Parãpa ũridaitꞌee mɨ pedee. Mamĩda kꞌawada–e paitꞌee kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨ. Mɨa oo bɨ unudai mĩda, kꞌawada–e paitꞌee.

Na eperãarã kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua pꞌanadairã, pia ũridakꞌaa. Ma awara tau pꞌãrajɨ̃ pɨkꞌa jẽra bɨ ununaadamerã; kꞌɨɨrɨ jida tꞌapꞌa pɨkꞌa jẽra bɨ ũrinaadamerã. Maperãpɨ mɨmaa chedakꞌaa, mɨa ãchi tꞌãri pia pꞌanapimerã mãikꞌaapa ãchi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atamerã.’
Mãpai Pablopa mãgaji:

—Idi wãara uchiajida aji, ma etꞌewa jarada, parãpa ijãa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadairã Akꞌõrepa mɨmaa jarapida. Kꞌawáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ɨtꞌaa wãpiitꞌee judio–eerã, ãrapa parã kꞌãyaara ũridaitꞌee perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëi bɨ.
[Pablopa mãga jarapꞌeda, judiorã uchiajida. Aupedee erreu wãjida ãchi pitapai.]
Pablo año omé beeji Romade, te alquilaa ata badade. Mama bɨde irumaa pꞌasianarutaarã jõmaweda auteebaipachi.
Jarateepachi Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida ijãadamerã Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristode, mãgá ɨtꞌaa wãdaitꞌee. Maapai apidaapa irumaa jarateenaapáde ada–e paji.
Mɨ, Pablopa oopari Jesucristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mapa nãgɨ́ kꞌartꞌa pꞌãru. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji mãikꞌaapa awara bɨji jarateemerã irua pedee pia jara pëida Jesucristode.
Chonaarãweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaraji ma pedee pia jara pëida ichi pedee jarapataarã kꞌapꞌɨa pari, ãrapa mãgɨ́ pꞌãdamerã mãikꞌaapa jɨ̃adamerã awaraa ũraa pꞌãda ome.
Ma jara pëidade Akꞌõrepa jaraji ichi Warra uchiaitꞌee chonaarãwedapema Rey Daviddeepa, eperã jĩpꞌaa uchiaparikꞌa.

Mamĩda ichi warra eperã jĩpꞌaa–e paji. Tachi Akꞌõre Warra paji. Akꞌɨpiitꞌee Jesucristo wãara ichi Warra, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara papiji, iru piupꞌeda, chokꞌai pꞌirabaipikꞌãri. Mãga ooji jõmaarãpa kꞌawaadamerã wãara Jesucristota Tachi Waibɨa.
Cristopa mɨ pia ooji mɨ pëikꞌãri mãga jarateenamerã. Mapa mɨa jarateepari judio–eerã jõmaarãmaa, irude ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa oodamerã irua oopi bɨkꞌa.
Parãpa ichiaba ma jarateeda ijãajida. Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã jida jɨrɨji Cristodeerã

Maperã mɨa na kꞌartꞌa pꞌãru parã Roma pꞌuurudepemaarãmaa kꞌirãpapiitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã kꞌinia iru bɨ mãikꞌaapa parã awara bɨ kꞌinia bɨ ichideerã pꞌaneedamerã. Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ irua mãikꞌaapa Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa parã pia akꞌɨ pꞌanadamerã. Mãgá kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.

Naapɨara mɨa jara kꞌinia bɨ Jesucristo kꞌaurepa mɨa gracias jarapari mɨ Akꞌõre Waibɨamaa parã jõmaarã pari. Mɨa mãgá gracias jarapari, ijãapataarã para bee chaa nepɨrɨpata perã parãpa wãara Jesucristode ijãa pꞌanɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõrépata kꞌawa bɨ mɨ ichita ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pari parã pari, tꞌãripa oo kꞌinia bairã irua oopi bɨkꞌa. Mapa jarateepari iru Warrapa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee.
Enenee nɨ̃bɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa mɨ kꞌaripamerã wãitꞌee parã akꞌɨde, irua mãga kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã. Taarãru mɨ wã kꞌinia bɨ.
Parã kꞌĩra akꞌɨ kꞌinia bɨ, parãmaa waapɨara kꞌawaapiitꞌee Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨ. Mãgá parãpa pipɨara oodai Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Ma awara mãgá tachi jõmaweda chikꞌaripa pꞌanadai pipɨara Cristode ijãadaitꞌee.

Ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, mɨa parãmaa kꞌawapi kꞌinia bɨ mɨ wã kꞌinia bada parã akꞌɨde. Mamĩda pꞌoyaa–e paji. Parã aukꞌa kꞌaripa kꞌinia bɨ apemaarã judio–eerã kꞌaripaparikꞌa. Kꞌinia bɨ parã tꞌãidepemaarã ichiaba Cristode ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa oodamerã irua oopi bɨkꞌa.

Wãara Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji ichia jara pëida jarateenamerã jõmaarãmaa: Grecia eujãdepema pedee pedeepataarãmaa; aɨ pedee pedeedakꞌaarãmaa ichiaba; kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanɨɨrãmaa mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee pꞌanɨɨrãmaa paara.
Maperã parã Roma pꞌuurudepemaarãmaa ichiaba mɨa jaratee kꞌinia bɨ Jesucristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee.

Mɨ kꞌĩra nejasia–ee jarateeitꞌee Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõre, ichi juapa aɨde ijãapataarã kꞌaripaitꞌee perã atuanaadamerã. Naapɨara mãga jara pëiji judiorãmaa mãikꞌaapa ɨ̃rá mãga ichiaba jara pëiru judio–eerãmaa.

Mãgɨ́ jara pëida kꞌaurepa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ eperãarãpa kꞌawaadakꞌãri Cristopa ooda ãchi–itꞌee mãikꞌaapa irude ijãadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨpariitꞌee. Tachia mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrede wãara ijãapari ichita bapariitꞌee iru ome, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bairã iru kꞌĩrapite.’

Ɨtꞌariipa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ijãapataarã mãgá pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨ bɨ mĩda, ichia jõmaarãmaa kꞌawapi kꞌinia bɨ mãgá akꞌɨ–e ichide ijãadakꞌaa beerã. Kꞌĩrau bɨ ãchi ome pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanapata perã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata perã apemaarãpa ijãanaadamerã irua wãarata jara pëidade.
Ãchia mãga oopata, ãchi tꞌãride pia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mĩda Tachi Akꞌõre bapari. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ichi jua atꞌapai ãchimaa akꞌɨpidoo perã.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa na eujã, pajã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa jõma aɨde nɨ̃bɨ oodakꞌãriipa, eperãarãpa ma ooda akꞌɨ pꞌanapachida. Mãgá kꞌawaa wãpachida iru ichita bapari mãikꞌaapa jõmaweda irua ooda, eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa perã mãgee netꞌaa ãchi juadoopa. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanajida mĩda, ãchi kꞌinia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo wãpachida.

Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa pꞌanɨde atꞌãri irude ijãa kꞌiniadakꞌaa paji mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ kꞌiniadakꞌaa paji gracias jaradaitꞌee, irua ãchi pia akꞌɨ bapachi mĩda. Akꞌõre netꞌaade kꞌĩsiadakꞌaa paji. Maperãpɨ eperãarã kꞌĩra kꞌawa–ee pɨkꞌa pꞌanapachida, pia mãikꞌaapa kꞌachia kꞌawada–ee.
“Tachia ne–inaa jõma kꞌawa pꞌanɨda” apachida. Mamĩda wãara kꞌĩsia kꞌawadakꞌaa paji, Akꞌõrede ijãadakꞌaa paji perã.

Unupachida Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa kꞌĩra wãree ooda. Mamĩda ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dai kꞌãyaara Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãreemaa, irua oodadepema ne–inaa mãgee jĩakꞌa juapa oopachida aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadaitꞌee. Mãgá ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ pꞌaneepachida eperã jĩakꞌa ooda kꞌĩrapite; ipana, ne–animal maa–e pɨrã eujãde bipa nĩuteepata, mãgee jĩakꞌaa ooda kꞌĩrapite. Mãga oopachida mãgee netꞌaa chookꞌaa mĩda, eperãpa ooda perã. Jõdaipari eperãkꞌa. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre ichita bapari.
Mãga oo kꞌinia pꞌanapachida perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichiakꞌau bëiji kꞌachia oodamerã chĩara ome. Mãgá ãchia kꞌachia oo kꞌiniata oo wãpachida, kꞌĩra nejasia–ee.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãara ne–inaa jõmaweda ooji mĩda, ma wãarata ijãadai kꞌãyaara, seewa ijãapachida. Mapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pachida irua oodamaa, irumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dai kꞌãyaara. ¡Mamĩda tachi ooda ichita Akꞌõre Waibɨa paitꞌee! ¡Mãgɨta Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨa! Amén.

Ãchia mãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa oodamaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã irua ichiakꞌau bëiji ãchia oo kꞌiniata oodamerã. Mãgá ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo wãpachida. Wẽraarã awaraa wẽraarã ome kꞌãi kꞌinia pꞌanapachida, wẽra chi ɨmɨkꞌĩra ome kꞌãiparikꞌa.

Ichiaba ɨmɨkꞌĩraarãpa awaraa ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã audú jɨrɨpachida ãchi ome aukꞌa araa kꞌãidaitꞌee, wẽraarã ome kꞌãidai kꞌãyaara. Mãga oo pꞌanɨpa kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe, ãchi kꞌapꞌɨa miapipachida, Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa eperãarãmaa oodaamaa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.
Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawadaamaa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, irua ãchi ichiakꞌau atabëiji ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌĩsiadamerã mãikꞌaapa oodamerã.

Mãgá pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo pꞌaneepachida. Mãgee eperãarã nãgá pꞌanapata: pariatua awaraarã jɨrɨpata aɨ ome kꞌãidaitꞌee; ikꞌawaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee; chĩara netꞌaa kꞌɨ̃ayaa; chĩara kꞌachia ooyaa; chĩara kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bee ne–inaa kꞌaurepa; chĩara jɨrɨyaa peedaitꞌee; chõo jɨrɨyaa; chĩara kꞌũrayaa; tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa; chĩara ãpɨte kꞌachia pedeeyaa;
ikꞌachia jarayaa; Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra unuamaa; auduayaa; ãchia oopata nepɨrɨyaa awaraarãpa ãchi tꞌo pꞌanadamerã; ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee kꞌĩsiayaa; ãchi akꞌõreerã pedee ũridaamaa;
kꞌĩsia kꞌawadakꞌaa; oodakꞌaa ãchia oodaitꞌeeda apatakꞌa; ãchideerã paara kꞌĩra unuamaa; kꞌĩra jõdakꞌaa; chupɨria kꞌawaadakꞌaa.

Mãgeerãpa ãchi tꞌãridepai kꞌawapata pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Ma awara kꞌawapata Tachi Akꞌõrepa atuapiitꞌee mãgee pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooi awaa beerã. Mamĩda ichi kꞌinia mãgee ne–inaa kꞌachia oo wãpata mãikꞌaapa pia akꞌɨpata awaraarã ãchi ome aukꞌa oo wãpataarã.

Mãgee kꞌachia oopataarã akꞌɨkꞌãri, parãdepema abaapa kꞌĩsiai: “Mɨa mãga oo–e pakꞌaji”. Mamĩda pɨa pida ne–inaa kꞌachia oopari Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Maperã kꞌĩrakꞌaupai jarai Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgee kꞌachia oopataarã miapiipia bɨ. Aukꞌa Akꞌõrepa pɨ miapii, pɨa kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa.
Wãara, tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa kꞌachia chookꞌaa ichi bɨmãi. Maperãpɨ ichia ne–inaa pia oopari, jarakꞌãri mãgeerã miapiitꞌee ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa.
Mãga bɨta ¿kꞌĩsia bɨkꞌã irua pɨ miapi–e paitꞌee, aukꞌa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopari mĩda?

Maa–e pɨrã ¿nãga kꞌĩsia bɨkꞌã? “Tachi Akꞌõre audú tꞌãri pia bairã, chooitꞌee mɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia ookꞌãri.” ¿Kꞌawa–e bɨkꞌã Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌãri pia bapari pɨ ome, kꞌinia bairã pɨa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo amaamerã?

Mamĩda pɨa oo–e bɨ Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua bapari perã. Maperã Tachi Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate irua pɨ audupɨara miapiitꞌee awaraa kꞌachia oopataarã kꞌãyaara. Mãga ookꞌãri, ne–inaa pia ooitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichita ne–inaa pia oopari perã.
Ma ewate Tachi Akꞌõrepa akꞌɨitꞌee eperãarã jõmaarãpa oopatapꞌedaa jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia.
Ichi truadee wãpiitꞌee nãgee eperãarã: ne–inaa pia oopataarã, kꞌinia pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pia akꞌɨmerã, mãikꞌaapa ichita pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanapataarã iru ome iru trua kꞌĩra wãreede.

Jõdee nãgee eperãarã atuapiitꞌee: audua pꞌanapataarã mãikꞌaapa ooda–e pꞌanɨɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëidakꞌa, ma kꞌãyaara ne–inaa kꞌachia oo kꞌinia pꞌanadairã. Mãɨrãpa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩraupipata. Mapa ma ewate irua ãchi kꞌachia ooitꞌee.
Ma ewate jõmaweda pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã miadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa chupɨria chitoonadaitꞌee, naapɨara judiorã, maapꞌeda judio–eerã.
Jõdee pia oopataarã kꞌãiwee pꞌanadaitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pia akꞌɨitꞌee perã mãikꞌaapa ichi trua kꞌĩra wãreedee wãpiitꞌee perã. Mãga pꞌanadaitꞌee naapɨara judiorã, maapꞌeda judio–eerã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa judiorãpa oopatapꞌedaa, judio–eerãpa oopatapꞌedaa aukꞌa akꞌɨitꞌee.

Mɨa mãga jara bɨ Akꞌõrepa judio–eerã atuapiitꞌee perã ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa, Moisepa pꞌãda kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ mĩda. Jõdee judiorã aukꞌa atuapiitꞌee ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa, Moisepa pꞌãda kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mĩda, ooda–e pꞌanadairã jõmaweda ma pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa Moisemaa ũraa pꞌãpida ũrirutapapai, eperã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bee–e pai Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Mamĩda eperã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe beei Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, ooru pɨrã jõmaweda ma pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa.
Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ judio–eerãpa ichiaba oodai Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa, ma pꞌãda kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ mĩda. Mãga oodai oodakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia pia bëidakꞌa eperãarã tꞌãride, ewaa weda eperãarã ookꞌãri.

Mãgá pia oodakꞌãri, jõmaarãmaa akꞌɨpipata ãchi tꞌãride bëida aukꞌa bee Akꞌõrepa pꞌãpida ome. Ma kꞌĩsia pia bëida kꞌaurepa ne–inaa pia kꞌawapata. Mapa ne–inaa pia oodakꞌãri, kꞌãiwee pꞌanapata. Jõdee ne–inaa kꞌachia oodakꞌãri, kꞌĩsia pꞌua pꞌanapata.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji jarateemerã ichi Warra Jesucristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Irua akꞌɨitꞌee eperãarãpa oopatapꞌedaa Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate. Iruata kꞌawapari jõmaarãpa ãchi tꞌãride oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ, pia wa kꞌachia. Mapa kꞌawaitꞌee chisãgɨɨrã wãpii Akꞌõre truadee mãikꞌaapa chisãgɨɨrã atuapii.
Parãpa jarapata: “Tai judiorã.” Mamĩda parã audua pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨ eperãarãmaa kꞌawa pꞌanɨda apata perã. Mãga jarapata pãchi aukꞌaarãpa Moisepa pꞌãda iru pꞌanadairã.

Wãara Moisepa pꞌãda kꞌaurepa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ sãga oodaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa sãga oodaikꞌaraa bɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã pia akꞌɨ bamerã. Ma awara ijãa pꞌanɨ Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa wãara oodaipia bɨ jõmaarãpa, ma pꞌãdade jara bɨ ũraa pia bairã.
Kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ parã́pata Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨ eperãarãmaa jarateedai Moisepa pꞌãda kꞌawa–ee beerãmaa, ãchia Akꞌõre Ũraa kꞌawada–e pꞌanadairã.

Parã–itꞌee ãchi kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerãkꞌa pꞌanɨ maa–e pɨrã warra chakꞌeerãkꞌa pꞌanɨ. Parã judiorãpa ãchimaa jarateeda–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã, ¿sãga kꞌawaadaima Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨ ãchimaa? ¿Parãpa wãarata kꞌawa pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã, Akꞌõre Ũraa kꞌawa pꞌanapata perã?

Parãpa awaraarãmaa jarateepata Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa oodaipia bɨ. ¿Mãga–ekꞌã? Mamĩda parãpa pida ooda–e pꞌanɨ ma pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Ũraapata awaraarãmaa nechɨanaadamerã. Mamĩda edaare parãpa mãga oopata.

Jarapata tachi wẽra omepai kꞌãipia bɨ. Mamĩda parãdepema ũkꞌuruurãpa chĩara wẽra jɨrɨpata, aɨ ome kꞌãidaitꞌee. Kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapatada apata ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo juapa ooda, aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata. Mamĩda parãdepemaarã ũkꞌuru tꞌĩupata mãgee ne–inaa iru pꞌanɨ tede nechɨadaitꞌee.
Jara pꞌanɨ: “Táipata Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa kꞌawa pꞌanɨda” apata. Mamĩda wãara ooda–e pꞌanɨ Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ma ũraade. Mapa parã kꞌaurepa awaraarãpa pedee kꞌachia jarapata Tachi Akꞌõre ãpɨte,
Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade nãga jara bɨkꞌa:
‘Parã kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa kꞌachia pedeepata iru ãpɨte.’

Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopidakꞌa chonaarãweda, tauchaa bɨjida parãdepema ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã kꞌapꞌɨade, akꞌɨpidaitꞌee parã Tachi Akꞌõre eperãarã. Mamĩda parãpa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa wãara ooda–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã, aukꞌa pꞌaneepata tauchaa wẽe beerã ome.
Jõdee, ma tauchaa wẽe beerãpa wãara oo pꞌanɨ pɨrã Akꞌõre Ũraade jara bɨkꞌa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichideerã papiitꞌee, tauchaa wẽe pꞌanɨ mĩda.

Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mãɨrã pipɨara uchiadaitꞌee parã judiorã kꞌãyaara. Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa oo pꞌanɨpa ãrapa akꞌɨpipata Akꞌõrepa parã miapiipia bɨ, irua oopi bɨkꞌa oo kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadairã. Mãga pꞌanapata, parã judiorãpa iru ũraa pꞌãda kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mĩda mãikꞌaapa pãchi kꞌapꞌɨade tauchaa iru pꞌanɨ mĩda.
Ma jõma jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichideerã papi–e judiorãda apataarã, ne–inaa oopata perã irua ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa maa–e pɨrã ãchi kꞌapꞌɨade tauchaa bɨpata perã.

Ma kꞌãyaara ichideerã papipari chi tꞌãripa irude wãara ijãapataarã. Jaradai ãchia tauchaa pɨkꞌa iru pꞌanɨ ãchi tꞌãride, kꞌapꞌɨade iru pꞌanadai kꞌãyaara. Mãgá tꞌãripa wãara ijãadakꞌãri, Akꞌõre Jaure ãchi ome ba chepari. Mãgɨ́ pipɨara bɨ Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade iru pꞌanadai kꞌãyaara, iruata kꞌawapipari perã jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨ. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgee wãara ijãapataarã pia akꞌɨpari, awaraarãpa ãra mãgá akꞌɨda–e pꞌanɨ mĩda.
Mãgara, ¿kꞌãare–itꞌee eperã kꞌapꞌɨade tauchaa bɨi judío pamerã? ¿Pipɨara bɨ–ekꞌã judio–ee baitꞌee, judío pai kꞌãyaara?
¡Mãga–epɨ! Tachi Akꞌõrepa judiorãta naapɨara jɨrɨtꞌeraji ichia jarada jɨ̃adamerã mãikꞌaapa awaraarãmaa jarateedamerã.

Made Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa jaraji judiorãmaa. Mamĩda ãchidepema ũkꞌuruurãpa ma ũraa ijãada–e pꞌanapachida. Maperã ooda–e paji irua oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Ãrapa mãgá ijãada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, ¿Akꞌõrepa oo amaa beejikꞌã ichia jaradakꞌa ma ũraa pꞌãdade?
¡Mãga–e! Akꞌõrepa seewa jarakꞌaa eperãarãkꞌa. Jĩpꞌa oopari ichia jara bɨkꞌa. Ichi ũraa pꞌãdade chonaarãwedapema Rey David itꞌaideepa jaraji:

‘Akꞌõre, mɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata akꞌɨpꞌeda, pɨa wãarata jarapari “kꞌachia bɨda” akꞌãri. Pɨ ɨmɨateepataarã ichita pꞌoyaapariitꞌee, pɨa aupaita akꞌɨitꞌee perã eperãarãpa oopata jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia.’

Mamĩda tai judiorãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo pꞌanadakꞌãri, akꞌɨpipata Tachi Akꞌõre pipɨara bɨ eperãarã kꞌãyaara, irua maarepida kꞌachia ookꞌaa perã. Mãgara ¿kꞌãata jaradaima? “¿Tachi Akꞌõre, tachi ooda tꞌãri kꞌachia bɨkꞌã, kꞌachia oopataarã atuapiitꞌee perã?” (Mɨa mãga iidikꞌãri parãmaa, pedeemaa bɨ eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨkꞌa.)
¡Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌãri kꞌachia–epɨ! Mãga bada paara tachi ome, ¿sãga akꞌɨkꞌajima na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa oopata jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia?

Mɨa mãga kꞌĩsia bada paara, eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨpa jarakꞌajikꞌa ichiaba mɨa mãga jarai: “Mɨa seewa jarakꞌãri, akꞌɨpimaa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre pipɨara bɨ mɨ kꞌãyaara, irua seewa jarakꞌaa perã.” Mãgara mɨa kꞌĩsiakꞌaji seewa jara bɨpa jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõre pipɨara akꞌɨdaitꞌee, irua wãarata jarapari perã. Mãga pada paara ¿sãapꞌeda Akꞌõrepa mɨ atuapiima ma seewa jarada kꞌaurepa?

Wãara judiorã ũkꞌuruurãpa mɨ ãpɨte jara pꞌanɨda a pꞌanɨ, mɨa jarateepari ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaipia bɨ, jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõre pipɨara akꞌɨdamerã. ¡Mɨa mãga jarateekꞌaapɨ! Akꞌõrepa kꞌawa bɨ kꞌairãpa mãga jarateepata mãikꞌaapa ichia mãgɨɨrã miapiitꞌee ma kꞌaurepa.

Ma jõma jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tai judiorã pipɨara pꞌanɨ–e judio–eerã kꞌãyaara, Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa pꞌãda tai ome bëida perã. Etꞌewa mɨa akꞌɨpiji parãmaa tachi jõmaarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata perã; judiorã, judio–eerã aukꞌa.
Ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Eperã apida pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bɨ–e Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Eperã apidaapa wãara kꞌawa–e bɨ ne–inaa pia ooitꞌee. Eperã apidaapa jɨrɨ–e bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre wãara kꞌawaaitꞌee.
Jõmaarãta o kꞌachiade pꞌanɨ ãchia oo kꞌiniata oo pꞌanapata perã. Apidaapa oodakꞌaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, ne–inaa pia wãara pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa perã.’

‘Nãga pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ. Ara piuda kꞌapꞌɨa pia ɨada–e pakꞌãri, mikꞌia uchiaparikꞌa ma ɨadapꞌedaamãiipa, mãga pɨkꞌa pedee kꞌachia uchiapari ãchi itꞌaideepa, tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa pꞌanapata perã. Ãchi itꞌaideepa seewa aupai uchiapari.’
‘Ara taamapa neera mera iru baparikꞌa chi kꞌidade eperã kꞌaaitꞌee, mãga pɨkꞌa ãchi imeraa pedeepa eperãarã kꞌũrapata ne–inaa kꞌachia oopidaitꞌee.’
‘Ikꞌachia pedeepata tꞌãri kꞌachia pꞌanapata perã.’
‘Chĩara audú pee kꞌinia pꞌanapata.
Mãɨrã wãrutamaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo wãpata awaraarãmaa mãikꞌaapa awaraarã tꞌãri pꞌuapipata.
Kꞌãiwee pꞌanadakꞌaa mãikꞌaapa kꞌawadakꞌaa awaraarã mãgá pꞌanapidaitꞌee.’
‘Tachi Akꞌõre waaweedakꞌaa, irude ijãadakꞌaa perã.’

Tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa pꞌãpiji ma etꞌewa pedeeda judiorã–itꞌee, ichia bëida perã ichi ũraa pꞌãda tai chonaarã ome. Ma ũraa pꞌãpiji apidaapa jaranaadamerã “mɨata ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–e” mãikꞌaapa jõmaweda na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa kꞌawaadamerã ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi atuapiitꞌee.

Maperã kꞌawa pꞌanɨ eperã apida pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe baitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite Moisepa pꞌãda kꞌawapari perã maa–e pɨrã ma pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa oopari perã. Jĩpꞌa ma ũraa pꞌãda kꞌaurepa kꞌawapata tachia kꞌachia oopata.

Mamĩda ɨ̃rá eperãarãmaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa akꞌɨpimaa bɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌaneedai iru kꞌĩrapite, ooda–e pꞌanɨ mĩda jõmaweda irua jara bɨkꞌa ichi ũraa pꞌãdade. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ irua mãga akꞌɨpida perã tai chonaarãmaa, Moisepa pꞌãdade mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa pꞌãdapꞌedaade.
Tachimaa akꞌɨpimaa bɨ ichia naaweda kꞌĩsia iru bada: jõmaarãta wãara Jesucristode ijãa pꞌanɨɨrã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanapata Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, judiorã mãikꞌaapa judio–eerã paara.
Jõmaarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata. Eperã apida wẽ–e wãara ne–inaa jõmaweda oopari Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre audú tꞌãri pia bapari perã mãikꞌaapa eperãarã kꞌinia iru bapari perã, pëiji ichi warra Jesucristo pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atamerã, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe ichita pꞌanapataadamerã iru kꞌĩrapite.

Jesucristopa eperãarã mãgá kꞌaripai Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru piupida perã eperãarã pari. Chonaarãweda eperãarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oodakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa choopachi mãikꞌaapa irua ma kꞌachia ãyaa bɨpachi. Mamĩda ma kꞌachia wẽpapi–e paji. Jõdee eperãarã taide ichi warra kurusode piukꞌãri, iru waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jõmaweda wẽpapiji, chonaarãpa chonaarãweda oopatapꞌedaa paara.
Mãga ooji akꞌɨpiitꞌee ichi wãara tꞌãri pia bapari. Maperãpɨ eperã Cristode wãara ijãa bɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bapari Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Mamĩda eperãpa jarai: “Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨta pia akꞌɨ bapariitꞌee mɨa ne–inaa pia oopari perã”. Mamĩda mãga–e. Tachi Akꞌõrepa pia akꞌɨ bapariitꞌee chi wãara Jesucristode ijãa bɨ aupai.

Ma jõma jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ eperãarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌoyaa pꞌanadakꞌaa oo pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Jĩpꞌa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, Jesucristode ijãa pꞌanadairã.
Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa; judiorã Akꞌõre Waibɨa, ichiaba judio–eerã Akꞌõre Waibɨa.
Tachi Akꞌõre apai. Maperã kꞌawa pꞌanɨ judiorã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia, judio–eerã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia aukꞌa wẽpapipari, Cristode wãara ijãadakꞌãri.
Mãga jaradakꞌãri, ¿jara kꞌinia pꞌanɨkꞌã Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãda vale–ee pɨkꞌa bɨ? ¡Mãga–e! Tachia Cristode wãara ijãadakꞌãri, oopata ma ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa.
Kꞌĩsiadáma tai judiorã chonaarãwedapema Abrahampa oodade. ¿Kꞌãata oojima Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pia akꞌɨmerã?

Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaradakꞌa jõmaweda ooda paara Abrahampa, ichia jarakꞌaji awaraarãmaa: “Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ pia akꞌɨpari ne–inaa oopari perã iru–itꞌee.” Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee mãga jara–e pakꞌaji, ne–inaa jõmaweda oo–e pada perã Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia badakꞌa. Mãga bɨta, ¿sãapꞌeda Tachi Akꞌõrepa Abraham pia akꞌɨjima?
Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Abrahampa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada ijãaji. Maperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pia akꞌɨpachi.’
Kꞌĩsiadáma nãgɨde. Eperã mimiakꞌãri awaraa pari, ma mimia aupapꞌeda, ichi pꞌaratꞌa iidinapari mimia chiparimaa. Mãgá tachia oopata pꞌaratꞌa jitadaitꞌee.

Mamĩda mãga–e Tachi Akꞌõre ome. Irua eperã pia akꞌɨ–e, ma eperãpa mãga iidi bairã ichia ne–inaa pia oopari kꞌaurepa. Jĩpꞌa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã pia akꞌɨpari, mãɨrãpa wãara ijãadakꞌãri irua ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiitꞌee.

Chonaarãweda Rey Davidpa ichiaba kꞌawaji Akꞌõrepa eperã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨpari, ne–inaa pia oo–e bɨ mĩda iru–itꞌee. Jaraji mãgee eperã tꞌãri o–ĩa bapari, Akꞌõrepa iru mãgá kꞌaripapari perã. Mãgaji:
‘Pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã o–ĩa pꞌanapata Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ãyaa bɨkꞌãri mãikꞌaapa wẽpapikꞌãri.
Mãgee eperã o–ĩa bapari Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨkꞌãri.’

Davidpa mãga jarada perã, ¿kꞌãata jaradaima? ¿Tachi Akꞌõrepa wẽpapiikꞌã tauchaa iru beerãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa aupai? Tauchaa wẽe beerãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa aukꞌa wẽpapiitꞌee, o–ĩa pꞌanapataadamerã Davidpa jaradakꞌa. Waya pedeedáma Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Abrahampa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada ijãaji. Maperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pia akꞌɨpachi.’
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga jarakꞌãri, Abrahampa atꞌãri ichi kꞌapꞌɨade tauchaa bɨ–e baji.

Ma tꞌẽepaita Abrahampa mãga ooji. Mãga ookꞌãri, akꞌɨpiji ichia wãara ijãa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨda, ma ijãa bɨ kꞌaurepa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa Abraham mãgá akꞌɨda perã ma tauchaa bɨi naaweda, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tauchaa wẽe beerã aukꞌa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌaneedai Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, ijãadakꞌãri Abrahampa ijãadakꞌa. Mãgá ijãadakꞌãri, Abraham warrarãkꞌa padaipata, ãchi kꞌapꞌɨade tauchaa wẽe pꞌanɨ mĩda.

Jõdee tauchaa iru beerã ichiaba Abraham warrarã. Mãga pꞌanɨ–e tauchaa iru pꞌanadairã ãchi kꞌapꞌɨadepai. Jĩpꞌa mãga pꞌanɨ ijãapata perã tai judiorã chonaarãwedapema Abrahampa ijãadakꞌa, ichi waide tauchaa wẽe bɨde.

Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa pꞌãpii naaweda, Abrahammaa jaraji irudeepa uchiadapꞌedaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda jõmaweda iru pꞌaneedaitꞌee ãchi jua ekꞌari, mãikꞌaapa ãchi kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã pia akꞌɨitꞌee. Akꞌõrepa mãga jara–e paji Abrahampa ne–inaa oo bada perã iru ũraade jaradakꞌa. Mãga jaraji Abrahampa irude ijãa bada perã. Maperãpɨ Abraham pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe baji iru kꞌĩrapite.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga jarada paara ichi ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa oopataarãmaa aupai, ¿kꞌãare–itꞌee irude ijãadaima? Mãga bada paara, oo–e pakꞌaji ichia jaradakꞌa Abrahammaa. Mamĩda mãga–e. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawa bɨ eperã apidaapa pꞌoyaa ooda–e jõmaweda iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa.

Ma awara eperãarãpa ooda–e pakꞌãri ma ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa, ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata. Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩraupipata mãikꞌaapa ma kꞌaurepa atuapata. Ma ũraa wẽ–e pada paara, kꞌawada–e pakꞌaji ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oo pꞌanɨ.

Ma jõma jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaradakꞌa, ichia Abrahamdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã pia akꞌɨpariitꞌee, ãrapa ijãapata perã Abrahampa ijãadakꞌa; ma kꞌaurepapai. Maperã kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Abraham jõmaarã akꞌõchona, judiorã akꞌõchona mãikꞌaapa judio–eerã akꞌõchona, ijãadakꞌãri irua ijãadakꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa Abrahammaa jara bɨ ichi ũraa pꞌãdade:
‘Mɨa pɨ eujã awara–awaraadepemaarã akꞌõchona papiitꞌee.’

Mãgá kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite Abraham tachi ijãapataarã akꞌõchona, irudeepa uchiada–e paji mĩda. Abrahampa ijãapachi Tachi Akꞌõrepa piudapꞌedaarã chokꞌai pꞌirabaipipari. Ichiaba ijãapachi Akꞌõrépata jarakꞌãri ichia ooitꞌee bɨ, mãga ooitꞌee, waide oo–e bɨ mĩda.
Abraham perá cien años iru baji Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarakꞌãri:
‘Pɨdeepa uchiadaitꞌeerã cho–kꞌara paitꞌee.’

Mãgá taarã–ee piutꞌee baji mãikꞌaapa chi wẽra Sara, chõtrãa bɨta, warra tꞌokꞌaa paji mĩda, Abrahampa ijãaji Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada; chi wẽrapa warra tꞌoitꞌee. Mãga ijãaji kꞌawa bada perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichita oopari ichia jara bɨkꞌa. Mãgá ijãada perã, Akꞌõrepa Abraham awara–awaraa eujãdepemaarã akꞌõchona papiji.
