Abrahampa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada ijãa amaa–e paji mãikꞌaapa awaraa ne–inaa kꞌĩsia–e paji. Jĩpꞌa ijãaji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooitꞌee ichia jaradakꞌa. Maperã Abraham ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ji Tachi Akꞌõremaa
jaraitꞌee iruta jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Kꞌawaji ne–inaa wẽ–e Tachi Akꞌõrepa pꞌoyaa ookꞌaa.
Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Abrahampa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada ijãaji. Maperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pia akꞌɨpachi.’
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga jara–e paji Abraham–itꞌee aupai.
Ichiaba mãga jaraji tachi–itꞌee, irude ijãapata perã. Iruata Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiji.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesucristo pëiji piumerã tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa. Maapꞌeda iru chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiji tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanadamerã iru kꞌĩrapite.

Tachi Cristode ijãapataarã mãgá pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanapata perã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, kꞌãiwee pꞌanapata, kꞌawaa pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi atuapi–e paitꞌee. Ma kꞌãyaara tachi pia akꞌɨpari Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo kꞌaurepa.
Irude ijãapata kꞌaurepata Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌaripapari. Maperã tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapata. Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ irua ichi kꞌĩra wãree unupiitꞌee tachimaa.
Ma awara ɨ̃raweda tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapata, mia pꞌanɨ pɨjida. Mãga pꞌanadai kꞌawa pꞌanadairã mãgá miadakꞌãri, kꞌawaa wãpata choodaitꞌee.
Mãgá choodakꞌãri, kꞌawaapata Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi pia akꞌɨpari mãikꞌaapa waapɨara ijãapata ewari cherude iru kꞌĩra wãree unudaitꞌee.
Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ma ewate irua tachi kꞌũra–e paitꞌee, ichi Jaure pëida perã tachi ome ba chemerã. Mãgɨpa tachi tꞌãride kꞌawapipari Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌinia iru bɨ.
Naaweda tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia pꞌoyaa oo amaada–e paji tachi kꞌĩradoopa. Maperã Akꞌõrepa ewari aba jɨrɨtꞌeraji Cristo piumerã kꞌachia beerã pari.
Eperã jĩpꞌaapa mãga oo–e pakꞌaji awaraa pari. ¿Kꞌaita chĩara tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa bɨ pari piukꞌajima? Piu–e pakꞌaji pia oopataarã pari pɨjida. Piukꞌajiskꞌa eperã tꞌãri pia bɨ pari.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa akꞌɨpiji ichiata tachi audú kꞌinia iru bɨ, Cristo pëikꞌãri piumerã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã pari.

Ichia mãga ooda perã tachi–itꞌee, ijãapata Cristo waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ijãapataarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe papipari ichi kꞌĩrapite. Ma awara kꞌawapata Cristo kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi miapi–e paitꞌee ichi ewari waibɨa ewate.

Naaweda tachi jida Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãkꞌa pꞌanajida, o kꞌachiade pꞌanapachida perã. Mamĩda Cristo piuda kꞌaurepa tachi pari, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi tꞌãri aukꞌa bɨji tachi tꞌãri ome. Ma awara Cristo piupꞌeda chokꞌai pꞌirabaida perã, ɨ̃rá audupɨara tachi kꞌaripapari ichi ode wãrutade, mãikꞌaapa mãgá kꞌaripapariitꞌee tachi wãrutamaa ichi truadee.
Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa tachi mãgá kꞌaripapari perã, ɨ̃rá tachi tꞌãri aukꞌa pꞌanapata Tachi Akꞌõre ome. Maperãpɨ tachi tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapata.

Adanpa oodade kꞌĩsiadáma. Chi naapema eperãpa naapɨara pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooji, oo–e pada perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaradakꞌa. Piuji ma kꞌachia ooda kꞌaurepa. Ma kꞌachia oodakꞌãriipa jõmaweda ichideepa uchiadapꞌedaarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo pꞌaneejida. Mãgá Adanpa naapɨara kꞌachia ooda kꞌaurepa, maadamãiipa eperãarã piupata.

Mãga paji Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa pꞌãpii naaweda Moisemaa. Ma ũraa pꞌãpida kꞌawada–e pꞌanapachida mĩda, eperãarãpa pariatua pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopachida Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi miapi–e paji ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa.
Jĩpꞌa piujida Adanpa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda kꞌaurepa, aukꞌa ooda–e paji mĩda irua oodakꞌa. Ɨ̃rá kꞌĩsiadáma Adanpa oodade mãikꞌaapa Cristo, chi cheitꞌee bada apatapa oodade.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã chupɨria kꞌawaada mãikꞌaapa pia ooda Cristo kꞌaurepa, Adanpa oodakꞌa bɨ–e. Adanpa ooda kꞌaurepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaweda piupata mãikꞌaapa pia–ee pꞌanapata Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Mãga pꞌanapata mĩda Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata mĩda, Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã chupɨria kꞌawaapari mãikꞌaapa ãrapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapipari. Mãgá Cristopa ooda kꞌaurepa Akꞌõrepa ma eperãarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨpari.

Ma awara Adanpa kꞌachia ooda kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã pia akꞌɨ–e paji mãikꞌaapa ma kꞌaurepa ãra atuapiitꞌee paji. Jõdee Cristopa pia ooda kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa na eujãdepemaarã pia akꞌɨpari irude ijãadakꞌãri.

Ma etꞌewa jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Adanpa ooda kꞌaurepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã piupata. Mamĩda ma kꞌãyaara Jesucristopa ooda pipɨara bɨ. Ma kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã kꞌaripapari, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe ichita pꞌanapataadamerã iru truade, ãrapa irude ijãapata perã.
Ichiaba Adanpa kꞌachia ooda kꞌaurepa, jõmaweda atuadaitꞌee paji. Jõdee Jesucristopa pia ooda kꞌaurepa jõmaweda pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanadai Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa iru truadee wãdai.

Mãpa jaradai eperã abaapa oo–e pada perã Akꞌõrepa jaradakꞌa, eperãarã chokꞌaraarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo pꞌaneejida. Jõdee chi apemapa ooda perã Akꞌõrepa jaradakꞌa, eperãarã chokꞌara pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa Moisemaa pꞌãpiji akꞌɨpiitꞌee eperãarãmaa ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata. Ma ũraa kꞌawaadakꞌãri, audupɨara kꞌachia oopachida. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgee eperãarã audú kꞌinia iru bada perã, ãchi ma o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji.

Waide Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgá kꞌaripa–e bakꞌãri, tachi eperãarã piudapꞌeda, atuapachida tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã kꞌaripakꞌãri Jesucristo kꞌaurepa, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌaneejida iru kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa iru ode pꞌaneejida. Ma ode pꞌanadakꞌãri, tachi kꞌapꞌɨa piuruta pɨjida, Akꞌõre truade pꞌananadaitꞌee.
Parãdepemapa iidii: “Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristode ijãapataarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨ bɨ pɨrã, ¿pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia waapɨara oodaipia bɨ–ekꞌã, mãgá Akꞌõrepa waapɨara tachi pia akꞌɨmerã?”
¡Mãga–e! Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa piu pɨkꞌaji. Mãga bɨta, ¿sãga waapɨara pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oodaima?

¿Kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã? Jesucristode ijãadakꞌãri, poro choopijida akꞌɨpidaitꞌee iru ome araa pꞌanɨ. Mãgá araa pꞌanadairã iru ome, iru piukꞌãri tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapiitꞌee, tachi jida aukꞌa piu pɨkꞌajida.

Ma awara tachi ijãapataarãpa poro choopidakꞌãri mãgá akꞌɨpidaitꞌee tachi piu pɨkꞌadapꞌedaa Cristo ome, jaradai tachi aukꞌa ɨa pɨkꞌajida iru ome. Ichiaba jaradai Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨapa tachi aukꞌa pꞌirabai pɨkꞌapiji iru pꞌirabaipidakꞌa, mãgá awara pꞌanapataadamerã irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Cristo ome araa pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa, tachi aukꞌa piu pɨkꞌajida pɨrã iru ome, mãgara aukꞌa pꞌirabaidaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa iru ome pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanapataadaitꞌee, irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Cristode ijãadai naaweda pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa pꞌanapachida. Mamĩda ijãadakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa araa pꞌaneedakꞌãri iru ome, ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa kurusode piu pɨkꞌaji iru kꞌapꞌɨa ome. Mãgá uchiajida ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa jua ekꞌariipa, waa tachimaa kꞌachia oopinaamerã.

Tachi eperã kꞌapꞌɨa piukꞌãri, ne–inaa waa tachimaa oopi–e pai, pia wa kꞌachia. Mãga pɨkꞌa tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa piu pɨkꞌakꞌãri Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa ome, ne–inaa kꞌachia waa tachimaa oopi–e pai.
Tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa mãgá piu pɨkꞌada perã Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa ome, ijãa pꞌanɨ Cristopa tachi kꞌaripaitꞌee pꞌanapataadamerã irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, aukꞌa pꞌirabai pɨkꞌadapꞌedaa perã iru ome.
Tachi ijãapataarãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Cristo piupꞌeda chokꞌai pꞌirabaida perã, waa piu–e paitꞌee.
Piuda apai piuji pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jõmaweda wẽpapiitꞌee. Ma piudakꞌãriipa ichita chokꞌai bapari ooitꞌee Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Parã ichiaba mãgá pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ, parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa piu pɨkꞌada perã Jesucristo kꞌapꞌɨa ome. Mapa ichita iididaipia bɨ Jesucristomaa, irua parã kꞌaripamerã oodaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mãgá ne–inaa kꞌachia oo amaadaipɨ.
Oonáatɨ ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa parãmaa. Mãgɨ́ kꞌaurepa ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopata. Mamĩda ma kꞌapꞌɨa jõitꞌeepɨ.

Ne–inaa kꞌachia oopináatɨ pãchi juamaa, bɨɨrɨmaa, itꞌaimaa, taumaa. Jĩpꞌa pãchi kꞌapꞌɨa bɨ́tɨ Tachi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari, irua ne–inaa pia oopimerã ma kꞌapꞌɨamaa. Pꞌanapatáatɨ kꞌapꞌɨa chiwidi iru pꞌanɨkꞌa, parã aukꞌa pꞌirabai pɨkꞌadapꞌedaa perã Cristo ome, iru kꞌapꞌɨa chiwidi pꞌirabaikꞌãri.

Mãga ooruta pɨrã, waa pꞌana kꞌiniada–e paitꞌee pãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa jua ekꞌari. Cristopa parã uchiapidakꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãda jua ekꞌariipa, aukꞌa uchiapii ma kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa jua ekꞌariipa. Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã kꞌaripa kꞌinia bɨ, parã kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Parãdepemapa jarai: “Mãgara, Cristopa ooda kꞌaurepa ɨtꞌaa wãdaitꞌee pɨrã, oonaadáma Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Oodáma tachia oo kꞌiniata.” ¡Mãga–e!

¿Kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã esclavopa oopari chiparipa oopi bɨkꞌa? Ne–inaa kꞌachia oopiru pɨrã, kꞌachia oopari mãikꞌaapa kꞌachiade baaipari. Mãga pɨkꞌa bɨ parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa jua ekꞌari pꞌanadakꞌãri. Jõdee ma esclavo chiparipa chi esclavomaa ne–inaa pia oopiru pɨrã, pia oopari mãikꞌaapa chiparipa kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨpari. Mãga pɨkꞌa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari pꞌanadakꞌãri. Pɨ ¿kꞌai esclavoma; pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa esclavo wa Tachi Akꞌõre esclavo?

Mɨa gracias jarapari Tachi Akꞌõremaa, ɨ̃rá irua oopiparikꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌanadairã pãchi tꞌãripa. Mãga oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa pedee pia jara pëida Cristode ũridapꞌedaa perã iru mimiapataarã itꞌaideepa mãikꞌaapa irude ijãadapꞌedaa perã.
Mãgá uchiajida ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa jua ekꞌariipa mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari pꞌaneejida.

(Nãgɨ́ jarateerude mɨa “esclavo” jara bɨ parãpa pipɨara kꞌawaadamerã kꞌãata mɨa jara kꞌinia bɨ.) Naaweda pãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa jua ekꞌari esclavoorãkꞌa pꞌanapachida. Mamĩda ɨ̃rá pãchi kꞌapꞌɨamaa oopidaipia bɨ ne–inaa pia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌiniata, ma–itꞌee Akꞌõrepa parã awara bɨda perã.

Parã atꞌãri pãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa jua ekꞌari esclavoorãkꞌa pꞌanadakꞌãri, ũridaamaa pꞌanapachida Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bada parãmaa. Jĩpꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌanapachida kꞌachia beerãpa oopatakꞌa.

¿Kꞌãare piata atajidama mãga pꞌanadapꞌedaa pari? Mãga pꞌanadapꞌedaa paara pãchi piurutamaa, atuakꞌajida kꞌachia beerã atuapatakꞌa. Ma awara ɨ̃rá ijãapata perã, kꞌĩra nejasia pꞌanɨ kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri ma kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaade.

Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã ichideerã papiji mãikꞌaapa parã uchia ataji ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌariipa, waa esclavoorãkꞌa pꞌananaadamerã. Ichia parã mãgá awara bɨda perã, ichia kꞌinia bɨkꞌa pꞌanapataadai mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa wãdai pãchi jai–idaadakꞌãri.
Wãara pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã piudakꞌãri, atuadaitꞌee. Mamĩda Cristode ijãapataarã ɨtꞌaa wãdaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo ome, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga kꞌinia bairã.
Ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Moisemaa ũraa pꞌãpida. Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachi ma ũraa jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata chokꞌai pꞌanɨ misa.

Kꞌĩsiadáma nãgɨde. Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraade jara bɨ wẽrapa awaraa ɨmɨkꞌĩra jɨrɨikꞌaraa bɨ, ichi ɨmɨkꞌĩra chokꞌai bɨ misa. Mamĩda chi ɨmɨkꞌĩra jai–idaakꞌãri, chi wẽra uchiai mãgɨ́ ũraa jara bɨ jua ekꞌariipa. Awaraa ɨmɨkꞌĩra atai.

Pia jaraitꞌeera, chi ɨmɨkꞌĩra chokꞌai bɨde, araa beeru pɨrã awaraa ɨmɨkꞌĩra ome, pꞌekꞌau oo bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Mamĩda chi kꞌima jai–idaapꞌeda, awaraa ome araa paru pɨrã, pꞌekꞌau oo–e bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.

Mãga pɨkꞌa bɨ parã ome, mɨchi ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa. Parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa kurusode piu pɨkꞌakꞌãri Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa ome, Moisepa pꞌãda ũraa jara bɨdeepa uchiajida. Parãpa Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, araa pꞌaneejida iru ome, ichideerã pꞌaneedamerã mãikꞌaapa oodamerã irua oopi bɨkꞌa.

Araa pꞌanadai naaweda Cristo ome, ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopipachi tachimaa, oo kꞌinia bada perã Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ eperãarãpa oonaadamerã. Mãga oopida perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi atuapiitꞌee paji.

Mamĩda Cristode ijãadakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa piu pɨkꞌakꞌãri Cristo ome, tachi uchiajida ma ũraa jara bɨ jua ekꞌariipa oodaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Naaweda ma ũraa tachi chipari pɨkꞌa baji. Mamĩda Cristo ome araa pꞌaneedakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure tachi chipari beeji pꞌanapataadamerã Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure tachi chipari beeji pɨrã, ¿jaradaikꞌã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ũraa pꞌãpida kꞌachia bɨ? ¡Mãga–e! Ma ũraa wẽ–e pada paara, mɨa kꞌawa–e pakꞌaji kꞌãare netꞌaata kꞌachia bɨ Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Ma ũraade jara–e pada paara:
‘Chĩara netꞌaa kꞌɨ̃anáaji’,
mɨa kꞌĩsia–e pakꞌaji chĩara netꞌaa kꞌɨ̃aitꞌee.

Mamĩda tachia Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãda iru pꞌanɨ. Maperã mɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa waapɨara mɨmaa chĩara netꞌaa kꞌɨ̃apipari, mãgɨpa oopi kꞌinia bairã ma ũraade jara bɨ eperãarãpa oonaadamerã. Ma ũraa wẽ–e pada paara, ¿sãga oopikꞌajima ma ũraade jara bɨ oonaadamerã? ¡Maarepida oopi–e pakꞌaji!
Mɨa ma ũraade jara bɨ waide kꞌawa–e bakꞌãri, kꞌĩsia pꞌua wẽe bapachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Mamĩda ma ũraa kꞌawaadakꞌãriipa kꞌĩsia pꞌua beeji, kꞌawada perã chĩara netꞌaa kꞌɨ̃a bɨ kꞌaurepa mɨ atuaitꞌee.
Akꞌõrepa ma ũraa pꞌãpiji akꞌɨpiitꞌee sãga iru ode tꞌĩudai. Mamĩda mɨa ma ũraa ooikꞌaraa bɨda adade ookꞌãri, iru ode tꞌĩu kꞌãyaara, o kꞌachiade tꞌĩuji.
Mɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa mɨ kꞌũratꞌaaji. Oopii kꞌãyaara Akꞌõrepa Ũraa pꞌãpidade jara bɨkꞌa, oopiji ma ũraade jara bɨ oonaadamerã, mãgá mɨ atuapiitꞌee.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa Moisemaa ũraa pꞌãpida pia bɨ, ichia ũraa jarada chaa. Mɨa mãga jara bɨ ma ũraa uchiada perã Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌãri pia bɨdeepa. Iru kꞌachia wẽe bapari. Mapa ma ũraa kꞌaurepa Akꞌõrepa akꞌɨi eperãarãpa oopata kꞌawaaitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia.

Mãga pɨrã, ¿jaraikꞌã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa kꞌaurepa mɨ atua baji? ¡Mãga–e! Mɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa mɨ atuapiji oopikꞌãri Akꞌõre Ũraa pia jara bɨ eperãarãpa oonaadamerã. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru baji ichi ũraa kꞌaurepa mɨa kꞌawaamerã wãara mɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa audú kꞌachia bɨ.

Tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Akꞌõre Ũraa jõmaweda uchiaji ichi Jauredeepa. Mamĩda mɨa pꞌoyaa oo–e ma ũraade jara bɨkꞌa, mɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa mɨ chiparikꞌa bairã. Mãgɨpa mɨmaa ichita kꞌachia oopipari.
Kꞌawa–e sãgapꞌeda oopari mãgɨpa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mɨa oo–e wãara mɨchi tꞌãripa oo kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Ma kꞌãyaara oopari ne–inaa mɨa ooamaa bɨ.
Mãga ookꞌãri, akꞌɨpi bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraade wãarata jara bɨ.
Oo kꞌinia bɨ Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda mɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa ne–inaa kꞌachia mɨmaa oopipari.
Kꞌawa bɨ na pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨade pia wẽ–e, mɨchi kꞌĩradoopa pia pꞌoyaa oo–e bairã, mãga oo kꞌinia bɨ mĩda.
Oo–e ne–inaa pia, mɨa oo kꞌinia bɨ. Jĩpꞌa oopari ne–inaa kꞌachia, mɨa oo kꞌinia–e bɨ.
Mãga oopari perã, kꞌawa bɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa mɨmaa mãga oopipari.
Ne–inaa pia oo kꞌinia bakꞌãri Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa mãga oopi kꞌinia–e.
Mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa kꞌawa bairã. Tꞌãripa oo kꞌinia bapari made jara bɨkꞌa.
Mamĩda mɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa presokꞌa bɨ. Mãgɨ́ chõo pɨkꞌa bɨ mɨchi tꞌãri ome, atꞌãri mɨ chipari ba kꞌinia bairã.
¿Sãgapɨ ooima? ¡Mɨ chupɨria chɨ! ¿Kꞌaipa mɨ kꞌaripa ataima na pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa jua ekꞌariipa? Mãgɨpa mɨ waya o kꞌachiade tꞌĩupi kꞌinia bɨ.

¡Mamĩda mɨa gracias jarapari Tachi Akꞌõremaa, Tachi Waibɨa, Jesucristopata, mɨ kꞌaripa atada perã mɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa jua ekꞌariipa! Mɨchi tꞌãripa oo kꞌinia bɨ Akꞌõre ũraade jara bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda mɨ kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa atꞌãri kꞌachia oopi kꞌinia bɨ.
Ma jõma jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesucristo ome araa pꞌanɨɨrã atuapi–e paitꞌee.
Cristode wãara ijãadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure ba chepari tachi ome. Iruata tachi uchiapipari tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa jua ekꞌariipa, ma kꞌaurepa atuanaadamerã.

Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa Moisemaa pꞌãpidapa eperãarã pꞌoyaa kꞌaripa ata–e paji, eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa ooda–e pꞌanadairã ma ũraade jara bɨkꞌa, ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨ misa. Mapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Warra pëiji eperã jĩpꞌaakꞌa bapariimerã mãikꞌaapa piumerã tachi pari, tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata jõmaweda wẽpapiitꞌee. Mãgapɨ Cristopa tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa pꞌoyaaji.
Mãga ooji tachi ijãapataarã pꞌanapataadamerã Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Mãgá pꞌanadai oodakꞌãri Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa, tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopii kꞌãyaara.

Chi oo kꞌinia pꞌanapataarãpa ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa, mãga oopata jɨrɨpata perã ãchia oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ aupai. Mamĩda chi oo kꞌinia pꞌanapataarãpa Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa, mãga oopata jɨrɨpata perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨ.

Ma awara chi oo kꞌinia pꞌanapataarãpa ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa o kꞌachia jɨrɨpata. Mãgá atuadaitꞌee. Mamĩda chi oo kꞌinia pꞌanapataarãpa Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa, kꞌãiwee pꞌanapata Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, iru ode pꞌanadairã mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa wãdaitꞌee perã.

Mãgee oo kꞌinia pꞌanapataarãpa ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapata. Mapa oo kꞌiniadakꞌaa iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Wãara mãgá pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa, Akꞌõre Jaure wẽe pꞌanadairã.
Ma awara ne–inaa wẽ–e mãgee eperãarãpa oodai Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pia akꞌɨmerã.
Jõdee Akꞌõre Jaure pãchi tꞌãride baparida a pꞌanɨ. Mãga pɨrã, parãpa oo kꞌinia pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ iru Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Cristo Jaure wẽe beerã Cristodeerã–e.

Mamĩda Cristo pãchi tꞌãride bapari pɨrã, parã jaure ichita chokꞌai bapariitꞌee. Maperã parã kꞌapꞌɨa piudaruta pɨjida pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa, Cristo kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨpari.

Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure pãchi tꞌãride bapari pɨrã, parã jai–idaadakꞌãri, irua parã kꞌapꞌɨa chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiitꞌee ichita pꞌanapataadamerã. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga ooda perã Cristo ome, iru piupꞌeda pꞌirabaipikꞌãri.

Mãpai ɨ̃pemaarã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi Cristode ijãapataarã mãgá kꞌaripapari perã ichi Jaure kꞌapꞌɨa, pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ iru Jaurepa pꞌanapi bɨkꞌa. Ɨ̃rá tachi ijãapataarã Cristo jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata. Mãga bɨta ¿sãga oodaima tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa?

Parã pꞌanaruta pɨrã mãgɨ́ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa pꞌanapi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, atuadaitꞌee. Mamĩda mãgɨpa oopi bɨkꞌa oo amaaruta pɨrã mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõre Jauremaa oopiruta pɨrã irua oopi bɨkꞌa, parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa pꞌoyaadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõre truade pꞌananadaitꞌee.
Jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa pꞌanapi bɨkꞌa pꞌanapataarã Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã.

Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Jaure pëi–e paji parã pꞌera pꞌanapataadamerã esclavoorãkꞌa, irua parã miapii jĩakꞌaapa. Jĩpꞌa pëiji ichi warrarã padamerã. Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dakꞌãri, jarapata: “
Mãga jaradai Akꞌõre Jaurepa tachi tꞌãrimaa kꞌawapipari perã wãara Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã.

Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã pꞌanadairã, iru pꞌanadaitꞌee jõmaweda irua kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ichideerã–itꞌee ɨtꞌari pꞌananadakꞌãri. Ne–inaa iru pꞌanadaitꞌee iru Warra Cristopa iru bɨkꞌa. Iru na eujãde bɨ misa, ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa iru jɨrɨpachida miapidaitꞌee. Mãgá tachi aukꞌa jɨrɨpata. Mapa ɨtꞌari panadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi Cristokꞌa papiitꞌee, aukꞌa iru kꞌĩra wãreede pꞌanapataadamerã.
Mɨchi tꞌãride mɨa nãga kꞌawa bɨ. Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa, tachi makꞌɨara miada–e pꞌanɨ kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachimaa unupiitꞌee ichi kꞌĩra wãree eujãde.
Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde mãgá mia jõnɨ jida, o–ĩa nɨ pꞌanɨ iru ewari waibɨa ewate. Jõma ne–inaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda jida nɨmaa bɨ irua akꞌɨpimerã ichi warrarã Cristo cheru ewaride.
Chi naapema eperãpa oo–e pakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaradakꞌa, kꞌachiade baaiji. Maperã Akꞌõrepa ichia ooda jõmaweda aukꞌa kꞌachiade baaipiji, ma ne–inaa Akꞌõrepa ooda mãga kꞌinia–e baji mĩda.

Mamĩda ɨ̃rá ma ooda jõmaweda nɨmaa bɨ ma ewari cherude ma kꞌachia baaidadeepa aukꞌa uchiaitꞌee perã Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã ome. Iru warrarã waa piuda–e paitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree eujãde pꞌananadaitꞌee.
Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda jõmaweda atꞌãri mia nɨ̃bɨ, wẽra mia nɨ̃baparikꞌa ichi warra ewaa tꞌoitꞌee pakꞌãri.

Tachi ijãapataarã jida mia chitoonɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa, ne–inaa pipɨara bɨ iru pꞌanɨ mĩda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨdepema teeitꞌee Cristode ijãapataarãmaa. Mãgɨ́ iru Jaure. Mãgá iru Jaure tachi ome iru pꞌanɨ mĩda, tachi tꞌãride kꞌĩsia paraa pꞌanapata na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa. Aukꞌa o–ĩa nɨpata Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌapꞌɨa chiwidi pꞌirabaipimerã mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌari tachi ichi warrarãkꞌa pꞌanapimerã.

Ichia tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atadakꞌãriipa, kꞌawajida ewari cherude wãara mãgá kꞌapꞌɨa chiwidide pꞌanapataadaitꞌee iru kꞌĩra wãree truade. Ma kꞌapꞌɨa chiwidi iru pꞌanadapꞌedaa paara, nɨda–e pakꞌajida kꞌapꞌɨa chiwidi iru pꞌanadaitꞌee.
Mamĩda wãara ijãa pꞌanɨ pɨrã ma kꞌapꞌɨa chiwidi iru pꞌanadaitꞌee, waide unuda–e pꞌanɨ mĩda, choodaitꞌee tachia nɨ pꞌanɨde.

Mãgá choodai Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa tachi kꞌaripapari perã, audú kꞌĩsia paraa pꞌanadakꞌãri maa–e pɨrã tachi tꞌãride juatau wẽe pɨkꞌa pꞌanadakꞌãri. Mãga pꞌanɨde tachi kꞌĩradoopa pꞌoyaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃da–e pakꞌãri Akꞌõremaa, iru Jaurepa enenee nɨ̃bɨ tachi pari ĩyapaa bɨdepai, pedee wẽe.
Mãpai Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi ijãapataarã tꞌãride iru bɨ kꞌawapari perã, ũripari ichi Jaurepa jara kꞌinia bɨ tachi kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Ichi Jaurepa ichita iidipari irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Mapa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa pia uchiapiitꞌee jõmaweda ne–inaa pꞌasaru ichi kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨɨrãmaa. Mãga ooitꞌee ichiata mãɨrã jɨrɨda perã Cristode ijãadamerã.

Eperãarã ooi naaweda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawaji mãɨrãpa iru kꞌinia iru pꞌanadaitꞌee. Mapa kꞌĩsia iru baji mãɨrã ichi warra jĩakꞌa papiitꞌee. Cristo chi Warra naapema paji. Maapꞌeda irude ijãapataarã iru ɨ̃pemaarãkꞌa pꞌaneejida.

Pia jaraitꞌeera, naaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawaji eperãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa iru kꞌinia iru pꞌanadaitꞌee. Mapa mãɨrã jɨrɨpari Cristode ijãadamerã. Mãpai, ijãadakꞌãri, irua ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨpari ichi warra Cristo akꞌɨparikꞌa. Maperãpɨ ãra pꞌanapiitꞌee ichi trua kꞌĩra wãree bɨde.
Kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooparide tachi ijãapataarã kꞌaripaitꞌee, ¿kꞌãata waa jaradaima? Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi mãgá kꞌaripapari pɨrã, ¿kꞌaipa tachi kꞌachia ooima?
Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãakꞌa–e paji pɨrã ichi Warra piupikꞌãri tachi pari, audupɨara wãakꞌa–e paitꞌee ne–inaa awaraa ichia jara bɨ teeitꞌee tachi Cristode ijãapataarãmaa.
¿Kꞌaipa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã ɨmɨateeima, irua ãra pia–ee akꞌɨmerã? Tachi Akꞌõrépata tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨpari Cristopa ooda kꞌaurepa.

Mãga–e pɨrã, ¿kꞌaipa Cristode ijãapataarã atuapiima? Jesucristo piuji mãikꞌaapa chokꞌai pꞌirabaiji tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataitꞌee. Maapꞌeda ɨtꞌari Tachi Akꞌõre juaraare banaji chupɨria iidiitꞌee Akꞌõremaa tachi pari.

Mãga–e pɨrã, ¿kꞌaipa tachi ãyaa ataima Cristo juadeepa, irua tachi kꞌinia–ee iru bamerã? Mãgá ãyaa wãda–e pai nepɨrade baairuta pɨjida maa–e pɨrã audú kꞌĩsia jõnɨ pɨjida maa–e pɨrã awaraarãpa tachi kꞌachia ooruta pɨjida Cristode ijãapata perã maa–e pɨrã jarrapisia jõnɨ pɨjida maa–e pɨrã pꞌaru wẽe pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa chupɨria chitoonɨ pɨjida maa–e pɨrã awaraarãpa tachi jɨrɨruta pɨjida miapidaitꞌee wa peedaitꞌee. ¡Ne–inaa apidaapa tachi ãyaa wãpida–e Cristo juadeepa!
Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:

‘Akꞌõre, taipa pɨ kꞌinia iru pꞌanapata perã, kꞌachia beerãpa tai ipꞌii jɨrɨpata peedaitꞌee. Oveja peepataarãpa oveja iru pꞌanapatakꞌa ateedakꞌãri peedaitꞌee, mãga pɨkꞌa mãgee kꞌachia beerãpa tai iru pꞌanɨ.’
Kꞌachia beerãpa tachi ijãapataarã atꞌãri mãgá iru pꞌanɨ mĩda, tachia ne–inaa jõmaade ãchi pꞌoyaapata, tachi kꞌinia iru baparipa kꞌaripapari perã.

Cristopa tachi mãgá kꞌinia iru bapari perã, mɨchi tꞌãripa mɨa nãga ijãa bɨ. Ãyaa wãda–e iru juadeepa piuruta pɨjida maa–e pɨrã mia jõnɨ pɨjida na eujãde pꞌanɨ misa. Cristo juadeepa tachi ãyaa wãpida–e pai angeleerãpa, netuaraarãpa, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã waibɨarãpa pida. Apidaapa mãgá wãpida–e pai ne–inaa ɨ̃rapema wa tꞌẽepema ewari cherude.

Ɨtꞌɨpɨara wãruta pɨjida pajãde maa–e pɨrã edupɨara wãruta pɨjida eujã ekꞌari maa–e pɨrã tꞌɨmɨpɨara wãruta pɨjida na pꞌekꞌau eujãde, ãyaa wãda–e pai iru juadeepa. Mɨa mãga jara bɨ wẽ–e perã ne–inaa tachi ãyaa wãpiitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre juadeepa Tachi Waibɨa, Jesucristopa, tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Mɨ Cristode ijãadakꞌãriipa, araa bɨ iru ome. Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa kꞌawapipari mɨa wãarata jararu. Ma awara mɨchi tꞌãripa ichiaba kꞌawa bɨ seewa jara–e nãga jarakꞌãri.
Mɨ audú tꞌãri pꞌua nɨ̃bɨ mɨchi aukꞌaarã, judiorãpa Cristode ijãadakꞌaa perã.
Piara bakꞌaji Cristopa mɨ yiaraa iru bada paara, mɨchi aukꞌaarã atuadai kꞌãyaara.

Ãra Israeldeepa uchiajida. Chonaarãweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra jɨrɨtꞌeraji ichideerã pꞌaneedamerã. Mãgá ichi warrarãkꞌa pꞌaneejida. Iru bapachi ãra chonaarã tꞌãide. Mãga nɨde iru kꞌĩra wãree unujida. Ãra chonaarãmaa jaraji ichia ooitꞌee Abrahamdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Ichi ũraa pꞌãpiji ãra chonaarãmaa mãikꞌaapa mãɨrãdepema ũkꞌuru awara bɨji mimiadamerã ichi–itꞌee. Jaraji ãra chonaarãmaa sãga ɨtꞌaa iidipataadaipia bɨ. Ãra chonaarãmaa jarada chokꞌara jaraji ãra pia akꞌɨ bapariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa eperã pëiitꞌee ãra kꞌaripade.

Ãra uchiajida tai chonaarã Abrahamdeepa, Isaacdeepa, Jacobdeepa. Maapꞌeda Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨa Jesucristo, chi ne–inaa jõmaweda akꞌɨpari tꞌokꞌãri eperã kꞌapꞌɨade, ãchi aukꞌaa paji, ichiaba ma chonaarãdeepa uchiada perã. ¡Maperã ichita gracias jaradáma irumaa! ¡Amén!
Mãgara ¿kꞌãata jaraima? ¿Tachi Akꞌõrepa oo–e pajikꞌã ichia ooitꞌeeda adakꞌa Israel pidaarã ome? ¡Mãga ooji! Mamĩda ichi–itꞌee jõmaweda Israeldeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã wãara Israel pidaarã–e.
Ichiaba ichi–itꞌee jõmaweda Abrahamdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã wãara Abraham warrarã–e. Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Mɨa Isaacdeepa uchiadaitꞌeerã pia akꞌɨitꞌee, pɨ mɨde ijãapari perã.’

Akꞌõrepa mãga jarada perã, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ iru–itꞌee Isaacdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã aupai Abraham warrarã, Abrahampa awaraa warrarã ooji mĩda. Tachi Akꞌõrepa Isaacdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã mãga akꞌɨpachi, ãra uchiadapꞌedaa perã irua Abrahammaa jarada kꞌaurepa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgaji Abrahammaa:
‘Añomaa mɨ waya cheitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Sarapa warra tꞌoitꞌee.’
Ma awara aɨ tꞌẽepai tai judiorã chonaa Isaacpa me–iso ooji chi wẽra Rebeca ome.

Mamĩda ma me–iso tꞌodai naaweda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru baji aba jɨrɨtꞌeraitꞌee mãikꞌaapa waibɨara papiitꞌee chi apema kꞌãyaara. Akꞌõrepa mãga ooji ma warrarãpa waide ne–inaa pia wa kꞌachia ooda–e pꞌanajida mĩda. Mãga ookꞌãri, kꞌawapiji ichiata eperã jɨrɨtꞌerapari oomerã ichia oopi bɨkꞌa.
Jɨrɨtꞌera–e ma eperãpa ne–inaa pia oopari perã. Jĩpꞌa jɨrɨtꞌerapari ichia kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Akꞌõrepa Rebecamaa nãga jarada perã:
‘Chi naapema chi tꞌẽepema jua ekꞌari baitꞌee.’
Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa pꞌãdapꞌedaade ichiaba jara bɨ:
‘Jacob jɨrɨtꞌeraji. Jõdee Esaú unuamaa iru baji.’
Mãgara ¿kꞌãata jaradaima? ¿Tachi Akꞌõrepa pia oo–e bɨkꞌã, aba pipɨara akꞌɨpari perã chi apema kꞌãyaara? ¡Mãga–e!
Mɨa mãga jara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Moisemaa nãga jarada perã:
‘Mɨa chupɨria kꞌawaaitꞌee mɨa chupɨria kꞌawaa kꞌinia bɨɨrã. Pia akꞌɨitꞌee mɨa pia akꞌɨ kꞌinia bɨɨrã.’

Mãga jarada perã, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã jɨrɨtꞌerapari kꞌaripaitꞌee, ichia ãchi chupɨria kꞌawaa kꞌinia bairã. Jɨrɨtꞌera–e ãchia mãga kꞌinia pꞌanadairã maa–e pɨrã ne–inaa pia wa kꞌachia oo pꞌanadairã.
Ichiaba Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa pꞌãdade jaraji Egiptodepemaarã poro waibɨa Faraonmaa:

‘Mɨa pɨ rey papiji mãikꞌaapa pɨ kꞌĩrapite ooji ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa. Mãga ooji mɨa pɨ nepɨrade baaipida kꞌaurepa, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa kꞌawaadamerã Mɨta, jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa.’
Mãga jarada perã, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa chupɨria kꞌawaapari ichia chupɨria kꞌawaa kꞌinia bɨɨrã mãikꞌaapa kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisuapipari ichia mãgá oopi kꞌinia bɨɨrãmaa.
Mamĩda parãdepemapa mɨmaa iidii: “Mãga pɨrã, ¿sãgapꞌeda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua pꞌanɨɨrã miapiitꞌeema? ¿Iru kꞌaurepa mãgá pꞌanapata–ekꞌã?”
Mɨa ma iidida nãga pꞌanautꞌee. Pɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema. Mãga bɨta, ¿Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa oopari iidiipia bɨkꞌã?
‘Ma awara pɨ, Akꞌõrepa ooda, iidiipia bɨkꞌã: “¿Sãapꞌeda mɨ nãgá oojima?” ’

Kꞌĩsíaji nãgɨde. Chokꞌo kꞌaparipa ichi yooro pꞌe iru bɨdee chokꞌo kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌapari, ichia kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Ma yoorodee kꞌai chokꞌo pi–ia fiestadee ateeitꞌee mãikꞌaapa aɨ yoorodee kꞌai chokꞌo jĩpꞌaa teeda iru baitꞌee.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga pɨkꞌa oopari na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã ome. Ichia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ mĩda pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa pꞌanɨɨrã jõpiitꞌee, choopari ãra ome ichi ewari waibɨa ewate paru misa. Mãgá choo kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã, ¿kꞌãata jaradaima?

Mãgá chooru pɨrã kꞌĩsia iru bada perã eperãarãmaa ichi kꞌĩra wãree unupiitꞌee, ¿kꞌãata jaradaima? Irua mãga ooji tachi chupɨria kꞌawaakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa tachi kꞌapꞌɨa ichi kꞌĩra wãree unupikꞌãri awaraarãmaa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachita jɨrɨji judiorã tꞌãideepa mãikꞌaapa judio–eerã tꞌãideepa, tachi jõmaweda aukꞌa Cristode ijãadamerã.
Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Akꞌõrepa mãga kꞌĩsia iru baji, iru pedee jarapari Oseamaa jarapida perã:
‘Mɨchi eperãarã–ee pꞌanadapꞌedaarã tꞌɨ̃jaradaitꞌee “mɨchi eperãarã” mãikꞌaapa eperãarã mɨa kꞌinia–e badaarã tꞌɨ̃jaradaitꞌee “eperãarã mɨa kꞌinia iru bɨɨrã”.’
Awara ãi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade Oseapa ichiaba jaraji:
‘Mɨa eperãarãmaa jara badamãi: “parã mɨchi pꞌuuru pidaarã–e”, mãgɨɨrãmãi ãchideepa uchiadapꞌedaarãmaa “Akꞌõre ichita chokꞌai bapari warrarãda” adaitꞌee.’
Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapari Isaíapa jaraji:
‘Israel pidaarã ipu tau nãusaakꞌa pꞌusa ide chokꞌara pꞌanɨ mĩda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra chokꞌara–ee uchiapiitꞌee kꞌachia beerã juadeepa.
Taarã–e nɨde Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã chokꞌara jõpiitꞌee.’
Mamĩda aɨ naaweda Isaíapa ichiaba jara baji:
‘Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨapa tachi warrarã chokꞌara–ee pꞌanɨɨrã kꞌaripa–e pada paara, kꞌiniikꞌajida Sodoma pidaarãkꞌa mãikꞌaapa Gomorra pidaarãkꞌa.’

Tachia ¿kꞌãata kꞌawaadaima kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri Akꞌõrepa mãga oodade Israel pidaarã ome? Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ judio–eerãpa Tachi Akꞌõre jɨrɨda–e pꞌanajida. Mamĩda ɨ̃rá pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanapata Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, Cristode ijãapata perã.
Jõdee Israel pidaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõre jɨrɨ pꞌanajida mãikꞌaapa oo kꞌinia pꞌanajida iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa, irua ãchi pia akꞌɨmerã. Mamĩda pꞌoyaa ooda–e paji jõmaweda ma ũraade jara bɨkꞌa.

¿Sãgapꞌeda mãga pꞌanajida? Cristode ijãa pꞌaneedai kꞌãyaara Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pia akꞌɨmerã, Akꞌõre Ũraa Moisemaa pꞌãpidakꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌanapachida. Mamĩda Akꞌõrepa Cristo pëiji ichi o akꞌɨpimerã. Mapa irude ijãa kꞌiniada–e pakꞌãri, ma o atuajida.
Oojida Akꞌõrepa jaradakꞌa chonaarãweda ichi ũraa pꞌãdade:
‘Judiorã tꞌãide Sión pꞌuurude
Ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, tꞌãripa mɨa kꞌinia bɨ judiorãpa Cristode ijãadamerã. Ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pari Tachi Akꞌõremaa ãra chupɨria kꞌawaamerã, mãgá o kꞌachiadeepa uchiadamerã.
Mɨchi taupa unu bɨ ãrapa Akꞌõre netꞌaa kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda wãara iru kꞌawadakꞌaa.
Kꞌawa kꞌiniadakꞌaa Akꞌõrepa Cristode ijãapataarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe beepipari. Kꞌĩsiapata ne–inaa pia oo pꞌanɨpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pia akꞌɨitꞌee. Maperã Cristode ijãa kꞌiniada–e.
Mamĩda Cristopata ichideerã uchiapipari Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ jua ekꞌariipa, oopataadamerã irua jara bɨkꞌa. Maperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristode ijãapataarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨpari.
Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Eperãpa ookꞌãri jõmaweda Akꞌõre Ũraade jara bɨkꞌa, ichita bapariitꞌee ma ũraade jara bɨkꞌa.’
Mamĩda pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe beerã Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa, mãgɨɨrãpa aukꞌa jaradai Moisepa jaradakꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaarãmaa:
‘Kꞌĩsianáatɨ pãchi tꞌãridepai: “¿Kꞌaita wãima Akꞌõre eujãdee irua kꞌinia bɨ kꞌawaade?” ’
(pia jaraitꞌeera, Cristo chemerã Akꞌõre eujãdeepa.)
Maa–e pɨrã:
‘ “¿Kꞌaita piudapꞌedaarãmaa wãima Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨ kꞌawaade?” ’
(pia jaraitꞌeera, Cristo chemerã iru ɨadapꞌedaamãiipa.)
Mãga kꞌĩsiadai kꞌãyaara, jaradaipia bɨ Akꞌõre Ũraade jara bɨkꞌa:
‘Nãgaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida kꞌawa pꞌanɨ, mãgɨ́ pãchi itꞌaideepa jarapata perã mãikꞌaapa pãchi tꞌãride kꞌawapata perã.’
Mãgɨ́ pedee Moisepa pꞌãdadepemakꞌa ichiaba taipa jarateepata jõmaarãmaa: tꞌãripa Cristode ijãapataadamerã.
Eperãpa jara bɨ pɨrã: “Jesucristo Mɨchi Waibɨa” mãikꞌaapa tꞌãripa wãara ijãa bɨ pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristo chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiji, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma eperã wãpiitꞌee ichi truadee.

Tꞌãripa Cristode wãara ijãadakꞌãri, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌaneepata Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Ma awara tachi itꞌaideepa jaradakꞌãri, “Jesucristo Mɨchi Waibɨa”, akꞌɨpipata irua tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji.
Kꞌirãpátɨ Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade ichiaba jara bɨ:
‘Eperã Cristode ijãa bɨ kꞌĩra pia–ee ba–e paitꞌee Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.’

Mãga jara bairã kꞌawa pꞌanɨ judiorã, judio–eerã ome aukꞌa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, Cristode ijãadakꞌãri. Iruta Jõmaarã Waibɨa. Aukꞌa kꞌaripapari chi chupɨria iidirutaarã ichimaa, ãchi aukꞌa kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Maperã kꞌawa pꞌanɨ na Akꞌõre Ũraa wãarata jara bɨ:
‘Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichimaa chupɨria iidirutaarã kꞌaripa ataitꞌeeda aji, atuanaadamerã.’

Mamĩda ¿sãga chupɨria iididaima, irude ijãada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã? Ichiaba ¿sãga irude ijãadaima, irua ooda ãchi–itꞌee ũrida–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã? Ma awara ¿sãga ũridaima irua ooda ãchi–itꞌee, eperãpa mãga jara–e pɨrã ãchimaa?
Mãgɨ́ eperã, ¿sãga wãima jarateede, awaraarãpa iru pëida–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã? Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Eperãarã o–ĩadaipata awaraarãpa pedee pia ãchimaa jara chedakꞌãri.’
Mamĩda jõmaarãpa ũri kꞌiniada–e pꞌanɨ, Akꞌõre pedee pia jara chedakꞌãri. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapari Isaíapa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Tachi Akꞌõre, ¿kꞌaipa ijãajima aji, taipa jarateedapꞌedaa?’
Ma jõma jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ eperãarãpa ũridakꞌãri Cristopa ooda ãchi–itꞌee, mãgapɨ irude ijãapata.
Mãga pɨrã, ¿sãgapꞌeda judiorãpa ijãada–e paji? ¿Ũrida–e pajikꞌã Cristopa ooda ãchi–itꞌee? ¡Ũrijidapɨ! Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda jarateepachida jõmaarãmaa; na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema tꞌɨmɨ́ beerãmaa paara kꞌawapijida irua ooda.’
Mãga pɨrã, waya iidiitꞌee: ¿sãgapꞌeda ijãada–e pajima? ¿Kꞌawada–e pajikꞌã ãchia ũridapꞌedaa? ¡Kꞌawajidapɨ! Naapɨara mɨa kꞌirãpapi kꞌinia bɨ Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:

‘Tachi Akꞌõrepa nãga jara bɨ ichi eperãarãmaa: Mɨa parã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapiitꞌee mɨchi eperãarã–eerãmaa, ãra mɨde ijãa kꞌinia pꞌanadairã. Ma awara parã kꞌĩraupiitꞌee mãgɨɨrã ome, chi parãpa kꞌĩsiapata kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerã.’
Ichiaba Isaíapa pꞌãdade jĩpꞌa jara bɨ:
‘Mɨ jɨrɨda–e pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa mɨ unujida. Mɨa unupiji mɨ kꞌawa kꞌiniada–eerãmaa.’
Jõdee Israel pidaarã ãpɨte jara bɨ:
‘Ichita mɨa Israel pidaarã kꞌaripa kꞌinia baji. Mamĩda ãchia oodaamaa pꞌanapachida mɨa jara bɨkꞌa, mɨde ijãa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.’
Israel pidaarã mãgá pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, ¿Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi eperãarã yiaraa iru bɨkꞌã? ¡Mãga–e! ¡Mɨta Israel pida, Abrahamdeepa uchiada, Benjamín ëreerãdepema! Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ yiaraa–e bɨ.

Irua Israel pidaarã naaweda jɨrɨtꞌeraji ichi eperãarã papiitꞌee. ¿Ɨ̃rá sãga ãchi yiaraa iru baima? ¿Kꞌirãpa pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ iru pedee jarapari Elías itꞌaideepa? Israel pidaarã ãpɨte mãgɨpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa jaraji:
‘Akꞌõre, tai poro waibɨarãpa pɨ pedee jarapataarã peepachida. Ichiaba pɨa altar oopida ãrikꞌoojida. Mɨ aupai pɨde ijãapari mãikꞌaapa ɨ̃rá mɨ jida jɨrɨ pꞌanɨ peedaitꞌee.’
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa Eliamaa pꞌanauji:
‘Mɨ jua ekꞌari eperãarã siete mil iru bɨ, atꞌãri mɨmaa aupai ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata. Pɨkꞌa, ãra jida bedabaidakꞌaa jã ne–inaa juapa ooda Baal kꞌĩrapite.’

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi eperãarã ũkꞌuru ichi jua ekꞌari iru badakꞌa Elías na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bakꞌãri, aukꞌa ɨ̃rapema Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨɨrã jɨrɨtꞌeraji ichi jua ekꞌari iru bapariitꞌee. Mãga oopari ãchi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.

Maperãpɨ ma ijãapataarã jɨrɨtꞌeraji. Eperãarã jɨrɨtꞌerada paara ãchia ne–inaa oopata kꞌaurepa, ãchia Tachi Akꞌõremaa jɨrɨtꞌerapikꞌajida ma ne–inaa oo pꞌanɨ pari. Mamĩda mãga–e. Irua ãchi jɨrɨtꞌerapari ãchi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.

Mãgara ¿kꞌãata kꞌĩsiadaima Israelde? Jõmaweda Israel pidaarãpa unuda–e paji ãchia jɨrɨdapꞌedaa. Jɨrɨpachida Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pia akꞌɨmerã, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe. Mamĩda ũkꞌurupai, chi Tachi Akꞌõrepa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã Cristode ijãadamerã, wãara mãga pꞌaneejida iru kꞌĩrapite. Jõdee chi apemaarã kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua pꞌaneepachida.
Mapa Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:

‘Tachi Akꞌõrépata ãchi tꞌãri chaareepiji. Tau iru pꞌanajida mĩda, unuda–e paji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchimaa unupida. Ichiaba kꞌɨɨrɨ iru pꞌanajida mĩda, ũrida–e paji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchimaa jarapida. Atꞌãri mãga pꞌanapata.’
Ichiaba Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade Rey David itꞌaideepa jara bɨ:
‘Akꞌõre Waibɨa, pɨ eperãarãpa kꞌĩsiapata Akꞌõre ewari ɨa pꞌanɨpapai pɨa ãchi pia akꞌɨpariitꞌee. Mãga kꞌĩsia pꞌanadairã, taawa pɨa ãchi kꞌachiade baaipii mãikꞌaapa miapii.

Ichita ne–inaa oopata pɨ–itꞌee ãchia kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨkꞌa, pɨa wãara oopi kꞌinia bɨ kꞌãyaara. Maperã taawa pɨa ãchi tau pꞌãriu pɨkꞌapii ununaadamerã pɨa oo bɨ mãikꞌaapa ãchi eburukꞌukꞌua pɨkꞌadaidamerã ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa.’

Waya iidiitꞌee: ¿Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi eperãarã yiaraa iru bɨkꞌã? ¡Mãga–e! Wãara ijãada–e pada perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia badakꞌa, kꞌachiade baaijida. Mamĩda ãchia mãgá ijãada–e pada kꞌaurepa judio–eerã Cristode ijãa pꞌaneejida mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõre ode tꞌĩujida. Akꞌõrepa mãgá judio–eerã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji. Mãga ooji judiorãpa mãɨrã ijãa pꞌanɨ unudakꞌãri, aukꞌa Cristode ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa ichi ode tꞌĩudamerã.

Judiorã Cristode ijãadaamaa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa kꞌawaadai Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa judio–eerãpa iru pꞌanadai jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ Cristode ijãapataarã–itꞌee. Judiorãpa aukꞌa Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, ijãapataarã jõmaweda audupɨara o–ĩa pꞌanadaitꞌee.
Ɨ̃rá parã judio–eerãmaa ne–inaa jaraitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji parã judio–eerãmaa jarateemerã irua pedee pia jara pëida Cristode. Mɨ o–ĩa bɨ ma–itꞌee Akꞌõrepa mɨ jɨrɨtꞌerada perã.
Na mimia oo bɨpa Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, kꞌinia bɨ mɨchi aukꞌaarãpa parã ijãapata unudakꞌãri, aukꞌa Cristode ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõre ode tꞌĩudamerã.

Mamĩda Cristode ijãada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã awaraarãpa irude ijãadai mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri aukꞌa pꞌanapataadai Tachi Akꞌõre ome. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma judiorã atꞌãri pꞌoyaa pia akꞌɨ–e, mãga ijãada–e pꞌanadairã. Mamĩda ijãadakꞌãripɨ, Akꞌõrepa ãchi pia akꞌɨpariitꞌee. Akꞌõrepa chokꞌai pꞌirabaipidaarãkꞌa pꞌanadaitꞌee.

Kꞌĩsiadáma nãgɨde. Judiorãpa trigo naapɨara ewadakꞌãri, mãgɨ́ awara bɨpata aɨdee masa oodapꞌeda, pan oodaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Mamĩda Akꞌõrepa trigo jõmaweda waripipari perã, wãara ma masa jõmaweda ichi–itꞌee. Mãga pɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrepa judiorã chonaarãwedapema Abraham awara bɨji ichi–itꞌee, Abrahampa ijãa bada perã irua jarada. Mamĩda wãara Abrahamdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã jõmaweda ichi–itꞌee, mãga ijãadakꞌãri.

Abraham pakꞌuru kꞌarrakꞌa bɨ judiorã–itꞌee. Mamĩda olivo bɨɨrɨ uupataarãpa chi jua tꞌɨapꞌepatakꞌa ma pakꞌuru pipɨara chaumerã, mãga pɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrepa Israel pidaarã ũkꞌuru tꞌɨapꞌe pɨkꞌaji, Cristode ijãadaamaa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Mãpai pakꞌuru akꞌɨpataarãpa ma pakꞌuru jua tꞌɨapꞌedapꞌedaamãi awaraa pakꞌuru jua tꞌɨ bɨpatakꞌa mãgee jida chaumerã, mãga pɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã judio–eerã tꞌɨ pɨkꞌa bɨji judiorã kꞌãyaara, Cristode ijãapata perã.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã judio–eerã ome mãgá ooji mĩda, kꞌĩsiadaikꞌaraa bɨ parã pipɨara pꞌanɨ judiorã kꞌãyaara. Ãra parã naaweda ma pakꞌuru kꞌarradepema juakꞌa pꞌanajida. Ma pakꞌuru kꞌarrakꞌa bɨ chokꞌai–e bɨ parã, chi jua tꞌɨ pɨkꞌa bɨda kꞌaurepa. Parã chokꞌai pꞌanɨ ma pakꞌuru kꞌarrakꞌa bɨ kꞌaurepa. Judiorã kꞌaurepata parãpa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa pꞌanɨ.
Parãdepemapa jarai: “Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ tꞌɨ pɨkꞌa bɨji ma kꞌarrakꞌa bɨde judiorã kꞌãyaara.”
Pia bɨ. Mamĩda kꞌirãpáji Akꞌõrepa ma judiorã tꞌɨapꞌe pɨkꞌaji Cristode ijãadaamaa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Pɨ Cristode ijãapari perãta, tꞌɨ pɨkꞌa bɨji. Audua bai kꞌãyaara, jĩpꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre waaweeipia bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi eperãarã tꞌɨapꞌe pɨkꞌaji pɨrã Cristode ijãadaamaa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, audupɨara parã tꞌɨapꞌe pɨkꞌaitꞌee ijãa amaadaruta pɨrã.

Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌãri pia bapari Cristode ijãapataarã ome. Mamĩda Cristode ijãadaamaa pꞌanɨɨrã pia akꞌɨ–e. Maperã pɨ ijãa beeru pɨrã, tꞌãri pia bapariitꞌee pɨ ome. Mamĩda ijãa amaaru pɨrã, waa pia akꞌɨ–e. Pɨ tꞌɨapꞌe pɨkꞌaitꞌee ijãadakꞌaa beerã ome ooparikꞌa.

Jõdee, naaweda Cristode ijãadaamaa pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa ijãaruta pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pia akꞌɨitꞌee Cristodeerã akꞌɨparikꞌa. Ãra waya tꞌɨ pɨkꞌa bɨitꞌee ãra naaweda pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa. Mãga ooi Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee ne–inaa audú chaaree wẽ–e perã.

Irua pɨ, judio–ee bɨta, o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataru pɨrã Cristode ijãapari perã, audupɨara judiorã mãgá kꞌaripaitꞌee, Cristode ijãadakꞌãri. Mãga ooitꞌee ãchi uchiadapꞌedaa perã irua eperã jɨrɨtꞌerada Abrahamdeepa.

Ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, ɨ̃rá mɨa parã judio–eerãmaa ne–inaa awaraarãpa waide kꞌawadakꞌaa kꞌawapi kꞌinia bɨ, kꞌĩsianaadamerã judiorã kꞌãyaara pipɨara pꞌanɨ. Tachi Akꞌõrepa Israel pidaarã ũkꞌuru kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisuapiji judio–eerãpa irua jara pëida pia ũridapꞌeda, Cristode ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre ode tꞌĩudamerã. Mamĩda ichita mãga–e paitꞌee. Jĩpꞌa mãga pꞌasaitꞌee ijãarutamaa jõma judio–eerã irua kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ijãadamerã.
Ma tꞌẽepai, Israel pidaarã chokꞌara aukꞌa Cristode ijãadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõrepa ãra o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataitꞌee, iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa:
‘Tachi Kꞌaripapari uchiaitꞌee Israel pidaarã tꞌãideepa, Sión pꞌuurudeepa. Jacobdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataitꞌee.
Maapai mɨa jaradakꞌa Jacobmaa, ichideerã pia ooitꞌee ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapikꞌãri.’

Parã judio–eerã kꞌaurepa ɨ̃rá Tachi Akꞌõrepa Israel pidaarã yiaraa iru bɨ, ãchi ijãada–e pꞌanadairã irua pedee pia jara pëida Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Mamĩda Akꞌõrepa naaweda Israel pidaarã jɨrɨtꞌeraji. Mapa atꞌãri ãchi kꞌinia iru bapari mãikꞌaapa pia akꞌɨ bapari. Mãga oopari mãga ooitꞌeeda ada perã ãchi chonaarãmaa.
Tachi Akꞌõrépata ichita oopari ichia jara bɨkꞌa. Mapa ichi eperãarã atabëi–e paitꞌee. Ichita ãchi pia akꞌɨ bapariitꞌee ichia jaradakꞌa ãchi chonaarãmaa.

Naaweda parã judio–eerãpa oodaamaa pꞌanapachida Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda judiorã Akꞌõre Waibɨapa ichi Warra pëidade ijãadaamaa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã judio–eerã chupɨria kꞌawaaji.
Ɨ̃rapema judiorã atꞌãri oodaamaa pꞌanapata Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã judio–eerã chupɨria kꞌawaadakꞌa Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, aukꞌa chupɨria kꞌawaaitꞌee judiorã, mãgá ijãadakꞌãri.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã judiorã mãikꞌaapa judio–eerã ichiakꞌau bɨji ãchia oo kꞌiniata oodamerã. Mãga ooji akꞌɨpiitꞌee ichia chupɨria kꞌawaapari pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã, judiorã, judio–eerã paara.

¡Wãara Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapari! Jõmaweda pia oopari ichia ne–inaa jõma kꞌawapari perã. Tachi eperãarãpa kꞌawada–e irua kꞌĩsia iru bɨ. Ichiaba kꞌawada–e sãgapꞌeda irua eperãarãmaa ne–inaa oopipari.
¿Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade nãga jara bɨ–ekꞌã? ‘¿Kꞌaipa kꞌawaaima Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩsia mãikꞌaapa kꞌaipa iru ũraaima? Iruata ne–inaa jõma kꞌawapari.’
‘¿Kꞌaipa ne–inaa teeima Tachi Akꞌõremaa, irua jõdee ma pari ne–inaa awara teemerã?’

Eperãpa mãgá pꞌoyaa tee–e, Tachi Akꞌõre juadeepa ne–inaa jõmaweda uchiapari perã. Ichiata ne–inaa jõmaweda akꞌɨ bapari. Ne–inaa jõmaweda nɨ̃bɨ ichi–itꞌee. Mapa ichita jaradaipia bɨ: “Akꞌõre, ¡pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ! ¡Amén!”

Ɨ̃pemaarã, mɨa nãga ũraaitꞌee: Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã chupɨria kꞌawaapari perã, atꞌãri chokꞌai pꞌanɨ misa, oopítɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa pɨ ome. Mãgá pãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa pꞌoyaadai, pꞌanapataadaitꞌee Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Ichiaba mãgá akꞌɨpidai parãpa wãara Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ.

Oonáatɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa oopatakꞌa. Mãɨrãpa kꞌĩsiapata ãchia oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨdepai. Parã jõdee, kꞌĩsiadaipia bɨ Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mãgá kꞌawaadaitꞌee Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨ ne–inaa pia, kꞌachia wẽe; ne–inaa irua pia akꞌɨpari.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ pia ooji mɨ jɨrɨtꞌerakꞌãri parãmaa jarateemerã. Maperã mɨa ũraaitꞌee parãdepema apidaapa kꞌĩsianaadamerã: “Mɨ pipɨara bɨ awaraarã kꞌãyaara”. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa jɨrɨipia bɨ Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨ mãikꞌaapa tꞌãripa mãga ooipia bɨ, ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ misa irua kꞌaripamerã.
Tachi kꞌapꞌɨade nãgee ne–inaa chokꞌara iru bɨ; bɨɨrɨ tꞌɨaitꞌee; jua ne–inaa jitaitꞌee; mãgee ne–inaa. Ma chaachaa ne–inaa awara–awaraa oopari. Aukꞌa oodakꞌaa.
Mãga pɨkꞌa bɨ tachi Cristode ijãapataarã. Tachi jõma araa pꞌanɨ iru ome. Mapa aukꞌa araa pꞌanɨ apemaarã ijãapataarã ome kꞌapꞌɨa apai bɨkꞌa.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripakꞌãri, ne–inaa awara–awaraa oopata, irua oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa tachi chaachaa.
Ichi ũraa jarapiru pɨrã tachidepema abaamaa, mãgɨpa mãga ooipia bɨ tꞌãripa, Akꞌõremaa kꞌaripa iidi bɨ misa.
Awaraamaa ijãapataarã kꞌaripapiru pɨrã, mãga ooipia bɨ. Awaraamaa jarateepiru pɨrã, ichiaba mãga ooipia bɨ.

Awaraa kꞌariparu pɨrã chĩara tꞌãri o–ĩapiitꞌee, mãga ooipia bɨ. Awaraamaa pꞌaratꞌarapiru pɨrã, tꞌãri pia pꞌaratꞌa waibɨa teeipia bɨ chupɨria beerã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Awaraamaa eperã waibɨa papiru pɨrã, pia akꞌɨipia bɨ ijãapataarã ichi jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã. Awaraa kꞌariparu pɨrã chĩara chupɨria kꞌawaamerã, tꞌãri o–ĩa mãga ooipia bɨ.
Awaraarã tꞌãri jĩpꞌa kꞌinia iru pꞌanadaipia bɨ. Ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oodaikꞌaraa bɨ. Mãgee ne–inaa unuamaa iru pꞌanapatáatɨ. Pia aupaita jɨrɨdaipia bɨ oodaitꞌee.
Chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ, tachi ëreerã ome pꞌanapatakꞌa. Audua pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara awaraa ijãapataarã pipɨara akꞌɨdaipia bɨ tachi kꞌãyaara.
Kꞌoo–idaa pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ. Tꞌãripa oodaipia bɨ Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãgá oodaitꞌee Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
O–ĩa pꞌanadaipia bɨ nɨ pꞌanɨ misa Tachi Akꞌõre eujãdee wãdaitꞌee. Choodaipia bɨ nepɨrade baaidakꞌãri. Ichita ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa.

Awaraa ijãapataarã chupɨria kꞌawaadaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa wẽe pꞌanɨ pɨrã, ãramaa teedaipia bɨ. Awaraarã pãchi tꞌãide pꞌasia chedakꞌãri, tꞌãri pia auteebaidaipia bɨ. Kꞌãidaitꞌee wẽe pꞌanɨ pɨrã, pãchi tede kꞌãipítɨ.
Awaraarãpa parã jɨrɨdakꞌãri ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee, ɨtꞌaa iidítɨ Akꞌõrepa ãra chupɨria kꞌawaamerã mãikꞌaapa bendiciamerã. Iidináatɨ Akꞌõrepa ãra maldiciamerã.
Awaraarã o–ĩa pꞌanadakꞌãri, aukꞌa o–ĩa pꞌanadaipia bɨ. Jõdee tꞌãri pꞌua pꞌanadakꞌãri, aukꞌa jẽedaipia bɨ.

Tꞌãri aukꞌa pꞌanadaipia bɨ awaraa ijãapataarã ome. Jĩpꞌa jɨrɨdaipia bɨ Akꞌõrepa parãmaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ. Kꞌĩsiadaikꞌaraa bɨ parã awaraarã kꞌãyaara pipɨara pꞌanɨ. Aukꞌa kꞌõpꞌãyo meraadaipia bɨ chupɨria beerã ome mãikꞌaapa pꞌaratꞌara beerã ome. Audua pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ.
Awaraarãpa parã kꞌachia oodakꞌãri, aukꞌa oonáatɨ. Ichita ne–inaa pia óotɨ awaraarãpa unudamerã Cristo kꞌaurepa parãpa ne–inaa pia oopata.
Awaraarã nepɨra jɨrɨyaa pꞌanɨ mĩda, parã jõdee kꞌãiwee pꞌanapatáatɨ chĩara ome.

Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, kꞌĩra jõ–ee pꞌananáatɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara ichiakꞌau bɨ́tɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãrapa oodapꞌedaa akꞌɨmerã mãikꞌaapa miapimerã ichia kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mɨa mãga jara bɨ Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Mɨa aupaita eperãarãpa oopata akꞌɨpari jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Mɨata pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã miapiitꞌee.’
Awara ãi ichiaba jara bɨ:

‘Eperãpa pɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bɨ pɨrã, nãgá ooipia bɨ. Mãgɨ́ jarrapisia bakꞌãri, nekꞌopíji mãikꞌaapa opisia bakꞌãri, ne–inaa topíji. Mãgá ooru pɨrã, iru kꞌĩra nejasiapiitꞌee mãikꞌaapa irua pɨmaa kꞌachia oo kꞌinia bɨ oo–e pai.’
Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai ne–inaa kꞌachia oodai. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌachia pꞌoyáatɨ ne–inaa pia oo pꞌanɨpa.

Ɨ̃rá mɨa ũraaitꞌee parã jõmaarãpa pãchi poro waibɨarã waaweedamerã. Oopatáatɨ charraarãpa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa. Mãga oodaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa pãchi waibɨarã papida perã parã akꞌɨdamerã. Tachi Akꞌõrépata eperãarã poro waibɨarã jõmaweda mãga papipari.
Maperã ooda–e pɨrã ãrapa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa, ichiaba ooda–e pai Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨ parãmaa. Ma awara ma charraarãpa parã miapidaitꞌee, mãga ooda–e pɨrã.
Tachi charraarãpa ne–inaa pia oopataarã pꞌerapida–e. Ne–inaa kꞌachia oopataarãta pꞌerapipata. Maperã kꞌãiwee pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã charraarã ome, pia óotɨ. Mãgá ãrapa parã pia akꞌɨpataadaitꞌee.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma charraarã bɨji parã kꞌaripadamerã kꞌachia beerã juadeepa. Mamĩda pɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooru pɨrã, wãara waaweedaipia bɨ, ma charraarãpa pɨ ome oodaitꞌee perã kꞌachia beerã ome oopatakꞌa. Ãchi jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã pëidaitꞌee pɨ atade. Ma–itꞌee espada anipapata. Mãpai pɨ atadakꞌãri, miapide ateedaitꞌee, mãga oopi kꞌinia bairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌachia oopataarãmaa.
Maperã óotɨ pãchi poro waibɨarãpa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa. Mãga oodaipia bɨ kꞌĩsia pꞌua wẽe pꞌanadaitꞌee ãra kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Ichiaba mãga oodaipia bɨ ãrapa parã miapinaadamerã.
Parãpa impuesto pꞌaapataadaipia bɨ mãgɨ́ poro waibɨarãmaa, ãra mimia oopata pari, Akꞌõrepa mãɨrã mãgá bɨda perã parã kꞌaripadamerã.
Pãchi poro waibɨarã jõmaweda waaweedaipia bɨ. Parãmaa impuesto pꞌaapiruta pɨrã, pꞌáatɨ. Parãmaa ne–inaa aneedapꞌedaa pari awaraa eujãdeepa pꞌaapiruta pɨrã, ichiaba pꞌáatɨ, aupedeeda–ee.
Tewe paraa pꞌananáatɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara, chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ. Mãga pꞌanaruta pɨrã, oodaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa:
‘Miakꞌãi pꞌanɨɨrã kꞌãináatɨ awaraarã ome; eperã peenáatɨ; chĩara netꞌaa chɨanáatɨ; chĩara te, wẽra, mimiapataarã, ne–animal wa netꞌaa kꞌɨ̃anáatɨ.’
Ũraa awaraa ichiaba paraa akꞌɨpiitꞌee sãga pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ chĩara ome. Mamĩda ma jõmaweda uchiapata ũraa abaade:
‘Awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanapatáatɨ, pãchi kꞌapꞌɨa kꞌinia iru pꞌanapatakꞌa.’
Mãga ooruta pɨrã, oodaitꞌee jõma Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa.
Mãgá awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanadakꞌãri, maarepida ãramaa kꞌachia ooda–e. Maperãpɨ mãga oodakꞌãri, oopata jõma Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa.

Ma jõma oo pꞌanɨ misa, kꞌirãpátɨ jõmasaa taarãru tachi Cristode ijãadapꞌedaadeepa. Ɨ̃rá naawedapema kꞌãyaara kꞌaitꞌaara pꞌanɨ ɨtꞌaa wãdaitꞌee. Maperã kꞌãi pɨkꞌa pꞌananaadáma. Ma kꞌãyaara oodáma Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa, tachi pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨde pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda taarã–ee Cristo waya chekꞌãri, ewari chiwidi pɨkꞌa unudaitꞌee. Mapa oo amaadáma ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa oopata mãikꞌaapa soldaopa armadura jɨ̃parikꞌa chõode wãi naaweda, mãga pɨkꞌa oodáma Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Pꞌanadáma Akꞌõre ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨde pꞌanapataarã pꞌanapatakꞌa, ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda–ee. Oonaadáma pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨde pꞌanapataarãpa oopatakꞌa. Ãchi piudaipata itꞌuapa mãikꞌaapa pariatua pedee nipapata. Ichiaba pariatua wẽraarã jɨrɨpata aɨ ome kꞌãidaitꞌee. Ma awara chõo jɨrɨpata chĩara ome mãikꞌaapa netꞌaa kꞌaurepa chĩara kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapata.
Parã, jõdee, Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristode ijãapata perã, pꞌanapatáatɨ iru na pꞌekꞌau eujãde badakꞌa. Kꞌĩsianáatɨ parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oo kꞌinia bɨde.
Cristode ijãapari aukꞌa parãkꞌa ijãa–e bɨ pɨrã, pia akꞌɨ́tɨ, awaraa ijãapataarã akꞌɨpatakꞌa. ¿Irua mãgá ijãa–e bɨpaa atꞌãri Akꞌõre Ũraa pia kꞌawa–e bairã? Mapa iru ome aupedeedaikꞌaraa bɨ.
Abaapa ijãai chikꞌo kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌoipia bɨ. Jõdee chi pia kꞌawa–e bɨpa kꞌĩsiai nechiara kꞌoikꞌaraa bɨ, ma kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pia akꞌɨ–e pai jĩakꞌaapa.

Maperã ma chikꞌo kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌoparipa pia–ee akꞌɨikꞌaraa bɨ ma nechiara kꞌokꞌaa bɨ. Jõdee ma nechiara kꞌokꞌaa bɨpa kꞌachia pedeeikꞌaraa bɨ chi apema ãpɨte. Mãga oodaikꞌaraa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi aukꞌa pia akꞌɨpari perã Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa.

¿Kꞌaipa pɨ bɨjima chĩara mimiapari akꞌɨmerã jaraitꞌee irua oopata pia wa kꞌachia? Mimia chiparipapai ichi jua ekꞌari mimiapataarã mãgá akꞌɨipia bɨ. Mãga pɨkꞌa bɨ Cristo ichideerã ome. Tachi Waibɨa Cristopata ichideerãpa oopata akꞌɨpari jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Ichiata ichideerãmaa ne–inaa pia oopipari.

Ne–inaa awaraa jaraitꞌee parãpa aɨde kꞌĩsiadamerã. Ijãapari abaapa ijãai ewari aba ɨaipia bɨ apema kꞌãyaara. Jõdee awaraapa ijãai ewari chaa aukꞌa bɨ. Tachi ijãapataarã chaachaa jɨrɨdaipia bɨ tachi tꞌãride ijãa pꞌanɨ, kꞌawaadaitꞌee wãara mãga ijãa pꞌanɨ wa mãga–e.

Ma ewari aba ɨaparipa apema kꞌãyaara, mãga oopari Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Ichiaba ma chikꞌo kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌoparipa mãga oopari Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, gracias jarapari perã Akꞌõremaa ma chikꞌo kꞌokꞌãri. Jõdee ma nechiara kꞌokꞌaa bɨpa aukꞌa mãga oopari Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, ichiaba gracias jarapari perã Akꞌõremaa nekꞌokꞌãri.
Tachi ijãapataarã apida ituaba pꞌanadakꞌaa tachia oo kꞌiniata oodaitꞌee. Ichiaba apida ituaba piudakꞌaa, akꞌɨpari wẽe.

Chokꞌai pꞌanɨ misa, pꞌanapata oodaitꞌee Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa, irua tachi akꞌɨpari perã. Mamĩda jai–idaaruta pɨjida, atꞌãri Cristopa tachi akꞌɨpari. Mapa jaradai tachi chokꞌai pꞌanɨ misa, Cristo Tachi Waibɨa. Ichiaba jai–idaa pꞌanɨ misa, Cristo Tachi Waibɨa.
Ma–itꞌee Cristo piuji mãikꞌaapa chokꞌai pꞌirabaiji, jõmaweda ijãapataarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa paitꞌee; chi chokꞌai pꞌanɨɨrã, jai–idaadapꞌedaarã paara.

Mãga bɨta ¿sãapꞌeda pɨa, Akꞌõre Ũraa pia kꞌawa–e bɨta, pedee kꞌachia pedee bɨma awaraa ijãapataarã ãpɨte? Maa–e pɨrã, ¿sãapꞌeda pɨa, Akꞌõre Ũraa kꞌawa bɨta, pia–ee akꞌɨparima ma ijãapari pia kꞌawa–e bɨ? Tachi jõmaweda pꞌanadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate.
Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Mɨ ichita chokꞌai baparida a bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa. Eperã chaa bedabaidaitꞌee mɨ kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa jaradaitꞌee: “Pɨta Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨa.” ’
Mapa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachi chaachaa panadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa jaradaitꞌee tachia kꞌĩsiadapꞌedaa, jaradapꞌedaa mãikꞌaapa oodapꞌedaa na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa.
Maperã akꞌɨnaadáma awaraa ijãapataarãpa oopata pedee kꞌachia pedeedaitꞌee ãra ãpɨte. Ma kꞌãyaara jõma óotɨ awaraa ijãapataarã pipɨara ijãadamerã, mãikꞌaapa oodamerã Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Mɨ jida araa bɨ Cristo ome. Ijãa bɨ chikꞌo kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌoipia bɨ, Akꞌõrepa ma chikꞌo kꞌoitꞌee ooda perã. Mamĩda awaraapa ijãa bɨ pɨrã chikꞌo kꞌĩra aba kꞌoikꞌaraa bɨ, ichi–itꞌee kꞌoikꞌaraa bɨ.

Maperã kꞌĩrakꞌaupai pɨ ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa tꞌãri pꞌuapii. Iru kꞌĩrapite pɨa kꞌoru pɨrã ne–inaa irua kꞌokꞌaa, iru tꞌãri ãrii beei pɨ ome maa–e pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõre ome, Cristode ijãa amaadarumaa. Cristo ichiaba piuji ma eperã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mapa chikꞌinia pꞌanapatáatɨ.
Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai awaraarãpa pedee kꞌachia jaradai pɨa ne–inaa pia oopata ãpɨte, pɨa ijãa bairã chikꞌo kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌoipia bɨ.

Tachi Cristode ijãada–e pꞌanɨ irua chikꞌo kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌopipari perã wa chikꞌo kꞌĩra apai kꞌopipari perã. Ijãada–e ne–inaa topipari perã wa topikꞌaa perã. Jĩpꞌa tachi Cristode ijãapata mãikꞌaapa iru jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata, iru Jaurepa kꞌaripakꞌãri, oopataadai perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadai perã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa pia akꞌɨpari mãgá ijãa pꞌanɨɨrã, oo kꞌinia pꞌanadairã Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mãga oodakꞌãri, kꞌachia ooda–e pꞌanɨ. Mapa ãra ikꞌaawa pꞌanɨɨrãpa ichiaba ãra pia akꞌɨpata.
Maperã ne–inaa pia oodáma kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadaitꞌee awaraa ijãapataarã ome. Chikꞌaripa pꞌanadáma, tachi jõmaweda pipɨara Cristode ijãadaitꞌee.

Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai awaraarã tꞌãri ãriipii Tachi Akꞌõre ome, parãpa ne–inaa kꞌopata kꞌaurepa. Kꞌirãpátɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa chikꞌo jõmaweda ooji kꞌodamerã. Mamĩda pɨa chikꞌo kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌo bɨpa awaraa ijãapari kꞌachiade baaipiru pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa bɨ.
Piara bɨ chikꞌo kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌo–e paitꞌee maa–e pɨrã ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo to–e paitꞌee maa–e pɨrã ne–inaa awaraa oo–e paitꞌee, ma kꞌaurepa kꞌachiade baaipii kꞌãyaara pɨ ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa.

Maperã pɨa ijãa bɨ pɨrã chikꞌo kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌoipia bɨ, mãga ijãa béeji pɨchi tꞌãridepai. Mãpai awaraa ijãapari mãga ijãa–e bɨ ome nipakꞌãri, jaraikꞌaraa bɨ pɨchi tꞌãride iru bɨ. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawa bɨ ne–inaa jõma pɨa ijãa bɨ pɨchi tꞌãride. Chi mãga oo pꞌanɨɨrã o–ĩa pꞌanɨ Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, kꞌĩsia pꞌua–ee.

Mamĩda pɨa ijãa bɨ pɨrã chikꞌo kꞌĩra aba kꞌoikꞌaraa bɨ, kꞌĩsia pꞌuadarii ma chikꞌo kꞌokꞌãri. Mãgá kꞌĩsia pꞌuadaikꞌãri, ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa bɨ Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite ma chikꞌo kꞌoru pɨrã. Mapa mɨa ũraapari ijãaparipa kꞌawa–e bɨ pɨrã ne–inaa ooi wa oo–e pai, ooikꞌaraa bɨ, ichi tꞌãripa ijãarumaa ooipia bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pia kꞌawaa beerãpa choodaipia bɨ Akꞌõre Ũraa pia kꞌawada–e beerã ome ne–inaa awara ijãadakꞌãri. Tachia oo kꞌiniata oodai kꞌãyaara, oodaipia bɨ ãrapa kꞌinia pꞌanɨkꞌa.
Mãga ooruta pɨrã, ãchi tꞌãri ãriipida–e paitꞌee. Jĩpꞌa ãchi kꞌaripadaitꞌee waapɨara kꞌawaadamerã Cristopa ãchimaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ.

Oodaipia bɨ Cristopa oodakꞌa. Ne–inaa oo–e paji irua mãga oo kꞌinia bada perã. Jĩpꞌa oopachi Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa, nepɨrade baaipachi mĩda mãga ooda kꞌaurepa. Choopachi Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa:
‘Akꞌõre, kꞌachia beerãpa ikꞌachia jaradapꞌedaakꞌa pɨ ãpɨte, aukꞌa mɨmaa jarajida, mɨa ooda perã pɨa oopidakꞌa.’

Chonaarãweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa pꞌãpiji, ma kꞌaurepa tachi ɨ̃rapemaarãpa irua jara pëida kꞌawaadamerã. Mãga kꞌawaa wãdakꞌãri, tꞌãri o–ĩ–ĩadaipata tachia ijãa pꞌanɨde, choo kꞌawaa wãpata nepɨrade pꞌanɨde mãikꞌaapa nɨpata Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌaripamerã ichi ũraade jara bɨkꞌa.

Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Akꞌõrepa parã mãgá kꞌaripamerã mãikꞌaapa choopimerã nepɨrade jõnɨde. Ichiaba iidi bɨ irua parã kꞌaripamerã tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanapataadamerã apemaarã ijãapataarã ome, Jesucristopa mãga oopi kꞌinia bairã.
Mãgá tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanadakꞌãri, otau aba pɨkꞌa parã jõmaweda o–ĩa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripataadaitꞌee. Mãgá akꞌɨpidaitꞌee wãara ijãa pꞌanɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo Akꞌõrede.

Maperã awaraa ijãapataarã pia akꞌɨ́tɨ, Cristopa parã pia akꞌɨparikꞌa. Cristopa mãga ooda perã na eujãde bɨ misa, awaraarãpa pia jarapachida Tachi Akꞌõre ãpɨte. Aukꞌa pia jaradai iru ãpɨte, parãpa mãga oo pꞌanɨ pɨrã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristo pëiji tai judiorã kꞌaripade, ichia jaradakꞌa tai chonaarãmaa. Mãga ooji akꞌɨpiitꞌee wãara ichia oopari ichia jara bɨkꞌa.

Ichiaba Akꞌõrepa Cristo pëiji akꞌɨpiitꞌee ichia judio–eerã aukꞌa kꞌaripa kꞌinia bɨ. Ichia ãchi mãgá chupɨria kꞌawaa bapari perã, judio–eerã aukꞌa irumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ kꞌinia pꞌanɨ, iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa:
‘Maperã awaraa eujãdepemaarã tꞌãide mɨ ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃itꞌee mãikꞌaapa pɨmaa kꞌariitꞌee.’
Awara ãi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade ichiaba jara bɨ:
‘Awaraa eujãdepemaarã, o–ĩa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃́tɨ Tachi Akꞌõre eperãarã ome.’
Awara ãi ichiaba jara bɨ:
‘Parã jõmaarã eujãdepemaarã, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃́tɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌarítɨ Tachi Waibɨamaa.’
Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapari Isaíapa pꞌãdade ichiaba jara bɨ:
‘Eperã uchiaitꞌee Jesedeepa. Mãgɨ́ jõmaarã akꞌɨpari paitꞌee. Israel pidaarã–eerãpa pida ijãadaitꞌee irua ãchi kꞌaripaitꞌee atuanaadamerã.’

Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ parã pari aukꞌa ijãadamerã. Mãgá ijãadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã o–ĩa pꞌanapiitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌãiwee pꞌanapiitꞌee. Iidi bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa parãmaa kꞌawaapimerã Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ Cristodeerã–itꞌee, tꞌãri o–ĩa nɨ pꞌanadamerã irumaa wãrutamaa.
Ɨ̃pemaarã, mɨa kꞌawa bɨ parã Cristode wãara ijãa pꞌanɨ. Ne–inaa pia oopata awaraarã kꞌaripadaitꞌee. Akꞌõre netꞌaa pia kꞌawapata mãikꞌaapa ũraa para bapari, chikꞌaripa pꞌanɨ misa.

Mãga pꞌanapata mĩda, na pꞌãdade mɨa ne–inaa ũkꞌuru jĩpꞌa jaraji Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapidakꞌa. Mãgá jaraji parãpa kꞌirãpadamerã Akꞌõrepa ichideerãmaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ. Ma–itꞌeepɨ Akꞌõrepa mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji, mɨ chupɨria kꞌawaapꞌeda.

Mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji judio–eerãmaa jarateenamerã Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Ma–itꞌee mɨ Jesucristo mimiapari papiji. Pꞌaareerã awara bɨdakꞌa iru mimia oopataadamerã, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ awara bɨji iru pedee pia jara pëida Cristode jarateepariimerã judio–eerãmaa. Mɨa mãga jarateepari ãrapa ijãadakꞌãri, primisiakꞌa pꞌaneedamerã Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee mãikꞌaapa irua ãra pia akꞌɨpariimerã Cristode ijãapata kꞌaurepa. Mãgapɨ ichi Jaurepa ãra ichideerã papiitꞌee.
Mɨ mãgá mimiapari perã Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, o–ĩa jara bɨ Cristopa oomaa bɨ mɨchi kꞌapꞌɨa pari.
Ne–inaa ooda mɨchi kꞌĩradoopa jara–e. Jesucristopa mɨmaa oopi bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure kꞌapꞌɨa pari jaraitꞌee; mɨmaa ne–inaa jarapiru mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa oopiru judio–eerã ijãadamerã.

Ãrapa mãgá ijãajida, unudakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa mɨmaa oopi bɨ ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa. Mãpai iru Jaurepa mɨ tꞌɨmɨ́ wãpiji judio–eerãmaa jarateenamerã. Jerusalén pꞌuurudeepa Iliria eujãde parumaa, pꞌuuru bee chaa mɨa Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee jaratee nipapachi, Akꞌõrepa mɨmaa oopidakꞌa.

Mãgá mɨa jaratee kꞌinia bɨ. Wã kꞌinia bɨ Cristo atꞌãri kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨɨrãmaa, jarateede irua ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Eperãpa te chiwidi ookꞌãri, oo–e awaraapa te bɨɨrɨ suda ɨ̃rɨ. Mãga pɨkꞌa mɨa jaratee kꞌinia–e Cristopa ooda chi ũridapꞌedaarãmaa awaraa jarateepari itꞌaideepa.
Jĩpꞌa mɨa jaratee kꞌinia bɨ kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨɨrãmaa, ãra pꞌanadamerã Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa:
‘Waide irua ooda ũrida–e pꞌanɨɨrãpa iru unudaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa waide irude ũrida–e pꞌanɨɨrãpa iru kꞌawaadaitꞌee.’
Mɨ mãgá tꞌɨmɨ́ wãpari perã awaraarãmaa jarateede, waide pꞌoyaa wã–e paji parã akꞌɨde, ichita wã kꞌinia baji mĩda.
Mamĩda ɨ̃rá, waa wẽ–e perã na tode atꞌãri Cristopa ooda ũrida–ee mãikꞌaapa año chokꞌara paru mɨ wãitꞌee bada parã akꞌɨde, ɨ̃rá wãitꞌee.
Españadee wãkꞌãri, parãmãi wiibaiitꞌee. Parãpa mɨ kꞌariparuta pɨrã, jãma panaitꞌee, pꞌasia nipapꞌeda parã tꞌãide. O–ĩa bɨ parã unuitꞌee perã, makꞌɨara pꞌoyaa taarã ba–e mĩda parã ome.
Mamĩda wãi naaweda parã akꞌɨde, mɨ wãitꞌee Jerusalén pꞌuurudee. Pꞌaratꞌa ateeitꞌee ijãapataarã mama pꞌanɨɨrãmaa.
Mãga ooitꞌee Macedonia eujãdepema mãikꞌaapa Acaya eujãdepema ijãapataarãpa kꞌaripa kꞌinia pꞌanadairã Jerusalendepema ijãapataarã chupɨria chitoonɨɨrã. Ma–itꞌee pꞌaratꞌa pꞌejida tee pëidaitꞌee mɨ ome.

Judio–eerã paji mĩda, ãchi kꞌĩradoopa mãga oojida tꞌãri pia pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Mamĩda mãga ooda–e pada paara ãchi kꞌĩradoopa, kꞌaripadaipia pꞌanakꞌajida, judiorã kꞌaurepa ãchia Akꞌõre netꞌaa kꞌawa pꞌanadairã. Maperãpɨ ãchi netꞌaa teedaipia bɨ chi wẽe pꞌanɨɨrãmaa judiorã tꞌãide.
Mãpai mɨa ãchi pꞌaratꞌa pꞌedapꞌedaa Jerusalendee ateepꞌeda mãikꞌaapa teepꞌeda ma chupɨria beerãmaa, mɨ wãitꞌee Españadee mãikꞌaapa ma wãrude wiibaiitꞌee parã akꞌɨitꞌee.
Mãgá unudakꞌãri, mɨa kꞌawa bɨ parã o–ĩa pꞌanadaitꞌee, mɨa jaraitꞌee perã ne–inaa pia Cristopa oo kꞌinia bɨ ichideerãmaa.

Mamĩda, ɨ̃pemaarã, mãga paru misa, mɨa kꞌinia bɨ parãpa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadamerã mɨ pari. Kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa ɨtꞌaa iidipatáatɨ Akꞌõrepa mɨ kꞌaripamerã, mɨ unukꞌãri Cristopa ooda ũridaamaa pꞌanɨɨrã ome. Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa kꞌinia bɨ tachi mãgá chikꞌaripa pꞌanadamerã. Mapa Akꞌõre Jaurepa Cristodeerã jõmaweda chikꞌinia pꞌanapipari.

Maperã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ baaipinaamerã Judeadepema Cristode ijãadakꞌaa beerã juade, mãɨrãpa mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapata perã, mɨa jaratee bɨ kꞌaurepa. Ichiaba ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patáatɨ Jerusalendepema judiorã Cristode ijãapataarãpa tꞌãri o–ĩa jitadamerã ma pꞌaratꞌa mɨa ateeru teeitꞌee ãramaa.
Mãgá ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patáatɨ mɨ parã tꞌãide o–ĩa panamerã, Akꞌõrepa mãga kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã. Jãma panakꞌãri, ɨ̃iitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pedee sia pedeeitꞌee parã ome.
Mãga paru misa, mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidiitꞌee Akꞌõrepa parã jõma kꞌãiwee pꞌanapimerã. Amén.
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ parãpa auteebaidamerã tachi ɨ̃pewẽra Cristo kꞌaurepa, tꞌɨ̃jarapata Febe. Irua Cencrea pꞌuurudepema ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarã kꞌaripapari.
Iru parã tꞌãide panakꞌãri, pia óotɨ Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa jõmaweda ichideerãmaa. Febe kꞌaripátɨ parãmaa ne–inaa iidiru pɨrã, irua ijãapataarã chokꞌara kꞌaripadoo perã, mɨ paara.
Mɨa salude pëiru Priscilamaa mãikꞌaapa Aquilamaa. Mɨ ome ãra aukꞌa mimiapata Jesucristo–itꞌee.
Perá piujida mɨ kꞌaripadaitꞌee. Maperã mɨa gracias jara kꞌinia bɨ ãramaa mãikꞌaapa ijãapataarã jõmaweda judio–eerã tꞌãidepemaarãpa pida.
Ichiaba salude pëiru jõmaweda ijãapataarãmaa, ãra tede ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ chepata. Salude pëiru mɨ kꞌõpꞌãyo kꞌinia, Epenetomaa. Iru awaraarã kꞌãyaara naapɨara Cristode ijãaji Ásia eujãde.
Salude pëiru Mariamaa. Pia oopari Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa parã tꞌãide.

Salude pëiru mɨchi aukꞌaarã Andronicomaa mãikꞌaapa Juniamaa. Ãra carcelde pꞌanajida mɨ ome. Ãrapa mɨ kꞌãyaara naapɨara ijãajida. Jõmaweda Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãpa ãra pia tꞌo pꞌanɨ, pia mimiapata perã Cristo–itꞌee.
Salude pëiru mɨ kꞌõpꞌãyo kꞌinia Ampliatomaa. Tachi ome aukꞌa ijãa bɨ Cristode.
Salude pëiru Urbanomaa. Irua tachi jõma kꞌaripapari mimia pꞌanɨ misa Cristo–itꞌee. Ichiaba salude pëiru mɨ kꞌõpꞌãyo kꞌinia, Estaquimaa.
Salude pëiru Apelemaa. Nepɨrade baaiji mĩda Cristode ijãapari perã, choopari ijãa bɨde. Ichiaba salude pëiru Aristóbulo te pidaarãmaa, ãra ichiaba Cristode ijãapata perã.
Salude pëiru mɨchi aukꞌaa Herodionmaa mãikꞌaapa Narciso tedepema ijãapataarãmaa.

Salude pëiru Trifenamaa mãikꞌaapa Trifosamaa. Ma wẽraarãpa pia oopata Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Ichiaba salude pëiru mɨ ɨ̃pewẽra Cristo kꞌaurepa Persidemaa. Mɨa iru kꞌinia iru bɨ. Irua ichiaba pia oopari Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa.
Salude pëiru Rufomaa. Akꞌõrepa iru jɨrɨtꞌeraji parã tꞌãide waibɨa papiitꞌee. Aukꞌa salude pëiru iru nawemaa. Mãgɨ́ wẽrapa mɨ akꞌɨpari mɨchi nawekꞌa.
Salude pëiru Asincritomaa, Flegonte, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas, mãgɨɨrãmaa mãikꞌaapa apemaarã ɨ̃pemaarãmaa, ãra ome ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ chepata.
Ichiaba salude pëiru Filologomaa Julia ome, Nereamaa iru ɨ̃pewẽra ome, Olimpamaa mãikꞌaapa apemaarã ijãapataarãmaa, ãra ome ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ chepata.
Salude tee para bátɨ pãchi pitapai akꞌɨpidaitꞌee chikꞌinia pꞌanapata Cristopa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Nãpema ijãapataarãpa parãmaa aukꞌa salude pëiruta.

Ɨ̃pemaarã, mɨa enenee nɨ̃bɨ parã kꞌɨɨrɨchaa pꞌanadamerã, ũkꞌuru seewa jarateepata paraa perã. Mãɨrãpa awara jarateepata Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa wãara jarateepataarãpa parãmaa jarateedapꞌedaa kꞌãyaara mãikꞌaapa ijãapataarã kꞌĩsia awara–awaraa papipata. Maperã Cristode ijãapataarã ũkꞌuru ijãa amaadaipata ãchi kꞌaurepa. Ãyaa pꞌanéetɨ mãɨrã ikꞌaawaapa.
Mãgeerãpa oodakꞌaa Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Jĩpꞌa ãchi–itꞌee aupai mimiapata. Pedee sia, iwarraa pedee jaratee pꞌanɨpa kꞌũrapata ijãapataarã, chi pia kꞌĩsia kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨɨrã.

Jõmaarãpa jara pꞌanɨ parã Cristode pia ijãapata mãikꞌaapa pꞌanapata irua pëida eperãarãpa jarateepatakꞌa. Mãga ũrikꞌãri, mɨ o–ĩadaipari. Mãgá ne–inaa pia kꞌawaa wãkꞌãtɨ wã́tɨ. Mamĩda kꞌĩrakꞌaupai ne–inaa kꞌachia oodai.

Parãpa ma seewa jarateepataarãpa jara pꞌanɨ ũrida–e pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa isapai pꞌoyaai Satanás, chi ãchimaa mãga oopi bɨ. Mãgá parã kꞌãiwee pꞌanadai, kꞌĩsia awara–awaraa pꞌanadai kꞌãyaara. Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesupa made parã kꞌaripamerã.
Timoteopa parãmaa ichiaba salude pëiru. Ichia mɨ kꞌaripapari na mimia ome. Ichiaba salude pëiruta mɨchi aukꞌaarã Luciopa, Jasonpa mãikꞌaapa Sosipatropa.
Mɨ, Terciopa na kꞌartꞌa pꞌãmaa bɨ Pablo kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Mɨa pida Tachi Waibɨade ijãa bɨ. Mapa parãmaa ichiaba salude pëi kꞌinia bɨ.

Gayopa parãmaa ichiaba salude pëiru. Irua tai auteebaiji ichi tede mãikꞌaapa tai pia akꞌɨmaa bɨ. Mãga oopari jõma Cristode ijãapataarã ome nama chedakꞌãri. Erasto, na pꞌuurudepema pꞌaratꞌa jɨ̃aparipa ichiaba salude pëiru. Ma awara tachi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa, Cuartopa salude pëiru.
[Mɨ, Pablopa iidi bɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa parã pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã.]

Ɨ̃rá ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dáma Tachi Akꞌõremaa jaradaitꞌee iruta jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Irua parã kꞌaripapariitꞌee Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oodamerã. Mɨa mãga jõmaarãmaa jara bɨ jarateekꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa Pia jara pëida. Ma ũraade jara bɨ jõmaweda Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Ma pedee Akꞌõrepa chonaarãweda kꞌawapi–e paji.

Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre ichita baparipa, ma kꞌĩsia iru bada ɨ̃rá kꞌawapimaa bɨ mɨchi itꞌaideepa mãikꞌaapa awaraa jarateepataarã itꞌaideepa. Taimaa kꞌawaapiji ichia wãarata jara kꞌinia bada ichi ũraa pꞌãdade chonaarãweda, ma pedeeta jara bairã Cristopa ooitꞌee bada jõmaarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mãga kꞌawaapida perã taimaa, jõmaweda taipa jarateepata ũri pꞌanɨɨrãpa Cristode ijãadai mãikꞌaapa oodai irua oopi bɨkꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõre aupaita wãara kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bapari. Ichia Jesucristo pëiji tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atamerã. ¡Mapa ichita ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dáma irumaa! Amén.
Mãgapai paji.
Mɨ, Pablo, tachi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa Sóstenes ome na kꞌartꞌa pꞌãruta. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bada perã, mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji Jesucristopa pëimerã ichi ũraa jarateede.

Mɨa na kꞌartꞌa pꞌãru parã ijãapataarãmaa Corinto pꞌuurude pꞌanɨ. Parãpa Jesucristode ijãa pꞌaneedakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã awara bɨji ichideerã pꞌaneedamerã. Mãga oopari jõmaweda na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã ome, Jesucristomaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dakꞌãri. Mãgá Tachi Poro Waibɨa Jesucristo ãra Poro Waibɨa pai ichiaba.
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãikꞌaapa Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa parã pia akꞌɨ pꞌanadamerã. Mãgá kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Ichita Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ bakꞌãri parã pari, mɨa jarapari: “Akꞌõre, pɨ tꞌãri pia bɨ Jesucristode ijãapataarã pia akꞌɨpari perã.”

Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa jõmaade parã Corinto pidaarã kꞌaripaji. Pia pedeepiji iru ũraa jarateedamerã. Ichiaba poro wẽsaapiji kꞌawaadamerã irua oopi kꞌinia bɨ ichide ijãapataarãmaa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga ooda perã, parãpa waapɨara Cristode ijãajida, taipa naaweda jarateedapꞌedaa kꞌãyaara.
Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma jõma ooda perã parã–itꞌee, parãpa oodai ne–inaa jõmaweda iru Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa ichideerãmaa, Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo cheitꞌee ewari nɨ pꞌanɨ misa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã pia akꞌɨ bapariitꞌee Cristo cherumaa, ma ewate iru kꞌaurepa parã kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanadamerã.
Mãga ooitꞌee ichia jaradakꞌa oopari perã. Parã jɨrɨji ichi Warra Jesucristo ome araa pꞌanapataadamerã.

Ma jara aupada jõmaweda wãara mĩda, Cloe tedepemaarãpa mɨmaa kꞌawapijida parã nepɨrade para bɨ, aukꞌa kꞌĩsiada–e pꞌanadairã. Ɨ̃pemaarã, Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa mɨ pëida perã, ¡ũrítɨ mɨ ũraa! Tꞌãri aukꞌa pꞌanapatáatɨ, aupedeeda–ee, Cristode ijãapata perã. Óotɨ irua oopi bɨkꞌa ichideerãmaa.
Nãga mɨmaa nepɨrɨjida. Ijãapataarã ũkꞌuruurãpa mãgapata: “Mɨ Pablo eere bɨ”; awaraarãpa: “Mɨ Apolo eere bɨ”; awaraarãpa: “Mɨ Pedro
Cristopa ichide ijãapataarãmaa mãgá awara–awaraa kꞌĩsiapikꞌaa. Mɨ, Pablo kurusode piu–e paji parã pari, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapiitꞌee. Parã poro choopidakꞌãri, mɨ tꞌɨ̃de poro chooda–e paji.
Mɨ o–ĩa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite parãdepema Crispo mãikꞌaapa Gayo aupai poro chooda perã.
Mãgá mɨa chokꞌara–ee poro chooda perã, parãdepema apidaapa pꞌoyaa jarada–e mɨ tꞌɨ̃de poro choopiji.
Ichiaba Estéfanas te pidaarã poro chooji. Mãgɨɨrã awara mɨa waa kꞌirãpa–e.

Cristopa mɨ pëi–e paji poro choode. Jĩpꞌa ichia ooda mãikꞌaapa ũraada jarateedeta pëiji. Mãgɨ́ ũraa mɨa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pɨkꞌa jaratee–e, ijãadamerã mɨ pedee wẽsaa jaratee bɨpa. Ma kꞌãyaara tꞌãri pia jarateepari kꞌawaadamerã Jesucristo kurusode piuji eperãarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataitꞌee.

Mãgɨ́ jarateeda maarepida ũri kꞌiniada–e pꞌanɨ Cristode ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa, ãchi–itꞌee mãgɨ́ jarateepataarã pariatua pedee pꞌanadairã. Mamĩda tachi ijãapataarãpa mãgɨ́ jarateeda ũridakꞌãri, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo kꞌiniada–e pꞌanapata, kꞌawa pꞌanadairã Cristopata tachi ma o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atapari.
Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Mɨa akꞌɨpiitꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãda apata wãara mãga pꞌanɨ–e, ãchia kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanɨkꞌa mɨa oopi–e pakꞌãri.’

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ pꞌãdade nãga jara kꞌinia bɨ. Eperãarã ɨ̃rapemaarãkꞌa, poro wẽsaa pꞌanɨ jida mãikꞌaapa pedee wẽsaa pedee pꞌanɨ jida, kꞌĩsia kꞌawada–ee pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara kꞌĩsia kꞌawaara bapari perã.

Tachi Akꞌõre mãga bapari perã, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa iru pꞌoyaa kꞌawada–e ãchi kꞌĩsiadoopa. Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee taimaa jarateepiji, ũkꞌuruurãpa kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ mĩda tai kꞌĩsia kꞌawada–ee pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda chi ijãarutaarã taipa jarateepatade o kꞌachiadeepa uchiadaitꞌee.

Judiorãpa taipa jarateepata ũri kꞌiniada–e pꞌanɨ, akꞌɨ kꞌinia pꞌanadairã ne–inaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooru eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa. Jõdee judio–eerãpa ũri kꞌiniada–e pꞌanɨ, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa jarateedata jɨrɨ pꞌanadairã.

Mamĩda táipata jarateepata Cristo kurusode piuda pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapiitꞌee, judiorãpa ijãadaamaa pꞌanɨ pɨjida mãikꞌaapa judio–eerãpa ichiaba ijãa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanɨ pɨjida, tachi kꞌĩsiadeepa pariatua jarateedai jĩakꞌaapa.

Taipa mãga jarateepata kꞌawa pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jɨrɨmaa bɨ judiorã mãikꞌaapa judio–eerã paara Cristode ijãadamerã. Irude ijãadakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌaneepata iruata kꞌawapipari Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ mãikꞌaapa oopipari Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa eperãarãmaa.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga kꞌĩsia iru baji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ mĩda irua ne–inaa pariatua ooji Cristo piupikꞌãri. Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristo peedapꞌedaarã ome pꞌoyaa–e pajida apata. Mamĩda irua mãga oopikꞌãri, akꞌɨpiji ichi wãara jõmaarã kꞌãyaara kꞌĩsia kꞌawaara bapari mãikꞌaapa akꞌɨpiji ne–inaa jõma pꞌoyaai, mãgá tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atada perã.

Ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, kꞌĩsíatɨ parã pꞌanapatapꞌedaade, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã jɨrɨi naaweda. Parã tꞌãide Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã jɨrɨkꞌãri ichide ijãadamerã, chokꞌara jɨrɨ–e paji nãgee: kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerã na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa jɨrɨpatakꞌa; pꞌaratꞌara beerã maa–e pɨrã eperãarã poro waibɨarã.

Mãgeerã jɨrɨtꞌerai kꞌãyaara, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jɨrɨtꞌeraji eperãarã makꞌɨara kꞌĩsia kꞌawada–ee beerã, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerã kꞌĩra nejasia pꞌaneedamerã ũridakꞌãri irua jarapida mãɨrãmaa. Ichiaba jɨrɨtꞌeraji eperã jĩpꞌaarã, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema poro waibɨarã kꞌĩra nejasia pꞌaneedamerã ũridakꞌãri irua oopi bɨ mãɨrãmaa.

Jɨrɨtꞌeraji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema eperãarã chupɨria beerãda apata. Mãga ooji akꞌɨpiitꞌee pipɨara bɨ Cristode ijãaru, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bai kꞌãyaara, pꞌaratꞌara bai kꞌãyaara mãikꞌaapa eperã waibɨa bai kꞌãyaara.
Mãga ooji Tachi Akꞌõrepa, apida audua pꞌananaadamerã ichi kꞌĩrapite.

Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara kꞌĩsia kꞌawaara bapari perã, tachimaa kꞌawaapiji Cristopa ooda tachi kꞌaripaitꞌee atuanaadamerã. Cristopa tachi neto pɨkꞌa ataji uchiadamerã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌariipa. Mãpai irude ijãadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi awara bɨji araa pꞌanapataadamerã iru ome. Mãgá pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌaneejida Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Ma awara mãgá Cristopa tachimaa kꞌawapiji Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨ.
Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Eperãpa jara kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã ichiata ne–inaa kꞌawaara bɨ awaraarã kꞌãyaara, mãga jaraipia bɨ ichia kꞌawaa bairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pia akꞌɨ bapari.’

Ɨ̃pemaarã, mɨ parãmaa wãkꞌãri, jarateeji Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida; irua naaweda kꞌĩsia iru bada ooitꞌee Cristo piuda kꞌapꞌɨa. Mãga jaratee–e paji poro wẽsaa bɨpa jarateeparikꞌa maa–e pɨrã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa jarateeparikꞌa.
Ma kꞌãyaara jarateeji Jesucristo kurusode piuda tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapiitꞌee.
Mãga jaratee bɨde mɨ pꞌera baji, parãpa mɨa jararu ũri kꞌiniada–e pai jĩakꞌaapa.
Jaratee–e paji kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa jarateeparikꞌa, ichi pedee ijãadamerã. Mãga–e. Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepata mɨa jarateeda parãmaa ijãapiji, ichia jõmaweda pꞌoyaapari perã.
Akꞌõre Jaurepa mãga ooji parãpa kꞌĩsianaadamerã eperãpa jarateeda kꞌaurepa ijãa pꞌanɨ. Jĩpꞌa ijãa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepata ijãapida perã.

Taipa parãmaa jarateeda–e paji kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãpa jarateepatakꞌa. Mamĩda mãgá jarateepata Tachi Akꞌõre pipɨara kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrãmaa. Jarateedakꞌaa ijãadakꞌaa beerã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãkꞌa maa–e pɨrã ijãadakꞌaa beerã waibɨarãkꞌa. Ãchi piudakꞌãri, ãchia jarateedapꞌedaa makꞌɨara kꞌirãpadakꞌaa.

Ãchia jarateepatakꞌa jarateedai kꞌãyaara, taipa jarateepachida Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawapida taimaa; aɨ naaweda ne–inaa eperãarãmaa kꞌawapi–e pada. Kꞌawapiji ichia kꞌĩsia iru bada ooitꞌee Jesucristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari na eujã ooi naaweda. Ichiaba kꞌawapiji jõma ichia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ tachi–itꞌee, ɨtꞌari panadakꞌãri.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichia kꞌĩsia iru bada kꞌawapi–e paji eperã waibɨa beerãmaa, mãgɨɨrãpa ijãada–e pada perã. Ãchia mãga kꞌawadapꞌedaa paara, Tachi Waibɨa kurusode peeda–e pakꞌaji. Kꞌawakꞌajida iru cheji Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree unupide na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãmaa.
Ma awara tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨɨrãmaa kꞌawapi–e paji ichia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ichide ijãapataarã–itꞌee, iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Tachi Akꞌõrepa nãgɨ́ ne–inaa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ teeitꞌee ichi kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨɨrãmaa: ne–inaa eperãarãpa waide unudakꞌaa; waide ũridakꞌaa; mãikꞌaapa waide kꞌĩsiadakꞌaa.’
Chonaarãweda Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdakꞌãri, kꞌawada–e pꞌanapachida irua kꞌĩsia iru bada. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa ne–inaa jõma kꞌawapari perã, mãgɨ́ kꞌĩsia paara tachimaa kꞌawapii.
Eperãpa ichi kꞌĩsia kꞌawapari ichi tꞌãridepai. Mãga pɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa kꞌawapari Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩsia.

Mapa tachi ijãapataarãpa Akꞌõrede ijãadakꞌaarãpa kꞌĩsiapatakꞌa kꞌĩsiadakꞌaa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Jaure pëiji tachimaa kꞌawapimerã ne–inaa jõma irua ooitꞌee bɨ tachi–itꞌee Jesucristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Akꞌõrepa mãga oo–e paji tachia ne–inaa pia oopata perã. Jĩpꞌa ooji tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.

Maperã taipa jarateedakꞌaa tachi kꞌĩsiadoopa. Jĩpꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarateepi bɨkꞌa jarateepata. Mãga ũridakꞌãri, ijãapataarãpa kꞌawaa wãpata Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ãchi–itꞌee, ichi Jaure ãchi ome bapari perã.
Mamĩda ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa mãga ũri kꞌiniadakꞌaa, ãchi–itꞌee tachi kꞌĩsiadoopa pariatua pedee pꞌanadairã. Ma awara ãchia Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩsia pꞌoyaa kꞌawadakꞌaa, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure wẽe pꞌanapata perã.

Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure iru pꞌanɨɨrãpa ne–inaa jõma akꞌɨdai kꞌawaadaitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Mãga oodai Akꞌõre Jaurepa ãra kꞌaripapari perã. Jõdee Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure wẽe beerãpa mãgá pꞌoyaa ooda–e. Ma awara ãchia pꞌoyaa kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure tachi ijãapataarã ome bapari wa mãga–e, iru Jaure wẽe pꞌanadairã.
Tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa Tachi Akꞌõre netꞌaa pꞌoyaa kꞌawadakꞌaa, iru Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘¿Kꞌaipa kꞌawaaima Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩsia mãikꞌaapa kꞌaipa iru ũraaima? Iruata ne–inaa jõma kꞌawapari.’
Mamĩda mãga–e tachi ijãapataarã ome. Tachiata kꞌawaadai Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩsia, iru Jaurepa tachi kꞌĩsiapipari perã Cristopa kꞌĩsia bɨkꞌa.

Ɨ̃pemaarã, kꞌirãpátɨ mɨa jaratee nipada parã ome bakꞌãri. Ara nawepa ichi warra chai ewaa tꞌodamaa chikꞌo kꞌopi–e bɨkꞌa, chikꞌo waide pꞌoyaa kꞌo–e bairã, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨa jaratee–e paji Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure taarã iru beerãmaa jarateeparikꞌa. Mãga oo–e paji parã atꞌãri pia ijãada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.

Maperãpɨ nawepa ichi warra chai jutopiparikꞌa chikꞌo waide pꞌoyaa kꞌo–e bairã, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨa jĩpꞌa jarateepachi Cristo piuda eperãarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiitꞌee. Jaratee–e paji jõma irua kꞌĩsia iru bɨ tachi–itꞌee, kꞌawa bada perã parãpa waide mãga pꞌoyaa kꞌawada–e pai.

Mãga pꞌanɨ pãchia oo kꞌiniata oo pꞌanadairã, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi kꞌinia bɨ ooda–ee. Iru Jaurepa jarateepi bɨkꞌa oodai kꞌãyaara, aupedeepata, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarateepataarã pëida audú kꞌɨ̃a pꞌanadairã.
¿Jara pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã: “Mɨ Pablo eere bɨ” maa–e pɨrã “Mɨ Apolo eere bɨ”? ¡Parã ijãadakꞌaarã́kꞌapɨ kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ!
Mɨ, Pablo Apolo ome eperãarã poro waibɨarã–epɨ; jĩpꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre mimia oopataarã, parãmaa jarateedapꞌedaa Cristode ijãadamerã. Taipa Cristopa oopidakꞌa jarateejida.

Eperãpa ichi eujãde ne–uuparikꞌa, mɨa naapɨara parãmaa jaranaji Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mãpai ne–uu akꞌɨparipa ooparikꞌa, Apolopa waapɨara jarateepachi kꞌawaadamerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa parãmaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–uu jõmaata waripiparikꞌa, iruata taipa jarateedapꞌedaa parãmaa ijãapiji.

Ne–uuparipa mãikꞌaapa ne–uu akꞌɨparipa ma ne–uuda pꞌoyaa waripidakꞌaa. Maperã ma ne–uuda waripipari ãra kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Mãga pɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre waibɨara bɨ tai jarateepataarã kꞌãyaara, irua aupaita eperãarãmaa ijãapipari perã.

Ma ne–uupari ma ne–uu akꞌɨpari ome aukꞌa mimiapachida chaumerã. Mãga pɨkꞌa tai mimiapataarãpa aukꞌa jarateepata eperãarãpa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadamerã. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai chaachaa pꞌaaitꞌee ichia kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, taipa oodapꞌedaa pari.

Tai ma mimiapataarã́kꞌata pꞌanɨ. Jõdee parã ma ne–uudákꞌata pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõreta ma eujã chipari. Parã ijãapataarã ichiaba te choma pɨkꞌa bɨ; te Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopimaa bɨ ichi mimiapataarãmaa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bada perã, mɨ pëiji ma te choma ewaa oomerã. Maapꞌeda awaraarã mɨ tꞌẽe chejida ne–inaa awaraa parãmaa jarateede. Mamĩda pia jarateedaipia bɨ.
Mɨa mãga jara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrépata ichi Warra Jesucristo bɨda perã ma te choma te basakꞌa bamerã. Irua aupaita tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atai. Mapa apidaapa awaraa basa jɨrɨdaikꞌaraa bɨ.
Ma basade te oodai nãgɨ́ netꞌaa pi–ia bɨdee: nẽedee, pꞌaratꞌadee, wa mãu pi–iadee. Maa–e pɨrã ma te oodai pakꞌurudee, pꞌũajara pꞌoo bɨdee wa siadee.

Mamĩda Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate irua ma te oopataarãpa oodapꞌedaa akꞌɨitꞌee mãikꞌaapa jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Pia jaraitꞌeera, irua taipa oodapꞌedaa chaa mãikꞌaapa jarateedapꞌedaa chaa akꞌɨitꞌee. Ma ewate ma ne–inaa jõmaweda tꞌɨpɨtaude wãyaaitꞌee.

Cristopa taimaa oopida mãikꞌaapa jarateepida paa–e paitꞌee. Chooitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ pia akꞌɨitꞌee mãikꞌaapa mãgɨ́ pari teeitꞌee ichia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ teeitꞌee Cristopa oopidakꞌa oodapꞌedaarãmaa.
