Mamĩda eperãarãpa ãchi kꞌĩsiadoopa oodapꞌedaa maa–e pɨrã jarateedapꞌedaa jõma paaitꞌee wẽparumaa. Mamĩda netꞌaa ẽtꞌa atadakꞌa tꞌɨpɨtaudeepa, ma jarateepari atua–e paitꞌee. Jĩpꞌa beeitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre ome. Mamĩda Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa teeitꞌee pada ichimaa wẽe baitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre ichi te waibɨade baparikꞌa, ichi Jaure bapari parã ome. Maperã parã iru tékꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ.

Maperã apidaapa parãmaa ijãa amaapiruta pɨrã Cristode maa–e pɨrã oo amaapiruta pɨrã Cristopa parãmaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ kꞌachia ooitꞌee. Mãga ooitꞌee, parã jɨrɨtꞌera atada perã ichi–itꞌee, ichi te waibɨakꞌa pꞌanadamerã.

Pãchi itu kꞌũrapináatɨ. Parãdepema apidaapa kꞌĩsiadaikꞌaraa bɨ ãchi kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãkꞌa. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee pɨkꞌa pꞌanadaipia bɨ na eujãdepemaarã kꞌĩrapite, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi kꞌĩsia parãmaa kꞌawapimerã.
Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãpa jaradakꞌãri ãchia ne–inaa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ, Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee ãchi kꞌĩsiadoopa pariatua pedeepata. Tachia mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ iru Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawa bɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãpa kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanɨ chĩara kꞌũradaitꞌee.’
Ichiaba iru Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãpa jõmaweda kꞌawa pꞌanɨ choo–e paitꞌee.’

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga jara bairã, apida audua pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ kꞌĩsia pꞌanadairã ãchi eerepema jarateeparita pipɨara bɨ apemaarã jarateepataarã kꞌãyaara. Jõmaarãpa parã aukꞌa kꞌaripapata, ma–itꞌee Akꞌõrepa ãra pëida perã parãmaa.

Irua mɨ, Pablo, Apolo mãikꞌaapa Pedro pëiji taipa Cristopa ooda jarateedamerã. Mãga ooji parã awaraa Cristode ijãapataarã ome pipɨara pꞌanapataadamerã Cristopa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujã ooji tachi aɨde pꞌanapataadamerã. Tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji ɨtꞌaa wãdamerã jai–idaadakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa pipɨara pꞌanapataadamerã na eujãde pꞌanɨ misa.
Ma jõma ooji tachi–itꞌee, tachi Cristodeerã perã mãikꞌaapa Cristo iru Warra perã.
Parãpa tai Cristo–itꞌee mimiapataarãkꞌa iru pꞌanadaipia bɨ, iruata tai jarateede pëida perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bada; ne–inaa eperãarãmaa naaweda jara–e pada.
Irua tai mãgá pëida perã, chokꞌekꞌee pꞌanadaipia bɨ.
Parã maa–e pɨrã awaraarãpa mɨa ooda mãikꞌaapa jarateeda akꞌɨ kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã kꞌawaadaitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia, akꞌɨdaipia bɨ. Mɨa pꞌua–e bɨ. Mamĩda mɨchia pida mɨa ooda mãgá akꞌɨ–e bɨ.

Cristopa jarateepidakꞌa parã tꞌãide jarateepachi perã, kꞌĩsia pꞌua–e bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Mãga jarakꞌãri, jara kꞌinia–e mɨa maarepida ne–inaa kꞌachia ookꞌaa. Tachi Waibɨapata mɨa oopata akꞌɨitꞌee mãikꞌaapa jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia.

Mãgá mɨa ooda Cristopata akꞌɨitꞌee perã, ¿sãapꞌeda taipa oopata akꞌɨ kꞌinia pꞌanɨma parãpa, Cristo cheitꞌee ewate pai naaweda? Ma ewate ichiata kꞌawapiitꞌee ne–inaa jõma eperãarãpa waide kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ; ne–inaa eperãarãpa ãchi tꞌãridepai kꞌĩsia pꞌanadapꞌedaa paara, na pꞌekꞌau eujãde nipadakꞌãri. Maapꞌeda ne–inaa pia oodapꞌedaa pari teeitꞌee ichia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ.

Ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, ma jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mɨ Apolo ome akꞌɨdaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa, pãchi kꞌĩradoopa akꞌɨdai kꞌãyaara. Mɨa mãga jara bɨ parãpa pedee audua pedeenaadamerã pãchi jarateepari ãpɨte, pedee kꞌachia pedee pꞌanɨ misa awaraarã jarateepari ãpɨte.
¿Kꞌaipa parã bɨjima chĩara akꞌɨpataarã? Tachi Akꞌõrépata parã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaapipari mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa oo kꞌawaapipari. Pãchi kꞌĩradoopa mãga oodakꞌaa. Mãga bɨta, ¿sãapꞌeda audua pedeepatama?

Parã audua pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ. Mamĩda mãgá pꞌanɨ. Mɨ–itꞌee parã pꞌaratꞌara beerã́kꞌata pꞌanɨ, ne–inaa jõma iru pꞌanadairã; maarepida faltada–ee. Ma awara nãgaweda reyrã́kꞌata pꞌanɨ Cristo ome. Mapa iru jarateepataarãpa jarateeruta waa ũri kꞌiniadakꞌaa. ¡Taawa reyrãkꞌa pꞌanakꞌajida, tai jida mãga pꞌanadaitꞌee aukꞌa!

Mamĩda mãga–e. Mɨ–itꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai, ichia jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã, ekꞌariara papiji. Eperãarãpa awaraarã peedaitꞌee pꞌanɨkꞌa jõmaarã taide, mãga pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ tai. Jõmaarãpa akꞌɨ kꞌinia pꞌanapata jãgɨ́ eperãarã miapiruta. Mãga pɨkꞌa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema jõmaarãpa tai chupɨria jõnɨ akꞌɨpata, angeleerãpa paara.

Tai kꞌĩra kꞌawa–ee pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ, Cristo–itꞌee mimiapata perã. Jõdee parã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaara pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨda apata perã. Taipa makꞌɨara kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ, tai kꞌĩsiadoopa kꞌĩsia pꞌanadairã. Mamĩda parãpa jõmaweda kꞌawa pꞌanɨda apata. Jõmaarãpa parã kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ, tꞌãri pia pꞌanadairã. Jõdee tai kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanɨ, jõmaarã ekꞌariara pꞌanadairã.

Taipa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jaratee pꞌaneedakꞌãriipa, mata atꞌãri jarra oopata mãikꞌaapa opisia choopata; pꞌaru sore jɨ̃pata. Ma awara ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa tai pꞌua oopata. Te jida wẽe pꞌanɨ, awara ãi jarateede nipapata perã.
Tachi juadoopa mimiapata, ɨ̃ida–ee. Awaraarãpa taimaa ikꞌachia jaradakꞌãri, chõo jɨrɨdakꞌaa. Jĩpꞌa Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata ãchi pari. Tai jɨrɨdakꞌãri miapidaitꞌee, taipa choopata.
Tai ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jaradakꞌãri, ãchimaa tꞌãri pia pedeepata. Mamĩda tai kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapata. Ãchi–itꞌee tai ne–inaa mikꞌiakꞌa pꞌanɨ. Mãgá tai iru pꞌanajida. Mata atꞌãri mãgá iru pꞌanɨ.
Ma etꞌewa jarada pꞌã–e paji parã kꞌĩra nejasiapiitꞌee. Ũraaitꞌeeta pꞌãji akꞌõrepa ichi warra kꞌinia iru bɨ ũraaparikꞌa.

Mɨa mãga jara bɨ mɨ–itꞌee parã mɨ warrarãkꞌa pꞌanadairã. Jarateepataarã chokꞌaraarãpa jarateedai Cristopa parãmaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ. Mamĩda mɨa naapɨara jarateenaji Cristo parã pari piuda. Mãgá irude ijãajida. Maperãpɨ mɨ parã akꞌõrekꞌa bɨ.
Maperã oodaipia bɨ mɨa oo bɨkꞌa.

Mapa Timoteo pëiru parã kꞌaripanamerã. Iru mɨ warra kꞌiniakꞌa ichiaba, mɨa naapɨara jarateeda perã Cristo iru pari piuda. Irua oopari Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mapa iru parãmaa pëiru, kꞌirãpapimerã mɨ sãga bapari Cristo jua ekꞌari. Mɨa oopari Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa ijãapataarã para bee chaa jarateepari jõmaarãpa mãga oodamerã.
Parãdepema ũkꞌuru audua pꞌanɨ kꞌĩsia pꞌanadairã mɨ waa parãmaa wã–e. Mamĩda mãga–e.

Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã, makꞌɨara taarã–e jãmaa wãitꞌee. Pakꞌãri, mɨa kꞌawaaitꞌee mãgɨ́ audua beerãpa jara jõnɨ. Mamĩda ma kꞌãyaara waapɨara mɨa nãga kꞌawa kꞌinia bɨ. ¿Ãchia oo pꞌanɨkꞌã wa ooda–e pꞌanɨ Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa?
Parãpa kꞌawadaipia bɨ Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨda apataarãpa oodaipia bɨ irua oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãga oodakꞌãri, akꞌɨpipata pedeepapai ijãa kꞌiniada–e. Jĩpꞌa pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanapata Cristo jua ekꞌari.
Mɨ parãmaa wãkꞌãri, ¿kꞌãata kꞌinia pꞌanɨma; ɨtrɨamerã wa pedee sia pedeemerã?
Ɨ̃rá mɨa jaraitꞌee mɨmaa nepɨrɨdapꞌedaa. Parã tꞌãide abaapa ichi nawekꞌaa chi wẽrakꞌa iru bɨ. ¡Ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa pida mãgee kꞌachia oodakꞌaa!

Mamĩda parã atꞌãri audua pꞌanɨ, kꞌĩsia pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa oo pꞌanɨ. Audua pꞌanadai kꞌãyaara, kꞌĩsia pꞌua pꞌanadaipia bɨ mãgɨ́ kꞌachia oomaa bairã parã ijãapataarã tꞌãide. Ma eperã pãchi ikꞌaawaapa ãyaa pëidaipia bɨ.
Mɨ parã ome ba–e paitꞌee mĩda, mɨ kꞌĩsia parã ome baitꞌee. Tachi Waibɨa Jesupa mɨmaa kꞌawapiji kꞌãata oodaipia bɨ ma eperã ome.
Mapa mɨ kꞌĩsia aupai baitꞌee mĩda parã ome, irua aukꞌa mãga kꞌawapiitꞌee parãmaa chipꞌedaidakꞌãri irumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daitꞌee.

Jõma ijãapataarã see nɨ̃bakꞌãri, ma eperã pãchimãiipa ãyaa wãpítɨ, Satanapa iru kꞌapꞌɨa kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ miapimerã maa–e pɨrã piupimerã. Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru jaure ɨtꞌaa ateei Tachi Waibɨa Jesús cheitꞌee ewate.
Audua pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ ma kꞌachia oomaa bɨ misa parã tꞌãide. Jõmaarãpa nãgɨ́ pedee kꞌawa pꞌanɨ: “Levadura ma–ãriipa pan masa jõmaweda waridaipari.”

Tai judiorãpa Pascua fiesta oodai naaweda, levadura jõmaweda iru pꞌanɨ tai tede batꞌakꞌoopata, ma fiestade pan levadura wẽe kꞌodaitꞌee. Mãga pɨkꞌa parãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jõmaweda unu pꞌanɨ parã tꞌãide oo amaadaipia bɨ, kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Wãara parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, Cristo piuda perã pãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiitꞌee. Pascua fiestadepema oveja chakꞌekꞌa bɨ piuji Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi miapinaamerã tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa.

Cristo mãgá piuda perã, pꞌanadáma irua oopi bɨkꞌa. Apidaapa kꞌachia oodaikꞌaraa bɨ Cristode ijãadai naaweda oopatapꞌedaakꞌa. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa wãarata jarapataadaipia bɨ.
Mɨa naaweda kꞌartꞌa pꞌãdade jaraji kꞌõpꞌãyo meraanaadamerã wẽraarã maa–e pɨrã ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã pariatua pꞌekꞌau ooyaa beerã ome.

Mãga jarakꞌãri, jara kꞌinia–e baji ãyaa pꞌaneedamerã nãgee ijãadakꞌaa beerã ikꞌaawaapa: pariatua pꞌekꞌau oopataarã; pꞌaratꞌa waapɨara iru pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrã; nechɨapataarã maa–e pɨrã awaraa akꞌõre waibɨa apatade ijãapataarã. Mãgeerã ikꞌaawaapa ãyaa pꞌaneedapꞌedaa paara, ichita uchiadaitꞌee paji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdeepa.

Nãgɨ́ pꞌãrupa mɨa jaraitꞌee kꞌãata jara kꞌinia baji apema kꞌartꞌade. Kꞌõpꞌãyo meraanáatɨ ijãapataarãda apata mĩda, nãga oopataarã ome: pariatua pꞌekꞌau ooyaa beerã; pꞌaratꞌa waapɨara iru pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrã; awaraa akꞌõre waibɨa apatamaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataarã; awaraarã ãpɨte ikꞌachia jarapataarã; itꞌua toyaa beerã maa–e pɨrã nechɨapataarã ome. Mãgeerãmaa pꞌasianáatɨ mãikꞌaapa pãchimaa chepináatɨ. Nekꞌode paara tꞌĩudaikꞌaraa bɨ mãgeerã ome.

Mãga jara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi bɨ–e pada perã ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa oo pꞌanɨ akꞌɨdamerã. Ichiata mãɨrãpa oopatapꞌedaa akꞌɨitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ãchi miapiitꞌee. Mamĩda tachia akꞌɨdaipia bɨ awaraarãpa oo pꞌanɨ tachi ijãapataarã tꞌãide, ijãadakꞌaa beerãkꞌa pꞌanaruta pɨrã. Maperãpɨ parãpa chi kꞌachia ooyaa beerã ãyaa wãpidaipia bɨ pãchi ikꞌaawaapa, Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa:
‘Jëretꞌáatɨ chi kꞌachia ooyaa beerã pãchi ikꞌaawaapa.’
Ɨ̃rá mɨa jaraitꞌee kꞌãata oodaipia bɨ parã nepɨrade pꞌanadakꞌãri. Parãdepema nepɨra iru bakꞌãri awaraa ijãapari ome, ijãadakꞌaa beerã charraarãmaa wãikꞌaraa bɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara ijãapataarãmaa wãipia bɨ.

¿Parãpa kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã tachi Cristo ome araa pꞌanɨɨrãpa iru pari akꞌɨdaitꞌee ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa ne–inaa oopatapꞌedaa jaradaitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia? Mãga bɨta, ¿sãapꞌeda pꞌoyaa akꞌɨda–ema ijãapataarã nepɨra makꞌɨara waibɨa–e bɨta parã tꞌãide?
¿Kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã tachia ichiaba angeleerã akꞌɨdaitꞌee? Mãga pɨrã, ¡ɨ̃rapema nepɨra pãchi pitapai akꞌɨdai!
Mãgá parã awaraa ijãapataarã ome nepɨrade baaidakꞌãri, charraarã ijãadakꞌaa beerãmaa wãdai kꞌãyaara, wãdaipia bɨ charraarã ijãapataarãmaa.

Nãgɨ́ jararupa parã kꞌĩra nejasiapi kꞌinia bɨ. ¿Pia bɨkꞌã chõopikꞌa para baitꞌee pãchi pitapai, ma awara mãgee charraarã kꞌĩrapite wãdaitꞌee? ¿Apida parãdepemapa ijãapataarã nepɨra pꞌoyaa akꞌɨda–ekꞌã?
¡Parã mãgá chõo pɨkꞌa para bairã, kꞌachia oomaa pꞌanɨ! Ma kꞌãyaara piara bakꞌaji awaraarãpa parã nepɨrade baaipidamerã. Maa–e pɨrã piara bakꞌaji awaraarãpa parã kꞌũradamerã.
Mamĩda mãga–e. ¡Parã́pata nepɨra jɨrɨpata awaraarã ome mãikꞌaapa awaraarã kꞌũrapata, parã ɨ̃pemaarã mĩda Cristo kꞌaurepa!

¿Parãpa kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã kꞌachia oopataarã wãda–e paitꞌee Akꞌõre eujãdee ichideerã ome? Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai ijãadakꞌaa beerãkꞌa pꞌanadai, nãgeerã wãdakꞌaa perã Tachi Akꞌõre eujãdee: prostitutaarã; ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataarã awaraa akꞌõre waibɨa apatamaa; miakꞌãi pꞌanɨɨrã awaraarã ome kꞌãipataarã; ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã awaraa ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã ome kꞌãipataarã, ɨmɨkꞌĩra wẽra ome kꞌãi bɨkꞌa;
nechɨapataarã; pꞌaratꞌa waapɨara iru pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrã; itꞌua toyaa beerã; ikꞌachia jarapataarã awaraarã ãpɨte maa–e pɨrã kꞌũrayaa beerã awaraarã netꞌaa atadaitꞌee.

Ijãadai naaweda, parã ũkꞌuru mãgá pꞌanapachida. Mamĩda Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristode ijãadakꞌãri, iru piuda kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa wẽpapiji parãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa. Ichiaba parã awara bɨji ichi–itꞌee, ichi Jaure pëikꞌãri parã ome bapariimerã mãikꞌaapa oopimerã Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mãga ooji parã ichi kꞌĩrapite pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanadamerã.

Eperãarãpa jarapata: “Ne–inaa jõma ooi mɨchia oo kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.” Mamĩda ma ne–inaa kꞌachia bɨ pɨrã, maarepida mɨ kꞌaripa–e paitꞌee. Ne–inaa jõma ooi. Mamĩda mãga oo kꞌinia bɨ kꞌaurepa mɨa oo–e pɨrã Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa, ma ne–inaa jua ekꞌari bapariitꞌee, Cristo jua ekꞌari bai kꞌãyaara.

Ichiaba jarapata: “Chikꞌo iru pꞌanɨ kꞌodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa bi iru pꞌanɨ ma chikꞌo aɨde banamerã.” Mamĩda na ewari Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma omee weda jõpiitꞌee. Wãara Tachi Akꞌõrepa bi ooji chikꞌo aɨde banamerã. Mamĩda tachi kꞌapꞌɨa oo–e paji pariatua pꞌekꞌau oodamerã. Jĩpꞌa ooji ichi Jaure ma kꞌapꞌɨade bapariimerã mãikꞌaapa tachia oodamerã Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌapꞌɨa jõpi–e paitꞌee. Ma kꞌãyaara ichi ewari waibɨa ewate tachi kꞌapꞌɨa chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiitꞌee Jesucristo kꞌapꞌɨa pꞌirabaipidakꞌa. Mãgá ooi jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bapari perã.

¿Parãpa kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã tachi ijãapataarã araa pꞌaneepata Cristo ome irude ijãadakꞌãri? Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌapꞌɨa ooji ichi Jaure aɨde bapariimerã. Mapa tachi kꞌapꞌɨa araa pꞌanapidaikꞌaraa bɨ prostitutaarã ome.
¿Kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã eperã araa paru pɨrã prostituta ome, mãgɨ́ wẽra ome eperã apai pɨkꞌa paru? Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Mãgá eperã omee weda eperã apai pɨkꞌa pꞌaneedaitꞌee.’
Jõdee eperã Cristode ijãakꞌãri, araa beepari iru ome mãikꞌaapa ma eperã jaure apai pɨkꞌa beepari Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure ome. Tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanapata.

Maperãpɨ pꞌekꞌau oonáatɨ awaraarã ome. Eperãpa awaraa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ookꞌãri, ichi kꞌapꞌɨa araa bapikꞌaa awaraa eperã kꞌapꞌɨa ome. Mamĩda awaraa ome pꞌekꞌau ookꞌãri, ichi kꞌapꞌɨa kꞌachiade baaipipari, ichi kꞌapꞌɨa araa bɨ Cristo ome bɨpari perã awaraa eperã jua ekꞌari, Cristo jua ekꞌari bɨi kꞌãyaara.
¿Kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã Cristode ijãadakꞌãriipa Akꞌõre Jaure tachi kꞌapꞌɨade bapari, Tachi Akꞌõre ichi te waibɨade baparikꞌa? Mapa Tachi Akꞌõreta tachi kꞌapꞌɨa chipari.
Iruata tachi neto pɨkꞌa ataji ichi Warra apai iru bada pëikꞌãri piumerã tachi pari. Mapa parã ichideerã perã, kꞌachia oo amáatɨ. Mãgá ooruta pɨrã, akꞌɨpidai wãara oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ irua oopi bɨkꞌa.
Ɨ̃rá mɨa pꞌanautꞌee parãpa kꞌartꞌa pꞌãdapꞌedaade iidi pëidapꞌedaa. Naapɨara iidijida chisãgɨta pipɨara bɨ ijãapari–itꞌee, miakꞌãiitꞌee maa–e pɨrã tuu baitꞌee. Mɨ–itꞌee piara bɨ tuu baitꞌee.
Mamĩda ɨmɨkꞌĩra tuu bakꞌãri, wẽraarã ome pariatua pꞌekꞌau oo nipai. Maperã ɨmɨkꞌĩrapa ichi wẽra iru baipia bɨ; wẽrapa pida ichi ɨmɨkꞌĩra iru baipia bɨ.
Ɨmɨkꞌĩrapa ichi kꞌapꞌɨa wãakꞌaikꞌaraa bɨ chi wẽramaa; wẽrapa pida ichiaba ichi kꞌapꞌɨa wãakꞌaikꞌaraa bɨ chi ɨmɨkꞌĩramaa.
Mãgá pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ wẽra kꞌapꞌɨa chi ɨmɨkꞌĩra–itꞌee perã mãikꞌaapa ɨmɨkꞌĩra kꞌapꞌɨa chi wẽra–itꞌee perã.

Jĩpꞌa Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ kꞌiniapa pedeeteeruta pɨrã, ma ewate araa kꞌãida–e paitꞌee. Mãga pꞌanadakꞌãri, ãra kꞌapꞌɨa wãakꞌadai. Mamĩda aɨ tꞌẽepai waya kꞌãidaipia bɨ, Satanapa kꞌachia oopiamaapa awaraa ome, pꞌoyaa chooda–e pꞌanadairã.
Mɨa mãga kꞌĩsia bɨ. Pãchia jɨrɨdaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨ parãmaa.
Mɨ–itꞌee pipɨara bakꞌaji jõmaweda mɨkꞌa pꞌanadamerã. Mamĩda kꞌawa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripai ijãapari chaa kꞌawaamerã miakꞌãipia bɨ wa mãga–e.
Mɨa ũraaitꞌee ɨmɨkꞌĩra tuu beerãmaa, wẽra tuu beerãmaa mãikꞌaapa pꞌẽtrãa tuu beerãmaa mɨkꞌa pꞌanadamerã.
Mamĩda miakꞌãi kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã, miakꞌã́itɨ, pꞌekꞌau oo kꞌinia pꞌanadai kꞌãyaara.

Ichiaba Tachi Waibɨapa jarapi bɨkꞌa mɨa jara bɨ: wẽrapa ichi ɨmɨkꞌĩra amaaikꞌaraa bɨ. Aukꞌa ɨmɨkꞌĩrapa ichi wẽra amaaikꞌaraa bɨ. Mamĩda mãga ooruta pɨrã, miakꞌãidaikꞌaraa bɨ awaraarã ome. Ma kꞌãyaara waya araa padaipia bɨ ãchi naaweda pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa.

Ɨ̃rá mɨa ũraaitꞌee ijãapataarã miakꞌãi pꞌanadapꞌedaa ijãadakꞌaa beerã ome, Cristode ijãadai naaweda. Cristopa jaratee–e paji kꞌãata oodaipia bɨ. Mamĩda mɨa nãga ũraaitꞌee. Eperã Cristode ijãaparipa wẽra ijãakꞌaa bɨ iru bɨ pɨrã, amaaikꞌaraa bɨ, chi wẽra iru ome ba kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã.
Ichiaba wẽrapa ɨmɨkꞌĩra ijãakꞌaa bɨ iru bɨ pɨrã, amaaikꞌaraa bɨ, chi ɨmɨkꞌĩrapa iru ome ba kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã.

Ijãapari araa bakꞌãri ijãakꞌaa bɨ ome, eperã apai pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ. Mãga bɨta, Tachi Akꞌõrepa chi ijãakꞌaa bɨ pia akꞌɨpari ma ijãapari kꞌaurepa. Mãgá ichiaba Akꞌõrepa ãchi warrarã pia akꞌɨpari ma ijãapari kꞌaurepa.
Mamĩda ma ijãakꞌaa bɨpa chi Cristode ijãapari amaa kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã, mãga oonaapáde adaikꞌaraa bɨ, iru kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bapiamaapa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨ ichideerã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadamerã.

Jõdee ma ijãaparipa chi ijãakꞌaa bɨ pëi kꞌinia–e bɨ pɨrã, chooipia bɨ. Mãga ooru pɨrã, aɨ tꞌẽepai iru kꞌaurepa mãgɨpa Cristode ijãai. Parã ijãapataarãpa kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ chisãgɨ́ ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa ijãadai parãpa kꞌaripapata perã. Tachi Akꞌõrepapai kꞌawa bɨ.
Ɨ̃rá mɨa nãga ũraaitꞌee. Parãpa jɨrɨdakꞌãri Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨ parãmaa, pꞌanadaipia bɨ parã pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ijãapikꞌãri. Mɨa mãga jarateepari ijãapataarã jõmaarãmaa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristode ijãapiru pɨrã ɨmɨkꞌĩra tauchaa iru bɨ ichi kꞌapꞌɨade, ma eperãpa meraikꞌaraa bɨ ma tauchaa iru bɨ. Jõdee ichi kꞌapꞌɨade tauchaa wẽe bɨ pɨrã ijãakꞌãri, tauchaa bɨpiikꞌaraa bɨ.
Mɨa mãga jara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee pꞌua–e bairã eperãpa tauchaa iru bɨ wa wẽe bɨ. Jĩpꞌa Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨ tachia oodamerã ichia jara bɨkꞌa.
Maperã awara baikꞌaraa bɨ pɨchi naaweda bada kꞌãyaara, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ijãapikꞌãri.
Esclavo paji pɨrã ijãa beekꞌãri, kꞌĩsianáaji pɨ eperã jua ekꞌari bɨ perã. Jõdee chiparipa pɨ pëi kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã, kꞌãiwee uchíaji.

Esclavopa Cristode ijãakꞌãri, atꞌãri chipari iru bɨ mĩda, esclavo–ee pɨkꞌa beepari, Cristopa iru uchia atada perã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌariipa. Jõdee esclavo–ee bɨpa Cristode ijãakꞌãri, Cristo esclavokꞌa beepari, irua oopi bɨkꞌa oopari perã.

Cristopa parã neto pɨkꞌa ataji ichi waa kurusode batꞌakꞌãri. Mãgá ichi piuji parãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiitꞌee mãikꞌaapa parã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataitꞌee atuanaadamerã. Maperãpɨ parã ichideerã. Maperã óotɨ irua oopi bɨkꞌa, oodai kꞌãyaara eperãarãpa oopi kꞌinia pꞌanɨkꞌa.
Mapa ɨ̃pemaarã, mɨa etꞌewa jaradakꞌa pꞌanadaipia bɨ pãchi ijãadai naaweda pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa.

Ɨ̃rá mɨa pꞌanautꞌee tuu beerãpa iidi pëidapꞌedaa. Mɨa pꞌoyaa jara–e Cristopa jarapida, irua nãgɨ́ jaratee–e pada perã. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ chupɨria kꞌawaapꞌeda, Cristode ijãapiji mãikꞌaapa iru ũraa mɨmaa jarateepiji. Maperã parãpa na ũraa ũridaipia bɨ.
Ɨ̃rapema ijãapataarã miapi iru pꞌanadairã, mɨ–itꞌee pipɨara bɨ tuu baitꞌee.
Wẽra iru bɨ pɨrã, yiaraa iru baikꞌaraa bɨ. Jõdee wẽe bɨ pɨrã, jɨrɨikꞌaraa bɨ.

Mamĩda miakꞌãiru pɨrã, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo–e bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Ichiaba wẽra tuu bɨpa ɨmɨkꞌĩra ataru pɨrã, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo–e bɨ. Mamĩda chi miakꞌãirutaarã audú miadaitꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa. Mapa mɨa jara bɨ pipɨara bɨ tuu baitꞌee.
Ɨ̃pemaarã, mɨa mãga jara bɨ kꞌĩsia bairã taarã–e Cristo cheitꞌee. Mãga nɨ pꞌanɨde miakꞌãi pꞌanɨɨrã pꞌanadaipia bɨ tuu beerãkꞌa; chi Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa oo pꞌanɨɨrãkꞌa.

Ma awara tꞌãri pꞌua pꞌanɨɨrã maa–e pɨrã o–ĩa pꞌanɨɨrãpa kꞌĩsiadaipia bɨ Cristopa ãchimaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ, ãchi kꞌĩsiade iru pꞌanɨ kꞌãyaara. Ichiaba ne–inaa neto atapataarãpa kꞌirãpadaipia bɨ ãchia netꞌaa atada ateeda–e paitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre eujãdee.

Ma awara ne–inaa netopataarãpa kꞌirãpadaipia bɨ ãchia pꞌaratꞌa jitadapꞌedaa ne–inaa neto pëidapꞌedaa pari ɨtꞌaa ateeda–e paitꞌee. Ma pꞌaratꞌa mãikꞌaapa netꞌaa jɨrɨdai kꞌãyaara, Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨ jɨrɨdaipia bɨ, na pꞌekꞌau eujã mãikꞌaapa jõma aɨde nɨ̃bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jõpiitꞌee perã.
Mɨa nãga ũraaitꞌee kꞌĩsia jõnanaadamerã. Ɨmɨkꞌĩra tuu bɨpa jɨrɨpari ooitꞌee Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Mamĩda miakꞌãi bɨ kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bapari na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema netꞌaade mãikꞌaapa chi wẽra o–ĩa bapiitꞌee.

Mãgɨ́ ɨmɨkꞌĩrapa aukꞌa oo kꞌinia bairã Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨ mãikꞌaapa chi wẽrapa oopi kꞌinia bɨ, audú kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bɨ chi tuu bɨ kꞌãyaara. Ichiaba wẽra ɨmɨkꞌĩra wẽe bɨpa kꞌawa kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ooitꞌee ichi ome. Mamĩda chi miakꞌãi bɨpa kꞌawa kꞌinia bɨ chi ɨmɨkꞌĩrapa oopi kꞌinia bɨ, mãga ooitꞌee chi kꞌima o–ĩa bamerã.
Mãga jaraji parã kꞌaripaitꞌee pia pꞌanapataadamerã mãikꞌaapa pãchi tꞌãripa Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa oodamerã.

Ɨmɨkꞌĩra tuu bɨpa pedeeru pɨrã miakꞌãiitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌapꞌɨapa choo–e bɨ pɨrã wẽra wẽe baitꞌee maa–e pɨrã ma wẽra pedeeteeda tꞌãri pꞌuapi kꞌinia–e bɨ pɨrã, miakꞌãipia bɨ. Mãga ooru pɨrã, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo–e bɨ.
Mamĩda ichi tꞌãride miakꞌãi kꞌinia–e bɨ pɨrã mãgɨ́ wẽra ome mãikꞌaapa kꞌapꞌɨapa choo bɨ pɨrã, miakꞌãikꞌaraa bɨ.
Mãpai ma miakꞌãi kꞌinia bɨpa pia kꞌĩsia bɨ. Mamĩda ma miakꞌãi kꞌinia–e bɨpa pipɨara kꞌĩsia bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ wẽra miakꞌãi bɨpa awaraa jɨrɨikꞌaraa bɨ, ichi ɨmɨkꞌĩra chokꞌai bɨ misa. Jõdee ichi kꞌima piukꞌãri, pia bɨ waya jɨrɨmerã, mamĩda Cristode ijãapari jɨrɨipia bɨ.
Mamĩda mɨa kꞌĩsia bɨ ma pꞌẽtrãa tꞌãri o–ĩara bai miakꞌãi–ee beeru pɨrã. Mãga kꞌĩsia bɨ mɨa. Mɨmaa Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa ichiaba kꞌĩsiapipari.

Ɨ̃rá mɨa pꞌanautꞌee parãpa iidi pëidapꞌedaa kꞌawaadaitꞌee kꞌodaipia bɨ wa kꞌodaikꞌaraa bɨ nechiara ata bɨdapꞌedaa primisiakꞌa awaraa akꞌõre waibɨa apata kꞌĩrapite. Mamĩda mãgɨ́ pꞌanau naaweda, kꞌinia bɨ parãpa kꞌirãpadamerã audua pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ kꞌawa pꞌanadairã ne–inaa ooda aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata Tachi Akꞌõre–e. Audua pꞌanadai kꞌãyaara, tachia kꞌinia iru pꞌanadaipia bɨ mãgee netꞌaade atꞌãri ijãa pꞌanɨɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõre pia kꞌawada–e pꞌanadairã. Mãgá oo pꞌanɨ pɨrã, ãchi kꞌaripadai Tachi Akꞌõre pipɨara kꞌawaadamerã.
Eperãpa kꞌĩsia bɨ pɨrã ichiata ne–inaa kꞌawa bɨ, wãara makꞌɨara kꞌawa–e bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichimaa kꞌawapi kꞌinia bɨ.
Mamĩda eperãpa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia iru bɨ pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawa bɨ ma eperã wãara irude ijãapari.

Mãgara ¿kꞌodaipia bɨkꞌã wa kꞌodaikꞌaraa bɨ nechiara ata bɨdapꞌedaa ne–inaa akꞌõre waibɨa apata kꞌĩrapite? Tachi ijãapataarãpa pia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mãgee ne–inaa juapa ooda Tachi Akꞌõre–e, aɨ kꞌĩrapite eperãarã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ pꞌanɨ mĩda, ãchi akꞌõre waibɨa jĩakꞌaapa. Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mãgee ne–inaa Tachi Akꞌõre–e, iru apai perã.

Ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa ijãapata atanede maa–e pɨrã akꞌõrejĩrude maa–e pɨrã awaraa ne–inaade, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema wa pajãdepema, ãchi akꞌõre waibɨarã jĩakꞌaapa. (Mãga pada paara, “akꞌõre waibɨarã” chokꞌara paraakꞌaji.)

Mamĩda tachi ijãapataarã–itꞌee Tachi Akꞌõreta Akꞌõre Waibɨa. Ijãapata irua ne–inaa jõmaweda ooji, eperãarã paara. Ma jõmaweda oopiji ichi Warra Jesucristomaa, tachia irude ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa irua oopi bɨkꞌa oodamerã.

Tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ne–inaa aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata Tachi Akꞌõre–e. Mamĩda awaraarãpa waide pia kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ. Ewaa ijãa pꞌanɨɨrãpa mãgee ne–inaa atꞌãri iru pꞌanɨ ãchi naawedapema iru pꞌanapatapꞌedaa akꞌõre waibɨakꞌa. Maperã ãchidepemapa kꞌoru pɨrã nechiara awaraarãpa bɨdapꞌedaa mãgee ne–inaa kꞌĩrapite, mãgɨ́ kꞌĩsia pꞌuadarii, ma nechiara kꞌorupa mãgɨ́ akꞌõre waibɨa apata atꞌãri waawee bai jĩakꞌaapa. Ma awara kꞌĩsia pꞌua bai waide kꞌawa–e bairã Cristode ijãa bɨde pia wa kꞌachia kꞌoitꞌee mãgee nechiara.

Parã, chi kꞌawa beerãpa mãgee ne–inaa Tachi Akꞌõre–e, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma nechiara kꞌo beerã pipɨara beerãkꞌa akꞌɨ–e paitꞌee. Ichiaba ma nechiara kꞌoamaa beerã ekꞌariara beerãkꞌa akꞌɨ–e paitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi ijãapataarã jõmaweda aukꞌa ichideerãkꞌa akꞌɨpari.
Mamĩda, mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨde, kꞌĩrakꞌaupai kꞌĩsia pꞌuapidai maa–e pɨrã ne–inaa kꞌachia oopidai chi mãga waide pia kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨɨrãmaa.
Kꞌĩsíatɨ nãgɨde. Chi mãga pia kꞌawa–e bɨpa parã unuru pɨrã mãgee ne–inaa bɨmãi nekꞌomaa pꞌanɨ, aukꞌa kꞌo kꞌiniadarii. Mãpai kꞌoru pɨrã, kꞌachiade baaii, kꞌĩsia bairã ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa bɨ.

Mãgá parãpa akꞌɨpi kꞌinia pꞌanadairã kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mãgee ne–inaa Tachi Akꞌõre–e, chi waide mãga pia kꞌawa–e bɨ kꞌachiade baaipidai. Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai pãchi ɨ̃pemamaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopidai, Cristo ichiaba piuda perã iru kꞌaripaitꞌee.
Mãgá pãchi ɨ̃pemaarãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopidakꞌãri, kꞌachia oomaa pꞌanɨ Cristo kꞌĩrapite.
Maperã mɨ ɨ̃pema kꞌachiade baairu pɨrã ne–inaa kꞌoparii kꞌaurepa, mãgara mɨa waa nechiara kꞌo–e paitꞌee. Ne–inaa kꞌachia oopi kꞌinia–e bɨ mɨchi ɨ̃pemaarãmaa mɨa nechiara kꞌo bɨ kꞌaurepa.

Ne–inaa jõmaweda ooi mɨchia oo kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda jĩpꞌa oo kꞌinia bɨ Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa, irua mɨ ichi ũraa jarateede pëida perã. Awaraa Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãkꞌa, mɨa ichiaba Tachi Waibɨa Jesús unuji mɨchi taupa. Parãpa pida Cristode ijãapata, mɨa parãmaa jarateenada perã irua ooda parã kꞌaripaitꞌee.

Ũkꞌuruurãpa ijãada–e pꞌanɨ mɨ Cristopa pëida. Mãɨrãpa akꞌɨ kꞌinia pꞌanɨ mɨa oopata mãikꞌaapa jarateepata mɨ ɨmɨateedaitꞌee. Mamĩda parã tꞌãidepema mɨa jarateeda ijãadapꞌedaarãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Cristopa mɨ pëiji, mɨ kꞌaurepa Cristo ome araa pꞌanapata perã.
Chi ijãada–e pꞌanɨɨrãpa kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã Cristopa mɨ pëida wa mãga–e, parã pꞌanapata akꞌɨdaipia bɨ.
Cristopa mɨ wãara pëida perã, irude ijãapataarãpa chikꞌo mãikꞌaapa pania mɨmaa teedaipia bɨ. ¿Wãara–ekꞌã?

Awaraa Cristopa pëida eperãarã, Pedropa mãikꞌaapa Cristo ɨ̃pemaarãpa ãchi wẽraarã Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨ ateepata awara ãyaa wãdakꞌãri. Mãga wãdakꞌãri, ijãapataarãpa ãra kꞌaripapata. ¿Parãpa aukꞌa mɨ ome mãgá ookꞌajida–ekꞌã, wẽra iru bada paara?
¿Pia bɨkꞌã mɨ Bernabé ome mimiadamerã chikꞌo iru pꞌanadaitꞌee? ¿Pia–e bakꞌajikꞌã taipa jarateepata ũrirutaarãpa kꞌaripadamerã?

¡Kꞌĩsíatɨ! Eperã soldao pakꞌãri, chikꞌo mãikꞌaapa awaraa netꞌaa irumaa pari teepata. Ichiaba eperãpa ne–uuda chaukꞌãri, ichia madepema pari kꞌopari. Ichiaba ne–animalaarã wariparipa kꞌopari ichia wari bɨdepema. Mãgapɨ pꞌanɨ tai jida ichiaba.
Mɨchi kꞌĩsiadoopa mãga jara–e bɨ. Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa Moisemaa pꞌãpidade ichiaba mãga jara bɨ:
‘Pꞌakꞌa itꞌai jɨ̃náatɨ trigo tꞌɨamaa bakꞌãri. Ita–aria kꞌopítɨ.’
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga jarakꞌãri, pꞌakꞌa aupai ichi kꞌĩsiade iru ba–e paji.

Jĩpꞌa tai, ichi mimia oopataarãta, ichi kꞌĩsiade iru baji, kꞌinia bairã awaraa ijãapataarãpa tai kꞌaripadamerã ne–inaa wẽe pꞌanadakꞌãri. Ne–uupataarãpa ne–uu chauda pꞌepataarã ome aukꞌa jita kꞌinia pꞌanɨ ãchi mimia pari.
Mãga pɨkꞌa taipa jarateedakꞌãri Cristopa ooda parã kꞌaripaitꞌee, aukꞌa jita kꞌinia pꞌanɨ chikꞌo mãikꞌaapa pania parã juadepema.
Awaraarãmaa tee pꞌanɨ pɨrã, ¿ichiaba taimaa teedaipia bɨ–ekꞌã?
Mamĩda tachi juadoopa mimiapata, parãmaa ne–inaa iidida–e paitꞌee. Mãga oopata parãpa kꞌĩsianaadamerã taipa jarateepata ne–inaa falta pꞌanɨ atadaitꞌee.
Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨadepema altarmãi mimiapataarãpa mãikꞌaapa ne–animalaarã paapataarãpa kꞌopata eperãarãpa aneepatadepema paapidaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee.
Mãga pɨkꞌa Cristopa jaraji ichi ũraa jarateepataarãpa ne–inaa jitadaipia bɨ awaraa ijãapataarã juadeepa.
Mamĩda mɨa parãmaa maarepida iidi–e paji mãikꞌaapa atꞌãri iidi–e bɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara piu baibeei jarrapa parãmaa kꞌĩsiapii kꞌãyaara mɨa Cristo mimia oo bɨ ne–inaa ataitꞌee.

Mamĩda mɨ pipɨara bɨ–e apemaarã pëida eperãarã kꞌãyaara, ne–iidi–e bairã. Cristopata mɨ pëiji ichi ũraa jarateede. Maperãpɨ mɨa jarateepari. Waawee bakꞌaji, jaratee–e pada paara irua oopi bɨkꞌa, irua mɨ miapii jĩakꞌaapa.

Ma awara mɨchi kꞌinia jarateeda paara, ne–inaa ata kꞌinia bakꞌaji na mimia pari. Mamĩda mãga–e. Mɨa na mimia oopari Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mapa maarepida mɨmaa teeda–e pꞌanɨ mĩda, jĩpꞌa jarateeitꞌee, ma–itꞌeeta Cristopa mɨ jɨrɨtꞌerada perã.
Mɨa maarepida parãmaa teepi–e paitꞌee. Nãgapai mɨa kꞌinia bɨ. Mɨchi tꞌãripa na mimia oo kꞌinia bɨ Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Mɨa jõmaweda ooi Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa, eperãarã esclavo–e perã. Mamĩda mɨ eperãarã esclavokꞌa padaipari nãga perã. Ba kꞌinia bɨ mɨa jaratee bɨ ũri pꞌanɨɨrã pꞌanapatakꞌa, ma jaratee bɨ ũridakꞌãri, Cristode ijãadamerã.

Judiorã tꞌãide jaratee nipakꞌãri, ãrapa oopatakꞌa oopari. Ichiaba Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa oopari. Cristode ijãadakꞌãriipa mɨ mãgɨ́ ũraa pꞌãda jua ekꞌari bɨ–e mĩda, mãga oopari ãrapa irude ijãadamerã.
Jõdee judio–eerã tꞌãide jaratee nipakꞌãri, oopari ãrapa oopatakꞌa. Mamĩda Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oopari, ãrapa ichiaba Cristode ijãadamerã.

Ma awara Cristode pia ijãada–e pꞌanɨɨrã jarateekꞌãri, jarateekꞌaa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨpa jarateeparikꞌa. Ãrapa kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨkꞌa mɨa kꞌĩsiapari mãikꞌaapa jĩpꞌa jarateepari, ãrapa Tachi Akꞌõre pipɨara kꞌawaadamerã mãikꞌaapa waapɨara Cristode ijãadamerã. Mɨchi wãrumaa mãga oo bɨ, kꞌinia bairã mɨa jaratee bɨ ũrirutaarãpa Cristode ijãadamerã.
Ma kꞌaurepa ijãa pꞌanɨ pɨrã, mɨ ome aukꞌa kꞌawaadai jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ichideerã–itꞌee.

Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ pꞌirapataarã pꞌiradakꞌãri, jõmaweda isapai pꞌirapata, ata kꞌinia pꞌanadairã ne–inaa teepata chi naapɨara panarumaa. Mãga pɨkꞌa parã pꞌanadaipia bɨ, ne–inaa oomaa pꞌanɨde Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãgá atadai Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ teeitꞌee Cristode ijãapataarãmaa.

Eperã pꞌiraitꞌee pakꞌãri, ichi kꞌapꞌɨa pia akꞌɨpari. Ewari chaa pꞌirapari ĩyapaa–e paitꞌee apemaarã ome pꞌirakꞌãri. Pꞌirapataarã jõmaarãpa mãgá oopata, naapɨara pana kꞌinia pꞌanadairã atadaitꞌee poro jɨ̃ra kꞌirudee ooda; taarã chookꞌaa bɨta. Mãga pɨkꞌa tachia oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ oo amaapata mãikꞌaapa Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa oopata atadaitꞌee ɨtꞌaripema poro jɨ̃ra; Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ teeitꞌee ichideerãmaa; mãgɨ́ ne–inaa jõkꞌaa bɨ.
Mapa mɨa ookꞌaa pꞌirapari pariatua pꞌiraparikꞌa maa–e pɨrã boxeo chõoparikꞌa nãu aupai sĩkꞌãri. Jĩpꞌa tꞌãripa mɨa oopari Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Mɨchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa ne–inaa oo kꞌinia bakꞌãri, mãga oopikꞌaa nãga perã. Mɨchi kꞌiniapai ooru pɨrã, kꞌĩra nejasia baitꞌee ɨtꞌari panakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Ma awara mãga ooru pɨrã, Cristopa ne–inaa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ teeitꞌee ichideerãmaa mɨmaa tee–e paitꞌee, mɨa awaraarãmaa jaratee baji mĩda na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bɨ misa.

Ɨ̃rá ɨ̃pemaarã, kꞌirãpapiitꞌee sãga chonaarãweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi judiorã chonaarã akꞌɨpachi. Jɨ̃araradeepa ãra jõmaweda akꞌɨ bapachi Egiptodeepa uchiadakꞌãri. Ma awara ãra jõmaweda sĩapiji Mar Rojo esajĩakꞌa pꞌoodade.

Ma jɨ̃araradeepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa o jara wãji ãramaa Moisés kꞌapꞌɨa pari mãikꞌaapa iru kꞌapꞌɨa pari ãra kꞌaripaji Mar Rojo sĩadamerã. Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra jõmaweda Moisés jua ekꞌari bɨji, tachi ijãapataarã Cristo jua ekꞌari bɨparikꞌa ijãadapꞌeda, poro choopidakꞌãri.
Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõrepa
mãikꞌaapa topiji pania mãudeepa uchiapida. Cristo mãgɨ́ mã́ukꞌata baji, ichideepa uchiapachi perã Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure kꞌaripade ãra wãrutamaa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma jõma oopachi mĩda ãra kꞌaripaitꞌee, ooda–e pꞌanapachida irua oopi kꞌinia badakꞌa. Mapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa perá jõmaweda piupiji, eujã pania wẽe bɨde wãyaarutade.

Tachia mãgɨ́ chonaarãpa oodapꞌedaade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, kꞌawaadaipia bɨ ãrapa oodapꞌedaa kꞌachia baji Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Mapa kꞌĩrakꞌaupai mãgá oodai ãrapa oodapꞌedaakꞌa. ¡Oonaadáma tachia ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨkꞌa!
Ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃náatɨ ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite, chonaarã ũkꞌuruurãpa oopatapꞌedaakꞌa. Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Eperãarãpa fiesta oojida ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite, aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata. Ma–itꞌee nekꞌojida, ne–inaa tojida, maapꞌeda pëirajida.’
Ichiaba pariatua pꞌekꞌau oonáatɨ, ma kꞌaurepa ewari abaade Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãradepemaarã veintitrés mil kꞌiniipida perã.
Ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩraupináatɨ ãradepemaarãpa oodapꞌedaakꞌa, jaradakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra pꞌoyaa pia akꞌɨ–e paji. Maperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa taamaarã pëiji kꞌaakꞌoodamerã. Mapa chokꞌara piujida.
Ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõre ãpɨte ikꞌachia pedeenáatɨ ãradepemaarãpa oodapꞌedaakꞌa. Mãga oodapꞌedaa perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ɨtꞌariipa ichi ángel pëiji; mãgɨpa chokꞌara peemerã.

Tachi chonaarã mãgá pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, pia akꞌɨdaipia bɨ ãrapa oodapꞌedaa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ oodapꞌedaa pꞌãpida perã ichi ũraa pꞌãdade, tachia kꞌawaadamerã mãikꞌaapa aukꞌa oonaadamerã, nɨ pꞌanɨ misa na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõru.
Mãpai parã tꞌãidepemapa kꞌĩsia bɨ pɨrã ichiata oopari Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa, kꞌĩrakꞌaupai ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi.

Edaare tachi tꞌãridepai kꞌĩsia pꞌaneepata ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee. Ma awara netuarapa kꞌĩsiapipari ne–inaa kꞌachia oodamerã. Mãga pꞌasapari jõmaarã ome. Mamĩda mãga pꞌasakꞌãri parã ome, ijãadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripaitꞌee choodamerã, kꞌachia ooda–ee.
Maperã, ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, parãpa kꞌĩsiaruta pɨrã wãdaitꞌee awaraa akꞌõre waibɨa apata kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃de, ¡mãgá oonáatɨ!
Parã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanɨ. Mapa kꞌĩsiadaipia bɨ mɨa jara bɨde kꞌawaadaitꞌee seewa maa–e pɨrã wãara.

¡Kꞌĩsíatɨ! ¿Kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨma tachia oopata, vino todakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa pan kꞌodakꞌãri kꞌirãpadaitꞌee Jesucristo piuda tachi pari? Todai naaweda mãikꞌaapa kꞌodai naaweda, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata Tachi Akꞌõremaa jaradaitꞌee iru tꞌãri pia bɨ Cristo tachi pari piupida perã. Ma vino todakꞌãri, kꞌirãpa pꞌanɨ Cristo waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa, tachi araa pꞌanapata iru ome. Ichiaba ma pan kꞌodakꞌãri, kꞌirãpa pꞌanɨ Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa piuda kꞌaurepa tachi araa pꞌanapata apemaarã Cristode ijãapataarã ome.
Tachi chokꞌara pꞌanɨ mĩda, mãgɨ́ pan kꞌodakꞌãri, eperã apai pɨkꞌa pꞌanapata Cristo piuda kꞌaurepa, iru ome tachi chaachaa araa pꞌanapata perã.

¡Kꞌĩsíatɨ! Israel pidaarãpa ne–animalaarã ateedakꞌãri paapidaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre altarmãi, akꞌɨpipata irude ijãa pꞌanɨ. Ma awara mãgɨ́ ne–animalaarãdepema kꞌodakꞌãri, akꞌɨpipata ãchi Tachi Akꞌõredeerã.
Ma jaradapa mɨa jara kꞌinia–e bɨ ne–inaa aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata Tachi Akꞌõrekꞌa bɨ. Ichiaba jara kꞌinia–e bɨ nechiara ata bɨdapꞌedaa ma kꞌĩrapite pipɨara bɨ awaraa nechiara kꞌãyaara.

Ma kꞌãyaara jara kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa nechiara kꞌodai naaweda, bɨruta pɨrã ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite, akꞌɨpipata mãgɨde ijãa pꞌanɨ, tachia Cristode ijãapatakꞌa. Mamĩda mãga oodakꞌãri, wãara ooda–e ãchi akꞌõre waibɨa apata–itꞌee. Jĩpꞌa oopata netuaraarã–itꞌee, mãgee ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata netuarade perã. Maperã parã wãnáatɨ mãgɨ́ ne–inaa aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patamaa kꞌodaitꞌee nechiara ata bɨdapꞌedaa ma ne–inaa kꞌĩrapite. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, akꞌɨpi pꞌanɨ araa pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanɨ netuaraarã ome. ¡Mɨa mãga kꞌinia–e bɨ!

¿Parã araa pꞌanadaipia bɨkꞌã netuara ome? ¡Mãgá oodaikꞌaraa bɨ, Cristo waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa iru ome araa pꞌanapata perã! ¿Netuara eere pꞌanɨɨrã ome kꞌodaipia bɨkꞌã nechiara netuaramaa teeda? Mãga oodaikꞌaraa bɨ, Cristode ijãapataarã ome araa pꞌanapata perã iru piuda kꞌaurepa.
¡Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩraupináatɨ omee weda oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨpa! ¿Kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨkꞌã Tachi Akꞌõre pꞌoyaadai, irua parã miapinaamerã?

“Mɨchia oo kꞌiniata ooitꞌeeda” apata. Mamĩda ma ne–inaa kꞌachia bɨ pɨrã, tachia apida kꞌaripada–e paitꞌee. Tachia ne–inaa oodaipia bɨ jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pipɨara kꞌawaadamerã mãikꞌaapa oodamerã Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa.
Apidaapa ne–inaa oodaikꞌaraa bɨ ichi–itꞌee aupai. Ichiaba ooipia bɨ awaraarã kꞌaripaitꞌee.
Nechiara netodakꞌãri chi netopatamãi, iidináatɨ mãgɨ́ nechiara ata bɨjida ne–inaa kꞌĩrapite wa mãga–e. Kꞌawaa ataruta pɨrã ma nechiara ata bɨdapꞌedaa ne–inaa kꞌĩrapite, kꞌĩsia pꞌuadariitꞌee.
Mãga iididaikꞌaraa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Na pꞌekꞌau eujã mãikꞌaapa jõmaweda aɨde nɨ̃bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, ichiata ooda perã.’

Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraade mãga jara bairã, Cristode ijãakꞌaa bɨpa parãdepema aba atee kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã ichi temaa nekꞌode, mãikꞌaapa pɨ wã kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã, wã́ji mãikꞌaapa kꞌóji ãrapa teeruta. Kꞌĩsianáaji mãikꞌaapa iidináaji ma nechiara ata bɨjida ne–inaa kꞌĩrapite wa mãga–e.

Mamĩda mama bɨde awaraapa pɨmaa jarai: “Nãgɨ́ nechiara ata bɨjida ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite, aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata”. Mãga jararu pɨrã, pɨa ma nechiara kꞌoikꞌaraa bɨ, mãgɨ́ eperã kꞌĩsia pꞌuapiamaapa.
Mɨa mãga jara–e bɨ pɨ kꞌĩsia pꞌua bai jĩakꞌaapa; jĩpꞌa chi apemamaa kꞌĩsiapiamaapa parãpa kꞌachia oodai mãgɨ́ nechiara kꞌoruta pɨrã.
Mamĩda pɨa iidii: “¿Kꞌãare–itꞌee mɨa ooipia bɨma awaraarãpa oopi kꞌinia pꞌanɨkꞌa, ãchi kꞌĩsia pꞌua pꞌanadairã?
¿Pia–e bɨkꞌã, Tachi Akꞌõremaa gracias jarapꞌeda kꞌoitꞌee ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo? Pia bɨ pɨrã, ¿mɨa, sãapꞌeda ooima awaraapa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa?” Mɨa jaraitꞌee sãapꞌeda mãga oodaipia bɨ.
Tachia ne–inaa kꞌodakꞌãri maa–e pɨrã todakꞌãri maa–e pɨrã ne–inaa awaraa oodakꞌãri, jõmaweda oodaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, jõmaarãpa iru waaweedamerã.
Mapa parãpa piata oodaipia bɨ judiorã kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa judio–eerã kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa awaraa ijãapataarã kꞌĩrapite, ne–inaa kꞌachia oo kꞌinia pꞌananaadamerã parã kꞌaurepa.
Mɨa jɨrɨpari mãga ooitꞌee. Ne–inaa oo–e mɨchi–itꞌee aupai. Jõma oopari awaraarã kꞌaripaitꞌee, ãrapa Cristode ijãadamerã. Mãgá irua ãra o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atai.
Óotɨ mɨa ooparikꞌa, mɨa oopari perã Cristopa jarateedakꞌa na pꞌekꞌau eujãde nipakꞌãri.
Ɨ̃rá mɨa jara kꞌinia bɨ parãpa pia oo pꞌanɨ, kꞌirãpa pꞌanadairã mɨ sãga bapari parã ome bakꞌãri. Mɨ o–ĩa bɨ parã ome, atꞌãri oopata perã mɨa jarateedakꞌa.

Mamĩda kꞌinia bɨ parãpa pipɨara kꞌawaadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Cristo iru jua ekꞌari bɨ mãikꞌaapa ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã Cristo jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa wẽraarã ãchi ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨ.

Maperã parã ijãapataarã chipꞌedaidakꞌãri, ɨmɨkꞌĩrapa ichi poro wãkꞌaikꞌaraa bɨ ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa bakꞌãri maa–e pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapiru jaramaa bakꞌãri. Ichi poro wãkꞌaru pɨrã, akꞌɨpiitꞌee ichia waawee–e ichi poro waibɨa Cristo.

Jõdee wẽrapa ne–inaa ichi porode jɨ̃ipia bɨ, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃kꞌãri maa–e pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapiru jarakꞌãri. Ichia wãkꞌapari jɨ̃–e bɨ pɨrã, akꞌɨpii ichi ɨmɨkꞌĩra waawee–e bɨ. Ma awara awaraarãpa mãgɨ́ wẽra akꞌɨdakꞌaa paitꞌee wẽra piakꞌa, wẽra poro wẽpida pia akꞌɨdakꞌaa perã.

Mãgɨ́ ijãapari wẽrapa ichi porode ne–inaa wãkꞌapari jɨ̃ kꞌinia–e bɨ pɨrã, ¿pipɨara bakꞌaji–ekꞌã ichi puda jida tꞌɨɨpitꞌaamerã maa–e pɨrã wẽpitꞌaamerã, wẽra kꞌachia beerã ome oopatakꞌa? Mamĩda kꞌĩra nejasia bɨ pɨrã mãgá baitꞌee jõmaarã kꞌĩrapite, mãgara puda tꞌɨɨpiikꞌaraa bɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara ne–inaa wãkꞌapari ichi porode jɨ̃ipia bɨ.

Pia jaraitꞌeera, ɨmɨkꞌĩrapa ichi poro wãkꞌaikꞌaraa bɨ ichi Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrakꞌa bairã mãikꞌaapa ichi Tachi Akꞌõrepa bɨda perã na pꞌekꞌau eujãde nɨ̃bɨ poro waibɨa bamerã. Jõdee wẽrapa ichi poro wãkꞌaipia bɨ akꞌɨpiitꞌee ɨmɨkꞌĩra ichi poro waibɨa.
Mɨa mãga jara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperã ookꞌãri, ɨmɨkꞌĩra naapɨara ooda perã, maapꞌeda wẽra ooji mãgɨ́ ɨmɨkꞌĩra orrodeepa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ ɨmɨkꞌĩra oo–e paji wẽra kꞌaripamerã; jĩpꞌa wẽrata ooji ɨmɨkꞌĩra kꞌaripamerã.

Maperã wẽra Cristode ijãapari pɨrã, ichi poro wãkꞌaipia bɨ. Mãga ookꞌãri, akꞌɨpipari Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa iru angeleerã kꞌĩrapite, ichi bapari ɨmɨkꞌĩra jua ekꞌari mãikꞌaapa Cristo jua ekꞌari.
Mamĩda Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, wẽra ɨmɨkꞌĩra ome aukꞌa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Mapa chikꞌaripa pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ.

Tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mãgá aukꞌa pꞌanɨ omee weda uchiadapꞌedaa perã Tachi Akꞌõre juadeepa. Chi naapema wẽra uchiaji chi naapema ɨmɨkꞌĩradeepa. Mamãikꞌaapata ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã uchiapata wẽraarãdeepa tꞌodakꞌãri.
Mãpai, parã́pata akꞌɨdaipia bɨ kꞌawaadaitꞌee pia bɨ wa pia–e bɨ ijãapari wẽra ne–inaa wãkꞌapari wẽe porode ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃merã Tachi Akꞌõremaa.
Ma awara pãchia oopatade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ pia–e bɨ ɨmɨkꞌĩra puda waree bamerã.
Jõdee wẽra puda waree bakꞌãri, kꞌĩra wãree unupata. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgá waripi–e paji kꞌĩra wãree aupai akꞌɨdamerã; jĩpꞌa akꞌɨpiitꞌee wẽra ichi ɨmɨkꞌĩra jua ekꞌari bɨ.
Apidaapa mɨa jara aupada ijãa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã, ijãanáatɨ. Mamĩda kꞌawaadaipia bɨ taipa jõmaarãmaa mãga jarateepata. Ma awara ijãapataarã apemaarãpa oopata ma jarateepatakꞌa.

Ɨ̃rá ũraaitꞌee sãga oodaipia bɨ parã ijãapataarã cheepurudakꞌãri Cristo piuda kꞌirãpadaitꞌee. Aɨ naawedapemakꞌa pꞌoyaa jara–e pãchia pia oomaa pꞌanɨ, mãgá ooda–e pꞌanadairã. Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oodai kꞌãyaara, ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa pꞌanɨ.
Mãga jara bɨ mɨmaa nepɨrɨdapꞌedaa perã parãdepema ũkꞌuru cheepurudakꞌãri, ne–inaa jedekꞌodakꞌaa aukꞌa kꞌĩsiada–e pꞌanadairã. Mapa awara–awaraa nekꞌopata. Kꞌĩsia bɨ wãara ũkꞌuru mɨmaa nepɨrɨdapꞌedaa.
Mamĩda mãgá parãdepema ũkꞌuruurãpa pãchia oo kꞌiniata ooda–e pada paara, kꞌawa–e pakꞌaji chisãgɨɨrãpa wãara oopata Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa, iru kꞌinia iru pꞌanapata perã.
Mãgá pariatua kꞌo pꞌanɨkꞌa kꞌodaikꞌaraa bɨ. ¡Mãgá Cristo piuda kꞌirãpadakꞌaa!

Mɨmaa nepɨrɨjida parãdepemaarã ũkꞌuru cheepurudakꞌãri ne–inaa jedekꞌodaitꞌee, apemaarã ijãapataarã nɨda–ee. Maperãpɨ ijãapataarã ũkꞌuru jarra oopata. Jõdee awaraarãpa kꞌopata bi jãwaadarutamaa mãikꞌaapa vino topata piu pꞌaneerutamaa.

Chi mãga oopataarãmaa iidi kꞌinia bɨ: ¿Pãchi te wẽe pꞌanɨkꞌã nekꞌodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa todaitꞌee? ¿Waaweeda–e pꞌanɨkꞌã pãchi ĩgreste, chi araa che pꞌanɨɨrã jida ichiaba? ¿Chupɨria chedeerã kꞌĩra nejasiapi kꞌinia pꞌanɨkꞌã? ¿Kꞌãata parãmaa jaraima? ¿Pia oo pꞌanɨkꞌã? ¡Mãga–epɨ!
Jesucristopa mɨmaa jarateeda, mɨa jõdee parãmaa jarateeji. Aɨ ewate pꞌãrikꞌua Jesús traicionaadai naaweda, nekꞌomaa pꞌanɨde ichia pan ataji
mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ji gracias jaraitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõremaa. Ma pan kꞌõratꞌaaji jedeitꞌee mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:
—Nãgɨ́ pan mɨ kꞌapꞌɨa, mɨ peepiitꞌee perã parã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Nãgá pan kꞌodakꞌãri, kꞌopatáatɨ kꞌirãpadaitꞌee mɨ piuda parã pari.
Mãgá ichiaba, nekꞌo aupadapꞌeda, Jesupa vino copa jitaji mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:

—Nãgɨ́ vino mɨ waa, mɨchi waa batꞌaitꞌee perã mɨ piukꞌãri eperãarã pari. Tachi Akꞌõrepa nãgɨ́ ũraa chiwidi jara bɨ. Mɨchi waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa irua wẽpapiitꞌee parãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata mãikꞌaapa mɨchideerã papiitꞌee. Nãgá vino todakꞌãri, topatáatɨ kꞌirãpadaitꞌee mɨa ooitꞌee bɨ eperãarã pari.
Mãga jarada perã Jesucristopa, tachia ma pan kꞌodakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa ma vino todakꞌãri, kꞌirãpapata Cristo piuda tachi pari. Mãgá oo pꞌanadaitꞌee, iru waya cheru misa.
Mãga jõmaarãmaa akꞌɨpipata perã, eperãpa ma pan pariatua kꞌoru pɨrã maa–e pɨrã ma vino pariatua toru pɨrã, kꞌachia oomaa bɨ, ichi–itꞌee pꞌua–e bairã Cristo piuda jõmaarã pari.
Maperãpɨ Cristode ijãapari chaa ma pan kꞌoi naaweda mãikꞌaapa ma vino toi naaweda, ichi tꞌãridepai kꞌĩsiaipia bɨ kꞌawaaitꞌee wãara kꞌoru mãikꞌaapa toru kꞌirãpaitꞌee Cristo piuda ichi pari wa mãga–e.
Mãgá ooipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa miapiitꞌee perã ma pan pariatua kꞌopataarã mãikꞌaapa ma vino pariatua topataarã, chikꞌo jĩpꞌaa kꞌopatakꞌa.
Parãdepema chokꞌara mãgá pariatua kꞌopata perã, kꞌayaa pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa ũkꞌuru jai–idaa pꞌanɨ.
Mamĩda mãgɨ́ kꞌodai naaweda mãikꞌaapa todai naaweda, kꞌĩsiaruta pɨrã oo amaadaitꞌee tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi miapi–e paitꞌee.

Mãga oodakꞌãri, pariatua kꞌoda–e paitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõrepa miapipari ma pan pariatua kꞌopataarã mãikꞌaapa ma vino pariatua topataarã, ãchia kꞌawaadamerã irua oopi kꞌinia bɨ. Mãga kꞌawaadakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa oodakꞌãri, irua ãchi kꞌaripaitꞌee atuanaadamerã ijãadakꞌaa beerãkꞌa, eperãarã jõmaweda panadakꞌãri iru kꞌĩrapite.
Mapa ɨ̃pemaarã, cheepurudakꞌãri pan kꞌodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa vino todaitꞌee Cristo piuda kꞌirãpadaitꞌee, nɨpatáatɨ jõmaweda cherutamaa, chikꞌinia ne–inaa jedekꞌodaitꞌee.
Apida jarrapisia bɨ pɨrã, chei naaweda, ichi temãi nekꞌoipia bɨ. Parãpa mãga ooruta pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa miapi–e paitꞌee pariatua kꞌo pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa.
Mɨ parãmaa wãkꞌãri, waapɨara jarateeitꞌee.
Ɨ̃rá ɨ̃pemaarã, pꞌanautꞌee parãpa iidi pëidapꞌedaa. Iidijida kꞌãata oopipari Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa Cristode ijãapataarãmaa. Nãgɨ́ jarateeitꞌee pia kꞌawaadamerã.

Kꞌirãpa pꞌanɨ parã pꞌanapatapꞌedaa Cristode ijãadai naaweda. Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite kꞌachia oopachida ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patapꞌedaa perã ne–inaamaa, Tachi Akꞌõre awara. Mãga oopachida mãgee ne–inaa pedeedakꞌaa beemaa, chokꞌai–e pꞌanɨ mĩda.

Mãga oopachida pia kꞌawadakꞌaa pada perã sãga Cristode ijãadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa sãga oodaitꞌee irua parãmaa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Kꞌawapatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa eperãarãmaa nãga jarapikꞌaa: “Jesús Tachi Akꞌõre Warra–e”. Jĩpꞌa jarapipari: “Jesús Tachi Poro Waibɨa.”
Parãpa kꞌawaadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa Cristode ijãapataarãmaa ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopipari chikꞌaripa pꞌanapataadamerã. Mãga oopari ne–inaa pia oo kꞌinia bairã ijãapataarã–itꞌee.
Ichia ma ne–inaa jõma oopipari Cristo, Tachi Poro Waibɨapa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Ijãapari chaa ma ne–inaa awara ooi ichi kꞌõpꞌãyo kꞌãyaara. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrépata ma ne–inaa ichita ãramaa oopipari.
Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa ma ne–inaa awara–awaraa oopipari Cristode ijãapataarãmaa, ãchi chikꞌaripa pꞌanapataadamerã.
Abaamaa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaapipari jarateemerã ne–inaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawapi kꞌinia bɨ. Awaraarãmaa pipɨara kꞌawapipari Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida, mãga jarateemerã.
Ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa waapɨara ijãapipari Cristode ijãa bɨmaa, kꞌawaamerã wãara uchiaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa, waide unu–e bɨ mĩda. Ichiaba awaraarãmaa kꞌayaa beerã jɨpapipari.

Ma awara awaraarãmaa ne–inaa oopipari eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa. Awaraarãmaa jarapipari Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa. Awaraarãmaa kꞌawapipari eperãpa wãara jaratee bɨ Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa wa netuarapa oopi bɨkꞌa. Awaraarãmaa pedeepipari irua kꞌawa–e bɨ pedeede, jarateemerã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa mãgá pedee bɨpa. Awaraarãmaa kꞌawapipari kꞌãata jara bɨ ma eperãpa, pedee irua kꞌawa–e bɨta pedeekꞌãri, jõmaarãpa kꞌawaadamerã irua jara kꞌinia bɨ.
Mãgá oopari Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa. Irua aupaita kꞌawapipari Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨ ichide ijãapataarãmaa.

Ɨ̃rá jaraitꞌee sãapꞌeda Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa mãgá ne–inaa awara–awaraa oopipari Cristode ijãapataarãmaa. Tachi kꞌapꞌɨa apai bɨ mĩda, aɨde nãgee paraa: bɨɨrɨ, poro, jua, tꞌãri; jãga bee chokꞌara. Mãga pɨkꞌa Cristo apai bɨ mĩda, irude ijãapataarã araa pꞌanapata iru ome. Kꞌapꞌɨa apai pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ, chokꞌara pꞌanɨ mĩda.

Tachi ijãapataarã mãga pꞌanɨ ijãapari chaa Cristode ijãa beekꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa iru araa bapipari perã apemaarã ijãapataarã ome. Aukꞌa oopari judiorã ome, judio–eerã ome, esclavoorã ome, esclavo–eerã ome. Mãga oopari, chokꞌara pꞌanɨ mĩda, apai pɨkꞌa pꞌanadamerã Cristo ome. Mapa tachia poro choopipata akꞌɨpidaitꞌee araa pꞌanɨ Cristo ome Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure kꞌaurepa.

Tachi eperã kꞌapꞌɨade bɨ poro, jua, bɨɨrɨ mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri. Jãgee jõmaarãpa kꞌaripapata tachia ne–inaa oodamerã. Mãga pɨkꞌa tachi ijãapataarã chokꞌara pꞌanɨ mĩda, chikꞌaripa pꞌanapata Cristo–itꞌee ne–inaa oodaitꞌee.
Kꞌĩsiadáma nãgɨde. Tachi bɨɨrɨ pedeeda paara, jarakꞌaji: “Juapa mɨ kꞌãyaara ne–inaa chokꞌaraara oopari perã, mɨ makꞌɨara servi–e bɨ na kꞌapꞌɨade.” Mãga jarakꞌaji mĩda, atꞌãri tachi kꞌapꞌɨade bɨ.
Maa–e pɨrã tachi kꞌɨɨrɨ pedeeda paara, jarakꞌaji: “Tau mɨ kꞌãyaara pipɨara bairã, mɨ makꞌɨara servi–e bɨ na kꞌapꞌɨade.” Mãga jarakꞌaji mĩda, atꞌãri tachi kꞌapꞌɨade bɨ.
Tachi kꞌapꞌɨa jõma tau pada paara, kꞌɨɨrɨ wẽ–e pakꞌaji ũridaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa jõma kꞌɨɨrɨ pada paara, kꞌɨ̃ wẽ–e pakꞌaji ɨ̃daitꞌee.
Mamĩda mãga–e. Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌapꞌɨade nɨ̃bɨ jõmaweda bɨji mãgɨ́ bɨmãi, ichia kꞌĩsia iru badakꞌa.
Tachi kꞌapꞌɨa jõmaweda bɨɨrɨ maa–e pɨrã jua maa–e pɨrã tau pada paara, kꞌapꞌɨa wẽe pꞌanakꞌajida.
Mamĩda mãga–e. Ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo paraa mĩda, ichita kꞌapꞌɨa apai bɨ.
Tachi kꞌapꞌɨa mãga bɨ perã, tachi tau pedee kꞌawaa bada paara, pꞌoyaa jara–e pakꞌaji juamaa: “Mɨa pɨ kꞌinia–e”. Poropa pida pꞌoyaa jara–e pakꞌaji bɨɨrɨmaa: “Mɨa pɨ kꞌinia–e.”
Ma kꞌãyaara ne–inaa jõma tachi kꞌapꞌɨade, makꞌɨara pꞌoyaa ooda–e pɨkꞌa kꞌedee paara, aukꞌa kꞌaripapata tachi kꞌapꞌɨa chokꞌai bamerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌapꞌɨa pia bamerã.
Ma awara tachi kꞌapꞌɨade nɨ̃bɨ ũkꞌuru pia chi–oopata tachi piara unudamerã. Mamĩda ũkꞌuru awaraarãmaa unupi kꞌiniadakꞌaa. Mapa wãkꞌapata pꞌarupa.
Jõdee chi unupi kꞌinia bɨta taawa iru pꞌanapata. Mãga oopata Tachi Akꞌõrépata tachi kꞌapꞌɨa mãga ooda perã, pipɨara ɨadamerã aɨde nɨ̃bɨ makꞌɨara pꞌoyaa oo–e pɨkꞌa kꞌedee mãikꞌaapa pia–e pɨkꞌa kꞌedee.
Mãga ooji tachi kꞌapꞌɨade nɨ̃bɨ jõma chikꞌaripa pꞌanadamerã.
Tachi kꞌapꞌɨade bɨ apida pꞌua nɨ̃beeru pɨrã, kꞌapꞌɨa jõmaweda miapari ma kꞌaurepa. Jõdee tachi kꞌapꞌɨade nɨ̃bɨ apida pi–ia unuruta pɨrã, kꞌapꞌɨa jõmaweda o–ĩadaipari.
Ma jõma jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachi ijãapataarã Cristo kꞌapꞌɨakꞌa pꞌanɨ, iru ome araa pꞌanapata perã.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌapꞌɨade nɨ̃bɨ chaa mimia awara–awaraa bɨji tachi kꞌaripamerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌapꞌɨa pia pꞌanadamerã. Mãga pɨkꞌa ichi Jaurepa Cristode ijãapataarãmaa mimia awara–awaraa bɨpari, ma mimia oo pꞌanɨde chikꞌaripa pꞌanapataadamerã. Naapɨara bɨpari Jesucristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã pëiitꞌee ichi ũraa jarateede; aɨ eere bɨpari Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa jarapataarã; mãgɨ́ tꞌẽe bɨpari Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepataarã; maapꞌeda ne–inaa oopataarã eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa; kꞌayaa beerã jɨpapataarã; ijãapataarã kꞌaripapataarã; ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarã; pedeepataarã ãchia kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ pedeede.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ijãapataarã jõmaweda jɨrɨtꞌera–e Cristopa pëimerã ichi ũraa jarateede. Ichiaba jõmaarãmaa ichia jarapi bɨkꞌa jarapi–e; jõmaarãpa iru ũraa jarateeda–e; jõmaarãpa ne–inaa ooda–e eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa;
jõmaarãpa kꞌayaa beerã jɨpada–e; jõmaarãpa pedeeda–e ãchia kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ pedeede; jõmaarãpa kꞌawada–e chi pedeerupa jara kꞌinia bɨ ma kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ pedeede.
Maperã parãpa iididaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa parãmaa madepema pipɨara bɨta bɨmerã. Mãgá pipɨara pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Mãgá oo pꞌanɨ mĩda, mɨa akꞌɨpiitꞌee sãga wãara pipɨara pꞌanapataadai.

Pipɨara pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã, chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ. Tachia eperãarã pedee kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo pedee pꞌanɨ mĩda mãikꞌaapa angeleerã pedee paara pedeeruta pɨjida, pari mãga oopata tꞌãripa awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã. Mãga pꞌanaruta pɨrã, tachi ma pedeede pedeedakꞌãri, awaraarãpa ũridai campana pariatua chaaparikꞌa.

Ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa jara pꞌanɨ mĩda mãikꞌaapa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mĩda ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo, Tachi Akꞌõrepa waide jara–e bɨ paara eperãarãmaa, páripɨ pꞌanapata awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã. Ma awara audú ijãaruta pɨjida ee ãyaa bɨrutamaa tachia jararutapa; awaraarã tꞌãripa kꞌinia iru pꞌanada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã, ichi kꞌinia mãga oo pꞌanɨ.

Ma awara tachia netꞌaa iru pꞌanɨ jõmaweda tee pꞌanɨ mĩda chupɨria chedeerãmaa mãikꞌaapa tachi kꞌapꞌɨa paara paapeepiruta pɨjida Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa, tꞌãripa awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã, tachi–itꞌee wẽ–e paitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨdepema, ɨtꞌari panadakꞌãri.

Tachia wãara awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanadakꞌãri, nãga pꞌanapata. Tꞌãridepai choopata. Awaraarãmaa ne–inaa pia oopata. Awaraarã unuamaa iru pꞌanadakꞌaa, ãrapa ne–inaa iru pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa. Ichiaba tachia ooda jõmaarãmaa jaradakꞌaa, ãrapa kꞌĩsiadamerã tachia ne–inaa oo kꞌawaa pꞌanapata. Audua pꞌanadakꞌaa.
Chĩara kꞌĩraupidakꞌaa mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra nejasiapidakꞌaa. Tachi–itꞌee ne–inaa pipɨara jɨrɨdakꞌaa. Isapai kꞌĩraudakꞌaa. Kꞌĩra pꞌu–ua pꞌanadakꞌaa tachimaa chĩarapa ne–inaa kꞌachia ookꞌãri.
O–ĩa pꞌanadakꞌaa unudakꞌãri awaraapa ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa bɨ. Jĩpꞌa o–ĩadaipata irua ookꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëidakꞌa.
Ma awara chĩarapa tachi miapidakꞌãri, choopata ijãapata perã Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌaripaitꞌee. Ijãapata kꞌachia pꞌoyaadai. Tꞌãride ichita choopata awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanadairã.

Mãgá awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanadakꞌãri Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa, ichita chikꞌinia para baitꞌee. Kꞌawáatɨ na ewari Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨ waa wẽ–e paitꞌee. Ma awara chi pedee bɨpa kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ pedee waa ũrida–e paitꞌee. Ichiaba kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanɨɨrãpa jarateepata aukꞌa waa wẽ–e paitꞌee.
Mãgɨ́ jõma na ewari wẽ–e paitꞌee, jõdaitꞌee perã. Tachia waide kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãpa jaratee pꞌanɨ.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ jõmaweda oo aupakꞌãri, waa kꞌawa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadaitꞌee irua jarapi bɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãpa jaratee pꞌanɨ, jõmaweda Cristokꞌa kꞌawadaitꞌee perã.
Warra weda mɨ pedeeji mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩsia iru baji ne–inaa ooitꞌee warrarãpa oopatakꞌa. Mamĩda chona pakꞌãri, oo amaaji mãgee warra weda ne–inaa oopata.

Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa, jĩpꞌa espejo kꞌĩra tꞌawaa bɨde akꞌɨ pꞌanɨkꞌa bɨ, jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ kꞌawada–e pꞌanadairã. Mamĩda Cristo ome pꞌananadakꞌãri, jõmaweda kꞌawadaitꞌee Cristopa kꞌawa bɨkꞌa, kꞌawadaitꞌee perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌawa bɨkꞌa.

Maperã ichita ijãadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopari ichia jara bɨkꞌa. Ichita ijãadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachimaa teeitꞌee ne–inaa jõmaweda ichia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ tachi–itꞌee, ɨtꞌari panadakꞌãri. Ichita awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia iru baparikꞌa. Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee ma jarada õpeedepema chi tꞌẽe jara aupadata pipɨara bɨ jõma apema jara aupada kꞌãyaara.
Mãga pipɨara bairã Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, parãpa awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanadaipia bɨ. Mãga oo pꞌanɨ misa, iididaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa parãmaa jarapimerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa.
Ma kꞌãyaara, iidiruta pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa parã pedeepimerã kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ pedeede, mãgá jarateedakꞌãri, chi ũrirutaarãpa kꞌawada–e pꞌanadai mãgɨ́ jarateeruta. Tachi Akꞌõrepapai kꞌawaitꞌee.

Jõdee Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarapiru pɨrã irua jarapi bɨkꞌa, chi ũrirutaarãpa pia kꞌawaadaitꞌee, ãchi pedeede ũridaitꞌee perã. Mapa oo kꞌinia pꞌanadaitꞌee mãgɨ́ jarateeruta jara pꞌanɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanadaitꞌee oodakꞌãri Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa.
Chi pedee bɨpa ichia kꞌawa–e bɨ pedeede pia oo bɨ ichi–itꞌee. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa jaraparipa apemaarã ijãapataarã kꞌaripapari.

Parã jõmaweda pedeeda paara kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ pedeede, pia bakꞌaji. Mamĩda pipɨara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa jaradamerã, wẽ–e pɨrã apidaapa mãgɨ́ pedee ũridamerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌawapidamerã apema ijãapataarãmaa.

Mapa ɨ̃pemaarã, mɨ parãmaa wãru pɨrã jarateede kꞌawa–e bɨ pedeede, parã kꞌaripa–e paitꞌee. Jõdee wãru pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa jarade maa–e pɨrã Cristo ũraa jarateeru pɨrã, mãgá kꞌawaadai Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨ.

Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ siru chaa kꞌawaa beerãpa mãikꞌaapa arpa chaa kꞌawaa beerãpa pia chaapata chi ũri pꞌanɨɨrãpa kꞌawaadamerã chisãgɨ́ sirupa chaada mãikꞌaapa chisãgɨ́ arpapa chaada. Mamĩda pia chaa kꞌawa–e bɨpa chaakꞌãri, kꞌachia ũridai mãikꞌaapa pia kꞌawada–e pai chisãgɨ́ siru wa chisãgɨ́ arpa.

Ichiaba soldaorãpa trompeta ateepata jura chõonadakꞌãri. Chi chaa kꞌawaa bɨpa chaapari soldaorã chõode uchiadamerã. Mamĩda mãgɨpa pia chaa–e pɨrã, soldaorã chõode uchiada–e pai, kꞌawada–e pꞌanadairã ãchia ũri pꞌanɨ kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨ.
Mãga pɨkꞌa bɨ parã ome. Kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ pedeede pedee pꞌanadakꞌãri, chi ũrirutaarãpa kꞌawada–e pai parãpa jaratee kꞌinia pꞌanɨ. Pipɨara bakꞌaji pãchi ituaba pedeedapꞌedaa paara.
Wãara na pꞌekꞌau eujãde eperãarã pedee chokꞌara awara–awaraa pedee pꞌanɨ. Ma pedee pedeepataarãpa pia kꞌawapata ãchi pedee ũridakꞌãri.
Mamĩda mɨa mãgɨ́ pedee ũri–e bɨ pɨrã, kꞌĩra tewaraakꞌa bai mãgɨ́ pedeepari ome, pꞌoyaa ũri–e bairã mãgɨ́ pedee.
Mãga bɨ parã ome ichiaba. Maperãpɨ iidi kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa parãmaa ne–inaa oopimerã, iididaipia bɨ ne–inaa kꞌaripadaitꞌee apemaarã ijãapataarã.
Mamĩda iidi kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã Akꞌõrepa pedeepimerã kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ pedeede, mãgara ichiaba iididaipia bɨ kꞌawapimerã kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨ mãgɨ́ pedee. Mãgá awaraarãmaa jarateedai.
Mɨa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ru pɨrã kꞌawa–e bɨ pedeede, mɨ jaurepapai kꞌawa bɨ kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨ, araa bapari perã Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure ome. Mamĩda mɨchi kꞌĩsiade kꞌawa–e bɨ.
Mãgara mɨa ¿sãga ooima? Jaurepapai ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃itꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌariitꞌee mɨa kꞌawa–e bɨ pedeede. Mamĩda ma kꞌãyaara pipɨara ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripariitꞌee mɨa kꞌawa bɨ pedeede.
Pɨa pida mãga ooru pɨrã, eperã pɨ ikꞌaawa su–akꞌɨ bɨpa aukꞌa kꞌawaaitꞌee pɨa gracias jara bɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌari bɨ. Mãgá pɨ ome aukꞌa iru ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃i gracias jaraitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõremaa.
Jõdee pɨa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ru pɨrã kꞌawa–e bɨ pedeede, pia bɨ mĩda Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, pɨ ikꞌaawa pꞌanɨɨrã maarepida kꞌaripa–e bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mɨ o–ĩa bɨ, mɨa parã kꞌãyaara pedee chokꞌaraara pedeepari perã, mɨa kꞌawa–e bɨ pedeede. Mãga ooi Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa mãga oopipari perã.

Mamĩda apemaarã ijãapataarã ome bakꞌãri ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃itꞌee Tachi Akꞌõremaa, mɨ–itꞌee pipɨara bɨ pedeeitꞌee pedee joisomaapai arii pꞌanɨɨrã pedeede, pedee diez mil pedeei kꞌãyaara ãrapa kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ pedeede.
Maperã ɨ̃pemaarã, warra chakꞌeerãkꞌa kꞌĩsianáatɨ. Ãrakꞌa pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã, pꞌanadaipia bɨ warra ewaa tꞌodakꞌa; audua–ee. Pia kꞌĩsíatɨ chonaarãpa kꞌĩsiapatakꞌa.
Kꞌirãpátɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:

‘Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨ: “Mɨa Israel pidaarãmaa pedeeitꞌee kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ pedeede kꞌĩra tewaraarã itꞌaideepa. Mamĩda ma Israel pidaarãpa kꞌawa pꞌanadaitꞌee mĩda mɨa mãga oopi bɨ, atꞌãri mɨ pedee ũri kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadaitꞌee.” ’

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga jarada perã, nãga kꞌawaadai. Ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa unuruta pɨjida Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa parãmaa pedeepimaa bɨ pãchia kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ pedeede, ma Israel pidaarãkꞌa ãrapa ũri kꞌiniada–e paitꞌee. Jõdee ijãapataarãpa mãga unudakꞌãri, ũridaitꞌee, kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ mĩda kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨ. Mamĩda ma kꞌãyaara parãpa jararuta pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa ãchi pedeede, audupɨara ũri kꞌinia pꞌanadaitꞌee, ũridaitꞌee perã ãramaa Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨ. Mãga bɨ ijãadakꞌaa beerã ome ichiaba.

Kꞌĩsíatɨ nãgɨde. Parã cheepurudakꞌãri ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daitꞌee, parãdepema ũkꞌuru pedeemaa pꞌaneeruta pɨrã kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ pedeede mãikꞌaapa mãga pꞌanɨde tꞌĩuru pɨrã eperã ijãakꞌaa bɨ maa–e pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa waide kꞌawa–e bɨ, ichia kꞌĩsiai parã jõmaweda kꞌĩra kꞌawa–ee para bɨ.
Jõdee eperã ijãakꞌaa bɨ maa–e pɨrã Akꞌõre Ũraa waide kꞌawa–e bɨ tꞌĩuru pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa jara pꞌanɨde, ũrii ichia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopari Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Maapꞌeda mãgɨde kꞌĩsiakꞌãri, tꞌãri pꞌuadarii mãikꞌaapa ijãai, wa ijãa–e pai. Maapꞌeda bedabaidarii Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃itꞌee mãikꞌaapa jaraitꞌee: “Wãara Tachi Akꞌõre nama parã ome bapari.”

Mãpai ɨ̃pemaarã, nãga oodaipia bɨ chipꞌedaidakꞌãri ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daitꞌee. Ũkꞌuruurãpa Akꞌõre kꞌari kꞌaridaipia bɨ. Awaraarãpa Cristo ũraa jarateedaipia bɨ maa–e pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa jaradaipia bɨ. Awaraarãpa kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ pedeede pedeedaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Awaraarãpa mãgɨ́ pedee jara kꞌinia bɨ jõmaarãmaa kꞌawapidaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Ma jõmaweda oodaipia bɨ ijãapataarã chikꞌaripa pꞌanadamerã.
Ma kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ pedeede pedeepataarã pedeedaipia bɨ aba–abaa, omé maa–e pɨrã õpee pedee auparutamaa. Maapꞌeda mãgɨ́ pedee kꞌawapataarãpa jõmaarãmaa kꞌawapidaipia bɨ ãrapa jaradapꞌedaa.
Apida wẽ–e pɨrã mãgɨ́ pedee kꞌawaapiitꞌee kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨ, mãgara chi mãgá pedee bɨ waa pedeeikꞌaraa bɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara ichi tꞌãridepai pedeeipia bɨ ichi–itꞌee mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee.

Mãgá ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa jarapataarãpa pedee kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã, pedeedaipia bɨ aba–abaa, omé maa–e pɨrã õpee pedee auparutamaa. Apemaarãpa ũridaipia bɨ ãrapa jararuta, kꞌawaadaitꞌee wãara Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapida wa mãga–e.
Abaapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa jara bɨ misa, awaraapa pedee kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã jarapida awara, mãgara ma naa pedee badapa chi tꞌẽepemamaa pedeepiipia bɨ.
Mãga oo pꞌanɨ pɨrã, jõmaarã pedee kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrã pedeedaitꞌee, apemaarã ijãapataarãpa kꞌawaadamerã jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãramaa jara kꞌinia bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa jara bɨpa pariatua pedeeikꞌaraa bɨ. Jĩpꞌa pedeeipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa mãga oopi bakꞌãri.
Mãga oodaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa pariatua oopikꞌaa perã. Oodaipia bɨ awaraa pꞌuurudepema ijãapataarãpa oopatakꞌa.

Mapa ichiaba chipꞌedaidakꞌãri ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daitꞌee, wẽraarã kꞌĩupꞌee pꞌanadaipia bɨ, jarateepataarã mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa jarapataarã pedee pꞌanɨ misa, Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã ãchi ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã jua ekꞌari pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ.
Mapa ãrapa ne–inaa iidi kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã, iididaipia bɨ ãchi ɨmɨkꞌĩramaa teeda panadakꞌãri. Pia–e bɨ pariatua pedeedamerã, awaraarã pedee pꞌanɨ misa.

Aukꞌa kꞌĩsiada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã, kꞌirãpátɨ parãmaa ijãapii naaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa awaraarãmaa ijãapiji mãikꞌaapa kꞌawapiji ichia oopi kꞌinia bɨ chipꞌedaidakꞌãri. Maperã kꞌĩrakꞌaupai pãchia oo kꞌiniata oodai, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawapida oodai kꞌãyaara.

Apida kꞌĩsia bɨ pɨrã ichiata Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa jarapari, maa–e pɨrã ne–inaa awara oopari Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa, kꞌawaaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨmaa jarapiji jõma na pꞌãdade jara bɨ. Mapa ooipia bɨ na ũraade jara bɨkꞌa.
Mamĩda mãgɨ́ eperãpa jara bɨ pɨrã mɨa na pꞌã bɨde jarateemaa bɨ mɨchi kꞌĩsiadoopa, irua jara bɨ ũridaikꞌaraa bɨ.

Mãpai ɨ̃pemaarã, audupɨara iididaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarapimerã Akꞌõrepa jara kꞌinia bɨ ijãapataarãmaa. Mãga nɨde abaapa pedee kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã ichia kꞌawa–e bɨ pedeede, pedeenaapáde adaikꞌaraa bɨ.
Mamĩda ne–inaa jõma oodaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa, pariatua oodai kꞌãyaara.
Ɨ̃rá ɨ̃pemaarã, kꞌirãpapiitꞌee mɨa naaweda jarateeda; jõma Jesucristopa ooda tachi kꞌaripaitꞌee atuanaadamerã. Parãpa mãgɨ́ jarateeda ijãajida; mãgɨta atꞌãri ijãa pꞌanɨ.
Ma jarateeda kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ata wã. Mapa aɨde ijãapataadaipia bɨ. Mãga–e pɨrã, pãchi kꞌinia ijãajida.
Ma jarateeda kꞌawaapꞌeda, mɨa parãmaa jarateeji, jarateeda pipɨara bairã. Nãga bɨ: Cristo piuji tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa.
Ma piuda tꞌẽepai, mãu te uriade ɨajida mãikꞌaapa ewari õpeemaa chokꞌai pꞌirabaiji, Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa.
Ma tꞌẽepai ichia unupiji Pedromaa, maapꞌeda chi apemaarã kꞌõpꞌãyoorãmaa, ichi ome nipapatapꞌedaa na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bɨ misa.
Aɨ tꞌẽepai unupiji quinientos audú see nɨ̃bada ijãapataarãmaa. Mãgɨdepema ũkꞌurupai jai–idaa pꞌanɨ, mamĩda chi apemaarã atꞌãri chokꞌai pꞌanɨ.
Aɨ tꞌẽepai unupiji Santiagomaa. Maapꞌeda unupiji ichia ũraa jarateede pëida eperãarãmaa.
Maapꞌeda, jõmaarã tꞌẽe, mɨmaa ichiaba unupiji, aɨ naaweda mɨ kꞌachia baji mĩda.
Mãga ooji mɨ jõmaweda apemaarã pëida kꞌãyaara ekꞌariara bɨ mĩda. Mɨ–itꞌee piara bakꞌaji Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ jɨrɨtꞌera–e pada paara, mɨa Cristode ijãapataarã miapipachi perã.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌãri pia bapari perã, mɨ kꞌaripaji. Maperã mɨ apemaarã pëida kꞌãyaara mimiara bapari. Mimiakꞌaa mɨchi kꞌĩradoopa. Jĩpꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrépata mɨmaa nãgɨ́ mimia oopipari Cristo–itꞌee.
Mɨ ãra kꞌãyaara audú mimiapari mĩda, taipa aukꞌa jarateepata, ma–itꞌee Cristopa tai pëida perã. Mãgɨ́ jarateedata parãpa ijãajida.

Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristo chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiji, taipa mãga jarateedapꞌedaa perã. Mãga bɨta, ¿sãapꞌeda ũkꞌuru parã tꞌãide pꞌanɨɨrãpa jara pꞌanɨma eperãarã piudapꞌeda chokꞌai pꞌirabaidakꞌaa?
¡Kꞌĩsíatɨ! Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã pꞌoyaa pꞌirabaipi–e pɨrã, mãgara Cristo jida pꞌirabaipi–e pakꞌaji.
Mãgara páripɨ taipa jarateepata Jesucristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Parãpa pida pãchi kꞌinia irude ijãa pꞌanɨ.
Ma awara mãɨrãpa jara pꞌanɨ wãara pɨrã, tai seewa–idaa pꞌanɨ, parãmaa jarateedapꞌedaa perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristo pꞌirabaipiji.
Mãɨrãpa kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã pꞌoyaa pꞌirabaipi–e pɨrã, mãgara Cristo jida pꞌoyaa pꞌirabaipi–e pakꞌaji. Mãgara Cristo atꞌãri piu bakꞌaji.
Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristo pꞌirabaipi–e paji pɨrã, mãgara parãpa páripɨ ijãa pꞌanɨ Cristo piuda kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa pãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapii.
Mãgara awaraa Cristode ijãapataarã jai–idaadapꞌedaarã aukꞌa atuakꞌajida.
Ma jõma wãara pɨrã mãikꞌaapa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepai Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨ pɨrã, ¡tachi jõmaarã kꞌãyaara chupɨriara pꞌanɨ!

Mamĩda mãga–e. ¡Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãara Cristo chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiji! Cristo naapɨara ichita chokꞌai bapariitꞌee, piupꞌeda mãikꞌaapa pꞌirabaipꞌeda. Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga ooda perã Cristo ome, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachi jida ichiaba chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiitꞌee, Cristode ijãapata perã.

Kꞌĩsiadáma nãgɨde. Eperãpa kꞌachia ooda kꞌaurepa, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaweda piupata. Jõdee Tachi Akꞌõrepa awaraa eperã chokꞌai pꞌirabaipida kꞌaurepa, jõmaweda irude ijãapataarã aukꞌa chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiitꞌee.
Pia jaraitꞌeera, Adán kꞌaurepa jõmaarãta piupata. Jõdee Cristo kꞌaurepa jõmaweda irude ijãapataarã jai–idaadapꞌeda, chokꞌai pꞌirabaidaitꞌee.
Mamĩda pꞌirabaidaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨkꞌa. Cristo naapɨara pꞌirabaipiji. Maapꞌeda Cristo cheru ewate irude ijãapataarã aukꞌa pꞌirabaipiitꞌee.

Ma tꞌẽepai na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõitꞌee. Cristopa netuaraarã mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanɨɨrã, chi na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema poro waibɨarã jõmaweda pꞌoyaakꞌãri, mãgɨɨrã ichi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari bɨitꞌee.
Mãga paitꞌee Cristo na eujã poro waibɨa paitꞌee perã, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanɨɨrã jõma bɨrumaa ichi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari.
Mãgá ookꞌãripɨ, eperãarã waa piuda–e paitꞌee.
Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Cristota na pꞌekꞌau eujã poro waibɨa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Ne–inaa jõmaweda pɨ jua ekꞌari bɨji: eperãarã, angeleerã mãikꞌaapa netuaraarã paara.’
Tachi Akꞌõre aupaita Cristo jua ekꞌari ba–e.

Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanɨɨrã pꞌoyaapꞌeda, Tachi Akꞌõre Warrapa ooitꞌee ichi Akꞌõrepa oodakꞌa ichi ome, nejõmaata iru jua ekꞌari bɨkꞌãri. Irua nejõmaata bɨitꞌee ichi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari, ichi kꞌapꞌɨa paara, Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara beemerã.

Ichiaba nãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Cristode ijãapataarã jai–idaadapꞌeda, chokꞌai pꞌirabaidaitꞌee. Pꞌirabaida–e pɨrã, ¿sãapꞌeda eperãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa poro choopipatama ijãapataarã jai–idaadapꞌedaarã pari, chi araada–e padapꞌedaarã poro choopidaitꞌee jai–idaadai naaweda? ¡Mãgɨ́ jai–idaadapꞌedaarã pꞌirabaida–e pɨrã, páripɨ ãra pari poro choopipata!
Ma awara ijãapataarã pꞌirabaida–e pɨrã, ¿sãapꞌeda tai jarateede wãpatama, chi wãrutamaa tai kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanɨ mĩda?
Wãara ewari chaa mɨ peedaitꞌee iru pꞌanɨ, jarateepari perã Cristopa ooda jõmaarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mamĩda wãara mɨ o–ĩa bɨ kꞌawa bairã parãpa Jesucristode ijãa pꞌanɨ.

Ma awara Cristode ijãapataarã pꞌirabaida–e pɨrã, páripɨ mɨ perá piuji Éfeso pꞌuurudepemaarã juapa. Mãgɨɨrã ne–animalaarã kꞌachiarã́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ. Wãara chokꞌai pꞌirabaida–e pɨrã, mãgara pꞌanadáma nãgɨ́ jarapatakꞌa:
‘Nekꞌodáma, ne–inaa todáma mãikꞌaapa tachia oo kꞌiniata oodáma, taarã–e perã jõdaitꞌee.’
¡Mãga–e! Apidaamaa kꞌũrapináatɨ. Wãara jara pꞌanɨ nãga jaradakꞌãri: “Kꞌõpꞌãyo meraa bɨ pɨrã kꞌachia oopataarã ome, aukꞌa oodai.”

¡Pia kꞌĩsíatɨ mãikꞌaapa akꞌɨ́tɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨɨrã parã tꞌãide! Pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oonáatɨ ãchia oo pꞌanɨkꞌa jaradakꞌãri Cristode ijãapataarã pꞌirabaida–e paitꞌee. ¡Mãga jaratee pꞌanɨɨrãpa waide Cristode ijãada–e pꞌanɨ! Mɨa mãga jara bɨ parã kꞌĩra nejasiapiitꞌee.
¿Nãga iidi kꞌinia pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã? “¿Sãga Tachi Akꞌõrepa piudapꞌedaarã pꞌirabaipiitꞌeema? ¿Sãga baima chi kꞌapꞌɨa pꞌirabaida?”
Wãara mãga iidi kꞌinia pꞌanɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawada–e pꞌanadairã. ¿Parãpa nãgɨ́ kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã? Trigo tau maa–e pɨrã awaraa netꞌatau uudakꞌãri, eujãde beraudaipari, tꞌono wãru misa.
Chi kꞌarra uudakꞌaa. Jĩpꞌa chi tauta uupata, trigodee wa awaraa netꞌataudee.
Mãgɨ́ uupꞌeda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tꞌonopipari trigo kꞌarra wa ne–inaa awaraa, ichia kꞌĩsia iru badakꞌa netꞌatau kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo ewaa ookꞌãri.

Mãga ooji awaraa ne–inaa chokꞌai bee ome ichiaba. Ichia kꞌĩsia iru badakꞌa kꞌapꞌɨa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo ooji eperãarãde, ne–animalaarãde, ipanaarãde mãikꞌaapa chikꞌode, mãgá ãchi kꞌapꞌɨa awara–awaraa iru pꞌanadamerã.
Ichiaba bɨji ne–inaa pajãde ichia kꞌĩsia iru badakꞌa, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ne–inaa awara. Mãgɨ́ chaachaa ichi kꞌĩra wãree bɨji. Mamĩda aukꞌa bɨ–e paji.
Ma kꞌĩra wãree awara–awaraa bɨji nãgá: akꞌõrejĩru urua awara bɨ atane ɨ̃daa ome mãikꞌaapa atane ɨ̃daa lucero ɨ̃daa ome awara bɨ. Ichiaba lucero chaa urua awara bee.

Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa awara–awaraa oodakꞌa na eujãdepema mãikꞌaapa pajãdepema, mãga pɨkꞌa ichiaba awara ooitꞌee eperã piuda kꞌapꞌɨa chokꞌai pꞌirabaipikꞌãri. Piuda kꞌapꞌɨa ɨadakꞌãri, mikꞌiadaipari. Jõdee chokꞌai pꞌirabaida kꞌapꞌɨa waa piukꞌaa.

Ma awara mãgɨ́ piuda kꞌapꞌɨa kꞌachia bapari mikꞌiadaipari perã. Jõdee chi chokꞌai pꞌirabaida kꞌapꞌɨa kꞌĩra wãree baitꞌee. Piuda kꞌapꞌɨa pꞌoyaa mimikꞌakꞌaa. Jõdee chokꞌai pꞌirabaida kꞌapꞌɨapa ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo ooitꞌee, Cristopa chokꞌai pꞌirabaida tꞌẽe oodakꞌa.

Eperãpa kꞌapꞌɨa iru bairã na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bɨ misa, mãgara ichiaba kꞌapꞌɨa iru baitꞌee Akꞌõre truade. Na eujãdepema kꞌapꞌɨa piukꞌãri, ɨapata mikꞌiadaimerã. Mamĩda tꞌẽepai Tachi Akꞌõrepa pꞌirabaipikꞌãri, ɨtꞌaripema kꞌapꞌɨa papiitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperã ookꞌãri, iru kꞌɨ̃de jãrapꞌuaji chokꞌai beemerã.’

Ma eperã Adán paji. Mamĩda Cristo jida tꞌɨ̃jarapata Adán chi tꞌẽepema, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichiaba iru chokꞌai pꞌirabaipida perã ichi truade ichita bapariimerã. Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristo bɨji irude ijãapataarã chokꞌai pꞌanapipariimerã.
Tachi kꞌapꞌɨa naapema Adán kꞌapꞌɨakꞌa bɨ, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema perã. Jõdee tachi tꞌẽepema kꞌapꞌɨa baitꞌee chi tꞌẽepema Adán apata kꞌapꞌɨakꞌa, Akꞌõre truadepema perã.
Chi naapema Adán yoorodee ooda paji. Mapa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema paji. Jõdee chi tꞌẽepema Adán ɨtꞌaripema paji. Mata cheji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee.
Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa kꞌapꞌɨa iru pꞌanɨ naapema Adanpa iru badakꞌa, irudeepa uchiadapꞌedaa perã. Jõdee ɨtꞌaa wãrutaarãpa kꞌapꞌɨa iru pꞌanadaitꞌee Cristopa iru bɨkꞌa, ichideerã perã.
Mãgá na eujãdepema kꞌapꞌɨade pꞌanɨ misa, Adán bapatakꞌa pꞌanapata. Mamĩda ɨtꞌaripema kꞌapꞌɨade pꞌanadakꞌãri, Cristo baparikꞌa pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Ma jõma jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, parãpa kꞌawaadaipia bɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌapꞌɨa pꞌoyaa tꞌĩukꞌaa Tachi Akꞌõre eujãde, ne–inaa mikꞌiadaipari mama tꞌĩukꞌaa perã.
Mamĩda ũrítɨ, mɨa jaraitꞌee perã ne–inaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarãmaa waide jara–e bɨ. Ijãapataarã jõmaweda piuda–e paitꞌee. Mamĩda wãara jõmaweda kꞌapꞌɨa awara padaitꞌee.

Mãgá padaitꞌee isapai, tachi tau pꞌinaru jĩakꞌaata. Mãga nɨde ɨtꞌaripema trompeta jĩwaakꞌãri, Cristode ijãa jai–idaadapꞌedaarã jõmaweda pꞌirabaidaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa tachi chokꞌai pꞌanɨɨrã kꞌapꞌɨa jida awara pakꞌoodaridaitꞌee.
Mãga paitꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌapꞌɨa pꞌoyaa wã–e perã Tachi Akꞌõre eujãdee. Mapa mãgá ɨtꞌaripema kꞌapꞌɨata padaitꞌee, aɨde uchiadamerã iru eujãde.
Mãgá tachi kꞌapꞌɨa jõmaweda ɨtꞌaripema kꞌapꞌɨa padaikꞌãri, unudaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa:
‘Tachi Akꞌõrepa jõmaweda pꞌoyaaji. Maperãpɨ ichia chokꞌai pꞌirabaipidaarã waa piuda–e paitꞌee.’
Mapa ijãapataarãpa jõmaweda jaradaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa:

‘Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ, tachi chokꞌai pꞌanapipari perã, waa piuda–e paitꞌee. Ma awara waa kꞌĩsia pꞌua kꞌĩsiadakꞌaa, waaweeda–e pꞌanadairã miadaitꞌee tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa.’
Mãga jaradaipia bɨ eperãarã piupata perã ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa. Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ jõmaweda pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia eperãarãpa oopata, ma jõma jara bairã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa Moisemaa pꞌãpidade.

Mamĩda Jesucristo piuda perã tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiitꞌee, mãikꞌaapa chokꞌai pꞌirabaida perã, tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji. Maperã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata Tachi Akꞌõremaa gracias jaradaitꞌee. ¡Iruta jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ, irua kꞌĩsia iru bada perã Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo pëiitꞌee tachi kꞌaripade!
Maperã ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, mɨa jarateeda ijãa pꞌanapatáatɨ. Ma awara ichita óotɨ Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa, kꞌawa pꞌanadairã mãga oodakꞌãri, pari ne–inaa ooda–e paitꞌee.
Ɨ̃rá jaraitꞌee sãga pꞌaratꞌa pꞌedaipia bɨ pëidaitꞌee apemaarã ijãapataarã–itꞌee. Óotɨ mɨa jaradakꞌa Galacia eujãdepema ijãapataarãmaa, ãchi ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata chaa.

Tomia ewate parã chaachaa pꞌaratꞌa awara bɨdaipia bɨ, parãmaa pꞌaa pꞌanɨdepema. Pꞌaratꞌa waibɨa pꞌaa pꞌanɨ pɨrã, waibɨa awara bɨ́tɨ. Mamĩda makꞌɨara pꞌaada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã, ma jĩakꞌa awara bɨdai. Mãga oodaipia bɨ ewaa pꞌaratꞌa pꞌenaadamerã mɨ panakꞌãri.

Ma awara jɨrɨtꞌeradaipia bɨ parã tꞌãidepemaarã, ma pꞌaratꞌa pꞌedapꞌedaa ateedamerã Jerusalendee. Mãpai mɨ parãmãi panakꞌãri, kꞌartꞌa pꞌã pëiitꞌee ãra ome Jerusalendee, ijãapataarãpa kꞌawaadamerã wãara mãɨrã parãpa jɨrɨtꞌerada.
Mãga–e pɨrã, mɨ jida aukꞌa ãra ome wãi.
Mɨ wãitꞌee Macedonia eujãdee ijãapataarã akꞌɨde. Ma tꞌẽepai wã kꞌinia bɨ Corinto pꞌuurudee parã akꞌɨde.
Kꞌĩsia bɨ taarãitꞌee parã ome pꞌusa tꞌojara wãyaarumaa. Mãga ooru pɨrã, kꞌinia bɨ mɨ kꞌaripadamerã jãmãikꞌaapa wãkꞌãri.
Arakꞌatɨa wiibai kꞌinia–e parãmãi. Jĩpꞌa taarã bee kꞌinia bɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã.
Nãgaweda kꞌĩsia bɨ beeitꞌee nama Éfeso pꞌuurude Pentecostés fiesta
Nama atꞌãri bee kꞌinia bɨ nãpema chokꞌaraarãpa mɨa jaratee bɨ ũri kꞌinia pꞌanadairã. Mapa jaratee nɨ̃baitꞌee, chokꞌara Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanɨɨrãpa mãgá jarateepi kꞌiniada–e pꞌanɨ mĩda.
Timoteo panakꞌãri parãmaa, auteebai pedéetɨ iru ome, iru mɨ ome aukꞌa Cristo mimia oopari perã.
Iru oo iru pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara pia akꞌɨ pꞌanátɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripátɨ, o–ĩa chemerã apemaarã ijãapataarã ome mɨa nɨmaa bɨmãi.
Parãpa iidi pëijida sãapai tachi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa Apolo parãmaa wãitꞌee. Mɨa jaraji wãmerã apemaarã ome parã akꞌɨde. Mamĩda na wãdade wã kꞌinia–e paji. Jua pari bakꞌã́rita wãitꞌee.
Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai apidaapa parã kꞌachiade baaipidai. Cristode ijãapatáatɨ mɨa jarateedakꞌa mãikꞌaapa oopatáatɨ Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Pia choopatáatɨ Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨde.
Ma awara parãpa oo pꞌanɨ jõmaweda chikꞌinia oopatáatɨ.
Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Estéfanas ichi te pidaarã ome naapɨara Cristode ijãajida Acaya eujãde. Ãrapa apemaarã ijãapataarã kꞌaripapata.
Maperã mɨa kꞌinia bɨ ãra pãchi poroorãkꞌa iru pꞌanadamerã mãikꞌaapa mãgá ichiaba iru pꞌanadamerã apemaarã ijãapataarã ãrakꞌa kꞌaripapata.
Mɨ o–ĩa bɨ chedapꞌedaa perã Estéfanas, Fortunato mãikꞌaapa Acaico mɨ kꞌaripade parã pari.
Ãrapa mɨ o–ĩapi chejida parã o–ĩapidapꞌedaakꞌa. Mapa ãra pari Tachi Akꞌõremaa gracias teedáma.
Ásia eujãdepema ijãapataarãpa salude pëiruta. Ichiaba salude pëiruta Aquilapa Priscila ome mãikꞌaapa ãchi tede cheepurupata ijãapataarãpa.
Nãpema ijãapataarãpa aukꞌa salude pëiruta. Parã saludaadakꞌãri, chikꞌinia saludaapatáatɨ.
Mɨ, Pablopa nãgɨ́ salude pꞌãru mɨchi juadoopa.
Eperã apidaapa Jesucristo kꞌiniada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ kꞌachia ooitꞌee. Tachi Waibɨa Cristo, ¡isapai chéji!
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa parã pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã.
Parã jõmaweda kꞌinia iru bɨ Jesucristodeerã perã.
Mãgapai paji.

Mɨ, Pablopa na kꞌartꞌa pꞌã pëiru Jesucristode ijãapataarãmaa, Corinto pꞌuurude pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa jõma Acaya eujãde pꞌanɨ. Tachi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa, Timoteopa ichiaba salude pëiru parãmaa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bada perã, mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji Jesucristopa mɨ pëimerã jarateede ichia oopi kꞌinia bɨ eperãarãmaa.
Mapa mɨa kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo ome parã pia akꞌɨ pꞌanadamerã. Mãgá parã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
¡Wãara, Tachi Akꞌõre, Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo Akꞌõre, jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ! Ichia tachi chupɨria kꞌawaapari mãikꞌaapa ichiata tachi tꞌãri o–ĩapipari.
Mãgá oopari tai jarateepataarãmaa, chupɨria jõnɨde. Ichia tai mãgá kꞌaripapari, taipa, jõdee, awaraarã aukꞌa kꞌaripadamerã ãra chupɨria jõnadakꞌãri.

Eperãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa Cristo kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanajida irua jarada kꞌaurepa. Mãgá ɨ̃rá awaraarãpa tai aukꞌa kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanɨ taipa jarateepata kꞌaurepa. Mamĩda Cristopa tai kꞌaripapari choodamerã. Waapɨara ãchia tai mãga iru pꞌanɨ pɨrã, waapɨara Cristopa tai tꞌãri o–ĩapiitꞌee.

Wãara, chupɨria jõneeruta pɨjida Cristopa jarada jarateepata kꞌaurepa parãmaa, tai o–ĩa pꞌanɨ. Tai mãgá pꞌanadai ma jarateepata kꞌaurepa parã o kꞌachiadeepa uchiadapꞌedaa perã. Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai tꞌãri o–ĩapi bɨkꞌa chupɨria jõnɨde, aukꞌa parã tꞌãri o–ĩapiitꞌee parã aukꞌa chupɨria jõneedakꞌãri. Irua mãga ooitꞌee parãpa choodakꞌãri taipa choopatakꞌa.
Maperã taipa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai kꞌaripaparikꞌa chupɨria jõnɨde, parã aukꞌa kꞌaripaitꞌee mãgá jõnadakꞌãri.
Ɨ̃pemaarã, parãmaa mɨa kꞌirãpapi kꞌinia bɨ mɨ chupɨria nɨ̃bada Ásia eujãde. Mãga nɨ̃bakꞌãri, perá choo–e paji. Tꞌãri ma–ãri nɨ̃baji.

Wãara, kꞌĩsiaji madeepa chokꞌai uchia–e pai. Mamĩda ɨ̃rá kꞌawa bɨ mãga paji mɨa ijãanaamerã mɨchi kꞌĩradoopa chupɨria nɨ̃bɨdeepa uchiai. Jĩpꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrépata uchiapii. Ichia mãgá kꞌaripai ichi jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã. ¡Irua aupaita piudapꞌedaarã chokꞌai pꞌirabaipipari!
Wãara, mɨ piudakꞌa baji. Mamĩda Akꞌõrepa mɨ kꞌaripa ataji madeepa. Mapa mɨa kꞌawa bɨ waya mãgadaru pɨrã, waya mɨ kꞌaripaitꞌee, mɨ kꞌõpꞌãyoorã jida aukꞌa.

Parãpa ichiaba tai kꞌaripadai, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ruta pɨrã tai pari. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, chokꞌaraarãpa o–ĩa gracias jaradaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõremaa, unudakꞌãri irua ne–inaa pia ooru tai kꞌaripaitꞌee parãpa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata kꞌaurepa.

Parãdepema ũkꞌuruurãpa jara pꞌanɨ taipa eperãarã kꞌũra nipapata. Mamĩda mãga–e. Tai o–ĩa pꞌanɨ jõmaarã tꞌãide jaratee nipadakꞌãri, kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipapata perã. Mãgá nipajida parã tꞌãide. Audua nipadakꞌaa paji parãpa kꞌĩsiadamerã tai kꞌĩsia kꞌawaara pꞌanɨ awaraarã kꞌãyaara. Mãga–e. Parã tꞌãide tꞌãri pia pꞌanapachida, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai kꞌaripa bada perã. Mãga ooji ichia tai kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Taipa parãmaa kꞌartꞌa pꞌã pëidakꞌãri, jĩpꞌa pꞌãpata taipa jara kꞌinia pꞌanɨ aupai. Mãgá pꞌãpata parãpa tai kꞌartꞌa leedamerã mãikꞌaapa pia kꞌawaadamerã jõmaweda aɨde jara bɨ.

Wãara parãdepema ũkꞌuruurãpa mãga kꞌawapata. Mamĩda mɨa kꞌinia bɨ parã jõmaarãpa kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanadamerã taipa oopata mãikꞌaapa jarateepata. Mãgá Tachi Waibɨa Jesús waya chekꞌãri, tachi jõma o–ĩa pꞌanadaitꞌee iru kꞌĩrapite. Tai o–ĩa pꞌanadaitꞌee parãpa taipa jarateeda ijãadapꞌedaa perã. Jõdee parã o–ĩa pꞌanadaitꞌee tai itꞌaideepa ũridapꞌedaa perã Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee.

Mɨa kꞌĩsiaji parãpa pedeejida taipa kꞌartꞌa pꞌã pëidapꞌedaa mãikꞌaapa ijãajida wãara Cristopa tai pëiji jarateedamerã irua oopi kꞌinia bɨ eperãarãmaa. Mapa wãitꞌee paji parã akꞌɨde. Wãda omé wãitꞌee paji parã o–ĩa pꞌanadamerã mɨ unudakꞌãri.
Naapɨara Macedonia eujãdee wãkꞌãri, mɨ parãmãi wiibaiitꞌee paji mãikꞌaapa waya ãpɨtee chekꞌãri, aukꞌa parãmaa pꞌasianaitꞌee paji. Ma tꞌẽe wãdade parãpa mɨ kꞌaripakꞌajida Judea eujãdee wãitꞌee.

Mamĩda parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mɨ parãmaa wã–e paji. ¿Mapa parã tꞌãidepema ũkꞌuruurãpa jara pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã mɨ tꞌãri aukꞌa bɨ–e parã ome? ¿Kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã mɨchia oo kꞌiniata oopari awaraarãpa oopatakꞌa? ¡Mɨa mãga ookꞌaapɨ!

Tachi Akꞌõrépata kꞌawa bɨ tai jarateepataarã mãgá pꞌanadakꞌaa. Ichiaba mãgá jarateedakꞌaa, jarateedakꞌãri iru Warra, Jesucristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Jĩpꞌa taimaa jarateepata irua jarapi bɨkꞌa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichita oopari ichia jara bɨkꞌa. Mãga oopata tai jida ichiaba, ichideerã perã.
Parã tꞌãide Silvano,

Chonaarãweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaraji Jesucristopa ooitꞌee bada. Mãga jaraji Cristo tꞌoi naaweda. Mãpai iru tꞌopꞌeda, wãara ooji jõmaweda Akꞌõrepa jaradakꞌa. Maperã kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Cristo wãara Tachi Waibɨa. Mãgá Cristode ijãapata perã, tachia “Amén” apata Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa ũridakꞌãri.
Tachi Akꞌõrépata tai Cristode ijãapipari, parã jida aukꞌa. Ichiata tachi jɨrɨtꞌeraji ichideerã papiitꞌee.

Tachia kꞌawaadamerã wãara ichideerã pꞌanɨ, ichia tauchaa pɨkꞌa bɨji tachi tꞌãride. Ichi Jaure pëiji tachi ijãapataarã ome bapariimerã. Mãga ookꞌãri, tachimaa akꞌɨpiji ichia wãara tachi pia akꞌɨitꞌee mãikꞌaapa tꞌẽepai teeitꞌee jõmaweda ichia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ tachi–itꞌee.

Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mɨa jara kꞌinia bɨ sãapꞌedata wã–e paji parã akꞌɨde. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawa bɨ mɨchi tꞌãride iru bɨ mãikꞌaapa mɨ miapii seewa jararu pɨrã. Mɨ waa wã–e paji Corinto pꞌuurudee parã ɨtrɨade, parã tꞌãri pꞌuapiamaapa.

Tai, chi jarateepataarãpa, parãmaa ijãapi kꞌiniada–e taipa kꞌinia pꞌanɨkꞌa. Parãpa aukꞌa Cristode ijãapata. Iruata parãmaa ichia kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oopii. Taipa jõdee parã kꞌaripa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ waapɨara ijãapataadamerã mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapataadamerã.
Naaweda mɨ parã akꞌɨde wãkꞌãri, parã tꞌãri pꞌuapiji. Maperã waya wãitꞌee pakꞌãri, nãga kꞌĩsiaji: “Mɨ naapai waya wã–e ãra tꞌãri pꞌuapide.”
Mɨa parã tꞌãri pꞌuapiru pɨrã, parãdepema apida wẽ–e pai mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩapiitꞌee.

Mapa wãi kꞌãyaara, kꞌartꞌa pꞌã pëiji parãpa aɨde jara bɨ ũridamerã mãikꞌaapa oodamerã mɨa ũraadakꞌa. Mɨ parãmaa wãru pɨrã parãpa mãga oodai naaweda, audupɨara parã tꞌãri pꞌuapii. Waya unudakꞌãri, mɨa kꞌinia bɨ parãpa mɨ tꞌãri pꞌuapii kꞌãyaara, tꞌãri o–ĩapidamerã. Mɨa nãga kꞌawa bɨ: mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩa bakꞌãri, parã jida mãga pꞌanɨ.

Ma kꞌartꞌa pꞌãkꞌãri, mɨchi tꞌãride kꞌĩsia nɨ̃baji, parã mãgá ɨtrɨa kꞌinia–e pada perã. Jẽedachi parã tꞌãri pꞌuapi kꞌinia–e bada perã. Ma kꞌartꞌa pꞌãkꞌãri, mɨa jĩpꞌa akꞌɨpi kꞌinia baji parã audú kꞌinia iru bɨ.
Wãara parã tꞌãidepemapa, kꞌachia oo kꞌiniapa, mɨ tꞌãri pꞌuapiji mãikꞌaapa parã ũkꞌuru audupɨara mãgapiji. Ichia tachimaa mãgá ooji mĩda, mɨa iru waa ɨmɨatee kꞌinia–e.
Parã chokꞌaraarãpa iru tꞌãri pꞌuapimaa pꞌanɨ, iru yiaraa iru pꞌanadairã. Jãgapaipɨ. Waa mãgá yiaraa iru pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ.

Ma kꞌãyaara, irua ooda perdonaadaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri o–ĩapidaipia bɨ waya tꞌĩumerã awaraa ijãapataarã ome. Parãpa mãga ooda–e pɨrã mãikꞌaapa iru atꞌãri yiaraa iru pꞌanaruta pɨrã, iru audupɨara tꞌãri pꞌua bai, Akꞌõrede ijãa–edarumaa.
Maperã ɨ̃rá mɨa parãmaa enenee nɨ̃bɨ akꞌɨpidamerã wãara iru kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ.
Ma–itꞌee ma kꞌartꞌa pꞌãji. Kꞌinia baji irua ma kꞌachia oo amaamerã. Mamĩda ma kꞌãyaara waapɨara mɨa kꞌawa kꞌinia baji parãpa oodai wa ooda–e pai mɨa jaradakꞌa.

Parãpa ma eperãpa kꞌachia ooda perdonaa pꞌanɨkꞌa, mɨa pida perdonaa bɨ. Wãara, Cristopa kꞌawa bɨ abaapa mɨ ome nepɨra jɨrɨ baji pɨrã, mɨa ma nepɨra perdonaaji. Mɨa mãga ooji parã waya tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanadamerã.

Tachi jõmaarãpa chĩarapa kꞌachia ooda mãgá perdonaaruta pɨrã, Netuara Poro Waibɨa juade baaida–e paitꞌee ne–inaa kꞌachia oo kꞌiniapa ma eperãmaa. Ma awara ma ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda kꞌaurepa netuara juade baai–e paitꞌee, audú kꞌĩsia pꞌua nɨ̃bairã. Tachia pia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ netuarapa oopari ichi juade baaidamerã.
Mɨa jaradakꞌa mɨ wã–e paji parã akꞌɨde. Ma kꞌãyaara Troas pꞌuurudee wãji jarateede. Mama nipakꞌãri, Tachi Waibɨapa kꞌaripaji mãpemaarãpa ũri kꞌinia pꞌanadamerã Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee.
