Mamĩda, mama bɨde mɨ kꞌĩsia nɨ̃beeji unu–e pada perã Tito, tachi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa, mɨa pëida parã akꞌɨde. Iru parãmãiipa chepꞌeda, mama tai unudaitꞌee paji. Mãgá unuda–e pada perã, mɨa Troadepemaarã atabëiji mãikꞌaapa cheji Macedonia eujãdee, nama Tito ome unui jĩakꞌaapa.

Taipa gracias jarapata Tachi Akꞌõremaa, iruata Netuara Poro Waibɨa pꞌoyaapari perã Cristo juapa. Maperãpɨ netuara apidaapa tai Cristodeerã pꞌoyaada–e pai. Mãgá ichideerã perã irua tai kꞌaripapari jarateedamerã jõmaarã tꞌãide.

Ara kꞌera tꞌũa aubaiparikꞌa ewatꞌaakꞌãri, mãga pɨkꞌa tai ijãapataarã tꞌɨmɨ́ wãpata jarateede Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨ eperãarãmaa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa unukꞌãri taipa mãga jarateemaa pꞌanɨ, o–ĩa beepari. Cristopa tai jarateepataarã pëipari jarateedamerã chi ũri kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrãmaa mãikꞌaapa chi ũridaamaa pꞌanɨɨrãmaa paara.

Taipa jarateepata mikꞌia pɨkꞌa bɨ chi ũridaamaa pꞌanɨɨrã–itꞌee, ma kꞌaurepa ãra atuadaitꞌee perã. Mamĩda chi ũri kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrã–itꞌee ne–inaa tꞌũa baparikꞌa bɨ, ma jarateeda kꞌaurepa ãra wãdaitꞌee perã Akꞌõre truadee. Mãga bɨta, ¿kꞌaipa jarateeima chi ũri pꞌanɨɨrãpa wãara kꞌawaadamerã Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨ eperãarãmaa?

Táipata mãga jarateedai. Ma–itꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai jɨrɨtꞌeraji. Tai kꞌĩsiadoopa jarateedakꞌaa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa taimaa jarapipari. Tai nipadakꞌaa awaraarãkꞌa. Ãchi kꞌĩsiadoopa Akꞌõre netꞌaa jaratee nipapata, eperãarãpa ãchi pia akꞌɨdamerã mãikꞌaapa ãchimaa pꞌaratꞌa teedamerã. Taipa jõdee mãga oodakꞌaa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai ichita akꞌɨpari perã, kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa jarateepata irua oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãgá jarateedai Cristo tai ome bapari perã.

Mɨa jarakꞌãri tai kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa jarateepata, jara kꞌinia–e bɨ taita pipɨara akꞌɨdaipia bɨ awaraa jarateepataarã kꞌãyaara. Taipa kꞌartꞌa pꞌãda iididakꞌaa ijãapataarãpa parãmaa jara pëidamerã táipata pia jarateepata, jarateepataarã ũkꞌuruurãpa oopatakꞌa. Ichiaba iidida–e parãpa mãgee kꞌartꞌa awaraa ijãapataarãmaa pëidamerã.

Awaraarãpa kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã tai wãara Jesucristopa pëida jarateede wa mãga–e, ãchia parã ijãapataarã akꞌɨdaipia bɨ. Parã taipa kꞌartꞌa pꞌãdákꞌata pꞌanɨ, Cristode ijãapata perã taipa jarateedapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa. Mɨchi tꞌãride kꞌawa bɨ mɨa wãarata jara bɨ.

Jõmaarãpa kꞌawaadai Cristopa tai pëiji parã akꞌɨdakꞌãri, sãga pꞌanapata Cristode ijãadakꞌãriipa. Awaraarãpa oo kꞌinia pꞌanapata Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa mãude pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia–e baji mĩda eperãarãpa ichita ijãadamerã ma ũraa Moisemaa pꞌãpidade, ũkꞌuru aɨde atꞌãri ijãa pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda parã mãga pꞌanadakꞌaa. Ma kꞌãyaara pipɨara parãpa oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure parã tꞌãride bapari perã. Ma awara Akꞌõrepa mãga ichita oopiitꞌee, ichita bapari perã.
Taipa akꞌɨdakꞌãri parãpa oomaa pꞌanɨ Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ wãara Tachi Akꞌõrepa taimaa jarapi baji.
Tai kꞌĩsiadoopa eperãarã pꞌoyaa Cristode ijãapidakꞌaa. Tachi Akꞌõrepapai mãga ooi. Ichia aupaita tai kꞌaripapari iru ũraa pia jarateedamerã.

Ichia taimaa nãgɨ́ ũraa chiwidi kꞌawapiji. Cristopa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atai. Mãga kꞌawapiji taipa jõmaarãmaa jarateenadamerã. Na ũraa chiwidi awara bɨ chi naawedapema ũraa kꞌãyaara. Eperãarãpa ma naawedapema ũraa pꞌãdade ijãaruta pɨrã, atuadaitꞌee. Jõdee na ũraa chiwidide ijãaruta pɨrã, Akꞌõre Jaurepa ãchi Akꞌõre ode tꞌĩupiitꞌee.

Kꞌĩsiadáma nãgɨde. Chonaarãweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa mãude pꞌãpiji Moisemaa. Na eujãde bɨ misa, Moisés Tachi Akꞌõre ome unukꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree iru ome beeji. Mapa Moisés waya chekꞌãri Israel pidaarãmaa, ãrapa iru kꞌĩra pꞌoyaa akꞌɨdakꞌaa paji, audú ɨ̃daa bada perã. Mãga baji mĩda, taarã–e nɨde ma ɨ̃daa wẽpa wãji. Akꞌõrepa ichi kꞌĩra wãree mãgá ãchimaa unupiji mĩda, ma ũraa pꞌãda kꞌaurepa eperãarãpa kꞌawaa pꞌaneejida ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa atuadaitꞌee.

Ɨ̃rá jõdee, ma kꞌãyaara pipɨara Tachi Akꞌõrepa ũraa chiwidi jara pëida kꞌaurepa tachi ijãapataarãpa kꞌawapata Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, wãdai Tachi Akꞌõre truadee. Mãga kꞌawapata Akꞌõre Jaure kꞌaurepa, iru tachi ome bapari perã.

Mãpai nãga jaradai. Pia baji Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarãmaa kꞌawapikꞌãri ichi ũraa pꞌãda, mãgɨde jaraji mĩda ãchi atuadaitꞌee pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata perã. Mamĩda ma kꞌãyaara pipɨara bɨ ichia ũraa chiwidi jara pëida. Mãgɨ́ ũraade ichi Jaurepa tachi ijãapataarãmaa kꞌawapipari Cristo kꞌaurepa tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanɨ Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Maperãpɨ kꞌawa pꞌanɨ pipɨara bɨ ijãadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa ũraa chiwidi jara pëidade, ijãadai kꞌãyaara mãgɨ́ chonaarãwedapema ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨde.

Wãara Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãda pia baji, Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ jarada perã. Mamĩda ichia kꞌinia–e paji eperãarãpa ichita aɨde ijãadamerã. Mapa ũraa chiwidi jara pëiji. Nãgɨ́ ũraa pipɨara bɨ chi naawedapema kꞌãyaara, jõkꞌaa perã.
Kꞌawa pꞌanadairã Akꞌõrepa ũraa chiwidi jara pëida mãgá pipɨara bɨ chi naawedapema jarada kꞌãyaara, taipa mãgɨ́ ũraa jĩpꞌa jarateepata, waaweeda–ee.

Mamĩda mãga–e paji Moisés ome. Moisepa ichi kꞌĩra wãkꞌaji Israel pidaarãpa ununaadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree wẽpa wãkꞌãri. Mãgá ma ɨ̃daa Moisés kꞌĩrade wẽpa wãdakꞌa, ma chonaarãwedapema ũraa wẽpa pɨkꞌa wãji.

Mamĩda ma Israel pidaarãpa mãga ijãa kꞌiniada–e paji, kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Atꞌãri mãga pꞌanɨ Moisepa pꞌãda leepataarã ũridakꞌãri. Moisepa ichi kꞌĩra wãkꞌa iru badakꞌa, ãchi tꞌãri wãkꞌa pɨkꞌa iru pꞌanɨ ũraa chiwidide ijãa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadairã. Atꞌãri ãchia ijãapata Akꞌõre ode tꞌĩudai ma chonaarãwedapema ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa oo pꞌanɨpa. Mãga ijãapata Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchimaa ichi ũraa chiwidi kꞌawapi bɨ mĩda. Nãgá kꞌĩsia awara kꞌĩsiadai: Cristode ijãadakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa ichideerã padaidakꞌãri.
Mãgá Akꞌõre Ũraa Moisepa pꞌãdade ijãapata perã, idi ewate atꞌãri ma ũraa ũridakꞌãri, ãchi tꞌãri wãkꞌa pɨkꞌa iru pꞌanɨ.
Mamĩda ãchidepemapa ma ũraa chiwidi ũrikꞌãri mãikꞌaapa Cristode ijãakꞌãri, ma tꞌãri wãkꞌa pɨkꞌa bada wẽpaitꞌee.

Mãga pꞌaneedaitꞌee Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, eperãarã uchiapata perã Akꞌõrepa naawedapema ũraa pꞌãda jua ekꞌariipa. Mãga oodai Cristo ãra ome bapari perã ichi Jaure kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Cristo ichi Jaure ome apai, aukꞌa Tachi Waibɨa perã.

Mãgá ma naawedapema ũraa jua ekꞌariipa tachi uchiadapꞌedaa perã, tachi tꞌãri waa wãkꞌa pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ–e. Ara espejode tachi kꞌĩra unuparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree unupata iru ũraa chiwidi jara pëidade Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Ma awara Cristo Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa oodakꞌãri, tꞌãri pia padaipata irukꞌa. Waapɨara iru Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa oodai, waapɨara tꞌãri pia padaridai irukꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai chupɨria kꞌawaa bairã, ichi ũraa chiwidi taimaa jarateepi bɨ. Maperãpɨ waaweeda–ee pꞌanapata, awaraarãpa tai ome nepɨra jɨrɨ pꞌanɨ mĩda.

Taipa oodaamaa pꞌanapata ne–inaa kꞌachia awaraarãpa mera oopata; ne–inaa eperãarã jĩpꞌaarã kꞌĩra nejasia pꞌanapata oodaitꞌee. Madepema ũkꞌuruurãpa imeraa jarateepata chĩara kꞌũradaitꞌee. Maa–e pɨrã ãchi kꞌĩsia pꞌoirapata Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨ ome, irua jara kꞌinia bɨ awara uchiamerã. Mamĩda taipa mãga ooda–e. Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa jarateepata. Mãga oo pꞌanɨpa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ jõmaarãpa kꞌawaadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite taipa wãarata jarateepata.
Wãara, Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee jarateedakꞌãri, ũkꞌuru eperãarã–itꞌee ma jarateepata wãkꞌa pɨkꞌa bɨ, mãɨrãpa ma wãarata kꞌawadaamaa pꞌanapata perã. Mapa o kꞌachiadee wãruta.

Ãchi mãga pꞌanɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerã akꞌõre, Netuara Poro Waibɨapa, ãchi tau pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa iru bairã ichi jua ekꞌari. Ichia kꞌinia–e ãchia kꞌawaadamerã tꞌĩudai ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨde kꞌawaadakꞌãri Cristopa ooda ãchi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataitꞌee. Ichia kꞌawa bɨ mãga ijãaruta pɨrã, unudai Cristo kꞌĩra wãree, iru Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrakꞌa bairã.

Mapa taipa jarateedakꞌãri, jarateeda–e tachi kꞌĩsiadeepa tai akꞌɨdamerã pãchi poroorãkꞌa. Jĩpꞌa jarateepata Jesucristo, Tachi Waibɨapa oopi kꞌinia bɨ eperãarãmaa. Taipa irua oopi bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌanapata perã, tai mimiapata parã–itꞌee.

Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Jesucristo tachi jõmaarã waibɨa nãga perã. Ewaa weda jõma pꞌãriu nɨ̃bakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaraji ɨ̃daamerã. Mãpai ɨ̃daa beeji. Mãga pɨkꞌa ijãadai naaweda, tai pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨde pꞌanapachida, kꞌawada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa taimaa mãga kꞌawapikꞌãri, tai tꞌãride ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌapiji. Mapa Cristode ijãa pꞌaneejida mãikꞌaapa kꞌawaa pꞌaneejida Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree.

Tachi kꞌapꞌɨa chokꞌo sorekꞌapɨ bɨ. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa aɨde nẽe bɨdákꞌapɨ bɨ ichi kꞌĩra wãree taimaa unupikꞌãri mãikꞌaapa tai jɨrɨtꞌerakꞌãri Cristopa ooda jarateedamerã eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mãgá eperãarãpa ijãadakꞌãri taipa jarateepata kꞌaurepa, jõmaarãpa kꞌawaadai Tachi Akꞌõrépata taimaa jarapi bɨ. ¡Iruta tai kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ!

Mãga jaratee pꞌanɨ misa iru–itꞌee, tai wãrutamaa ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa nepɨra jɨrɨpata tai ome. Mamĩda ãramaa pꞌoyaapidakꞌaa. Mãga pꞌanadai Tachi Akꞌõrépata tai kꞌaripapari perã choodamerã. Edaare kꞌawada–e sãgapɨ oodai. Mamĩda ijãa pꞌanɨ Akꞌõrepa taimaa ichia kꞌinia bɨ kꞌawapiitꞌee.
Edaare awaraarãpa tai kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapata. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai atabaibëikꞌaa. Ichiaba edaare tai pꞌua oopata. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai kꞌaripapari chokꞌai uchiadamerã ãchi juadeepa.

Tai wãrutamaa jɨrɨpata peedaitꞌee Jesús peedapꞌedaakꞌa. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai kꞌaripapari ãchi juadeepa, eperãarãpa kꞌawaadamerã irua aupaita tai kꞌaripapari. Mãga oopari Jesucristo Jaure tai ome bapari perã.

Wãara, na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa, tai mãgá pee kꞌinia pꞌanadaitꞌee taipa jarateepata perã Jesucristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨ eperãarãmaa. Mamĩda mãga pꞌoyaa ooda–e, irua akꞌɨpi kꞌinia bairã ichi wãara chokꞌai pꞌirabaiji mãikꞌaapa atꞌãri tai tꞌãride chokꞌai bɨ.
Mãpai tai mãgá jɨrɨ pꞌanɨ mĩda, taipa jarateepata Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa, parã awaraarã ome Cristode ijãadapꞌeda, Tachi Akꞌõre truade ichita pꞌanapataadamerã.
Taipa aukꞌa jaradai Tachi Akꞌõre chonaarãwedapema ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa:
‘Ijãaji Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ kꞌaripai. Maperã irumaa jaraji mɨchi tꞌãride kꞌĩsia bada.’
Taipa ichiaba mãga ijãapata. Maperãpɨ jarateepata Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa.
Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesucristo chokꞌai pꞌirabaipidakꞌa, tai jida aukꞌa pꞌirabaipiitꞌee parã ome mãikꞌaapa tachi ateeitꞌee Jesucristo bɨmaa ichi truade. Mãga ooitꞌee tachi Cristodeerã perã.

Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanadairã, choopata parã mãikꞌaapa awaraarã kꞌaripadaitꞌee Cristode ijãadamerã. Mãgá chokꞌaraarãpa kꞌawaadaitꞌee Akꞌõrepa ãchi kꞌinia iru bɨ mãikꞌaapa o kꞌachiadeepa uchiapi kꞌinia bɨ. Mãpai mãɨrãpa Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, gracias jaradaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõremaa mãikꞌaapa ãchi ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ pꞌanɨde akꞌɨpidaitꞌee wãara irude ijãapata.
Maperãpɨ tai chupɨria jõneedakꞌãri, kꞌĩsia pꞌua jõnadakꞌaa. Tai kꞌapꞌɨa jõdaruta pɨjida, ewari chaa tꞌãride audupɨara Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapata.

Ma awara na eujãde pꞌanɨ misa, taarãdakꞌaa chupɨria jõnɨde. Tai–itꞌee makꞌɨara pꞌua–e. Jõdee taipa ne–inaa unudaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre truade pꞌoyaa jarada–e, audú pi–ia bairã. ¡Ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee iru ome!

Maperã tai audú kꞌĩsia jõnada–e na pꞌekꞌau eujãde unu pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa. Jĩpꞌa kꞌĩsiapata ne–inaa waide unuda–e pꞌanɨde; ɨtꞌaripema netꞌaade. Na eujãdepema netꞌaa taarã–ee jõpari. Mamĩda ɨtꞌaripema netꞌaa ichita bapariitꞌee.

Taipa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachi eperã kꞌapꞌɨa piuru pɨjida Cristo chei naaweda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai pꞌanapiitꞌee ichia ooitꞌee bɨ ɨtꞌaripema kꞌapꞌɨa chiwidide. Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌapꞌɨa jõpari. Mamĩda chi ɨtꞌaripema kꞌapꞌɨa jõkꞌaa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgá oopari perã.
Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌapꞌɨade pꞌanɨ misa, chupɨria jõnapata mãikꞌaapa audú kꞌĩsia jõnapata, ma ɨtꞌaripema kꞌapꞌɨade pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanadairã.
Eperãpa pꞌaru jɨ̃ kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa tai pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanɨ ma ɨtꞌaripema kꞌapꞌɨade. Eperã ãkꞌadaa ba kꞌinia–e bɨkꞌa, tai kꞌapꞌɨa wẽe pꞌana kꞌiniadakꞌaa.

Maperãpɨ piu kꞌiniada–e Cristo chei naaweda. Iru mãgá cheru misa, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌapꞌɨade pꞌanɨde, kꞌĩsia jõnapata ne–inaa kꞌachia pꞌasai jĩakꞌaapa. Mãgá na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌapꞌɨa chupɨria nɨ̃bairã, atabëi kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre ome pꞌananadaitꞌee.

Ma–itꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa ɨtꞌaripema kꞌapꞌɨa ooitꞌee ichideerã–itꞌee, aɨde pꞌanapataadamerã iru truade. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ irua ichi Jaure pëida perã tachi chaachaa bapariimerã. Ichi Jaurepata kꞌawapipari ichia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ichideerã–itꞌee.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgá ne–inaa kꞌĩsia iru bapari perã ichideerã–itꞌee, na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa, tachi kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadai. Wãara kꞌawa pꞌanɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌapꞌɨade pꞌanɨ misa, Tachi Waibɨa ikꞌaawaapa tꞌɨmɨ́ pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ.
Tachi taupa iru unuda–e pꞌanɨ mĩda, irude ijãapata.
Maperãpɨ kꞌãiwee pꞌanapata. Piara bakꞌaji aweda uchiadaitꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌapꞌɨadeepa mãikꞌaapa iru truade pꞌananadaitꞌee tachi ɨtꞌaripema kꞌapꞌɨade.

Mamĩda atꞌãri wãda–e. Mapa nãga kꞌĩsiapata. Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌapꞌɨade pꞌanɨ misa, oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa na eujãdeepa uchiadakꞌãri, aukꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌanadaitꞌee irua oopi bɨkꞌa nãga perã.

Ewari cherude tachi ijãapataarã jõmaweda iru kꞌĩrapite panadaitꞌee irua akꞌɨmerã tachia oopatapꞌedaa na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa. Eperã Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oodapa ataitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ichideerã–itꞌee. Ma awara Cristopa mãgɨmaa pedee pia jaraitꞌee. Mamĩda chi mãga oo–e badapa maarepida ata–e paitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Cristopa irumaa pedee pia jara–e paitꞌee.

Cristopa tachia oopata mãgá akꞌɨitꞌee perã, iru waawee pꞌanapata. Mapa taipa eperãarãmaa jarateepata Cristode ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa tai pꞌanapata kꞌawaadamerã. Taipa ne–inaa oodakꞌãri wa ne–inaa jaradakꞌãri, mãga oopata eperãarã kꞌaripadaitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawa bɨ tai tꞌãride iru pꞌanɨ. Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ parãpa tai ichiaba mãgá kꞌawaadamerã.

Mɨa mãga jarakꞌãri, jara kꞌinia–e bɨ tai pipɨara akꞌɨdamerã awaraarã kꞌãyaara. Jĩpꞌa kꞌinia bɨ parã o–ĩa pꞌanadamerã taipa ne–inaa pia oopata kꞌaurepa. Mãgá o–ĩa pꞌanaruta pɨrã, parãpa pꞌanaudai chi audua beerãpa tai ãpɨte jara jõnɨ. Ma jarateepataarãpa kꞌĩsiapata ãchia aupaita pia jarateepata.

¿Mãɨrãpa jara pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã tai parã tꞌãide nipadakꞌãri, oojida kꞌĩra kꞌawa–ee pꞌanɨɨrãpa oopatakꞌa? Mamĩda mãga–e paji. Taipa mãga oojida awaraarãpa unudakꞌãri, kꞌawaadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã waibɨa. Ma awara tai kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipadakꞌãri, mãga oopata parã kꞌaripadaitꞌee, aukꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre pipɨara kꞌawaadamerã.

Jesucristopa tai kꞌinia iru bapari. Maperãpɨ tai jaratee nipapata irua oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Wãara na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaweda kꞌinia iru bapari perã, kurusode piuji tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa. Mãgá piuji jõmaarã kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Ara Cristo piudakꞌa jõmaarã pari, iru kꞌapꞌɨa pari eperã chaachaa piu pɨkꞌaji.

Cristo piuji eperãarã pari mãikꞌaapa chokꞌai pꞌirabaiji, kꞌinia bada perã ichide ijãa pꞌanɨɨrã pꞌanapataadamerã irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Tachi mãga pꞌanadakꞌãri, oodaitꞌee irua oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, tachia oo kꞌiniata oodai kꞌãyaara.

Mãga kꞌawaadakꞌãriipa, taipa eperãarã unudakꞌaa, Cristode ijãadai naaweda unupatapꞌedaakꞌa. Maapai Cristo jida eperã jĩpꞌaakꞌa unupachida. ¡Mamĩda ɨ̃rá iru mãgá unuda–e pꞌanɨ! Ichideerã ichiaba mãgá unuda–e nãga perã.

Eperã araa bakꞌãri Cristo ome ijãapari perã irude, mãgɨ́ eperã tꞌãri awaradaipari. ¡Pia kꞌĩsíatɨ! Cristode ijãai naaweda, ma eperã kꞌachiade nipapachi. Mamĩda irude ijãadakꞌãriipa waa mãgá nipa kꞌinia–e. Jĩpꞌa nipa kꞌinia bɨ Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Mãgá nipai Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga oopipari perã. Tachi aukꞌa pꞌanapachida ma eperãkꞌa. Cristode ijãadai naaweda, taipa Tachi Akꞌõre pia kꞌawa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanapachida. Ichiaba maapai Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi pia–ee akꞌɨpachi. Mamĩda ijãadakꞌãri, Cristo piuda kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi tꞌãri aukꞌa bɨji tachi tꞌãri ome. Maperãpɨ tai jɨrɨtꞌeraji jõmaarãmaa jarateenadamerã. Mãgá taipa jarateepata ũrirutaarãpa Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi tꞌãri aukꞌa bɨpari ãchi tꞌãri ome ichiaba.

Pia jaraitꞌeera, Cristo piuda kꞌaurepa eperãarã pari, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi tꞌãri aukꞌa bɨ kꞌinia bɨ ãchi tꞌãri ome. Ma awara ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapi kꞌinia bɨ. Ma pedeeta Tachi Akꞌõrepa taimaa jarapi bɨ.

Ma–itꞌee Cristopa tai pëiji, ichi kꞌapꞌɨa pari taipa jaradamerã irua jara kꞌinia bɨ. Mapa taipa parã jõmaarãmaa enenee jõnɨ: Ijã́atɨ Jesucristode, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi tꞌãri aukꞌa bɨmerã parã tꞌãri ome.

Cristopa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia maarepida ookꞌaa paji. Mamĩda kurusode bakꞌãri tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã pari, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pia–ee unuji. Pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã unuparikꞌa unuji. Ɨ̃rá jõdee, ma piuda kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi pia unupari.

Mãpa tai Tachi Akꞌõre ome mimia pꞌanɨde, parã ũraa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ kꞌĩsiadamerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa parãmaa pia ooda. Parã ijãadakꞌãri, Cristo piuda kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi tꞌãri aukꞌa bɨji parã tꞌãri ome. Maperã kꞌĩrakꞌaupai Tachi Akꞌõre yiaraa iru pꞌanadai awaraarãpa jarateepata ũri kꞌiniapa.
Ma kꞌãyaara óotɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa:
‘Mɨa pɨde kꞌĩsia bakꞌãri, ũriji pɨa mɨmaa ɨtꞌaa iidida. Pɨa chupɨria iidida ewate, mɨa pɨ o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji.’
Corinto pidaarã, ¡ũrítɨ! Nãgaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ũriitꞌee parãpa chupɨria iidiruta. Nãgaweda parã kꞌaripaitꞌee ichide wãara ijãadamerã.
Tai parã tꞌãide jaratee nipadakꞌãri, maarepida ne–inaa oo kꞌiniada–e paji parãpa ma jarateepata oo iru pꞌanadamerã, wa Cristode ijãadaamaa pꞌanadamerã taipa oopata kꞌaurepa.

Mãga–e. Jĩpꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌanapachida jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopidakꞌa, parãpa tai pia akꞌɨdamerã, Akꞌõrepa tai pia akꞌɨparikꞌa. Tai jõmaarã tꞌãide mãgá nipapata. Mãɨmisa, tꞌãridepai choopata audú kꞌĩsia jõnɨde; ne–inaa wẽe chitoonɨde; nepɨrade jõnɨde;
awaraarãpa tai wɨmaa pꞌanɨde; carcelde chitoonɨde; tai pee kꞌiniapa awara ãyaa jëretꞌaa jõnɨde; mimia chaaree oo jõnɨde; kꞌãi–ee ewari jõnɨde; jarra oo jõnɨde.

Ichiaba akꞌɨpipata tai Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëida nãga oo pꞌanɨpa. Kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipapata, ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda–ee. Taipa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa wãarata jara kꞌinia bɨ tai itꞌaideepa. Kꞌĩrau–ee choopata awaraarãpa taimaa ikꞌachia jaradakꞌãri maa–e pɨrã tai oo iru pꞌanadakꞌãri. Tꞌãri pia pꞌanapata awaraarã ome, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure tai ome bapari perã. Mapa tꞌãripa awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichideerã kꞌinia iru baparikꞌa.

Jarateedakꞌãri, chi ũri pꞌanɨɨrã maarepida kꞌũradakꞌaa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa oopata. Mapa irua tai pia akꞌɨpari. Iruata tai kꞌaripapari waaweeda–ee jarateedamerã mãikꞌaapa taimaa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaapipari pia pꞌanaudamerã awaraarãpa tai ɨmɨateedakꞌãri.

Eperãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa tai pia akꞌɨpata. Jõdee awaraarãpa tai kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapata. Ichiaba eperãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa tai ãpɨte ikꞌachia pedeepata. Jõdee awaraarãpa tai ãpɨte pia pedeepata. Eperãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa jara pꞌanɨ taipa seewa jarateepata. Mamĩda mãga–e. Taipa wãarata jarateepata.

Eperãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa jara pꞌanɨ: “Jã Pablo eperã jĩpꞌaa. ¿Kꞌãare–itꞌee iru pedee ũridaima?” Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ kꞌĩra Cristodeerãmaa pia kꞌawapipari. Taipa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ atu pꞌanɨde piudai kꞌachia beerã juapa. Mamĩda atꞌãri chokꞌai pꞌanɨ. Awaraarãpa tai pꞌua oopata mãikꞌaapa miapipata. Mamĩda tai peeda–e.

Wãara, edaare tai kꞌĩra pia–ee pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichita waya tai tꞌãri o–ĩapipari. Ma awara tai netꞌaa makꞌɨara wẽe pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda ne–inaa pia teepata awaraarãmaa jarateedakꞌãri Cristopa ooda ãchi kꞌaripaitꞌee. Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema netꞌaa wẽe chitoonɨ mĩda, iru pꞌanɨ jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ichideerã–itꞌee.
Ɨ̃pemaarã Corinto pꞌuurude pꞌanɨɨrã, taipa parãmaa jĩpꞌa jaramaa pꞌanɨ jõma tai tꞌãride iru pꞌanɨ.
Atꞌãri taipa parã kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ. Jõdee parãpa tai kꞌinia iru pꞌanada–e naawedapemakꞌa.
Mɨa parã ũraaitꞌee akꞌõrepa ichi warra ũraaparikꞌa. Tꞌãripa tai kꞌinia iru pꞌanapatáatɨ taipa parã kꞌinia iru pꞌanapatakꞌa.

Kꞌõpꞌãyo meraanáatɨ Cristode ijãadakꞌaa beerã ome. Eperãpa Cristode ijãakꞌãri, ne–inaa pia oo kꞌinia bapari. Mamĩda Cristode ijãa–e bakꞌãri, ne–inaa kꞌachia oo kꞌinia bapari. Aukꞌa pꞌanadakꞌaa. Chi pia oo kꞌinia bɨpa mãga oopari kꞌawa bairã Cristopa mãga oopipari. Mamĩda chi kꞌachia oo kꞌinia bɨpa mãga oopari Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa–e bairã. Ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨde pꞌanɨɨrã aukꞌa nipadakꞌaa pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨde pꞌanɨɨrã ome.
Cristo kꞌõpꞌãyo–e Netuara Poro Waibɨa Beliál apata ome. Pꞌoyaa aukꞌa nipadakꞌaa. Ichiaba Cristode ijãapari pꞌoyaa aukꞌa nipakꞌaa ijãadakꞌaa beerã ome.

Tachi Akꞌõre ichita chokꞌai bapari. Iru Cristode ijãapataarã ome bapari. Mapa tachi iru tékꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ. Iru ba kꞌiniakꞌaa ne–inaa aɨ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata tede, ma te ijãadakꞌaa beerãde perã. Ba kꞌiniakꞌaa ijãadakꞌaa beerã ome. Maperãpɨ ãra ome kꞌõpꞌãyo meraadaikꞌaraa bɨ. Tachia kꞌawaadai Akꞌõrepa mãga kꞌinia bɨ ichi chonaarãwedapema ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Mɨ ãra tꞌãide ãra tꞌãri chaa bapariitꞌee. Mɨ ãra Akꞌõre paitꞌee. Jõdee ãra mɨchideerã padaitꞌee.’
Tachi Akꞌõre wãara mãgá bapari perã ichideerã ome, ichiaba jara bɨ awara ãi ma ũraa pꞌãdade:
‘Ãyaa wã́tɨ ijãadakꞌaa beerã ikꞌaawaapa. Oonáatɨ ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopatakꞌa. Mãpaipɨ mɨa parã pia akꞌɨpariitꞌee.’
‘Mɨ parã Akꞌõre paitꞌee. Jõdee parã mɨ warrarã padaitꞌee.’
Mãga jara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨapa.

Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga jarada perã, oo amaadáma ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo; tachi kꞌapꞌɨapa oopata mãikꞌaapa tꞌãridepai kꞌĩsiapata oodaitꞌee. Ma kꞌachia oodai kꞌãyaara, ne–inaa jõmaweda oodáma Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãga oodakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõremaa akꞌɨpidai iru wãara waawee pꞌanɨ.

Taimaa kꞌawapítɨ wãara tai kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ. Parã tꞌãide nipadakꞌãri, taipa apidaamaa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda–e paji. Ichiaba apidaamaa jarateedakꞌaa paji Akꞌõrepa jarapida awara, mãgɨde ijãadamerã. Ma awara eperã apida kꞌũradakꞌaa paji.

Mɨa mãga jarakꞌãri, jara–e bɨ parã kꞌĩsia pꞌuapiitꞌee. Mɨa etꞌewapai jaradakꞌa na kꞌartꞌa pꞌã bɨde, tꞌãripa taipa parã kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ. Tai chokꞌai pꞌanɨ misa mãikꞌaapa piuruta pɨjida, parã mãgá kꞌinia iru pꞌanadaitꞌee, parã tai ome aukꞌa Cristodeerã perã.
Tꞌãripa mɨa nãga jara kꞌinia bɨ. Mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩa bɨ parã ome, kꞌawa bairã parãpa oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ mɨa ũraa bɨkꞌa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ mãgá o–ĩapi bɨ, tai atꞌãri chupɨria chitoonɨ mĩda.
Nama Macedonia eujãde pachedakꞌãri, pꞌoyaa kꞌãiwee pꞌanadakꞌaa paji. Tai wãrutamaa awaraarãpa tai ome nepɨra jɨrɨpachida. Ma awara tꞌãridepai tai kꞌĩsia jõnapachida.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa chi kꞌĩsia jõnɨɨrã tꞌãri o–ĩapipari pipɨara bɨ. Mãgá tai tꞌãri o–ĩapiji Tito nama pachekꞌãri.

Ichiaba tai tꞌãri o–ĩapiji Titopa nepɨrɨda ũridakꞌãri. Irua taimaa jaraji parãpa iru tꞌãri o–ĩapidapꞌedaa parã tꞌãide bakꞌãri. Jaraji parãpa mɨ unu kꞌinia jõnɨ. Ichiaba jaraji parã kꞌĩsia pꞌua jõnɨ, parãdepema ũkꞌuruurãpa mɨ ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jaradapꞌedaa perã. Maapꞌeda Titopa jarakꞌãri parãpa mɨa ũraadakꞌa wãara oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ, mɨ audupɨara o–ĩa beeji.

Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ chi awaraa kꞌartꞌa parãmaa pꞌã pëidade parã kꞌĩsia pꞌuapiji. Mãga ooji mĩda, mɨ kꞌĩsia pꞌua–e. Wãara ma kꞌartꞌa pëikꞌãri, mɨ kꞌĩsia pꞌua bakꞌaji, kꞌawada perã ma kꞌaurepa parã kꞌĩsia pꞌua pꞌanadai, taarã–e mãgá pꞌanajida mĩda.

Mamĩda ɨ̃rá kꞌĩsia pꞌua bai kꞌãyaara, mɨ o–ĩa bɨ. O–ĩa–e bɨ parã mãgá kꞌĩsia pꞌua pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Mɨ o–ĩa bɨ parãpa ma kꞌĩsia kꞌachia mɨ ãpɨte iru pꞌanadapꞌedaa ɨ̃rá kꞌĩra atuadapꞌedaa perã. Wãara mɨa parã kꞌĩsia pꞌuapi–e paji. Akꞌõrépata mɨmaa mãga pꞌãpiji parãpa oodamerã irua oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Wãara Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã kꞌĩsia pꞌuapikꞌãri, mãga oopari ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oo amaadamerã mãikꞌaapa Cristode ijãadamerã. Mãgá irude ijãadakꞌãri, kꞌĩsia pꞌua pꞌanada–e. Jõdee awaraarã, ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa kꞌĩsia pꞌua jõnɨ mĩda, ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo amaada–e. Maperãpɨ atuadaitꞌee.

Taipa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ wãara Tachi Akꞌõrépata parã kꞌĩsia pꞌuapi baji, parãpa tai ome isapai tꞌãri aukꞌa bɨ kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Ichiaba jõma kꞌawapijida taimaa, parã pia akꞌɨdamerã. Ichiaba parã kꞌĩrau pꞌanajida chi nepɨra jɨrɨ pꞌanɨɨrã ome. Ma awara waawee pꞌanajida, mãgɨɨrã kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa parãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi jĩakꞌaapa. Ichiaba iidijida mɨa waya parã akꞌɨnamerã. Parãpa ne–inaa pia oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa, yiaraa iru ba kꞌinia pꞌanadairã chi nepɨra jɨrɨdapꞌedaarã. Ma jõma oo pꞌanɨpa taimaa kꞌawapi pꞌanɨ parã wãara ma nepɨrade tꞌĩu kꞌiniada–e paji.

Ma kꞌartꞌa parãmaa pꞌãkꞌãri, kꞌĩsia–e paji chi kꞌachia oo badade. Ichiaba kꞌĩsia–e paji chi apema ma kꞌachia oodapa tꞌãri pꞌuapidade. Ma kꞌartꞌa pꞌãkꞌãri, mɨa kꞌinia baji Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite kꞌawaadamerã parãpa tai wãara pia akꞌɨpata Akꞌõrepa pëidakꞌa.
Kꞌawaadakꞌãri parãpa tai wãara mãgá akꞌɨpata, tai tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌaneejida.
Mamĩda audupɨara o–ĩa pꞌanɨ Tito auteebaidapꞌedaa perã iru parãmaa wãkꞌãri. Mãga oodakꞌãri, iru ichiaba tꞌãri o–ĩapijida.

Tito nãikꞌaapa parãmaa wãi naaweda, mɨa irumaa jaraji parãpa mãga oodai. Wãara oojida mɨa jaradakꞌa. Mɨ kꞌĩra nejasiapida–e paji. Mɨa wãarata parãmaa jaraji ma pꞌãdade mãikꞌaapa parãpa wãara oojida mɨa Titomaa jaradakꞌa.

Mãga oodapꞌedaa perã, Titopa parã audupɨara kꞌinia iru bɨ naawedapema kꞌãyaara. Kꞌirãpa bɨ parãpa oojida jõmaweda irua oopidakꞌa. Mãga oojida waawee pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, pãchia oo kꞌiniata oodaitꞌee. Jĩpꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌanajida Akꞌõrepa jarapidakꞌa Tito itꞌaideepa.
Maperãpɨ mɨ o–ĩa bɨ. Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ ne–inaa jõmaade parãpa mɨa jara bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ.
Ɨ̃pemaarã, parãmaa mɨa nepɨrɨ kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa pia ooda Macedoniadepema ijãapataarã tꞌãide.

Nepɨrade pꞌanajida mĩda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra o–ĩapipachi. Mãgá o–ĩa pꞌanapachida makꞌɨara pꞌaratꞌa wẽe chitoonajida mĩda. Mãgá chitoonɨde ãchi pꞌaratꞌa iru pꞌanɨdepema waibɨa teejida awaraarã kꞌaripadaitꞌee.

Teejida ãchia pꞌoyaarutapai mãikꞌaapa aɨ ɨ̃rɨ waa teejida. Mɨa mãga jara bɨ mɨchi taupa mãga unuda perã ãra tꞌãide nipakꞌãri. Eperã apidaapa ãramaa jarada–e paji mãgá teedamerã. Teejida tꞌãripa tee kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.
Mãgá kꞌaripa kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, taimaa enenee jõnajida ãchia pꞌe aneedapꞌedaa jitadamerã mãikꞌaapa ateedamerã ijãapataarã Judea eujãde chupɨria beerãmaa.

Mamĩda ma teedapꞌedaa kꞌãyaara ne–inaa piara oojida. Taipa kꞌĩsiada–e paji mãga oodai. Ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃jida Tachi Waibɨamaa jaradaitꞌee ãchia oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ irua oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãpai jarajida taimaa ãchia oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ taipa oopirutakꞌa. Mãga oojida ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã ãramaa Akꞌõrepa mãga oopi baji.

Macedoniadepemaarãpa oo pꞌanɨ unudapꞌeda, taipa Titomaa chupɨria iidijida iru waya parã kꞌaripade wãmerã, tꞌãri piapa parãpa pꞌaratꞌa ichiaba pꞌeruta misa tee pëidaitꞌee. Irua naaweda kꞌaripadakꞌa ewaa ma pꞌaratꞌa pꞌe wãdakꞌãri, ɨ̃rá aukꞌa kꞌaripaitꞌee jõma pꞌe aupadamerã.

Parãpa Cristode pia ijãapata. Ichiaba awaraarãmaa pia jarateepata Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Pia kꞌawapata Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨ parãmaa mãikꞌaapa pia kꞌĩsiapata awaraarã kꞌaripadaitꞌee. Ma awara taimaa pia akꞌɨpipata tai kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ. Ma jõma ne–inaa pia oopatakꞌa taipa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ aukꞌa chupɨria beerã pia kꞌaripadamerã pãchi pꞌaratꞌa tee pꞌanɨpa.

Mãga jarakꞌãri, mɨa jara kꞌinia–e: “Waibɨa téetɨ.” Jĩpꞌa nepɨrɨji Macedoniadepema ijãapataarãpa oodapꞌedaa parãpa aukꞌa teedamerã, tꞌãripa mãga oo kꞌinia pꞌanadairã. Mãgá teeruta pɨrã, jõmaarãmaa akꞌɨpidaitꞌee awaraa ijãapataarã aukꞌa kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ, ãra kꞌĩra kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ mĩda.

Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa ooda akꞌɨpiitꞌee parã kꞌinia iru bɨ. Ɨtꞌari Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãreede bapachi mĩda, eperãarã chupɨria kꞌawaa bapachi. Maperã ichia Akꞌõre eujãde iru bada jõmaweda atabëiji chupɨria nɨ̃ba cheitꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujãde. Mãga ooji parã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ata kꞌinia bada perã, irude ijãadapꞌeda, Akꞌõre truade iru ome pꞌananadamerã.

Ɨ̃rá mɨa parã ũraaitꞌee apema año pꞌaratꞌa pꞌe wãdapꞌedaa pꞌe aupadamerã. Parãpa apemaarã ijãapataarã kꞌãyaara naapɨara kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanajida pꞌaratꞌa pꞌe teedaitꞌee chupɨria beerãmaa. O–ĩa pꞌanajida mãgá kꞌaripa kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.
Mãgá tꞌãripa tee kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa, ɨ̃rá aukꞌa tꞌãri o–ĩa tee kꞌinia pꞌanadaipia bɨ, pꞌaratꞌa makꞌɨara wẽe pꞌanɨ jida pëidaitꞌee.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa akꞌɨpari tachi tꞌãride iru bɨ. Ichia kꞌinia bɨ tꞌãripa tee kꞌinia pꞌanadamerã. Ma–ãri iru pꞌanɨ pɨrã, ma–ãri teedai tꞌãri piapa. Jõdee waibɨa iru pꞌanɨ pɨrã, waibɨa teedai tꞌãri piapa. Teedaitꞌee wẽe pꞌanɨ pɨrã, ¿sãga teedai?
Mɨa kꞌinia–e parã chupɨria pꞌaneedamerã awaraarã kꞌaripa kꞌiniapa.

Nãgapai mɨa kꞌinia bɨ: aukꞌa iru pꞌanadamerã te, chikꞌo mãikꞌaapa pꞌaru. Ɨ̃rá parãpa awaraarã kꞌãyaara waapɨara iru pꞌanɨ pɨrã, teedai ãra kꞌaripadaitꞌee. Jõdee parã chupɨria jõnadakꞌãri, ãrapa parãmaa teedai.
Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichia jɨrɨtꞌerada eperãarãmaa teepari mãgá jededamerã, iru chonaarãwedapema ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Chi maná waibɨara pꞌedapꞌedaarãpa waibɨara jitada–e paji. Jõdee ma–ãriara pꞌedapꞌedaarãpa ma–ãriara jitada–e paji. Jededakꞌãri, aukꞌa jita wãjida.’
Mɨa gracias jara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa irua parã kꞌaripamaa bairã Titopa oo bɨ kꞌaurepa. Mɨa ooparikꞌa Titopa aukꞌa parã kꞌaripa kꞌinia bɨ.
Mɨa mãga kꞌawa bɨ iru o–ĩa bada perã chupɨria iididakꞌãri irumaa parã akꞌɨde wãmerã. Audú wã kꞌinia nɨ̃baji. Wãara taipa mãga iididai naaweda, kꞌĩsia iru baji wãitꞌee. Mapa wãitꞌee mãga kꞌinia bairã.
Tito ome awaraa ɨ̃pema aukꞌa pëidaitꞌee. Ijãapataarã bee chaa nama Macedonia eujãde jõmaarãpa mãgɨ́ kꞌawa pꞌanɨ, Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee pia jarateepari perã.

Ma ijãapataarãpa mãgɨ́ jɨrɨtꞌerajida aukꞌa tai ome nipamerã, pꞌaratꞌa pꞌe atee wãrutade Judeadepema chupɨria beerãmaa. Ma pꞌaratꞌa tee pëi pꞌanɨpa tachia jõmaarãmaa akꞌɨpidai oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Irua ne–inaa tachimaa teepari, tachia jõdee teedamerã chupɨria beerã kꞌaripadaitꞌee, ma awara akꞌɨpidaitꞌee ma ijãapataarã chupɨria beerãmaa tachia wãara ãra kꞌaripa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ.
Ma ɨ̃pema mãgá Tito ome pëidaitꞌee irua kꞌaripamerã ma pꞌaratꞌa waibɨa pꞌe ateeru misa. Mãgá tai ɨmɨateepataarãpa pedee pꞌanada–e pai tai ãpɨte, pꞌaratꞌa ũkꞌuru chɨadai jĩakꞌaapa.
Ichita ne–inaa kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa eperãarã kꞌĩrapite.

Ɨ̃pema awaraa ichiaba pëidaitꞌee ãra ome. Irua tai ichita kꞌaripa kꞌinia bɨ mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa pia oopari taipa oopipatakꞌa. Irua kꞌawaakꞌãri Tito parãmaa wãru mãikꞌaapa parã tꞌãri piapa aukꞌa pꞌaratꞌa tee pëidaitꞌee, o–ĩa aukꞌa wã kꞌinia baji.

Parã tꞌãidepemapa Tito kꞌawa–e bɨ pɨrã, jarátɨ iru mɨ kꞌõpꞌãyo pia na mimiade. Mɨ ome mimiapari parã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Iidiruta pɨrã apema omé nidaarã pari, jarátɨ nãpema ijãapataarãpa ãchi pari pëidapꞌedaa, ichiaba aukꞌa kꞌaripadamerã. Mãɨrã wãrutamaa kꞌawapipata jõmaarãmaa Cristota Tachi Waibɨa.

Mãɨrã araa panadakꞌãri, akꞌɨpítɨ ãra kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ tai kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨkꞌa. Mãgá waya wãdakꞌãri ãchi pꞌanapatamaa, nepɨrɨdai parãpa ãra pia akꞌɨ pꞌanadapꞌedaa. Mãgá ãra pëidapꞌedaarãpa kꞌawaadai wãara taipa jaradakꞌa parãpa wãara nejõmaata pia oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ.
Wãara na pꞌãdade mɨa parãmaa waa jara–e pɨjida, kꞌawa bɨ parãpa ma pꞌaratꞌa pꞌe tee pëidaitꞌee ijãapataarã chupɨria beerãmaa.

Mãga kꞌawa bɨ parãpa wãara chupɨria beerã kꞌaripa kꞌinia pꞌanadairã. Año aba paru parã Acaya eujãdepema ijãapataarãpa ma pꞌaratꞌa pꞌemaa pꞌaneedapꞌedaa. Mãga oo pꞌaneedakꞌãri, taipa o–ĩa nepɨrɨjida na Macedoniadepema ijãapataarãmaa. Mãga ũridakꞌãri, ãrapa aukꞌa kꞌaripa kꞌinia pꞌaneejida.
Maperãpɨ taipa Macedoniadepema ɨ̃pemaarã omé aukꞌa pëiruta Tito ome, parãpa ãramaa akꞌɨpidamerã wãara oojida taipa jaradakꞌa. Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ ma pꞌaratꞌa pꞌe iru pꞌanadamerã, aramãgá tee pëidaitꞌee.
Mɨ jãma panakꞌãri, awaraa Macedoniadepema ɨ̃pemaarã aukꞌa cheruta pɨrã mɨ ome mãikꞌaapa parãpa waide ooda–e pɨrã taipa jaradakꞌa ãchimaa, tai kꞌĩra nejasia pꞌaneedai; parã jida ichiaba.

Mapa mɨa chupɨria iidiji Titomaa iru chi apema ɨ̃pemaarã ome mɨ naa wãdamerã. Mãgá ãrapa parã kꞌaripadai parãpa kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa; pꞌaratꞌa jõmaweda pꞌe iru pꞌanadamerã mɨ panaru misa. Mãgá ichiaba apidaapa jarada–e pai mɨa parãmaa teepida. Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ parãpa tꞌãri pia teedamerã pãchia tee kꞌiniata.
¡Kꞌirãpátɨ! Eperãpa eujã ma–ãriide ne–uukꞌãri, makꞌɨara ewa–e. Jõdee chi eujã waibɨade ne–uu bɨpa waibɨa ewapari.
Eperã chaachaa teeipia bɨ ichi tꞌãride kꞌĩsia bɨkꞌa. Teeikꞌaraa bɨ teeamaa bɨde wa awaraapa irumaa teepi bairã. Tachi Akꞌõrepa chi tꞌãri pia teepari kꞌinia iru bɨ.

Parãpa mãgá tꞌãri piapa teeruta pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrépata parã kꞌaripai iru pꞌanadamerã te, chikꞌo mãikꞌaapa pꞌaru. Ma awara irua kꞌaripai audupɨara iru pꞌanadamerã kꞌaripadaitꞌee awaraarã parã kꞌãyaara chupɨriara chedee.
Tachi Akꞌõre chonaarãwedapema ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Eperã tꞌãri pia bɨpa ne–inaa pia oopari chupɨria beerãmaa tꞌãri pia bairã. Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ ichita pia akꞌɨpariitꞌee.’
Tachi Akꞌõre, chi netꞌatau oodapa ne–uu chaupipari, jõmaarãpa iru pꞌanadamerã kꞌodaitꞌee. ¿Audupɨara teei–ekꞌã chi tꞌãri pia pꞌanɨɨrãmaa ãchia awaraarã kꞌaripadamerã?

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga oopari perã, parãmaa aukꞌa teeitꞌee, parã aukꞌa tꞌãri pia pꞌanadairã. Mãgá parãpa waibɨa iru pꞌanadaitꞌee tai ome tee pëidaitꞌee Judeadepema chupɨria beerãmaa. Mãpai o–ĩapa ãchia gracias jaradaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõremaa ma pꞌaratꞌa tai juadepema jitadakꞌãri.
Mãgá parãpa kꞌaripadaitꞌee ãrapa iru pꞌanadamerã kꞌodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa jɨ̃daitꞌee. Mamĩda ichiaba kꞌaripadaitꞌee ãrapa Tachi Akꞌõremaa gracias jaradamerã.
Ma awara nãgá pia tee pꞌanɨpa awaraarãmaa mãikꞌaapa ãramaa, kꞌawaadaitꞌee parãpa Jesucristode wãara ijãapata mãikꞌaapa oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ irua oopi bɨkꞌa.
Ichiaba ãrapa parã kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ kꞌinia pꞌanadaitꞌee parã pari, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã mãgá kꞌaripapari perã.
Gracias jaradáma Tachi Akꞌõremaa irua jõmaarã kꞌãyaara ne–inaa pipɨara bɨ teeda perã, ichi warra pëikꞌãri tachi kꞌaripade. Pedee wẽe pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ ma pari irumaa gracias jaradaitꞌee.

Ɨ̃rá mɨ, Pablopa parã ũraaitꞌee Cristopa ũraadakꞌa na eujãde nipakꞌãri. Irua tꞌãri pia, kꞌĩrau–ee ũraaji. Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ parã tꞌãidepema ũkꞌuruurãpa jara pꞌanɨ mɨ waawee pɨkꞌa bɨ parã kꞌĩrapite bakꞌãri, jõdee kꞌartꞌa pꞌãkꞌãri, audú ɨtrɨa pedee jarapari.

¿Mãɨrãpa jara pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã mɨchi kꞌĩsiadoopapai jaratee nipapari, jarateepataarã jĩpꞌaarãpa oopatakꞌa? Mapa parãmaa mɨa enenee nɨ̃bɨ mãɨrã ikꞌaawaapa uchiadamerã mɨ jãma pai naaweda. Mãga jara bɨ mɨa wãara ãchi ɨtrɨaitꞌee perã, Akꞌõrepa mɨmaa mãgá pedeepiru pɨrã.
Wãara, tai na eujãde pꞌanapata eperãarã jĩpꞌaarãkꞌa. Mamĩda mãɨrãkꞌa tai aupedeedakꞌaa.
Mãɨrã pedee wẽsaa, imeraa pedeepata. Mamĩda tai jĩpꞌa pedeepata Akꞌõrepa pedeepi bɨkꞌa. Mãgá jõpipata jõma ãchia kꞌĩsia iru pꞌanɨ Cristode ijãapataarã ijãa amaapidaitꞌee.

Taipa jõpipata ãchia seewa jarapata, Akꞌõrepa tai itꞌaideepa wãarata jarakꞌãri. Ma awara Akꞌõrepa tai kꞌaripapari pꞌanaudamerã jõma ãchia Cristo ãpɨte seewa jarapata. Mãgá ãchia wãara kꞌawaadai Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bada ooitꞌee Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Ichiaba taipa Cristopa ooda ãchi–itꞌee jarapata, ãchia aukꞌa wãara irude ijãadamerã.
Mamĩda mãgá ijãa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã, ãchi tꞌãri pꞌuapidai Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Taipa mãga oodaitꞌee parãpa akꞌɨpidakꞌãri wãara oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ taipa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa.

Parã Corintodepemaarãpa eperãarã ɨ̃rɨpai akꞌɨpata. Ãchi kꞌĩra akꞌɨpata mãikꞌaapa ãchia audua pedee jara jõnɨ ũripata, ãchi tꞌãride iru pꞌanɨ kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanadai kꞌãyaara. ¿Mãga–ekꞌã? Parã tꞌãidepemapa kꞌĩsia bɨ pɨrã ichita wãara Cristopa pëida jarateemerã, aukꞌa kꞌawaaipia bɨ tai jida Cristopa pëida.

Kꞌĩra nejasia–ee mɨa nãga jaraitꞌee. Tachi Waibɨapa wãara jarapari tai itꞌaideepa mãikꞌaapa parã bɨji tai jua ekꞌari, taipa parã kꞌaripadamerã iru pari. Mapa taipa maarepida parãmaa ijãa amaapidakꞌaa. Jĩpꞌa kꞌaripapata pipɨara Cristode ijãadamerã.
Mɨa parã pꞌerapi kꞌinia–e bɨ kꞌartꞌa pꞌãdade pedee bɨpa.
¿Mɨ ãpɨte pedeepataarãpa jara pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã: “Pablopa kꞌartꞌa parãmaa pꞌãkꞌãri, audú ɨtrɨa pedee jarapari. Mamĩda ichi parã kꞌĩrapite bakꞌãri, waawee pɨkꞌa nɨ̃beeparida” a jõnɨ–ekꞌã?
Mãɨrãpa kꞌawaadaipia bɨ ãchia jaradakꞌa, mɨa wãara ɨtrɨa pedee jaraitꞌee, mamĩda ãchi kꞌĩrapite panakꞌãri.

Taipa ooda–e ãchia oopatakꞌa. Ãchia mãgapata: “Taipa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa, Cristopa pëida eperãarã mãgá pꞌanadaipia bɨda” apata. Mãpai ãchi pitapai mãgapata: “Táipata jõmaarã kꞌãyaara Akꞌõre netꞌaa pipɨara kꞌawa pꞌanɨda” apata. Mãɨrãpa awaraarã akꞌɨda–e Tachi Akꞌõrepa akꞌɨparikꞌa. Irua kꞌawapari eperã tꞌãride iru bɨ. Jõdee ãchia ɨ̃rɨpai akꞌɨpata. Chi mãgá oo pꞌanɨɨrã kꞌĩsia kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawa bɨ tai tꞌãride iru pꞌanɨ. Taipa pida ichiaba kꞌawa pꞌanɨ. Iruata tai pëiji judio–eerã tꞌãidee Cristopa ooda jarateede chi waide ũrida–ee pꞌanɨɨrãmaa. Maperãpɨ parã tꞌãide jaratee nipajida. Oojida Akꞌõrepa oopidakꞌa.
Akꞌõrepa tai parãmaa pëi–e pada paara, maarepida jarateeda–e pakꞌaji. Mamĩda mãga–e paji. Irua tai naapɨara pëiji parã tꞌãidee, jarateedamerã Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee.

Mamĩda ¿mɨ ãpɨte pedeepataarãpa jara jõnɨ–ekꞌã ãchiata Akꞌõre netꞌaa pia jarateepata? Mãga jarapata parãpa ãchi mɨ kꞌãyaara pipɨara akꞌɨdamerã. Taipa mãgá oodakꞌaa. Jĩpꞌa taipa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ parãpa pipɨara kꞌawaa kꞌinia pꞌanadamerã Cristopa parãmaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ. Mãga kꞌawaadakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa wãara oodakꞌãri irua oopiparikꞌa, parãpa tai audupɨara kꞌaripadai na mimia ome.

Tai mãgá kꞌariparuta pɨrã, parã tꞌãideepa tꞌɨmɨpɨara wãdai jarateede. Tꞌĩu kꞌiniada–e awaraa jarateepataarã mimia pꞌanɨmãi, tai nipada–e perã awaraa jarateepataarã nipapatakꞌa. Ãchia ne–inaa ooda–eeta jara nipapata ne–inaa oodakꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Eperãpa jara kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã ichiata ne–inaa kꞌawaara bɨ awaraarã kꞌãyaara, mãga jaraipia bɨ ichia kꞌawaa bairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pia akꞌɨpari.’
Parãpa chi pedee audua pedeepari pia akꞌɨdaikꞌaraa bɨ. Jĩpꞌa pia akꞌɨdaipia bɨ eperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa pia akꞌɨpari.
Ɨ̃rá mɨa kꞌinia bɨ parãpa choodamerã mɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee pɨkꞌa pedee bɨ misa. Mɨ chupɨria kꞌawáatɨ. Mamĩda mãgá pedeei naaweda, mɨa nãga jara kꞌinia bɨ.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã kꞌinia iru bɨkꞌa, mɨa pida parã kꞌinia iru bɨ. Ara eperãpa ichi kꞌau jiwaaparikꞌa iru araa pai naaweda chi ɨmɨkꞌĩra ome, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨa parã jiwaa pɨkꞌapari. Kꞌinia bɨ Cristodepai ijãadamerã mɨa parãmaa jarateedakꞌa.

Mamĩda mɨa waawee bɨ Netuara Poro Waibɨapa chi naapɨara wẽra Eva kꞌũradakꞌa, parã jida aukꞌa kꞌũrai jĩakꞌaapa. Irua imeraa pedeeji Evamaa taama itꞌaideepa, Evapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada ijãa amaamerã. Ɨ̃rá aukꞌa parãmaa imeraa pedee bɨ mɨ ãpɨte pedeepataarã itꞌaideepa, parã Cristode ijãa amaa wãdamerã.

Jarateepari tai awara parã tꞌãide panakꞌãri, ¿parã kꞌɨɨrɨ ẽesaa pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã ũridaitꞌee mãgɨpa jara bɨ? Parã mãga pꞌanɨ, mãgɨpa jaratee ni mĩda Jesús awara bɨ taipa jarateedapꞌedaa kꞌãyaara. Ichiaba mãgá ũri kꞌinia pꞌanɨ, mãgɨpa jaratee bɨ mĩda Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure awara bɨ taipa jarateedapꞌedaa kꞌãyaara. ¿Taipa parãmaa jarateeda–e pajikꞌã Cristopa tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atapari iru piuda kꞌaurepa? Mãga bɨta, ¿sãapꞌeda parãpa ũri kꞌinia pꞌanɨma mãgɨpa jaratee bɨ?

Parãpa mãgɨ́ ‘Cristopa pëida pipɨara bɨ’ chi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã ome pipɨara akꞌɨ pꞌanɨ mĩda Akꞌõrepa pëida kꞌãyaara, mɨa ãchi mãga akꞌɨ–e. Mɨ ãchi kꞌãyaara ekꞌariara bɨ–e, Akꞌõrepa mɨ na mimia oode pëida perã.
Wãara, mɨa pedee wẽsaa pedeekꞌaa ãchia oopatakꞌa. Mamĩda pia kꞌawa bɨ mɨa jaratee bɨ. Parãpa pia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ taipa ichita ne–inaa jõmaweda kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa jarateepata.

¿Parãpa kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨkꞌã mɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooji parã juadepema pꞌaratꞌa jita–e pakꞌãri? Parã tꞌãide bakꞌãri, mɨchi juadoopa mimia bapachi pꞌaratꞌa jitaitꞌee chikꞌo–itꞌee. Jõdee mɨa Tachi Akꞌõre pedee pia jarateeji parãpa pipɨara kꞌawaadamerã Cristopa parãmaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ. Jaratee–e paji parã pꞌaratꞌa jita kꞌiniapa.
Ma kꞌãyaara pꞌaratꞌa jitaji awaraa ijãapataarã juadepema. Ãra pꞌaratꞌa jãri pɨkꞌa ataji parã kꞌaripaitꞌee.

Ma awara parã tꞌãide bakꞌãri, pꞌaratꞌa wa ne–inaa wẽ–e pakꞌãri, mɨa parãmaa maarepida iidi–e paji. Macedoniadepema ɨ̃pemaarã mɨmaa chedakꞌãri, mɨ kꞌaripajida. Mamĩda mɨa parãmaa iidi–e paji mãikꞌaapa iidi–e paitꞌee waya parã akꞌɨde wãkꞌãri.
Mɨa wãarata jara bɨ Cristopa wãarata jaradakꞌa. Acaya eujãdepema apidaapa mɨa jarada awara mɨmaa oopida–e paitꞌee.
Kꞌĩsianáatɨ mɨa parã pꞌaratꞌa jita kꞌinia–e paji, parã kꞌinia–e bada perã. Tachi Akꞌõrépata kꞌawa bɨ mɨa parã kꞌinia iru bɨ.

Mɨa parã pꞌaratꞌa jita kꞌinia–e nãga perã. ¿Mɨ ãpɨte pedeepataarãpa jara pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã ãchi wãara Cristopa parãmaa pëida, parãpa pꞌaratꞌa pꞌaapata perã ãchi mimia pari? Pꞌaratꞌa iidi wãpata ãchi wãrutamaa. Mamĩda taipa mãga oodakꞌaa. ¿Jara pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã ãchi aukꞌa pꞌanɨ tai ome? Mamĩda taipa pꞌaratꞌa iididakꞌaa tai jarateepata pari.
Mãgee eperãarã Cristopa pëida–e. Ãchita Cristopa pëidada a pꞌanɨ mĩda, mãga pꞌanɨ–e. Jĩpꞌa kꞌũrayaa pꞌanɨ. Seewata jaratee nipapata Cristopa pëida eperãarãkꞌa.
Parã pꞌera pɨkꞌa pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ kꞌawaadaitꞌee ãchia mãgá kꞌũra nipapata. Netuara Poro Waibɨa seewata ɨtꞌaripema ángel kꞌĩra wãree pɨkꞌa padaipari eperãarã kꞌũraitꞌee.

Mãgá ichi mimiapataarã aukꞌa seewata Cristopa pëidakꞌa padaipata. Mãga oopata eperãarãmaa ijãapidaitꞌee ãchia jara pꞌanɨkꞌa oodaipia bɨ Akꞌõre eujãdee wãdaitꞌee. Mamĩda ma jara pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate irua mãgɨɨrã miapiitꞌee, iru kꞌĩrapite panadakꞌãri.
Waya chupɨria iidiitꞌee parãpa mɨ pedee ũridamerã. Parãdepema ũkꞌuruurãpa mɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee pɨkꞌa akꞌɨ pꞌanɨ mĩda, mɨ ita–aria pedeepítɨ.
Tachi Waibɨapa mɨmaa jarapi–e mɨa ɨ̃rá jaraitꞌee. Kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee pɨkꞌa mɨa nãgɨ́ pedee audua pedeeitꞌee ma seewa jarateepataarãpa oopatakꞌa.
Mãgɨɨrãpa jarai awaa pꞌanadairã ãchia oo pꞌanɨ, mɨa aukꞌa jaraitꞌee mɨa ooda.
Mãgɨɨrãpa parã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanɨda a jõnapata. ¿Mãga–ekꞌã? Mamĩda parã pia choopata ũridakꞌãri ma kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerãpa jara jõnɨ.

Wãara pia choopata ãchia parã chokꞌa pꞌanɨ mĩda ãchi esclavoorãkꞌa. Ichiaba choopata ãchia parã kꞌũra pꞌanɨ mĩda imeraa pedee pꞌanɨpa, pꞌaratꞌa teedamerã maa–e pɨrã ijãadamerã ãchia jaratee pꞌanɨ. Ichiaba mãgá choopata ãchi audua nida mĩda pãchi tꞌãide, kꞌĩsia pꞌanadairã parã kꞌãyaara ne–inaa jõma pipɨara kꞌawa pꞌanɨ. Ma awara parã mãgá choopata ãchia parãmaa ikꞌachia jara pꞌanɨ mĩda.
Mɨ kꞌĩra nejasia pɨkꞌa bɨ taipa mãga ooda–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã parãmaa wãdakꞌãri. Mamĩda tai waawee pɨkꞌa pꞌanadairã, mãga ooda–e paji. ¿Wãara–ekꞌã?
Ɨ̃rata mɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee pɨkꞌa pedeeitꞌee. Mɨ ãpɨte pedeepataarãkꞌa mɨa ooda jaraitꞌee.

Ma seewa jarateepataarãpa mãgapata: “Táipata hebreo pedee pedeepata.” Mɨ jida aukꞌa. Ichiaba mãgapata: “Taita Akꞌõre eperãarã; Israel pidaarã.” Mɨ jida aukꞌa. Mãgapata: “Taita Abrahamdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã.” Mɨ jida aukꞌa.

¿Jarapata–ekꞌã? “Taita Cristo–itꞌee mimiapata.” Mɨ ãchi kꞌãyaara Cristo–itꞌee pipɨara mimiapari. Ɨ̃rata mɨ eperã kꞌĩra kꞌawa–ee bɨkꞌa pedeemaa bɨ. Ãchi kꞌãyaara mɨ audupɨara ne–inaa kꞌachia pꞌasapari: Cristode ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa mɨ carcelde tꞌɨ nɨ̃bɨjida; mɨ wɨ iru pꞌanajida; mɨ perá piuji.
Mɨ wãda joisomaa wãru chaa judiorã waibɨarãpa mɨ wɨpipachida. Wɨda treinta y nueve wɨjida soopa.

Wãda õpee wãru chaa Roma pidaarã waibɨarãpa mɨ pakꞌurupa wɨpijida. Wãda abaade mɨ perá piuji judiorãpa mãupa mɨmaa batꞌadakꞌãri. Pꞌusade wãda õpeede barco pirubaaidachi mãikꞌaapa ma wãda abaade barco pirubaaipꞌeda, tokꞌesá mɨ pakꞌuru ɨ̃rɨ bataudachi kꞌãima aba.

Mɨ ode wã nide perá nãgá piuji: to choma nɨ̃bɨde sĩa wãde; nechɨapataarãpa mɨ netꞌaa chɨa ata cherutade; mɨchi aukꞌaarã judiorãpa mɨ wawamaa pꞌanɨde; judio–eerãpa mɨ pꞌua oomaa pꞌanɨde. Ma awara pꞌuurude bɨde mãikꞌaapa eperãarã pꞌanadakꞌaamãi ode wãde, mɨ jɨrɨjida peedaitꞌee. Pꞌusade wãdade nãumiapa barco atadachi. Edaare Cristode ijãapatada apataarãpa paara pedee kꞌachia jarajida mɨ ãpɨte, mɨa jarateepari perã ũraa chiwidi Moisepa pꞌãda kꞌãyaara.

Kꞌãima chokꞌara mɨ ɨ̃ikꞌaa paji mãikꞌaapa pꞌoyaa kꞌãi–e paji mimia nɨ̃bɨpa maa–e pɨrã jaratee nɨ̃bɨpa. Edaare jarrapisia nɨ̃baji maa–e pɨrã opisia. Ewari chokꞌara mɨ nekꞌo–e paji. Ma awara jĩsua nɨ̃baji, pꞌaru pia wẽe bada perã.
Ma ne–inaa kꞌachiade mãikꞌaapa awaraa ne–inaa kꞌachia mɨa nama jara–e bɨde, mɨ ichita kꞌĩsia nɨ̃baji ijãapataarã bee chaa, ãrapa ijãa amaadai jĩakꞌaapa.
Ijãapari aba juatau wẽedaru pɨrã, mɨ jida mãgadaipari. Jõdee awaraapa ma ijãapari pꞌekꞌau kꞌachiade baaipiru pɨrã, mɨ kꞌĩraudaipari mãgɨ́ ome.
Mɨ pedee audua wãara jara kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã, mãgara jarai mɨ juatau wẽe bada, ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa mɨ miapidaitꞌee pakꞌãri.
Tachi Akꞌõre, Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo Akꞌõrepa kꞌawa bɨ mɨ seewa–e bɨ na jõma jarakꞌãri. ¡Jõmaarãpa irumaa ichita o–ĩa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daipia bɨ, irua ne–inaa jõmaweda oopari perã ichi juapa!

Wãara mɨ Cristode ewaa ijãa bakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ uchiapiji mɨ miapidaitꞌee pꞌanadapꞌedaarã juadeepa. Mãga paji mɨ Damasco pꞌuurude bakꞌãri. Rey Aretapa jaraji ma pꞌuuru pidaarã akꞌɨparimaa pꞌuuru jɨ̃a paraa bɨdamerã mɨ jita atadaitꞌee.
Mamĩda mɨ kꞌõpꞌãyoorãpa mɨ kꞌaripajida. Kꞌoraa choma bɨde tꞌɨ atajida mãikꞌaapa chi pꞌuuru ikꞌaawa tꞌɨakꞌau jẽra bɨ uria badadeepa mɨ ɨrabai pëijida. Mãgá mɨ mãɨrã juadeepa uchiaji.

Mɨchi kꞌinia ne–inaa awaraa nepɨrɨitꞌee, parãpa kꞌawaadamerã mɨchi ituaba na mimia pꞌoyaa ookꞌaa. Jaraitꞌee Tachi Waibɨapa unupida mɨmaa kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌa bɨde. Ne–inaa eperãarãpa waide kꞌawada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa mɨmaa kꞌawaapiji.
Mɨa Cristode ijãapari kꞌawa bɨ.
Mama ɨtꞌari bɨde irua ũriji ne–inaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa apidaamaa jarapikꞌaa.
Pedee audua wãara jara kꞌinia bada paara, mɨa waapɨara ma ɨtꞌaa wãdade jarakꞌaji. Mamĩda jĩpꞌa jara kꞌinia bɨ mɨchi ituabaapa pꞌoyaa oo–e pada.

Akꞌõrepa mɨmaa unupida audua jarakꞌaji, kꞌĩra kꞌawa–ee pɨkꞌa, wãara mɨa mãga unuda perã. Mamĩda mɨa mãga oo–e paitꞌee. Kꞌinia–e bɨ awaraarãpa mɨ pia akꞌɨdamerã, Akꞌõrepa ichi eujã mɨmaa unupida perã. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌinia bɨ mɨ pia akꞌɨdamerã mɨa jaratee bɨ kꞌaurepa mãikꞌaapa mɨ tꞌãri pia bɨ kꞌaurepa jõmaarã ome.

Ma awara audua banaamerã ma ne–inaa pi–ia unuda kꞌaurepa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ miapiji Netuara Poro Waibɨa eere bɨ juapa. Ne–ɨɨrɨ tachi kꞌapꞌɨade awa nɨ̃bɨkꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa ma netuarapa mɨ miapipari. Mãgá mia nɨ̃bɨde, maarepida mɨ pedee audua pedee–e bɨ, mɨchi ituaba aɨdeepa pꞌoyaa uchia–e bairã.
Chupɨria iidida õpee enenee nɨ̃baji Tachi Waibɨamaa mɨ waa mãgá miapinaamerã.

Mamĩda irua pꞌanauji: “Mãga–eda aji. Mɨa pɨ kꞌaripaitꞌeeda aji, choomerã. Pɨ chupɨria nɨ̃bakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa choo–e pakꞌãri, mɨa pɨ kꞌaripaitꞌeeda aji, choomerã.” Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga jarada perã mɨ kꞌĩra nejasia–e bɨ jaraitꞌee mɨ chupɨria nɨ̃bada. Mãgá jarai Cristopa mɨ kꞌaripapari perã choomerã.

Wãara tꞌãri o–ĩa bɨ Cristo kꞌaurepa mɨ nãgá chupɨria nɨ̃bakꞌãri: mɨmaa awaraarãpa ikꞌachia jaradakꞌãri; netꞌaa wẽe bakꞌãri; mɨ ɨmɨatee iru pꞌanadakꞌãri; mɨ kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bakꞌãri; mãgá nɨ̃bakꞌãri. Mãgá tꞌãri o–ĩa bai kꞌawa bairã mɨchi ituaba pꞌoyaa choo–e pakꞌãri, Cristopa mɨ kꞌaripaitꞌee.

Parã kꞌaurepa mɨ eperã kꞌĩra kꞌawa–ee pɨkꞌa pedee audua pedeemaa bɨ. Parã́pata mɨ tꞌo pꞌanadaipia bɨ, mɨchi itu tꞌo bai kꞌãyaara. Mɨ maarepida ekꞌariara bɨ–e ma Cristopa pëida apataarã kꞌãyaara, ãchia mɨ kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨda a pꞌanɨ mĩda.

¿Parãpa kꞌirãpada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda mɨ kꞌapꞌɨa pari parã tꞌãide nipakꞌãri? Ma ooda kꞌaurepapai parãpa ijãadaipia bɨ mɨta wãara Cristopa pëida. Mamĩda mãga ooda–e paji. Mɨ kꞌapꞌɨa pari Tachi Akꞌõrepa oo bɨ misa ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa, mɨ choopachi parãdepema ũkꞌuruurãpa mɨmaa ɨmɨateedapꞌedaa.

Jõma mɨa ooda apemaarã ijãapataarã tꞌãide aukꞌa ooji parã tꞌãide. ¿Kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨkꞌã parã apemaarã ijãapataarã ekꞌariara pꞌanɨ, mɨa parã juadepema pꞌaratꞌa jita–e pada perã? Mãga kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ pɨrã, ¡mɨ perdonáatɨ!

¡Ũrítɨ! Na wãrupa parãmaa wãda õpee paitꞌee. Etꞌewa jaradakꞌa mɨa maarepida iidi–e paitꞌee parã juadepema. Parã pꞌaratꞌa kꞌinia–e. Jĩpꞌa kꞌinia bɨ parãpa wãara Cristode ijãadamerã. Warrarãpa ãchi akꞌõreerã akꞌɨdakꞌaa. Akꞌõreerã́pata ãchi warrarã akꞌɨpata.

Mɨ parã akꞌõrekꞌa bairã, mɨa iru bɨ jõmaweda teei, mɨchi kꞌapꞌɨa paara, tꞌãripa parãpa Cristode ijãadamerã. Mɨa parã mãgá audú kꞌinia iru bɨ. Jõdee parãpa mɨ makꞌɨara kꞌiniada–e iru pꞌanɨ. ¿Wãara–ekꞌã?
Wãara mɨa maarepida pꞌaratꞌa iidi–e paji parã tꞌãide bakꞌãri. Mamĩda ¿mɨ ãpɨte pedeepataarãpa jara jõnɨ–ekꞌã mɨa parã kꞌũraji?
¿Parãpa kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã mɨa parã kꞌũraji mɨ kꞌõpꞌãyoorã pëida kꞌaurepa? ¡Mamĩda mãga–e!

Wãara mɨa chupɨria iidiji Titomaa parã akꞌɨde wãmerã mãikꞌaapa iru ome awaraa ɨ̃pema pëiji. Mamĩda parãpa pia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Titopa parã kꞌũra–e paji, iru aukꞌa mɨkꞌa tꞌãri pia bapari perã parã ome. Aukꞌa parã kꞌaripa kꞌinia pꞌanapata.

¿Parãpa kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨkꞌã mɨa ma jõma jara aupada jaraji pꞌanautꞌee mɨ ãpɨte pedeepataarãmaa, mãgá parãpa mɨ pia akꞌɨdamerã? Mãga–e. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawa bɨ mɨ tꞌãride iru bɨ, Cristo mɨ ome bapari perã. Iruata mɨmaa mãga jarapiji. Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, mɨa ma jõma jaraji parã kꞌaripaitꞌee pipɨara Cristode ijãadamerã.

Mamĩda waawee bɨ mɨ jãmaa wãkꞌãri, parã mãga unu–e pai jĩakꞌaapa. Wãara parã waide pia ijãada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã, parãpa ichiaba mɨ unu kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadai. Mɨ jãma panakꞌãri, unu kꞌinia–e parãpa nãga oomaa pꞌanɨ: nepɨra jɨrɨmaa chĩara ome; chĩara kꞌĩra unuamaa netꞌaa kꞌaurepa; kꞌĩrau jõnɨ chĩara ome; jõma kꞌɨ̃a jõnɨ pãchi–itꞌee; ikꞌachia jaramaa chĩaramaa maa–e pɨrã chĩara ãpɨte pedeemaa; audua jõnɨ; pariatua ne–inaa oomaa pꞌanɨ.

Ma awara mɨa waawee bɨ mɨ jãmaa wãkꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ waya kꞌĩra nejasiapiitꞌee, parãpa waide kꞌachia oo amaada–e pꞌanadairã. Wãara mɨ jẽedariitꞌee unuru pɨrã parãdepemaarã ũkꞌuru atꞌãri kꞌĩsia kꞌachia nipapata, kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe. ¿Parã atꞌãri wẽraarã ome pariatua kꞌãi jõnɨ–ekꞌã, waide oo amaa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadairã parãpa naawedapema kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopatapꞌedaa?
Mɨa etꞌewa jaradakꞌa nãgɨ́ wãrupa parã akꞌɨde wãda õpee paitꞌee. Jãma panakꞌãri, parã atꞌãri kꞌachiade pꞌanɨ pɨrã, mɨa ooitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa chonaarãweda pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa:
‘Eperãpa chĩara ɨmɨateekꞌãri, iru miapii naaweda, irua kꞌachia ooda unudapꞌedaarã omé wa õpee jɨrɨdaipia bɨ, aukꞌa jaradamerã ãrapa unudapꞌedaa.’

Mɨ parãmaa wãda omeede jaraji chi kꞌachia oo pꞌanadapꞌedaarãmaa mɨa ãchi chupɨria kꞌawa–e paitꞌee, ma kꞌachia oo amaada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã, mɨ pai naaweda. Ɨ̃rá jõmaarãmaa mɨa jara pëiru wãara ãchi chupɨria kꞌawa–e paitꞌee mɨ jãma panakꞌãri.

Parãpa kꞌinia pꞌanɨda a pꞌanɨ mɨa akꞌɨpimerã Cristopa pedeepari mɨ kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Kꞌawaadaitꞌee mɨ jãma panakꞌãri. Cristo eperã juatau wẽe bɨkꞌa bɨ–e. Jõma oopari ichia kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã. Mãgá aukꞌa ooitꞌee parã tꞌãide, kꞌachia oo amaada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã.

Wãara iru juatau wẽe pɨkꞌa baji kurusode piukꞌãri. Mamĩda ɨ̃rá ichita chokꞌai bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru chokꞌai pꞌirabaipida perã. Tai jida juatau wẽe pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda iru ome araa pꞌanapata perã, ichiaba ichita chokꞌai pꞌanapataadaitꞌee iru ome. Maperã taipa parã nepɨra akꞌɨdai irua kꞌaripakꞌãri.

Pia kꞌĩsíatɨ parã tꞌãri chaachaa. ¿Wãara Jesucristode ijãapatakꞌã? Mãgá ijãa pꞌanɨ pɨrã, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Cristo bapari parã ome. Mamĩda pꞌoyaa ooda–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã irua oopi bɨkꞌa, wãara iru ba–e parã ome. ¿Wãara–ekꞌã?
Parãpa taipa oopata pia akꞌɨdakꞌãri, kꞌawaadai wãara Cristopa tai pëiji, taipa oopata perã irua oopi bɨkꞌa.

Mamĩda parãpa tai atꞌãri akꞌɨda–e pꞌanɨ mĩda Cristopa pëidakꞌa, taipa ɨtꞌaa iidimaa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã kꞌaripamerã ne–inaa kꞌachia oonaadamerã. Iidida–e irua parã tꞌãri pꞌuapimerã tai juapa. Jĩpꞌa iidi pꞌanɨ parãpa ne–inaa pia oodamerã irua ichideerãmaa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, taipa apida tꞌãri pꞌuapida–e Tachi Akꞌõrepa taimaa oopiparikꞌa.

Wãara Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai pëipari ɨtrɨadamerã chi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã ijãapataarã tꞌãide pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda mãgɨɨrãpa Akꞌõremaa chupɨria iididakꞌãri, ma kꞌachia oo amaa pꞌanɨ pɨrã, mãgá ɨtrɨada–e paitꞌee, Akꞌõrepa chi chupɨria iidirutaarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapipari perã.
Tai o–ĩa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai pëi–e pakꞌãri ijãapataarã ɨtrɨade. Mapa irumaa iidi pꞌanɨ parãpa pipɨara ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa oodamerã Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Ma–itꞌee mɨa na kꞌartꞌa parãmaa pꞌãji mɨ wãi naaweda. Mɨa parã ɨtrɨa kꞌinia–e bɨ mãikꞌaapa apida tꞌãri pꞌuapi kꞌinia–e bɨ, Akꞌõrepa mɨmaa mãga oopi bɨ mĩda. Tꞌãri pꞌuapii kꞌãyaara, mɨa parã kꞌaripa kꞌinia bɨ pipɨara ijãadamerã. Ma–itꞌeepɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ parãmaa pëiji.

Ɨ̃rá ɨ̃pemaarã, na kꞌartꞌa aupa kꞌinia bɨ. Kꞌinia bɨ parã o–ĩa pꞌanapataadamerã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa jõmaweda oo kꞌinia pꞌanapataadamerã Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Tꞌãri aukꞌa, kꞌãiwee, chikꞌinia pꞌanapatáatɨ mɨa ũraadakꞌa. Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã pia akꞌɨitꞌee, irua eperãarã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapipari perã mãikꞌaapa chikꞌinia pꞌanapipari perã.
Ɨ̃pemaarã ome chikꞌinia saludaapatáatɨ parãpa ichita oopatakꞌa. Nãpema Cristode ijãapataarãpa parãmaa salude pëiruta.

Taipa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa parã kꞌaripamerã. Ichiaba kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã chikꞌinia pꞌanapimerã mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa parã jõmaarãmaa kꞌawapimerã wãara Cristodeerã.
Mãgapai paji.

Mɨ, Pablopa na kꞌartꞌa pꞌãru parã Galacia eujãdepema Cristode ijãapataarãmaa. Eperãarãpa mɨ jɨrɨtꞌerada–e paji. Ichiaba mɨ pëida–e paji. Tachi Akꞌõre, Cristo chokꞌai pꞌirabaipidapata mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji mãikꞌaapa Cristopa mɨ pëiji.
Jõma tachi ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa nama mɨ ome aukꞌa pꞌanɨɨrãpa salude pëiruta parã Cristode ijãapataarã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata chaa.
Taipa ɨtꞌaa iidipata Tachi Akꞌõre Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo ome parã pia akꞌɨ pꞌanadamerã. Mãgá kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru badakꞌa Cristo piuji tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa. Ichi ita–aria peepiji tachi kꞌaripa ataitꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa kꞌachia oopatadeepa.
Maperã ichita ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dáma Tachi Akꞌõremaa jaradaitꞌee iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara tꞌãri piara bapari. Amén.

Mamĩda mɨ pꞌera pɨkꞌa bɨ taarã–e weda parãpa ijãa amaadaruta perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru badade ooitꞌee Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Iru kꞌapꞌɨa pari Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã chupɨria kꞌawaaji mãikꞌaapa jɨrɨji irude ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa wãdamerã. Mamĩda parãpa mãga ijãa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara ijãa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ awaraa ne–inaa kꞌaurepa ɨtꞌaa wãdai.
¡Mamĩda mãga–e! Eperãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa parãmaa kꞌĩsia awara–awaraapiruta. Mãɨrãpa ne–inaa awara jaratee kꞌinia pꞌanɨ, Tachi Akꞌõre pedee pia jarateedai kꞌãyaara.
Mapa taipa wa ɨtꞌaripema angeleerãpa paara jarateeruta pɨjida taipa naaweda jarateeda awara, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãɨrã atuapiipia bɨ.
Parãpa ijãajida taipa naaweda jarateedapꞌedaa. Mapa mɨa waya jarai ma etꞌewa jarada. Abaapa jarateeru pɨrã taipa Cristode jarateeda kꞌãyaara awara, mãgɨ́ atuaipia bɨ.

Mɨa jara kꞌinia–e bɨ eperãarãpa mɨ pia akꞌɨdamerã mɨa jaratee bɨ kꞌaurepa. Mãga ooda paara, pꞌoyaa oo–e pakꞌaji Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Cristode ijãai naaweda, mãga ooji mĩda, ɨ̃rá jĩpꞌa na mimia oo kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa, iruata mɨ pia akꞌɨmerã.
Ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, mɨa nãga kꞌawapi kꞌinia bɨ parãmaa. Mɨa Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee parã tꞌãide jaratee nipakꞌãri, jaratee–e paji mɨchi kꞌĩsiadoopa
maa–e pɨrã awaraapa mɨmaa jarateeda. Jara–e paji eperãpa jara pëida. Jĩpꞌa jaraji Jesucristopa mɨmaa kꞌawapida.
Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mɨa ooda atꞌãri judiorãpa ijãapatade ijãa bakꞌãri. Tachi Akꞌõredeerã audú jɨrɨ nipapachi peeitꞌee, mãɨrã jõpi kꞌinia bada perã.
Maapai judiorãpa ijãapata audupɨara kꞌawaa wãji, mɨ ome año aukꞌa iru pꞌanadapꞌedaarã kꞌãyaara. Jõmaarã kꞌãyaara pipɨara oo kꞌinia baji judiorãpa oopata, chonaarãweda ũraapatapꞌedaakꞌa.
Mãga baji mĩda, ɨ̃rá mɨa kꞌawa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru baji mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraitꞌee oomerã ichia oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãga ooji mɨ tꞌoi naaweda, ichi wãara tꞌãri pia bapari perã.
Maperã ichi Warra kꞌawapiji mɨmaa, judio–eerã tꞌãide mɨa jarateenamerã ichi Warrapa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mamĩda mãga kꞌawapikꞌãri, mɨ apidaamaa wã–e paji ũraa iidide.

Ichiaba wã–e paji Jerusalendee Cristo ome nipapatapꞌedaarãmaa ne–inaa iidide, Cristopa ãra mɨ naa pëiji mĩda jarateede. Ma kꞌãyaara, ma tꞌẽepai wãji Arabia eujãdee ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃de mɨchi ituaba. Maapꞌeda waya cheji Damasco pꞌuurudee.
Wãara, Cristode ijãadakꞌãriipa año õpee parumaa, mɨ Jerusalendee wãji Pedro akꞌɨde mãikꞌaapa tomia omé mama beeji.
Mamĩda mama bɨde Cristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã awara unu–e paji. Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo ɨ̃pema, Santiago aupaita unuji.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawa bɨ mɨa na pꞌã bɨde seewa jara–e bɨ. Wãarata jara bɨ.
Ma tꞌẽepai Jerusalendeepa wãji Siria eujãdee mãikꞌaapa Cilicia eujãdee.
Maapai Cristode ijãapataarã Judea eujãdepemaarãpa mɨ waide kꞌawada–e pꞌanajida.
Aba na pedee ũrijida awaraarã ijãapataarã itꞌaideepa: “Tachi jɨrɨ nipadapa ɨ̃rá jarateemaa bɨ Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee, naaweda irude ijãa amaapi kꞌinia baji mĩda.”
Mãga ũridakꞌãri, ma ijãapataarã o–ĩa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃jida gracias jaradaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõremaa mɨ pari.
Ma naa wãda tꞌẽepai Jerusalendee, catorce años parumaa waya wãji tachi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa Bernabé ome. Mɨa tachi ɨ̃pema Tito aukꞌa ateeji.

Wãji Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨmaa kꞌawapida perã wãipia bɨ. Mama bɨde ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarã taide mɨa jaraji pedee pia jõma mɨa Cristode jarateepari judio–eerã tꞌãide nipakꞌãri. Mãga ooji kꞌawa kꞌinia bada perã ãrapa pia akꞌɨdai wa pia akꞌɨda–e pai mɨa jarateepari judio–eerãmaa. Mãga kꞌawa kꞌinia baji pariatua na mimia oo kꞌinia–e bada perã.
Kꞌĩsia nɨ̃baji mĩda ãrapa jaradaitꞌee, mãga uchia–e paji. Mɨ kꞌõpꞌãyo, Tito, judio–ee paji mĩda, maarepida jarada–e paji ichi kꞌapꞌɨade tauchaa bɨpimerã.

Ma–itꞌeeta wãjida ãramaa iidide. Ũkꞌuru wãara Cristode ijãada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaarã mera tꞌĩujida judio–eerã ijãapataarã tꞌãide, tachi ijãapata Cristode pia kꞌawaade. Jarajida tauchaa bɨpidaipia bɨ judio–eerã ijãapataarã ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã kꞌapꞌɨade. Mãgeerãpa kꞌiniada–e tachi ijãadamerã Jesucristodepai, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi pia akꞌɨmerã. Tachi aukꞌa esclavoorãkꞌa pꞌanapi kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Moisepa pꞌãda jua ekꞌari, judiorã chonaarãweda pꞌanapatapꞌedaakꞌa.
Taipa maarepida kꞌĩsiada–e paji oodaitꞌee mãgeerãpa oopi kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa. Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee, ma pedee wãara jɨ̃a kꞌinia pꞌanajida parã–itꞌee.

Ma awara tachi waibɨarãda apataarãpa ne–inaa awara jarada–e paji mɨa jarateemerã. Mɨa jara bɨ “tachi ijãapataarã waibɨarãda apata” ũkꞌuruurãpa atꞌãri jarapata perã Cristo ome nipapatapꞌedaarã awaraa ijãapataarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda mɨa pꞌua–e bɨ chisãgɨ́ ijãapari waibɨara bɨ mãikꞌaapa chisãgɨ́ ijãapari ekꞌariara bɨ. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichideerã jõmaweda aukꞌa pia akꞌɨpari.

Mãgɨ́ ijãapataarã waibɨarãpa ne–inaa awara jarateepidai kꞌãyaara mɨmaa, mɨ bɨjida Tachi Akꞌõre juade waapɨara judio–eerã tꞌãide jarateenamerã Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Kꞌawajida Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ ma–itꞌee jɨrɨtꞌeraji, Pedro jɨrɨtꞌeradakꞌa judiorãmaa jarateenamerã.

Kꞌawaadakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãara mɨ kꞌaripa bɨ judio–eerãmaa jarateenamerã, Santiago, Pedro Juan ome, chi ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarã waibɨarãda apata, ãchi jua teejida mɨmaa mãikꞌaapa Bernabemaa. Mãga oojida akꞌɨpidaitꞌee aukꞌa kꞌõpꞌãyoorãkꞌa taipa Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee judio–eerã tꞌãide jarateedaipia bɨ. Jõdee ãchia judiorã tꞌãide jarateedai.
Jĩpꞌa ãchia taimaa iidijida kꞌĩra atuanaadamerã kꞌaripadaitꞌee chupɨria chedeerã ãchi tꞌãide. Mɨa pida aukꞌa mãga oo kꞌinia bɨ.
Mãgá ãra tꞌãideepa tꞌãri o–ĩa uchiajida mĩda, Pedro Antioquía pꞌuurudee chekꞌãri, ijãapataarã taide mɨa iru ɨtrɨaji judio–eerãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo bada perã.

Nãga ooji. Naa pachekꞌãri, iru aukꞌa nekꞌopachi judio–eerã ijãapataarã ome. Mamĩda aɨ tꞌẽepai ũkꞌuru judiorã Santiago ome pꞌanadapꞌedaarã Jerusalendeepa pachejida. Mãɨrãpa ijãapata judiorã nekꞌodaikꞌaraa bɨ judio–eerã ome. Ma awara ijãapata tauchaa bɨpidaipia bɨ judio–eerã kꞌapꞌɨade. Maperã awara nekꞌojida. Pedropa mãga unukꞌãri, aukꞌa awara nekꞌomaa beeji, mãɨrãpa kꞌachia pedeenaadamerã iru ãpɨte.
Mãpai Pedropa mãga ooru unudakꞌãri, awaraa judiorã ijãapataarã Antioquiadepemaarã aukꞌa kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa–eedachida. Judio–eerã pꞌanadapꞌedaamãiipa awara nekꞌojida, Bernabé paara.
Mɨa ãchi mãga unukꞌãri, kꞌawaaji ãchia ooda–e paji Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëidakꞌa. Mapa jõmaarã ijãapataarã taide Pedromaa jaraji:
—Pɨchi tꞌoru weda pɨ judío mĩda, nama bɨde judiorãkꞌa ba–e pajida aji. Mãga bɨta, ¿sãapꞌeda pɨa judiorãpa oopata oopi kꞌinia bɨma aji, judio–eerãmaa?
Wãara, tachi tꞌoru weda tai judiorãpa iru pꞌanapachida Tachi Akꞌõrepa Moisemaa ũraa pꞌãpida. Tai Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadakꞌaa beerã–e, judio–eerãkꞌa.

Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãda mãgá iru pꞌanɨ mĩda, taipa pida kꞌawa pꞌanɨ eperã apida pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe baitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mãgɨpa oopari perã ma ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa oo pꞌanɨpapai eperãarã pꞌoyaa wãdakꞌaa Tachi Akꞌõre truadee. Jĩpꞌa eperã iru truadee wãitꞌee Jesucristode ijãapari perã. Maperãpɨ tai aukꞌa Cristode ijãajida, iru kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨmerã.

Mãgá Cristode ijãajida, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Uchiajida ma ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ jua ekꞌariipa mãikꞌaapa judio–eerãkꞌa pajida. Mãga oodakꞌãri, ¿ne–inaa kꞌachia oojidakꞌã? Mãgá ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda paara, mãgara Cristopa taimaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopikꞌaji. ¡Mamĩda mãga–e!
Mɨchi kꞌinia wãara ne–inaa kꞌachia ookꞌaji eperãarãmaa waya oopida paara Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa, oopii kꞌãyaara Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëidakꞌa Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari.

Mɨa mãga jara bɨ mɨa pꞌoyaa oo–e pada perã jõma ma pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Ma kꞌaurepa mɨ piudakꞌa baji, ne–inaa oo–ee Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Mamĩda Cristode ijãakꞌãri, irua mɨ uchiapiji ma pꞌãdade jara bɨ jua ekꞌariipa, wãara oomerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Cristopa mãga ooji, kurusode piukꞌãri. Maperã mɨa jarai mɨ jida aukꞌa kurusode piu pɨkꞌaji Cristo ome, mãgá uchiaitꞌee ma ũraa pꞌãda jua ekꞌariipa mãikꞌaapa araa bapariitꞌee iru ome. Ɨ̃rá iruta bapari mɨ ome mãikꞌaapa iru mɨ poro waibɨa. Mapa mɨ chokꞌai bɨ misa, ijãa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Warrade mãikꞌaapa oo kꞌinia bɨ irua oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãga oo kꞌinia bɨ irua mɨ audú kꞌinia iru bapꞌeda, piuda perã mɨ pari.

Mɨa eperãarãmaa ijãapi kꞌinia–e bɨ ne–inaa awara, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pedee pia Cristode jara pëida kꞌãyaara. Cristo piuji tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataitꞌee, mãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi pia akꞌɨmerã. Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã pia akꞌɨda paara oo pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa, Cristo pari piukꞌaji.

¡Aai, Galacia pidaarã! ¡Parã kꞌĩsia kꞌawada–ee beerã́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ! ¿Apidaapa parã poro pꞌërebaipitꞌaajida–ekꞌã? ¿Kꞌirãpada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã taipa jarateedapꞌedaa parã tꞌãide nipadakꞌãri? Jesucristo kurusode piuda pia jarateejida parã jõmaarãmaa.
Jĩpꞌa mɨa nãga kꞌawa kꞌinia bɨ. ¿Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure ba chejikꞌã parã ome, oo pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa maa–e pɨrã ijãadapꞌedaa perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari?

¿Parã wãara kꞌĩsia kꞌawada–ee pꞌanɨkꞌã? Naaweda Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee ũridakꞌãri, Cristodepai ijãajida mãikꞌaapa pꞌaneejida iru Jaure ome. ¿Ɨ̃rá kꞌĩsiapatakꞌã Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã pipɨara akꞌɨitꞌee oo pꞌanɨ pɨrã judiorã ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa maa–e pɨrã ne–inaa oo pꞌanɨ pɨrã pãchi juadoopa?
¿Jõma Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa pia ooda parã–itꞌee pari oojikꞌã? ¡Wãara mãga pari ookꞌaji, parã ijãa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã ma ũraa pꞌãdade, Cristodepai ijãadai kꞌãyaara!

Mɨa waya iidiitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Jaure pëikꞌãri parã ome bapariimerã mãikꞌaapa parã tꞌãide ne–inaa oopimerã eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa, ¿sãapꞌeda mãgá pëiparima? Pëi–e parãpa oopata perã irua Moisemaa ũraa pꞌãpida jara bɨkꞌa. Ma kꞌãyaara pëipari Cristodepai ijãapata perã.
Kꞌĩsiadáma judiorã chonaarãwedapema Abrahamde. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ũraa pꞌãpidade chonaarãmaa jara bɨ:
‘Abrahampa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada ijãaji. Maperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pia akꞌɨpachi.’
Mapa kꞌawaadaipia bɨ eperãarãpa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadakꞌãri, ãchi wãara Abrahamdeepa uchiadakꞌa pꞌanɨ. Irukꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada ijãapata mãikꞌaapa iru kꞌĩrapite pia pꞌanapata.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa naaweda kꞌĩsia iru baji judio–eerã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataitꞌee, wãara ijãadakꞌãri. Mãga kꞌawapiji Abrahammaa. Tachia mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Moisemaa nãga pꞌãpida perã:
‘Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pedee pia Abrahammaa mãgaji: “Mɨa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaweda kꞌaripaitꞌeeda aji, pɨ kꞌapꞌɨa pari.” ’
Akꞌõrepa mãga jarada perã, tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Abraham bendiciadakꞌa irua ijãada perã, awaraarã aukꞌa bendiciaitꞌee irude ijãadakꞌãri.
Jõdee eperãarã kꞌachia ooitꞌee, ichi ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa ooruta pɨrã irua ãchi pia akꞌɨmerã. Ãchi atuapiitꞌee pꞌoyaa ooda–e perã jõma ma ũraade jara bɨkꞌa:
‘Eperãpa oo–e bɨ pɨrã jõma Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa, atuaitꞌee.’

Ma jõma jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, pia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa pia akꞌɨ–e chi oo kꞌinia bɨpapai iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Jĩpꞌa pia akꞌɨpari eperã irude ijãa bɨta. ¿Iru ũraa pꞌãdade nãga jara bɨ–ekꞌã?
‘Eperã Tachi Akꞌõrede wãara ijãapari ichita bapariitꞌee iru ome, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bairã iru kꞌĩrapite.’
Eperã ijãa–e bɨpa ooda paara jõma Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa, ɨtꞌaa wãkꞌaji ichi kꞌĩradoopa. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Eperãpa ookꞌãri jõmaweda Akꞌõre Ũraade jara bɨkꞌa, ichita bapariitꞌee ma ũraade jara bɨkꞌa.’

Mamĩda tai judiorãpa oodakꞌaa jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Mapa o kꞌachiade pꞌanajida mãikꞌaapa atuadaitꞌee paji. Mamĩda Cristopa tai uchiapiji ma ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ jua ekꞌariipa, ma kꞌaurepa atuanaadamerã. Mãga ooji kurusode piukꞌãri. Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru kꞌachia ooji, tai kꞌachia ooi kꞌãyaara. Mãgá tai kꞌaripaji. Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Cristo kꞌachiade baji Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Eperã pakꞌurude baijira bɨ kꞌachiade banaitꞌee.’

Jesucristopa mãgá tai kꞌaripaji parã judio–eerã paara ijãadamerã Abrahampa ijãadakꞌa. Ma awara mãgá tai kꞌaripaji tachi jõmaweda ichiaba ijãadakꞌãri, iru Jaure tachi ome iru pꞌanadamerã. Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooji ichia jaradakꞌa Abrahammaa, jarakꞌãri Abraham kꞌapꞌɨa pari ne–inaa pia ooitꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaarãmaa.

Ɨ̃pemaarã, kꞌĩsiadáma eperãarãpa oopatade. Eperãpa pꞌãkꞌãri kꞌairãpa ichi netꞌaa atadaitꞌee ichi piukꞌãri, chi firma pꞌãpꞌeda, eperã awaraapa ne–inaa awaraa pꞌã–e pai aɨ pꞌãdade, chi pꞌãda chiparipa jara–ee. Maa–e pɨrã chipari piukꞌãri, awaraa eperãpa ne–inaa awaraa pꞌã–e pai aɨ pꞌãdade. Ichiaba ichi kꞌinia ma pꞌãda jõpi–e pai.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bëiji Abraham ome irudeepa uchiadaitꞌeerã kꞌaurepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema jõmaarãmaa ne–inaa pia ooitꞌee.

Ma jara aupadade mɨa nãga jara kꞌinia bɨ: eperãpa pꞌãda bëiparikꞌa kꞌawaadamerã kꞌaipa ichi netꞌaa ataitꞌee, mãga pɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichia jarada bëiji Abraham ome, iru tꞌẽe uchiadapꞌedaarãpa aukꞌa mãga kꞌawaadamerã. Jõdee, cuatrocientos treinta años wãyaada tꞌẽepai, ichi ũraa Moisemaa pꞌãpiji. Mamĩda ma ũraa pꞌãpikꞌãri, ichia jara bëida Abraham ome atꞌãri beeji. Ma ũraa pꞌãdapa jõpi–e paji ichia naapɨara jarada Abrahammaa.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã kꞌaripa kꞌinia bada paara Moisepa ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa oopata kꞌaurepa, mãgara ichia jarada jara bëi–e pakꞌaji Abraham ome. Mamĩda mãga–e paji. Ichia jarada bëiji Abraham ome, kꞌinia bada perã Abrahampa ma jarada ijãamerã. Ma ijãada kꞌaurepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã aukꞌa ijãadakꞌãri, pia pꞌanapataadai Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.

¿Kꞌãare–itꞌee ichi ũraa Moisemaa pꞌãpijima? Mãga pꞌãpiji eperãarãpa kꞌawaadamerã ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa pꞌanapata iru kꞌĩrapite. Ma ũraa pëiji ichi angeleerã ome eperãmaa, mãgɨpa pꞌãmerã eperãarã–itꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru baji eperãarãpa ma ũraa pꞌãda iru pꞌanadamerã, ma Abrahamdeepa uchiada na eujãdee cheru misa na eujãdepemaarã kꞌaripaitꞌee, Akꞌõrepa naaweda jaradakꞌa.
Mãgá tee pëiji mĩda ichi ũraa Moisés kꞌapꞌɨa pari, mãga oo–e paji jarakꞌãri Abrahammaa. Ichi itꞌaideepa jaraji ichia ooitꞌee bada Abrahamdeepa uchiada kꞌapꞌɨa pari.

Maperã eperãpa kꞌĩsiai Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia awara–awaraa iru baji eperãarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataitꞌee. ¡Mamĩda mãga–e! Ichi ũraa tee pëidapa eperãarã o kꞌachiadeepa uchiapida paara, wãara pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanakꞌajida iru kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa wãkꞌajida ma ũraa kꞌaurepa.

Mamĩda iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ eperãarã jõmaweda pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata. Ara presoorã pꞌoyaa uchiada–e pꞌanɨkꞌa carceldeepa ãchi juadoopa, mãga pɨkꞌa eperãarã pꞌoyaa uchiada–e pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌariipa ãchi juadoopa. Aba uchiadai Jesucristode ijãadakꞌãri, iru kꞌapꞌɨa pari Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã kꞌaripapari perã, ichia jaradakꞌa Abrahammaa.

Cristo chei naaweda, tai judiorã ichiaba presoorãkꞌa pꞌanapachida Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨ jua ekꞌari. Ma ũraa carcel jɨ̃aparikꞌa baji. Tai akꞌɨ baji Tachi Akꞌõrepa unupiru misa ichia Abrahammaa jaradakꞌa.
Mimiaparipa warra akꞌɨparikꞌa, ma ũraa pꞌãdapa tai akꞌɨ pɨkꞌapachi Cristo cheru misa, tai jida irude ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanadamerã Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Ɨ̃rá, Cristo cheda perã, mãgá irude ijãadakꞌãri, tai waa pꞌanadakꞌaa Moisepa pꞌãda jua ekꞌari.
Ma kꞌãyaara pipɨara, parã jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã, Jesucristode ijãapata perã. Mãgá araa pꞌanapata Cristo ome.
Jõmaweda araa pꞌanapataarã Cristo ome Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã irukꞌa. Ma–itꞌee tachia poro choopipata; akꞌɨpidaitꞌee araa pꞌanapata Cristo ome.

Mãgá Cristo ome pꞌanapata perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi ichi warrarãkꞌa aukꞌa unupari. Mãga unupari judiorã mĩda, judio–eerã mĩda, esclavoorã mĩda, esclavo–eerã mĩda, ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã mĩda, wẽraarã mĩda. Jõmaweda aukꞌa pꞌanɨ iru kꞌĩrapite Jesucristo ome araa pꞌanadakꞌãri.

Ma awara tachi Cristo ome araa pꞌanapataarã wãara Abrahamdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida ijãapata perã Abrahampa ijãadakꞌa. Maperã iru pꞌanadaitꞌee jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ichideerã–itꞌee.

Piara kꞌawaadaitꞌee mɨa jara kꞌinia bɨ, kꞌĩsíatɨ nãgɨde. Eperã piukꞌãri warra kꞌaipeepai iru bɨ, ma–ãri weda ma warrapa atakꞌaa chi akꞌõrepa netꞌaa atabëida. Awaraarã jua ekꞌari chi akꞌõre esclavokꞌa bapari, netꞌaa makꞌɨara wẽe, chonaa paru misa.
Mãɨmisa chi akꞌɨpataarãpa nɨpata chi akꞌõrepa año jara bëida parumaa, ma netꞌaa teedai naaweda mãikꞌaapa chi te chipari papii naaweda.

Mãga pɨkꞌa tachi jida esclavoorãkꞌa pꞌanapachida, Cristo na eujãdee chei naaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bëidakꞌa. Maapai chonaarãwedapema ũraa jua ekꞌari pꞌanapachida mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩsia pꞌanapachida warrarãkꞌa. Kꞌĩsia pꞌanapachida tachia ne–inaa kꞌawa pꞌanɨpa maa–e pɨrã ma ũraa jara bɨkꞌa oo pꞌanɨpa ɨtꞌaa wãdai.

Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌiniakꞌãri, ichi Warra pëiji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee judío wẽrapa tꞌomerã. Mãgá chi Warra bapachi Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ jua ekꞌari mãikꞌaapa jõma oopachi ma ũraade jara bɨkꞌa.

Mãga ooda perã ichia aupai tai judiorã uchiapii ma ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ jua ekꞌariipa. Ma–itꞌeeta Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Warra pëiji; tai judiorã uchiapimerã ma ũraa jara bɨ jua ekꞌariipa mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã papimerã irukꞌa.
Tachi Cristode ijãapataarãpa kꞌawaadamerã tachi wãara iru warrarã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëiji ichi Warra Jaure tachi tꞌãride bapariimerã. Mãgɨ́ Jaurepa ichita Tachi Akꞌõremaa jarapari: “Abbá, Mɨ Akꞌõre.”
Mapa parãpa kꞌawaadai ɨ̃rá esclavoorã–e. Ma kꞌãyaara Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã. Mãgá iru warrarã perã, iru pꞌanadaitꞌee jõma irua kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ichideerã–itꞌee.
Naaweda parãpa Tachi Akꞌõre waide kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ weda, Tachi Akꞌõre–ee beemaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pachida mãikꞌaapa ma jua ekꞌari pꞌanapachida esclavoorãkꞌa.

Mamĩda ɨ̃rá parãpa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa pꞌanɨ; pia jaraitꞌeera, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã kꞌawa bɨ. Mãga bɨta, ¿sãapꞌeda waya tꞌĩu kꞌinia pꞌanɨma ma naawedapema ne–inaa vale–ee baibɨ jua ekꞌari, waya esclavoorãkꞌa pꞌaneedaitꞌee?
Parãpa ɨapata ewari, atane mãikꞌaapa año, ɨ̃ipata ewate pakꞌãri maa–e pɨrã fiesta ewate pakꞌãri. ¿Kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨkꞌã mãga oo pꞌanɨpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã pipɨara akꞌɨitꞌee apemaarã ijãapataarã kꞌãyaara?
Mɨ waawee bɨ, pari parã tꞌãide jaratee nipaji jĩakꞌaapa.

Ɨ̃pemaarã, mɨa parãmaa enenee nɨ̃bɨ mɨkꞌa uchiadamerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ũraa Moisemaa pꞌãpida jua ekꞌariipa. Naaweda parã ma jua ekꞌari pꞌanada–e paji. Mapa parã tꞌãide nipakꞌãri, mɨa ma ũraa jaratee–e paji. Mama pakꞌãri, parãpa mɨ auteebaijida mãikꞌaapa pia akꞌɨjida.
Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mɨ kꞌayaa bada perã, ma naa wãyaa wãdade parã tꞌãide, mama beeji jarateeitꞌee Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee.

Ma kꞌayaa kꞌaurepa parãpa mɨ yiaraa iru pꞌanakꞌajida, maa–e pɨrã mɨ ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jarakꞌajida. Mamĩda mãga ooda–e paji. Ma kꞌãyaara mɨ pia auteebaijida, Jesucristo wa ɨtꞌaripema ángel auteebaikꞌajidakꞌa.
Maapai parã o–ĩa pꞌanajida. Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ parãpa mɨ kꞌaripa kꞌiniapa pãchi tau paara ẽekꞌookꞌajida mɨ kꞌaripadaitꞌee. Mamĩda ɨ̃rá mãga pꞌanɨ–e. ¿Parã, sãgajidama?
Ɨ̃rá ¿mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌaneeruta–ekꞌã, mɨa wãarata jara bairã parãmaa?

Awaraa Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepataarãda apataarãpa ne–inaa awara ijãapi kꞌinia pꞌanɨ, mɨa jaratee bɨ kꞌãyaara. Mapa parã tꞌãide tꞌãri pia mãikꞌaapa iwarraa pedee nipapata. Kꞌinia pꞌanɨ parãpa ãchi akꞌɨdamerã Cristode wãara ijãapataarãkꞌa. Mamĩda mãga pꞌanɨ–e. Mɨa jaratee bɨdeepa parã ãyaa atee kꞌinia pꞌanɨ ãchi eere tꞌĩudamerã.
Mɨa mãga jarakꞌãri, jara kꞌinia–e kꞌachia bɨ awaraarã tꞌãri pia nipadamerã parã tꞌãide mɨ wẽ–e pakꞌãri. Pia bɨ ne–inaa pia oo kꞌiniadakꞌãri parã ome.
Mɨchi warrarã, ara wẽra bi pꞌirapa mia nɨ̃bɨkꞌa ichi warra tꞌorumaa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bɨpa waya mia nɨ̃bɨ parãpa wãara oorutamaa Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Naapai mɨ parã ome bada paara, kꞌawa bakꞌaji kꞌãata jaraitꞌee parãmaa. Wãara mɨa kꞌawa–e sãgapɨ ooitꞌee.

¿Parã ũkꞌuruurãpa Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨ jua ekꞌari pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã? ¿Kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã ma ũraa jua ekꞌari pꞌanaruta pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã piara akꞌɨitꞌee? ¿Parãpa wãara kꞌawa pꞌanɨkꞌã ma ũraade jara bɨ?
Nãga jara bɨ. Abrahampa warra omé iru baji; aba chi wẽra esclava Agarpa tꞌoda, aba chi wẽra Sarapa tꞌoda.

Chi wẽra esclava Agar ome ma warra ooji eperã jĩpꞌaapa warra ooparikꞌa. Mamĩda mãga–e paji chi wẽra Sarapa warra tꞌoda ome. Naaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaraji Abrahampa warra ooitꞌee chi wẽra ome. Mãgɨ́ warra tꞌoji Akꞌõrepa jaradakꞌa, Abraham chi wẽra ome audú chonaa pꞌanajida mĩda warra oodaitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripaji mãgɨ́ warra oodamerã.

¡Kꞌĩsíatɨ nãgɨde! Ma wẽra chaa jara kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bëida aba. Irua jara bëida aba Sinaí eedepema paji, mama iru ũraa jarada perã Moisemaa, ichia ma ũraa pꞌãmerã eperãarã–itꞌee. Mãga jarapꞌeda, eperãarã esclavoorãkꞌa pꞌaneejida ma ũraa jarada jua ekꞌari. Mãgɨ́ jara bëida jara kꞌinia bɨ Agar.

Maperã Abraham wẽra esclava Agar jara kꞌinia bɨ Sinaí ee, Arabia eujãde bɨ. Agardeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã ichikꞌa esclavoorã pꞌanapachida. Mãga pɨkꞌa ɨ̃rá Jerusalén pꞌuurude pꞌanɨɨrã esclavoorãkꞌa pꞌanɨ, Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarada Sinaí eede, ma jua ekꞌari atꞌãri pꞌanapata perã.
Jõdee Abraham wẽra jara kꞌinia bɨ ɨtꞌaripema Jerusalén. Tachi Cristode ijãapataarã ɨtꞌaripema Jerusalendepemaarã. Maperã pꞌanadakꞌaa ma Sinaí eede jarada jua ekꞌari.
Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapari Isaíapa ichiaba jaraji ma Jerusalén omeede, chonaarãweda nãgɨ́ pedee pꞌãkꞌãri:

‘Pɨ, chi warra tꞌokꞌaa bɨta, o–ĩa báji. O–ĩapa bíaji warra tꞌoru pꞌua senti–e bɨ mĩda mãikꞌaapa pɨ kꞌimapa pɨ yiaraa iru bɨ pɨjida. Na ewari pɨdeepa uchiadaitꞌeerã chokꞌaraara paitꞌee chi warra naa tꞌodadeepa uchiadaitꞌeerã kꞌãyaara.’
Ɨ̃pemaarã, tachi Abraham warra Isaackꞌa. Tachi chi naa warra tꞌokꞌaa badadeepa uchiadakꞌa pꞌanɨ, wãara ijãapata perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨde, Abrahampa ijãadakꞌa.

Kꞌirãpátɨ chi warra naapema Agarde tꞌoda eperã jĩpꞌaakꞌa tꞌoji. Jõdee chi warra tꞌẽe tꞌoda Sarapa tꞌoji Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa tꞌopidakꞌa. Mãga baji mĩda, chi naapɨara tꞌoda, Ismaelpa, nepɨra jɨrɨji Isaac, chi tꞌẽe tꞌoda ome. Ɨ̃rá mãga pɨkꞌa Moisepa pꞌãdade oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrãpa nepɨra jɨrɨpata tachi Cristode ijãapataarã ome.
Mamĩda mãga baji mĩda Agar warra ome, Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Ãyaa pëipáde aji, ma esclava ichi warra ome. Ma warrapa chi akꞌõrepa bëida ata–e paitꞌee chi wẽra warrapa ataparikꞌa.’

Mãpai ɨ̃pemaarã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi jëre–e paitꞌee. Tachi Cristode ijãapataarã chi esclavadeepa uchiadapꞌedaarãkꞌa–e. Jĩpꞌa chi esclava–e badadeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ. Mapa tachiata Tachi Akꞌõre truadee wãdaitꞌee.
Cristopa mãgá tachi uchia atada perã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa Moisemaa pꞌãpida jua ekꞌariipa, chóotɨ irude ijãa pꞌanɨde. Tꞌĩunáatɨ ma ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ jua ekꞌari, waya esclavoorãkꞌa pꞌanadaitꞌee.
¡Ũrítɨ mɨ, Pablopa jara bɨ! Parãpa pãchi kꞌapꞌɨade tauchaa bɨpiruta pɨrã, kꞌĩsia pꞌanadairã mãga oo pꞌanɨpa ɨtꞌaa wãdai, Cristopa parã waa kꞌaripa–e paitꞌee ɨtꞌaa wãdamerã.

Ichiaba waya jaraitꞌee. Parãpa pãchi kꞌapꞌɨade tauchaa bɨpiruta pɨrã, tꞌĩudaitꞌee jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ jua ekꞌari. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, oodaipia bɨ jõma ma ũraade jara bɨkꞌa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã pia akꞌɨmerã.
Parã, ma ũraade jara bɨkꞌa oo pꞌanɨɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã pia akꞌɨmerã, Cristode ijãa amaadaruta mãikꞌaapa waa ichideerã pꞌanada–e paitꞌee.

Mamĩda tachi Cristode ijãapataarãpa ijãa pꞌanɨ Cristopa tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapipari, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa tachimaa mãga kꞌawapipari perã. Maperãpɨ nɨ pꞌanɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite iru ewari waibɨa ewate.

Mãgá nɨ pꞌanɨ kꞌawa pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa tauchaa iru beerã apemaarã kꞌãyaara pipɨara akꞌɨ–e. Ma awara pipɨara akꞌɨ–e tauchaa bɨpida–eerã. Jĩpꞌa pipɨara akꞌɨpari eperã awaraarã kꞌinia iru bɨpa, Jesucristode ijãapari perã.
Naaweda parãpa mãga ijãa pꞌanajida. ¿Kꞌaipa ma wãara ijãa amaapijima, Cristopa oopi bɨ awara oo pꞌaneedamerã?
¡Tachi Akꞌõrepa–e paji! Iruata parã jɨrɨji ichideerã pꞌaneedamerã.
Levadura ma–ãriipa pan masa jõmaweda waridaiparida apata.

Mamĩda mɨa ijãa bɨ parãpa mɨ ũraa ũridaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ooda–e paitꞌee seewa jarateepari apidaapa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mãga ijãa bɨ Tachi Waibɨa Cristo mãgeerã kꞌãyaara mãikꞌaapa jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bapari perã. Ichi kꞌaurepata tachi ijãapataarã araa pꞌanapata. Jõdee mãgeerãpa jarateepata kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi kꞌachia ooitꞌee.

Ɨ̃pemaarã, ¿mãgee jarateepataarãpa jarada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã mɨa aukꞌa jarateepari eperãarãpa ãchi kꞌapꞌɨade tauchaa bɨpidaipia bɨ, Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa? Wãara Cristode ijãai naaweda, mɨa mãga jarateepachi. Mamĩda atꞌãri mãga jarateeda paara, ãchia mɨ ichiakꞌau bɨkꞌajida, aupedeeda–ee. Mamĩda mãga ooda–e pꞌanɨ. Ũridaamaa pꞌanɨ mɨa jarateekꞌãri Cristo kurusode piuda, ma kꞌaurepapai tachi ɨtꞌaa wãdai.
¿Ãrapa kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ–ekꞌã Tachi Akꞌõrepa piara akꞌɨpari chi kꞌapꞌɨa tꞌɨɨpidapꞌedaarã? ¡Mãgara, ãchi kꞌãratau paara tꞌɨapꞌepidaipia bɨ!

Ɨ̃pemaarã, kꞌirãpátɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã jɨrɨji pꞌanapataadamerã Cristo jua ekꞌari, ma chonaarãweda ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ jua ekꞌari pꞌanapataadai kꞌãyaara. Mamĩda kꞌĩsiadaikꞌaraa bɨ oodaitꞌee pãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Jĩpꞌa kꞌĩsiadaipia bɨ awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripadaitꞌee.
Nãgɨ́ ũraa jara bɨkꞌa ooruta pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa chonaarãweda pꞌãdade jara bɨ jõmaweda oodaitꞌee:
‘Awaraarã kꞌinia iru baparíiji pɨchi kꞌapꞌɨa kꞌinia iru baparikꞌa.’
Ma kꞌãyaara, awaraarã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanaruta pɨrã mãikꞌaapa nepɨra jɨrɨruta pɨrã ãra ome chõodarutamaa, jõpidaitꞌee Cristopa oomaa bɨ parã tꞌãide mãikꞌaapa waa tꞌãri aukꞌa pꞌanada–e paitꞌee.
Maperã oo wãkꞌãtɨ wã́tɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, ooda–e paitꞌee parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Oodakꞌãri tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa, pꞌoyaa ooda–e Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Jõdee oodakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa, ooda–e paitꞌee ne–inaa tachia oo kꞌiniata. Omee weda aukꞌa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa. Mapa parãpa oodaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa, pãchia oo kꞌiniata oopiamaapa.
Mãga ooruta pɨrã, pꞌanada–e paitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa Moisemaa ũraa pꞌãpida jua ekꞌari. Ma kꞌãyaara Akꞌõre Jaurepata oopiitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Jõmaarãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ eperãarãpa oodakꞌãri ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa, nãga pꞌanapata: miakꞌãi pꞌanɨɨrã awaraarã ome kꞌãipata; kꞌĩsiapata chĩara ome kꞌachia oodaitꞌee; awaraarã jɨrɨpata ãchi ome kꞌachia oodaitꞌee;

ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata; petau tau kꞌawaa beerãmaa wa jaipanaarãmaa wãpata chĩara kꞌachia oodamerã; awaraarã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapata; nepɨra jɨrɨpata chĩara ome; awaraarã netꞌaa ata kꞌinia pꞌanapata ãchi–itꞌee; kꞌĩrauyaa pꞌanapata; jõma kꞌinia pꞌanɨ ãchi–itꞌee aupai; tꞌãri aukꞌa bɨdakꞌaa awaraarã ome; kꞌĩsia awarapipata eperãarãmaa ãyaa ateedaitꞌee awaraarã ikꞌaawaapa;

awaraarã netꞌaa kꞌinia pꞌanapata maa–e pɨrã ãchikꞌa pa kꞌinia pꞌanapata, ãchimaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo kꞌiniadarutamaa; chĩara peepata; itꞌua toyaa pꞌanapata; pariatua nekꞌoyaa, toyaa, kꞌachia oodaitꞌee jɨrɨyaa pꞌanapata fiestade; mãga bee. Mɨa naaweda jaradakꞌa waya jaraitꞌee. Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai mãgá pꞌanadai. Mãgee ne–inaa oopataarã pꞌoyaa wãda–e Tachi Akꞌõre truadee.

Jõdee chi oopataarãpa Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa nãga pꞌanapata: awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanapata; tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapata; kꞌãiwee pꞌanapata awaraarã ome; kꞌĩrau–ee choopata awaraarã ome, nepɨrade pꞌanɨ mĩda; awaraarã chupɨria kꞌawaapata; tꞌãri pia pꞌanapata awaraarã ome mãikꞌaapa awaraarã kꞌũradakꞌaa; jĩpꞌa oopata ãchia jara pꞌanɨkꞌa;
audua nipadakꞌaa; ne–inaa pariatua oo kꞌiniadakꞌãri, mãga oodakꞌaa. Ũraa wẽ–e jaraitꞌee mãgee ne–inaa oonaadamerã, pia pꞌanadairã.
