Parãpa kꞌirãpa pꞌanɨ tai mimiapatapꞌedaa mama pꞌanadakꞌãri. Ewari chaa parãmaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida jarateepachida. Sẽ jõnɨde pida, pꞌãrikꞌua pida tai mimia oopachida nekꞌodaitꞌee. Mãga pꞌanapachida parã pꞌaratꞌa jita kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã tai chikꞌo kꞌodaitꞌee.

Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa pida kꞌawa bɨ parã ijãapataarã tꞌãide nipadakꞌãri, ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda–ee nipapachida. Ne–inaa oopachida Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopidakꞌa. Maperã apidaapa jarada–e pai taipa ne–inaa kꞌachia oojida.
Ara akꞌõrepa ichi warra pia ũraaparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa taipa parã ũraapachida.

Mãgá ũraa pꞌanɨde parã kꞌaripapachida ne–inaa jõma oo kꞌinia pꞌanadamerã Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Tachi Akꞌõrépata parã jɨrɨji ichideerã papiitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ichi trua kꞌĩra wãreedee wãpiitꞌee ewari cherude.

Maperã taipa ichita gracias jarapata Tachi Akꞌõremaa. Taipa parãmaa jarateedakꞌãri Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee, ma pedee ũri kꞌinia pꞌanajida mãikꞌaapa Cristode ijãajida. Ijãada–e paji tai pia pedee pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Jĩpꞌa ijãajida ma pedee Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida perã. Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã ijãapataarã kꞌaripamaa bɨ oodamerã ichia oopi bɨkꞌa.
Mãga oopata perã, parã aukꞌaarãpa parã jɨrɨpachida miapidaitꞌee, judiorãpa Judea eujãdepema Jesucristode ijãapataarã aukꞌa jɨrɨ pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa.

Mãgee judiorãpa Tachi Waibɨa Jesús peepijida, ãchi aukꞌaarãpa chonaarãweda Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarã peepidapꞌedaakꞌa. Jesús peepidapꞌeda, tꞌãri kꞌachiapa tai jida jɨrɨpachida miapidaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa tꞌɨmɨ́ jërekꞌoodaitꞌee ãchi eujãdeepa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgee eperãarã pia akꞌɨ–e. Mãgeerãpa eperãarã jõmaweda kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanɨ.

Mɨa mãga jara bɨ ãchia taimaa jarateepidaamaa pꞌanadairã Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee; judio–eerã tꞌãide paara. Kꞌiniada–e apida o kꞌachiadeepa uchiadamerã Cristo kꞌaurepa. Mãga oo pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa, Tachi Akꞌõre audupɨara kꞌĩraupiruta, iru naaweda kꞌĩraupidapꞌedaa kꞌãyaara, ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa. Maperãpɨ irua ãchi kꞌachia ooitꞌee.
Ɨ̃pemaarã, taarã–e bɨ mĩda tai unudapꞌedaa, parã ichita iru pꞌanapata tai kꞌĩsiade mãikꞌaapa waya wã kꞌinia pꞌanajida parã akꞌɨde.
Mamĩda pꞌoyaa wãda–e paji. Mɨchi ituaba wãda chokꞌara wãitꞌee paji. Mamĩda Satanapa taidepema apida wãpi–e paji.

Parãpa pia ijãadakꞌãri, jõmaarãmaa akꞌɨpipata wãara Jesucristo Tachi Waibɨa. Mapa tai o–ĩa pꞌanɨ parã ome mãikꞌaapa taipa awaraarãmaa jara kꞌinia pꞌanɨ parãpa ne–inaa pia oopata. Ichiaba parãpa mãga oopata perã, tachi jõmaweda o–ĩa pꞌanadaitꞌee Jesucristo kꞌĩrapite, iru na eujãdee waya chekꞌãri.
¡Wãarapɨ! Parã mãgá ijãapata kꞌaurepa tai o–ĩa pꞌanɨ. Ma awara parã kꞌaurepata awaraarãpa tai ãpɨte pia pedeepata.
Mãpai tai waa chooda–e pakꞌãri parã akꞌɨda–ee, kꞌĩsiajida: “¿sãga oodaitꞌee?” Tai jõma pꞌoyaa wãda–e pada perã parã akꞌɨde, mɨ ituaba beeji Atenas pꞌuurude.

Jõdee tachi ɨ̃pema Timoteo pëijida tai pari. Iru pia mimiapari Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, Cristopa ooda jarateepari perã. Iru pëijida Akꞌõre Ũraa pipɨara jarateemerã parãmaa mãikꞌaapa parã ũraamerã. Mãgá parã waapɨara ijãadai, irua jara bɨ kꞌaurepa.
Mãgá ijãadakꞌãri, chupɨria jõneeruta pɨjida, apidaapa parã kꞌũrada–e pai ijãa amaadamerã. Parãpa pia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa, awaraarãpa tachi ichita jɨrɨdaitꞌee miapidaitꞌee.
Taipa mãga jarajida naaweda parã ome pꞌanadakꞌãri. Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ wãara uchiaji taipa jaradakꞌa.

Maperãpɨ mɨa Timoteo pëiji irua kꞌawaamerã parã Tachi Akꞌõre ome nipapata. Mɨa waa choo–e paji parã unu kꞌiniapa mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bɨpa. Mãgá kꞌĩsia nɨ̃baji Netuara Poro Waibɨapa parã Cristode ijãa amaapii jĩakꞌaapa. Mãga pada paara, tai mimia parã tꞌãide atuakꞌaji.

Mamĩda mãga–e paji. Parã akꞌɨnapꞌeda, Timoteo waya chekꞌãri, pedee pia nepɨrɨ cheji. Jaraji parã Tachi Akꞌõre ome pia nidá mãikꞌaapa chikꞌinia pꞌanapata. Ichiaba jaraji parãpa tai kꞌirãpapata mãikꞌaapa tai unu kꞌinia jõnapata, taipa parã unu kꞌinia jõnɨkꞌa.
Mapa ɨ̃pemaarã, ɨ̃rá tai jɨrɨ jõnɨ mĩda miapidaitꞌee, kꞌãiwee pꞌanɨ Timoteo itꞌaideepa ũridapꞌedaa perã parã atꞌãri Cristode pia ijãa pꞌanɨ.
Parã mãgá choo pꞌanadakꞌãri Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨde, audupɨara taipa jõmaarãmaa jaratee kꞌinia pꞌanɨ, awaraarãpa Cristode ijãadamerã parãkꞌa.
¿Sãga gracias jaradaima Tachi Akꞌõremaa parã pari? Parã kꞌaurepa tai tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.

Ewari chaa, pꞌãrikꞌua pida, ɨtꞌaa iidi pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa, irua tai waya wãpimerã parã akꞌɨde. Jaratee kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Akꞌõre netꞌaa parãpa waide kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ. Mãgá parãpa pipɨara oodai Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Mãgá ɨtꞌaa iidi pꞌanɨ misa, iidipata Tachi Akꞌõre Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo ome tai waya pëidamerã parã akꞌɨde.
Ichiaba iidipata Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa parã waapɨara chikꞌinia pꞌanapimerã. Ma awara iidipata irua parãmaa awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanapimerã, taipa parã kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨkꞌa.
Iidipata irua parã choopimerã pãchi tꞌãride. Mãgá chooruta pɨrã, kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, Tachi Waibɨa Jesús chekꞌãri jõma ichideerã ɨtꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã ome.

Mãpai ɨ̃pemaarã, Cristopa tai jɨrɨtꞌerada perã ichi ũraa jarateedamerã, nãga ũraa pꞌanɨ parãmaa. Taipa mãikꞌaapa Tachi Waibɨa Jesupa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ parã pꞌanapataadamerã taipa jarateedapꞌedaakꞌa. Mãgá pꞌanadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parãpa oopata pia akꞌɨitꞌee. Ɨ̃rá wãara mãgá pꞌanapata. Mamĩda taipa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ waapɨara oodamerã Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa parãmaa.
Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ taipa jarateedapꞌedaa, parã tꞌãide nipadakꞌãri. Jarajida Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa jarapidakꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨ awara pꞌanapataadamerã ijãadakꞌaa beerã kꞌãyaara. Kꞌinia bɨ parãpa ne–inaa jõmaweda oodamerã irua oopi bɨkꞌa. Mapa taipa nãga ũraa pꞌanɨ. Pꞌekꞌau oonáatɨ awaraarã ome.

Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌawaadaipia bɨ nãga oodaitꞌee. Wẽra kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã, ma wẽra ome béeji mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri pia baparíiji iru ome. Aɨ ome kꞌãiparíiji, awaraa jɨrɨ–ee. Parãpa mãgá ooruta pɨrã, pia oodaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa awaraarã kꞌĩrapite.
Pꞌananáatɨ ijãadakꞌaa beerã pꞌanapatakꞌa. Ãchi pariatua pꞌekꞌau oo wãpata chĩara wẽra ome, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawada–e pꞌanadairã.
Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai pãchi ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa kꞌũradai, mãga oo pꞌanɨpa ãchi wẽraarã ome. Mãgá kꞌachia ooruta pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã miapiitꞌee, taipa naaweda jaradapꞌedaakꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi jɨrɨ–e paji kꞌachiade pꞌanapataadamerã. Jɨrɨji pꞌanapataadamerã ichia kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Maperã na ũraa jara aupada ijãa kꞌiniada–e pɨrã, mɨa jara bɨ pedee ijãadaamaa pꞌanɨ–e. Jĩpꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrepa pedee jarada ijãadaamaa pꞌanɨ. Akꞌõrépata ichi Jaure ba chepipari parã ijãapataarã ome, ijãadamerã ichia jara bɨ.
Taipa parã ũraada–e paitꞌee chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadamerã awaraa ijãapataarã ome, parãpa mãgá oo pꞌanadairã, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa kꞌaripapꞌeda.
Mãgá chikꞌinia pꞌanapata Macedonia eujãdepema jõmaarã ijãapataarã ome. Mapa ɨ̃pemaarã, mɨa ũraa kꞌinia bɨ audupɨara mãga pꞌanapataadamerã.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa parãmaa oopi kꞌinia bɨde kꞌĩsiadapꞌeda, jɨrɨpatáatɨ kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadaitꞌee. Pedee–idaa bɨpa chĩaramaa ooparikꞌa ichita jaranáatɨ ãchia ne–inaa oodaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌoo–idaa pꞌananáatɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara pãchi mimia óotɨ pãchi juadoopa, taipa jaradapꞌedaakꞌa parã tꞌãide nipadakꞌãri.
Mãga pꞌanaruta pɨrã, nɨda–e paitꞌee awaraarãpa teedamerã pãchi nekꞌodaitꞌee. Ma awara ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa parã pia unudaitꞌee.

Ɨ̃rá, ɨ̃pemaarã, taipa nãgɨ́ wãarata kꞌawapi kꞌinia pꞌanɨ parãmaa. Tachi Jesucristode ijãapataarã jai–idaadakꞌãri, kꞌãi pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ. Maperã parã ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa jai–idaadakꞌãri, makꞌɨara jẽedaikꞌaraa bɨ ijãadakꞌaa beerãkꞌa. Mãɨrã Cristode ijãada–e pꞌanadairã, ijãada–e ãchi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã piudapꞌeda chokꞌai pꞌirabaidaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pꞌananadaitꞌee Akꞌõre eujãde. Mapa audú tꞌãri pꞌua pꞌanɨ ãchi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã piudakꞌãri.

Mamĩda mãga–e tachi ijãapataarã ome, tachia ijãapata perã Jesús piupꞌeda chokꞌai pꞌirabaiji. Mapa ijãa pꞌanɨ Jesús kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa irude ijãapataarã aukꞌa chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiitꞌee. Mãga ooitꞌee Jesús waya chekꞌãri ãchi jaureerã ome.
Tachi Waibɨapa parãmaa nãga jara pëiru: ichi na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee waya chekꞌãri ichideerã atade, tachi ijãapataarã atꞌãri chokꞌai pꞌanɨ wãda–e paitꞌee jai–idaadapꞌedaarã naa.

Ma ewate Tachi Waibɨa chekꞌãri, naapɨara chokꞌa pëiru pedeeta ũridaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa angeleerã poro waibɨa pedee ũridaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre trompeta jĩwaa nɨ̃bɨ ũridaitꞌee. Mãga nɨde Cristo ɨtꞌariipa cheru unudaitꞌee. Mamata Cristode ijãa jai–idaadapꞌedaarã kꞌapꞌɨa naapɨara chokꞌai pꞌirabaidaitꞌee jãɨradeepa.
Mãpai Tachi Waibɨapa ãchi ɨtꞌaa ateeitꞌee tachi chokꞌai pꞌanɨɨrã ome jɨ̃ararade, iru ome unudaitꞌee pajãde. Mãgá tachi jõma ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee iru ome.
O–ĩa para bátɨ ma jara pëida ũridapꞌeda.
Ɨ̃pemaarã, taipa jarada–e jõmasaa taarãitꞌee Jesús cheitꞌee. Naaweda jaradapꞌedaakꞌa, apidaapa kꞌawada–e sãapaita iru cheitꞌee.
Parãpa pia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ma ewate paitꞌee eperãarã atu pꞌanɨde. Nechɨapari pꞌãrikꞌua cheparikꞌa eperã temãi chi te chipari atu bɨde, mãgá paitꞌee.

Cristode ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa jara pꞌanɨ misa: “Tachi kꞌãiwee pꞌanɨ, nepɨra wẽe,” atu pꞌanɨde ma ewate cheitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi ɨ̃rɨ ne–inaa kꞌachia pëiitꞌee, ichia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ooitꞌee ãchimaa. Ara wẽra biakꞌoo bɨ atu baparikꞌa bi pꞌiradaikꞌãri warra tꞌoitꞌee, mãga pɨkꞌa ijãadakꞌaa beerã atu pꞌanadaitꞌee. Ma ewate apida uchiada–e paitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre juadeepa.
Mamĩda ɨ̃pemaarã, parã pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨde pꞌanadakꞌaa ma ijãadakꞌaa beerã pꞌanapatakꞌa, Tachi Waibɨa atu pꞌanɨde cheitꞌee perã.
Ma kꞌãyaara ma ewate nɨmaa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨde pꞌanapata perã, Jesucristode ijãadapꞌeda. Irude ijãadakꞌãriipa tachi waa pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨde pꞌanadakꞌaa.
Ma etꞌewa jarada wãara perã, kꞌãi pɨkꞌa pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ awaraarãkꞌa. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌanadáma, Cristo cheitꞌee ewate nɨ pꞌanɨ misa.
Pꞌãrikꞌua eperãarã kꞌãipata mãikꞌaapa itꞌua topata, Tachi Akꞌõre netꞌaa kꞌĩsiada–ee.

Mamĩda tachi ijãapataarã mãgá pariatua pꞌanadakꞌaa, Akꞌõre ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨde pꞌanadairã. Mapa kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ. Waapɨara Tachi Waibɨade ijãadaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa audupɨara chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ, kꞌawa pꞌanadairã Cristopa tachi ata chekꞌãri, ichi ome pꞌananadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre truade.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi jɨrɨtꞌera–e paji tachi kꞌachia ooitꞌee ma ewate. Jĩpꞌa jɨrɨtꞌeraji ichi truade ichita pꞌananadamerã Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo kꞌaurepa.
Ma–itꞌee Jesucristo piuji tachi ijãapataarã pari, ichi ome araa pꞌanapataadamerã, chokꞌai pꞌanɨ mĩda wa piu pꞌanɨ pɨjida.
Maperã o–ĩa para bátɨ mãikꞌaapa chikꞌaripa pꞌanapatáatɨ oodaitꞌee irua oopi bɨkꞌa, parãpa nãga weda oomaa pꞌanɨkꞌa.
Ɨ̃pemaarã, taipa enenee jõnɨ waaweedamerã pãchi ijãapataarã poro waibɨarã, ãchi audú mimiapata perã parã–itꞌee. Ãchia parã ũraapata mãikꞌaapa akꞌɨpata Tachi Waibɨapa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Mapa parãpa ãchi pia akꞌɨdaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌinia iru pꞌanadaipia bɨ. Kꞌãiwee pꞌanapatáatɨ ãchi ome mãikꞌaapa jõmaarã ijãapataarã ome.

Ichiaba ɨ̃pemaarã, taipa parã ũraadaitꞌee jaradamerã chi mimia kꞌiniada–ee pꞌanɨɨrãmaa mimiadamerã. Kꞌaripátɨ chi pia chooda–ee pꞌanɨɨrã nepɨra kꞌaurepa. Ichiaba kꞌaripátɨ chi Cristode ijãadai naaweda ne–inaa kꞌachia oodapꞌedaarã, mãɨrãpa ɨ̃rá oodamerã Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãɨmisa tꞌãri pia pꞌanapatáatɨ jõmaarã ome.

Pia pꞌanapatáatɨ parãdepema apidaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia oonaadamerã. Mãga pꞌanadaipia bɨ awaraarãpa parãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooruta pɨjida. Ichita jɨrɨpatáatɨ ne–inaa pia oodaitꞌee pãchi tꞌãidepema ijãapataarãmaa mãikꞌaapa jõmaarãmaa.
Ichita tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapatáatɨ.
Ichita ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patáatɨ.
Ichita Tachi Akꞌõremaa gracias jarapatáatɨ, Akꞌõrepa mãgata kꞌinia bairã Jesucristode ijãapataarãpa oodamerã.
Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa ijãaparimaa ne–inaa jarapiru pɨrã maa–e pɨrã ne–inaa oopiru pɨrã, ita–aria oopítɨ.
Pia ũrítɨ apidaapa jaradakꞌãri: “Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa mɨmaa na pedee jarapimaa bɨ.”

Mãgɨ́ pedee ũridapꞌeda, pia kꞌĩsíatɨ kꞌawaadaitꞌee ũraa pia wa kꞌachia. Ũraa pia bɨ pɨrã, óotɨ ma ũraade jara bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda pia–e bɨ pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõre Jauredepema–e. Mapa ne–inaa jõma mãgá akꞌɨdaipia bɨ kꞌawaadaitꞌee wãara Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa wa mãga–e.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia apida oonáatɨ.

Ɨ̃rá ɨtꞌaa iidi kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa parã pari. Iruata tachi kꞌãiwee pꞌanapipari. Mapa iidi pꞌanɨ irua parã awara bɨmerã pãchi tꞌãride, oo kꞌinia pꞌanadamerã irua oopi bɨkꞌa; pãchi kꞌapꞌɨade, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo amaadamerã; pãchi jaurede, parãpa iru Jauremaa oopidamerã irua oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa parãmaa. Mãgá irua parã pia akꞌɨitꞌee Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo waya chekꞌãri.
Tachi Akꞌõre, parã jɨrɨdapa mãga ooitꞌee parã ome, oopari perã ichia jara bɨkꞌa.
Ɨ̃pemaarã, ichiaba tai pari ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patáatɨ.
Tai pari saludaa para bátɨ akꞌɨpidaitꞌee chikꞌinia pꞌanɨ.
Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa mɨmaa jarapiru na kꞌartꞌa leedamerã tachi ɨ̃pemaarã jõmaarã taide.
Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa parã pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã.
Mãgapai paji.

Mɨ, Pablo Silvano ome mãikꞌaapa Timoteo paara na kꞌartꞌa pꞌã pëiruta parã ijãapataarãmaa, Tesalónica pꞌuurude pꞌanɨ. Taipa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ parã Tachi Akꞌõredeerã mãikꞌaapa Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristodeerã, wãara ijãapata perã.
Taipa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãikꞌaapa Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa parã pia akꞌɨ pꞌanadamerã. Mãgá kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.

Ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, ichita gracias jarapata Tachi Akꞌõremaa parã jõmaarã pari. Taipa wãara mãga oodaipia bɨ, ɨ̃rá parã waapɨara Cristode ijãapata perã, naaweda ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa kꞌãyaara. Ichiaba ɨ̃rá audupɨara chikꞌinia pꞌanapata awaraa ijãapataarã ome.

Mãgá pꞌanapata perã, taipa mãga o–ĩa nepɨrɨpata awaraa Akꞌõrede ijãapataarãmaa, ãra tꞌãide nipadakꞌãri. Nepɨrɨpata sãga parã choopata Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨde. Mãgá choopata ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa parã jɨrɨ pꞌanɨ mĩda miapidaitꞌee, ma ijãa pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa. Ichiaba mãgá choopata chupɨria chitoonɨ mĩda.

Mãgá choopata perã ãchia parã miapi iru pꞌanɨ misa, akꞌɨpipata wãara Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã kꞌaripapari mãikꞌaapa parã pia akꞌɨpari. Ma awara irua parã mãgá pia akꞌɨpari perã, parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ewari cherude wãara iru truadee wãdaitꞌee.
Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarãpa oopata akꞌɨpari jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Maperã ichiaba kꞌawa pꞌanɨ irua parã miapi pꞌanɨɨrã aukꞌa miapiitꞌee.

Jõdee parã waa nepɨra unuda–e paitꞌee, tai jida ichiaba, irua tachi aukꞌa kꞌãiwee pꞌanapikꞌãri ichi truade. Mãga ooitꞌee Tachi Waibɨa Jesús ɨtꞌariipa chekꞌãri ichi angeleerã ome. Ma ewate jõmaarãpa ãra unudaitꞌee tꞌɨpɨtau urua pɨkꞌa nɨ̃bɨde.
Ma ewate Jesupa miapiitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanɨɨrã mãikꞌaapa ijãadaamaa pꞌanɨɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida Tachi Waibɨa Jesude.

Mãɨrã atuadaitꞌee. Ichita kꞌachiade pꞌanadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa tꞌɨmɨ́ pꞌanadaitꞌee Tachi Waibɨa bɨmãiipa. Akꞌõre Waibɨa truadee wãda–e paitꞌee. Unuda–e paitꞌee iru kꞌĩra wãree mãikꞌaapa irua ne–inaa pi–ia oo bɨ.

Ma ewate Jesús chekꞌãri, ichi kꞌĩra wãree unupiitꞌee ichideerã kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Jõma irude ijãa pꞌanɨɨrã o–ĩa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daitꞌee irumaa, wãara kꞌawaadaitꞌee perã iru kꞌĩra wãree. Ma ewate parã jida aukꞌa pꞌanadaitꞌee, taipa jarateepata ijãadapꞌedaa perã.

Maperã tai ichita ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata Tachi Akꞌõremaa, irua parã pia akꞌɨmerã. Iruata parã jɨrɨji Cristode ijãapataadamerã mãikꞌaapa irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa pꞌanapataadamerã. Iidi pꞌanɨ irua oopimerã jõmaweda parãpa ne–inaa pia oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ iru Jaure kꞌapꞌɨa pari.

Mãga iidi pꞌanɨ parãpa mãgá ne–inaa pia oodakꞌãri, awaraarãpa Tachi Waibɨa Jesús tꞌɨ̃ pia tꞌo pꞌanadamerã parã kꞌaurepa. Ma awara ãrapa parã jida pia akꞌɨdaitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõre Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo ome parã mãgá kꞌaripapata perã.
Ɨ̃rá ɨ̃pemaarã, taipa waapɨara jaratee kꞌinia pꞌanɨ sãga paitꞌee Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo chekꞌãri ichideerã atade.

Parã enenee jõnɨ isapai kꞌĩsia awara kꞌĩsianaadamerã maa–e pɨrã pꞌeranaadamerã, ũriruta pɨrã Tachi Waibɨa ewaa pacheji. Ijãanáatɨ jara pꞌanɨ pɨjida Akꞌõre Jaurepa apidaamaa mãga kꞌawapiji, maa–e pɨrã mɨ itꞌaideepa mãga jaraji maa–e pɨrã taipa kꞌartꞌade mãga pꞌãjida.

Kꞌũrapináatɨ apidaamaa. Cristo che–e paitꞌee nãga pꞌasai naaweda. Naapɨara eperãarã chokꞌaraarãpa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌaneedaitꞌee. Ma awara eperãarã tꞌãide eperã aba waibɨa uchiaitꞌee. Mãgɨpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooi awaa baitꞌee perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru tꞌɨmɨ́ pëiitꞌee kꞌachiade mianamerã.

Mamĩda iru na eujãde bɨ misa, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra unuamaa iru baitꞌee. Ma awara kꞌĩra unuamaa iru baitꞌee ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo, jõmaweda aɨ kꞌĩrapite na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata. Kꞌĩsiaitꞌee ichi jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Mãga kꞌĩsiaitꞌee perã, su–akꞌɨ beeitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre te edupɨara bɨ cuartode mãikꞌaapa jaraitꞌee ichita Tachi Akꞌõre.
¿Parãpa kꞌirãpada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã mɨa jarateeda parã ome bakꞌãri?
Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ sãgapꞌeda mãgɨ́ eperã waide che–e. Abaapa ichi tꞌɨdɨkꞌa iru bɨ chepiamaapa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ewari awara bɨda ma–itꞌee paru misa.

Mãgɨ́ eperã waide che–e bɨ mĩda, ichi waibɨapa nãgaweda eperãarãmaa mera kꞌachia oomaa bɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadaamaa pꞌaneedamerã. Mamĩda tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ma ewari awara bɨda chi kꞌachia ooi awaa bee–itꞌee che–e paitꞌee chi tꞌɨdɨkꞌa iru bɨpa na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bɨ misa.

Mãpai chi tꞌɨdɨkꞌa iru bɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdeepa uchiakꞌãri, mãgɨ́ kꞌachia ooi awaa bɨ paitꞌee kꞌachia oode. Mamĩda Tachi Waibɨa Jesupa ichi pedeepapai mãgɨ́ peeitꞌee, ichi kꞌĩra wãreede chekꞌãri mãgɨ́ jõitꞌee.

Satanapa mãgɨ́ eperã chokꞌa pëiitꞌee eperãarã kꞌũramerã. Mãga ooitꞌee ne–inaa eperãarãpa waide unudakꞌaa akꞌɨpi bɨpa mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa oo bɨpa. Satanapa ma seewa oopiitꞌee mãgɨ́ eperãmaa, eperãarãpa ijãadamerã mãgɨta Tachi Akꞌõre.

Mãgá kꞌachia oo bɨpa wãara mãgɨpa Tachi Waibɨade ijãadaamaa pꞌanɨɨrã kꞌũraitꞌee. Mãgɨ́ ome ãchi aukꞌa kꞌachiadee wãdaitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida ijãa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadairã. Wãarata ijãaruta pɨrã, Cristopa ãchi ma o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atai. Mamĩda mãga kꞌiniada–e paitꞌee.
Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ eperã chepiitꞌee ãchi kꞌũramerã ne–inaa oo bɨpa Satanás kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida ijãadai kꞌãyaara, seewa ijãa pꞌaneedaitꞌee.
Mãgá wãarata ijãadaamaa pꞌanadaitꞌee perã mãikꞌaapa kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanadaitꞌee perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi tꞌɨmɨ́ kꞌachiadee pëiitꞌee, eperãarãpa oopatapꞌedaa akꞌɨkꞌãri ichi ewari waibɨa ewate.

Ɨ̃pemaarã, ijãadakꞌaa beerã ome mãga pꞌasaitꞌee mĩda, parã ãchikꞌa pꞌana kꞌiniada–e, Cristode ijãapata perã. Mapa taipa ichita gracias jara kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa parã pari. Tachi Waibɨapa parã kꞌinia iru bɨ. Maperã na eujã ooi naaweda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã jɨrɨtꞌeraji ũridamerã Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ijãadamerã iruata parã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atai. Akꞌõrepa ichi Jaure pëi kꞌinia baji parã awara bɨmerã ichi–itꞌee, ma wãarata ijãadakꞌãri.

Ma–itꞌeeta ichia tai pëiji parãmaa jarateede. Ichia parã jɨrɨ baji ijãadamerã taipa jarateepata Cristode. Ichiaba parã jɨrɨji tai ome aukꞌa iru pꞌanadamerã jõma ichia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ichideerã–itꞌee, Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristokꞌa ɨtꞌari kꞌĩra wãree pꞌaneedakꞌãri.
Ɨ̃pemaarã, maperã chóotɨ Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨde mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra atuanáatɨ taipa parãmaa jarateepatapꞌedaa, pedee jaradapa wa kꞌartꞌade pꞌãdapa.

Taipa ɨtꞌaa iidi pꞌanɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã kꞌaripadamerã na eujãde pꞌanɨ misa. Kꞌirãpátɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi Cristode ijãapataarã audú kꞌinia iru bapari perã, tachi ichita kꞌaripapari na eujãde pꞌanɨ misa. Ichiaba tachi tꞌãri o–ĩapipari kꞌĩsiapikꞌãri tachia ne–inaa unudaitꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujãdeepa uchiadapꞌeda, wãdakꞌãri iru truadee.
Irua parã tꞌãridepai choopipari ijãa pꞌanɨde, mãgá ichita pedee pia jaradamerã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa jõmaweda pia oodamerã.

Ɨ̃rá ɨ̃pemaarã, parãmaa chupɨria iidi kꞌinia pꞌanɨ tai pari ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadamerã. Iidítɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai kꞌaripamerã, jõmaarãmaa irua jara pëida isapai jaratee kꞌinia pꞌanadairã. Iidítɨ ma jaratee pꞌanɨ ũrirutaarã tꞌãripa Cristode ijãadamerã, parã ijãadapꞌedaakꞌa.
Ichiaba iidítɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai kꞌaripa atamerã kꞌachia beerã juadeepa, chokꞌaraarãpa tai jɨrɨpata perã miapidaitꞌee. Jãgɨɨrãpa Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristode ijãa kꞌiniadakꞌaa.

Mamĩda kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Waibɨapa oopari ichia jara bɨkꞌa. Iruata parã kꞌaripaitꞌee choodamerã parã ijãa pꞌanɨde mãikꞌaapa kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripaitꞌee kꞌachia beerã poro, Satanapa parã kꞌachiade baaipi kꞌinia bakꞌãri.
Tachi Waibɨapa ichideerã mãgá kꞌaripapari perã, taipa ijãa pꞌanɨ parãpa wãara oomaa pꞌanɨ taipa jarapatakꞌa mãikꞌaapa mãga oopataadaitꞌee.

Maperãpɨ iidi pꞌanɨ Tachi Waibɨapa parãmaa kꞌawapimerã sãga Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia iru pꞌanadai, irua parã audú kꞌinia iru baparikꞌa. Mãga kꞌawaadakꞌãri, chupɨria jõneeruta pɨjida, pãchi tꞌãridepai choodaitꞌee, Cristopa mãga oopipari perã.
Ɨ̃pemaarã, Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa jara pëiru ichide ijãapataarã mimiadaipia bɨ, taipa naaweda jarateedapꞌedaakꞌa. Ijãaparipa ma ũraa ũriamaa bɨ pɨrã, iru ikꞌaawaapa ãyaa pꞌanéetɨ.
Pãchia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ pꞌanadaipia bɨ tai pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa parã tꞌãide nipadakꞌãri. Kꞌoo–idaa pꞌanadakꞌaa paji.
Apidaamaa iidida–e paji taimaa chikꞌo pari teedamerã. Ma kꞌãyaara ãstaawa, pꞌãrikꞌua pida mimiapachida tai chikꞌo neto kꞌodaitꞌee. Mãga oopachida parãpa chikꞌo tai–itꞌee netonaadamerã.
Tai mimiapata perã Cristo–itꞌee, mãga iidikꞌajida. Mamĩda mãga ooda–e paji. Akꞌɨpi kꞌinia pꞌanapachida Cristode ijãapataarã sãga pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ.
Parã ome pꞌanadakꞌãri, na ũraa jarajida: “Nekꞌopidaikꞌaraa bɨda ajida, mimia kꞌinia–e bɨmaa.”
Mamĩda ɨ̃rá taipa ũri pꞌanɨ parã tꞌãidepemaarã ũkꞌuru mimiadakꞌaa. Jĩpꞌa nipapata kꞌawaadaitꞌee awaraarãpa oomaa pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa jara pꞌanɨ.
Maperãpɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa taimaa jarapiru: mãgee eperãarã kꞌãiwee mimiadaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa chikꞌo atadaipia bɨ ãchi juadoopa.
Ichiaba apemaarã ɨ̃pemaarãmaa ũraa pꞌanɨ ichita ne–inaa pia oopataadamerã, sẽda–ee.
Mamĩda parã tꞌãidepemapa na kꞌartꞌade ũraa jara bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia–e pɨrã, awaraa ijãapataarãmaa nepɨrɨ́tɨ mãikꞌaapa mãgɨ́ ikꞌaawaapa ãyaa pꞌanéetɨ, kꞌĩra nejasia beemerã.
Mamĩda kꞌĩrakꞌaupai mãgɨ́ ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanadai. Jĩpꞌa ũráatɨ pãchi ɨ̃pema ũraapatakꞌa, irua oomerã Cristopa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Taipa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ Tachi Waibɨapa parã ichita kꞌãiwee pꞌanapimerã. Ichiata ichideerã mãgá bapipari, nepɨra wẽe pꞌanɨde mãikꞌaapa nepɨrade pꞌanɨ pɨjida. Taipa ɨtꞌaa iidi pꞌanɨ Tachi Waibɨa parã jõmaarã ome ichita bapariimerã.
Mɨ, Pablopa nãgɨ́ salude pꞌãru mɨchi juadoopa kꞌawaadamerã mɨa na kꞌartꞌa pëiru. Nãgá pꞌãpari mɨchi juapa mɨa kꞌartꞌa jõma pëi bɨde.
Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa parã jõmaweda pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã.
Mãgapai paji.

Mɨ, Pablopa na kꞌartꞌa pꞌã pëiru Timoteomaa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bada perã, mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji Jesucristopa pëimerã ichi ũraa jarateede. Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ eperãarãpa Jesucristode ijãadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra kꞌaripaitꞌee atuanaadamerã. Mapa tachia ijãapata mãikꞌaapa nɨpata irua jaradakꞌa oomerã.

Timoteo, pɨ mɨchi warrakꞌa, Cristode ijãapari perã mɨ kꞌaurepa. Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãikꞌaapa Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa pɨ pia akꞌɨ pꞌanadamerã mãikꞌaapa chupɨria kꞌawaadamerã. Mãgá pɨ kꞌãiwee bapariitꞌee.

Naaweda mɨa enenee nɨ̃baji pɨ beemerã Éfeso pꞌuurude, mɨ mamãikꞌaapa uchiakꞌãri wãitꞌee Macedonia eujãdee. Atꞌãri kꞌinia bɨ jãma beemerã, jãpemaarã ũkꞌuruurãpa ne–inaa awara jarateemaa pꞌanadairã mɨa jaratee ni kꞌãyaara. Jaráji ma seewa waa jarateenaadamerã.

Ichiaba ũráaji jarateenaadamerã judiorã chonaarãpa chonaarãweda nepɨrɨdapꞌedaa. Jɨrɨdaikꞌaraa bɨ ãchi chonaarãdeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã pꞌe iru pꞌanɨ akꞌɨpidaitꞌee jõmaarãmaa. Mãga oodakꞌãri, aupedeepipata ijãapataarãmaa mãikꞌaapa maarepida kꞌaripada–e waapɨara ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa oodamerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Mɨa jaraji mãɨrã mãgá ũraamerã kꞌinia bairã ijãapataarã chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadamerã. Mãga pꞌanapataadai wãara ijãadakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa tꞌãripa oo kꞌinia pꞌanadakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa, kꞌĩsia pꞌua wẽe.
Mamĩda ɨ̃rá jãpemaarã ũkꞌuruurãpa mãga ooda–e pꞌanɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara awaraa kꞌĩsia atajida. Mapa pariatua pedee wãpata.
Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jaratee kꞌinia pꞌanɨda a pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda wãara kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ irua jara kꞌinia bada ma ũraa Moisemaa pꞌãpikꞌãri. Kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãkꞌa jaratee pꞌanɨ mĩda, mãga pꞌanɨ–e.
Tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Moisemaa ũraa pꞌãpida pia bɨ, ma ũraade ijãa pꞌanɨ pɨrã Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Ichiaba kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa pꞌãpi–e paji tꞌãri pia beerã–itꞌee. Ma kꞌãyaara pꞌãpiji nãgeerã–itꞌee: oodaamaa pꞌanɨɨrã iru ũraade jara bɨkꞌa; tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa beerã; pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa beerã; irude ijãadakꞌaa beerã; akꞌõreerã peepataarã mãikꞌaapa eperã peepataarã;

miakꞌãi pꞌanɨɨrã awaraarã ome kꞌãipataarã; ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã awaraa ɨmɨkꞌĩra ome kꞌãipataarã wẽraarã ome kꞌãirutakꞌa; chĩara atapataarã esclavo papidaitꞌee; seewa–idaa beerã; seewa wãarakꞌa jarapataarã awaraarã kꞌĩrapite ijãadamerã; mãgeerã–itꞌee mãikꞌaapa jõma irua jara pëidakꞌa oodaamaa pꞌanɨɨrã–itꞌee.

Irua pedee pia jara pëiji ichi Warra Jesucristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Mapa Cristopata Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree unupiji na pꞌekꞌau eujãde nipakꞌãri. Tachi Akꞌõre, chi audú tꞌãri pia baparipa, mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee jarateenamerã.
Mɨa gracias jara bɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristomaa. Ichiata mɨ kꞌaripapari kꞌawa bairã mɨa ooitꞌee ichia oopi bɨkꞌa. Mapa mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji na mimia oomerã.

Mɨ chupɨria kꞌawaaji, naaweda mɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo ooji mĩda. Iru ãpɨte mãikꞌaapa irudeerã ãpɨte ikꞌachia jarapachi. Ma awara irudeerã jɨrɨji miapiitꞌee. Mãga ooji waide kꞌawa–e bada perã iru cheji eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa waide irude ijãa–e bada perã.
Mamĩda iru audú tꞌãri pia bapari perã, mãga kꞌawapiji mɨmaa. Mãgá mɨa irude ijãa beeji mãikꞌaapa iru kꞌaurepa kꞌawaaji awaraarã kꞌinia iru baitꞌee.

Jõmaarãpa nãgɨ́ pedee ijãadaipia bɨ wãara perã. Jesucristo na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee cheji pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã kꞌaripaitꞌee atuanaadamerã. Mɨa ma pedee pia kꞌawa bɨ, mɨ chi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopari kꞌachiara bairã.

Maperãpɨ Jesucristopa mɨ chupɨria kꞌawaaji akꞌɨpiitꞌee ichia mɨ ome chooda. Mãgá chooitꞌee jõma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã ome, irude ijãaruta pɨrã. Kꞌinia bɨ jõmaarãpa ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa ichita ichi ome pꞌanapataadamerã.
Maperã o–ĩa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dáma Tachi Ɨtꞌaripema Reymaa. Iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Iru trua ichita bapari. Iru aupaita Tachi Akꞌõre. Ichita bapari. Eperãarãpa iru unudakꞌaa. ¡Amén!

Timoteo, pɨ mɨchi warrakꞌa bairã, mɨa na ũraa jararu. Kꞌirãpáji Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapida pɨmaa ichi pedee jarapataarã itꞌaideepa. Ma jaradapꞌedaakꞌa ookꞌãri, kꞌĩsia pꞌua–ee chooitꞌee wãarata ijãa bɨde, soldaopa chooparikꞌa ãpɨtee wã–ee chõo jõnɨde.
Ũkꞌuruurãpa mãga ooda–e pꞌanɨ. Mãɨrãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa oodaipia bɨ. Mamĩda irude ijãa amaa pꞌaneejida. Barco kꞌuadákꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ, jõdaitꞌee perã.
Himeneo mãikꞌaapa Alejandro mãga pꞌanɨ. Mapa mɨa ãchi bɨji Satanás juade ichia oo kꞌiniata oomerã ãchi ome. Mãgá kꞌawaadai ikꞌachia jaradaikꞌaraa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre ãpɨte.

Naapɨara ũraaitꞌee parã Cristode ijãapataarã chipꞌedaidakꞌãri, jõmaarã pari ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃damerã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra kꞌaripamerã. Chupɨria iidítɨ pãchi pari mãikꞌaapa awaraarã pari mãikꞌaapa gracias jarátɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa irua ne–inaa jõma ooda pari.

Ichiaba ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daipia bɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã poro waibɨarã pari mãikꞌaapa jõmaweda eperãarã akꞌɨpataarã pari. Mãgá tachi kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadaitꞌee. Ma awara mãgá oodaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa jõmaarã taide kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipadaitꞌee.
Mãgá ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dakꞌãri, pia oopata mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre, Tachi Kꞌaripapari, o–ĩapipata.
Ichia eperãarã jõmaweda o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ata kꞌinia bɨ. Kꞌinia bɨ jõmaarãpa ichi wãarata kꞌawaadamerã.
Tachi Akꞌõre apai mãikꞌaapa eperã apaipa eperãarã tꞌãri aukꞌa bɨpii iru ome. Mãgɨ́ eperã Jesucristo.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bada ewate Cristo ita–aria peepiji jõmaarã pari, eperãarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa. Mãga ooji eperãarã uchiapiitꞌee ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌariipa ɨtꞌaa wãdamerã. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨ jõmaarãpa mãga kꞌawaadamerã.

Ma–itꞌeepɨ ichia mɨ bɨji mãga jarateemerã. Mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji Cristopa pëimerã ichi ũraa jarateede. Audú kꞌinia bɨ mɨa ma wãara pedee jarateenamerã judio–eerãmaa, ãchia ichiaba ijãadamerã. Wãara jara bɨ; seewa–e.

Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ ijãapataarã chipꞌedaidakꞌãri, ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã tꞌãri pia beerãpa ãchi jua ɨtꞌaa ɨadapꞌeda, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃damerã jõmaarã pari. Mamĩda ãchidepema kꞌĩrau bɨ pɨrã maa–e pɨrã nepɨrade bɨ pɨrã awaraa eperã ome, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ikꞌaraa bɨ.

Ichiaba kꞌinia bɨ ijãapataarã wẽraarãpa pꞌaru jɨ̃damerã wẽra pꞌaru jĩpꞌa jɨ̃pataarãpa jɨ̃patakꞌa. Kꞌĩra wãree pꞌanadaitꞌee makꞌɨara chi–oodaikꞌaraa bɨ jɨ̃daitꞌee netꞌaa nẽedee ooda, perladee ooda, pꞌaru ɨ̃pɨadee ooda maa–e pɨrã puda pi–ia bida pꞌanɨpa.
Ma kꞌãyaara pꞌanadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrede wãara ijãapata wẽraarãkꞌa; ne–inaa pia oomaa awaraarã kꞌaripadaitꞌee.
Ijãapataarã chipꞌedaidakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa ũridaitꞌee, wẽraarãpa kꞌĩupꞌee ũridaipia bɨ, ãchi kꞌĩsia jarada–ee. Ãchi jarateepataarã ichita waawee pꞌanadaipia bɨ.
Mɨa wẽraarãmaa ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã jarateepikꞌaa maa–e pɨrã chokꞌa pëipikꞌaa. Kꞌĩupꞌee pꞌanadaipia bɨ ijãapataarã see jõnɨ misa.
Mɨa mãga jaraji Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã ookꞌãri, naapɨara Adán oopꞌeda, Eva ooda perã.
Ma awara Netuara Poro Waibɨapa Adán kꞌũra–e paji. Evata kꞌũratꞌaaji. Mãgá Evata naapɨara kꞌachiade baaiji.

Ma kꞌaurepa eperãarã jõmaweda o kꞌachiade pꞌaneejida. Mamĩda wẽraarã paara ma o kꞌachiadeepa uchiadai Cristode ijãaruta pɨrã mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa ooruta pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa; ãchideerã pia akꞌɨpataadamerã mãikꞌaapa awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanapataadamerã.
Eperãarãpa wãarata jarapata jaradakꞌãri: “Eperã ijãapataarã akꞌɨpari pa kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã, pia bɨda” apata.
Maperã ijãapataarã akꞌɨpari jõmaarã kꞌĩrapite tꞌãri pia baipia bɨ; wẽra apai iru baipia bɨ; kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa; ne–inaa pariatua oo–ee; awaraarã auteebai kꞌawaa ichi temãi; pia jaratee kꞌawaa;
toyaa bakꞌaa; kꞌĩrauyaa mãikꞌaapa nepɨra jɨrɨyaa bakꞌaa; ma kꞌãyaara ne–inaa pia oopari; pꞌaratꞌa ata kꞌiniayaa bakꞌaa.
Ichi te pidaarã pia akꞌɨ baipia bɨ, chi warrarãpa ichi waaweedamerã mãikꞌaapa chokꞌekꞌee pꞌanadamerã.
Ɨmɨkꞌĩrapa ichi te pidaarã pꞌoyaa pia akꞌɨ–e bɨ pɨrã, ¿sãga Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapataarã akꞌɨima?
Eperã ewaa Cristode ijãa bɨ pɨrã, ijãapataarã akꞌɨpari paikꞌaraa bɨ, auduadarii perã mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa atuapii perã Netuara Poro Waibɨa atuapidakꞌa.

Ijãapataarã akꞌɨpari tꞌɨ̃ pia tꞌo pꞌanadaipia bɨ, Cristode ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa paara. Mãga–e pɨrã, Netuara Poro Waibɨapa iru ãpɨte ne–inaa kꞌachia nepɨrɨpii eperãarãmaa, jõmaarãpa ma kꞌaurepa iru pia–e akꞌɨdamerã.

Ijãapataarã kꞌaripapataarã diácono apata aukꞌa tꞌãri pia pꞌanadaipia bɨ; kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa; jĩpꞌa pedeepata; seewa jaradakꞌaa mãikꞌaapa chĩara ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia pedeedakꞌaa; toyaa pꞌanadakꞌaa; pꞌaratꞌa ata kꞌiniayaa pꞌanadakꞌaa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata kꞌawapida Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari tꞌãripa ijãadaipia bɨ, kꞌĩsia pꞌua–ee.

Ãchi mimiade tꞌĩudai naaweda, awaraa ijãapataarãpa ãchi pꞌanapata pia akꞌɨdaipia bɨ kꞌawaadaitꞌee wãara pꞌanapata Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa wa mãga–e. Ɨmɨateeda wẽe uchiaruta pɨrã, ijãapataarã kꞌaripapataarã pꞌaneedai.
Wẽraarã
Ijãapataarã kꞌaripaparipa wẽra apai iru baipia bɨ. Pia akꞌɨipia bɨ ichi warrarã mãikꞌaapa awaraarã ichi tede pꞌanapata.
Mãgɨ́ kꞌaripapataarãpa ãchi mimia pia ooruta pɨrã, ijãapataarãpa ãra tꞌɨ̃ tꞌo pꞌanadaitꞌee. Mãpai ãrapa waawee–ee jaradaitꞌee ãchia Jesucristode ijãa pꞌanɨ.
Taarã–ee mɨ wã kꞌinia bɨ pɨ akꞌɨde.

Mamĩda taarãru pɨrã, na pꞌãdapa pɨa kꞌawaaitꞌee sãga pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ apemaarã ijãapataarã ome. Kꞌirãpapíji tachi ijãapataarã jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõredeerã. Iru ichita bapari tachi ome mãikꞌaapa iru wãarata jara pëiji tachimaa jɨ̃adamerã mãikꞌaapa jõmaarãmaa jarateedamerã.
Wãara, awaraarãpa ma wãarata jara pëida kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ mĩda, tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ma kꞌãyaara ne–inaa pipɨara wẽ–e. Mapa Tachi Waibɨamaa nãga kꞌaripata:

Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãmaa pɨa unupipachi eperã jĩpꞌaakꞌa. Kꞌachia oo–ee bapachi Akꞌõre Jaure kꞌaurepa. Angeleerãpa pɨ unupachida. Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa ũripachida pɨa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa chokꞌaraarãpa pɨde ijãapachida. Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ ateeji ɨtꞌaa, ichi trua kꞌĩra wãree nɨ̃bɨde ichita bapariimerã.

Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jĩpꞌa jara bɨ: Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate pai naaweda, eperãarã ũkꞌuru ma wãarade ijãa amaadaitꞌee. Cristode ijãadai kꞌãyaara, kꞌũrapidaitꞌee netuaraarãmaa mãikꞌaapa ijãadaitꞌee ma netuaraarãpa jarateepirutade.

Ma netuaraarã jua ekꞌari jarateepataarãpa jarapata: “Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateemaa pꞌanɨda” apata. Mamĩda seewamaa pꞌanɨ. Ãchi–itꞌee pꞌua–e bɨ ijãapataarã kꞌũradaitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarateepi bɨkꞌa pꞌoyaa jarateeda–e, netuaradeerã perã.
Jãgɨɨrãpa ũraapata miakꞌãidaikꞌaraa bɨ mãikꞌaapa chikꞌo ũkꞌuru kꞌodaikꞌaraa bɨ. Mamĩda tachia Akꞌõre Ũraa wãarade ijãapata perã, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ irua ne–inaa jõma ooji, gracias jaradapꞌeda kꞌodamerã.
Jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda pia bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite tachi nekꞌopata pia bɨ, irua mãga jarada perã mãikꞌaapa tachia gracias jarapata perã irumaa ma chikꞌo pari.

Arii pꞌanɨ ɨ̃pemaarãmaa mɨ ũraa jaratéeji. Mãga ooru pɨrã, pia ooitꞌee Jesucristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Iru mimiapari pia baitꞌee ijãa bɨ misa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida iru kꞌapꞌɨa pari mãikꞌaapa kꞌawaa wãru misa irua jarapida ichia jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãmaa.

Mamĩda tꞌĩunáaji ma chonaarãweda nepɨrɨdapꞌedaa jarateepataarã ome. Jãgɨɨrãpa jarateeda–e Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapidakꞌa. Jarateepata chõtrãarãpa ũri kꞌinia pꞌanapata cuentokꞌa. Ãchi ome aupedeei kꞌãyaara, jɨrɨ́ji pipɨara kꞌawaaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida mãikꞌaapa óoji irua oopi bɨkꞌa.

Jõmaarãpa nãgɨ́ pedee ijãadaipia bɨ, wãara perã. Tachi pꞌiradakꞌãri juataura pꞌaneedaitꞌee, tachi kꞌapꞌɨa kꞌaripapata. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida kꞌawaa wãdakꞌãri, tachi jaure paara kꞌaripapata. Mãgá na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa, kꞌãiwee pꞌanapata mãikꞌaapa kꞌawaapata tachi piudakꞌãri, ɨtꞌaa wãdaitꞌee.

Ma–itꞌeeta tachi choopata na mimiade, eperãarãpa ma ũraa jara pëidade ijãadamerã. Eperãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa tachia jarateepata ũridaamaa pꞌanɨ mĩda, ijãa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre ichita bapari mãikꞌaapa irua aupaita na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaweda akꞌɨpari. Wãara, tachi Cristode ijãapataarã pipɨara akꞌɨpari, tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atapari perã.
Mɨa jõma jara aupada jaratéeji jãpemaarã ijãapataarãmaa mãikꞌaapa jaráji mãga oodamerã.

Kꞌĩsiapináaji apidaamaa pɨ pedee ũridaikꞌaraa bɨ, pɨ makꞌɨara chonaa–e bairã. Ma kꞌãyaara akꞌɨpíji pɨa wãara oo kꞌinia bɨ Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa, ãrapa aukꞌa oodamerã. Nãga baparíiji: ne–inaa pia jarapari; kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipapari jõmaarã ome; awaraarã kꞌinia iru bapari; nepɨrade bɨ mĩda, Cristode ijãapari; ne–inaa kꞌachia oo–ee bapari; jõma oopari Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Mɨ jãmaa wãru misa, ijãapataarã chipꞌedaidakꞌãri, léeji Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdapꞌedaa. Jaratéeji kꞌasaa jara kꞌinia bɨ mãikꞌaapa ũráaji ijãapataarã pꞌanapataadamerã ma jara bɨkꞌa.

Kꞌirãpáji Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa jaradapꞌedaa pɨmaa, ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarãpa ãchi jua bɨdakꞌãri pɨ ɨ̃rɨ. Mãga oodakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa ne–inaa oopiji pɨmaa kꞌawaamerã kꞌãare mimia ooitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Mãga óoji Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa.
Kꞌĩsíaji mɨa ũraadade na kꞌartꞌa pꞌãdade mãikꞌaapa tꞌãripa óoji aɨde jara bɨkꞌa. Mãga ooru pɨrã, awaraarãpa akꞌɨdaitꞌee pɨa naawedapema kꞌãyaara pipɨara oomaa bɨ.

Kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa óoji Cristopa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa jaratéeji irua jarapi bɨkꞌa. Chóoji mãga oo bɨde kꞌawa bairã mãga oo bɨpa, pɨ Akꞌõre truadee wãitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pɨa jaratee bɨ ũrirutaarã aukꞌa wãdaitꞌee, pɨ kꞌaurepa Cristode ijãadakꞌãri.
Ijãapataarã tꞌãidepema chonaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooru pɨrã, ɨtrɨanáaji. Ma kꞌãyaara pedéeji iru ome, pɨchi akꞌõre ome pedeeparikꞌa. Jõdee, kꞌũtrãarã ũráaji pɨchi ɨ̃pemaarã ũraakꞌajikꞌa.
Chõtrãarã akꞌɨipia bɨ pɨchi nawe akꞌɨparikꞌa. Mãgá ichiaba awẽraarã akꞌɨipia bɨ pɨchi ɨ̃pewẽraarã akꞌɨkꞌajikꞌa, ãra ome kꞌachia oo–ee.
Pia kꞌaripáji pꞌẽtrãarã ëreerã wẽe chitoonɨ.

Mamĩda pꞌẽtrãapa warrarã wa ãichakꞌeerã iru bɨ pɨrã, ãchiata naapɨara ãchideerã akꞌɨdaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraade jara bɨkꞌa. Mãgá ãchi nawe wa awela kꞌaripadai irua ãchi kꞌaripadakꞌa ãchi wari wãkꞌãri. Ma awara mãga oodakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pia akꞌɨpari.
Jõdee pꞌẽtrãa ëreerã wẽe kꞌɨrɨpa nɨpari Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripamerã. Ãstaawa, pꞌãrikꞌua pida ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pari Tachi Akꞌõremaa kꞌaripamerã. Mãgee pꞌẽtrãa kꞌaripaipia bɨ.
Mamĩda mãgee pꞌẽtrãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa Tachi Akꞌõre netꞌaade kꞌĩsiadai kꞌãyaara, ãchia kꞌiniata oo wãpata. Mãgeerã chokꞌai pꞌanɨ mĩda, piudapꞌedaarã́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ. Mapa mãgeerã kꞌaripaikꞌaraa bɨ.
Jaráji ijãapataarã pɨ ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrãmaa oodamerã mɨa etꞌewa jaradakꞌa. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, awaraarãpa pꞌoyaa kꞌachia pedeeda–e pai tachi ijãapataarã ãpɨte.
Ijãaparipa ichi ëreerã wa audupɨara ichideerã akꞌɨ–e pɨrã, baamaa bɨ Cristopa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa ijãadakꞌaa beerã kꞌãyaara kꞌachiara bɨ.
Pꞌẽtrãa tꞌɨ̃ pꞌãdai naaweda awaraa pꞌẽtrãarã tꞌɨ̃ ome, iru bapata akꞌɨdaipia bɨ. Mãgɨ́ pꞌẽtrãa ɨmɨkꞌĩra apai ome miakꞌãi bapꞌeda, sesenta añodeepa waa iru baipia bɨ.

Awaraarãpa iru tꞌɨ̃ pia tꞌo pꞌanadaipia bɨ, irua ne–inaa pia oopata kꞌaurepa nãgee jĩakꞌa: ichi warrarã pia warida perã; eperãarã pia auteebaida perã; ijãapataarã pꞌasia chedakꞌãri, ãra bɨɨrɨ sɨɨda perã;
Pꞌẽtrãarã sesenta años waide wẽe beerã tꞌɨ̃ pꞌãdaikꞌaraa bɨ awaraa pꞌẽtrãarã tꞌɨ̃ ome, ɨmɨkꞌĩra waya kꞌiniadarii perã mãikꞌaapa miakꞌãidarii perã, Cristo–itꞌee mimiadai kꞌãyaara.
Mãgee pꞌẽtrãarãpa jaradapꞌeda Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oodaitꞌee, ɨmɨkꞌĩra ataruta pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia pꞌuapii maa–e pɨrã awaraarãpa pedee kꞌachia jaradai ãra ãpɨte.

Ma awara, mãgee pꞌẽtrãarã kꞌoo–idaadaipata, ne–inaa pia makꞌɨara ooda–ee. Mãgá te chaa chĩara ãpɨte jara nipapata mãikꞌaapa pedee–idaa pꞌanadairã, ũraa wãpata ãchi kꞌĩsiadeepa. Mãgá pedee kꞌachia jaradaikꞌaraa bɨta jara wãpata.

Maperã mɨa kꞌinia bɨ mãgee pꞌẽtrãarã makꞌɨara chõtrãa–ee pꞌanɨɨrã, waya miakꞌãidamerã mãikꞌaapa warra tꞌodamerã. Mãgá mimiadaitꞌee ãchi temãi, ãchideerã akꞌɨmaa pꞌanɨ misa. Mãga oo pꞌanɨ pɨrã, tachi ijãapataarã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarãpa pꞌoyaa kꞌachia pedeeda–e pai tachi ãpɨte ma pꞌẽtrãarã kꞌaurepa.
Mãgee pꞌẽtrãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa oo amaajida Cristopa oopi kꞌinia bɨ oodaitꞌee Satanapa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Waya mɨa jara bɨ: Cristode ijãapari ëreerãdepema pꞌẽtrãa paraa pɨrã, ma ijãaparipa chi pꞌẽtrãa kꞌaripaipia bɨ. Pëikꞌaraa bɨ ijãapataarãmaa kꞌaripa iidide, ãrapa ne–inaa iru pꞌanɨ araa–e pai perã audú chokꞌaraarã–itꞌee. Ijãapataarãpa akꞌɨdaipia bɨ pꞌẽtrãarã ëreerã wẽe chitoonɨ aupai.

Ijãapataarã chonaarã waaweedaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa pꞌaadaipia bɨ ãchi jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã pia akꞌɨdakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripadakꞌãri. Waapɨara pꞌaadaipia bɨ awaraa ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarã kꞌãyaara, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida jarateedakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa ijãapataarã ũraadakꞌãri.
Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Pꞌakꞌa itꞌai jɨ̃náatɨ trigo tꞌɨamaa bakꞌãri. Ita–aria kꞌopítɨ.’
Ichiaba awara ãi jara bɨ:
‘Mimiaparipa pꞌaratꞌa ataipia bɨ chi poro waibɨa juadepema.’
Eperãpa ijãapataarã akꞌɨpari ɨmɨateeru pɨrã, ijãanáatɨ mãgɨpa jara bɨ. Jĩpꞌa ma pedee akꞌɨdaipia bɨ eperãarã omé wa õpee aukꞌa jararuta pɨrã.
Mamĩda ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarã kꞌachiade baai jõnaruta pɨrã, jõmaarã taide ɨtrɨakꞌóoji. Mãgá awaraarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda–e paitꞌee waaweepa.
Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa Jesucristo kꞌĩrapite, angeleerã jɨrɨtꞌerada kꞌĩrapite paara, mɨa jara bɨ: óoji mɨa etꞌewa jaradakꞌa. Mamĩda pɨchi kꞌinia aba pipɨara akꞌɨnáaji awaraa kꞌãyaara.

Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai ijãapari audú isapai awara bɨi ijãapataarã akꞌɨpari mimia–itꞌee. Ma–itꞌee pɨ jua bɨi naaweda mãgɨ́ ɨ̃rɨ, iru bapata pia akꞌɨipia bɨ. Iru ne–inaa kꞌachiade ni pɨrã, awaraarãpa iru ãpɨte kꞌachia pedeedai mãikꞌaapa pɨ ãpɨte aukꞌa mãgadai, irua oopata pɨa pia akꞌɨi jĩakꞌaapa. Mapa maarepida ne–inaa kꞌachia oonáaji. Ichita óoji Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa.
Pania aupai toikꞌaraa bɨ. Pɨ ipꞌii kꞌayaa bapari perã, ichiaba vino ma–ãri toipia bɨ bi pꞌirapiamaapa.

Jõmaarãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ eperãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata, tau taawa oopata perã. Taarã–e nɨde pɨa kꞌawaai mãgeerãpa oopata mãikꞌaapa ãchi jɨrɨtꞌera–e paitꞌee ijãapataarã akꞌɨpari mimia–itꞌee. Jõdee, awaraa eperãarã pꞌanapata ewaa akꞌɨkꞌãri, tꞌãri pia pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda taarã pakꞌãri, pɨa kꞌawaa atai ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia mera oopata mãikꞌaapa ãchi jida jɨrɨtꞌera–e paitꞌee ma mimia–itꞌee.

Mãgá ichiaba taarã–ee eperãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa ne–inaa pia oopata kꞌawaai, tau taawa oopata perã. Mamĩda ne–inaa pia mera ooruta pɨjida, taarã–ee pɨa mãga kꞌawaa atai, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa kꞌawaapiitꞌee perã. Mãgeerãta jɨrɨtꞌeraipia bɨ ma mimia–itꞌee.
Esclavo Cristode ijãa bɨpa chipari waaweeipia bɨ, ichi kꞌaurepa ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa ikꞌachia pedeenaadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre ãpɨte mãikꞌaapa taipa jarateedapꞌedaade.

Chipari ichiaba Cristode ijãa bɨ pɨrã, ma esclavopa kꞌĩsiaikꞌaraa bɨ oo–e paitꞌee jõma chiparipa oopi bɨkꞌa, ichi ɨ̃pema perã Cristo kꞌaurepa. Ma kꞌãyaara audupɨara tꞌãripa ooipia bɨ chiparipa oopi bɨkꞌa iru kꞌaripaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa akꞌɨpiitꞌee iru kꞌinia iru bɨ Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Ma jõma jara aupada jãpema ijãapataarãmaa jaratéeji mãikꞌaapa ũráaji mãga oodamerã.
Timoteo, abaapa jarateeru pɨrã Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa pedee wãara jarateeda awara maa–e pɨrã iru jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãpa jaratee pꞌanɨ awara, mãgɨpa ooamaa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Jãgee eperã audua bɨ mãikꞌaapa wãara maarepida kꞌawa–e bɨ. Aupedeei awaa bapari Akꞌõre Ũraade pedee jara kꞌinia bɨ kꞌaurepa mãikꞌaapa ichi tꞌãridepai kꞌachia kꞌĩsiapari. Ichi jaratee bɨ kꞌaurepa ijãapataarã kꞌĩra unuamaa para beepari; kꞌĩraupikꞌa para beepari; ikꞌachia pedee para beepari mãikꞌaapa chĩara pedee ijãada–e para beepari.

Ichi mãikꞌaapa ichi jĩakꞌaarã kꞌĩsia kꞌawada–ee pꞌanɨ. Jĩpꞌa aupedee kꞌinia pꞌanɨ, Tachi Akꞌõre wãarata waa kꞌawa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadairã. Jara wãpata “taita ijãa pꞌanɨda” apata, pꞌaratꞌa ata kꞌinia pꞌanadairã ãchia jaratee pꞌanɨ pari.
Jõdee Cristode wãara ijãapataarã nãga pꞌanapata: tꞌãri o–ĩa; kꞌãiwee; awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanapata. Pꞌaratꞌa iru pꞌanɨ jida wa wẽe pꞌanɨ pɨjida, aukꞌa tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapata.
Tachi tꞌodakꞌãri, maarepida netꞌaa wẽe tꞌojida mãikꞌaapa waya mãga pꞌanadaitꞌee piudakꞌãri.
Maperã ne–inaa kꞌopari mãikꞌaapa pꞌaru jɨ̃pari iru pꞌanɨ pɨrã, tachi ijãapataarã tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanadaitꞌee.

Mamĩda eperãarã ũkꞌuru, audú pꞌaratꞌa ata kꞌiniapa, kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–eedaipata mãikꞌaapa kꞌachiade baaipata. Maapꞌeda bigi pꞌoyaa lazodeepa uchia–e bɨkꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa ãra ma kꞌachiadeepa pꞌoyaa uchiada–e pꞌaneepata. Mãgapɨ eperãarã atua wãpata.

Mapa chi audú pꞌaratꞌa ata kꞌinia bɨpa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoode baaiitꞌee. Wãara, pꞌaratꞌa ata kꞌiniapa ũkꞌuru ijãapataarãpa paara Cristode waa ijãa kꞌiniada–e. Mãɨrã kꞌĩsia pꞌua pꞌanapata mãikꞌaapa ãchi tꞌãride mia chitoonɨ, kꞌachiade baaidapꞌedaa perã.

Timoteo, oonáaji mãɨrãpa oopatakꞌa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ jɨrɨtꞌerada perã ichi–itꞌee. Jĩpꞌa óoji Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa, irude wãara ijãa bairã. Chóoji Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida kꞌawa bɨde mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri pia ma wãarata jaratéeji ãramaa. Ãra kꞌinia iru báji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra kꞌinia iru bɨkꞌa.

Ara chõoparipa jɨrɨparikꞌa pꞌoyaaitꞌee, mãga pɨkꞌa jɨrɨ́ji pipɨara ijãapariitꞌee Cristode mãikꞌaapa oopariitꞌee irua oopi bɨkꞌa, ijãapari perã mãga oopꞌeda ichita bapariitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre truade. Ma–itꞌeeta Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ jɨrɨji, eperãarã chokꞌara nɨ̃bɨ taide waawee–ee jarakꞌãri pɨ Cristode ijãa bɨ.
Ɨ̃rá mɨa na ũraa jaraitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Irua ne–inaa jõmaweda chokꞌai bapipari. Ichiaba nãga jaraitꞌee Jesucristo kꞌĩrapite. Irua Poncio Pilatomaa waawee–ee pedeeji.

Nejõmaata óoji mɨa pɨmaa jaradakꞌa. Mãga oo bɨ misa, parã ijãapataarã tꞌãide tꞌĩupináaji kꞌĩsia awara wa jarateeru awara apida. Chóoji mãga oo nɨ̃bɨde Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo waya cheru misa na eujãdee. Mãgá apidaapa pɨ ɨtrɨada–e pai.

Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨapa iru pëi kꞌinia bakꞌãri, cheitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõre aupai tꞌãri piara bɨ mãikꞌaapa jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ; jõmaweda reyrã kꞌãyaara mãikꞌaapa jõmaweda na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã poro waibɨarã kꞌãyaara.

Iru aupai ichita bapari. Apida iru kꞌaitꞌa wãda–e pai, iru kꞌĩra wãree ɨ̃daa chooda–e pai perã. Mapa apidaapa iru unuda–e pai. ¡Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree! Jõmaweda iru jua ekꞌari ichita pꞌanadaitꞌee. ¡Amén!

Jaráji pꞌaratꞌara beerãmaa na pꞌekꞌau eujãde mãgá pꞌaratꞌara pꞌanɨ misa, kꞌĩsianaadamerã ãchi pipɨara pꞌanɨ awaraarã kꞌãyaara. Ichiaba jaráji ijãadai kꞌãyaara ãchi ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo jõparide, ijãadamerã Tachi Akꞌõrede, iru jõkꞌaa perã. ¡Iru tꞌãri pia bapari perã tachi ome, teepari jõma tachia iru pꞌanɨ o–ĩa pꞌanadamerã!
Maperã jaráji ãramaa tꞌãri pia teedamerã awaraarãmaa mãikꞌaapa tꞌãripa ne–inaa pia oodamerã awaraarã kꞌaripaitꞌee.
Mãga ooruta pɨrã, tꞌẽepai ne–inaa pipɨara iru pꞌanadaitꞌee pꞌaratꞌa kꞌãyaara. ¡Ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre ome mãikꞌaapa iru pꞌanadaitꞌee jõmaweda irua kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ichideerã–itꞌee!
Timoteo, jɨ̃́aji Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata pɨmaa jara pëida. Ũrináaji jã pariatua pedee wãpataarã, ãchi kꞌĩsiadeepa seewa jarateepata perã. “Kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanɨda” a pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda mãga pꞌanɨ–e.
Kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanadai kꞌãyaara, Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëidade ijãa amaa pꞌanɨ, awaraa kꞌĩsiade ijãa kꞌinia pꞌanadairã.
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã mãikꞌaapa nejõmaade kꞌaripamerã.
Mãgapai paji.

Mɨ, Pablopa na kꞌartꞌa pꞌã pëiru Timoteomaa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bada perã, mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji Jesucristopa pëimerã ichi ũraa jarateede. Ma pedee jaratee bɨ kꞌaurepa eperãarã Cristode ijãapata mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa wãpata.
Timoteo, mɨa pɨ kꞌinia iru bɨ mɨchi warrakꞌa. Ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãikꞌaapa Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa pɨ pia akꞌɨ pꞌanadamerã mãikꞌaapa chupɨria kꞌawaadamerã. Mãgá pɨ kꞌãiwee bapariitꞌee.

Mɨchi chonaarã judiorãpa oopatapꞌedaakꞌa, kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa mɨa oo bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mapa ichita pɨ kꞌirãpapari ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃kꞌãri; ãstaawa, pꞌãrikꞌua pida mãikꞌaapa ichita gracias jarapari Tachi Akꞌõremaa pɨ pari.
Kꞌirãpa bɨ pɨ jẽe nɨ̃bada mɨ uchiakꞌãri pɨ ikꞌaawaapa. Mapa pɨ waya unu kꞌinia bɨ. Unuruta pɨrã, mɨ wãara o–ĩa baitꞌee.
Ichiaba mɨa kꞌirãpa bɨ pɨ Jesucristode ijãakꞌãri, tꞌãripa ijãaji pɨ awela Loida mãikꞌaapa pɨ nawe Eunice ijãapatapꞌedaakꞌa. Kꞌawa bɨ ɨ̃rá pɨ aukꞌa wãara ijãa bɨ ãrakꞌa.

Mapa kꞌirãpapi kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa pɨmaa oopida, mɨ jua pɨ ɨ̃rɨ bɨkꞌãri. Irua ichita mãga oopi kꞌinia bɨ pɨmaa. Mapa tꞌãripa óoji irua oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãgá ijãapataarã pɨ jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨ pipɨara kꞌaripaitꞌee.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Jaure ba chepi–e paji tachi ijãapataarãmaa waawee–idaa pꞌanadamerã. Ma kꞌãyaara ichi Jaure pëiji mãgɨ́ juapa tachia choodamerã irude ijãa pꞌanɨde; awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanadamerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌawaadamerã ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo amaadaitꞌee.

Maperã kꞌĩra nejasianáaji jarateeitꞌee Tachi Waibɨapa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Ichiaba kꞌĩra nejasianáaji mɨ pɨ kꞌõpꞌãyo perã, mɨ carcelde nɨ̃bɨ mĩda Cristo kꞌaurepa. Ma kꞌãyaara, chóoji Cristode ijãa bɨde, awaraarãpa pɨ ichiaba miapiruta pɨjida ma ijãa bɨ kꞌaurepa. ¡Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ kꞌaripaitꞌeepɨ!

Ichiata tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji mãikꞌaapa tachi jɨrɨji ichideerã papiitꞌee. Tachi mãgá kꞌaripa–e paji ne–inaa pia oopata perã. Jĩpꞌa mãga ooji na eujã ooi naaweda, ichia kꞌĩsia iru bada perã tachi pia ooitꞌee Jesucristo kꞌaurepa.

Mãgɨ́ kꞌĩsia iru bada kꞌawapiji, Tachi Kꞌaripapari Jesucristo pëikꞌãri na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee. Iru chokꞌai pꞌirabaikꞌãri, akꞌɨpiji tachi jida mãga oodai, irude ijãaruta pɨrã. Ma awara irua jarateeda kꞌaurepa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa, irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa pꞌanadai mãikꞌaapa aɨ tꞌẽepai, ɨtꞌari ichita pꞌanadaitꞌee iru ome.
Ma jara pëidata jarateemerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji mãikꞌaapa Jesucristopa mɨ pëiji.

Ma kꞌaurepata mɨ mia nɨ̃bɨ nama carcelde. Mamĩda mɨ kꞌĩra nejasia–e, kꞌawa bairã kꞌaideta ijãa bɨ. Mãgɨ́ Jesucristo. Irua ne–inaa jõmaweda oopari. Mapa mɨa kꞌawa bɨ irua jarateepida mɨmaa jɨ̃aitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate paru misa.
Ma jarateepidata pɨmaa jaraji. Kꞌirãpáji wãara perã. Ichiaba awaraarãmaa ma jĩakꞌa jaratéeji. Mãga ooru misa, chóoji Jesucristode ijãa bɨde mãikꞌaapa awaraarã kꞌinia iru báji iru kꞌapꞌɨa pari.
Jɨ̃́aji Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata pɨmaa jara pëida. Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure, tachi ome baparipa pɨ kꞌaripaitꞌee.
Pɨa kꞌawa bɨ perá jõma Asiadepema ijãapataarãpa mɨ yiaraa iru pꞌanɨ; Figelo, Hermógenes paara.

Onesiforopa aupaita mãga oo–e paji. Atꞌapai mɨ kꞌaripa cheji. Mɨ carcelde nɨ̃bɨ mĩda, kꞌĩra nejasia–ee baji mɨ kꞌaripa cheitꞌee. Mapa mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Onesiforodeerã chupɨria kꞌawaamerã.
Kꞌĩra nejasia bai kꞌãyaara, Onesíforo Romade pachekꞌãri, ɨ̃i–ee mɨ jɨrɨ cheji unu atarumaa.

Irua mɨ chupɨria kꞌawaadakꞌa, mɨa iidi bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru aukꞌa chupɨria kꞌawaamerã iru ewari waibɨa ewate pakꞌãri. Pɨa pia kꞌawa bɨ jõmaweda Onesiforopa ooda ichiaba mɨ kꞌaripaitꞌee, Éfeso pꞌuurude bakꞌãri.
Timoteo, pɨ mɨchi warrakꞌa bɨ. Jesucristopa ichideerã kꞌaripapari perã, waapɨara óoji irua oopi bɨkꞌa.
Mɨa iru ũraa jaratee bakꞌãri ijãapataarã chokꞌara nɨ̃bɨ taide, pɨa pida ũri baji. Aukꞌa jaratéeji kꞌĩra jĩpꞌaarãmaa; chi jaratee kꞌawaa pꞌanɨɨrã awaraarãmaa.
Mɨ awaraa ijãapataarã ome mia jõnɨ Jesucristopa oopi bɨkꞌa oopata perã. Waaweenáaji aukꞌa mia nɨ̃baitꞌee.
Ooipia bɨ soldaopa ooparikꞌa. Soldao tꞌĩu–e eperãarã jĩpꞌaarãpa ne–inaa oopatade. Jĩpꞌa oopari ichi poro waibɨapa jara bɨkꞌa.
Ichiaba deporte jemeneparipa ooparikꞌa ooipia bɨ. Mãgɨpa oopari ma jemene pia kꞌawaa beerãpa jarapatakꞌa, ata kꞌinia bairã ne–inaa teepata chi pꞌoyaarutaarãmaa.
Ichiaba ooipia bɨ ne–uuparipa ooparikꞌa. Mãgɨ́ ichi ne–uude sẽ–ee mimiapari naapɨara ata kꞌinia bairã made chauru.
Kꞌĩsíaji mɨa etꞌewa jaradade. Tachi Waibɨapa kꞌawapiitꞌee ma jõmaweda kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨ pɨ–itꞌee.
Kꞌirãpáji Jesucristo chonaarãwedapema Rey Daviddeepa uchiada paji. Cristota piupꞌeda, chokꞌai pꞌirabaiji. Mɨa mãga jarateepari jõmaarãmaa jarateekꞌãri irua oodata eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee.

Maperãpɨ kꞌachia ooyaa beerã carcelde tꞌɨ nɨ̃bɨpatakꞌa, mɨ nama carcelde tꞌɨ nɨ̃bɨjida, mia nɨ̃bapariimerã. Mamĩda, mɨ cadenapa jɨ̃ iru pꞌanɨ mĩda, pꞌoyaa jarateepida–e paitꞌee awaraarãpa jarateedamerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa pedee pia jara pëida Cristode.

Maperãpɨ mɨa ne–inaa jõma choopari, mia nɨ̃bɨ mĩda. Mãgá choopari eperãarã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jɨrɨtꞌerada Jesucristode ijãadamerã, o kꞌachiadeepa uchiadamerã mãikꞌaapa ichita pꞌanapataadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree eujãde.
Na pedee jõmaarãpa ijãadaipia bɨ, wãara perã:

Tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa piu pɨkꞌaji Cristo ome, iru ome araa pꞌanadairã. Maperã jai–idaadakꞌãri, aukꞌa chokꞌai pꞌirabaidaitꞌee iru pꞌirabaidakꞌa mãikꞌaapa iru ome ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Tachi chooruta pɨrã irude ijãa pꞌanɨde, Akꞌõre truade iru ikꞌaawa pꞌanadaitꞌee ne–inaa jõmaweda akꞌɨmaa. Mamĩda iru meraruta pɨrã, irua aukꞌa tachi meraitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Tachia jara pꞌanɨkꞌa ooda–e pꞌanɨ pɨjida, irua jara bɨkꞌa ichita ooitꞌeepɨ, ichita mãga oopari perã.

Mɨa jara bɨ kꞌirãpapíji ijãapataarãmaa. Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite ũráaji aupedeenaadamerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida pedee jara kꞌinia bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa. Mãga oodakꞌãri, apemaarã maarepida kꞌaripada–e pꞌanɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara ijãa amaapi pꞌanɨ ãchia jara pꞌanɨ ũrirutaarãmaa.
Pɨa, jõdee, jõmaweda tꞌãripa óoji, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ akꞌɨmerã mimiapari piakꞌa. Mãga ooru pɨrã, kꞌĩra nejasia–e paitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, irua wãarata jara pëida pia jarateepari perã.
Mamĩda ãyaa béeji pariatua pedee wãpataarã ikꞌaawaapa. Ãchia Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa jaradakꞌaa. Mãgá pariatua pedee pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa audupɨara kꞌachiade baairuta.
Aida kꞌayaa waibɨara wariparikꞌa tachi chiara mikꞌiapiitꞌee, mãga pɨkꞌa ãchia jarateepata wari pɨkꞌadaipari ijãapataarã chokꞌaraara ijãa amaapiitꞌee. Mãgá jaratee pꞌanɨ Himeneopa mãikꞌaapa Filetopa.

Ãchia Tachi Akꞌõre wãarata jarateeda–e pꞌanɨ, jara pꞌanadairã tachi Cristode ijãapataarã ɨ̃rá ichita chokꞌai pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Maperã piudakꞌãri, chokꞌai pꞌirabaida–e paitꞌeeda apata kꞌapꞌɨa chiwidide Cristopa oodakꞌa. Ma seewa jarateepata kꞌaurepa ijãapataarã ũkꞌuru ijãa amaadaruta.

Mamĩda wãara Cristode ijãapataarãpa mãga ooda–e paitꞌee. Ãchia choodaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida ijãa pꞌanɨde. Irua jõmaarãmaa kꞌawaapipari ichi ijãapataarã chipari ichi ũraa pꞌãdade. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ma pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Akꞌõre Waibɨapa ichideerã kꞌawa bɨ.’
Awara ãi ichiaba jara bɨ:
‘Jõmaweda jara pꞌanɨɨrãpa: “Cristo Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨa” ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo amaadaipia bɨ.’

Kꞌĩsiadáma nãgɨde. Pꞌaratꞌara bɨ te choma bɨde paraa pꞌaratꞌu kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo, ũkꞌuru nẽedee ooda maa–e pɨrã pꞌaratꞌadee ooda. Ma te chiparipa mãgee jɨrɨtꞌerapari ichi–itꞌee mãikꞌaapa chi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã–itꞌee nekꞌodaitꞌee pakꞌãri. Jõdee pꞌaratꞌu pakꞌurudee ooda maa–e pɨrã yoorodee ooda iru bɨ ichi ekꞌariirã–itꞌee.

Mãga bɨ ichiaba tachi ijãapataarã ome. Apidaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo amaaruta pɨrã ooitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa, iru, tachi ijãapataarã chiparipa, ma ijãapari jɨrɨtꞌerapari oomerã ne–inaa pia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo.

Maperã oonáaji ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌũtrãarãpa oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨkꞌa. Ma kꞌãyaara jɨrɨ́ji ne–inaa jõma ooitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Tꞌãri jĩpꞌa nipaparíiji Cristode ijãapari perã. Awaraarã kꞌinia iru báji mãikꞌaapa kꞌãiwee baparíiji jõmaarã ome. Mãga ooru pɨrã, ooitꞌee jõma Cristomaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataarãpa oopatakꞌa, wãara tꞌãripa irude ijãapata perã.
Aupedeenáaji kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerã ome, pariatua pedee wãpata perã. Pɨa kꞌawa bɨ mãga ooru pɨrã, nepɨra jɨrɨdai pɨ ome.

Tachi Waibɨa mimiapari nepɨrade baaikꞌaraa bɨ awaraarã ome. Ma kꞌãyaara tꞌãri pia baipia bɨ jõmaarã ome; awaraarã jaratee kꞌawaaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa chooipia bɨ, kꞌĩrau–ee, awaraarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooruta pɨjida.

Tꞌãri pia ũraaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre wãarata jarateeda–ee pꞌanɨɨrã. Jaraipia bɨ ãchia pia jarateeda–e pꞌanɨ. Pɨ ũraa ũriruta pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi kꞌaripai ma kꞌachia oo amaadamerã mãikꞌaapa irua jara pëida wãara kꞌawaadamerã.
Mãgapɨ uchiadai Netuara Poro Waibɨa juadeepa. Ichia ãra atapꞌeda, trampade bɨji oodamerã ichia oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra uchiapii mãgɨ́ juadeepa, wãara oodamerã ichia oopi bɨkꞌa.
Timoteo, Tachi Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate pai naaweda, eperãarã audupɨara kꞌachiade baaidaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa nepɨra jɨrɨdaitꞌee ijãapataarã ome.

Nãga pꞌanadaitꞌee: ãchi–itꞌee aupai ooyaa; pꞌaratꞌa ata kꞌiniayaa ãchi–itꞌee; auduayaa; ikꞌachia pedeeyaa; tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa; ãchi akꞌõreerã pedee ũriamaa; gracias jaradakꞌaa apidaamaa; oodakꞌaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa;
ãchideerã paara chupɨria kꞌawadakꞌaa; kꞌĩra jõ–ee awaraarã ome; chĩara ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jarayaa; pariatua ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa; chĩara kꞌĩra unuamaa; ne–inaa pia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo ooamaa;

ãchi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã paara traicionaapata; kꞌĩsiadakꞌaa ne–inaa ooi naaweda; auduayaa, pedee–idaa nipapata; ãchia oo kꞌiniata ooi awaa pꞌanɨ ne–inaa oodai kꞌãyaara Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, iru kꞌinia iru pꞌanadairã.
Mãgeerã chipꞌedaipata Cristode ijãapataarã ome ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃de. Mamĩda seewata mãga oo pꞌanɨ, oo kꞌiniadakꞌaa perã Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. ¡Ãyaa béeji mãgeerã ikꞌaawaapa!

Ɨ̃raweda mãgeerã jĩakꞌa imeraa jara pꞌanɨpa eperãarã tede tꞌĩupata. Maapꞌeda iwarraa pedee pꞌanɨpa kꞌũrapata wẽraarã pia kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee beerã. Ma wẽraarã kꞌĩsia pꞌua pꞌanapata ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa. Mamĩda kꞌachia oo amaadakꞌaa. Ma kꞌãyaara oopata ãchia oo kꞌiniata, ne–inaa kꞌachia bɨ mĩda.

Ma wẽraarã mãga pꞌanadairã, ũri kꞌinia pꞌanɨ ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo eperãarãpa jaratee pꞌanɨ. Kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ mãga ũridakꞌãri, kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa padaridai. Mamĩda ma kꞌãyaara, audupɨara kꞌawada–ee pꞌanapata Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida.

Mãgee jarateepataarãpa kꞌĩsiapata chonaarãwedapema petau tau kꞌawaa beerã, Janes, Jambrés ome kꞌĩsiadapꞌedaakꞌa. Moisepa oo bakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopidakꞌa Egiptode, mãɨrãpa irua jarada ũridaamaa pꞌanajida. Mãga pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ mãgee ɨ̃rapema jarateepataarã. Ãchia ũridaamaa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida jarateepataarã pedee. Jĩpꞌa kꞌĩsia kꞌawada–ee pꞌanɨ, wãara kꞌawa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida, mãga jaratee pꞌanɨda a pꞌanɨ mĩda.

Mamĩda ichita mãgá jarada–e paitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jõmaarãmaa kꞌawapiitꞌee perã ãchi kꞌĩsia atua pꞌanɨ. Tachia mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ chonaarãweda Akꞌõrepa mãga ooda perã mãgɨ́ omeerã ome, pꞌoyaada–e pꞌanadakꞌãri Moisés ome.

Jõdee pɨata kꞌawa kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida. Mapa mimia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee mɨ mimiaparikꞌa. Mɨ bapata unudoo. Kꞌawa bɨ mɨa jaratee bɨ mãikꞌaapa mɨa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ooitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Kꞌawa bɨ mɨa wãara ijãapari Tachi Waibɨa Cristode mãikꞌaapa mɨa choopari mãgá ijãa bɨde, awaraarãpa nepɨra jɨrɨ pꞌanɨ mĩda mɨ ome. Kꞌawa bɨ mɨa awaraarã kꞌinia iru bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra kꞌinia iru bɨkꞌa. Maperãpɨ chooi.

Ichiaba pɨa kꞌawa bɨ mɨ jɨrɨdapꞌedaa mãikꞌaapa miapidapꞌedaa Cristopa ooda jaratee bɨ kꞌaurepa. Mãga oojida mɨ nipakꞌãri Antioquía pꞌuurude, Iconio pꞌuurude mãikꞌaapa Listra pꞌuurude. Mãgá mia nɨ̃baji mĩda, choopachi mãikꞌaapa Tachi Waibɨapa mɨ kꞌaripa ataji ma nepɨra jõmaadeepa.
Wãara, Jesucristodeerãpa oo kꞌinia pꞌanadakꞌãri irua oopi bɨkꞌa, ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa ãra ichita jɨrɨdaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa miapidaitꞌee.
Mãgɨ́ ijãadakꞌaa beerã mãikꞌaapa awaraa seewata: “taita Akꞌõre Waibɨapa pëida” a pꞌanɨɨrã, kꞌachiade baaidaitꞌee. Maapꞌeda audupɨara mãga baaidaitꞌee, ãchi kꞌũrapatakꞌa awaraarã kꞌũrapata perã.
Pɨ, jõdee, kꞌirãpáji pɨmaa jarateeda mãikꞌaapa aɨde ijã́aji naaweda ijãa badakꞌa. Pɨa kꞌawa bɨ ma jarateeda Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida. Ichiaba kꞌawa bɨ kꞌairã itꞌaidepata ma jarateeda ũriji.
Warra weda pɨa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãda ũripari mãikꞌaapa kꞌawa bɨ aɨde jara bɨ. Ma ũraa kꞌaurepata kꞌawa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ata kꞌinia bɨ, Jesucristode ijãadakꞌãri.

Tachi Akꞌõrépata ichi ũraa jõmaweda pꞌãpiji ichideerãmaa ichi Jaure kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Maperã kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ma ũraa pꞌãda pia bɨ nãgee ne–inaa–itꞌee: jarateeitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida; eperãarãmaa kꞌawapiitꞌee ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata; kꞌaripaitꞌee eperãarã ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo amaadamerã; kꞌawapiitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨ eperãarãmaa, mãga oodamerã mãikꞌaapa pia pꞌanapataadamerã iru kꞌĩrapite.
Mãgee jõma kꞌawaakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia bakꞌãri, eperã wãara mimiaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee mãikꞌaapa ooitꞌee ne–inaa pia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo awaraarã kꞌaripaitꞌee.

Jesucristo Tachi Rey Waibɨa. Iru cheitꞌee ichideerã atade. Cheitꞌee eperãarãpa oopatapꞌedaa akꞌɨde, jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Mãga ooitꞌee piudapꞌedaarã ome mãikꞌaapa ma ewate chokꞌai pꞌanɨɨrã ome. Ichi kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mɨa jara bɨ:

Jaratéeji Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida Jesucristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Mãga óoji pɨa jaratee bɨ ũri kꞌinia pꞌanadakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa ũri kꞌiniada–ee pꞌanɨ pɨjida. Eperãarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodakꞌãri, mãga kꞌawaapíji ãchimaa. Ichiaba ũráaji ma kꞌachia oo amaadamerã mãikꞌaapa oodamerã Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Ichita jaratéeji tꞌãri pia, kꞌĩrau–ee.

Ewari cherude eperãarãpa ũraa pia jõmaweda ũridaamaa pꞌanadaitꞌee. Ma kꞌãyaara jɨrɨdaitꞌee ãchia ũri kꞌiniata jaratee pꞌanɨ. Mãgá kꞌawaadaitꞌee eperãarãpa jaratee pꞌanɨ kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo. Mamĩda ãchia oo kꞌiniata oodaitꞌee.
Wãarata ũri kꞌinia pꞌanadai kꞌãyaara, chonaarãwedapema cuento nepɨrɨpatapꞌedaata ũri kꞌinia pꞌanadaitꞌee.

Pɨ, jõdee, ichita kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa báji. Waaweenáaji mia nɨ̃baitꞌee Cristo kꞌaurepa. Pɨchi wãrumaa jaratéeji Cristopa ooda eperãarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataitꞌee. Jõma óoji Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa ichi mimiapataarãmaa.

Mɨa mãga jara bɨ taarã–e nɨde mɨ wẽ–e paitꞌee perã. Ara vino jõdaiparikꞌa altarde weedakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee primisiakꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ jõitꞌee. Ara barco uchiaparikꞌa to ideepa jɨ̃kꞌara ẽratꞌaadakꞌãri, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ uchiaitꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujãdeepa.

Mamĩda mɨa kꞌĩsia–e, nama bakꞌãri, pia oopachi perã pꞌiraparipa ooparikꞌa jĩpꞌa pꞌirakꞌãri tauchaa bɨdapꞌedaamaa, awaraarã pꞌoyaa kꞌiniapa. Jĩpꞌa oopachi Cristopa mɨmaa oopi bɨkꞌa. Ma awara pꞌirapari naapɨara panarupa pꞌoyaaparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨa pꞌoyaaru, ooji perã jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bada mɨa oomerã ichi–itꞌee.

Ɨ̃rá pꞌirapari naapɨara panarupa poro jɨ̃ra ataparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨa ataitꞌee Tachi Waibɨapa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ mɨmaa teeitꞌee. Iru tachi akꞌɨpari pipɨara bairã, ne–inaa pia teeitꞌee irua oopi bɨkꞌa oodapꞌedaarãmaa. Mãga ooitꞌee Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate. Mɨmaa aupai ma ne–inaa pia tee–e paitꞌee. Jĩpꞌa mãga teeitꞌee jõmaweda iru cheru nɨmaa pꞌanɨɨrãmaa, iru kꞌinia iru pꞌanapata perã.
Taarã–ee chéji mɨmaa.
Demapa mɨ atabaibëiji wãitꞌee Tesalónica pꞌuurudee, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ne–inaa audú kꞌinia bairã. Ma awara Crescente wãji Galacia eujãdee mãikꞌaapa Tito wãji Dalmacia eujãdee.
Lucas aupai nama bɨ mɨ ome. Pɨ chekꞌãri, Marcos atanáji pɨ ome chemerã. Irua mɨ kꞌaripai nama mimia bɨ misa Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee.
Mɨa Tíquico pëiji Éfeso pꞌuurudee.
Pɨ chekꞌãri, anéeji mɨ ɨ̃rɨpema pꞌaru jɨ̃pari. Mɨa mãgɨ́ atabëiji Carpo tede Troas pꞌuurude nipakꞌãri. Ichiaba anéeji mɨ libro jõmaweda, chi ne–animal ede pꞌãda paara.
Alejandro, chi ne–inaa metaldee oopari, mɨmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooji. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga kꞌawa bɨ mãikꞌaapa ichiata kꞌawa bɨ sãga ooi iru ome, ma kꞌachia ooda pari.
Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai jãgɨ́ eperã ome. Jãgɨpa apidaamaa ũripiamaa bɨ tachia jarateepata pedee.

Naapɨara mɨ ateedakꞌãri Romadepema poro waibɨarã kꞌĩrapite pꞌanaumerã mɨ ɨmɨateedapꞌedaa, eperã apidaapa mɨ kꞌõpꞌãyada–e paji kꞌaripadaitꞌee. Jõma mɨ kꞌõpꞌãyoorã nama pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa mɨ ituaba atabaibëijida. Taawa Tachi Akꞌõrepa miapi–e pai, ãchia oodapꞌedaa pari.

Ãchia mɨ mãgá atabëijida mĩda, Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa mɨ kꞌaripa baji. Mɨmaa jarapiji jõmaweda ichia ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee, arii pꞌanadapꞌedaa ijãadakꞌaa beerã jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida pia kꞌawaadamerã. Mãgá ma ewate Akꞌõrepa mɨ chokꞌai uchiapiji ãchi juadeepa. León itꞌaideepa eperã chokꞌai uchiakꞌajikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ uchiaji.
Wãara, Tachi Waibɨapa mɨ uchiapiitꞌee jõmaweda kꞌachia beerã juadeepa mãikꞌaapa mɨ jaure jɨ̃aitꞌee, iru truadee wãru misa. ¡Jesucristo, chi Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree unupipari, ichita bapari! ¡Amén!
Mɨa salude pëiru Priscilamaa Áquila ome. Ichiaba Onesiforodeerãmaa salude pëiru.
Mɨ nama che wãde awaraa kꞌõpꞌãyoorã ome, Erasto beeji Corinto pꞌuurude. Jõdee mɨa Trófimo bëiji Mileto pꞌuurude, iru kꞌayaa bada perã.
Kꞌinia bɨ pɨ chemerã, pꞌusa tꞌojara pai naaweda.
Ichiaba salude pëiruta Eubulo, Pudente, Lino, Claudia, jõmaweda tachi ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa ome.
Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa pɨ kꞌaripamerã mãikꞌaapa parã jõmaweda pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã.
Mãgapai paji.

Mɨ, Pablo mimiapari Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Jesucristopa mɨ pëiji ichi ũraa jarateede, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã irude ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa iru wãarata jara pëida kꞌawaadapꞌeda, chokꞌekꞌee pꞌanadamerã.
Ma awara ichideerãpa kꞌawaadaitꞌee piudakꞌãri, ichita ɨtꞌari pꞌananadaitꞌee ichideerã perã. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga jaraji na pꞌekꞌau eujã bai naaweda. Wãarapɨ; seewa jarakꞌaa.
Tachi Akꞌõreta Tachi Kꞌaripapari. Irua kꞌinia bakꞌãri, ma ũraa kꞌawapiji eperãarãmaa. Ichiaba mɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji mãgɨ́ jarateenamerã.

Tito, na kꞌartꞌa pɨmaa pꞌãru. Pɨ kꞌinia iru bɨ mɨchi warrakꞌa, Cristode wãara ijãapari perã mɨkꞌa. Ɨtꞌaa iidipari Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãikꞌaapa Tachi Kꞌaripapari Jesucristopa pɨ pia akꞌɨ pꞌanadamerã. Mãgá pɨ kꞌãiwee bapariitꞌee.
Pɨ Creta islade atabëiji, ne–inaa mɨa jõma oo–e pada oomerã. Mɨa naaweda jaradakꞌa, jɨrɨtꞌeraipia bɨ ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã pꞌuuru bee chaa ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataadamerã.

Ijãapataarã akꞌɨpari tꞌãri pia baipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Ichiaba kꞌachia wẽe baipia bɨ eperãarã kꞌĩrapite. Wẽra abapai iru baipia bɨ. Chi warrarã Cristode chokꞌekꞌee ijãadaipia bɨ. Ichiaba tꞌãri pia pꞌanadaipia bɨ, awaraarãpa jaranaadamerã ãra kꞌachia–idaa pꞌanɨ, maa–e pɨrã kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua pꞌanɨ.

Ichia Tachi Akꞌõredeerã akꞌɨpariitꞌee. Maperã jɨrɨtꞌeraipia bɨ eperã kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa, kꞌachia wẽe apemaarã kꞌĩrapite. Kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua baikꞌaraa bɨ; kꞌĩrauyaa; toyaa; chõoyaa; chĩara kꞌũrayaa pꞌaratꞌa jitaitꞌee.

Ma kꞌãyaara awaraarã auteebaipia bɨ, ichi temaa chedakꞌãri. Ichiaba ne–inaa pia o–ĩa ooipia bɨ; kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa baipia bɨ ne–inaa ooitꞌee; tꞌãri pia awaraarã ome; pia bapari Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite; pia kꞌĩsiapari ne–inaa ooi naaweda.

Ichita Akꞌõre Ũraade ijãaipia bɨ tachia jarateedapꞌedaakꞌa, ma ũraa wãara perã. Ma ũraa kꞌãyaara Tachi Akꞌõrepa ũraa awara bɨkꞌaa. Mãga ijãakꞌãri, kꞌaripaitꞌee ijãapataarãpa oodamerã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa chiwidi kꞌawa beerãpa jarateedapꞌedaakꞌa. Ma awara ma ũraa ũridaamaa beerãmaa kꞌawapii ãrapa kꞌachia oopata.

Mɨa mãga jara bɨ, mãgee ũridaamaa pꞌanɨɨrã chokꞌara paraa perã parã tꞌãide. Seewa ãchi kꞌĩsiadeepa pariatua jarateepata mãikꞌaapa eperãarã kꞌũrapata. Mãgɨɨrãpa jarateepata Cristo eere pꞌanɨɨrãpa atꞌãri oodaipia bɨ Moisés eere pꞌanɨɨrãpa oopatakꞌa; tauchaa bɨpidaipia bɨ ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã kꞌapꞌɨade.

Tito, mãɨrãmaa jarateepináaji. Ãchia jarateedaikꞌaraa bɨ, ma kꞌaurepa ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã, wẽraarã, ãchi warrarã paara kꞌũrapata perã. Mãgeerãpa kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe seewa jarateepata pꞌaratꞌa atadaitꞌee ãchi–itꞌee.
Chonaarãweda Creta isladepema kꞌĩsia kꞌawaapari, ãchi aukꞌaapa mãgaji:
“¡Creta pidaarã, seewa–idaa beerã, kꞌoo–idaa beerã, waibɨa nekꞌoyaa beerã! Parã jõmaweda tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa pꞌanapata ne–animalaarã kꞌachiarãkꞌa.”
Ma eperã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaaparipa jaradakꞌa, mãga pꞌanɨ ma seewa jarateepataarã. Maperã ãchi mãikꞌaapa chi seewa ũri kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrã paara ɨtrɨakꞌóoji jĩpꞌa ijãadamerã.
Mãgá waa ijãada–e paitꞌee chonaarãwedapema judiorãpa seewa nepɨrɨdapꞌedaa ãchi kꞌĩsiadoopa. Ichiaba waa ooda–e paitꞌee Jesucristo ũraa wãara ũridaamaa pꞌanɨɨrãpa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa.

Cristo kꞌaurepa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanadakꞌãri, ne–inaa jõmaweda pia bɨ tachi–itꞌee; chikꞌo kꞌodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa itꞌabarreepema netꞌaa. Jõdee jãgee pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã–itꞌee mãikꞌaapa Cristo ũraade ijãadakꞌaa beerã–itꞌee, maarepida ne–inaa pia wẽ–e. Ãchi–itꞌee jõmaweda kꞌachia bɨ. Ãchi kꞌĩsia paara kꞌachia bɨ, Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa kꞌĩsiadakꞌaa perã.

“Taipa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa pꞌanɨda” apata. Mamĩda seewata mãga jarapata. Tachia ãchia oopata unudakꞌãri, kꞌawapata ãchia tꞌãripa ijãadakꞌaa. Tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa pꞌanadairã, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrau bɨ ãchi ome. Oodakꞌaa irua oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mãgeerãpa ne–inaa pia apida pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa.
Pɨ jõdee, jarateeipia bɨ jĩpꞌa uchiamerã Jesucristo Ũraa Pia jara bɨkꞌa.

Ũráaji ijãapataarã chonaarãmaa: ne–inaa oodai naaweda pia kꞌĩsiadaipia bɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachiade baainaadamerã; kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌanadaipia bɨ apemaarã kꞌĩrapite, pia kꞌĩsiadamerã ãchide; ne–inaa pariatua oodaikꞌaraa bɨ; wãara Cristode ijãadaipia bɨ; awaraarã wãara kꞌinia iru pꞌanadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia iru bɨkꞌa; chupɨria jõnɨ jida, Cristode ijãadaipia bɨ.

Mãga pɨkꞌa chõtrãarãmaa ũráaji: Tachi Akꞌõre ome ewari chaa chokꞌekꞌee pꞌanadaipia bɨ; chĩara ãpɨte ikꞌachia pedeedaikꞌaraa bɨ; itꞌuapa piudaikꞌaraa bɨ. Ãchi mãgá pia pꞌanadaipia bɨ apemaarã wẽraarã ne–inaa pia oo kꞌawaa wãdamerã.
Mãgá ijãapataarã chõtrãarãpa awẽraarãmaa jarateedai ãchi kꞌima mãikꞌaapa ãchi warrarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanapataadamerã.

Ma awẽraarãpa ne–inaa pariatua oodaikꞌaraa bɨ; ãchi ɨmɨkꞌĩra kꞌãyaara awaraa ɨmɨkꞌĩra ome tꞌĩudaikꞌaraa bɨ; kꞌachia oodaitꞌee kꞌĩsiadaikꞌaraa bɨ; tꞌãri pia mimiadaipia bɨ ãchi te pidaarã akꞌɨdaitꞌee; ãchi ɨmɨkꞌĩra jua ekꞌari chokꞌekꞌee pꞌanadaipia bɨ. Mãgá pꞌanaruta pɨrã, ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa kꞌachia pedeeda–e paitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraade ãra kꞌaurepa.
Aukꞌa ũráaji kꞌũtrãarã chokꞌekꞌee pꞌanadamerã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa pariatua oonaadamerã.

Tito, pɨ ichiaba nejõmaade ichita ne–inaa pia ooipia bɨ. Mãgá ãramaa akꞌɨpiitꞌee sãga pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ. Ãramaa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateekꞌãri, kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa jarateeipia bɨ ãra pipɨara pꞌanapataadamerã mãikꞌaapa Jesucristo kꞌinia iru pꞌanadamerã. Jarateeikꞌaraa bɨ pɨ waibɨara paitꞌee ãra kꞌĩrapite.

Pɨa jarateeru ichita wãara baipia bɨ. Mãgá jarateeru pɨrã, apidaapa jarada–e pai pɨa pariatua jarateepari. Ma kꞌãyaara, pɨa jaratee bɨ ũridaamaa beerã kꞌĩra nejasia pꞌanadai kꞌawaadakꞌãri pɨa ichita oopari pɨa ũraa bɨkꞌa. Ne–inaa kꞌachia maarepida unuda–e pai tachi ãpɨte jaradaitꞌee.

Ũráaji esclavoorã ijãa pꞌanɨɨrãmaa: ãchi chipariirã jua ekꞌari chokꞌekꞌee pꞌaneedaipia bɨ; ne–inaa jõmaata tꞌãri pia oodaipia bɨ chipariirãpa oopi pꞌanɨkꞌa; pedee kꞌachia pꞌanaudaikꞌaraa bɨ mimiade chokꞌa pëidakꞌãri.

Chipariirã netꞌaa maarepida chɨadaikꞌaraa bɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara akꞌɨpidaipia bɨ ichita oodaitꞌee chipariirãpa kꞌinia pꞌanɨkꞌa, seewa jarada–ee. Mãgá ewari chaa chokꞌekꞌee pꞌanaruta pɨrã, chipariirã awaraarã ome Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pi–ia kꞌĩsiadai mãikꞌaapa iru ode tꞌĩu kꞌiniadai tachi ome, tokꞌarradee atuapiamaapa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa akꞌɨpiji eperãarã jõmaweda kꞌinia iru bɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌinia bɨ o kꞌachiade atuanaadamerã.

Tachia iru ũraade jara bɨkꞌa oodakꞌãri, oo amaadaitꞌee ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopata. Mãgá jĩpꞌa ijãadakꞌãri, pia kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa wãpata mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa oopata tachia oodaipia bɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Tachi mãga pꞌanapata pɨrã na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa, pia pꞌanapataadaitꞌee iru kꞌĩrapite, ichiaba awaraarã kꞌĩrapite.
Mãga pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨa waya cheru misa. Tachi Kꞌaripapari Jesucristo unu kꞌiniapa ewari chaa iru nɨpata. Iru kꞌĩra wãree unudakꞌãri, tꞌãri o–ĩa akꞌɨtrua para nɨ̃beeitꞌee.

Ichi ita–aria peepiji tachi pari. Mãgá tachi kꞌaripa ataji pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌariipa. Mãgá piukꞌãri, tachia kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa jõmaweda wẽpapiji ichideerã pꞌaneedamerã. Maperã tꞌãripa ichi–itꞌee ne–inaa pia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ.

Mãpai Tito, mãgee ũraa mɨa jarada pia jaratéeji Creta isladepema ijãapataarãmaa. Tꞌãri pia ũráaji, jõmaweda pɨa jara bɨkꞌa oodamerã. Ũri kꞌiniada–ee pꞌanɨ pɨrã, kꞌawapíji ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oo pꞌanɨ. Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji ãra akꞌɨpariimerã. Maperã mãgá pedeeipia bɨ. Pɨ yiaraa iru pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ.

Kꞌirãpapíji jãpema ijãapataarãmaa ãra ichiaba pꞌanapata Creta isladepema poro waibɨarã jua ekꞌari. Maperã oodaipia bɨ mãgɨ́ poroorãpa oopi pꞌanɨkꞌa. Ichita oo kꞌinia pꞌanadaipia bɨ ne–inaa pia awaraarã kꞌaripadaitꞌee.

Jaráji chĩara ãpɨte kꞌachia pedeenaadamerã mãikꞌaapa aupedeenaadamerã awaraarã ome. Ma kꞌãyaara tꞌãri pia pꞌanadaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa pedee pia pedeedaipia bɨ jõmaarã ome. ¡Mamĩda, audua pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ!

Naaweda tachia Cristo kꞌawada–e pꞌanadakꞌãri, kꞌachia pꞌanapachida. Oodaamaa pꞌanapachida Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëidakꞌa. Atua pꞌanajida, seewa jara pꞌanɨpa tachi itu kꞌũra pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Esclavoorãkꞌa pꞌanapachida, tachia oo kꞌiniata ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo nipapatapꞌedaa perã. Tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa pꞌanapachida. Awaraarã unuamaa iru pꞌanapachida, ne–inaa iru pꞌanadapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa. Chikꞌĩra unuamaa pꞌanapachida.

Mãgá pꞌanapachida mĩda, Tachi Akꞌõre, Tachi Kꞌaripaparipa ichi warra tachimaa pëiji, tachi chupɨria kꞌawaada perã. Peepiji tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌaneedamerã. Mãgá kꞌawaapiji ichia tachi kꞌinia iru bɨ.

Ichiata tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji atuanaadamerã. Mãga oo–e paji tachia ne–inaa tꞌãri pia oopata perã. ¡Mãga–e! Tachi kꞌaripaji tachi chupɨria kꞌawaada perã. Tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa wẽpapiji mãikꞌaapa ichi Jaure ba chepiji tachi kꞌapꞌɨade. Tachi piu pɨkꞌa pꞌanajida mĩda pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia kꞌaurepa, irua waya chokꞌai pꞌanapiji ichi Jaurepa. Mãga oopꞌeda, tachi pꞌaneepachida warra chai ewaa tꞌodakꞌa mãikꞌaapa paniade kꞌuipidakꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Jaure ba chepikꞌãri tachimaa, pania waibɨa pɨkꞌa weeji tachi kꞌapꞌɨa ɨ̃rɨ.

Ɨ̃rá Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarai: “Mɨ Warra piuda kꞌaurepa parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanɨ mɨ kꞌĩrapite.” Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga ooji tꞌãri pia bapari perã. Tachia ne–inaa pia pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa irua tachi chupɨria kꞌawaamerã. Ma awara eperã piuda netꞌaa ome beerukꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa tachi, Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã pꞌaneeruta Cristo kꞌaurepa. Mapa kꞌawapata piudakꞌãri, wãara ɨtꞌaa wãdaitꞌee.

Mɨa etꞌewa pꞌãda wãarapɨ. Maperã mãgɨ́ ũraa ipꞌii jarateeipia bɨ ijãapataarãmaa, mãga ũridakꞌãri, ne–inaa pia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo pꞌanadamerã. Mãga oodakꞌãri, eperãarã jõmaweda kꞌaripadaitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Mamĩda Tito, pariatua aupedeeyaa baikꞌaraa bɨ audua beerã ome ãchi chonaarãwedapema ëreerã kꞌapꞌɨa. Ichiaba tꞌĩukꞌaraa bɨ nepɨra jɨrɨ pꞌanɨɨrã ome, ãchi aupedeeyaa pꞌanadakꞌãri Moisepa pꞌãda jara kꞌinia bɨ kꞌapꞌɨa. Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai tꞌĩu mãgee ijaraapataarã ome. Mãgee ne–inaa ooruta pɨrã, maarepida kꞌaripada–e.

Eperãpa ijãapataarãmaa kꞌĩraupikꞌãri, tachi ijãapataarã awara–awaraadaipata. Mãgee eperã parã tꞌãide paraa pɨrã, kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa ũráaji mãgɨ́ kꞌachia oo amaamerã. Ũri kꞌinia–e bɨ pɨrã, waya ũráaji. Mãga ũraapꞌeda, atꞌãri ũriamaa bɨ pɨrã, ijãapataarã tꞌãide waa tꞌĩupináatɨ.
Mãgee eperãarã ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa pꞌanɨ, ijãa amaadaruta perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida. Jõmaarãpa kꞌawapata ãchi kꞌachia uchiadaitꞌee Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, ũridaamaa pꞌanapata perã.
Tito, mɨa Artemas maa–e pɨrã Tíquico pɨmaa pëiitꞌee. Jãma panakꞌãri, pꞌoyaa bɨ pɨrã, isapai wã́ji Nicópolis pꞌuurudee mɨ kꞌĩrachuude. Mɨ jãma banaitꞌee pꞌusa tꞌojara bɨ misa.
Abogado tꞌɨ̃jarapata Zenas, Apolo ome jãmãikꞌaapa uchiadakꞌãri, kꞌaripáji nejõmaade pia wãdamerã ãchi ode.

Mãgá tachi ɨ̃pemaarã jãma pꞌanɨɨrãpa ipꞌii pia oodaipia bɨ awaraarã kꞌaripadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa chupɨria chedeerã kꞌaripadaitꞌee chikꞌo, pꞌaru iru pꞌanadamerã. Mãga oodaipia bɨ pariatua pꞌanapataadai kꞌãyaara, apida kꞌaripada–ee.

Jõmaweda ijãapataarã nama mɨ ome pꞌanɨɨrãpa pɨmaa salude pëiruta. Taipa ichiaba salude tee pëiruta tai kꞌõpꞌãyoorã Cristo kꞌaurepa kꞌiniarãmaa. Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Akꞌõremaa irua parã jõma pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã.
Mãgapai paji.

Mɨ, Pablo carcelde bɨ mɨa oopari perã Jesucristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mɨ tachi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa Timoteo ome na kꞌartꞌa pꞌã pëiruta Filemonmaa. Filemón, pɨ kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨpɨ, aukꞌa Cristode ijãapari perã mãikꞌaapa aukꞌa iru–itꞌee mimiapari perã.

Ichiaba na kꞌartꞌa pꞌã pëiruta tachi ɨ̃pewẽra Apiamaa mãikꞌaapa tachi ɨ̃pema Arquipomaa. Ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa nepɨra jɨrɨ pꞌanɨ mĩda iru ome, taikꞌa iru choopari Cristode ijãa bairã mãikꞌaapa oomaa bairã Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Ichiaba pꞌã pëiruta jõmaweda ijãapataarã pɨ tede ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ chepataarãmaa.
Ɨtꞌaa iidipata Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãikꞌaapa Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa parã pia akꞌɨ pꞌanadamerã. Mãgá kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Filemón, mɨa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃kꞌãri pɨ pari, ichita gracias jarapari mɨ ɨtꞌaripema Akꞌõremaa.
Ũridoo pɨ wãara ijãapari Tachi Waibɨa Jesude mãikꞌaapa iru kꞌinia iru bapari. Ichiaba ũridoo pɨa jõma ijãapataarã kꞌinia iru bapari.
Pɨ mãgá chikꞌinia bapari perã tachi ijãapataarã ome, mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidipari Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨmaa kꞌawapimerã ne–inaa pia jõma tachi Cristodeerãpa oodai irua kꞌaripakꞌãri.
Mɨ ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa, mɨ o–ĩa bɨ pɨa awaraarã mãgá kꞌinia iru bapari perã. Mãga oo bɨpa pɨa mɨ tꞌãri mãikꞌaapa awaraa Cristodeerã tꞌãri o–ĩapipari.
Pɨ mãga bapari perã, mɨa ne–inaa iidi kꞌinia bɨ pɨa mɨ–itꞌee oomerã. Pɨa nãga ooipia bɨ, ne–inaa pia bairã. Ma awara Cristopa mɨ jɨrɨtꞌerada perã, mɨa waawee–ee na iidiru oopii pɨmaa.

Mamĩda kꞌawa bairã pɨa jõma ijãapataarã kꞌinia iru bapari, mɨa pɨmaa chupɨria iidiitꞌee. Taawa pɨa ũrii mɨa iidiru, mɨ chonaa bairã mãikꞌaapa na carcelde bairã Jesucristopa oopi bɨkꞌa oopari kꞌaurepa.
Kꞌinia bɨ pɨa auteebaimerã eperã nama bɨ mɨ ome. Iru mɨchi warrakꞌa bɨ, mɨ kꞌaurepa iru Cristode ijãada perã mɨ nama carcelde bɨ misa. Na eperã pɨ esclavo iru bada, Onésimo.
Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ naaweda irua pɨ kꞌaripa–e paji. Mamĩda ɨ̃rá mãga–e bɨ. Ɨ̃rá audú chokꞌekꞌee bapari mɨ ome. Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ aukꞌa baitꞌee pɨ ome.
Mɨa iru pɨmaa pëiru. Iru audupai kꞌinia iru bɨ. Mapa kꞌinia bɨ pɨa iru auteebaimerã mɨ auteebaikꞌajikꞌa.
Mɨa kꞌinia bakꞌaji iru mɨ ome beemerã, mɨ nama carcelde bɨ misa, Jesupa ooda jarateeda kꞌaurepa. Mãgá irua mɨ kꞌaripakꞌaji pɨ pari.
Mamĩda mãga oo–e paji, pɨa jara–e pada perã iru nama baipia bɨ mɨ ome. Mɨa kꞌinia–e pɨa iru auteebaimerã mɨa mãga oopiru perã. Pɨa mɨ mãgá kꞌaripa kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã, kꞌaripaipia bɨ pɨchi kꞌĩradoopa.
Kꞌĩsíaji nãgɨde. Onésimo makꞌɨara taarã–e baji pɨ ikꞌaawaapa uchiada. ¿Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru mãgá wãpiji–ekꞌã aji, Cristode ijãapꞌeda, ɨ̃rá pɨ ome ichita bapariimerã?

Ma awara ɨ̃rá iru auteebairu pɨrã, iru pipɨara bai esclavo kꞌãyaara. Pɨ ɨ̃pema pia baitꞌee aukꞌa Cristode ijãa bairã. Mɨa iru kꞌinia iru bɨ. Mamĩda pɨa iru audupɨara kꞌinia iru baipia bɨ, iru chokꞌekꞌee bairã mãikꞌaapa iru pɨ ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa perã.
Mãpai pɨa mɨ iru bɨ pɨrã pɨchi kꞌõpꞌãyo piakꞌa, Onésimo auteebáiji mɨ auteebaikꞌajikꞌa.
Irua pɨmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooji pɨrã maa–e pɨrã pɨ netꞌaa chɨaji pɨrã, jara pë́iji. Mɨa pꞌaaitꞌee.

Mɨ, Pablopa nãgɨ́ pꞌãru mɨchi juapa: mɨata pꞌaaitꞌee. Mamĩda mɨa pɨmaa nãga kꞌirãpapi kꞌinia bɨ. Onésimo pɨ ome tewe iru bai kꞌãyaara, pɨa tewe waibɨara iru bɨ mɨ ome, mɨ kꞌaurepa pɨa Cristode ijãada perã.
Maperã ɨ̃pema, ɨ̃rá mɨa kꞌinia bɨ pɨa jõdee mɨ kꞌaripamerã, Tachi Waibɨapa pɨmaa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Chupɨria kꞌawáaji mãikꞌaapa Onésimo auteebáiji. Mãgá pɨa mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩapiitꞌee.
Mɨa ijãa bɨ pɨa ooitꞌee mɨa iidi bɨkꞌa. Mapa na kꞌartꞌa pɨmaa pꞌãmaa bɨ. Wãara mɨa kꞌĩsia bɨ pɨa waapɨara ooitꞌee mɨa iidida kꞌãyaara.

Mãga oo bɨ misa, cuarto awara bɨ́ji mɨ–itꞌee, mɨ jãma panakꞌãri. Mɨa mãga jara bɨ ijãa bairã parã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ uchiapiitꞌee na carceldeepa mãikꞌaapa waya pëiitꞌee parãmaa.
Tachi kꞌõpꞌãyo Epafras ichiaba nama carcelde bɨ mɨ ome, Jesucristopa oopi bɨkꞌa oopari perã. Irua pɨmaa salude tee pëiru.
Marcos, Aristarco, Demas mãikꞌaapa Lucapa salude tee pëiruta. Ãra mɨ ome aukꞌa mimiapata Cristo–itꞌee.
Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa parã jõmaweda pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã.
Mãgapai paji.

Chonaarãweda Tachi Akꞌõre pedeepachi tachi chonaarãmaa ichi pedee jarapataarã itꞌaideepa. Mãgɨɨrãpa jarateepachida Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨ eperãarãmaa. Atꞌapai jarateepachida; ũraade mãikꞌaapa kꞌaride.

Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre Warra, Jesucristo chedakꞌãriipa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee, Tachi Akꞌõre pedeepari iru kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Ichi Warramaa ne–inaa jõmaweda ɨtꞌɨ́ nɨ̃bɨ mãikꞌaapa eujãde nɨ̃bɨ oopiji. Kꞌĩsia iru baji ma jõmaweda teeitꞌee chi Warramaa ichi–itꞌee iru bamerã.

Chi Warra chi akꞌõre jĩakꞌa bɨ. Iru bɨ jõma chi akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree. Iru pedeerupapai ne–inaa jõma iru juade nɨ̃bɨ. Piupꞌeda Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiitꞌee, ɨtꞌaa wãji mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre juaraare ɨtꞌari su–akꞌɨ banaji.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi angeleerãmaa “chokꞌapariirã” apari. Mamĩda chi warramaa “Warra” apari. Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ eperã warra chi mimiapari kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Mãgá ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõre Warra waibɨara bɨ ichi angeleerã kꞌãyaara.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa waide jara–e paji ichi angeleerã apidaamaa:
‘Mɨa idi jõmaarãmaa jara bɨ pɨ mɨ Warra.’
Ma awara ichi ángel apidaamaa jara–e paji:
‘Mɨ pɨ akꞌõre paitꞌee. Jõdee pɨ mɨ warra paitꞌee.’
Mamĩda chi Warra naapema jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã, iru na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee pëikꞌãri, jaraji ichi angeleerãmaa:
‘Bedabáitɨ mɨ Warra kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃́tɨ irumaa.’
Angeleerã nãga pꞌanɨda a bɨ ichi ũraa pꞌãdade:
‘Irua ichi angeleerã nãukꞌa papipari mãikꞌaapa wẽpapipari maa–e pɨrã tꞌɨpɨtaukꞌa uruapipari mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩipipari.’
Mamĩda nãga bɨda a bɨ chi Warra:
‘Tachi Akꞌõreda, a bɨ, pɨ ichita jõmaarã rey bapariitꞌee, na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõru pɨjida. Kꞌachia wẽe bapari perã, pɨa pia akꞌɨ bapari pɨ jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã.

Ne–inaa pia aupai oo kꞌinia bapachi. Pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooamaa bada perã, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bɨ. Maperã pɨ Akꞌõre, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ jɨrɨtꞌeraji waibɨara pamerã pɨ kꞌõpꞌãyoorã kꞌãyaara. Mãga ookꞌãri, pɨ o–ĩapiji.’
Tachi Akꞌõrepa chi Warramaa ichiaba mãgaji:
‘Eperãarã Akꞌɨpari Waibɨa, ewaa weda pɨata pɨchi juadoopa ooji na pꞌekꞌau eujã mãikꞌaapa pajã.
Ma jõmaweda pꞌaru sorekꞌa pakꞌoodaridaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa jõdaridaitꞌee. Mamĩda pɨ ichita bapariitꞌee, na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõru pɨjida.
Na eujã pari pɨa eujã mãikꞌaapa pajã chiwidi ooitꞌee. Mamĩda pɨ jõ–e; ichita bapari perã.’
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ángel apidaamaa jara–e paji:
‘Pɨ mɨ ome aukꞌa waibɨa bairã, mɨ juaraare su–akꞌɨ béeji, mɨa pɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã pꞌoyaaru misa.’
Mãga jara–e paji, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi angeleerã jõmaweda pëipari perã na eujãdee eperãarã kꞌaripade. Ãra eperã kꞌapꞌɨa wẽe pꞌanɨ mĩda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra pëipari ichimaa wãdaitꞌeerã kꞌaripadamerã.
Mãgá Cristo waibɨara bairã angeleerã kꞌãyaara, tachia pia kꞌawadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida iru kꞌapꞌɨa pari, Akꞌõre odeepa uchiada–e paitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarada Moisemaa ichi angeleerã itꞌaideepa wãara paji. Mapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ ũraa ũri kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaarã miapiji.

Mãgá miapiji pɨrã ichi ũraa ũri kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaarã naaweda, ¿sãgá tachi irumaa wãdaima, iru ũraa jara pëida Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari ũri kꞌiniada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã? Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristota naapɨara cheji jaraitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa ũraa chiwidi iru bɨ irude ijãapataarã–itꞌee. Tꞌẽepai ma ũraa ũridapꞌedaarãpa tachimaa jarateejida.
