Ma ũraa chiwidi jaratee pꞌanɨde Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãramaa oopipachi ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa ichia oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa ãramaa oopipachi.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesucristota jɨrɨtꞌeraji jaramerã ma ũraa chiwidi mɨa jaramaa bɨ na pꞌãdade. Maperã ma ũraade ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaarã bɨ–e paji ichi angeleerã jua ekꞌari.
Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Akꞌõre, ¿eperã pɨ–itꞌee kꞌãarema, pɨa ichi akꞌɨ bapariimerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌinia iru bapariimerã?
Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bɨ misa, pɨa ichi ekꞌariara bɨji pɨchi angeleerã kꞌãyaara. Mãgá bɨji mĩda, ichi waibɨa papiji mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra wãree papiji pɨkꞌa.
Ne–inaa jõma nɨ̃bɨ ichi jua ekꞌari bɨji.’
Mãga ooji mĩda, waide ne–inaa jõma ichi jua ekꞌari bɨ–e.

Mamĩda Jesús jua ekꞌari bɨ. Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesús ekꞌariara bɨji ichi angeleerã kꞌãyaara, taarã–e nɨde eperã jĩpꞌaakꞌa bapariimerã. Eperãarã kꞌinia iru bairã, Jesús piupiji jõmaarã pari. Mãgá chupɨria piuda perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru tachi rey waibɨa papiji mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra wãree papiji.

Ne–inaa jõma nɨ̃bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Ichiata pia kꞌĩsia iru baji ichi Warra piuda kꞌaurepa awaraa warrarã chokꞌara ichi ome pꞌanapataadamerã, ichi eujã kꞌĩra wãree bɨde. Mapa chi Warra chupɨria piupiji. Cristopa jõma ooji ichi Akꞌõrepa oopidakꞌa, mia nɨ̃baji mĩda mãga ooitꞌee. Mapa ichia wãara Tachi Akꞌõre o akꞌɨpii eperãarãmaa, aɨde tꞌĩudapꞌeda, ɨtꞌaa wãdamerã.

Ma–itꞌeeta Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesucristo jɨrɨtꞌeraji, iru kꞌaurepa eperãarã tꞌĩudamerã mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõre ode pꞌanapataadamerã. Jõma eperãarã Tachi Akꞌõre ode pꞌanɨɨrã chi Warra kꞌaurepa ichiaba ichi warrarã. Mapa Tachi Akꞌõre Warra kꞌĩra nejasia–e bɨ mãgɨɨrãmaa ɨ̃pema aitꞌee.
Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Tachi Akꞌõre, mɨa pɨ kꞌawapiitꞌee mɨ ɨ̃pemaarãmaa mãikꞌaapa pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃itꞌee kꞌari nɨ̃bɨde ãra taide.’
Ichiaba awara ãi jara bɨ:
‘Mɨa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãaitꞌee.’
Ichiaba jara bɨ:
‘Mɨ nama bɨda aji, pɨa warrarã mɨmaa teeda ome.’

Mãgɨ́ warrarã tachikꞌa pꞌanadairã, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Jesucristo aukꞌa eperã paji. Mãga pa kꞌinia baji kꞌawada perã ichi piuda kꞌaurepa eperãarã irude ijãa pꞌanɨ uchiapiitꞌee Netuara Poro Waibɨa jua ekꞌariipa. Mãgɨpa eperãarã peepii awaa bapari.

Mãgɨ́ jua ekꞌari eperãarã esclavoorãkꞌa pꞌanapata, piudaitꞌee waawee pꞌanadairã. Mamĩda Jesucristopa aweda Netuara Poro Waibɨa pꞌoyaada perã piukꞌãri, ichia eperãarã uchiapii mãgɨ́ jua ekꞌariipa waa waaweenaadamerã piutꞌee.
Maperãpɨ tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Jesucristo che–e paji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee angeleerã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Ma kꞌãyaara cheji kꞌaripaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapataarã Abrahampa ijãadakꞌa.

Cristo mãgá cheda perã ichi ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌaripade, tachikꞌa baji na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bakꞌãri. Mapa Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨapa ooparikꞌa, tachi chupɨria kꞌawaapari mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pari tachi pari. Iru piuda kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa wẽpapipari tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata, ma kꞌaurepa atuanaadamerã.
Jesucristo tachikꞌa bada perã, aukꞌa chupɨria nɨ̃baji Netuara Poro Waibɨapa irumaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopi chekꞌãri. Mapa ichia tachi kꞌaripai aukꞌa choodamerã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia oonaadamerã.

Ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi awara bɨda perã ichi ome ɨtꞌari pꞌanapataadamerã, kꞌĩsíatɨ Jesucristopa oo bɨde tachi kꞌaripaitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pëiji jarateemerã iru ũraa chiwidi mãikꞌaapa Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨakꞌa ɨtꞌaa iidipariimerã tachi pari, irude ijãapata perã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesucristo pëiji iru Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia bada perã, Moisepa oo kꞌinia badakꞌa, chonaarãweda Akꞌõre eperãarã kꞌaripakꞌãri.
Mamĩda Jesús Moisés kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Kꞌĩsiadáma nãgɨde. Eperãarãpa te oopataarã pipɨara akꞌɨpata, mãɨrãpa te oodapꞌedaa kꞌãyaara.
Eperãarãpa te chokꞌara oodai. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrépata ooji ne–inaa jõma nɨ̃bɨ.
Moisés Tachi Akꞌõredeerã akꞌɨpari pia paji, oo kꞌinia bada perã Akꞌõrepa jaradakꞌa. Eperãarãmaa jarateepachi Tachi Akꞌõrepa tꞌẽepai ooitꞌee bada.

Mamĩda Cristo Tachi Akꞌõre Warra perã, ichideerã pipɨara akꞌɨpari Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Tachita irudeerã ichiaba, Cristode ijãa amaada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã mãikꞌaapa o–ĩa unu kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã ne–inaa pia Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ tachi–itꞌee.
Maperã pia ũridaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jara bɨ iru ũraa pꞌãdade:
‘Idi Tachi Akꞌõre pedee ũriruta pɨrã,
kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua pꞌananáatɨ pãchi chonaarãkꞌa, ãchi wãyaa wãdakꞌãri eujã pania wẽe bɨde. Tachi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari pꞌana kꞌiniada–e paji, ãchia oo kꞌiniata oo kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.
Mapa Akꞌõrepa jaraji: “Cuarenta años pãchi chonaarãpa unupachida mɨa oo bada ãchi kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mamĩda atꞌãri mɨa jarada oo kꞌiniada–e pꞌanapachida.
Maperãpɨ mɨ kꞌĩraudachi ma eperãarã ome.” Mãpai jaraji: “Na eperãarãpa ãchia oo kꞌiniata oopata. Oodakꞌaa mɨa oopi bɨkꞌa, mɨ o kꞌawada–e pꞌanadairã.”
Mãpai mɨ kꞌĩrau bada perã ãchi ome, juraaji: “Wãda–eda aji, mɨa kꞌãiwee pꞌanapiitꞌeeda ada eujãdee.” ’
Ɨ̃rá ɨ̃pemaarã, mãga bada perã tachi chonaarã ome, Tachi Akꞌõre ichita bapari odeepa uchianaadamerã, tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa pꞌananáatɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua pꞌananáatɨ.
Ma kꞌãyaara, chokꞌai pꞌanɨ misa, ewari chaa chikꞌaripa pꞌanapatáatɨ waapɨara ijãadaitꞌee, apida Tachi Akꞌõre odeepa uchianaadamerã, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo kꞌiniapa.
Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadaipia bɨ tachi piurutamaa. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, unudaitꞌee irua ne–inaa pia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ tachi–itꞌee, Cristo tachi ome bapari perã.
Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:

‘Idi Tachi Akꞌõre pedee ũriruta pɨrã, kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua pꞌananáatɨ pãchi chonaarãkꞌa, ãchi wãyaa wãdakꞌãri eujã pania wẽe bɨde. Tachi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari pꞌana kꞌiniada–e paji, ãchia oo kꞌiniata oo kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.’
Maperã kꞌĩsiadáma tachi chonaarãde. Moisés ãchi poro waibɨa paji Egiptodeepa uchiadakꞌãri. Maapai Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchimaa jĩpꞌa pedeeji ichi itꞌaideepa. Mamĩda irua jaradakꞌa oo kꞌiniada–e paji.
Maperãpɨ piukꞌoodachida ma eujã pania wẽe bɨde, wãdai naaweda ma eujãdee Tachi Akꞌõrepa pꞌanapiitꞌee padamãi. Cuarenta años ãchia oo kꞌiniata oo pꞌanɨpa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩraupijida.
Mapa irua nãga jaraji:
‘Ɨ̃rá parã wãda–eda aji, mɨa kꞌãiwee pꞌanapiitꞌeeda ada eujãdee.’
Ma chonaarã wãda–e paji ma eujãdee, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada ijãada–e pada perã.
Atꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌãiwee pꞌanapi kꞌinia bɨ. Maperã pia pꞌanapataadáma irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, apidaamaa irua jaranaamerã: “Mɨa kꞌãiwee bapi–e.”

Mɨa mãga jara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachimaa ichiaba jara pëida perã ichia ooda eperãarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataitꞌee. Mãga ijãadakꞌãri, kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadaitꞌee. Ichia chonaarãmaa jara pëidakꞌa, mãgá ichiaba tachimaa jara pëiji. Mamĩda ãchi–itꞌee pia uchia–e paji, kꞌɨɨrɨpapai ũridapꞌedaa perã, tꞌãride ijãada–ee.
Tachia ãchikꞌa oodaikꞌaraa bɨ. Ijãada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi jida kꞌãiwee pꞌanapi–e. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Kꞌĩrau bada perã ãchi ome, juraaji: “Wãda–eda aji, mɨa kꞌãiwee pꞌanapiitꞌeeda ada eujãdee.” ’
Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujã ooi naaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru baji tachi kꞌãiwee pꞌanapiitꞌee ichi ome.
Ma awara kꞌawa pꞌanɨ iru kꞌãiwee bapari, awara ãi iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Kꞌãima sieteede Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi mimia oo aupakꞌãri, ɨ̃iji mãikꞌaapa kꞌãiwee beeji.’
Mamĩda waya ũrítɨ irua naaweda jarada ichi ũraa pꞌãdade:
‘Wãda–eda aji, mɨa kꞌãiwee pꞌanapiitꞌeeda ada eujãdee.’
Mãga jaraji ma naa ũridapꞌedaarãpa irua jara pëida ijãada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Mamĩda irua atꞌãri ichide ijãapataarã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapi kꞌinia bɨ.
Ma–itꞌee ewari awara bɨji. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mãgɨ́ chonaarã piudapꞌedaa tꞌẽepai, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada perã Rey David itꞌaideepa:
‘Idi Tachi Akꞌõre pedee ũriruta pɨrã, kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua pꞌananáatɨ.’
Josuépa mãgɨ́ chonaarã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapida paara, aɨ tꞌẽepai David itꞌaideepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa “idi” jara–e pakꞌaji.
Mãgara irude ijãapataarã idipema ewari ɨ̃idai ichiaba, Tachi Akꞌõre ɨ̃idakꞌa na pꞌekꞌau eujã oo aupakꞌãri.
Tachia oo kꞌiniata oopata oo amaadakꞌãri oo kꞌinia pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa, wãara irukꞌa ɨ̃idaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Maperã jɨrɨdaipia bɨ irukꞌa ɨ̃idaitꞌee. Kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ tachi chonaarãkꞌa.

Iru ũraa ũridaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa chokꞌai pɨkꞌa bairã. Ma kꞌaurepa eperãarã ichita pꞌanapataadai. Ma awara iru ũraa waibɨara bɨ awaraa ũraa kꞌãyaara, irua jara bɨkꞌa mãgá pꞌasapari perã. Espada kꞌĩraichaa weda pꞌewedee bɨkꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa iru ũraa ichiaba pꞌewedee pɨkꞌa bɨ, ma ũraa tachi tꞌãride tꞌĩupari perã. Kꞌawapipari tachia kꞌĩsia bɨ mãikꞌaapa oo kꞌinia bɨ, pia wa kꞌachia.

Ne–inaa apida wẽ–e Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawa–e pai. Iru–itꞌee ne–inaa jõma ewaraa jẽra bɨ. Ewari cherude tachi jõmaweda pꞌanadaitꞌee iru kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa irumaa tachia oopatapꞌedaa jõmaweda jaradaitꞌee.

Ɨ̃rá mɨa waya kꞌirãpapi kꞌinia bɨ parãmaa: Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesús awara bɨji waibɨa pamerã mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pariimerã tachi pari. Maperã Tachi Akꞌõre Warra Jesús tachi ijãapataarã Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨa. Ɨtꞌari bapari ichi Akꞌõre ome. Mama ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa bairã tachi pari, tꞌãripa irude ijãadáma.
Nãgɨ́ Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨapa kꞌawapari tachi tꞌãride kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ, tachikꞌa na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bapachi perã. Mamĩda mãgá bapachi mĩda, maarepida pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo–e paji.

Mãgá Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨa irukꞌa iru pꞌanadairã, waaweenaadáma wãdaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨa kꞌaitꞌaara, tachi ɨtꞌaa iididakꞌãri. Ne–inaa jõma Cristo jua ekꞌari nɨ̃bɨ mãikꞌaapa irua tachi kꞌaripa kꞌinia bɨ. Maperã chupɨria iididáma, irua jara bɨkꞌa ooda–e pakꞌãri. Ichiaba tachi kꞌĩradoopa irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa pꞌoyaa ooda–e pakꞌãri, iididáma irua kꞌaripamerã, tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã.

Pꞌaareerã poro waibɨa chaa tachi ome aukꞌa bɨ mĩda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ eperã awara bɨpari, ichimaa ɨtꞌaa iidipariimerã eperãarã pari. Ma awara irua jitapari ne–inaa eperãarãpa aneepata teedaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõremaa. Ichiaba ne–animalaarã peekꞌãri, irua paapari Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, eperãarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa.
Mãgɨ́ pꞌaareerã poro waibɨapa tachikꞌa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopari perã, irua chupɨria kꞌawaai chi ne–inaa kꞌachia oo pꞌanɨɨrã, kꞌawada–e pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchimaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ.
Maperãpɨ irua chupɨria iidipari, ne–inaa teepari mãikꞌaapa ne–animalaarã peepꞌeda, paapari Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, naapɨara ichi kꞌapꞌɨa pari, maapꞌeda apemaarã pari.
Eperã apida ichi kꞌĩradoopa pꞌaareerã poro waibɨa pa–e pai. Tachi Akꞌõrépata mãgɨ́ mimiade bɨpari, chonaarãweda Aarón
Mãgapɨ Cristo ome baji ichiaba. Ichi kꞌĩradoopa waibɨa pa–e paji. Tachi Akꞌõrépata iru bɨji tachi ijãapataarã Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨa pamerã. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Mɨa idi jõmaarãmaa jara bɨ pɨ mɨ Warra.’
Ichiaba awara ãi jara bɨ:
‘Pɨ ichita Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨa paitꞌee, Melquisedeckꞌa.’

Jesucristo na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bakꞌãri, atꞌapai taubade chupɨria iidiji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi kꞌaripamerã. Kꞌawaji ichi piutꞌee mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõrépata ichi madeepa uchiapii. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma chupɨria iidida ũriji, Cristopa oo kꞌinia bada perã chi Akꞌõrepa oopidakꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõre Warra paji mĩda, mia nɨ̃bɨde Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌiniata oo kꞌawaa wã nipaji.
Mapa chi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bada oo aupakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru bɨji tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atamerã. Mãga bɨji irude ijãapataarã Akꞌõre truade ichita pꞌanapataadamerã iru ome, waa piuda–ee.
Irua mãgá ooi Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru bɨda perã tachi ijãapataarã Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨa pamerã Melquisedeckꞌa.
Mɨa pipɨara jaratee kꞌinia bɨ sãga Jesucristopa ooda Melquisedecpa oodakꞌa. Mamĩda mãga ooru pɨrã, parãpa pia kꞌawada–e pai, wãara ũri kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadairã.

¡Pãchita Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepataarã pakꞌajida, taarãruta perã Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨ! Mamĩda mãga–e. Atꞌãri awaraarãpa parãmaa jarateepata, waide pia kꞌawada–e pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateedapꞌedaa, ewaa irude ijãadakꞌãri. Mãga pꞌanɨ ma ũraa pipɨara kꞌawa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadairã.
Ara warra chakꞌe juto bɨ chikꞌo kꞌo atua bɨkꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa parãpa ijãa pꞌanɨ mĩda, kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ chisãgɨ́ ne–inaa pia mãikꞌaapa chisãgɨ́ ne–inaa kꞌachia Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Jõdee Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pipɨara kꞌawa pꞌanɨɨrã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanɨ, pia mãikꞌaapa kꞌachia kꞌawapata perã.

Mapa oodáma Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa iru ũraa pipɨara kꞌawaa wãdáma. O–ĩa pꞌananaadáma tachimaa naapɨara jarateedapꞌedaa ome. Nãga jarateejida tachimaa: Eperãarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo amaadaipia bɨ, ma kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã ichi bɨmãi tꞌĩupi–e paitꞌee perã. Ijãadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesucristo pëiji eperãarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atamerã, mãgá ãra pꞌanapataadamerã Akꞌõre truade iru ome, waa piuda–ee.

Poro choopidaipia bɨ akꞌɨpidaitꞌee ãchi Cristodeerã. Ma tꞌẽepai, tachi naawedapemaarãpa oodapꞌedaakꞌa, ijãapataarã poroorãpa jua bɨdaipia bɨ ãra ɨ̃rɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãramaa ichi Jaure pëimerã. Ichiaba ijãadaipia bɨ Cristo waya chekꞌãri, ichide ijãa jai–idaadapꞌedaarã Tachi Akꞌõrepa chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiitꞌee, kꞌapꞌɨa chiwidi pꞌanapataadamerã, waa piuda–ee. Jõdee Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate jai–idaadapꞌedaarã Cristode ijãada–ee, ichimãiipa pëiitꞌee awara ãyaa, chupɨria pꞌanapataadamerã, waa piuda–ee.
Mãga paji ma naapɨara jarateedapꞌedaa. Mamĩda ma ũraa kꞌãyaara waa kꞌawaadai, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌariparu pɨrã.

Mɨa mãga jara bɨ eperãarãpa Cristode ijãa amaadapꞌeda, waya pꞌoyaa ijãada–e perã. Mãgɨɨrãmaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawaapiji Cristopa ooda ãchi–itꞌee. Maapꞌeda ãchia ijãajida iru piuji ãchi kꞌaripaitꞌee ɨtꞌaa wãdamerã. Mãga ijãadapꞌeda, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure ba cheji ãchi ome, Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨ ãchimaa pia kꞌawaadamerã.

Ichiaba kꞌawaajida Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarakꞌãri ichia ne–inaa pia ooitꞌee, mãga oopari. Unujida Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa ooda eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa, tau pꞌãriu bada mãikꞌaapa chiwa bada jɨpakꞌãri. Kꞌawaajida mãgá ooitꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõrumaa.

Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨde, Cristode ijãa amaaruta pɨrã, ne–inaa awaraa wẽ–e ãchi kꞌaripaitꞌee, waya ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo amaadamerã mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa wãdamerã. Mãgá ijãa amaaruta pɨrã, oodai Tachi Akꞌõre Warra peedapꞌedaarãpa oodapꞌedaakꞌa, iru kurusode bɨdakꞌãri arii pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa oo iru pꞌanadamerã.

Mɨa jaraitꞌee sãga pꞌanɨ Cristode ijãa amaa pꞌanɨɨrã. Kꞌoi chekꞌãri, eujã pꞌũasaade tꞌĩupari mãikꞌaapa madeepa ne–uuda uchiapari. Ma ne–uuda pia chaukꞌãri, eperãarãpa pꞌepata kꞌodaitꞌee. Mãga bakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma eujã pia akꞌɨparida apata.
Mamĩda kꞌoi che bɨ mĩda, ne–ɨɨrɨ uchiaru pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma eujã pia akꞌɨ–e bɨda apata, mãikꞌaapa ma eujã atabaibëipata, paa atapëidamerã.

Ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa kꞌiniarã, mãga jara bɨ mĩda, kꞌawa bɨ parã́pata Cristode ijãa amaada–e pꞌanɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa oo pꞌanadairã. Mãgá akꞌɨpipata parãpa wãara pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo amaajida Cristode ijãapataadaitꞌee.
Kꞌirãpátɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichita pia oopari. Ichia kꞌĩra atua–e bɨ parãpa irudeerã kꞌaripadapꞌedaa mãikꞌaapa atꞌãri mãga oo pꞌanɨ, iru kꞌinia iru pꞌanadairã.
Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ parã mãga pꞌanapataadamerã piurutamaa. Mãga pꞌanaruta pɨrã, pia kꞌawaadaitꞌee Cristo kꞌaurepa iru pꞌanadaitꞌee jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ parã–itꞌee.

Kꞌinia–e bɨ kꞌoo–idaa pꞌanadamerã. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌinia bɨ parãpa ijãadamerã tachi chonaarãkꞌa, chi irua jarada pedee ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaarã ãchi piurutamaa. Choojida unurutamaa jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bada ãramaa teeitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi pedee Abrahammaa jarakꞌãri, awaraa ichi kꞌãyaara waibɨara wẽ–e paji ma kꞌĩrapite jaraitꞌee. Mapa ichi tꞌɨ̃de jaraji:
‘Mɨa pɨ pia akꞌɨ bapariitꞌee. Pɨdeepa warrarã chokꞌara uchiapiitꞌee.’
Abrahampa ijãaji Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada, taarãji mĩda ooitꞌee ichia jaradakꞌa. Abrahampa mãgá ijãada perã, Akꞌõrepa wãara ooji ichia jaradakꞌa.
Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ eperãarã nepɨrade pꞌanɨde akꞌɨpi kꞌinia pꞌanadakꞌãri wãarata jara pꞌanɨ, juraapata eperã ãchi kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ kꞌĩrapite, chi ũri pꞌanɨɨrãpa ijãadamerã.
Mãga pɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrepa akꞌɨpi kꞌinia bakꞌãri wãara ooitꞌee ichia jaradakꞌa Abrahammaa mãikꞌaapa irukꞌa ijãapatapꞌedaarãmaa, mãga jaraji ichi tꞌɨ̃de, awaraa ichi kꞌãyaara waibɨara wẽ–e pada perã.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma pedee jarada perã mãikꞌaapa ichi tꞌɨ̃de jarada perã, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ iru seewakꞌaa. Irua jara bɨkꞌa, ichita mãga oopari. Mapa tachi o kꞌachiadeepa uchiapata Cristode ijãadaitꞌee. Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ irua tachi kꞌaripaitꞌee pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌariipa, tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanapataadamerã iru ome mãikꞌaapa iru pꞌanadamerã ne–inaa jõma irua kꞌĩsia iru bɨ tachi–itꞌee.

Maperã tachia ijãapata; ijãa amaada–ee. Ara anclapa barco pia jita iru bɨkꞌa ãyaa wãpiamaapa, mãga pɨkꞌa tachia pia ijãapata, kꞌawa pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi ateeitꞌee ichimaa, Jesupa ooda kꞌaurepa.

Jesuta tachi kꞌãyaara naapɨara wãji Tachi Akꞌõre baparimaa, tꞌẽepai tachi aukꞌa wãdamerã. Mama bakꞌãri, Jesús tachi Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨa beeji, ichita tachi pari ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pari perã, Melquisedecpa oodakꞌa.
Mãgɨ́ Melquisedec Salem pꞌuurudepema rey paji. Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨapa iru pꞌaare waibɨa papiji. Abraham chekꞌãri awaraarã reyrã pꞌoyaapꞌeda, Melquisedec iru kꞌĩrapite uchiaji mãikꞌaapa bendiciaji.
Mãpai Abrahampa Melquisedecmaa teeji netꞌaa diezdepema chaa aba, irua netꞌaa jõmaweda jãri atadadepema ma reyrã juakꞌaawa.

Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara–e bɨ Melquisedec nawe, chi akꞌõre, chi akꞌõchonaarã, chi tꞌoda, chi piuda. Ma awara jara–e bɨ chi pꞌaare mimia jõda. Iru Tachi Akꞌõre Warrakꞌa, ichita pꞌaare waibɨa bapari perã.

¡Kꞌĩsíatɨ nãgɨde! Melquisedec eperãarã poro waibɨa paji. Ichiaba tachi chonaarãwedapema akꞌõchona Abraham tachi chonaarã poro waibɨa paji, Tachi Akꞌõrepa irumaa naapɨara jarada perã. Mamĩda Melquisedecmaa Abrahampa teeji netꞌaa ma reyrã juakꞌaawa jãridadepema; ma netꞌaa jõmaweda diezdepema chaa, aba.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa Ũraa Moisemaa pꞌãpidade jaraji Israel pidaarã poro waibɨarãpa Leví ëreerãdepemaarã ũkꞌuru awara bɨdamerã, pꞌaareerã mimia oodamerã. Ma ũraade ichiaba jaraji ma pꞌaareerãpa iidipataadamerã netꞌaa diezdepema chaa aba ãchi aukꞌaarãmaa, mãɨrã ichiaba Abrahamdeepa uchiadapꞌedaa paji mĩda ãchi jĩakꞌa.

Jõdee Melquisedec Leví ëreerãdeepa uchia–e paji mĩda, Abrahammaa iidiji netꞌaa jãrida diezdepema chaa, aba. Ma awara Abraham waibɨa paji, Tachi Akꞌõrepa irumaa jarada perã ichia kꞌĩsia iru bada warrarã chokꞌara teeitꞌee. Mãgá Abraham waibɨara pɨkꞌa baji mĩda Melquisedec kꞌãyaara, irua Abraham bendiciaji.
Jõmaarãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ pꞌaare waibɨa, chi ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pari awaraarã pari, waibɨara bɨ eperã jĩpꞌaa kꞌãyaara.
Ma awara ɨ̃rapema netꞌaa diezdepema chaa aba iidipataarã jai–idaapata. Jõdee Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara–e bɨ Melquisedec piuda.
Ma ewate Abrahampa Melquisedecmaa teekꞌãri netꞌaa jãrida diezdepema chaa aba, jõma Leví ëreerãdepema pꞌaareerã kꞌapꞌɨa pari teeji, ãra atꞌãri tꞌoda–e pꞌanajida mĩda.
Atꞌãri Leví uchia–e baji mĩda Abraham kꞌapꞌɨadeepa, jaradai ma ewate Levideerãpa teejida Melquisedecmaa Abraham pari, aɨ tꞌẽepai Abraham ãichakꞌe Jacobdeepa uchiadaitꞌee pada perã.

Moisepa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãda teekꞌãri Israel pidaarãmaa, awara bɨji Leví ëreerã, Aarondeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã pꞌaareerã mimia oodamerã. Mãgɨɨrãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaradakꞌa oopipachida eperãarãmaa. Mamĩda, mãga oo pꞌanajida mĩda, ma pꞌaareerãpa pꞌoyaa wẽpapida–e paji eperãarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌaitꞌaara wãdamerã. Mãga oodapꞌedaa paara, Tachi Akꞌõrepa awaraa pëi–e pakꞌaji Melquisedec jĩakꞌa.

Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa awaraa pꞌaare bɨji mãga oomerã. Nãgɨ́ bɨ–e paji Aarón bɨdakꞌa. Ma kꞌãyaara Melquisedeckꞌa bɨji. Nãgɨ́ pꞌaarepa ichi mimia ookꞌaa Aarondeepa uchiadapꞌedaarãkꞌa. Oopari Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa chiwidide jara bɨkꞌa.
Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ nãgɨ́ pꞌaare, mɨa jara bɨ, uchia–e paji Leví ëreerãdeepa. Wãara, na pꞌaare ëreerãdeepa pꞌaare apida uchiadakꞌaa paji.
Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesuta uchiada perã Judá ëreerãdeepa. Moisepa apida Judá ëreerã eerepema tꞌɨ̃jara–e paji, apemaarã pꞌaareerã awara bɨkꞌãri.
Ichiaba nãga perã audupɨara kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Jesuta tachi ɨ̃rapema pꞌaare waibɨa, Melquisedeckꞌa.

Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ Leví ëreerãdepemaarã awara bɨdamerã pꞌaareerã mimia–itꞌee. Ma mimia oodaitꞌee paji na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa. Mamĩda mãga–e paji Jesús ome. Iru Leví ëreerãdeepa uchia–e paji awaraa pꞌaareerãkꞌa, taarã–e weda ma mimia oomerã. Mãga–e. Tachi Akꞌõrépata Jesús awara bɨji ichita ma mimiade bapariimerã.
Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ irumaa jara bairã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade:
‘Pɨ ichita Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨa paitꞌee, Melquisedeckꞌa.’

Naaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa Moisemaa pꞌãpiji ichia oopi kꞌinia bada ichi eperãarãmaa. Jaraji ne–animalaarã pꞌaareerãmaa ateedamerã, ãchia peedamerã mãikꞌaapa paadamerã ichi–itꞌee. Mamĩda ma pꞌaareerãpa ma pꞌãpidakꞌa oo pꞌanɨpa, eperãarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata pꞌoyaa wẽpapida–e paji.

Maperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma pꞌãpidakꞌa oodapꞌedaa waa oopi–e paji. Ma kꞌãyaara ichi ũraa chiwidi tachimaa kꞌawaapiji, ichi kꞌĩrapite pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanadamerã Cristode ijãadakꞌãri. Ma awara mãgɨ́ ũraa chiwidi kꞌaurepa ɨ̃rá Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌaitꞌaara wã pꞌanɨ ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dakꞌãri.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa Leví ëreerãdepema pꞌaareerã awara bɨkꞌãri, awaraarã kꞌĩrapite pedee–e paji.
Jõdee, ɨ̃rapema pꞌaare awara bɨkꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi tꞌɨ̃de pedeeji. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi tꞌɨ̃de nãga jara bairã, awaraa ne–inaa oo–e paitꞌee. “Pɨ ichita pꞌaareerã poro waibɨa paitꞌee.” ’
Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesumaa mãga jarada perã mãikꞌaapa Jesús kꞌaurepa ũraa chiwidi paraa perã, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ma ũraa chiwidide jara bɨ tachimaa pipɨara bɨ irua Moisemaa jarada kꞌãyaara.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa apemaarã pꞌaareerã chokꞌara bɨpachi. Mamĩda ãra mãgɨ́ mimiade ichita pꞌanadakꞌaa, piupata perã.
Jõdee Jesús piukꞌaa perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa awaraa pꞌaareerã poro waibɨa bɨ–e paitꞌee iru pari.
Mapa irua kꞌaripai ichide ijãapataarã, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Ichita bapari perã, ichita Tachi Akꞌõremaa chupɨria iidipariitꞌee tachi pari.

Nãgɨ́ Jesús Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨa tachia kꞌinia pꞌanɨ. Irua pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ookꞌaa, kꞌachia wẽe bairã. Kꞌĩsia kꞌachia kꞌĩsiakꞌaa. Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bakꞌãri, bapachi mĩda eperãarã kꞌachia oopataarã tꞌãide, mãgá ookꞌaa paji. Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara papiji.

Cristo apemaarã Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨarãkꞌa bɨ–e. Mãgɨɨrãpa chokꞌapata apemaarã pꞌaareerã ewari chaa ne–animalaarã peedamerã paadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Ma awara ne–animalaarã peedakꞌãri paadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, naapɨara mãga oopata ãchi pari, maapꞌeda apemaarã pari, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa. Jõdee Cristo piuda aba piuji, tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata jõmaweda wẽpapiitꞌee.

Ma jõma jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨ pꞌaareerã poro waibɨa mimia–itꞌee awara bɨdamerã eperã tachikꞌa, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopari. Mamĩda, ma pꞌãpida tꞌẽepai, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi tꞌɨ̃de pedee bɨpa, bɨji ichi Warra, chi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ookꞌaa bɨta, ichita tachi Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨa pamerã.
Mɨa na pedee jara che wã, nãgata jara kꞌinia bɨ. Cristota tachi Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨa. Iru Tachi Akꞌõre juaraare su–akꞌɨ bapari Akꞌõre truade.
Ichi bɨmãi ɨtꞌari, mamata Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨa. Eperãarãpa mãgɨ́ te ooda–e paji. Tachi Akꞌõrépata ooji. Mama Jesupa Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨa mimia oopari tachi pari.
Jõma Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨarã bɨpata, ãchia teedamerã Tachi Akꞌõremaa ne–inaa eperãarãpa aneepata iru–itꞌee. Mãgá Cristopa pida ne–inaa teepari Tachi Akꞌõremaa, ichi tachi Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨa perã.

Atꞌãri Cristo na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bada paara, Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨade pꞌaare pa–e pakꞌaji, mãgee pꞌaareerã atꞌãri paraa perã. Mãɨrãpa oomaa pꞌanɨ Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Cristo nama bɨ–e perã eperã kꞌapꞌɨade, tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ iru mimia oomaa bɨ Akꞌõre truade.
Mamĩda na eujãdepema pꞌaareerãpa ne–inaa oo pꞌanɨ jĩpꞌa Cristopa oo bɨkꞌa ɨtꞌari. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada perã ichi te oopiitꞌee pakꞌãri Moisemaa:
‘Óoji ne–inaa jõmaata mɨa akꞌɨpidakꞌa, pɨ ee nokꞌode bakꞌãri mɨ ome.’

Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachi Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨapa oo bɨ ɨtꞌari pipɨara bɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema pꞌaareerãpa oopata kꞌãyaara. Mãga bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa chiwidide jara bairã tachi pia akꞌɨpariitꞌee Cristo kꞌaurepa.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa naa ũraa jarada kꞌaurepa eperãarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌaneedapꞌedaa paara, awaraa ũraa chiwidi jara–e pakꞌaji. Mamĩda ma naa ũraa jarada mãga–e pada perã, tachi chonaarãpa ũraa chiwidi jɨrɨ pꞌanajida.
Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõrepa unukꞌãri eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa ooda–e ma naawedapema ũraade jaradakꞌa, jaraji:
—‘Mɨ, Akꞌõre Waibɨapa jara bɨ: ¡Ũrítɨ! Ewari cherude ne–inaa chiwidi ooitꞌee. Ũraa chiwidi jaraitꞌee Judá ëreerãdepemaarãmaa mãikꞌaapa awaraa Israeldeepa uchiadapꞌedaa ëreerãdepemaarãmaa.

Nãgɨ́ ũraa chiwidi awara bɨ. Israel pidaarã chonaarãmaa jaradakꞌa mɨa aneekꞌãri Egiptodeepa, mãga bɨ–e. Mɨchi juadoopa ãchi aneeji mĩda, ãchia oo kꞌiniada–e paji mɨa jaradakꞌa. Mapa mɨa ãchi akꞌɨ kꞌinia–e paji. ¡Mɨ, Akꞌõre Waibɨapa mãga jara bɨ!

Mamĩda ewari cherude Israel pidaarã jõmaarãmaa ũraa chiwidi jaraitꞌee. ¡Mɨ, Akꞌõre Waibɨapa mãga jara bɨ! Nãgata ooitꞌee. Ma ewatedeepa ãramaa kꞌawapiitꞌee mɨa oopi kꞌinia bɨ, mãikꞌaapa mãga oo kꞌinia pꞌanadaitꞌee, tꞌãripa kꞌinia pꞌanadairã. Mapa mɨmaa aupai Tachi Akꞌõreda adai, mãikꞌaapa mɨa ãra pia akꞌɨ bapariitꞌee, mɨchi eperãarã perã.

Mãga bakꞌãri, apidaapa chĩaramaa, chi kꞌõpꞌãyoorãmaa mãikꞌaapa chi ëreerãmaa jarateeda–e paitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawaadamerã mãikꞌaapa irude ijãapataadamerã. Jõmaarãpa mɨ kꞌawa pꞌanadaitꞌee ãchi Akꞌõre Waibɨakꞌa, chupɨria beerãdeepa pꞌaratꞌara beerãmaa.
Ãrapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata chupɨria kꞌawaaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa wẽpapiitꞌee. Maapꞌeda waa kꞌirãpa–e paitꞌee ãrapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa.’
Tachi Akꞌõrepa “ũraa chiwidida” akꞌãri, jara kꞌinia bɨ ma naa ũraa jarada Moisemaa sore pɨkꞌa bɨ. Ne–inaa soredaiparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa ma naa ũraa jarada soredai wã.
Naapɨara Moisemaa ũraa jarakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaraji sãgata irude ijãadai mãikꞌaapa irua jaradakꞌa oodai. Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõre te ne–edee ooda oopiji.
Ma te ne–edee oodade chi naapema cuartode baji lámpara bɨpata mãikꞌaapa mesa pan pꞌepari Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Mãgɨ́ Cuarto Awara Bɨda apachida Tachi Akꞌõre Netꞌaa–itꞌee.
Araarepema Cuarto Awara Bɨda apachida Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Mãgɨ́ tꞌɨakꞌau baji pꞌaru teesoo bɨpa.

Ma pꞌaru teesoo bɨ kꞌaitꞌa baji altar nẽepa pꞌẽeda. Aɨ ɨ̃rɨ ne–inaa tꞌũa bapari paapachida. Ma pꞌaru teesoo bɨ edupema eere baji baaltekꞌa bɨ nẽepa pꞌẽeda. Ma baaltekꞌa bɨ eperãarãmaa kꞌirãpapi baji Tachi Akꞌõrepa Moisemaa jarada. Mãgɨ́ edajãde baji

Ma baaltekꞌa bada tꞌapꞌa ɨ̃rɨ bainɨ̃ pꞌanajida santokꞌa bee omé isia paraa. Mãgɨ́ jɨ̃apataarã kꞌĩra wãree, Tachi Akꞌõre ikꞌaawa pꞌanapata iru truade. Maperã santo mãgɨ́ jĩakꞌa bɨjida ma tꞌapꞌade akꞌɨpiitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre mama bɨ. Ma tꞌapꞌade pꞌaareerã poro waibɨapa ne–animalaarã waa jĩapꞌeji Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã miapinaamerã ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa. Mamĩda mɨa naapai pꞌoyaa jõma jara–e.
Israel pidaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõre te cuarto omeede oodapꞌeda, pꞌaareerã ewari chaa tꞌĩupachida naapema cuartode ãchi mimia oode, Tachi Akꞌõrepa Moisemaa jaradakꞌa.

Mamĩda chi araarepema cuartode pꞌaareerã poro waibɨa aupaita tꞌĩupachi, año chaa tꞌĩuda aba. Tꞌĩukꞌãri, ateepachi ne–animal waa bɨitꞌee ma baaltekꞌa bɨ ɨ̃rɨ. Mãɨmisa Tachi Akꞌõremaa chupɨria iidiji ichia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata pari mãikꞌaapa Israel pidaarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa pari; ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌawada–ee oopatapꞌedaa paara.
Mãga oopida kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa eperãarãmaa kꞌawapi baji mãgɨ́ tede Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌaitꞌa wãdaikꞌaraa bɨ.

Ma jõma oopida kꞌaurepa ma eperãarãmaa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarateemaa baji ichia ãramaa kꞌawapi kꞌinia bada mãikꞌaapa tachi ɨ̃rapemaarãmaa paara. Nãga kꞌawapi kꞌinia baji. Netꞌaa teedakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa ne–animalaarã peepidapꞌeda, paapidakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, eperãarã atꞌãri kꞌĩsia pꞌua pꞌanapachida ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa.

Chi mãga oopataarãpa ne–inaa kꞌodakꞌãri, kꞌapꞌɨa sɨɨdakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa todakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa Moisemaa pꞌãpidakꞌa, ɨ̃rɨpai o–ĩa pꞌaneepachida, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pipɨara kꞌawapirumaa ichia kꞌĩsia iru bada ãchi–itꞌee.

Ma–itꞌee Cristo cheji, tachi Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨa paitꞌee. Ichia kꞌawapipari Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapataarãmaa Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ãchi–itꞌee. Mãga ooi ichi bapari perã Tachi Akꞌõre ɨtꞌaripema te waibɨade. Mãgɨ́ te waibɨa pipɨara bɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema te waibɨa kꞌãyaara, eperãarãpa ooda–e pada perã. Jĩpꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrépata ooji.

Ma awara na eujãdepema pꞌaareerã poro waibɨa ma edupɨara bɨ cuartode tꞌĩukꞌãri, ne–animalaarã waa ateepari. Mamĩda Cristo tꞌĩukꞌãri ma ɨtꞌaripema tede chi cuarto edupɨara bɨde, tꞌĩuda aba tꞌĩuji ichi waa batꞌadata bɨde Tachi Akꞌõre bɨmãi. Mãgá tachi neto pɨkꞌa ataji uchiadamerã tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata jua ekꞌariipa mãikꞌaapa atuanaadamerã.

Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa naa ũraa jaradadeepa Moisemaa eperãarã tꞌĩudaikꞌaraa pꞌanadakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨa bɨmãi, nãga oojida waya tꞌĩudaipia pꞌanadamerã. Chivo chakꞌeerã mãikꞌaapa pꞌakꞌa chakꞌeerã ateejida pꞌaareerãmaa peedamerã mãikꞌaapa chi waa jĩapꞌedamerã ãchi ɨ̃rɨ. Mãga–e pɨrã jĩapꞌepipachida itꞌabarre pꞌora pꞌakꞌa wẽra chakꞌe paadapꞌedaa pꞌoirada pania ome. Ma ne–animalaarã waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã ɨ̃rɨpema kꞌachia aupai wẽpapiji.

Mamĩda Cristo waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa pipɨara oopari. Cristopa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia maarepida oo–e paji mĩda, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa kꞌaripaji iru tachi pari piumerã. Mãgá iru waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa wẽpapipari ne–inaa kꞌachia jõmaweda tachi atuapipari, ne–inaa tachi kꞌĩsia pꞌuapipari paara. Tachi Akꞌõre ichita baparipa mãga oopari kꞌinia bairã tachia irude ijãapataadamerã mãikꞌaapa oopataadamerã irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga kꞌinia bairã, Cristo pëiji irua oomerã Akꞌõre Ũraa chiwidide jara bɨkꞌa. Mãgá chonaarãwedapema Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapatapꞌedaarãpa aukꞌa iru pꞌanadaitꞌee ne–inaa jõma irua kꞌĩsia iru bada ãchi–itꞌee. Cristo piuda kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa wẽpapiji ãrapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa, tachide ome aukꞌa. Mãga ooji Cristo piuda perã jõmaarã pari, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe ichita pꞌanapataadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.

Kꞌĩsiadáma nãgɨde. Eperãpa kꞌartꞌade pꞌã iru bakꞌãri kꞌaimaa ichi netꞌaa bëiitꞌee ichi piukꞌãri, chi netꞌaa ataitꞌee bɨpa ma netꞌaa atakꞌaa chipari chokꞌai bɨ misa. Mamĩda ma kꞌartꞌa pꞌã iru bɨ eperã piukꞌãri, apemapa iru netꞌaa atapari.
Mãga pɨkꞌa Cristo piuji ooitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa chiwidi jara bɨkꞌa. Piu–e pada paara, tachia iru pꞌanada–e pakꞌaji Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada tachimaa teeitꞌee.
Mãga baji ichiaba chonaarãweda, ne–animalaarã peedakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa oomerã ichia Moisemaa naa jaradakꞌa.
Moisepa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jõmaweda jarapꞌeda ichi pꞌuuru pidaarãmaa, pꞌakꞌa mãikꞌaapa chivo peejida. Mãpai madeepa waa ataji mãikꞌaapa pꞌoiraji pania ome. Oveja kꞌara pꞌoree tꞌɨdapa
Mãga oo bɨ misa, mãgaji:
‘Nãgɨ́ waa jara kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨmaa jaradakꞌa parã pia akꞌɨitꞌee, irua oopi bɨkꞌa ooruta pɨrã.’
Ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõre te ne–edee ooda edajãde mãikꞌaapa chi ne–inaa jõma aɨde nɨ̃bada ɨ̃rɨ ma waapa jĩapꞌeji.

Mãga ooji aɨ naaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa irumaa jarada perã mãgɨ́ te mãikꞌaapa netꞌaa jĩapꞌemerã ne–animalaarã waapa. Mãga ookꞌãri, Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa kꞌachia ma tede nɨ̃bada waa akꞌɨ–e paji. Mãga bada perã ne–animalaarã waa ome, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata jõmaweda wẽpapi–e paitꞌee, aba piu–e pɨrã ãchi pari.

Moisepa ne–animalaarã waapa jĩapꞌeji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema te waibɨade, Tachi Akꞌõrepa Israel pidaarã pia akꞌɨmerã. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma ne–animalaarã waa kꞌãyaara pipɨara kꞌinia baji jĩapꞌemerã ichi ɨtꞌaripema te waibɨade, ichia eperãarã jõmaweda pia akꞌɨmerã. Mapa Cristo pëiji eperãarã pari piumerã. Cristo chokꞌai pꞌirabaikꞌãri, ma ɨtꞌaripema te waibɨade ichi waa jĩapꞌeji eperãarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌaneedamerã Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Cristo tꞌĩu–e paji ma ɨtꞌaripema jĩakꞌaa tede; eperãarãpa te oodapꞌedaade. Ma kꞌãyaara ɨtꞌaripema te waibɨadeta tꞌĩuji Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, chupɨria iidiitꞌee tachi pari.

Ma ɨtꞌaripema tede tꞌĩukꞌãri, oo–e paji judiorã pꞌaareerã poro waibɨapa ooparikꞌa. Mãgɨpa año chaa ne–animal waa ateepari Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨa edupɨara bɨ cuartode. Mamĩda Cristopa ateeda apai ichi waa ateeji ɨtꞌaripema te waibɨade.

Mãga–e pada paara, Cristo piuda chokꞌara piukꞌaji, Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujã ooru weda. Mamĩda Cristo cheda aba cheji mãikꞌaapa kurusode piuda aba piuji na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõrumaa, tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapiitꞌee.
Eperã chaa piuda aba piutꞌee. Maapꞌeda Tachi Akꞌõrepa akꞌɨitꞌee ma eperãpa pia maa–e pɨrã kꞌachia ooda na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bɨ misa.

Mãga pɨkꞌa Cristo piuda aba piuji eperãarã chokꞌaraarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiitꞌee. Waya cheitꞌee. Mamĩda ma cherude tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapide che–e paitꞌee. Jĩpꞌa cheitꞌee ichi cheru nɨ pꞌanɨɨrãmaa teede jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ãchi–itꞌee.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa Moisemaa pꞌãpidakꞌa oopataarãpa waide kꞌawada–e jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ooitꞌee Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Maperã ipꞌiipai ne–animalaarã peedapꞌeda, paa pꞌanɨ mĩda Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, iru kꞌĩrapite pꞌoyaa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanadakꞌaa.

Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa oo bɨpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapida paara, waa ne–animalaarã peedapꞌeda, paada–e pakꞌaji ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa. Mamĩda atꞌãri mãga oopata. Mapa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ãchi atꞌãri kꞌĩsia pꞌua jõnapata.
Año chaa ma ne–animalaarã peedakꞌãri, ãchia kꞌachia oopata waapɨara kꞌirãpapata,
pꞌakꞌa waa mãikꞌaapa chivo waapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapikꞌaa perã.
Maperãpɨ Cristo na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee chekꞌãri, ichi Akꞌõremaa mãgaji:
—‘Ne–animalaarã peepachida mĩda pɨ–itꞌee mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa ateepachida mĩda pɨmaa teedaitꞌee, wãara pɨa mãga kꞌinia–e paji. Maperã mɨ na eujãdepemaarãkꞌa tꞌopiji piumerã eperãarã pari.
Ichiaba pɨ o–ĩa–e baji ne–animalaarã peedapꞌeda, paadakꞌãri akꞌɨpidaitꞌee pɨ kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ, maa–e pɨrã chupɨria iididaitꞌee ãrapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa.
Mapa mɨa mãgaji: “Pɨchá, Akꞌõre, mɨ nama bɨpɨ ooitꞌee pɨa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Pɨchi ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa mɨa ooitꞌee.” ’
Cristopa mãga jarakꞌãri, naapɨara mãgaji:

—Kꞌinia–e paji ne–animalaarã peedamerã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa ateedamerã pɨmaa teedaitꞌee. Pɨ o–ĩa–e bajida aji, ne–animalaarã peedakꞌãri akꞌɨpidaitꞌee pɨ kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ maa–e pɨrã chupɨria iididaitꞌee ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa.
Cristopa mãga jaraji Tachi Akꞌõrépata Moisemaa jaraji mĩda ne–animalaarã peedamerã ma–itꞌee.
Maapꞌeda Cristopa mãgaji:
—Akꞌõre, mɨ nama bɨ ooitꞌee pɨa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.
Mãga jarada perã tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ chi naaweda oopatapꞌedaa Moisepa pꞌãdakꞌa jõru, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa chiwidipida perã Cristo kꞌaurepa.

Cristopa ooda perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia badakꞌa, kurusode piuda aba piu chekꞌãri tachi kꞌapꞌɨa pari, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapiji. Maperãpɨ ɨ̃rá tachi ijãapataarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa, ewari chaa judiorã pꞌaareerãpa ne–animalaarã paapata. Mãgá ipꞌiipai oopata, mãga oopata kꞌaurepa pꞌoyaa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapidakꞌaa pai mĩda.
Jõdee Cristo piuda abaade pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapiji. Maapꞌeda su–akꞌɨ beeji Tachi Akꞌõre truade iru juaraare.
Mama Cristopa nɨmaa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã ichi jua ekꞌari bɨrumaa.
Cristo piuda aba piuda perã tachi kꞌapꞌɨa pari, irude ijãapataarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe ichita pꞌanadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa ichiaba made jara baji jarakꞌãri:

‘Ewari cherude mɨa Israel pidaarãmaa ũraa chiwidi jaraitꞌee. ¡Mɨ, Akꞌõre Waibɨapa mãga jara bɨ! Ma ewatedeepa kꞌawaapiitꞌee mɨa ãramaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ mãikꞌaapa mãga oo kꞌinia pꞌanadaitꞌee, tꞌãripa kꞌinia pꞌanadairã.’
Mãga jarapꞌeda, ichiaba jaraji:
‘Mɨa waa kꞌirãpa–e paitꞌee ãrapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa.’
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgá pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia waa kꞌirãpa–e paitꞌeeda ada perã, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Jesús piuda kꞌãyaara ne–inaa pipɨara wẽ–e pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapiitꞌee.
Mãpai ɨ̃pemaarã, Jesucristo waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa nãgaweda tachi panadai Tachi Akꞌõre bɨmaa.

¿Sãga jãma panadaima? Kꞌirãpátɨ Akꞌõre te waibɨade chi cuarto edupɨara tꞌɨakꞌau baji pꞌaru teesoo bɨpa, eperãarã tꞌĩunaadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre badamãi. Mamĩda Jesucristo kurusode piukꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma pꞌaru teesoo bɨ jẽpiji akꞌɨpiitꞌee ma kꞌãyaara ne–inaa chiwidi bɨitꞌee, ma kꞌaurepa eperãarã tꞌĩudamerã ichi bɨmãi. Mãgɨ́ Jesús kꞌapꞌɨa chokꞌai pꞌirabaida. Ma kꞌaurepata tachi ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dakꞌãri, ɨtꞌari tꞌĩudai Tachi Akꞌõre bɨmãi.
Ma awara Cristo, tachi Pꞌaareerã Poro Waibɨa perã, irua Tachi Akꞌõre ɨtꞌaripema te akꞌɨpari.

Mapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa bɨde tꞌãri pia wãdáma Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌaitꞌa. Irua oopi bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌanadáma mãikꞌaapa ijãadáma irua tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨ bɨ. Kꞌĩsia pꞌua pꞌananaadáma tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa, Cristo waapa ma jõma wẽpapida perã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo amaa kꞌinia pꞌanɨda ada perã paniapa sɨɨdakꞌãri.

Mãgapai–epɨ. Ichita pꞌanadáma tachi pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa naa tꞌãripa ijãadakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa teeitꞌee ne–inaa jõma ichia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ tachi–itꞌee. ¡Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichita oopari ichia jara bɨkꞌa!
Jɨrɨdáma chikꞌaripapataadaitꞌee, tachi jõmaweda chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa pia oopataadaitꞌee.

Pꞌananaadáma awaraarãkꞌa, chi cheda–e pꞌanɨɨrã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa ũride. Ma kꞌãyaara chipꞌedaidapꞌeda, chikꞌaripa pꞌanadáma pipɨara ijãadaitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate paru misa. Ma ewate Tachi Akꞌõrepa akꞌɨitꞌee eperãarãpa pia mãikꞌaapa kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa.

Ijãadakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida Cristode, tachia oo kꞌiniata oo wãruta pɨrã, ijãa amaa kꞌiniapa, kꞌĩsiadaikꞌaraa bɨ awaraa ne–inaapa tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapii. Cristo awara ne–inaa wẽ–e tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiitꞌee.

Chi mãga ijãada–e pꞌanɨɨrãpa ãchi piuda waaweedaipia bɨ, aɨ tꞌẽepai Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchia kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa akꞌɨkꞌãri, ãchi pëiitꞌee perã tꞌɨpɨtau jẽrajẽraa jira bɨde. Mamaata wãdaitꞌee jõma Tachi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari pꞌana kꞌiniadakꞌaa pꞌanɨɨrã.

Chonaarãweda eperãpa ooamaa bakꞌãri Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa, mãgɨpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo bɨ unudapꞌedaarãpa, omé maa–e pɨrã õpee, jarapachida ãchi poroorãmaa. Mãga kꞌawaadakꞌãri, peetꞌaapachida, chupɨria kꞌawada–ee.

Chonaarãweda mãga paji pɨrã, ¿audupɨara Tachi Akꞌõrepa nãgɨɨrã miapi–e paikꞌã? Ijãa amaa wãda Jesucristota Tachi Akꞌõre Warra mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oo bɨ eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõredepema–e. Ma awara jara pꞌanɨ ichi Ũraa chiwidi jara bɨkꞌa Cristo waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa eperãarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapi–e mãikꞌaapa mãgá pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanada–e Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨɨrã miapiitꞌee ichia jarada perã:
‘Mɨata pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã miapiitꞌee. Mɨata ãchi kꞌachia ooitꞌee ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata pari.’
Ichiaba ichi ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Tachi Akꞌõrépata akꞌɨitꞌee ichi eperãarãpa ne–inaa pia mãikꞌaapa kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa.’
Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨa ichita bapari. Ichi kꞌĩraudaru pɨrã tachi ome, tachia waaweepa pꞌoyaa chooda–e pai.

Mamĩda kꞌirãpátɨ parãpa naa Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, chupɨria jõnadapꞌedaa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa parãmaa kꞌawapiji ichi ũraa chiwidide jara bɨ Cristode. Maapꞌeda awaraarãpa parã miapijida mĩda, choopachida ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.

Edaare choopachida ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa ikꞌachia jarapatapꞌedaa mãikꞌaapa parã oo iru pꞌanapataadapꞌedaa apemaarã taide. Ma awara parãpa unudakꞌãri pãchi ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa mãgá chupɨria chitoonɨ, kꞌaripapachida.

Ichiaba chupɨria kꞌawaa jõnapachida ijãapataarã carcelde pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa ãra kꞌaripajida. Parã o–ĩa pꞌanapachida ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa pãchi netꞌaa jõma jãri atadakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã ɨtꞌari iru pꞌanɨ ne–inaa pi–iara. Ma ne–inaa jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ tachi–itꞌee jõ–e paitꞌee.
Jõma ma etꞌewa jarada wãara perã, waaweenáatɨ. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ parãmaa ne–inaa pi–ia teeitꞌee.
Mapa choo pꞌanapatáatɨ pãchi ijãa pꞌanɨde Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa oodaitꞌee. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, unudaitꞌee jõma irua jarada teeitꞌee parãmaa.
Kꞌirãpátɨ irua jarada:
‘Taarã–e nɨde chi cheitꞌee bɨta cheitꞌee. Taarã–e paitꞌee.
Pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanɨɨrã mɨde ijãapata perã, mɨ ome pꞌanadaitꞌee. Mamĩda waya naa para badakꞌa ijãada–e pꞌaneeruta pɨrã, mɨ o–ĩa ba–e paitꞌee ãra ome.’
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga jaraji mĩda, tachita atuada–e paitꞌee ma ijãada–eerãkꞌa, Cristode wãara ijãapata perã. Maperãpɨ irua tachi kꞌaripaitꞌee irumaa parutamaa.
¿Kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨma Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapari? Ijãapata perã kꞌawa pꞌanɨ wãarata uchiaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa, waide mãga unuda–e pꞌanɨ mĩda.
Tachi chonaarãpa mãgá ijãa pꞌanapatapꞌedaa perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra pia akꞌɨji.
Ijãapata perã tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujã mãikꞌaapa pajã ooji ichi pedeepapai. Mapa ɨ̃rá tachia jõmaweda unu pꞌanɨ irua ooda ne–inaa wẽ–e padadeepa.

Abelpa ijãa bada perã, Tachi Akꞌõremaa ne–inaa pipɨara teeji Caínpa teeda kꞌãyaara. Mapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa pia akꞌɨji Abelpa teeda mãikꞌaapa irumaa jaraji: “Pɨ pia bapari mɨ kꞌĩrapite.” Abel piuji mĩda, atꞌãri tachimaa kꞌawaapipari Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa oodaipia bɨ irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Enocpa ijãa bada perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ateeji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdeepa, piu–ee. Maperã iru ikꞌaawa pꞌanapatapꞌedaarãpa waa unuda–e paji. Ma ateei naaweda Akꞌõrepa jaraji: “Enocpa mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩapiparida aji, mɨ kꞌĩrapite pia bapari perã.”

Mamĩda eperãpa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa–e bɨ pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõre pꞌoyaa tꞌãri o–ĩapi–e. Mapa eperã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa bakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõremaa kꞌaitꞌaara wã kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã, ijãaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre ichita bapari. Ichiaba ijãaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripapari ichide pipɨara ijãarutaarã.

Noépa ijãaji Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarakꞌãri na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõma paniapa ũutꞌaaitꞌee, mãga waide unuda–e paji mĩda. Tachi Akꞌõre waawee bada perã, ooji barco choma ichi ëreerã ome bataudaitꞌee, mãgá piuda–e paitꞌee. Ma barco mãgá ookꞌãri, apemaarãmaa akꞌɨpiji ichia ijãa bɨ. Mãga unujida mĩda ijãada–e paji. Maperãpɨ kꞌiniijida. Mamĩda Noépa ijãa bada perã, Akꞌõrepa jaraji: “Noé pia bapari mɨ kꞌĩrapite.”
Abrahampa ijãa bada perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarakꞌãri wãmerã ichia teeitꞌee pada eujãdee, Abraham uchiaji ichi eujãdeepa. Mamĩda kꞌawa–e paji sãmaa wãru.

Abrahampa ijãa bada perã, banaji ma eujã jaradade. Bapachi te ne–edee oodade awaraa eujãdepemaarãpa oopatapꞌedaakꞌa. Ichiaba mãgá pꞌanapachida Isaac mãikꞌaapa Jacob, ijãadapꞌedaa perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada; ma eujã teeitꞌee ãchi ëreerãmaa.
Abraham mãgá bapachi ijãa bada perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ateeitꞌee ichia pꞌuuru oodamaa; ma pꞌuuru jõ–e paitꞌee.
Abraham audú chonaa baji warra ooitꞌee. Ichiaba Sara warra tꞌokꞌaa paji. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa warra oopiji Abrahammaa, ijãa bada perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooitꞌee ichia jaradakꞌa.
Mãpai Abraham eperã piudakꞌa baji mĩda, warrarã chokꞌara irudeepa uchiajida, lucero pajãde nɨ̃bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa pꞌusa ide ipu tau nãusaa nɨ̃bɨkꞌa.

Ma eperãarã jõmaarãpa ijãa pꞌanapachida ãchi piurutamaa, atꞌãri jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada teeitꞌee ãramaa unuda–e paji mĩda. Mamĩda ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, kꞌawa pꞌanajida Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooitꞌee ichia jaradakꞌa. Mapa o–ĩa kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri ãchia ne–inaa iru pꞌanadaitꞌee Akꞌõre juadeepa, apemaarãmaa jarajida ma eujã ãchi pꞌanadapꞌedaamãi wãara ãchide–e paji.
Mãga jarajida ɨtꞌaripema eujãde kꞌĩsia pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.
Ãchi uchiadapꞌedaa eujãde kꞌĩsia pꞌanadapꞌedaa paara, waya ãpɨtee wãkꞌajida.

Mamĩda wã kꞌinia pꞌanajida pꞌanapataade ɨtꞌaripema eujãde, mãgɨ́ na pꞌekꞌau eujã kꞌãyaara pipɨara bairã. Mãga kꞌĩsia pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra nejasia–e ãchi Akꞌõre Waibɨa paitꞌee. Irua ãra–itꞌee pꞌuuru oo iru bɨ ichi truade.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawaa kꞌinia baji Abrahampa irude wãara ijãa bɨ wa mãga–e. Maperã jaraji Abrahammaa chi warra Isaac peemerã mãikꞌaapa paamerã ichi–itꞌee.
Abrahampa ijãa bada perã, mãgá peeitꞌee paji chi warra apai Sara ome iru bada, Tachi Akꞌõrepa aɨ naaweda Abrahammaa jaraji mĩda:
‘Mɨa Isaacdeepa uchiadaitꞌeerã pia akꞌɨitꞌee pɨ mɨde ijãapari perã.’
Abrahampa ijãaji Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperã piuda chokꞌai pꞌirabaipii. Wãara mãga pɨkꞌa baji Isaac ome. Piuda pꞌirabaidakꞌa baji, chi akꞌõrepa peei naaweda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa peenaapáde ada perã.
Isaacpa ijãa bada perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapidakꞌa jaraji Jacobmaa mãikꞌaapa Esaumaa. Ɨtꞌaa iidiji Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jacob Esaú ome pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã.
Jacobpa Akꞌõrede ijãa bada perã, ichi piutꞌee pakꞌãri, ɨtꞌaa iidiji Tachi Akꞌõrepa José warrarã bendiciamerã. Chonaa bada perã, ichi bordonde tꞌɨdɨkꞌaji mãga ookꞌãri.

Josepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada ijãada perã, ichi piutꞌee pakꞌãri, chi arii pꞌanadapꞌedaarãmaa jaraji Israel pidaarã Egipto eujãdeepa uchiadaitꞌee. Ichiaba jaraji mãga pꞌasakꞌãri, ãrapa ichi bɨɨrɨ aukꞌa ateedamerã.

Moisés akꞌõreerãpa ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, Moisés tꞌokꞌãri mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra wãree unudakꞌãri, atane õpee mera bɨjida. Rey pedee waaweeda–e paji, irua jaraji mĩda ɨmɨkꞌĩra warra chakꞌeerã jõmaweda peepiitꞌee.
Moisepa ijãa bada perã, chonaa pakꞌãri, Faraón kꞌau warrakꞌa pa kꞌinia–e paji.
Ma kꞌãyaara apemaarã Israel pidaarã chupɨria chitoonɨ ome aukꞌa ba kꞌinia baji mimia chaaree oomaa, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ode o–ĩa nipai kꞌãyaara.

Kꞌĩsiaji pipɨara bai chupɨria nɨ̃baitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõredeerã ome, nɨ pꞌanɨ misa Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëiitꞌee bɨ ãchi kꞌaripamerã, Egiptodepema ne–inaa pia iru bai kꞌãyaara. Mãga kꞌĩsiaji kꞌawa bada perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa teeitꞌeeda ada pipɨara bɨ.
Moisepa ijãa bada perã wãji Egipto eujãdeepa, rey kꞌĩrau bɨ waawee–ee. Kꞌawa baji Tachi Akꞌõre ichi ome bɨ, ichi taupa unu–e paji mĩda.
Moisepa ijãa bada perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa Israel pidaarã kꞌaripai, ãramaa Pascua fiesta oopiji. Mãgɨde oveja peepiji, maapꞌeda ãra te tꞌĩupata i chaa waa jĩapꞌepiji
Israel pidaarãpa ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, Mar Rojo pꞌoo bɨde wãyaajida eujã pania wẽe bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda Egipto pidaarã aukꞌa wãyaadaitꞌee pakꞌãri, jõma toida kꞌiniijida.

Israel pidaarãpa ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, ewari siete parumaa ewari chaa pꞌɨrrabaijida Jericó pꞌuuru ikꞌaawa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaradakꞌa oodamerã. Mãgá oodapꞌeda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa muralla choma ma pꞌuuru tꞌɨakꞌau bada baaipiji.

Prostituta Rahabpa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa bada perã, ichi temãi o–ĩa tꞌĩupiji Josuépa eperãarã omé pëida; ma pꞌuuru akꞌɨde chedapꞌedaarã. Maperã piu–e paji apemaarã ma pꞌuurude ijãadakꞌaa beerãkꞌa, Israel pidaarãpa ma pꞌuuru jõtꞌaa chedakꞌãri.
¿Kꞌãata waa jaraima? Pꞌoyaa jõma jara–e jua araa–e perã jaraitꞌee Gedeónpa ooda, Baracpa, Sansonpa, Jeftepa, Davidpa mãikꞌaapa Samuelpa oodapꞌedaa, Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa oodapꞌedaa paara.

Mãgɨɨrãpa ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi kꞌaripaji nãga oodamerã. Ũkꞌuru jura chõo pꞌoyaajida; awaraarãpa pia akꞌɨjida ãchi jua ekꞌari pꞌanadapꞌedaarã; awaraarãpa unujida Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooitꞌeeda ada ãchi chonaarã kꞌaripaitꞌee; awaraarãpa león itꞌai jɨ̃apijida, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripapꞌeda;

Awaraarã tꞌɨpɨtaudeepa paa–ee uchiajida; awaraarã chokꞌai uchiajida espadapa pee kꞌinia pꞌanadapꞌedaarã juadeepa; ũkꞌuru juatau tꞌũmaa pꞌanadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa juataura papiji; awaraarã Tachi Akꞌõrepa sõcharra papipꞌeda, chõojida ãchi kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã ome; ũkꞌuruurãpa ãchi eujãdeepa jërekꞌoojida awaraa eujãdepema chõode chedapꞌedaarãpa.
Ichiaba wẽraarã ũkꞌuruurãpa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, unujida ãchia kꞌinia iru pꞌanadapꞌedaa piudapꞌedaarã chokꞌai pꞌirabairuta.

Jõdee, ijãa pꞌanajida mĩda, ũkꞌuru piu kꞌachia piujida. Ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa mãgɨɨrã jita atadakꞌãri, mãgapachida: “Pëida–eda apachida, Cristode ijãa amaarutamaa”. Mamĩda mãga ooda–e paji. Maperã piujida. Ãchia kꞌawajida piudapꞌeda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi waya chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiitꞌee iru ome pꞌanapataadamerã, waa piuda–ee.
Ichiaba ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa ũkꞌuru ɨmɨkꞌĩraarãmaa ikꞌachia jarajida mãikꞌaapa wɨjida. Ma awara cadenapa jɨ̃dapꞌeda, carcelde tꞌɨ nɨ̃bɨjida.

Awaraarã mãupa batꞌa peejida maa–e pɨrã serruchopa esajĩakꞌa tꞌoopꞌe peejida. Ũkꞌuru peejida espadapa. Ũkꞌuru chupɨria oveja e maa–e pɨrã cabra e jɨ̃ nipapachida; jarra oopachida mãikꞌaapa chĩarapa ãra kꞌachia ooruta choopachida.

Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde ichita pꞌanadaikꞌaraa baji, ãchi ikꞌaawa pꞌanadapꞌedaarã kꞌãyaara pipɨara pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Mãga pꞌanajida Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Nipapachida eujã pania wẽe bɨde mãikꞌaapa mẽe, eera jẽra bɨmãi. Maapai pꞌanapachida yooro te uriade mãikꞌaapa mãu te uriade.
Ma jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, irua ãra kꞌaripaji mãikꞌaapa pia akꞌɨji. Mamĩda piudai naaweda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãramaa teeitꞌeeda ada maarepida unuda–e paji.

Irua kꞌinia baji ãrapa ne–inaa pipɨara iru pꞌanadamerã tachi ome aukꞌa. Iru ũraa chiwidi kꞌaurepa wẽpapiji ãrapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa tachide ome aukꞌa, jõmaweda pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanadamerã ichi kꞌĩrapite.

Mãpai ma ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaarã chokꞌaraarãpa tachi akꞌɨmaa pꞌanadairã Akꞌõre truadeepa, pꞌanapataadáma ãra pꞌanapatapꞌedaakꞌa. Ara pꞌirapataarã jĩpꞌa pꞌirapatakꞌa panadaitꞌee ãchi pꞌira wãrutamaa, mãga pɨkꞌa Cristode ijãadáma. Oo amaadáma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi–e bɨ. Jĩpꞌa oodáma Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, irumaa pꞌananaruta misa.

Mãga oo pꞌanɨde kꞌĩsiadáma Jesucristode, irua naapɨara ijãa bada perã ichi piurumaa. Ɨ̃rá ichia mãgá tachi kꞌaripapari, pipɨara ijãa wãdamerã piurutamaa. Ichi kurusode chupɨria piukꞌãri, kꞌĩra nejasia–e paji mãgá piutꞌee, kꞌawa bada perã chupɨria nɨ̃bapꞌeda, o–ĩa baitꞌee. Mãgá ɨ̃rá su–akꞌɨ bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre su–akꞌɨ beepari juaraare.

Parãpa kꞌĩsiadaipia bɨ Jesús chupɨria nɨ̃bada ijãadakꞌaa beerã kꞌaurepa. Ãchia ijãadaamaa pꞌanajida irua ooda unudakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa irua jarada ũridakꞌãri. Mãgá oojida mĩda, iru choopachi. Mãgá parã aukꞌa choodaipia bɨ irude ijãa pꞌanɨde. Sẽdaikꞌaraa bɨ mãikꞌaapa pꞌoyaa choo–eda adaikꞌaraa bɨ.
Parã mãgá choo jõnɨde, waide pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopi kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrãpa parã peeda–e pꞌanɨ Jesús peedapꞌedaakꞌa.
¿Kꞌĩra atua pꞌanɨkꞌã Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã ũraada, eperãpa chi warra ũraa bɨkꞌa? Iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Warra, pia kꞌĩsíaji Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarateekꞌãri ɨtrɨa pɨkꞌa bɨde. Irua kꞌirãpapikꞌãri pɨa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata, kꞌĩra pia–ee beenáaji.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgá ɨtrɨa pɨkꞌa bɨde akꞌɨpipari pɨ kꞌinia iru bɨ mãikꞌaapa wɨmaa pɨkꞌa bɨde miapikꞌãri, akꞌɨpipari wãara pɨ ichi warra.’

Mapa choo pꞌanadaipia bɨ mia jõnɨde, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarateemaa bairã na eujãdepema akꞌõrepa ooparikꞌa. Mãga oopari ichia kꞌinia bɨta oo kꞌawaadamerã. Na eujãdepema akꞌõreerãpa ãchi warrarã ũraapata mãikꞌaapa ɨtrɨapata ne–inaa kꞌachia oodakꞌãri.
Mãgá ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopari. Mãga oo–e pɨrã, parã ichi warrarã–e; jĩpꞌa awaraa akꞌõredepema.

Tachi kꞌaipee pꞌanadakꞌãri, akꞌõreerãpa ɨtrɨapachida ne–inaa kꞌachia oodakꞌãri. Mapa tachia ãra waawee pꞌanapachida. Mãgá bɨ pɨrã akꞌõreerã na eujãdepema ome, Tachi Akꞌõre audupɨara waaweedaipia bɨ irua tachi wɨmaa pɨkꞌa iru bakꞌãri, iru ome ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee perã.

Taarã–e nɨde tachi kꞌaipee weda tachi akꞌõreerãpa ũraapachida mãikꞌaapa ɨtrɨapachida tachimaa ne–inaa oopi kꞌinia pꞌanadakꞌãri. Jõdee Tachi Akꞌõrépata ichita pia ũraapari mãikꞌaapa ɨtrɨapari pipɨara pꞌanapataadamerã, tꞌãri pia ichikꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi ɨtrɨamaa bɨ misa, kꞌĩra pia–ee pꞌanapata. Mamĩda ma tꞌẽepai pia kꞌĩsia pꞌaneedakꞌãri, oo kꞌawaa wãpata irua oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa kꞌãiwee pꞌanapata.
Maperã tꞌãridepai choopatáatɨ ijãa pꞌanɨde. Parã ũkꞌuru pꞌirapataarã́kꞌata pꞌanɨ. Mãɨrã ĩyapaadaidakꞌãri, juatau tꞌũmaadaipata mãikꞌaapa bɨɨrɨ wëredaipata. ¡Mãgá pꞌananáatɨ!
Ma kꞌãyaara naawedapema oodapꞌedaakꞌa pia oopatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parãmaa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, pia ijãada–e pꞌanɨɨrã pia ijãapidai. Parãpa oo pꞌanapatakꞌa ãchia aukꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌanadai.

Jɨrɨdaipia bɨ kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadaitꞌee jõmaarã ome mãikꞌaapa oo pꞌanapatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãga oodaipia bɨ kꞌawa pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa ooda–e pꞌanɨɨrã irumaa pꞌoyaa wãda–e.

¡Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai ijãa amaa pꞌaneedai Akꞌõrepa Jesucristo pëida, ichia tachi kꞌinia iru bairã! Ichiaba apidaapa ũridaikꞌaraa bɨ ijãa amaapi kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrãpa jaratee pꞌanɨ Jesucristopa oodade. Ma jaratee pꞌanɨ neera kꞌachíakꞌata bɨ, todakꞌãri, chokꞌara peepari perã.

Apida awaraa ome kꞌãikꞌaraa bɨ, miakꞌãi–e bɨ pɨrã. Ichiaba oodaikꞌaraa bɨ Esaúpa oodakꞌa. Ichia Tachi Akꞌõre waaweekꞌaa paji. Jacobmaa teeji chi akꞌõre netꞌaa ataitꞌee pada mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pia akꞌɨitꞌee pada, warra naapema pada perã. Mãga teeji chikꞌo pꞌaratꞌu abaa pari.

Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ma tꞌẽepai pia kꞌĩsiakꞌãri, chi akꞌõrepa teeitꞌee pada netꞌaa audú ata kꞌinia baji mãikꞌaapa audú kꞌinia baji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi pia akꞌɨmerã. Mamĩda audupai jẽeji mĩda, mãga uchia–e paji, aɨ naaweda chi akꞌõrepa jarada perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapidakꞌa; Jacob pipɨara akꞌɨitꞌee Esaú kꞌãyaara.

¡Kꞌĩsíatɨ! Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa chiwidi kꞌaurepa, parã iru kꞌaitꞌaara wãpata Israel pidaarã wãdapꞌedaa kꞌãyaara, irua Moisemaa jarada kꞌaurepa. Naaweda irua Moisemaa pedeeji ee ɨtꞌɨa bɨdeepa, mama bada perã. Maapai tachi chonaarã mãgɨ́ ee ɨtꞌɨa bɨ kꞌaitꞌa wãdapꞌeda, tꞌɨpɨtau ɨtꞌaa urua nɨ̃bɨkꞌa unujida. Ichiaba unujida pꞌãriu jɨ̃ararakꞌa ma ee aneu cheru. Ma awara ũrijida nãumia pururua nɨ̃bɨ mãikꞌaapa pa jĩwaa nɨ̃bɨ.

Mãga unudakꞌãri, ichiaba ũrijida trompeta jĩwaa nɨ̃bɨ mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre ãchimaa pedeemaa bɨ. Chi mãga ũridapꞌedaarã audú pꞌera jõnɨpa chupɨria iidijida Moisemaa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchimaa waa pedeenaamerã.
Mãga oojida pꞌoyaa chooda–e pada perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarakꞌãri:
‘Chi tꞌɨaru na eede, ne–animal paara, peetꞌáatɨ mãupa.’
Ma ewate jõmaarãta pꞌera para baji. Mapa Moisepa pida mãgaji:
‘Mɨ audú pꞌera nɨ̃bɨda aji.’

Jõdee mãga–e parã ome. Jĩpꞌa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa bɨde kꞌaitꞌa wã pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre bɨmaa ɨtꞌaripema eede tꞌɨ̃jarapata Sión mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre, chi ichita chokꞌai bɨ, kꞌĩrapite panapata ɨtꞌaripema pꞌuuru Jerusalende. Mama unu pꞌanɨ angeleerã cho–kꞌara see jõnɨ, o–ĩa kꞌari para bɨ.

Ichiaba mama unu pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã, chi ɨtꞌari tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã jẽra bɨɨrã. Mãgɨɨrã jõma Tachi Akꞌõre warra naapemaarãkꞌa, Jesucristode ijãapata perã. Mama ichiaba unu pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa pia mãikꞌaapa kꞌachia oopata akꞌɨpari. Ma awara unu pꞌanɨ chonaarãwedapema ijãa pꞌanapatapꞌedaarã, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanɨ Cristo kꞌaurepa.

Mama unu pꞌanɨ Jesús, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëida ichi ũraa chiwidi jaramerã. Mama iru waa jĩapꞌeda kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõre bɨmãi, parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanɨ iru kꞌĩrapite. Ma waa awara bɨ Abel waa kꞌãyaara. Tachi Akꞌõrepa Abel waa unukꞌãri, chi Abel peeda kꞌachia oo kꞌinia baji. Mamĩda Cristo waa unukꞌãri, irude ijãapataarã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapida perã mãgɨ́ waapa, kꞌachia oo kꞌiniakꞌaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa.

Mapa parãpa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa ũridaipia bɨ. Ma ee ɨtꞌɨa bɨdeepa pedeekꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa chupɨria kꞌawa–e paji pɨrã ichi ũraa ũridaamaa pꞌanadapꞌedaarã, audupɨara tachi iru juadeepa uchiada–e pai, ũridaamaa pꞌanɨ pɨrã iru ũraa jara pëida ɨtꞌariipa ichi Warra kꞌapꞌɨa pari.
Ma ewate Tachi Akꞌõrepa pedeekꞌãri, eujã wëre jira ataji. Mamĩda ɨ̃rapema ewari jara bɨ:
‘Ewari cherude eujã waya wëre jira ataitꞌeeda a bɨ, pajã paara.’

Mãgɨ́ pedee waya jara kꞌinia bɨ ma wëre jira atarude Tachi Akꞌõrepa jõtꞌaaitꞌee ichia ooda na pꞌekꞌau eujãde nɨ̃bɨ mãikꞌaapa pajãde nɨ̃bɨ. Jõdee ne–inaa ɨtꞌaripema mãikꞌaapa ichide ijãapataarã ichiakꞌau bɨitꞌee.

Mãgá tachi, Tachi Akꞌõre trua wërekꞌaade pꞌanadaitꞌee perã, gracias jaradáma irumaa mãikꞌaapa oodáma irua oopi bɨkꞌa, tꞌãripa mãga oo kꞌinia pꞌanadairã. Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõre waaweedáma, irua mãga kꞌinia bairã.
Ma jõma oodáma Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa ũri kꞌiniadakꞌaa pꞌanɨɨrã kꞌachia ooitꞌee perã. Ooitꞌee tꞌɨpɨtaupa ne–inaa paa jõtꞌaaparikꞌa.
Chikꞌinia pꞌanapatáatɨ. Mãga pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ Cristode ijãapataarã, iru kꞌaurepa ɨ̃pemaarã pꞌanadairã.
Parãmaa te iidi chedakꞌãri, wãakꞌanáatɨ. Tachi chonaarãpa te wãakꞌada–ee, tꞌĩupipachida ãchi temãi pacherutaarãmaa. Ũkꞌuruurãpa kꞌawada–ee, angeleerã kꞌãipijida.

Kꞌirãpátɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripapatáatɨ carcelde pꞌanɨɨrã Cristo kꞌaurepa. Chupɨria kꞌawáatɨ parã jida mãga pꞌaneedai perã. Ichiaba ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa parã kꞌõpꞌãyoorã miapi pꞌanadakꞌãri Cristo kꞌaurepa, kꞌaripapatáatɨ, parã jida mãga pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.

Miakꞌãi pꞌanɨɨrã awaraarã ome kꞌãináatɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bairã chi miakꞌãidapa awaraa iru baikꞌaraa bɨ. Ichiaba tuu bɨpa awaraarã jɨrɨikꞌaraa bɨ mãɨrã ome kꞌãiitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõrepa chi mãga oo pꞌanɨɨrã kꞌachia ooitꞌeeda a bɨ.
Pꞌaratꞌa waibɨa ichita jɨrɨnáatɨ waa kꞌinia bairã. O–ĩa pꞌanátɨ pãchia iru pꞌanɨ omepai, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bairã:
‘Mɨa pɨ akꞌɨ amaa–e. Ewari apida ituaba atabëi–e.’
Mapa waawee–ee tachia jaradaipia bɨ:
‘Tachi Akꞌõrépata mɨ kꞌaripapari. Mapa mɨa eperãarã jua waawee–e bɨ.’

Naawedapema jarateepataarã kꞌirãpátɨ. Mãgɨɨrãpa ãchi piurutamaa ijãapachida Jesucristopapai eperãarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atai. Mãga parãmaa pia jarateepachida, aukꞌa ijãa pꞌanapataadamerã. Mapa ãrakꞌa ijãapatáatɨ.
Jesucristo awara pa–e paitꞌee. Naawedapemaarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji, ɨ̃rapemaarã aukꞌa kꞌaripapari mãikꞌaapa waide tꞌoda–e pꞌanadaitꞌeerã aukꞌa kꞌaripaitꞌee.

Parãmaa naawedapema jarateepataarãpa jarapachida Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesucristo pëiji eperãarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atade, tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã. Ma wãara perã, tꞌãripa waapɨara ijãadáma irude. Ijãanáatɨ awaraa ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo jarateepataarã pedee. Mãɨrãpa jara pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã kꞌaripapari kꞌo pꞌanadairã ne–animalaarã peedapꞌeda, paadapꞌedaa altarde. Mamĩda mãga oo bɨpa apida pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bakꞌaa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa oo pꞌanɨɨrãpa pꞌoyaa kꞌawada–e Cristopa ãchi pari kurusode ooda.

Ma jara bɨkꞌa oodakꞌãri, pꞌaareerã poro waibɨapa ne–animal waa atapꞌeda, ateepari ma cuarto edupɨara bɨde Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨade. Mãgɨ́ waa bɨpari Tachi Akꞌõre bɨmãi eperãarã miapinaamerã ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa. Mamĩda ma ne–animal peeda kꞌapꞌɨa pꞌuurudeepa taawaa ateepata paadaitꞌee.

Jõdee Jesús pꞌuurudeepa taawaa ateejida mãikꞌaapa mama miapijida piurumaa. Mãgá piuda perã eperãarã pari, ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa wẽpapiji ichi waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa. Mãga ooji ãchi pꞌekꞌau wẽe pꞌaneedamerã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.

Moisepa pꞌãdade jara bɨ kꞌachia baji piutꞌee pꞌuurude taawa. Mãga baji mĩda, Cristo mãgá piuji kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Mamĩda irua mãgɨde kꞌĩsia–e paji kꞌawa bada perã piutꞌee tachi pari. Mapa wãdáma iru ome pꞌuurudeepa taawaa pɨkꞌa. Uchiadáma ma chonaarãwedapema ũraa jua ekꞌariipa pꞌananadaitꞌee ũraa chiwidi jua ekꞌari, tachi kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanɨ mĩda Cristo iru pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa. Kꞌĩsiada–ee, waapɨara irude ijãadáma.
Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌuuru apida ichita ba–e paitꞌee. Maperã tachia kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ ɨtꞌaripema pꞌuuru kꞌĩra wãreede. Mamata pꞌanapataadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre ome.
Mãpai Jesucristo mãgá piuda perã tachi pari mãikꞌaapa tachi kꞌaripapari perã, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa bɨde ipꞌii jaradáma: “Akꞌõre, pɨ ichita tꞌãri pia bapari, Jesús tai kꞌaripamerã pëida perã.”
Ichiaba kꞌĩra atuanáatɨ chikꞌaripa pꞌanapataadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa wẽe beerãmaa teedaitꞌee pãchia iru pꞌanɨ netꞌaadepema, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgata kꞌinia bairã. Mãga oodakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌãri o–ĩapidai.

Ma awara oopatáatɨ pãchi akꞌɨpataarãpa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa, ãchia parã akꞌɨ pꞌanadairã mãikꞌaapa parã kꞌaripa pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa kꞌawaadamerã. Ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa pꞌanɨde ãrápata jaradaitꞌee ãchia parã akꞌɨ pꞌanadapꞌedaa mãikꞌaapa parãpa oodapꞌedaa. Maperã oo pꞌanɨ pɨrã ãchia jara pꞌanɨkꞌa, ãchi o–ĩa pꞌanadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, parãpa ijãapata perã. Mamĩda mãga ooda–e pɨrã, ãchi kꞌĩsia pꞌua pꞌanadaitꞌee iru kꞌĩrapite.

Ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa tai pari. Taipa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ irua pia pꞌanautꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõrepa tai kꞌĩsia pꞌua kꞌĩsiapi–e, irua oopi bɨkꞌa oo pꞌanadairã mãikꞌaapa mãga oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ jai–idaarutamaa.
Ichiaba mɨa enenee nɨ̃bɨ ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadamerã mɨ pari Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨ kꞌaripamerã, waya isapai wã kꞌinia bairã parã akꞌɨde.

Tachi Akꞌõrépata tachi kꞌãiwee pꞌanapipari. Jesús waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa ichia eperãarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiji, mãikꞌaapa Jesucristo chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiji. Maapꞌeda ichi ũraa chiwidi kꞌaurepa Cristo bɨji tachi akꞌɨpari waibɨa, irude ijãapataarã ichita akꞌɨ bamerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripamerã, oveja akꞌɨparipa ichi ovejaarã akꞌɨparikꞌa.

Ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa bɨde parã pari mɨa jara bɨ: “Akꞌõre, ãra pia akꞌɨ baparíiji, pɨa oopi bɨkꞌa oo kꞌawaa wãdamerã. Tachia mãgá oodai mãikꞌaapa pɨ tꞌãri o–ĩapidai Jesucristopa kꞌaripakꞌãri. Akꞌõre, ¡irua pɨ kꞌĩra wãree ichita iru bapariitꞌee! ¡Amén!”
Ɨ̃pemaarã, mɨa kꞌinia bɨ parãpa na kꞌartꞌa pia leedamerã mãikꞌaapa aɨde jara bɨkꞌa oodamerã. Na kꞌartꞌa makꞌɨara teesoo–e bɨ, ne–inaa waa atꞌãri pꞌãi paraa perã.
Mɨa parãmaa kꞌawapi kꞌinia bɨ tachi ɨ̃pema Timoteo uchiaji carceldeepa. Nama mɨ bɨmãi isapai pacheru pɨrã, iru ome parã akꞌɨde wãitꞌee.
Salude téetɨ parã akꞌɨpataarãmaa mãikꞌaapa awaraa Cristode ijãapataarãmaa. Italiadepema ijãapataarãpa parãmaa salude tee pëiruta.
Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã jõmaweda pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã.
Mãgapai paji.

Mɨ, Santiagopa oopari Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Na kꞌartꞌa pëiru parã Israeldeepa uchiadapꞌedaa ëreerã docedepema ijãapataarãmaa, tꞌɨmɨ́ na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ chaa. Pia pꞌanátɨ.
Ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, parã nepɨrade pꞌanadakꞌãri maa–e pɨrã chupɨria jõnadakꞌãri, waapɨara Cristode o–ĩa ijãa pꞌanátɨ.
Mãgá choodakꞌãri, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo choodai.

Mãgá choo pꞌanɨ misa, ichiakꞌau Tachi Akꞌõremaa oopítɨ irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mãgá parãpa ne–inaa apida faltada–e paitꞌee irua oopi kꞌinia bɨ parãmaa. Pia kꞌĩsiapataadai mãikꞌaapa jõma pia oopataadai, irua kꞌaripa bairã.

Mamĩda parãdepemapa kꞌawa–e bɨ pɨrã kꞌãata ooipia bɨ chupɨria nɨ̃bɨde, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃́ji Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawapimerã. Tachia chupɨria iidiruta pɨrã, iru kꞌĩrau–epɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌaripaitꞌeepɨ, ne–inaa jõmaade tachi kꞌaripa kꞌinia bapari perã.

Mapa Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃kꞌãri, ijã́aji wãara irua ooitꞌee pɨa iidi bɨkꞌa. Kꞌĩsianáaji: “¿Mɨa oo kꞌinia baikꞌã irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa wa mãga–e?” Mãgee eperã kꞌĩsia nãga bɨ: ara pꞌusa abaamãi bakꞌáakꞌata bɨ.
Mãgee eperãpa ijãa–e Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi kꞌaripai.
Idi ne–inaa aba ijãapari mãikꞌaapa nu ne–inaa awaraa ijãapari. Kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa ijãakꞌaa.

Piara kꞌawaadamerã sãga oodaipia bɨ chupɨria jõnɨde, parãmaa nãga nepɨrɨitꞌee. Ijãapari aba chupɨria bɨ pɨrã pꞌaratꞌa wẽe, o–ĩa baipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru aukꞌa pia akꞌɨpari perã apemaarã ijãapataarãkꞌa. Ma awara o–ĩa baipia bɨ ɨtꞌari banaitꞌee perã.
Jõdee ijãapari pꞌaratꞌara bɨ o–ĩa baikꞌaraa bɨ pꞌaratꞌara bairã. Eperã pꞌaratꞌara bɨ taarã chookꞌaa, nepꞌono ewaraade bɨkꞌa.

Mãgee nepꞌono pi–ia bɨ tꞌokꞌãri tapꞌeda. Mamĩda aɨ ɨ̃rɨ akꞌõrejĩru jẽra nɨ̃beekꞌãri, pɨɨdaipari wãsiapa. Taarã–e nɨde ma nepꞌono pi–ia jõdaipari. Mãga pɨkꞌa bɨ eperã pꞌaratꞌara bee. Mimia oomaa pꞌanɨde pida, jõma ãchia iru pꞌanɨ jõdarii.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa o–ĩapipari eperã chupɨria nɨ̃bɨde maa–e pɨrã nepɨrade nɨ̃bɨde, chookꞌãri Cristode ijãa bairã. Mãgá chookꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma eperãmaa ɨtꞌaripema poro jɨ̃ra teeitꞌee; pia jaraitꞌeera, ichita ichi ome bapiitꞌee. Ichia mãga oopari jõma ichi kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨɨrã ome, chonaarãweda mãga jarada perã.

Mamĩda mãgá nepɨrade jõnɨde abaapa kꞌĩsiaru pɨrã kꞌachia ooitꞌee, jaraikꞌaraa bɨ: “Tachi Akꞌõrépata mãga oopi bɨ”. Mãga jaraikꞌaraa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsiakꞌaa perã ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee. Ma awara eperãmaa mãga kꞌĩsiapikꞌaa.
Jĩpꞌa tachi tꞌãrideepata kꞌĩsia kꞌachia uchiapari. Maapꞌeda ne–animal trampade tꞌĩuparikꞌa carnada kꞌoitꞌee, mãga pɨkꞌa eperã ichia kꞌĩsia kꞌachia oo kꞌiniadaikꞌãri,
ma ne–inaa kꞌachia oopari. Chi mãga ooyaa bɨ atuaitꞌee.
Maperã ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, pãchi itu kꞌũrapináatɨ. Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai kꞌĩsiadai Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsiapii ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee.

Mãga–epɨ. Tachia ne–inaa pia jõmaweda iru pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌaurepata iru pꞌanɨ. Irua ooji akꞌõrejĩru, atane mãikꞌaapa lucero. Mãgɨ́ edaare ɨ̃daapata, edaare ɨ̃daadakꞌaa. Tachi Akꞌõre mãga bada paara, edaare kꞌĩsiapikꞌaji kꞌachia ooitꞌee; edaare kꞌĩsiapikꞌaji pia ooitꞌee. Mamĩda mãga–e. Ichita pia oopari.

Mãgá pia oopari perã, apemaarãpa irude waide ijãadai naaweda, tachi judiorãmaa kꞌawapiji ichia wãarata jara pëida, ma ũraa wãarade ijãadapꞌeda, atuanaadamerã. Mãga ooji kꞌinia bairã ichi kꞌĩrapite pia nipadamerã.
Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga ooda perã tachi–itꞌee, kꞌɨɨrɨ ẽesaa pꞌanátɨ iru ũraa ũridamerã. Mamĩda pia kꞌĩsíatɨ pedeedai naaweda. Ma awara isapai kꞌĩraunáatɨ.
Mɨa mãga jara bɨ chi isapai kꞌĩrauyaa bɨpa ookꞌaa perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Maperã kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo kꞌĩsia amáatɨ. Pꞌananáatɨ naaweda pꞌanapatapꞌedaakꞌa, waide ijãada–e pꞌanadakꞌãri. Ma kꞌãyaara audua–ee óotɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Ichiaba kꞌĩsiapatáatɨ irua wãarata jara pëidade, ma kꞌaurepata ijãapata perã mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa wãdaitꞌee perã.

Mãga ooda–e pɨrã, pãchi kꞌinia ijãa pꞌanɨ́kꞌata bɨ. Mɨa mãga jara bɨ ũkꞌuruurãpa kꞌĩsiadai perã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa ũri bɨpapai oo pꞌanɨ irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda pãchi itu kꞌũrapi pꞌanɨ. Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa ũridakꞌãri, oodaipia bɨ irua jara bɨkꞌa.
Chi mãga oo–e bɨpa ara eperãpa espejode ichi kꞌĩra akꞌɨparíkꞌata bɨ.
Jãgɨ́ eperã espejode akꞌɨ bakꞌãri, ichi kꞌĩra pia unupari. Mamĩda ma espejodeepa ãyaa wãkꞌãri, espejode unuda kꞌĩra atuadaipari.

Mãga pɨkꞌa bɨ eperã ome Akꞌõre Ũraa ũrikꞌãri. Ũrii Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichimaa oopi kꞌinia bɨ. Mamĩda, aɨ tꞌẽepai ichia ũrida kꞌĩra atuadaru pɨrã, oo–e pai Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Jõdee chi ooparipa Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa nãga bɨ. Tachi Akꞌõrepa Ũraa Pia jara pëida Cristode ũrikꞌãri, aɨde kꞌĩsia wãpari mãikꞌaapa Cristode ijãapari. Kꞌĩra atua–ee mãgɨ́ jara pëida, Cristopata kꞌaripapari perã ichia oomerã ma ũraade jara bɨkꞌa. Mãga ookꞌãri, tꞌãri o–ĩa bapariitꞌee.

Eperãpa kꞌĩsiai Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oo bɨ, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pari perã maa–e pɨrã primisia teepari perã. Mamĩda ikꞌachia pedeeru pɨrã awaraarã ãpɨte maa–e pɨrã audua pedeeru pɨrã, ichi itu kꞌũramaa bɨ, wãara Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oo–e bairã.
Wãara Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa ooparipa ooamaa bapari ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa kꞌachia oopata kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo. Ma awara kꞌaripapari akꞌõre wẽe beerã mãikꞌaapa pꞌẽtrãa beerã ãchi chupɨria jõnɨde.

Ɨ̃pemaarã, parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ netꞌaa jõma Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo jua ekꞌari nɨ̃bɨ. Iruata Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree iru bɨ. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨta mãikꞌaapa irude ijãa pꞌanɨta, ¿sãapꞌeda parãpa aba kꞌiniara iru pꞌanapatama apemaarã kꞌãyaara? Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga oopikꞌaa.
¿Sãga pakꞌajima parãpa mɨa jararukꞌa oodapꞌedaa paara? Parã cheepurudakꞌãri ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daitꞌee, pachei aba pꞌaratꞌara bɨ mãikꞌaapa aba chupɨria bɨ.

Chi pꞌaru pi–ia jɨ̃ bɨ mãikꞌaapa sortija nẽedee jɨ̃ bɨ pipɨara akꞌɨdai chi pꞌaru sore jɨ̃ bɨ kꞌãyaara. Jaradai ma pꞌaratꞌara bɨmaa: “Nama su–akꞌɨ ba chéji su–akꞌɨ beepata pipɨara bɨde.” Jõdee ma chupɨria chɨmaa jaradai: “Jãma bainɨ̃ banáji, maa–e pɨrã jãma su–akꞌɨ banáji.”

Mãga oodapꞌedaa paara, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa ooda–e pꞌanakꞌajida. Mapa parãpa mãgá oo pꞌanɨ pɨrã, pia ooda–e pꞌanɨ. Cristo Tachi Waibɨada a pꞌanɨ mĩda, jara pꞌanɨ chisãgɨta kꞌiniadaipia bɨ apemaarã kꞌãyaara. Mãga oodakꞌãri, kꞌachia kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ.

Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, ¡ũrítɨ! Tachi Akꞌõrepa audú jɨrɨtꞌerajipɨ chupɨria chedeerã, Cristode ijãadapꞌeda, o–ĩa pꞌanapataadamerã na pꞌekꞌau eujãde, kꞌawa pꞌanadairã irua ãchi kꞌaripapari. Ma awara ãchi jɨrɨtꞌeraji ɨtꞌaa wãdamerã. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga oopari ãchi–itꞌee mãikꞌaapa jõma iru kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨɨrã–itꞌee, chonaarãweda mãga jarada perã.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgá chupɨria beerã jɨrɨtꞌeraji mĩda, parãpa pꞌaratꞌara beerã pipɨara akꞌɨpata chupɨria beerã kꞌãyaara. ¿Kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã pꞌaratꞌara beerã́pata parã chupɨria oo iru pꞌanapata mãikꞌaapa charraarã kꞌĩrapite atadaipata?

Ma awara ãchia Jesucristo tꞌɨ̃ ichi kꞌinia ikꞌachia jarapata. Mãga oopata Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa jõmaarãmaa pia oopari mĩda. ¡Iru tꞌɨ̃deta parã poro choopijida! Mãga bɨta, ¿sãga ãrata pipɨara akꞌɨdaima chupɨria beerã kꞌãyaara?
Ma kꞌãyaara oodaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ũraa waibɨara bɨde jara bɨkꞌa ichi ũraa pꞌãpidade:
‘Awaraarã kꞌinia iru baparíiji pɨchi kꞌapꞌɨa kꞌinia iru baparikꞌa.’

Mãgá parãpa eperãarã ũkꞌuru akꞌɨ pꞌanɨ pɨrã pãchi kꞌapꞌɨa akꞌɨpatakꞌa, mamĩda mãga ooda–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã jõmaarã ome, kꞌachiata oomaa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Mãgá oodakꞌãri, ooda–e pꞌanɨ iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa.
Eperãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa Ũraa jaradadepema aba oo–e pɨrã, ichita iru ũraade jara bɨkꞌa jõmaweda oo–e bɨ.
Iruata jaraji:
‘Miakꞌãi bɨ awaraarã ome kꞌãináaji.’
Ichiaba jaraji:
‘Eperã peenáaji.’
Mapa awaraa jɨrɨ–e pɨjida, eperã peeru pɨrã, ichita oo–e bɨ jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa.

Mamĩda parãpa Cristode ijãadakꞌãri, ma ũraa pꞌãda jua ekꞌariipa uchiajida. Mapa parãpa pia pedeedaipia bɨ awaraarãde mãikꞌaapa jõmaarã aukꞌa akꞌɨdaipia bɨ, ewari cherude Tachi Akꞌõrepa akꞌɨitꞌee perã ichide ijãapataarãpa oopatapꞌedaa mãikꞌaapa pedeepatapꞌedaa. Mãgá kꞌawaaitꞌee ichia jaradakꞌa oojida wa ooda–e paji.

Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa oopatapꞌedaa akꞌɨkꞌãri, chupɨria kꞌawa–e paitꞌee awaraarã chupɨria kꞌawada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaarã. Jõdee chupɨria kꞌawaaitꞌee awaraarã chupɨria kꞌawaadapꞌedaarã. Mãɨrã o–ĩa uchiadaitꞌee iru kꞌĩrapite, oodapꞌedaa perã irua jaradakꞌa.

Mãpai ɨ̃pemaarã, kꞌĩsíatɨ mɨa jararude. Eperãpa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa bɨda ai. Mamĩda mãgɨpa chĩara kꞌaripakꞌaa pɨrã Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, ichi kꞌinia mãga jara bɨ. Mãga jara bɨpapai ɨtꞌaa wã–e paitꞌee.
Pia jaraitꞌeera, ijãapari abaapa unuru pɨrã awaraa ijãapari pꞌaru wẽe bɨ jĩsua–itꞌee, mãikꞌaapa chikꞌo wẽe bɨ kꞌoitꞌee, ¿sãgakꞌajima nãga jarada paara?

“Pꞌaru mõtaapa pɨra béeji jĩsuapiamaapa mãikꞌaapa nekꞌóji bi jãwaa beerumaa. Maapꞌeda pia wã́ji Tachi Akꞌõre ome.” Mãga jara bɨde maarepida tee–e pɨrã ma ijãapari chupɨria chɨmaa, ¿kꞌãare piata baima? Ichi kꞌinia mãga jaraji.
Mãga pɨkꞌa bɨ chi jara bɨpa: “Mɨa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapari.” Mamĩda mãgɨ́ eperãpa ookꞌaa pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ichi ũraade, ma eperãpa ichi kꞌinia mãga jara bɨ.

Ewaa eperãpa jarai: “Pɨa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa bɨ mãikꞌaapa mɨa ne–inaa oopari irua jara bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda pɨa ne–inaa oo–e pɨrã irua jara bɨkꞌa, mãgara wãara ijãa–e bɨ. Jõdee mɨa mãgá irua jara bɨkꞌa oopari perã, pɨa kꞌawaai mɨa wãara ijãa bɨ.”

Kꞌawa bɨ pɨa ijãa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre apai. Wãarapɨ, mamĩda mãga ijãa bɨpa tachi ɨtꞌaa wã–e paitꞌee. Netuaraarãpa ichiaba mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda pꞌera pꞌanapata kꞌawa pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi kꞌachia ooitꞌee.
Pariatua kꞌĩsianáaji. Ma kꞌãyaara óoji Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Kꞌawáaji wãara Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa bɨpa oopari irua oopi bɨkꞌa.

Chonaarãweda aukꞌa mãga paji. Tachi chonaarãwedapema Abrahampa ichi warra ateeji ee nokꞌode bɨitꞌee altar ɨ̃rɨ mãikꞌaapa peeitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõrepa irumaa mãga jarada perã. Mãgá Abrahampa chi warra wãakꞌa–e pada perã, wãara pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe beeji Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Aɨ naaweda Abrahampa Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãaji. Mamĩda ichia ookꞌãri Akꞌõrepa jaradakꞌa, akꞌɨpiji wãara ijãa bɨ.
Ma awara mãga ookꞌãri, wãara uchiaji Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa:
‘Abrahampa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada ijãaji. Maperã Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru pia akꞌɨpachi.’
Abrahampa ichia wãara ijãada mãgá akꞌɨpida perã, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌõpꞌãyoda apachida.

Mãpai ɨ̃pemaarã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga ooda perã Abraham ome, parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨpari eperã irude wãara ijãa bɨ mãikꞌaapa irua jara bɨkꞌa oo bɨ. Mamĩda mãgá akꞌɨ–epɨ eperã irude ijãa bɨda apari, mãgɨpa oo–e bɨ pɨrã irua jara bɨkꞌa.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa Abraham ome oodakꞌa ichiaba ooji Rahab ome. Mãgɨ́ prostituta baji. Mamĩda Israel pidaarã chedakꞌãri iru baparimãi ma pꞌuuru akꞌɨde, irua ma Israel pidaarã kꞌaripaji ichi aukꞌaarãpa jita atanaadamerã. Mãga ooji Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa bada perã. Mãgá ooda perã mãikꞌaapa wãara ijãada perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ wẽra pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe akꞌɨji.
Mãpai ma jõma jara aupadade kꞌĩsiadakꞌãri, parãpa kꞌawaadai Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãa bɨda aparipa ookꞌaa pɨrã irua jara bɨkꞌa ichi ũraade, wãara ijãa–e bɨ. Iru tachi piuda kꞌapꞌɨ́akꞌata bɨ.

Ɨ̃pemaarã, parãdepema Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepari pa kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã, kꞌawaaipia bɨ apemaarã ijãapataarãpa oopatapꞌedaa akꞌɨi kꞌãyaara, Tachi Akꞌõrepa taipa oopatapꞌedaa audupɨara akꞌɨitꞌee jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Mãgá irua kꞌawaaitꞌee taipa jarateedapꞌedaakꞌa pꞌanapachida wa mãgá pꞌanadakꞌaa paji.

Mãga jara bɨ tai chi jarateepataarãpa chĩara kꞌĩraupidai perã taipa jarapata kꞌaurepa. Wãara tachi ijãapataarã jõmaarãpa edaare mãga oopata mãikꞌaapa awaraa ne–inaa kꞌachia pariatua oopata. Eperã pada paara chĩara kꞌĩraupikꞌaa ichi pedeepa, mãgɨpa awaraa ne–inaa kꞌachia apida ookꞌaa pakꞌaji.
Kꞌĩsiadáma nãgɨde. Ne–inaa ma–ãri hierrodee ooda caballo itꞌaide bɨpata. Mãgɨpa wãpipata chi wãpi kꞌiniamaa.

Ichiaba barco choma tokꞌesaa wãkꞌãri, nãupa golpe pꞌua nɨ̃bɨ mĩda ãyaa wãpiitꞌee, ma barco pꞌeraparipa ichia atee kꞌiniamaa ateepari chi timonpa. Mãga oopari ma barco kꞌãyaara timón ma–ãriara bɨ mĩda.
Mãga pɨkꞌa bɨ tachi kꞌĩrame ome. Tachi kꞌapꞌɨade ma–ãri bɨ mĩda, mãgɨpa ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo audua jarapata eperãarãpa. Ma awara kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tꞌɨpɨtau ma–ãriipa eujã ãree paatꞌaai.

Ma tꞌɨpɨtáukꞌata bɨ tachi kꞌĩrame. Tachi kꞌapꞌɨade ma–ãri bɨ mĩda, nepɨra waibɨade baaipipari mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopipari, madeepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema pedee kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo uchiapari perã. Ma awara madeepa netuarapa pedeepida uchiapari. Mapa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachi kꞌĩramepa mãgá nepɨrade baaipipariitꞌee tachi tꞌoru wedapema piurumaa.
Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ eperãarãpa taunomaapata nãgee ne–animalaarã mẽepema kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo: wãabaipata; eujãde nĩuteepata; eujãde bipa urtꞌĩu nĩuteepata; pꞌusa jãdepema; jãgee.

Mãga oopata mĩda ne–animalaarã ome, apidaapa ãchi kꞌĩradoopa kꞌĩrame pꞌoyaa tꞌɨdɨkꞌadakꞌaa. Mãga pꞌoyaada–e tachi kꞌĩramedeepa pedee kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo pariatua uchiapari perã. Madeepa uchiada pedee kꞌachia neera kꞌachíakꞌata bɨ, chĩara miapipari perã.

Tachi kꞌĩramepa pedee pia jarapari Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dakꞌãri. Mamĩda mãgɨpa ichiaba ikꞌachia pedee jarapari chĩaramaa. Mãgá pedee kꞌachia jaradakꞌãri awaraarãmaa, ikꞌachia jara pꞌanɨ́kꞌata bɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa, irua eperãarã jõma ooda perã.
Ɨ̃pemaarã, Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapataarã itꞌaideepa pedee pia pedee kꞌachia ome mãgá uchiaikꞌaraa bɨ.
Pania poatrɨ uchia bɨmãi eujã ekꞌariipa asia naapꞌee ome uchiakꞌaapɨ. Ichiaba pania kꞌɨyaa uchiaparimãiipa naapꞌee uchia–epɨ.

Ma awara higuera bɨɨrɨdeepa orodakꞌaa olivo, mãikꞌaapa uva kꞌarradeepa pꞌedakꞌaa higojõ. Mapa ɨ̃pemaarã, Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapataarãpa pedee kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo jaradaikꞌaraa bɨ; jĩpꞌa pia aupaita jarapataadaipia bɨ.

Parãdepema kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ pɨrã, kꞌawaa wãipia bɨ ooitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa mãga akꞌɨpiipia bɨ apemaarãmaa. Chĩara ome tꞌãri pia baipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripaipia bɨ, audua–ee. Mãgata pꞌanapata wãara kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerã.
Mamĩda mãga pꞌanapataadai kꞌãyaara, parãpa Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jaratee kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã apemaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara pa kꞌiniapa, wãara Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee kꞌĩsia atua pꞌanɨ, irua mãga oopikꞌaa perã.
Chi mãgá kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨɨrã ijãadakꞌaarã́kꞌapɨ kꞌĩsiapata, ãchia oo kꞌiniata oo kꞌinia pꞌanadairã. ¡Netuarapata mãgá kꞌĩsiapipari!

Eperã aba waibɨara pa kꞌinia bakꞌãri apemaarã kꞌãyaara, jõmaarãpa ichi pedee aupai ũridamerã, nãgee ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo ooi: nepɨra jɨrɨyaa bai, pedee audua bai, maa–e pɨrã apemaarã kꞌaripakꞌaa bai.

Mamĩda chi wãara kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa mãgá nipakꞌaapɨ. Ne–inaa awaraa kꞌãyaara jõma oopari oo kꞌinia bairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Nepɨra jɨrɨkꞌaa chĩara ome; jĩpꞌa kꞌãiwee bapari. Chĩara kꞌĩrau chokꞌakꞌaa mãikꞌaapa pia ũripari ne–inaa iidide chedakꞌãri. Kꞌĩrau–ee oopari ichi poropa oopi bɨkꞌa. Awaraarã chupɨria kꞌawaapari mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripapari. Eperã aba pipɨara akꞌɨkꞌaa apemaarã kꞌãyaara. Oopari ichia jara bɨkꞌa; seewata ne–inaa ookꞌaa. Mãgeepa ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopari chĩara kꞌaripaitꞌee.
Chi mãga ooparipa kꞌinia bapari jõmaarã kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadamerã ichikꞌa, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa apemaarã kꞌĩrapite. Mapa pia nipapari. Mãgá ichi ikꞌaawa pꞌanɨɨrã irukꞌa pꞌana kꞌiniadaipɨ.

Ma kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa bɨ mãga bapari mĩda, parãdepema chokꞌara kꞌãiwee pꞌanadakꞌaa. ¿Wãara–ekꞌã? Aupedee para bapari mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩrau para bapari, pãchi tꞌãride kꞌĩsia kꞌachia iru pꞌanadairã. ¿Kꞌãare kꞌaurepata mãga para bapari? ¿Pãchia oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa–ekꞌã?

Nãga oo pꞌanɨ. Parã waibɨara pa kꞌinia pꞌanapata apemaarã kꞌãyaara maa–e pɨrã chĩara netꞌaa kꞌɨ̃apata. Tꞌẽepai ma netꞌaa pꞌoyaa atada–e pakꞌãri, ma netꞌaa chipari kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌaneepata, peetꞌaa kꞌiniadarutamaa. Mãga oo pꞌanɨ mĩda, atadakꞌaa parãpa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ, Tachi Akꞌõremaa iididakꞌaa perã.
Jõdee Tachi Akꞌõremaa iididakꞌãri, pãchi–itꞌee aupaita iidipata. Mapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa teekꞌaa pãchia iidi pꞌanɨ, mãgá kꞌachia iidi pꞌanadairã.

Pãchia oo kꞌiniata oo kꞌinia pꞌanadairã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oo kꞌiniada–e. Ara wẽrapa chi kꞌima amaaparikꞌa awaraa ome banaitꞌee, mãga pɨkꞌa parãpa oodaamaa pꞌanɨ ne–inaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨ, oonadaitꞌee irude ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa oopatakꞌa. ¿Kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨkꞌã mãga oodakꞌãri, tꞌĩu pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã eere?
¿Kꞌãata kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨma? ¿Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ũraa pꞌãdade nãga pariatua jara bɨkꞌã?
‘Mɨa jaure bɨda eperã kꞌapꞌɨade kꞌinia bɨ mɨchi–itꞌee.’
¡Tachi Akꞌõrepa pariatua mãga jara–e paji!

Mãga jaraji tachi pia akꞌɨ kꞌinia bairã mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripa kꞌinia bairã. Mamĩda wãara kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã irua mãga oomerã, pãchia kꞌinia pꞌanɨ oo amaadaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa irua jara bɨkꞌa oodaipia bɨ. Mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripa–e audua pꞌanapataarã, mamĩda tꞌãri pia kꞌaripapari audua–ee beerã.’

Mapa ɨ̃pemaarã, oopítɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa irua oo kꞌinia bɨkꞌa pãchi tꞌãride mãikꞌaapa pãchi kꞌĩsiade. Ma awara netuarapa kꞌĩsia kꞌachia kꞌĩsiapikꞌãri, oonáatɨ ichia kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Ma kꞌãyaara chóotɨ mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃́tɨ. Mãgá oodakꞌãri, ma netuara ãyaa wãitꞌee.

Parãdepema ne–inaa kꞌachia oo pꞌanɨɨrãpa jarátɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa jõma kꞌachia oodapꞌedaa, irua mãgɨ́ wẽpapikꞌoomerã. Maapꞌeda kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo amáatɨ. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, irumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dakꞌãri, irua waya ũriipɨ. Ichiaba pariatua kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨɨrãpa mãga oodaipia bɨ. Mãgeerã eda kꞌĩsiapata “mɨa ooitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa” mãikꞌaapa eda kꞌĩsiapata “mɨa ooitꞌee mɨchia oo kꞌiniata”. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgá pariatua kꞌĩsiapikꞌaa.

Parã wãara pia nipa kꞌinia pꞌanɨ pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, kꞌĩsíatɨ pãchia oopatapꞌedaade. Maapꞌeda kꞌĩsia pꞌua pꞌanátɨ. Ëidai kꞌãyaara, tꞌãri pꞌua pꞌanátɨ mãikꞌaapa jẽ́etɨ, pãchia kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa.
Mãga ooruta pɨrã, Tachi Akꞌõremaa akꞌɨpidai wãara oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ irua jara bɨkꞌa. Ma awara mãgá oodakꞌãri, irua parã pia akꞌɨi.

Mamĩda ɨ̃pemaarã, kꞌĩrakꞌaupai chĩara ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia pedeedai, kꞌĩsia pꞌanadairã ãchia ooda–e pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãpidade jara bɨkꞌa. Mãgá eperãpa pedee kꞌachia pedeekꞌãri, ichiaba oo–e bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa, ichi ũraade jara bairã chĩara ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia pedeeikꞌaraa bɨ. Ma awara ijãapataarãpa mãga oodakꞌãri, akꞌɨpipata kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ ãchia Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌãyaara pipɨara kꞌawa pꞌanɨ chĩarapa oo pꞌanɨ akꞌɨdaitꞌee.

Mãgá kꞌĩsiadaikꞌaraa bɨ. Tachi Akꞌõrepapaita eperãarãpa oopata akꞌɨpari, ichiata jarada perã sãga pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ. Ichia aupaita eperãarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atapari ichi ome pꞌananadamerã. Ma awara ichia aupai jarapari chisãgɨɨrã ichimãiipa ãyaa pëiitꞌee. Mapa apidaapa akꞌɨdaikꞌaraa bɨ chĩarapa oopata, jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia.
Ũrítɨ parãdepema jarapataarã: “Idi maa–e pɨrã nu wãdaitꞌee jãgɨ́ pꞌuurudee netꞌaa netode mãikꞌaapa año aba mama pꞌaneedaitꞌee mimiamaa pꞌaratꞌa jitadaitꞌee.”
Mãga jaradaikꞌaraa bɨ parãpa kꞌawada–e pꞌanadairã nu chokꞌai pꞌanadai wa pꞌanada–e pai. Parã nãupa jɨ̃arara taarã–ee ãyaa pꞌua ateeparíkꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ.
Idi wa nu ne–inaa oodaitꞌeeda adai kꞌãyaara, jaradaipia bɨ: “Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã mãikꞌaapa chokꞌai pꞌanɨ pɨrã, ne–inaa oodaitꞌee.”
Mamĩda parãpa mãgadakꞌaa. Audua pedeepata, pãchi kꞌĩradoopa ne–inaa jõmaweda oo kꞌinia pꞌanadairã. Mamĩda mãgá audua pedeedaikꞌaraa bɨ, tachi jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari pꞌanadairã.
Mãpai eperãpa kꞌawa bɨ pɨrã ne–inaa pia ooipia bɨ, mamĩda mãga oo–ee, kꞌachia oomaa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Ɨ̃rá ũrítɨ pꞌaratꞌara beerã. Jẽ́etɨ mãikꞌaapa bíatɨ, parã miadaitꞌee perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa akꞌɨkꞌãri na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa oopatapꞌedaa.

Ma ewate pãchia ne–inaa iru pꞌanɨ jõmaweda servi–ee baibeeitꞌee. Jõma pãchia kꞌodaitꞌee ɨa bɨdapꞌedaa mikꞌia baitꞌee. Ma awara parãpa pꞌaru pi–ia pꞌe iru pꞌanɨ jɨ̃daitꞌee wɨwɨrrɨa jẽra baitꞌee, polillapa kꞌokꞌooda perã.

Parã nẽe mãikꞌaapa pꞌaratꞌa pꞌe iru pꞌanɨ mogosia jẽra baitꞌee hierrokꞌa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma netꞌaa jõmaweda jõpiitꞌee, ichi kꞌĩrapite servi–e bairã.
