Parãpa ma nẽe pꞌaratꞌa ome mãgá mogosiadaida unudakꞌãri, kꞌawaadaitꞌee pãchi kꞌapꞌɨa paara jõdaitꞌee, tꞌɨpɨtaupa ne–inaa paa jõparikꞌa. Ɨ̃rá parãpa mãgee netꞌaa atꞌãri pꞌemaa pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda taarã–e Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooitꞌee mɨa jara bɨkꞌa.

¡Ũrítɨ! Parãpa mimiapataarã jɨrɨpata pãchi ne–uudapꞌedaa chauda pꞌedamerã. Mamĩda ma mimiapataarãmaa pꞌaadakꞌaa. Mapa chupɨria iidipata abaapa ãchi kꞌaripamerã. Jõmaarã Akꞌõre Waibɨapa ãra chupɨria iidida ũri bɨ.

Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa, jõmaweda pãchia oo kꞌiniata oopata mãikꞌaapa netꞌaa kꞌiniata pꞌe wãpata. Pꞌakꞌa poreepidákꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda taarã–e ewari cherude pꞌakꞌa ateepatakꞌa chi peepatamaa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã kꞌachia ooitꞌee, ooda–e pꞌanadairã irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Ma awara parãpa eperã tꞌãri pia pꞌanɨɨrã charraarãmaa ateepata, ne–inaa kꞌachia maarepida ooda–e pꞌanɨ mĩda. Maapꞌeda charraarãmaa pꞌaapata ma chupɨria chitoonɨɨrã peepidamerã. ¿Kꞌaipa pꞌoyaaima parã ome?

Ɨ̃pemaarã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgá ooitꞌee perã mãgeerã ome, choopatáatɨ chupɨria jõnadakꞌãri ãra kꞌaurepa. Mãga oodaipia bɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo cheitꞌee perã. Iru mãgá cheru misa, pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ ne–uupataarãkꞌa. Mãɨrãpa ne–inaa uudapꞌeda, kꞌãiwee nɨpata ijãa pꞌanadairã kꞌoi chekꞌãri, ãchi ne–uudapꞌedaa tꞌonoitꞌee mãikꞌaapa wariitꞌee. Aɨ tꞌẽepai waya nɨpata kꞌoi waya chekꞌãri, ma ne–uudapꞌedaa chaumerã.
Mãga pɨkꞌa parã kꞌãiwee nɨdaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa ijãapataadaipia bɨ Tachi Waibɨade, iru taarã–ee cheitꞌee perã, jõmaarãpa oopatapꞌedaa akꞌɨde.

Mamĩda ɨ̃pemaarã, mãgá kꞌãiwee nɨ pꞌanɨ misa ma chupɨria jõnɨde, kꞌĩrakꞌaupai jaradai: “Jãgɨ́ ijãapari kꞌaurepa mɨ nãgá chupɨria nɨ̃bɨ.” Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgá kꞌachia kꞌĩsiapataarã pia akꞌɨ–e paitꞌee, iru chekꞌãri jõmaarãpa oopatapꞌedaa akꞌɨde. Taarã–ee iru waya cheitꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee.

Piara kꞌawaadamerã sãga choodaipia bɨ nepɨrade jõnɨde, mɨa kꞌirãpapi kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarã chonaarãweda pꞌanapatapꞌedaa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra pëiji jarade irua oopi kꞌinia bada eperãarãmaa. Mamĩda ma eperãarãpa ãra miapijida, ãrapa jaradapꞌedaa ũri kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Mãgá iru pꞌanajida mĩda, choopachida.

Tachi ijãapataarãpa pia pedeepata ãra ãpɨte, waapɨara ijãapatapꞌedaa perã Tachi Akꞌõrede ãra chupɨria jõnadakꞌãri. Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ sãga chooji chonaarãwedapema Job, chupɨria nɨ̃bɨde. Mãgá baji mĩda, Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapachi. Maapꞌeda ma chupɨria nɨ̃bɨdeepa uchiakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa Job kꞌaripaji pipɨara bapariimerã naawedapema kꞌãyaara. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga ooji chupɨria jõnɨɨrã chupɨria kꞌawaapari perã.

Ɨ̃rá ɨ̃pemaarã, ne–inaa awaraa kꞌawapi kꞌinia bɨ parãmaa. Juraadaikꞌaraa bɨ ne–inaa apida kꞌĩrapite: pajã kꞌĩrapite, na eujã kꞌĩrapite, wa ne–inaa awaraa kꞌĩrapite. Tachi Akꞌõrepa jõmaarãpa oopatapꞌedaa akꞌɨkꞌãri, pia akꞌɨ–e paitꞌee mãgá pariatua jarapataarã, chĩarapa ijãadamerã ãchia jara pꞌanɨ. Mãgá juraadai kꞌãyaara parãpa jaradaipia bɨ: “ooitꞌeepɨ” jaradakꞌãri ne–inaa oodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa “oo–epɨ” jaradakꞌãri ne–inaa ooda–e paitꞌee.
Mãpai ɨ̃pemaarã, parãdepema aba chupɨria nɨ̃bakꞌãri, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ipia bɨ. Jõdee o–ĩa bakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõremaa kꞌariipia bɨ.

Ma awara parãdepema aba kꞌayaa bakꞌãri, jara pëidaipia bɨ tachi ijãapataarã akꞌɨpataarãmaa, ãra chedamerã mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃damerã iru pari. Iru ikꞌaawa pachedakꞌãri, ãrapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daipia bɨ Jesucristopa iru jɨpamerã. Mãɨmisa ãradepemapa iru kꞌapꞌɨa pꞌuruipia bɨ aceitepa.

Mamĩda ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dakꞌãri, wãara ijãadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jɨpai. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, Akꞌõrepa ooitꞌee ãrapa iidi pꞌanɨkꞌa. Ma kꞌayaa wẽpaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌayaa baji pɨrã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooda kꞌaurepa, ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpaitꞌee.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga oopari perã, kꞌayaa beerãpa jaradaipia bɨ ãchia kꞌachia oodapꞌedaa awaraa ijãapataarãmaa, mãɨrãpa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃damerã ãchi pari. Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra jɨpaipɨ. Mɨa mãga jara bɨ irua oopari perã ichi kꞌĩrapite pia nipapataarãpa iidi pꞌanɨkꞌa, wãara ijãadakꞌãri. Mãga oopari ãrapa ne–inaa chaaree iidi pꞌanɨ pɨjida.

Mãga ooji chonaarãweda ichi pedee jarapari Elías ome. Elías eperã paji tachikꞌa. Mamĩda ɨtꞌaa iidikꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõremaa irua kꞌoi chepinaamerã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga ooji, Eliapa wãara ijãa bada perã. Año õpee esa–aukꞌa kꞌoi che–e paji.
Ma tꞌẽepai waya ɨtꞌaa iidikꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌoi chepiji mãikꞌaapa ma eujãde ne–uudapꞌedaa tꞌonopꞌeda mãikꞌaapa waripꞌeda, chauji.

Mãpai ɨ̃pemaarã, mɨa etꞌewa jaradakꞌa chikꞌaripa pꞌanapatáatɨ. Mãgá parãdepema aba kꞌachiade baairu pɨrã oo kꞌinia–e bairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, awaraarãpa iru kꞌaripadai, waya wãara ijãamerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌachia oo amaamerã.
Kꞌawadaipia bɨ chi mãgá kꞌariparupa mãgɨ́ eperã o kꞌachiadeepa uchiapiitꞌee. Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa irua kꞌachia ooda jõmaweda wẽpapii.
Mãgapai paji.

Mɨ, Pedro Jesucristopa pëida ichi ũraa jarateede. Mɨa na kꞌartꞌa pꞌã pëiru parã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãmaa Cristode ijãadamerã; chi awara–awaraa pꞌanapataarã kꞌĩra tewaraarãkꞌa nãgɨ́ eujãde: Ponto, Galacia, Capadocia, Ásia mãikꞌaapa Bitinia; mãgɨ́ eujãde.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa naaweda kꞌĩsia iru badakꞌa, parã jɨrɨtꞌeraji. Iru Jaurepa parã awara bɨji oodamerã Jesucristopa oopi bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanadamerã iru waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa. Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã audú pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã. Mãgá kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.

O–ĩa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dáma Tachi Akꞌõremaa. Iru Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo Akꞌõre. Tachi audú chupɨria kꞌawaada perã, ichi Jaurepa tachi waya tꞌo pɨkꞌapiji ichideerã pꞌaneedamerã. Mãga ooji Jesucristo piupꞌeda, chokꞌai pꞌirabaipikꞌãri. Ma kꞌaurepata kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachi jida ichiaba chokꞌai pꞌirabaidaitꞌee.

Ma awara kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachia iru pꞌanadaitꞌee ne–inaa jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ teeitꞌee ichideerãmaa. Mãgɨ́ ne–inaa ɨa iru bɨ ɨtꞌari parã–itꞌee. Mãgɨ́ ne–inaa pi–ia bɨ. Jõkꞌaa mãikꞌaapa sore pakꞌaa, ne–inaa ɨtꞌaripema perã.

Parãpa wãara Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapata perã, irua parã akꞌɨ bapariitꞌee mãgɨ́ ne–inaa unurutamaa. Iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã, parã akꞌɨpari atuanaadamerã ichi ewari waibɨa ewate, na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõkꞌãri. Ma ewate irua unupiitꞌee jõma ichia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ ichideerã–itꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga oopari perã parã–itꞌee, tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapata. Mamĩda ɨ̃rá, taarã–e nɨde kꞌĩsia pꞌuadaridai, nepɨra kꞌĩra tꞌãdoode baaidakꞌãri.

Parã nepɨrade baaipata kꞌawaadaitꞌee wãara Cristode ijãapata wa mãga–e. Kꞌĩsíatɨ nãgɨde. Eperãarãpa tꞌɨpɨtaude nẽe torrabaipata, nejarra uchiamerã. Mãga pɨkꞌa parã nepɨrade baaipata, audupɨara Cristode ijãapataadamerã. Nẽe pi–ia bɨ, mamĩda pipɨara bɨ Cristode ijãaitꞌee. Nẽe jõdaipari na eujãdepema perã. Mamĩda eperãpa wãara Cristode ijãakꞌãri, jõ–e paitꞌee. Mapa chóotɨ parã ijãa pꞌanɨde, nepɨrade baairuta pɨjida. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, Jesucristo waya chekꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pia pedeeitꞌee parãmaa.
Parãpa Cristo waide unuda–e pꞌanɨ mĩda, iru kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ. Ma awara ɨ̃rá unuda–e pꞌanɨ mĩda, irude ijãapata. Mapa tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanapata. Pedee wẽ–e jaraitꞌee sãga parã audupai o–ĩa pꞌanɨ.
Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ wãara ijãapata perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã kꞌaripamaa bɨ atuanaadamerã.

Chonaarãweda Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa pi–ia akꞌɨjida Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãda kꞌawaadaitꞌee sãga Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee atuanaadamerã, parã ome oomaa bɨkꞌa. Mãgá akꞌɨ pꞌanɨ misa, ãchia jõma pia kꞌawada–e paji mĩda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapiji ãramaa sãga irua parã ɨ̃rapemaarã kꞌaripaitꞌee baji, eperãarã jõmaweda kꞌinia iru bairã.

Cristo Jaurepa ãramaa jarapipachi iru cheitꞌee bada, chupɨria nɨ̃baitꞌee bada mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩra wãree baitꞌee bada, jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara pakꞌãri. Mapa ãrapa audú kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanapachida sãga mãikꞌaapa sãapai ma jõma pꞌasaitꞌee paji.

Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãramaa kꞌawapiji mãgɨ́ pedee jaradakꞌãri irua jarapidakꞌa, ãchi–itꞌee–e paji. Ma kꞌãyaara parã ɨ̃rapemaarã–itꞌee paji. Mãgɨ́ pedee parãpa ũrijida Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepataarãpa parãmaa jarateedakꞌãri Cristopa ooda parã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataitꞌee. Mãga jarateejida Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure ɨtꞌariipa ãra ome ba cheda perã. ¡Angeleerãpa paara mãgɨ́ netꞌaa jõma kꞌawa kꞌinia pꞌanapata! Mamĩda kꞌawada–e tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨkꞌa.
Maperã kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌanapatáatɨ. Ichita kꞌĩsíatɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooitꞌee bɨde parã kꞌaripaitꞌee Cristo waya chekꞌãri.
Warrarã chokꞌekꞌee pꞌanapatakꞌa pꞌanapatáatɨ. Ijãadai naaweda pꞌanapatapꞌedaakꞌa pꞌananáatɨ. Maapai Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã, ne–inaa kꞌachia pariatua oopachida; pãchia oo kꞌiniata.
Ma kꞌãyaara ne–inaa jõmaade kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanapatáatɨ, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌachia wẽe bapari perã. Iruata parã jɨrɨji mãga pꞌanapataadamerã.
Iru ũraa pꞌãdade aukꞌa jara bɨ:
‘Kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanapatáatɨ, mɨ mãga bapari perã.’

Tachi Akꞌõre, “Akꞌõreda” a pꞌanɨ pɨrã, iru waaweedaipia bɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa kꞌĩra tewaraarãkꞌa. Iru waaweedaipia bɨ irua jõmaarãpa ne–inaa oopata aukꞌa akꞌɨpari perã jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia.

Pariatua parãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo wãpachida pãchi chonaarãpa oo pꞌanadapꞌedaakꞌa. Pia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã kꞌaripa–e paji ma naaweda o kꞌachiade wãdadeepa, apidaapa irumaa pꞌaadapꞌedaa perã ne–inaa jõparipa, nẽekꞌa maa–e pɨrã pꞌaratꞌakꞌa.

Ma kꞌãyaara Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã ma o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji Cristo waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa. Ma waa pipɨara baji ne–inaa awaraa kꞌãyaara, oveja chakꞌe waakꞌa bada perã. Chonaarãweda eperãarãpa oveja chakꞌe maarepida tꞌuda anida wẽe ateedakꞌãri peepidaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa paadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee, irua ãra pia akꞌɨpachi. Mãga bɨ Cristo waa ome. Iru maarepida kꞌachia wẽe baji. Mapa iru waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa irude ijãapataarã pia akꞌɨpari.
Na eujã ooi naaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru baji Cristopa ichi waa batꞌamerã eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mamĩda ɨ̃rapaita, na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõi naaweda, irua Cristo pëiji parã ɨ̃rapemaarã kꞌaripade.

Ma awara Cristo chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiji mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa ateeji ichi kꞌĩra wãree eujãdee. Mapa Cristo kꞌaurepa parãpa Tachi Akꞌõrede wãara ijãapata mãikꞌaapa kꞌawapata jai–idaadakꞌãri, irua parã ichiaba chokꞌai pꞌirabaipiitꞌee.

Parãpa ũridapꞌeda Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida Cristode, tꞌãripa ijãajida mãikꞌaapa Akꞌõrepa parã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapiji. Mapa ɨ̃rá wãara pãchi ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa kꞌinia iru pꞌanadai. Mapa jĩpꞌa pãchi tꞌãripa chikꞌinia pꞌanapatáatɨ.

Mãga pꞌanadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa parã waya tꞌo pɨkꞌapida perã ichideerã pꞌaneedamerã. Mãga padaida–e paji pãchi akꞌõreerã kꞌaurepa, ewaa tꞌodakꞌa. Mãgee akꞌõreerã piupata. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre ichita chokꞌai bapari. Iruata parã ichideerã papiji ichi pedee kꞌaurepa. Mãgɨ́ pedee jõkꞌaa. Ichita bapari Tachi Akꞌõrekꞌa. Mapa parã jida ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Eperãarã jõmaweda pꞌũajarakꞌa pꞌanɨ. Pꞌũajara bapꞌeda, taarã–ee pɨɨdaipari. Ichiaba pꞌũajara pꞌono tꞌonopꞌeda, pi–ia unupata mĩda, piu baaipari eujãde.
Mamĩda mãga–e Tachi Akꞌõre pedee ome. Mãgɨ́ ichita bapari.’
Parãpa mãgɨ́ pedee ũrijida Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepataarãpa parãmaa jarateedakꞌãri Cristopa ooda parã kꞌaripaitꞌee atuanaadamerã. Mãgɨ́ pedee pia kꞌaurepata parã jida ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.

Maperã oo amáatɨ ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo. Seewanáatɨ mãikꞌaapa seewata ne–inaa oonáatɨ. Awaraarã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌananáatɨ ãrapa netꞌaa iru pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa. Pedee kꞌachia apida chĩara ãpɨte jaranáatɨ.
Ma kꞌãyaara, ara warra ewaa tꞌoda juto kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, kꞌawaa kꞌinia pꞌanapatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida. Mãgá oo wãdaitꞌee irua oopi bɨkꞌa ɨtꞌaa wãrutamaa.
Ɨ̃rá kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Waibɨa tꞌãri pia bapari.

Mapa óotɨ irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Irua tachi kꞌaripapari ichita chokꞌai pꞌanapataadamerã. Eperãarãpa iru yiaraa iru pꞌanapachida te oopataarãpa mãu orpꞌe–ee yiaraa iru pꞌanapatakꞌa, mãu basa–itꞌee jɨrɨtꞌeradakꞌãri. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite iru chi mãu pipɨara pɨkꞌa bɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru jɨrɨtꞌerada perã.

Parã jida ma ichita bapari tedepema mã́ukꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee perã. Mapa oopítɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mãga oodakꞌãri, parãpa mimia oodaitꞌee pꞌaareerãpa oopatakꞌa ne–animalaarã peedapꞌeda, paadakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Mamĩda ma kꞌãyaara ne–inaa pipɨara oodaitꞌee, Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari ne–inaa oodaitꞌee perã ichi Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa.
Chonaarãweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga jaraji ichi Ũraa pꞌãdade:
‘Mɨa aba pi–ia bɨta jɨrɨtꞌeraji bɨitꞌee mɨchi ɨtꞌaripema Sión pꞌuurude, parãpa irude ijãadamerã. Irude ijãapataarã kꞌĩra nejasia pꞌanada–e paitꞌee ma pꞌuurude panadakꞌãri, ichideerã perã.’
Wãara parã ijãapataarã–itꞌee iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara pipɨara bɨ. Mamĩda mãga–e ijãadakꞌaa beerã–itꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Te oopataarãpa mãu kꞌiniada–e padapꞌedaa pipɨara padachi.’
Ichiaba awara ãi Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Ara eperã mãumaa tꞌĩutɨparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa eperãarã chokꞌara tꞌĩutɨ pɨkꞌadaitꞌee ma mãu pipɨara papida kꞌaurepa.’
Mãgɨ́ mãu Jesucristo. Wãara ijãadakꞌaa beerã tꞌĩutɨ pɨkꞌapata, Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari ijãadaamaa pꞌanadapꞌeda, atuadaitꞌee perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru badakꞌa.

Mamĩda Akꞌõrepa parãta jɨrɨtꞌeraji ichideerã pꞌanadamerã. Ichiaba jõmaarã reypa parã awara bɨji mimia oodamerã ichi pari, pꞌaareerãpa Akꞌõre mimia oopatakꞌa. Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨ parã ichi pꞌuuru pidaarã pꞌanadamerã ichikꞌa, kꞌachia wẽe. Ichideerã papiji parãpa jõmaarãmaa jaradamerã irua ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Iruata parã jɨrɨji uchiadamerã ijãadakꞌaa beerã pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨdeepa tꞌĩudaitꞌee ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa pi–ia bɨdee iru ome.
Naaweda parã Tachi Akꞌõre pꞌuuru

Mapa ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, mɨa enenee nɨ̃bɨ oonaadamerã pãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mãgɨpa chõo pɨkꞌapari tachi tꞌãri ome. Parã kꞌĩra tewaraarãkꞌa pꞌanapata ijãadakꞌaa beerã tꞌãide. Mapa oodaikꞌaraa bɨ ãchia oopatakꞌa.

Ma kꞌãyaara ãchi tꞌãide kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌanadaipia bɨ. Mãgá pꞌanaruta pɨrã, ãchia “kꞌachia beerãda” aruta pɨjida parã ãpɨte, unudaitꞌee parãpa ne–inaa pia oo pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre cheru ewate jaradaitꞌee iruata parãmaa mãga oopiji.

Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa, óotɨ eperãarã poroorãpa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa, apidaapa Tachi Waibɨa ãpɨte kꞌachia pedeenaadamerã parã kꞌaurepa. Mãga oodaipia bɨ César ome, iru waibɨara bairã apemaarã poro waibɨarã kꞌãyaara.
Ichiaba mãga oodaipia bɨ iru ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã ome. Irua ãra pëipari kꞌachia beerã atadamerã mãikꞌaapa miapidamerã; jõdee tꞌãri pia pꞌanɨɨrãmaa pia pedeedamerã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨ parãpa ne–inaa pia aupai oodamerã. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, chi kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee pꞌanɨɨrãpa parã ãpɨte pariatua pedeeda–e pai. Kꞌĩupꞌee pꞌanadaitꞌee.

Parã esclavoorã–e. Mapa pꞌanapatáatɨ esclavo–eerãkꞌa. Mamĩda mãɨmisa kꞌĩsianáatɨ oodaitꞌee pãchia oo kꞌiniata, ne–inaa kꞌachia oorutamaa. Ma kꞌãyaara pꞌanapatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõre esclavoorãkꞌa, oomaa irua oopi bɨkꞌa.
Tꞌãri pia pꞌanapatáatɨ jõmaarã ome. Kꞌinia iru pꞌanapatáatɨ pãchi ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa. Tachi Akꞌõre waaweepatáatɨ mãikꞌaapa César waaweepatáatɨ, eperãarãpa ãchi poro waibɨarã waaweepatakꞌa.
Teeda mimiapataarã, pãchi poro waibɨarã waaweepatáatɨ mãikꞌaapa oopatáatɨ ãrapa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa. Mãga oodaipia bɨ ãra tꞌãri pia pꞌanɨ pɨrã, maa–e pɨrã tꞌãri kꞌachia pꞌanɨ pɨjida.
Ãrapa parã miapidai, ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda–e pꞌanɨ mĩda. Mamĩda kꞌĩrau–ee chooruta pɨrã oo kꞌinia pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa, irua parã pia akꞌɨitꞌee.

Jõdee mãgá akꞌɨ–e paitꞌee parãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodapꞌeda, kꞌĩrau–ee chooruta pɨrã miapidakꞌãri ma kꞌachia oodapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa. Mamĩda parã kꞌĩrau–ee chooruta pɨrã miapidakꞌãri ne–inaa pia oodapꞌedaa perã, mãgara Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã pia akꞌɨitꞌee.

Ma–itꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã jɨrɨji, Cristo jĩakꞌa pꞌanapataadamerã. Iru miaji parã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Kꞌinia bɨ parãpa awaraarã aukꞌa kꞌaripadamerã, miaruta pɨjida mãga oo pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa. Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jaraparipa irude nãga jaraji:
‘Irua pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ookꞌaa paji. Seewa apidaamaa jarakꞌaa paji.’

Cristomaa ikꞌachia jaradakꞌãri, mãgá pꞌanaukꞌaa paji. Miapidakꞌãri, maarepida jarakꞌaa paji kꞌachia ooitꞌee iru ɨmɨateedapꞌedaarãmaa. Ma kꞌãyaara ma nepɨra ichiakꞌau bɨji Tachi Akꞌõrepa oomerã ichia oo kꞌiniata. Kꞌawaji Tachi Akꞌõrepapai akꞌɨi eperãarãpa oopata jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia.

Kurusode bakꞌãri, Cristopa ichi itu tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata iru baji ichi kꞌapꞌɨade. Mãgá piuji tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa, tachi uchiadaidamerã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌariipa mãikꞌaapa kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanapataadamerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa perã, parã kꞌayaa pɨkꞌa pꞌanapachida. Mamĩda Cristo miapida kꞌaurepa parã pari, jɨpa pɨkꞌa pꞌaneejida. Maperãpɨ ɨ̃rá parã ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre ome.

Parãpa ijãadai naaweda, pꞌanapachida oveja o atua bɨkꞌa, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawada–ee pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Mamĩda ɨ̃rá, ma oveja ãpɨtee cherukꞌa ichi akꞌɨpari waya unu atarumaa, mãga pɨkꞌa parã o kꞌachiade wãdapꞌedaadeepa ãpɨtee chejida unu atarutamaa pãchi akꞌɨpari, Cristo ome. Iruata parã tꞌãri akꞌɨpari.

Mɨa parã wẽraarã miakꞌãi beerã ũraaitꞌee oodamerã pãchi ɨmɨkꞌĩraarãpa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, chi ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã ijãadakꞌaa pꞌanɨɨrãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida ijãadai parã kꞌaurepa. Cristopa ooda ãchimaa jarada–e pꞌanɨ mĩda, ãchia irude ijãadai,
unudakꞌãri parãpa Tachi Akꞌõre waaweepata mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaamaa pꞌanapata.
Parã wẽraarã Cristode ijãapataarãpa jɨrɨdaikꞌaraa bɨ kꞌĩra wãree pꞌanadaitꞌee ɨ̃rɨpai, pãchi poro pi–ia bida pꞌanɨpa maa–e pɨrã ne–inaa nẽedee ooda jɨ̃ pꞌanɨpa maa–e pɨrã pꞌaru pi–ia jɨ̃ pꞌanɨpa.

Ma kꞌãyaara jɨrɨdaipia bɨ tꞌãride kꞌĩra wãree pꞌanadaitꞌee, awaraarãpa mãgee kꞌĩra pꞌoyaa unuda–e pꞌanɨ mĩda. Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee piara bɨ tꞌãri pia mãikꞌaapa kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadamerã, ne–inaa ɨ̃rɨpai oopata kꞌãyaara. Mãgee ne–inaa jõpata, mamĩda ne–inaa tꞌãride ichita bapari.

Mãgá pꞌanapachida chonaarãwedapema wẽraarã, Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapatapꞌedaa. Tꞌãride kꞌĩra wãree pꞌanapachida ijãapatapꞌedaa perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi kꞌaripaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa oopatapꞌedaa perã ãchi ɨmɨkꞌĩraarãpa jaradapꞌedaakꞌa.

Mãga paji Abraham wẽra Sara. Ichia oopachi Abrahampa jaradakꞌa mãikꞌaapa irumaa: “mɨchi poro waibɨada” apachi. Parã Sara kꞌaurãkꞌa pꞌanɨ, irukꞌa ne–inaa pia ooruta pɨrã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa apidaamaa pꞌerapida–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã.

Ichiaba ũraaitꞌee parã ɨmɨkꞌĩraarã Cristode ijãapataarã kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanadamerã pꞌanapataadaitꞌee pãchi wẽraarã ome. Ãra kꞌaripapatáatɨ juatau makꞌɨara wẽe pꞌanadairã ɨmɨkꞌĩraarãkꞌa. Ma awara ãra pia akꞌɨpatáatɨ, aukꞌa Cristode ijãapata perã mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa wãdaitꞌee perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripapꞌeda. Ãra mãgá pia akꞌɨdaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parãpa ɨtꞌaa iidipata pꞌanaumerã.

Ma awara parã jõmaarãmaa ũraaitꞌee aukꞌa kꞌĩsia pꞌanapataadamerã oodaitꞌee Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Tꞌãri aukꞌa pꞌanapatáatɨ mãikꞌaapa chikꞌinia pꞌanapatáatɨ ɨ̃pemaarã perã Cristo kꞌaurepa. Awaraarã chupɨria kꞌawaa pꞌanapatáatɨ mãikꞌaapa audua–ee pꞌanapatáatɨ.

Awaraarãpa parãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodakꞌãri, aukꞌa oonáatɨ. Parãmaa ikꞌachia jaradakꞌãri, aukꞌa jaranáatɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara ãchimaa pia pedéetɨ mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa iidítɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi kꞌaripamerã. Ma–itꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã jɨrɨji, parã jida kꞌaripa kꞌinia bada perã.
Iru ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨ:
‘Eperã tꞌãri o–ĩa taarã ba kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã na pꞌekꞌau eujãde, awaraarã ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jara amaaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa seewa amaaipia bɨ.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo amaaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa pia ooipia bɨ. Jɨrɨipia bɨ kꞌãiwee bapariitꞌee jõmaarã ome.
Ma jõma ooipia bɨ Tachi Waibɨapa akꞌɨ bapari perã ne–inaa pia oopataarã mãikꞌaapa ũripari perã ãrapa ɨtꞌaa iidipata. Mamĩda mãga oo–e ne–inaa kꞌachia oopataarã ome. Mãɨrã kꞌaripa–epɨ.’
Parãpa jɨrɨruta pɨrã oodaitꞌee ne–inaa pia aupai, ¿kꞌairãpa parãmaa kꞌachia oodaima?

Mamĩda awaraarãpa parã miapiruta pɨjida ne–inaa pia oo pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa, o–ĩa pꞌanadaipia bɨ. Ma miapida kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã pia akꞌɨitꞌee. Mapa pꞌerapináatɨ parã jɨrɨpataarãmaa mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩsia jõnanáatɨ ãchi kꞌaurepa.
Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌirãpátɨ Tachi Waibɨa Cristo bapari pãchi tꞌãride mãikꞌaapa irumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃́tɨ. Apidaapa parãmaa iidiruta pɨrã sãapꞌeda Cristode ijãapata, ichita pꞌanáutɨ.

Mamĩda mãga óotɨ tꞌãri pia, audua–ee, Tachi Akꞌõre waaweepata perã. Ne–inaa pia aupaita oopatáatɨ. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, kꞌĩsia pꞌua pꞌanada–e paitꞌee. Ma awara parã ɨmɨateepataarãpa parã ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jaradakꞌãri, awaraarãpa ãchi kꞌĩra nejasiapidaitꞌee, parã wãara pꞌanapata perã Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa.
Piara bɨ miadaitꞌee ne–inaa pia ooda kꞌaurepa, mãga kꞌinia bɨ pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa, miadai kꞌãyaara ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda kꞌaurepa.

Ichiaba Cristo miaji piukꞌãri tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiitꞌee. Iru pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe baji mĩda, piuda aba piuji pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopataarã pari, mãgá tachi ijãapataarã tꞌĩudamerã Tachi Akꞌõre ode iru ome. Eperãarãpa iru peejida. Mamĩda aramata Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure waya araa paji iru jaure ome.
Mãpai iru wãji angeleerã, chi kꞌachia oodapꞌedaarã, jɨ̃a paraa bɨmaa. Jaraji mãɨrãmaa irua ãchi pꞌoyaada piukꞌãri eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee atuanaadamerã.

Mãga jaraji mãɨrãpa oodakꞌaa pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa, chonaarãweda Noé na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bakꞌãri. Mãɨrã kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa na eujãdepemaarã kꞌachia beerã audú miapi kꞌinia baji. Mamĩda chooji Noépa barco choma ooru misa, aɨde batautꞌee ichi ëreerã ome. Ãra ochopai pꞌanajida. Mamĩda ma barcode bataudapꞌedaa perã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra kꞌaripaji kꞌiniinaadamerã awaraarã ome. Jaradai ma pania pëidapa kꞌachia beerã jõpiitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõrepa Noé ichideerã ome kꞌaripaji chokꞌai uchiadamerã.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra kꞌaripadakꞌa chokꞌai uchiadamerã ma pania kꞌaurepa, mãga pɨkꞌa ɨ̃rá pania kꞌaurepa Akꞌõrepa parã jida kꞌaripapari ichita chokꞌai pꞌanapataadamerã iru ome. Mãga oopari parã poro choopidakꞌãri paniapa. Mãga oodakꞌãri, ɨ̃rɨpai ooda–e, ma paniapa jaikꞌoo pãchi kꞌapꞌɨade sɨɨmerã mãikꞌaapa wẽpapimerã. Ma kꞌãyaara poro choopipata akꞌɨpidaitꞌee Jesucristo chokꞌai pꞌirabaida kꞌaurepa tꞌãripa irude ijãa pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa iidi pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa pãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapimerã.

Cristo chokꞌai pꞌirabaikꞌãri, wãji ɨtꞌaa su–akꞌɨ bapariitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre juaraare. Mama bɨde jõma na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema–eerã iru jua ekꞌari pꞌanadaitꞌee; angeleerã mãikꞌaapa Netuara Poro Waibɨa eere pꞌanɨɨrã paara.
Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanadairã Cristo miada mãgá iru kꞌapꞌɨade, sõcharra pꞌanapatáatɨ mãikꞌaapa aukꞌa kꞌĩsia pꞌanapatáatɨ irukꞌa. Miadakꞌãri, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oonáatɨ.
Oodai kꞌãyaara pãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa, óotɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa parã piurutamaa.

Cristode ijãadai naaweda parãpa audupai oopachida ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa nãgee ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanapatakꞌa: pariatua pꞌekꞌau ooyaa; ne–inaa kꞌachia ooyaa; itꞌua toyaa; wẽraarã pariatua jɨrɨyaa mãɨrã ome kꞌachia oodaitꞌee; kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃i awaa ne–inaa juapa oodamaa; mãgee ne–inaa kꞌachia.
Ɨ̃rá mãgee ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ kꞌãata kꞌĩsiadai, parã waa wãdakꞌaa perã ãchi ome mãgee ne–inaa kꞌachia oode. Maperãpɨ pedee kꞌachia jarapata parã ãpɨte.

Mamĩda ewari cherude Tachi Akꞌõrepa iidikꞌãri ãchia ne–inaa jõmaweda oopatapꞌedaa pari, ichita pꞌanaudaitꞌee. Ma ewate iruata akꞌɨitꞌee jõmaarãpa oopata jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia; chokꞌai pꞌanɨɨrãpa oopata mãikꞌaapa piudapꞌedaarãpa oopatapꞌedaa paara.

Ma piudapꞌedaarã chokꞌai pꞌanadakꞌãri, miapachida kꞌapꞌɨade mãikꞌaapa piujida kꞌapꞌɨade eperãarã jõmaarãkꞌa. Mamĩda ijãadapꞌedaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa pedee pia jara pëida Cristode ichita chokꞌai pꞌanapataadaitꞌee irukꞌa, ma ijãadapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa ãra jaure araa padaida perã iru Jaure ome. Ma–itꞌeepɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëiji Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee.
Taarã–e na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõitꞌee. Mapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ kꞌawaadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌanapatáatɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanapatáatɨ.

Ma awara nãga óotɨ awaraa ne–inaa jõmaweda oodai naaweda. Tꞌãripa chikꞌinia pꞌanapatáatɨ, mãgá pꞌanadakꞌãri, maarepida kꞌirãpada–e paitꞌee perã awaraarãpa parãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata mãikꞌaapa jarapata.
Awaraa ijãapataarã pꞌasianadakꞌãri parãmaa, tꞌãri pia auteebáitɨ, maarepida kꞌachia pedeeda–ee.
Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa ne–inaa awara–awaraa oopipari parã chaachaa, mãgá awaraarã kꞌaripadamerã. Mapa mãgɨ́ ne–inaa pia oopatáatɨ irua oopi bɨkꞌa.

Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateeparipa jarateeipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa. Ichiaba ne–inaa ooparipa awaraarã kꞌaripaitꞌee, mãga ooipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Ne–inaa jõmaade mãga ooruta pɨrã, akꞌɨpidaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ, Jesucristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari ne–inaa pia oopipari perã parãmaa. ¡Iru ichita Tachi Waibɨa paitꞌee! ¡Amén!

Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, pꞌeranáatɨ awaraarãpa parã jɨrɨdakꞌãri miapidaitꞌee. Mãgá chupɨria pꞌanadakꞌãri, parãpa kꞌawaa atadai wãara Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨ wa makꞌɨara ijãada–e pꞌanɨ. Kꞌĩsianáatɨ parã miadaikꞌaraa bɨ ichideerã perã.

Ma kꞌãyaara o–ĩa pꞌanátɨ parã miapidakꞌãri Cristo miapidapꞌedaakꞌa, ne–inaa pia oo pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa. O–ĩa pꞌanadai mãgá miaruta misa na eujãde, kꞌawa pꞌanadairã na ewari wãara tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanadaitꞌee Cristo chekꞌãri ichi kꞌĩra wãree unupide jõmaarãmaa.
Ichiaba o–ĩa pꞌanátɨ ikꞌachia jaradakꞌãri parãmaa Cristode ijãapata perã. Mãgá pꞌanadai kꞌawa pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure, chi jaure pipɨara bɨ, parã ome bapari perã.

Awaraarãpa parã miapidaitꞌee. Mamĩda kꞌĩrakꞌaupai miapidai parã tꞌãidepemapa nãgee ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda pari: chĩara peeda perã; chĩara netꞌaa chɨada perã maa–e pɨrã awaraa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda perã chĩaramaa; maa–e pɨrã pedee–idaa bapari perã; ne–inaa mãgee pari.
Jõdee parã tꞌãidepema ijãapari miapiruta pɨrã Cristode ijãapari perã, kꞌĩra nejasia baikꞌaraa bɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara Tachi Akꞌõremaa gracias jaraipia bɨ, parã ‘Cristodeerã’ apata perã.

Taarã–e Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa oopata akꞌɨitꞌee mãikꞌaapa jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Apemaarã kꞌãyaara ichideerã naapɨara mãgá akꞌɨitꞌee mãikꞌaapa miapiitꞌee chi ne–inaa kꞌachia oo pꞌanɨɨrã, mãgɨ́ kꞌachia oo amaadamerã. Irua tachi ome mãga ooru pɨrã, audupɨara irua jara pëida ũridaamaa pꞌanɨɨrã uchiada–e paitꞌee iru juadeepa.

‘Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanɨɨrã ɨtꞌaa wãdai naaweda, Cristo kꞌaurepa miaruta pɨrã Akꞌõre juade, audupɨara miadaitꞌee pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa pꞌanɨɨrã, irude ijãadakꞌaa perã. Mãgɨɨrã atuadaitꞌee.’

Maperã parã miadakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga kꞌinia bairã, audupɨara irude ijãadaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa ichita ne–inaa pia oodaipia bɨ. Mãga oodaipia bɨ kꞌawa pꞌanadairã iru, tachi oodapa oopari ichia jara bɨkꞌa. Tachi akꞌɨ bapariitꞌee ichimaa wãruta misa.

Ɨ̃rá mɨa ũraaitꞌee parã tꞌãidepema ijãapataarã chonaarã. Parã chonaarã jĩakꞌa mɨa pida ijãapataarã akꞌɨpari. Mɨchi taupa unuji Cristo miada tachi kꞌaripaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa mɨchi itꞌaipa mãga jarapari eperãarãmaa. Cristo waya chekꞌãri, mɨmaa ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi kꞌĩra wãree unupiitꞌee.

Mapa akꞌɨ pꞌanapatáatɨ ijãapataarã parã jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨ. Ãra akꞌɨ pꞌanadaipia bɨ oveja akꞌɨparipa ichi ovejaarã akꞌɨparikꞌa. Mãga oodaikꞌaraa bɨ apidaapa mãga oopi pꞌanadairã parãmaa. Ãra akꞌɨ pꞌanadaipia bɨ, tꞌãripa oo kꞌinia pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Ichiaba ma mimia oodaikꞌaraa bɨ pꞌaratꞌa atadaitꞌee. Ma kꞌãyaara óotɨ awaraarã kꞌaripa kꞌinia pꞌanadairã.
Parã jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã chipariirãkꞌa pꞌananáatɨ. Ma kꞌãyaara tꞌãri pia pꞌanapatáatɨ ãra ome, ãra parã jĩakꞌa pꞌana kꞌinia pꞌaneedamerã.

Mãgá pꞌanaruta pɨrã, tachi akꞌɨpari waibɨara bɨpa ichi waya unupikꞌãri jõmaarãmaa, parã́pata atadaitꞌee iru kꞌĩra wãree mãikꞌaapa ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee iru ome. Mãgɨ́ pipɨara bɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema poro jɨ̃ra atai kꞌãyaara, Cristo kꞌĩra wãree jõkꞌaa perã.
Chonaarãmaa ũraadakꞌa ichiaba parã tꞌãidepema kꞌũtrãarãmaa ũraaitꞌee. Oopatáatɨ chonaarãpa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa. Parã ijãapataarã tꞌãidepema apida audua baikꞌaraa bɨ, Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bairã:
‘Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripa–e audua pꞌanapataarã, mamĩda tꞌãri pia kꞌaripapari audua–ee beerã.’
Maperãpɨ audua–ee pꞌanapatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari, irua kꞌinia bɨ ewaride irua parã awaraarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara papimerã.
Parã kꞌĩsia jõnadakꞌãri, ma kꞌĩsia jõmaweda jarátɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa, irua parã pia akꞌɨ bapari perã.

Kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa pꞌanapatáatɨ mãikꞌaapa taukꞌa nipapatáatɨ, Netuara Poro Waibɨapa parã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bapari perã. Ichia eperãarã jɨrɨ nipapari Cristode ijãa amaapiitꞌee, león bia nipaparikꞌa ne–inaa jɨrɨ nipakꞌãri kꞌoitꞌee.

Ichia parã mãgá jɨrɨ chekꞌãri, chóotɨ Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨde mãikꞌaapa oonáatɨ mãgɨpa oopi kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Kꞌirãpátɨ ichia aukꞌa jɨrɨpari parã ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa miapiitꞌee, na pꞌekꞌau eujãde para bee chaa.

Mamĩda taarã–e, parã miadapꞌeda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌaripaitꞌee ichia kꞌinia bɨkꞌa pꞌanapataadamerã mãikꞌaapa pipɨara choodamerã pãchia Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨde. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgá parã kꞌaripaitꞌee tachi kꞌinia iru bapari perã mãikꞌaapa tachi jɨrɨda perã, Jesucristo kꞌaurepa ichita pꞌanapataadamerã iru eujã kꞌĩra wãreede.
¡Tachi Akꞌõre ichita jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara baitꞌee! ¡Amén!

Tachi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa, Silvano, nama bɨ mɨ ome. Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ irua pia oopari Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mapa mɨa na kꞌartꞌa kꞌakꞌatꞌua pꞌãpiji irumaa. Pꞌãpiji parãpa kꞌawaadamerã mɨa etꞌewa jaradakꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã kꞌinia iru bapari mãikꞌaapa wãara parã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mapa mɨa ũraaitꞌee parã choodamerã Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨde, maarepida ijãa amaada–ee.

Nama Babilónia pꞌuurude Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichiaba eperãarã jɨrɨtꞌeraji Cristode ijãadamerã, parã ome oodakꞌa. Mãɨrãpa parãmaa salude pëiruta. Ichiaba salude pëiru Marcopa. Iru mɨ warrakꞌa bɨ, mɨ ome nipapari perã Cristopa ooda jarateede.
Chikꞌinia saludaa para bátɨ.
Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ parã Cristodeerã jõmaarã pari, kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadamerã.
Mãgapai paji.
Mɨ, Simón Pedropa oopari Jesucristopa oopi bɨkꞌa. Irua mɨ pëiji ichi ũraa jarateede.

Mapa na kꞌartꞌa pꞌãru parã Cristode ijãapataarã, tai jĩakꞌa ijãa pꞌanɨɨrãmaa. Jesucristo Tachi Akꞌõre. Irua tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atapari. Audú tꞌãri pia bapari perã, tachi aukꞌa kꞌaripaji irude ijãapataadamerã.
Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã audú pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã. Mãgá kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadaitꞌee iru mãikꞌaapa Tachi Waibɨa Jesús ome kꞌawa wãdade.

Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã, tachimaa teepari ne–inaa jõma falta pꞌanɨ pꞌanapataadamerã irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Mãgá pꞌanapataadaitꞌee iru wãara kꞌawaadakꞌãri. Iruata tachi jɨrɨji kꞌawapiitꞌee ichi kꞌĩra wãree mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri pia, mãgá pꞌanapataadamerã ichikꞌa.

Iru mãga bapari perã, tachimaa jaraji jõmaweda ne–inaa pi–ia ichia ooitꞌee tachi kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mãga jaraji parãpa ma jarada ijãa pꞌanɨpa irukꞌa padaidamerã mãikꞌaapa uchiadaidamerã na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata jua ekꞌariipa. Ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopata, ãchia oo kꞌiniata oopata perã.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma jõma ooda perã parã kꞌaripaitꞌee, jɨrɨpatáatɨ Cristode wãara ijãapataadaitꞌee. Ma awara jɨrɨpatáatɨ tꞌãri pia, kꞌĩsia kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanapataadaitꞌee. Ma awara jɨrɨpatáatɨ kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.

Ma awara jɨrɨpatáatɨ oo amaadaitꞌee tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa. Ma awara jɨrɨpatáatɨ choodaitꞌee pãchi ijãa pꞌanɨde, nepɨrade baairuta pɨjida. Ma awara jɨrɨpatáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia iru pꞌanapataadaitꞌee.
Ma awara jɨrɨpatáatɨ chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadaitꞌee pãchi ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa ome. Ma awara jɨrɨpatáatɨ eperãarã jõmaweda kꞌinia iru pꞌanapataadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi kꞌinia iru baparikꞌa.
Parãpa ichita waapɨara jɨrɨruta pɨrã mãgá pꞌanapataadaitꞌee, Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo wãara kꞌawa wãdaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pꞌanapataadaitꞌee irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Oodaitꞌee irua oopi bɨkꞌa.

Mamĩda chi jɨrɨ–e bɨpa mãgá bapariitꞌee kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee bɨ. Eperã tau tꞌawaa pɨkꞌa bɨ, kꞌaitꞌapai unupari perã. Mãgɨpa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema netꞌaa audupɨara kꞌawa kꞌinia bɨ, Cristo kꞌawai kꞌãyaara. Kꞌirãpa kꞌinia–e ichia naawedapema pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooda Tachi Akꞌõrepa wẽpapiji.

Maperã mɨchi ɨ̃pemaarã, jĩpꞌa jɨrɨpatáatɨ pꞌanapataadaitꞌee mɨa etꞌewa jaradakꞌa. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, akꞌɨpidaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã jɨrɨpꞌeda, wãara jɨrɨtꞌeraji ichideerã papiitꞌee. Ma awara mãga ooruta pɨrã, kꞌachiade baaida–e paitꞌee.

Ma kꞌãyaara ewari cherude Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã o–ĩa auteebaiitꞌee mãikꞌaapa wãpiitꞌee Tachi Waibɨa, Tachi O Kꞌachiadeepa Kꞌaripa Atapari Jesucristo truadee. Mãgɨ́ trua jõkꞌaa Tachi Kꞌaripapari mama bapari perã.
Ma jõma jara aupada mɨa parãmaa ipꞌii kꞌirãpapiitꞌee, mãgɨ́ ũraa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mĩda mãikꞌaapa ijãa pꞌanɨ mĩda jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida parãmaa.
Wãara, mɨa kꞌinia bɨ parãpa mãgɨ́ ũraa kꞌirãpadamerã, mɨ–itꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga kꞌinia bairã. Mɨa mãga ooitꞌee chokꞌai bɨ misa,
Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa mɨmaa kꞌawapida perã taarã–e mɨ na kꞌapꞌɨadeepa uchiaitꞌee piukꞌãri.
Mamĩda jɨrɨitꞌee parãpa mɨ ũraa ichita kꞌirãpa pꞌanapataadamerã, mɨ piuda tꞌẽepai.

Taipa parãmaa jarateejida Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa ooda mãikꞌaapa iru waya cheitꞌee. Maapai jarateeda–e paji eperãarãpa oopatakꞌa, ãchi kꞌĩsiadeepa nepɨrɨdakꞌãri awaraarã kꞌũradaitꞌee. Ma kꞌãyaara tachi taupa taipa iru kꞌĩra wãree unujida.
Mãga unujida Tachi Akꞌõrepa taimaa akꞌɨpikꞌãri irua Cristo pia akꞌɨpari. Mãga ooji iru kꞌĩra wãree eujãdeepa pedeekꞌãri:
‘Nãgɨta mɨ Warra kꞌinia, mɨa jɨrɨtꞌerada. Irua mɨ tꞌãri o–ĩapipari.’
Kꞌɨɨrɨpa taipa mãgɨ́ otau ɨtꞌariipa pedeeda ũrijida, mãga nɨde tai pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã Tachi Waibɨa ome ee awara bɨdade Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ pedee jarai naaweda, chonaarãweda ichi pedee jarapataarãpa iru Warrade jarajida mãikꞌaapa pꞌãjida. Mapa taipa mãgɨ́ pedee ũridakꞌãri tachi kꞌɨɨrɨpa, kꞌawaajida wãara Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa, mãgá ichita pꞌasaitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãda lámpara pꞌãriude bɨkꞌa bɨ, ɨ̃daaru misa; pia jaraitꞌeera, Cristo waya cheru misa. Ma ewate irua na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨ wẽpapiitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre wãarata jõmaweda kꞌawaapiitꞌee tachi tꞌãrimaa.

Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãda mãgá akꞌɨdai naaweda, parãpa na pedee kꞌawaadaipia bɨ. Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa jaradapꞌedaa leedapꞌeda Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade, apidaapa jaradaikꞌaraa bɨ ichi kꞌĩsiadeepa ma pedee kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨ, jarateei awaraarãmaa.
Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa pedee apida ãchi kꞌĩradoopa jaradakꞌaa paji. Ma kꞌãyaara Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapachida Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarapidakꞌa.

Mamĩda maapai Israel pidaarã, tachi chonaarã tꞌãide ichiaba seewa jarateepataarã paraaji. “Tai ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãda” apachida mĩda, mãga–e paji. Mãɨrã jĩakꞌa parã tꞌãide ichiaba seewa jarateepataarã paraaitꞌee. Mãɨrãpa ãchi kꞌĩsiadeepa ijãapataarãmaa seewa imeraa jarateedaitꞌee. Meradaitꞌee Jesucristo tachi chipari, irua ãchi neto pɨkꞌa ataji mĩda ãchi pari piukꞌãri, atuanaadamerã. Ma meraruta kꞌaurepata, atu pꞌanɨde Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi jõpiitꞌee.
Chokꞌaraarãpa ma seewa ijãadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pariatua pꞌekꞌau oo pꞌanapataadaitꞌee mãɨrã jĩakꞌa. Ma kꞌaurepa jõmaarãpa pedee kꞌachia jaradaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre o wãara bɨde.

Ma awara mãɨrãpa pꞌaratꞌa audú ata kꞌinia pꞌanadairã, parã kꞌũradaitꞌee seewa jaratee pꞌanɨpa. Taarã weda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ mãgeerã atuapiitꞌee. Tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ iru sẽkꞌaa mãikꞌaapa kꞌãikꞌaa. Irua wãara ãchi jõpiitꞌee.

Kꞌĩsiadáma nãgɨde. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi angeleerãpa kꞌachia oodapꞌedaa wẽpapi–e paji. Ãchi pëiji eperãarã kꞌachia beerã piudapꞌedaarãmãiipa waawí mãikꞌaapa jɨ̃a paraa bɨji uria audú nãpɨa bɨde, mama iru ewari waibɨa ewate nɨdamerã.

Ichiaba chonaarãweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa wẽpapi–e paji eperãarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oodapꞌedaa. Ãchi jõpiji na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõma ũupirupa. Mãga ooji ijãadakꞌaa pꞌanapatapꞌedaa perã. Jĩpꞌa Noé awaraa eperãarã siete ome chokꞌai uchia ataji, Noépa jarateepachi perã eperãarã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa pꞌanapataadamerã.

Ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõrepa wẽpapi–e paji Sodoma pꞌuurudepemaarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodapꞌedaa mãikꞌaapa Gomorra pꞌuurudepemaarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodapꞌedaa. Ma pꞌuuru omee weda kꞌachia ooji tꞌɨpɨtaupa jõpikꞌãri. Mãga ooji mãɨrã tꞌẽepai ijãadaamaa pꞌanadaitꞌeerãpa kꞌawaadamerã irua kꞌachia beerã kꞌachia oopari.

Mãga ooji mĩda ma pꞌuurudepemaarãmaa, ma pꞌuuru jõtꞌaai naaweda irude ijãa bada, Lot chokꞌai uchiapiji. Mãgɨ́ eperã pia baji Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Iru audupai kꞌĩsia nɨ̃bapachi, pꞌekꞌau ooyaa pꞌanapatapꞌedaarã tꞌãide bapachi perã.

Ma pꞌuuru pidaarãpa oodakꞌaa paji Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Ma kꞌãyaara ne–inaa kꞌachia aupai oopachida. Mapa mãgɨ́ eperã pia bɨta ichi tꞌãride miapachi, ewari chaa ma kꞌachia beerãpa oopata unupachi perã mãikꞌaapa ũripachi perã.

Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa Lot uchiapiji ma kꞌachia beerã tꞌãideepa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawa bɨ sãga kꞌaripaitꞌee ichide ijãapataarã, ne–inaa kꞌachia oonaadamerã mãikꞌaapa irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa oodamerã. Jõdee ichia kꞌawa bɨ sãga jɨ̃a pɨkꞌa bɨitꞌee kꞌachia oopataarã ãchi miapirumaa mãikꞌaapa atuapirumaa ichi ewari waibɨa ewate.
Audupɨara miapiitꞌee oo pꞌanapataarãpa ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãɨrãpa oodaamaa pꞌanapata Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa.
Mãgɨ́ seewa jarateepataarãpa ãchia oo kꞌiniata oopata. Kꞌɨɨrɨ kꞌisua pꞌanapata mãikꞌaapa audua pꞌanapata. Waaweeda–ee pedee kꞌachia jaradaitꞌee angeleerã ãpɨte.
Jõdee angeleerã, mãɨrã kꞌãyaara waibɨara pꞌanɨ mĩda, maarepida pedee kꞌachia jarada–e, kꞌachia beerã ɨmɨateenadakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.

Ma seewa jarateepataarã ne–animalaarã́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ. Ne–animalaarã kꞌĩsiadakꞌaa eperãarãkꞌa. Oopata ãchi kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa. Tꞌopata eperãarãpa jita atadamerã mãikꞌaapa peedamerã. Mãga pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ ma seewa jarateepataarã. Pedee kꞌachia jarapata ne–inaa jõma ãchia kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ ãpɨte. Ma kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi jõpiitꞌee, eperãarãpa ne–animalaarã jõpipatakꞌa.

Ãchi miadaitꞌee ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata perã. Ãstaawa pida oo kꞌinia pꞌanapata ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa. Parã ijãapataarã tꞌãide paara mãga oopata, tꞌĩudakꞌãri nekꞌodaitꞌee parã ome. Mãgá parã kꞌũrapata aukꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌanadamerã ãchia oopatakꞌa. Ãchi kꞌaurepata awaraarãpa parã pia akꞌɨda–e pꞌanɨ.

Ãchia wẽraarã unudakꞌãri, audú kꞌãi kꞌinia pꞌanapata mãɨrã ome. Ichita kꞌĩsia pꞌanapata ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee. Kꞌũrapata pia ijãada–e pꞌanɨɨrã, aukꞌa kꞌãi kꞌinia pꞌanadamerã ãchi ome. Jɨrɨpata waapɨara ne–inaa kꞌachia oodaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌɨ̃apata ne–inaa jõma ãchia iru pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ. Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi kꞌachia ooitꞌee, ichia ooda mĩda.

Mãgá pꞌana kꞌiniapa ãchia Tachi Akꞌõre o atuajida. Oodai kꞌãyaara Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa, oopata chonaarãwedapema Bosor warra Balaampa oodakꞌa. Mãgɨpa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooitꞌee paji, pꞌaratꞌa audú ata kꞌinia bada perã mãga oorumaa.
Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru burromaa pedeepiji ɨtrɨatꞌaamerã. Ne–animal paji mĩda, mãgɨ́ burropa pedeeji mãikꞌaapa oopi–e paji chiparipa ma ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra kꞌawa–ee, pariatua oomerã.
Ma seewa jarateepataarã pozo pꞌoo bɨ́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ maa–e pɨrã jɨ̃arara pania wẽe bɨ́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ, parã kꞌaripada–e pꞌanadairã. Mapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi pëiitꞌee pꞌãriudee.

Ma seewa jarateepataarãpa iwẽsaa, pedee audua, pariatua nãga jarateepata: ijãapataarãpa oodai jõma ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa. Ma awara ãchia ijãapataarã jɨrɨpata kꞌachia oodaitꞌee ãra ome. Mãgá kꞌũrapata ewaa uchiarutaarã ijãadakꞌaa beerã pꞌanapatadeepa.

Jarapata ãchi eere tꞌĩurutaarã apida jua ekꞌari pꞌanapataadaitꞌee. Mamĩda ãchita pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata esclavoorãkꞌa, oopata perã ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãgɨmaa pꞌoyaapijidapɨ.

Mãɨrãpa Tachi Waibɨa, Tachi Kꞌaripapari Jesucristo kꞌawadakꞌãri, oo amaajida na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa oopata mãikꞌaapa uchiajida pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌariipa. Mamĩda mãga oodapꞌeda, waya baaijida pꞌekꞌau kꞌachiade, pꞌoyaapidapꞌedaa perã ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨamaa. Maperãpɨ ɨ̃rá kꞌachiara pꞌanɨ ãchi ijãadai naaweda pꞌanadapꞌedaa kꞌãyaara.

Piara bakꞌaji kꞌawada–e pada paara sãga pꞌanapataadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, mãga kꞌawa pꞌanadapꞌeda, uchiadai kꞌãyaara iru jua ekꞌariipa, ijãadaamaa pꞌanadairã irua ũraa pia jara pëida eperãarãmaa.
Mamĩda mãgɨɨrã pꞌanapata nãgɨ́ wãara pedee eperãarãpa jarapatakꞌa:
‘Usapa ãpꞌopꞌeda, waya kꞌo chepari ichi ãpꞌoda.’
mãikꞌaapa ‘Sina pania bëisãade kꞌuipꞌeda, waya yoorode tꞌĩupari.’
Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, na kꞌartꞌade mãikꞌaapa apema kꞌartꞌa mɨa parãmaa pꞌã pëidade, nãgɨ́ ne–inaa jõma kꞌirãpapiji. Ma awara ũraaji jĩpꞌa kꞌĩsiadamerã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Kꞌirãpátɨ chonaarãwedapema Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarãpa jaradapꞌedaa, jaradakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooitꞌee bada ãchi tꞌẽepai. Ichiaba kꞌirãpátɨ Tachi Waibɨa, Tachi Kꞌaripaparipa jarada tai kꞌapꞌɨa pari. Irua tai parãmaa pëiji jarateedamerã, mãgá parãpa iru ũraa pia kꞌawaadamerã.

Mamĩda ma jõma jaradapꞌedaade kꞌĩsiadapꞌeda, nãgɨ́ audupɨara kꞌirãpátɨ pia kꞌawaadamerã. Tachi Waibɨa waya chei naaweda, parã ijãapataarã tꞌãide Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa oo iru pꞌanapataarã uchiadaitꞌee. Mãgɨɨrãpa oodaitꞌee ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa parã oo iru pꞌanadaitꞌee.

“¿Sãgajima adaitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõrepa Cristo waya pëiitꞌeeda ada? Ma jarada ũridapꞌedaarã jai–idaadakꞌãriipa, na eujã aɨde nɨ̃bɨ ome aukꞌa bɨ naawedapemakꞌa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ewaa ookꞌãri. ¡Cristo waya che–e paitꞌeeda!” adaitꞌee.
Mãɨrãpa mãga jarapata kꞌirãpa kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa naaweda ooda. Ichi pedeepapai pajã beeji mãikꞌaapa aukꞌa ichi pedeepapai pania ũkꞌuru ãyaa pëiji eujã uchiamerã paniadeepa.
Ichiaba ichi pedeepapai ma pꞌekꞌau eujã jõpiji paniapa ũupikꞌãri.
Ma awara aukꞌa ichi pedeepapai pajã mãikꞌaapa eujã jɨ̃a iru bɨ ichi ewari waibɨa ewate tꞌɨpɨtaupa jõpirumaa. Ma ewate ijãadakꞌaa beerã jõmaweda atuapiitꞌee.

Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, ichiaba kꞌirãpátɨ nãgɨ́ pedee. Tachi–itꞌee kꞌãima aba makꞌɨara taarã–e; jõdee mil años taarãpari. Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee kꞌãima aba aukꞌa bɨ mil años ome. Jõdee mil años aukꞌa bɨ kꞌãima abaa ome.

Eperãarã ũkꞌuruurãpa kꞌĩsia pꞌanɨ Cristo waide che–e bairã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa oo–e paitꞌee ichia jaradakꞌa. Mamĩda mãga–e. Iru choo nɨ̃bɨ mãikꞌaapa parã chupɨria kꞌawaa nɨ̃bɨ, kꞌinia–e bairã apida atuadamerã. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌinia bɨ jõmaarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oo amaadamerã mãikꞌaapa oodamerã irua oopi bɨkꞌa, iru ewari waibɨa ewate pai naaweda.

Tachi Akꞌõre mãgá choo nɨ̃bɨ mĩda, ichi ewari waibɨa ewate paitꞌee. Ara nechɨapari pꞌãrikꞌua tachi atu pꞌanɨde parukꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa eperãarã atu pꞌanɨde iru ewari waibɨa ewate paitꞌee. Ma ewate golpe pururua nɨ̃bɨde pajã wẽpadariitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jõmaweda aɨde nɨ̃bɨ atane, akꞌõrejĩru, mãgee tꞌɨpɨtaupa jõpiitꞌee. Aukꞌa na pꞌekꞌau eujã mãikꞌaapa aɨde nɨ̃bɨ jõmaweda jõpiitꞌee.
Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa jõmaweda jõpiitꞌee perã, ¿sãga parã pꞌanapataadaipia bɨma? Kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa.

Nɨ pꞌanadaipia bɨ iru ewari waibɨa ewate pamerã mãikꞌaapa oodaipia bɨ irua oopi bɨkꞌa, ma ewate isapaira pamerã. Ma ewate pajã jõitꞌee tꞌɨpɨtaupa. Jõmaweda aɨde nɨ̃bɨ mãikꞌaapa na pꞌekꞌau eujãde nɨ̃bɨ aukꞌa jõitꞌee.
Mamĩda irua jaraji ma tꞌẽepai pajã chiwidi mãikꞌaapa eujã chiwidi ooitꞌee. Mãgɨ́ eujãde eperãarãpa irua oopi bɨkꞌa oodaitꞌee, aɨde ne–inaa kꞌachia wẽ–e perã. Mãgɨ́ eujãta tachia nɨmaa pꞌanɨ.
Maperã ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, parã nɨ pꞌanɨ misa Akꞌõrepa oomerã ichia jaradakꞌa, jɨrɨpatáatɨ kꞌachia wẽe pꞌanapataadaitꞌee iru kꞌĩrapite. Mãgá tꞌãri aukꞌa pꞌanapataadai iru ome.

Kꞌirãpátɨ Tachi Waibɨa choo nɨ̃bɨ kꞌinia bairã jõmaarãpa ichide ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa tꞌĩudamerã Tachi Akꞌõre ode, ichi waya chei naaweda. Tachi ɨ̃pema kꞌinia Pablopa ma ũraa ichiaba pꞌã pëiji parãmaa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru kꞌĩsia kꞌawaapida perã.

Irua kꞌartꞌa jõma pꞌãdade ma ũraa jaradoo, madepema pedee ũkꞌuru tachia pia pꞌoyaa kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ mĩda. Kꞌĩsia kꞌawa–ee pꞌanɨɨrãpa mãikꞌaapa waide pia ijãada–e pꞌanɨɨrãpa oopata mãgɨ́ pedee ome, awaraa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ũraa pꞌãpida ome oopatakꞌa. Ãchi kꞌĩsiadeepa ma ũraa seewa papipata mãikꞌaapa awaraarãmaa ma seewa jarateepata. Maperãpɨ ãchi atuadaitꞌee.

Mãpai ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, ɨ̃rá parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanadairã mãgee seewa jarateepataarã uchiadaitꞌee ijãapataarã tꞌãide, kꞌĩrakꞌaupai ijãadai ãrapa jarateepata. Ichiaba kꞌĩrakꞌaupai oodai ãrapa oopatakꞌa, oodakꞌaa perã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraade jara bɨkꞌa. Ɨ̃rá parãpa pia ijãapata. Mamĩda kꞌũrapiruta pɨrã ãramaa, parã ãyaa atadaridai Cristo ikꞌaawaapa.

Ma kꞌãyaara pipɨara kꞌawa wã́tɨ Tachi Waibɨa, Tachi O Kꞌachiadeepa Kꞌaripa Atapari Jesucristo mãikꞌaapa irumaa iidítɨ parã kꞌaripamerã. Mãgá pꞌanapataadaitꞌee irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. ¡Irua Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãree ichita unupiitꞌee, na eujã jõru pɨjida! ¡Amén!
Mãgapai paji.

Tai Jesucristo ome nipapatapꞌedaarãpa nepɨrɨpata kꞌaita iru. Mɨa na kꞌartꞌa pꞌã pëiru parãpa pida mãga kꞌawaadamerã. Na pꞌekꞌau eujã bai naaweda, Tachi Akꞌõre Pedeeta bapachi. Mãgɨ́ Jesucristo. Iru kꞌaurepata eperãarã ichita pꞌanapataadai Tachi Akꞌõre ome iru truade. Jesucristo na pꞌekꞌau eujãde nipakꞌãri, taipa iru unujida eperã jĩpꞌaakꞌa. Taipa iru tꞌõbaijida tachi juapa. Ichiaba ũrijida irua ũraa jarada.

Cristo Tachi Akꞌõre ome ichita bapachi mĩda, tai ɨ̃rapemaarãmaa eperã kꞌapꞌɨade unupiji. Irua Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepachi eperãarãmaa, ma ũraa ijãadapꞌeda ichita pꞌanapataadamerã iru ome Tachi Akꞌõre truade. Cheji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee. Taipa unujida irua ooda mãikꞌaapa jõmaarãmaa ma ooda nepɨrɨpata.
Parãmaa jarapata taipa unudapꞌedaa mãikꞌaapa taipa ũridapꞌedaa, parãpa mãga kꞌawaadapꞌeda, araa pꞌanapataadamerã tai ome, tai araa pꞌanapatakꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre ome mãikꞌaapa iru Warra Jesucristo ome.
Tachi jõmaarãta mãga pꞌanapataadakꞌãri, wãara o–ĩa pꞌanadaitꞌee. Ma–itꞌeeta mɨa parãmaa na kꞌartꞌa pꞌãmaa bɨ.
Jesucristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari Tachi Akꞌõrepa taimaa nãga jara pëiji. Tachi Akꞌõre ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨ. Ɨ̃daade maarepida pꞌãriu unuda–e pꞌanɨkꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõrede maarepida kꞌachia unuda–e.
Tachidepemapa jarai ichi araa bapari Tachi Akꞌõre ome. Mamĩda ma eperãpa atꞌãri ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa bɨ pɨrã, seewamaa bɨ. Ichia oo–e bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëidakꞌa.

Mamĩda eperã wãara ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨde bapari pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, araa bapariitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre ome mãikꞌaapa awaraa ijãapataarã ome. Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma eperã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jõmaweda wẽpapiitꞌee, iru Warra Jesús waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa.
Tachidepemapa jararu pɨrã ichi tꞌãride kꞌĩsia kꞌachia wẽe bɨ, ichi itu kꞌũramaa bɨ, seewamaa bairã. Mãgɨpa kꞌawa–e bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida.

Mamĩda mãgɨpa ichia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata jõmaweda jararu pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõremaa, tachi tꞌãride kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa chupɨria kꞌawaaitꞌee. Ooitꞌee ichia jara bɨkꞌa ichi ũraa jara pëidade. Ma eperã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jõmaweda wẽpapiitꞌee.

Mamĩda abaapa jararu pɨrã ichia ne–inaa kꞌachia ookꞌaa, jõmaarãmaa akꞌɨpi bɨ ichia Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraade ijãa–e. Mãgɨ́ eperãpa kꞌĩsia bɨ pɨrã ichia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ookꞌaa, mãgara ichiaba kꞌĩsia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa seewa jara bɨ ichi ũraade.
Warrarã,

Iru waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapii atuanaadamerã. Wãara tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapii. Mamĩda mãgapai–e. Ichiaba wẽpapii jõmaweda na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata.
Tachia kꞌawadai Tachi Akꞌõre wãara kꞌawa pꞌanɨ, iru ũraade jara bɨkꞌa oodakꞌãri.
Awaraa eperãpa jarai ichia Tachi Akꞌõre wãara kꞌawa bɨ. Mamĩda mãgɨpa oo–e bɨ pɨrã Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa, seewamaa bɨ. Kꞌawa–e bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida.
Mamĩda eperãpa ookꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraade jara bɨkꞌa, Tachi Akꞌõre wãara kꞌinia iru bɨ mãikꞌaapa chikꞌinia bapari iru ome. Nãgá kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachi, Tachi Akꞌõredeerã.
Eperãpa jara bɨ pɨrã wãara Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa bɨ, ma eperã baipia bɨ Jesucristo badakꞌa.

Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, mɨa na jararu parãpa oodamerã ɨ̃rapema–e, parãpa ũridooda perã Cristode ijãadakꞌãriipa. Chonaarãweda paara Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëiji eperãarãpa awaraarã ichiaba kꞌinia iru pꞌanapataadamerã.

Mamĩda na kꞌartꞌade mɨa ma jarada chiwidi pɨkꞌa jara bɨ. Chikꞌinia pꞌanapatáatɨ. Cristo wãara mãga bapachi ichideerã ome. Parãpa pida kꞌawaa wãda mãga pꞌanapataadaitꞌee. Parã Cristode ijãadai naaweda, pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨde pꞌanapachida, awaraarã kꞌiniada–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Mamĩda ɨ̃rá ma pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨdeepa uchia wãda ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa bɨdee.

Ma jara aupada wãara mĩda, parãdepemapa jarai ichia awaraarã kꞌinia iru bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda chi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bɨ pɨrã, wãara mãga oo–e bɨ. Atꞌãri ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa bɨ, pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa bɨde ookꞌajikꞌa.
Jõdee abaapa chi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa kꞌinia iru bakꞌãri, mãgɨpa wãara oopari Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa. Wãara mãgɨ́ eperã kꞌachiade baaipi–e.

Mamĩda ma eperãpa chi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa unuamaa iru bɨ pɨrã, ichi kꞌĩradoopa kꞌachiade bɨ, oo–e bairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa. Wãara mãgɨ́ eperãpa kꞌawa–e Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨ. Ma awara mãgá ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa bairã, pꞌoyaa oo–e Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa.
Warrarã, mɨa parãmaa pꞌãru, Jesucristo piuda kꞌaurepa Tachi Akꞌõrepa parãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapida perã.
Chonaarã, mɨa parãmaa pꞌãru, parãpa wãara Jesucristo kꞌawa pꞌanadairã. Iru bapachi na pꞌekꞌau eujã bai naaweda.
Kꞌũtrãarã, mɨa parãmaa pꞌãru, parãpa Netuara Poro Waibɨa pꞌoyaa wãda perã.
Warrarã, mɨa parãmaa pꞌãmaa bɨ, parãpa Tachi Akꞌõre wãara kꞌawapata perã.
Chonaarã, parãmaa pꞌãmaa bɨ, parãpa wãara kꞌawapata perã chi na pꞌekꞌau eujã ooi naaweda ichita bapari.

Kꞌũtrãarã, ichiaba parãmaa pꞌãmaa bɨ, parã Cristode wãara ijãapata perã mãikꞌaapa oopata perã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa pꞌãdade jara bɨkꞌa. Ma awara parãmaa pꞌãmaa bɨ Netuara Poro Waibɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa oodakꞌaa perã.
Pꞌananáatɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerã pꞌanapatakꞌa. Jɨrɨnáatɨ ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo na pꞌekꞌau eujãde paraa. Mãga jɨrɨruta pɨrã, chikꞌinia pꞌanada–e pai Tachi Akꞌõre ome.

Mɨa mãga jara bɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãde tachia unupata perã nãgee ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo: ne–inaa kꞌachia oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ tachi tꞌãridepai; ne–inaa kꞌachia unudakꞌãri tachi taupa, aukꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ; pedee audua pꞌanapata ne–inaa iru pꞌanadairã. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgee ne–inaa kꞌachia apida oopikꞌaa eperãarãmaa.
Mãgee ne–inaa mãikꞌaapa jõma ne–inaa kꞌachia na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ jõdaridaitꞌee. Mamĩda chi Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa oopataarã ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee iru ome.
Warrarã, taarã–e na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõdariitꞌee. Parãpa ũrijida Anticristo cheitꞌee. Wãara mãgɨ́ jĩakꞌaarã paraa tachi tꞌãide. Mapa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujã taarã–e jõdariitꞌee.

Mãgɨɨrã tachi tꞌãideepa uchiajida Cristode wãara ijãada–e pada perã tachia ijãapatakꞌa. Wãara mãgá ijãadapꞌedaa paara, wãda–e pakꞌaji. Mamĩda uchiadakꞌãri, unupijida ãchidepema apida Cristode wãara ijãada–e paji.

Jõdee parã jõmaweda Cristode wãara ijãa pꞌanɨ. Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida, Jesucristo, chi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bɨpa mãga kꞌawapida perã ichi Jaure pëikꞌãri parã ome bapariimerã.

Mɨa na kꞌartꞌa pꞌãrupa jara kꞌinia–e bɨ parãpa kꞌawada–e Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida. Jĩpꞌa mɨa pꞌãmaa bɨ parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanadairã ma wãarata jara pëidade seewa apida unudakꞌaa, Tachi Akꞌõrépata ma wãara jarada perã.

Maperã abaapa jara bɨ pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa Jesús pëi–e paji eperãarã rey pamerã, mãgɨ́ eperã seewamaa bɨ. Ma eperã Anticristo, jara bairã Jesús Tachi Akꞌõre Warra–e mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre Jesús Akꞌõre–e.
Chi mãga jara bɨpa wãara Jesucristode ijãa–e bɨ mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre wãara kꞌawa–e bɨ. Jõdee chi jara bɨpa Jesucristo Tachi Akꞌõre Warra, Tachi Akꞌõre wãara kꞌawa bɨ.

Maperã kꞌirãpátɨ parãpa naaweda ũridapꞌedaa, ewaa Cristode ijãadakꞌãri. Maapai kꞌawaajida Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida eperãarãmaa mãikꞌaapa tꞌãripa oo kꞌinia pꞌaneejida irua oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãgá oo wãkꞌãtɨ wã́tɨ. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanapataadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre ome mãikꞌaapa ichi Warra Jesucristo ome.
Cristopa mãga jara baji, jarakꞌãri ichita pꞌanapataadai Tachi Akꞌõre ome.
Mɨa naa jaradakꞌa mãgee Cristo kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanɨɨrã tachi tꞌãide paraa. Mãgɨɨrãpa parã kꞌũra kꞌinia pꞌanɨ.

Mamĩda parãpa ũrida–e paitꞌee mãgeerãpa jarateepata, Cristopa ichi Jaure pëida perã parã ome bapariimerã. Ma Jaurepa parãmaa ne–inaa wãara jõmaweda jarateepari. Seewa jarateekꞌaa. Mapa irua jaratee bɨkꞌa oo wãkꞌãtɨ wã́tɨ. Mãgá wãara tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanapataadaitꞌee Cristo ome.
Warrarã, mãgá tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanaruta pɨrã Cristo ome, parãpa waaweeda–e paitꞌee iru waya chekꞌãri na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee. Ma ewate iru kꞌĩrapite kꞌĩra nejasia–ee pꞌanadaitꞌee.
Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Jesucristo, Tachi Akꞌõre Warrapa ichita oopari ichi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa. Ichiaba kꞌawadaipia bɨ chi Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa ooparipa aukꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre warra.

¡Kꞌĩsíatɨ! Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi audú kꞌinia iru bapari perã, jarapari tachi ichi warrarã. ¡Wãarapɨ! Mamĩda na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa mãga pꞌoyaa kꞌawada–e, wãara Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawadakꞌaa perã.

Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, ɨ̃rá tachi wãara Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã. Mamĩda waide kꞌawada–e sãga pꞌanadai Cristo cheda tꞌẽepai. Aba kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Cristo waya chekꞌãri, irukꞌa pꞌanadaitꞌee, iru kꞌĩra wãree kꞌawadaitꞌee perã.
Tachi jõmaweda mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨɨrã nɨmaa pꞌanɨ iru cherumaa. Mapa mãgá nɨ pꞌanɨ misa, ne–inaa kꞌachia jõmaweda oo amaadaipia bɨ, irukꞌa pꞌanadaitꞌee, kꞌawa pꞌanadairã iru pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bapari.
Tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ chi ne–inaa kꞌachia oo bɨpa oo–e bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa. Mãga oo–e bakꞌãri, kꞌachiade bɨ.
Parãpa ichiaba kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Jesucristo na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee cheji eperãarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata jõmaweda wẽpapiitꞌee. Irua maarepida kꞌachia ookꞌaa paji.

Mapa wãara oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrãpa irua oopi bɨkꞌa tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanapata iru ome. Ne–inaa kꞌachia oo kꞌiniadakꞌaa, ichideerã perã. Mamĩda chi ne–inaa kꞌachia oopataarã tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanadakꞌaa iru ome, irude wãara ijãadakꞌaa perã mãikꞌaapa wãara iru kꞌawadakꞌaa perã.
Warrarã, kꞌũrapináatɨ apida seewapataarãmaa. Chi ooparipa Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa tꞌãri pia bapari Tachi Akꞌõrekꞌa.

Jõdee chi ne–inaa kꞌachia ooparipa oomaa bɨ Netuara Poro Waibɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujã oodakꞌãriipa, Netuara Poro Waibɨapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopari. Ma–itꞌee cheji Tachi Akꞌõre Warra na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee: jõpiitꞌee Netuara Poro Waibɨapa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata.
Tachi Akꞌõre warrarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo kꞌiniadakꞌaa, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure ãchi ome bapari perã. Wãara kꞌachiade pꞌoyaa pꞌanadakꞌaa, Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã perã.

Nãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ chisãgɨ́ Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã mãikꞌaapa chisãgɨ́ Netuara Poro Waibɨa warrarã. Chi oo–e bɨpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre warra–e. Ma awara chi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bɨpa Tachi Akꞌõre warra–e.
Cristode ijãadakꞌãriipa parãpa nãga ũridooda: chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ.

Tachia mãga kꞌawa pꞌanadairã, oonaadáma Caínpa oodakꞌa. Ichia ooji Netuara Poro Waibɨapa oopidakꞌa. Chi ɨ̃pema kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bapꞌeda, peetꞌaaji. ¿Sãapꞌeda mãga ooji? Ichi tꞌãri kꞌachia bapachi. Jõdee chi ɨ̃pema tꞌãri pia bapachi.
Maperã ɨ̃pemaarã, kꞌĩsianáatɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa parã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanadakꞌãri.

Naaweda tachi jida ãchikꞌa atuadaitꞌee paji, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa oodakꞌaa pada perã. Mamĩda Cristopa tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji, ichita pꞌanapataadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre ome mãikꞌaapa oopataadamerã irua oopi bɨkꞌa. Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachia wãara mãga oomaa pꞌanɨ, tachi ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa kꞌinia iru pꞌanapata perã. Chi ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã atuadaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee eperãpa ichi ɨ̃pema kꞌĩra unuamaa iru bɨ pɨrã, aukꞌa bɨ eperã chĩara peepari ome. Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ chĩara peepataarã ɨtꞌaa wãdakꞌaa.

Nãgá kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌinia iru bapari. Jesucristo piuji tachi pari. Mãga ooji tachi audú kꞌaripa kꞌinia bada perã. Mãgá tachia pida tachi ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa kꞌaripa kꞌinia pꞌanadaipia bɨ, piuruta pɨjida ma kꞌaurepa.

Mapa chi netꞌaa iru bɨpa ichi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa chupɨria nɨ̃bɨ unuru pɨrã, mamĩda chupɨria kꞌawa–e bɨ pɨrã, ma eperãpa akꞌɨpimaa bɨ ichia Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia–e bɨ. ¿Sãga ichia Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia iru bɨda aima, chi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa kꞌaripa–e bɨ pɨrã?
Warrarã, pedeepapai tachi ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanadaikꞌaraa bɨ. Ãra kꞌaripadaipia bɨ. Mãgá ooruta pɨrã, akꞌɨpidai wãara ãra mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ.
Mãgá tachi ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanadakꞌãri, tachia nãgɨ́ wãarata kꞌawaadaitꞌee. Tachi, Tachi Akꞌõredeerã. Tꞌãride mãga kꞌawadakꞌãri, inejasia–ee ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadaitꞌee irumaa.

Mamĩda inejasiadarii tachi tꞌãridepai kꞌĩsiaruta pɨrã: “Aai, mɨa wãara mɨ ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa makꞌɨara kꞌaripa–e.” Mãga kꞌĩsiaruta pɨrã, kꞌirãpadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa jõmaweda kꞌawa bɨ. Tachi kꞌãyaara kꞌawaara bɨ tachia wãara oo kꞌinia pꞌanɨ ichi–itꞌee.
Jõdee, ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, tachia mãgá kꞌĩsiada–e pꞌanɨ pɨrã, wãara inejasia–ee ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõremaa.
Ma awara ɨtꞌaa iididakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõremaa, irua ooitꞌee jõmaweda tachia iidi pꞌanɨ. Mãga ooitꞌee tachia oopata perã irua jara bɨkꞌa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨ tachia nãga oodamerã: Ijãadaipia bɨ Jesucristo wãara Tachi Akꞌõre Warra mãikꞌaapa chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ irua jaradakꞌa.

Chi ooparipa Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa tꞌãri a–ba bapari iru ome. Chikꞌinia pꞌanapata. Tachia mãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa tachimaa mãga kꞌawapipari perã. Ma–itꞌee ichi Jaure pëiji tachi ome bapariimerã.

Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, na pꞌekꞌau eujãde seewa–idaa beerã chokꞌara paraa. Mãɨrãpa “Tai Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepataarãda” apata mĩda, ijãanáatɨ ãchia jara pꞌanɨ. Pia ũridaipia bɨ jõmaarãpa jaramaa pꞌanɨ, kꞌawaadaitꞌee wãara jara pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa wa mãga–e.

Parãpa kꞌawaadai chisãgɨ́ eperãpa wãara jara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarapi bɨkꞌa. Chi jara bɨpa: “Jesucristo eperã jĩpꞌaakꞌa na pꞌekꞌau eujãde ba cheji” jara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarapi bɨkꞌa, wãara Cristode ijãapari perã.

Mamĩda chi mãga jara–e bɨpa pꞌoyaa jara–e Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarapi bɨkꞌa, mãgɨ́ eperãpa ijãakꞌaa perã Jesús, Cristo paji. Anticristo na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bada paara, mãgɨ́ pedeeparikꞌa pedeekꞌaji. Parãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ iru cheitꞌee tꞌẽepai. Mamĩda nãgaweda iru jĩakꞌaarã na pꞌekꞌau eujãde paraa.

Warrarã, parã Tachi Akꞌõredeerã. Mapa parãpa oodakꞌaa mãgɨ́ seewa–idaa beerãpa jara pꞌanɨkꞌa. Parãpa ãchi mãgá pꞌoyaadai chi parã ome bapari, Tachi Akꞌõre waibɨara bairã chi na eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerã ome bapari, Netuara Poro Waibɨa kꞌãyaara.

Ãchi mãikꞌaapa jõmaweda na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerã Netuara Poro Waibɨa jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata. Maperã na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌĩsia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo jara wãdakꞌãri, awaraarãpa ma seewa ũripata mãikꞌaapa aɨde ijãapata.

Mamĩda mãga–e tai ome, tai Tachi Akꞌõredeerã perã. Taipa wãarata jarateepata Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarapi bɨkꞌa. Mapa chi Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa beerãpa ũri kꞌinia pꞌanapata taipa jarapata. Mamĩda chi Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa–e beerãpa ũri kꞌiniadakꞌaa taipa jarateepata. Ãchia ũri kꞌinia pꞌanɨ seewa jarateepataarã, Netuara Poro Waibɨapa jarapi bɨkꞌa. Nãga kꞌawaadai chisãgɨ́ wãarata jarateepataarã mãikꞌaapa chisãgɨ́ seewa jarateepataarã. Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa beerãpa wãarata jarateepataarã ũri kꞌinia pꞌanapata. Jõdee Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa–e beerãpa seewa jarateepataarã ũri kꞌinia pꞌanapata.

Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadáma, Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãga oopi bairã. Jõmaarãpa awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanapata mãgá pꞌanapataadai, Tachi Akꞌõre warrarã perã mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa pꞌanapata perã.
Chi awaraarã kꞌinia–e bɨpa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa–e bɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jõmaweda kꞌinia iru bapari perã.
Nãgá Tachi Akꞌõrepa unupiji tachi audú kꞌinia iru bapari. Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee pëiji ichi Warra apai iru bada, mãgɨ́ kꞌaurepa tachi ichita pꞌanapataadamerã iru ome.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Warra mãgá pëikꞌãri, akꞌɨpiji tachi wãara kꞌinia iru bapari. Tachia iru mãgá kꞌiniada–e paji. Iruata tachi kꞌinia iru baji. Mapa ichi Warra pëiji piumerã tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata wẽpapiitꞌee.
Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi mãgá audú kꞌinia iru bapari perã, tachi jida chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ.

Apidaapa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra unuda–e pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda tachi chikꞌinia pꞌanaruta pɨrã, tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanapataadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre ome. Mãgá tachi kꞌapꞌɨa pari irua jõmaarãmaa unupiitꞌee wãara irua ãra jida kꞌinia iru bapari.
Nãga kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachi tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanapata Tachi Akꞌõre ome. Irua ichi Jaure pëiji tachi ome bapariimerã.
Ma awara taipa Tachi Akꞌõre Warra bapata unujida tachi taupa. Mapa jõmaarãmaa nãga nepɨrɨpata: Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi Warra pëiji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atade.
Mapa chi jara bɨpa Jesús Tachi Akꞌõre Warra tꞌãri a–ba bapari Tachi Akꞌõre ome.

Mãgá tachia Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa ijãa pꞌanɨ irua tachi kꞌinia iru bapari. Tachi Akꞌõrepa eperãarã jõmaweda kꞌinia iru bapari perã, eperãpa aukꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia iru bakꞌãri, tꞌãri a–ba bapari iru ome.

Tachia Tachi Akꞌõre mãgá kꞌinia iru pꞌanadakꞌãri, oomaa pꞌanɨ irua kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Irua kꞌinia bɨ waawee–ee pꞌanadamerã ichi kꞌĩrapite, ichi ewari waibɨa ewate pakꞌãri. Wãara ma ewate mãga pꞌanadaitꞌee, na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ misa iru ome tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanapata perã, Jesucristo iru ome tꞌãri a–ba baparikꞌa.

Wãara Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia iru baparipa maarepida waawee–ee bapari, kꞌawa bairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru aukꞌa kꞌinia iru bapari mãikꞌaapa maarepida iru kꞌachia oo–e paitꞌee. Mamĩda chi waide mãga kꞌawa–e bɨpa Tachi Akꞌõre waawee bapari, kꞌĩsia bairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi kꞌachia ooi. Mapa tachia nãga kꞌawadai. Eperã abaapa waawee bɨ pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru kꞌachia ooitꞌee, ma eperãpa waide pia kꞌawa–e bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru audú kꞌinia iru bapari.
Tachia Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ, irua naapɨara tachi kꞌinia iru bada perã.

Tachidepemapa jarai ichia Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia iru bapari. Mãga jara bɨ mĩda, ichi tꞌãride chi ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa unuamaa iru bɨ pɨrã, mãgɨ́ eperã seewamaa bɨ. Ichi ɨ̃pema unu bɨta kꞌinia–e bɨ pɨrã, ¿sãga kꞌinia iru bai Tachi Akꞌõre, unu–e bɨta?
Maperãpɨ Jesucristopa jaraji chi Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia iru bɨpa ichi ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa aukꞌa kꞌinia iru baipia bɨ.

Jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõre warrarãpa nãga ijãapata: Jesús, Cristo, ichi aɨ, Tachi Akꞌõrepa pëida eperãarã rey pamerã. Kꞌĩsiadáma nãgɨde. Tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ eperã abaapa awaraa eperã kꞌinia iru bakꞌãri, ma eperã warrarã paara kꞌinia iru bapariitꞌee.
Mãga bɨ ichiaba Tachi Akꞌõre ome. Tachia Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌinia iru pꞌanadakꞌãri mãikꞌaapa oodakꞌãri irua jara bɨkꞌa, kꞌawa pꞌanɨ iru warrarã jida kꞌinia iru pꞌanadaitꞌee.
Oodakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa, akꞌɨpimaa pꞌanɨ wãara iru kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ. Irua iidi–e bɨ oodamerã ne–inaa tachia pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa.

Tachia oodai Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa, iru warrarã perã. Jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõre warrarãpa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo amaa wãkꞌãtɨ wãpata, oo kꞌinia pꞌanapata perã irua jara bɨkꞌa. Tachia ne–inaa kꞌachia mãgá oo amaadai Cristode ijãapata perã.
Mapa jaradai: “Tachia ijãadakꞌãri Jesús Tachi Akꞌõre Warra, irua kꞌaripapari tachia na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ne–inaa kꞌachia jõma oo amaa wãkꞌãtɨ wãdamerã.”

Jesucristo na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee chekꞌãri, akꞌɨpiji ichi Tachi Akꞌõre Warra. Mãga ooji paniapa poro choopikꞌãri mãikꞌaapa ichi waa batꞌakꞌãri. Jesús, ichi aɨ, Cristo paji poro choopikꞌãri paniapa mãikꞌaapa ichi waa batꞌakꞌãri. Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepata ichiaba tachimaa kꞌawapipari Jesús Tachi Akꞌõre Warra. Ma Jaurepa ichita wãarata kꞌawapipari. Maperã ijãa pꞌanɨ wãara Jesús Tachi Akꞌõre Warra.
Mãpai jaradai nãgɨ́ ne–inaa õpeepa aukꞌa tachimaa kꞌawapi pꞌanɨ Jesús wãara Tachi Akꞌõre Warra:
Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa ma wãarata kꞌawapipari perã tachimaa; Jesupa ooda perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopidakꞌa poro choopikꞌãri paniapa mãikꞌaapa Jesupa ooda perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopidakꞌa iru waa batꞌakꞌãri.

Kꞌĩsiadáma nãgɨde. Eperãarãpa charraarã kꞌĩrapite ne–inaa jaradakꞌãri, ijãapata mãɨrãpa jara pꞌanɨ. Maperã audupɨara ijãadaipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa jarakꞌãri, ichi jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bapari perã. Ichia jaramaa bɨ Jesucristo ichi Warra ma jarada õpeepa.

Mapa chi Tachi Akꞌõre Warrade ijãaparipa kꞌawa bɨ iru wãara Tachi Akꞌõre Warra, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepata ma eperã tꞌãride mãga kꞌawapipari perã. Mamĩda chi mãga ijãa–e bɨpa jõmaarãmaa akꞌɨpimaa bɨ ichi kꞌĩsiade Tachi Akꞌõrepa seewa jara bɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨ tachia iru Warrade wãara ijãadakꞌãri, ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee iru ome.
Mapa jaradai: “Chi Tachi Akꞌõre Warrade wãara ijãapari ɨtꞌaa wãitꞌee. Mamĩda chi Tachi Akꞌõre Warrade ijãa–e bɨ ɨtꞌaa wã–e paitꞌee. Mãgɨ́ atuaitꞌee.”
Mɨa jõma jara aupada na kꞌartꞌade pꞌãji parã, Tachi Akꞌõre Warrade ijãapataarã, kꞌawaadamerã wãara ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre ome.

Maperã tachi inejasia–ee ɨtꞌaa iidipata Tachi Akꞌõremaa. Tꞌãride kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachia iidiruta pɨrã Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa oomerã ichia oo kꞌinia bɨkꞌa eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee, tachia iidiruta irua ũriitꞌee.
Ma awara kꞌawa pꞌanadairã irua ũripari mãgá iididakꞌãri, ichiaba kꞌawa pꞌanɨ irua ooitꞌee tachia iidi pꞌanɨkꞌa.

Parãdepemapa unuru pɨrã pɨ ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa bɨ, ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ipia bɨ ma ɨ̃pema pari, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru chupɨria kꞌawaamerã. Mãgá pɨa ma ɨ̃pema kꞌaripai, Tachi Akꞌõrepa iru ɨtꞌaa wãpimerã. Mãga ooi ma ɨ̃pemapa oo bɨ pɨrã ne–inaa kꞌachia, ma kꞌaurepa tachi atuapi–e. Mamĩda ne–inaa kꞌachia paraa, ma kꞌaurepa tachi atuapipari. Irua mãgɨ́ oo bɨ pɨrã, mɨa parãmaa jara–e ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃damerã iru pari.
Wãara eperãarãpa ooda–e pꞌanadakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa, ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa pꞌanɨ iru kꞌĩrapite. Mamĩda pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jõmaapa tachi atuapi–e.

Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre warrarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oo amaa wãkꞌãtɨ wãpata, Tachi Akꞌõre Warra, Jesucristopa ãra kꞌaripapari perã. Irua ãra akꞌɨpari Netuara Poro Waibɨapa ãramaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopinaamerã.
Kꞌawa pꞌanɨ tachi Cristode ijãapataarã Tachi Akꞌõredeerã. Jõdee apemaarã na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã Netuara Poro Waibɨa jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata.

Ichiaba kꞌawa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Warra na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee cheji Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawapiitꞌee tachimaa, mãgá kꞌawaadamerã kꞌaita wãara Tachi Akꞌõre. Tachi ijãapataarã chaa tꞌãri a–ba bapari ma wãara Akꞌõre ome, tꞌãri a–ba bapari perã iru Warra Jesucristo ome. Mãgɨta wãara Tachi Akꞌõre. Iru kꞌaurepata ɨtꞌaa wãdaitꞌee.
Chi mãga ijãada–e pꞌanɨɨrã seewadeta ijãa pꞌanɨ. Ãchia ijãapata chi ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataarãkꞌa. Mapa ijãanáatɨ ãchikꞌa.
Mãgapai paji.

Mɨ, Juan, Cristode ijãapataarã akꞌɨpari waibɨa. Mɨa na kꞌartꞌa pꞌãru parã ijãapataarãmaa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã jɨrɨtꞌerada perã Cristode ijãapataadamerã. Wãara mɨa parã kꞌinia iru bɨ. Mɨa aupaita parã mãgá kꞌinia iru bɨ–e. Jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëida kꞌawa pꞌanɨɨrãpa parã aukꞌa kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ.
Mɨa parã mãgá kꞌinia iru bɨ ma wãarata ɨ̃raweda tachi tꞌãride bapari perã mãikꞌaapa ichita baitꞌee perã tachi ome.

Wãara Tachi Akꞌõre mãikꞌaapa iru Warra Jesucristo tꞌãri pia pꞌanapata tachi ome. Mapa ãrapa tachi pia akꞌɨ pꞌanadaitꞌee. Ma awara tachi chupɨria kꞌawaadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa kꞌãiwee pꞌanapidaitꞌee. Mãgá wãara pꞌanadai Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadai iru ome.
Mɨ o–ĩa beeji kꞌawaakꞌãri parãdepemaarã ũkꞌuru pꞌanapata Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëidade jara bɨkꞌa.

Ɨ̃rá, ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, mɨa parãmaa enenee nɨ̃bɨ tachi chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadamerã. Mɨa mãga jarakꞌãri, jara–e bɨ ne–inaa parãpa waide kꞌawada–e pꞌanɨ. Tachia naa Cristode ijãadakꞌãriipa ma jarada ũridooda.

Nãgá tachia akꞌɨpidai Tachi Akꞌõre mãikꞌaapa awaraarã kꞌinia iru pꞌanɨ: oodakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨkꞌa. Iruata jara bɨ tachi chikꞌinia pꞌanapataadamerã. Parãpa mãga ũrijida naaweda Cristode ijãadakꞌãri.

Ma Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarada mɨa parãmaa kꞌirãpapi kꞌinia bɨ, na pꞌekꞌau eujãde seewa–idaa beerã chokꞌara paraa perã. Mãgɨɨrãpa ijãadakꞌaa Jesucristo na pꞌekꞌau eujãde ba cheji eperã jĩpꞌaakꞌa. Jaradakꞌaa Jesucristo Tachi Akꞌõre Warra. Mãgá tachia kꞌawa pꞌanɨ ãchia seewa jaratee nipapata. Ãchi Anticristo jĩakꞌaarã.

Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai ijãadai ãchia jara pꞌanɨ. Mãga ijãaruta pɨrã, jõpidaitꞌee jõma parãpa oomaa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Mɨa kꞌinia bɨ parãpa atadamerã jõma Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ teeitꞌee ichideerãmaa ɨtꞌari, oopatapꞌedaa perã irua oopi bɨkꞌa.

Eperãpa jararu pɨrã Cristopa jarateedakꞌa oo–e paitꞌee, ichia ma jarateeda kꞌãyaara Tachi Akꞌõre netꞌaa waapɨara kꞌawa bairã, mãgɨ́ eperãpa wãara Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa–e bɨ. Jõdee chi Cristopa jarateedakꞌa oo bɨpa wãara ijãapari Tachi Akꞌõre Warrade mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa bapari.
Maperã mãgee Cristopa jarateedakꞌa ooda–e pꞌanɨɨrãdepema aba parã tꞌãide cheru pɨrã, iru auteebaidaikꞌaraa bɨ. Mãgee jarateepataarã parãmaa chepidaikꞌaraa bɨ.
Parãdepema abaapa mãgee eperã auteebairu pɨrã, kꞌaripaitꞌee irua waapɨara kꞌachia oomerã ijãapataarãmaa, irua seewa jaratee bɨ kꞌaurepa.
Mɨa parãmaa waa jara kꞌinia bɨ, mamĩda kꞌartꞌa pꞌãdade mãga oo kꞌinia–e. Parã akꞌɨde wã kꞌinia bɨ, kꞌĩrapite pedeedaitꞌee. Mãgá tachi o–ĩa pꞌanadaitꞌee.
Parã ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, chi nãpema Tachi Akꞌõrepa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã Cristode ijãadamerã, parãmaa ichiaba salude tee pëiruta.
Mãgapai paji.
Kꞌõpꞌãyo Gayo mɨa wãara kꞌinia iru bapari,
Mɨ, Juan, Cristode ijãapataarã akꞌɨpari waibɨapa na kꞌartꞌa pɨmaa pꞌãru. Wãara mɨa pɨ kꞌinia iru bɨ.
Ɨ̃pema kꞌinia Cristo kꞌaurepa, mɨa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ bɨ ne–inaa jõmaade pɨ pia wãmerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌapꞌɨa pia bamerã pɨ tꞌãride Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite pia baparikꞌa.
Ũkꞌuru tachi ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa nama chedakꞌãri, nepɨrɨjida pɨa wãara oopari Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëidakꞌa, mãgɨde ijãapari perã. Mãga ũrikꞌãri, mɨ o–ĩa beeji.

Wãara mɨ ichita o–ĩa beepari kꞌawaakꞌãri ijãapataarã mɨchi warrarãkꞌa pꞌanɨ pꞌanapata Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëidade jara bɨkꞌa. Mɨ–itꞌee mãga kꞌawaai kꞌãyaara, ne–inaa awaraa pipɨara wẽ–e mɨ o–ĩapiitꞌee.
Ɨ̃pema kꞌinia, pɨa Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa pia oomaa bɨ kꞌaripakꞌãri tachi ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa, chi awara ãi jaratee nipapataarã. Wãara pɨa ãra auteebaipari, ãra kꞌawa–e bɨ mĩda.

Mapa nama chedakꞌãri, jõmaarã ijãapataarã taide nepɨrɨpata pɨa ãra kꞌaripada, ãra kꞌinia iru bapari perã. Mãgá kꞌaripaparíiji ãchi ode pia wãdamerã. Ãra kꞌaripáji Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, ãrapa iru mimia oomaa pꞌanadairã.
Ãra uchiajida ãchi tꞌãideepa jarateedaitꞌee Cristopa ooda mãikꞌaapa irua jarada. Ma wãdade ne–inaa maarepida iidi kꞌiniada–e paji ijãadakꞌaa beerã juadepema.
Mapa tachia ãra auteebaidaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa kꞌaripadaipia bɨ. Mãga ooruta pɨrã, ãra ome aukꞌa mimiadaitꞌee awaraarãpa Tachi Akꞌõre wãarata kꞌawaadamerã.
Mɨa aukꞌa jaraji awaraa kꞌartꞌa pëidade pɨ tꞌãidepema ijãapataarãmaa. Mamĩda Diotrefepa mɨ pedee ũri kꞌinia–e, ichi audua bairã. Ichi ijãapataarã poro waibɨa pa kꞌinia bɨ.

Ichia mɨ pedee mãgá ũri kꞌinia–e bairã, mɨ wãkꞌãri parã akꞌɨde, kꞌĩrapite pedeeitꞌee ichi ome. Mɨa kꞌirãpapiitꞌee ichia pedee kꞌachia jaramaa bɨ tai Akꞌõrepa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã ãpɨte. Mãgapai oo–e ichia. Ichiaba tachi ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa jaratee nipadakꞌãri ijãapataarã tꞌãide ichi kꞌaitꞌa, ichia mãgɨɨrã auteebaikꞌaa. Ma awara, awaraa ijãapataarãpa ãra auteebai kꞌinia pꞌanadakꞌãri, ichia mãga oopikꞌaa mãikꞌaapa jërepari ma auteebai kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrã awaraa ijãapataarã ikꞌaawaapa.

Gayo, mɨ ɨ̃pema kꞌinia, oonáaji ichia oo bɨkꞌa, ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa bairã. Ma kꞌãyaara pia óoji. Nãgɨ́ kꞌirãpáji. Chi ne–inaa pia oo bɨpa oopari Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mamĩda chi kꞌachia oo bɨpa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌawa–e bɨ.

Wãara Diotrefepa mãgá ne–inaa kꞌachia oomaa bɨ. Mamĩda Demetriopa mãga oo–e bɨ. Ijãapataarã jõmaarãpa nepɨrɨpata irua ne–inaa pia oopari. Iru bapari Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata jara pëidade jara bɨkꞌa. Tai nãpemaarãpa ichiaba jara pꞌanɨ iru tꞌãri pia bapari. Pɨata kꞌawa bɨ taipa seewadakꞌaa.
Mɨa pɨmaa waa jara kꞌinia bɨ, mamĩda kꞌartꞌa pꞌã bɨde mãga jara kꞌinia–e.
Taarã–e nɨde mɨ wã kꞌinia bɨ pɨ akꞌɨde. Mãgá kꞌĩrapite pedeedai.
Gayo, mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa pɨ kꞌãiwee bapimerã. Tachi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã nãpemaarãpa ichiaba pɨmaa salude tee pëiruta. Tai pari salude téeji jãma pꞌanɨ kꞌõpꞌãyo chaa.
Mãgapai paji.

Mɨ, Judas, Santiago ɨ̃pema, mimiapari Jesucristo–itꞌee. Na kꞌartꞌa pꞌãru Tachi Akꞌõrepa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãmaa. Irua parã kꞌinia iru bapari. Ma awara, Jesucristopa parã akꞌɨ bapari atuanaadamerã ichi waya cheru misa.
Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã audú chupɨria kꞌawaamerã, kꞌãiwee pꞌanapimerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌinia iru bamerã.

Ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, mɨa tꞌãripa pꞌãitꞌee paji jaraitꞌee sãga Cristopa tachi ijãapataarã jõmaweda o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji atuanaadamerã. Mamĩda, ma kꞌãyaara, pꞌãru ũraaitꞌee parãpa ijãa amaadamerã awaraarãpa seewa jarateepata mãikꞌaapa tꞌãripa Cristopa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa ijãadamerã, tai naapema ijãapataarãpa naaweda jarateedapꞌedaakꞌa.

Mãga jara bɨ ijãadakꞌaa beerã mera tꞌĩudapꞌedaa perã parã tꞌãide Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãapataarãkꞌa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽpapipari perã, pia bɨda a pꞌanɨ oodaitꞌee ne–inaa jõma tachi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa. ¡Mamĩda mãga–e! Ichiaba merapata Jesucristo Tachi Waibɨa, tachi ijãapataarã chipari. Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa chonaarãweda pꞌãdade jara bɨ mãgeerã jõdaitꞌee iru juapa.
Parãpa nãgɨ́ kꞌawa pꞌanɨ mĩda, mɨa kꞌirãpapiitꞌee. Tachi Waibɨapa Israel pidaarã jõmaweda Egipto eujãdeepa uchiapiji. Mamĩda tꞌẽepai ijãa amaa pꞌanadapꞌedaarã jõmaweda ichi juapa jõpiji.

Ma awara aɨ naaweda angeleerã ũkꞌuru uchiajida Akꞌõre jua ekꞌariipa, ãchi awaraa angeleerã poro waibɨarã pꞌanajida mĩda. Irua ãchi pꞌanapatapꞌedaamãiipa pëikꞌooji pꞌãriudee. Mama atꞌãri cadenapa jɨ̃a iru bɨ, ichi ewari waibɨa ewate nɨmaa. Mãgɨ́ ewate irua jõmaarã kꞌĩrapite ãchia kꞌachia oodapꞌedaa jaraitꞌee.

Awaraarã ichiaba ma angeleerã kꞌachia beerãkꞌa. Sodoma pidaarã mãikꞌaapa Gomorra pidaarã awaraa pꞌuuru kꞌaitꞌa pꞌanadapꞌedaarã ome ãchi kꞌapꞌɨapa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopachida; ne–inaa eperãarã jĩpꞌaarãpa yiaraa iru pꞌanapata. Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma pꞌuurudepemaarã jõpiji tꞌɨpɨtaupa. Mãgá apemaarãmaa akꞌɨpiji sãga tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa beerã jõpitꞌaaitꞌee tꞌɨpɨtau kꞌĩikꞌaa bɨpa.

Mãgɨ́ ijãadakꞌaa beerã parã tꞌãide pꞌanɨɨrãpa aukꞌa oopata. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma kꞌachia beerãmaa mãga ooji mĩda, ɨ̃rapema seewa jarateepataarãpa mãɨrã jĩakꞌa ãchia oo kꞌiniata oopata. Kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌapata perã, ãchia oopata ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa. Ma awara merapata Tachi Waibɨa ãchi chipari mãikꞌaapa angeleerã ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jarapata.
Jõdee Miguel, angeleerã poro waibɨa mĩda, akꞌɨpiji ichi Tachi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari bapari. Ikꞌachia pedee–e paji Satanamaa aupedeedakꞌãri Moisés kꞌapꞌɨa piuda pari; kꞌaipa ataitꞌee. Mãgaji:
‘Tachi Akꞌõrépata pɨ ɨtrɨaitꞌee.’

Mamĩda mãgɨ́ seewa jarateepataarãpa mãga ooda–e. Ne–inaa Tachi Akꞌõrede pia kꞌawada–e pakꞌãri, oo iru pꞌanapata pedee kꞌachiapa. Ne–animalaarãkꞌa ãchi kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa oopata, kꞌĩsiadakꞌaa perã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsiapiparikꞌa. Mapa mia jõnɨpa ãchi itu jõkꞌoodaitꞌee pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa kꞌaurepa.
¡Aai, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi kꞌachiadee pëiitꞌeepɨ! Pꞌekꞌau kꞌachiade nipapata Caínpa oodakꞌa.

Parã chipꞌedaidakꞌãri ne–inaa jedekꞌodaitꞌee, kꞌĩra nejasiadaipata mãgɨ́ seewa jarateepataarã kꞌaurepa. Mamĩda ãchi kꞌĩra nejasia wẽe, waibɨa kꞌopata mãikꞌaapa waibɨa topata, ãchita poro waibɨarãkꞌa Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite. Mãgá oodakꞌãri, chupɨria chitoonɨɨrã akꞌɨdakꞌaa. Jõmaweda ãchi–itꞌee aupai oopata. Jɨ̃arara pania wẽe bɨ́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ, nãupa ateepari eujã pꞌũasaadee. Ichiaba nejõ bɨɨrɨ́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ chaukꞌaa bakꞌãri, chaujara bɨ mĩda. Ãchi piu pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ ma pakꞌuru ẽtꞌadakꞌa mãikꞌaapa pꞌoodakꞌa.

Pꞌusa tꞌojara pakꞌãri, kꞌĩraudaipari mãikꞌaapa kꞌõpꞌepꞌee nejarra kꞌachia ome ipu ide atabëipari. Mãga pɨkꞌa mãgeerã. Golpe pedeepata eperãarã waibɨarãkꞌa. Mamĩda tachia unudai ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo ãchia oopata. Lucero Akꞌõrepa bɨdamãiipa uchiadákꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ, awaraarãmaa Tachi Akꞌõre o atuapipata perã. Mapa irua ãchi atuapiitꞌee, ichita pꞌãriude jɨ̃a paraa pꞌanadamerã.
Enoc Adandeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã sietede uchiaji. Tachi Akꞌõrepa Enocmaa pedeepiji mãgeerãde:
—¡Ũrítɨ mɨa jararu! Tachi Waibɨa cheitꞌee ichi angeleerã cho–kꞌara ome.

Akꞌɨ cheitꞌee jõmaweda eperãarãpa oopatapꞌedaa, jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Tachi Akꞌõrede ijãadakꞌaa beerã kꞌachiadee pëiitꞌee. Mãga ooitꞌee ãchi irude ijãadakꞌaa pꞌanadairã; ne–inaa kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa perã mãikꞌaapa iru ãpɨte pedee kꞌachia jarapatapꞌedaa perã.

Mãgɨɨrã tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanadakꞌaa. Ikꞌɨ̃atɨ pedeepata awaraarãmaa, ne–inaa oodakꞌãri. Tꞌãride oodaamaa pꞌanadairã Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌinia bɨkꞌa, oopata ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa. Audua pedeepata awaraarãpa pia akꞌɨdamerã mãikꞌaapa pedee pia jara pꞌanɨpa kꞌõpꞌãyo meraa pɨkꞌapata, jõmaweda pia uchiamerã ãchi–itꞌee aupai.
Mamĩda ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, parã mãga pꞌanadakꞌaa. Mapa kꞌirãpátɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãpa jaradapꞌedaa:
—Tachi Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate pai naaweda, ijãapataarã tꞌãide uchiadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa oo iru pꞌanapataarã. Mãgɨɨrãpa oodaitꞌee ãchi pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bɨ kꞌapꞌɨapa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Parã tꞌãide mãgá pꞌasa bɨ. Mãgee seewa jarateepataarãpa parã kꞌĩraupipata pãchi aukꞌaarã ome. Mapa awara–awaraadaipata. Ãchia oopata na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa oopatakꞌa, Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure wẽe pꞌanadairã.

Jõdee parã, ɨ̃pemaarã kꞌiniarã, mãga pꞌanadakꞌaa. Mapa chikꞌaripa pꞌanapatáatɨ waapɨara Cristode ijãadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa pipɨara kꞌawaadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa wãarata pedee jara pëida. Ma awara ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patáatɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa.

Kꞌĩra kꞌaupai kꞌĩra atuadai Tachi Akꞌõrepa tachi kꞌinia iru bapari mãikꞌaapa pꞌanapatáatɨ ichia kꞌinia bɨkꞌa. Kꞌãiwee nɨpatáatɨ Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristopa chupɨria kꞌawaaru ewate, ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee perã iru ome.
Pia ijãa–e beerã chupɨria kꞌawáatɨ waapɨara Cristode ijãadamerã.

Eperãarã netuara o kꞌachiade nipapataarã kꞌaripátɨ ijãadamerã mãikꞌaapa uchiadamerã tꞌɨpɨtau urua nɨ̃bɨdeepa uchiakꞌajidakꞌa. Eperã pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia ooyaa bakꞌãri, ichiaba chupɨria kꞌawáatɨ. Mamĩda ichia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata unuamaa iru pꞌanadaipia bɨ, pꞌaru mikꞌia jo bɨkꞌa. Mapa kꞌĩrakꞌaupai oodai ãchia oopatakꞌa.

Tachi Akꞌõrépata parã kꞌaripai mãɨrã kꞌachiade baainaadamerã. Ma awara ichia parã ateei ichimaa ichi kꞌĩra wãree unudamerã mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri o–ĩa, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bainɨ̃ pꞌanadamerã ichi kꞌĩrapite. Mapa o–ĩa irumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dáma.

Ichita Tachi Akꞌõre; awaraa Akꞌõre Waibɨa iru kꞌãyaara wẽ–e. Ichi Tachi O Kꞌachiadeepa Kꞌaripa Atapari. Maperã tꞌãripa o–ĩa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata: “Jesucristo, pɨ jõmaweda na pꞌekꞌau eujãde nɨ̃bɨ Rey Waibɨa Kꞌĩra Wãree. Ne–inaa jõmaweda pɨ jua ekꞌari iru bɨ. Ewaa weda ne–inaa jõmaweda chokꞌaji; atꞌãri chokꞌapari mãikꞌaapa ichita mãga bapariitꞌee. Amén.”

Na pꞌãdade mɨ, Juanpa jara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa kꞌawapida Jesucristomaa. Kꞌawapiji ichia na ewari ooitꞌee bɨ, Jesucristopa jõdee ichideerãmaa mãga kꞌawapimerã. Ɨtꞌariipa Cristopa pëiji ichi ángel mɨmaa, mɨ iru mimiapari perã.
Na pꞌãdade mɨa jara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa mɨmaa unupida, ichia mɨmaa jara pëida mãikꞌaapa Jesucristopa mɨmaa jarada.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa pia akꞌɨitꞌee na pꞌãda leerupa awaraarã taide, ichia jara pëida perã. Ichiaba pia akꞌɨitꞌee na pꞌãdade jara bɨ ũridapꞌeda, oo pꞌanɨpa aɨde ũraa bɨkꞌa, ma jõma ooitꞌee taarã–e perã.
Mɨ, Juanpa nãga pꞌã pëiru parã Ásia eujãdepema ijãapataarãmaa, siete chipꞌepataarã chaachaa.

Mɨa ɨtꞌaa iidi bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa parã pia akꞌɨ bapariimerã. Mãgá kꞌãiwee pꞌanapataadaitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõre ichita bapari; ichita bapachi mãikꞌaapa ichita cheitꞌee. Mɨa ichiaba iidi bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa parã kꞌaripamerã. Iru jaure siete pɨkꞌa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre su–akꞌɨ beepari kꞌĩrapite.

Ichiaba mɨa iidi bɨ Jesucristopa parã kꞌaripamerã. Iruata wãara jarapari Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara bɨ. Iruta piupꞌeda, naapɨara chokꞌai pꞌirabaiji ichita bapariitꞌee. Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema reyrã jõmaweda pꞌanapata iru jua ekꞌari. Iruata tachi kꞌinia iru bapari. Mapa tachi uchiapiji tachia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata jua ekꞌariipa. Mãga ooji iru waa batꞌada kꞌaurepa kurusode piukꞌãri tachi pari.
Iruata tachi ichideerã papiji ichi Akꞌõremaa pꞌaareerãkꞌa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadamerã eperãarã pari. Mapa jaradáma: “Jesucristo ichita jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bapariitꞌee.” ¡Amén!

‘¡Ũrítɨ! Iru cheitꞌee jɨ̃ararade. Maapai jõmaarãpa iru unudaitꞌee; iru supidapꞌedaarã paara. Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema to bee chaa eperãarã jarajẽedaitꞌee waaweepa, irua ãchi miapiitꞌee jĩakꞌaapa ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa. Mãga paitꞌee. Amén.’
Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨapa jara bɨ:
—Mɨta Alfa; nejõmaata naa. Ichiaba mɨta Omega; nejõmaata tꞌẽe. Mɨta jõmaarã Waibɨa. Mɨ ichita bapari; ichita bapachi mãikꞌaapa ichita cheitꞌee.

Mɨ, Juan, parã ɨ̃pema Cristo kꞌaurepa, parãkꞌa mɨ tꞌãri a–ba bapari perã iru ome. Mɨ ichiaba parã kꞌõpꞌãyo, tachi aukꞌa wãdaitꞌee perã Akꞌõre truadee mãikꞌaapa ɨ̃raweda tachi aukꞌa choopata perã Jesude ijãa pꞌanɨde, tachi jɨrɨ pꞌanɨ mĩda miapidaitꞌee ma kꞌaurepa. Mɨ Patmos islade pëijida Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepachi perã mãikꞌaapa Jesupa ooda jarateepachi perã.
