Mama bɨde tomia ewate ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃maa baji Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mãga nɨde kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌadachi. Mɨ ãpɨteikꞌa eereepa ũriji eperã golpe pedeeru, trompeta golpe jĩwaaparikꞌa.
Mãgaji:
—Pꞌã́ji pɨa unuru maapꞌeda pë́iji ijãapataarã chipꞌepata bee chaa nãgɨ́ siete pꞌuurude: Éfeso, Esmirna, Pérgamo, Tiatira, Sardes, Filadelfia, Laodicea pꞌuurudee aukꞌa.
Mãga ũrikꞌãri, pꞌɨrrabaiji akꞌɨitꞌee kꞌaipata mɨmaa mãga jara bɨ. Unuji lámpara bɨpata siete, awara–awaraa bainɨ̃ bɨ. Mãgɨ́ chaachaa nẽedee ooda paji.
Mãgɨ́ esajĩakꞌa unuji eperãkꞌa. Pꞌaru teesoo jɨ̃ baji. Kꞌɨrrɨde ne–inaa nẽedee ooda jɨ̃ baji. Nẽrabai baji ichi tꞌũade.
Ichi puda tꞌo–tꞌoo baji, oveja kꞌarakꞌa maa–e pɨrã nievekꞌa. Chi tau urua nɨ̃baji tꞌɨpɨtaukꞌa.
Chi bɨɨrɨ jida urua baji, bronce ɨrradakꞌãri uruaparikꞌa. Chi otau ũriji to kꞌida chaaree jĩwaaparikꞌa.
Ichi jua juaraare lucero siete iru baji. Chi itꞌaideepa uchiaji espada choma, kꞌĩraichaa weda pꞌewedee bɨ. Chi kꞌĩra urua nɨ̃baji akꞌõrejĩru imatꞌɨpa urua nɨ̃baparikꞌa.
Mɨa iru unukꞌãri, eujãde baainaji iru kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa piudakꞌa baibeeji. Mãpai irua mɨ tꞌõbaiji ichi juarapa mãikꞌaapa mɨmaa mãgaji:
—Pꞌeranáaji. Mɨ nejõmaata naa mãikꞌaapa nejõmaata tꞌẽe.

Mɨata eperãarã chokꞌai pꞌanapipari. Na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bɨde mɨ jai–idaaji. Mamĩda chokꞌai pꞌirabaiji, maadakꞌãriipa ichita bapariitꞌee. Mɨa llavekꞌa iru bɨ piudapꞌedaarãmãi ewaitꞌee. Madeepa eperãarã uchiapii mãikꞌaapa ãra kꞌaripai ichiaba chokꞌai pꞌirabaidamerã ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee mɨ ome. Maa–e pɨrã, kꞌinia–e pɨrã, ãra mãgá uchiapi–e paitꞌee.
Maperã pꞌã́ji pɨa unuru, ɨ̃rá ne–inaa wãyaa nɨ̃bɨ mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa tꞌẽepai wãyaaitꞌee bɨ.

Pɨa unu bɨ ne–inaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa waide unupi–e pada apidaamaa: na lucero siete mɨ jua juaraare mãikꞌaapa jã lámpara bɨpata siete nẽedee ooda. Na lucero siete jara kꞌinia bɨ angeleerã siete bɨda ijãapataarã chipꞌepata siete aba–abaa akꞌɨdamerã. Jõdee jã lámpara bɨpata siete jara kꞌinia bɨ ma ijãapataarã chipꞌepatamãi siete.
Mãpai irua mɨmaa mãgaji:
—Nãgɨ́ pedee pꞌã pë́iji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ángel pëidamaa
Nãga jara bɨ ma lucero siete iru bɨpa ichi juaraare, bɨ misa ma lámpara bɨpata siete nẽedee ooda ome.

Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ parã Efesodepemaarã pꞌanapata. Pia mimiapata seewa–idaa beerã tꞌĩunaadamerã pãchi tꞌãide mãikꞌaapa pia choopata mɨde ijãa pꞌanɨde. Kꞌawa bɨ parãpa chooda–e, tꞌãri kꞌachia–idaa beerã tꞌĩu kꞌinia pꞌanadakꞌãri pãchi tꞌãide. Mãɨrãpa seewata taita Cristopa pëidada adakꞌãri, parãpa akꞌɨpachida ãchia jarateepata, kꞌawaa atarutamaa ãchi seewa–idaa bee.
Maapai parãpa choopachida, mãɨrãpa nepɨra jɨrɨpachida mĩda parã ome. Sẽ–ee mãgá choopachida, nepɨrade baaijida mĩda mɨde ijãa pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa.
Mãgá choopachida mĩda, mɨa pia akꞌɨ–e nãgɨ́ ne–inaa parãpa oopata. Mɨ mãikꞌaapa pãchi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã kꞌinia iru pꞌanada–e naawedapemakꞌa.

Kꞌirãpátɨ sãga pꞌanapachida ewaa mɨde ijãadakꞌãri. Parãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata oo amáatɨ mãikꞌaapa tꞌãripa jõma oopatáatɨ naawedapemakꞌa, mɨ kꞌinia iru pꞌanadairã mãikꞌaapa pãchi kꞌõpꞌãyoorã kꞌinia iru pꞌanadairã. Mãga ooda–e pɨrã, mɨa pãchi lámpara bɨpata ãyaa ataitꞌee. Mãgá mɨ waa parã ome ba–e paitꞌee.
Mɨa mãga jara bɨ mĩda, parãpa nãgɨ́ ne–inaa pia oopata. Mɨkꞌa parãpa aukꞌa unuamaa iru pꞌanapata Nicolaíta pidaarãpa kꞌachia oopata.

Kꞌɨɨrɨ ẽesaa pꞌanátɨ ũridamerã Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jara bɨ ijãapataarãmaa, ãchi chipꞌepata chaa. Kꞌachia pꞌoyaapataarãmaa mɨa kꞌopiitꞌee eperãarã chokꞌai pꞌanapipari pakꞌurudepema; mãgɨ́ pakꞌuru Tachi Akꞌõre eujãde bɨ.
Mãpai irua mãgaji:
—Ɨ̃rá nãgɨ́ pedee pꞌã pë́iji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ángel pëidamaa Esmirna pꞌuurudepema ijãapataarã akꞌɨmerã:
Nãga jara bɨ nejõmaata naa, nejõmaata tꞌẽe; chi jai–idaapꞌeda chokꞌai pꞌirabaidapa.

Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ parã Esmirnadepemaarã nepɨrade pꞌanapata eperãarãpa parã jɨrɨpata perã miapidaitꞌee. Unu bɨ parã chupɨria jõnapata, wãara chupɨria–ee pꞌanɨ mĩda, ɨtꞌari iru pꞌanadairã jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ parã–itꞌee. Kꞌawa bɨ pedee kꞌachia judiorã apataarãpa jara jõnɨ parã ãpɨte. Mãɨrã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa jarateepata tede chipꞌepata mĩda, wãara Tachi Akꞌõredeerã–e, mɨchideerã jɨrɨpata perã. Tachi Akꞌõredeerãkꞌa pꞌanapataadai kꞌãyaara, Satanadeerã́kꞌapɨ pꞌanapata.

Waaweenáatɨ mãgeerãpa parãmaa ooruta. ¡Ũrítɨ! Mãgeerã kꞌapꞌɨa pari Satanapa parã ũkꞌuru tꞌɨpiitꞌee carcelde, mɨde ijãa amaadai jĩakꞌaapa ma kꞌaurepa. Ewari diez mama pꞌanadaitꞌee. Mamĩda chóotɨ mɨde ijãa pꞌanɨde, mama parã peeruta pɨjida. Mãgá chooruta pɨrã, mɨa ɨtꞌaripema poro jɨ̃ra teeitꞌee parãmaa, ichita pꞌanapataadamerã mɨ ome mɨchi truade.
Kꞌɨɨrɨ ẽesaa pꞌanátɨ ũridamerã Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jara bɨ ijãapataarãmaa, ãchi chipꞌepata chaa. Kꞌachia pꞌoyaapataarã piuda aba piudaitꞌee. Atuada–e paitꞌee Cristode ijãadakꞌaa beerãkꞌa.
Mãpai irua mãgaji:
—Ɨ̃rá nãgɨ́ pedee pꞌã pë́iji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ángel pëidamaa Pérgamo pꞌuurudepema ijãapataarã akꞌɨmerã:
Nãga jara bɨ espada choma kꞌĩraichaa weda pꞌewedee iru bɨpa.

Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ parã Pergamodepemaarã pꞌanapatamãi. Satanás rey su–akꞌɨ beeparíkꞌapɨ bɨ, jãpemaarã chokꞌara ichi jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata perã. Mamĩda parãmaa ikꞌachia Cristodeerãda adakꞌãri, mɨ merada–e paji. Ma awara parã choopachida mɨde ijãa pꞌanɨde, parã kꞌõpꞌãyo Antipas peejida mĩda mɨa ooda jarateeda perã. Parã mãgá choojida, iru peejida mĩda pãchi tꞌãide, Satanás baparimãi.

Parã mãgá choopachida mĩda, mɨa pia akꞌɨ–e nãgɨ́ ne–inaa parãpa oopata. Pãchi tꞌãide ũkꞌuruurãpa jarateepata Balaampa chonaarãweda jarateedakꞌa. Mãgɨpa Balacmaa jaraji sãga kꞌũrai Israel pidaarã, ãrapa kꞌodamerã nechiara ata bɨdapꞌedaa ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite, aɨ kꞌĩrapite eperãarãpa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata. Ichiaba kꞌũraji ãrapa kꞌachia oodamerã awaraarã ome. Israel pidaarãpa ma ne–inaa omé oodakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãra pia akꞌɨ–e paji.
Ma jĩakꞌa pãchi tꞌãide ichiaba ũkꞌuruurãpa jarateepata Nicolaíta pidaarãpa jarateepatakꞌa.

¡Ma kꞌachia choonáatɨ pãchi tꞌãide! Mãɨrãpa jarateepata choodai kꞌãyaara, ma jarateepata kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapatáatɨ, mɨa kꞌĩra unuamaa iru baparikꞌa. Maa–e pɨrã mɨa mãɨrã miapiitꞌee mɨ itꞌaideepa uchia bɨ espada choma bɨpa; mãgɨ́ mɨ pedee.
Kꞌɨɨrɨ ẽesaa pꞌanátɨ ũridamerã Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jara bɨ ijãapataarãmaa, ãchi chipꞌepata chaa. Kꞌachia pꞌoyaapataarãmaa mɨa kꞌopiitꞌee ɨtꞌaripema chikꞌo mera iru bɨ
Mãpai irua mãgaji:
—Ɨ̃rá nãgɨ́ pedee pꞌã pë́iji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ángel pëidamaa Tiatira pꞌuurudepema ijãapataarã akꞌɨmerã:
Nãga jara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Warrapa; chi tau urua nɨ̃bɨ tꞌɨpɨtaukꞌa mãikꞌaapa bɨɨrɨ urua bɨ bronce ɨrradakꞌãri uruaparikꞌa.

Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ parã Tiatiradepemaarãpa oopata mɨde ijãapata perã. Chikꞌinia pꞌanapata mãikꞌaapa choopata mɨde ijãa pꞌanɨde. Mapa awaraarã kꞌaripapata mãikꞌaapa choopata, nepɨrade baairuta pɨjida. Audupɨara mãga oomaa pꞌanɨ naawedapema kꞌãyaara, mɨde ewaa ijãa pꞌaneedakꞌãri.

Ɨ̃rá mãga oomaa pꞌanɨ mĩda, mɨa pia akꞌɨ–e nãgɨ́ ne–inaa parãpa oopata. Ichiakꞌau bɨpata jã chonaarãwedapema wẽra Jezabel jĩakꞌaa, ichia ne–inaa kꞌachia jarateemerã pãchi tꞌãide. Ichi Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jaraparida apari. Mamĩda mãga–e. Kꞌũrayaa bapari. Ichia jarateepari pia bɨ mɨchideerãpa pꞌekꞌau oodamerã mãikꞌaapa pia bɨ ãrapa kꞌodamerã nechiara ata bɨdapꞌedaa ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite, aɨ kꞌĩrapite eperãarãpa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata.
Mɨa jaraji ma kꞌachia oopata oo amaamerã. Mamĩda mãga oo kꞌinia–e.
Mapa mɨa ichi kꞌayaapiitꞌee; ichi ome kꞌachia oo pꞌanɨɨrã paara. Mãɨrã aukꞌa miapiitꞌee, oo amaada–e pɨrã ma kꞌachia ichia oopida.

Ma awara mɨa peeitꞌee ichia jaratee bɨde ijãapataarã, ichi warrarãkꞌa pꞌanadairã. Mãgapɨ mɨde ijãapataarã jõmaarãpa kꞌawaadaitꞌee mɨa nejõmaata kꞌawa bɨ; eperãpa tꞌãridepai kꞌĩsia bɨ mãikꞌaapa tꞌãripa oo kꞌinia bɨ paara. Mɨata akꞌɨitꞌee pãchia oopata mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa teeitꞌee eperã chaachaa irua ne–inaa oopata pari na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bɨ misa; ne–inaa pia irua pia oopata pari maa–e pɨrã ne–inaa kꞌachia irua kꞌachia oopata pari.

Ɨ̃rá mɨa nãga jara bɨ parã apemaarãmaa Tiatira pꞌuurude pꞌanɨ. Parãpa pia oo pꞌanɨ kꞌawa kꞌiniadakꞌaa perã ma wẽrapa jaratee bɨ. Jɨrɨdakꞌaa Satanás netꞌaa kꞌawaadaitꞌee; jãgee netꞌaa eperãarãpa kꞌawadaikꞌaraa bɨ. Parã ma kꞌachiade tꞌĩu kꞌiniadakꞌaa perã, mɨa ne–inaa awaraa iidi–e paitꞌee parãpa oodamerã.
Jĩpꞌa kꞌinia bɨ parã choodamerã mɨde ijãa pꞌanɨde mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa pia oo pꞌanɨde, mɨ waya cheru misa.
Parãdepema kꞌachia pꞌoyaapataarã pia akꞌɨitꞌee mɨa oopi bɨkꞌa oo pꞌanadakꞌãri parã jai–idaarutamaa. Parã bɨitꞌee eperãarã pꞌuuru akꞌɨpataadamerã, reypa ooparikꞌa.

Mɨ Akꞌõrepa eperãarã bɨdakꞌa mɨ jua ekꞌari, mãgá mɨa eperãarã bɨitꞌee parã jua ekꞌari. Parãpa ma pꞌuuru pidaarã pãchi jua ekꞌari iru pꞌanadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa chupɨria kꞌawaada–ee mɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã jõtꞌaadaitꞌee. Reypa tuma hierrodee juade iru bɨpa ooparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa parãpa oodaitꞌee.
‘Mãɨrã ome oodaitꞌee eperãpa chokꞌo pakꞌurupa wɨkꞌãri ooparikꞌa.’
Ichiaba mɨa ɨ̃datɨpodopa lucero teeitꞌee parãmaa, mɨ jĩakꞌa ɨ̃daa pɨkꞌa pꞌanapataadamerã.
Kꞌɨɨrɨ ẽesaa pꞌanátɨ ũridamerã ma pedee Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jarada ijãapataarãmaa, ãchi chipꞌepata chaa.
Mãpai irua mãgaji:
—Ɨ̃rá nãgɨ́ pedee pꞌã pë́iji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ángel pëidamaa Sardes pꞌuurudepema ijãapataarã akꞌɨmerã:

Nãga jara bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure siete pɨkꞌa iru bɨpa; chi lucero siete iru bɨ ichi juade. Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ parã Sardedepemaarãpa ne–inaa oopata. Eperãarãpa jarapata: “Jã ijãapataarã chokꞌai pꞌanɨda” apata, parãpa wãara mɨde ijãapata jĩakꞌaapa. Mamĩda mãga–e. Piudapꞌedaarã́kꞌapɨ pꞌanɨ, wãara ijãada–e pꞌanadairã.
¡Mapa ũrítɨ! Parãpa mɨde ijãapata jõi naaweda, jɨrɨpatáatɨ oodaitꞌee mɨa oopi bɨkꞌa. Mɨa unu bɨ parãpa ne–inaa oopata pia–e bɨ Mɨchi Waibɨa kꞌĩrapite.

Kꞌĩsíatɨ parãpa naaweda ũridapꞌedaade Tachi Akꞌõrepa jara pëida jaratee chedakꞌãri. Parãpa ma jarateedapꞌedaa ijãajida. Mapa ɨ̃rá oopatáatɨ ma jaradakꞌa. Parãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata oo amáatɨ. Mãga ooda–e pɨrã, atu bɨde nechɨapari cheparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨ cheitꞌee. Parãpa kꞌawada–e ewari mɨ cheitꞌee parã miapide.

Mamĩda parã Sardedepema ijãapataarã jõmaweda nipadakꞌaa ijãadakꞌaa beerãkꞌa. Chokꞌara–ee pꞌanɨ mĩda, ũkꞌuru pꞌanadakꞌaa mãɨrãkꞌa. Mapa parã ɨtꞌari mɨ ome nipapataadaitꞌee. Pꞌaru tꞌo–tꞌoo jɨ̃ pꞌanadaitꞌee, pia pꞌanapata perã Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.

Wãara jõmaweda kꞌachia pꞌoyaapataarã pꞌaru tꞌo–tꞌoo jɨ̃pataadaitꞌee. Mɨa mãɨrã tꞌɨ̃ wẽpapikꞌaa paitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre ome ichita ɨtꞌari pꞌanapataadaitꞌeerã tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã jẽra bɨ librodeepa. Ma kꞌãyaara mɨchideerã aitꞌee mɨ Akꞌõremaa mãikꞌaapa ichi angeleerãmaa.
Kꞌɨɨrɨ ẽesaa pꞌanátɨ ũridamerã Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jara bɨ ijãapataarãmaa, ãchi chipꞌepata chaa.
Mãpai irua mãgaji:
—Ɨ̃rá nãgɨ́ pedee pꞌã pë́iji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ángel pëidamaa Filadelfia pꞌuurudepema ijãapataarã akꞌɨmerã:

Nãga jara bɨ pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia wẽe bɨ, chi wãara aupaita jaraparipa. Chonaarãwedapema Rey David jõmaarã poro waibɨa badakꞌa, mɨ jõmaarã poro waibɨa. Mɨa aupaita llavekꞌa iru bɨ eperãarã wãpiitꞌee Akꞌõre truadee. Mɨ awara apidaapa wãpida–e pai mãikꞌaapa apidaapa jarada–e pai wãnaadamerã.

Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ parã Filadelfiadepemaarãpa oopata. Kꞌawa bɨ awaraarã kꞌĩrapite parã makꞌɨara waibɨa–ee pꞌanɨ mĩda, pꞌanapata mɨa jarateedakꞌa mãikꞌaapa choopata mɨde ijãa pꞌanɨde, mɨ merada–ee. Mãga pꞌanapata perã parã kꞌĩrapite mɨa o ooji, aɨde wãdamerã. Mɨata ma o ooda perã, apidaapa jarada–e pai parã aɨde wãnaadamerã.

¡Ũrítɨ mɨa ooitꞌee Satanadeerãmaa! Mãɨrãpa tai wãara judiorãda apata; Tachi Akꞌõredeerã. Mamĩda seewamaa pꞌanɨ. Mɨa mãɨrã bedabaipiitꞌee parã kꞌĩrapite. Mãga ooitꞌee ãchia kꞌawaadamerã mɨa parã kꞌinia pꞌe iru bapari.

Parãpa oojida mɨa jaradakꞌa. Choopata mɨde ijãa pꞌanɨde, ma kꞌaurepa nepɨrade baaijida mĩda. Maperãpɨ mɨa parã kꞌaripaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerã miapikꞌãri ichia ewari awara bɨdade ma–itꞌee. Ma ewate ichia akꞌɨpiitꞌee chisãgɨɨrã wãara ichide ijãapata mãikꞌaapa chisãgɨɨrã ijãadakꞌaa.
Taarã–e mɨ cheitꞌee. Chóotɨ mɨde ijãa pꞌanɨde. Kꞌĩrakꞌaupai apidaapa atuapidai ɨtꞌaripema poro jɨ̃ra

Kꞌachia pꞌoyaapataarã mɨa te bɨɨrɨ mãudee oodakꞌa papiitꞌee mɨ Akꞌõre tede. Ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee jãma mɨ Akꞌõre ome. Mɨa mɨ Akꞌõre tꞌɨ̃ pꞌãitꞌee ma pꞌoyaapataarã ɨ̃rɨ, jõmaarãpa kꞌawaadamerã mɨ Akꞌõre ãchi chipari. Ma awara mɨa pꞌãitꞌee mɨ Akꞌõre pꞌuuru tꞌɨ̃, Jerusalén chiwidi, ãchi ɨ̃rɨ, jõmaarãpa kꞌawaadamerã ãchi ma pꞌuurudepemaarã. Mãgɨ́ pꞌuuru Akꞌõrepa pëiitꞌee ɨtꞌariipa. Ma awara ãchi ɨ̃rɨ mɨa pꞌãitꞌee mɨchi tꞌɨ̃ chiwidi, jõmaarãpa kꞌawaadamerã ãchi mɨchideerã.
Kꞌɨɨrɨ ẽesaa pꞌanátɨ ũridamerã Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jara bɨ ijãapataarã jõmaarãmaa.
Mãpai irua mãgaji:
—Ɨ̃rá nãgɨ́ pedee pꞌã pë́iji Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi ángel pëidamaa Laodicea pꞌuurudepema ijãapataarã akꞌɨmerã:
Chi nãga jara bɨ Amén apata. Irua ichita oopari ichia jara bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre wãarata jara pëida jarapari. Iru kꞌapꞌɨa pari Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa jõma ooji.

Mɨa kꞌawa bɨ parã Laodiceadepemaarãpa oopata. Kꞌawa bɨ parã kꞌũrasaa pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ–e ijãada–e pꞌanɨɨrãkꞌa. Mamĩda ichiaba wãsia pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ–e wãara ijãapataarãkꞌa. Taawa parã kꞌũrasaa pɨkꞌa pꞌanapataadai maa–e pɨrã wãsia pɨkꞌa pꞌanapataadai.
Mamĩda mãga pꞌanɨ–e. Ma kꞌãyaara parã jɨ̃ɨrɨa pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ; ijãa–ijãa pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ. Mapa mɨ choo–e parã ome. Parã yiaraa iru baitꞌee.

Mɨa parã choo–e pãchia mãgapata perã: “mɨchi juadoopa nejõmaata iru bɨ. Mapa maarepida falta–eda” apata. Mãga jaradakꞌãri, pariatua pedeepata. Pꞌaratꞌara pꞌanɨ mĩda, Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee parã wãara chupɨria chitoonɨ; tau pꞌãriu pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ, mãikꞌaapa ãkꞌadaa pɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ.

Mãga pꞌanadairã mɨa ũraaitꞌee mɨmaata neto atadamerã ne–inaa nẽe ewaa atadakꞌa tꞌɨpɨtaudeepa. Ichiaba mɨmaa neto atátɨ pꞌaru tꞌorroo jɨ̃daitꞌee mɨa jɨ̃parikꞌa. Mãgá waa kꞌĩra nejasia pꞌanada–e, parã ãkꞌadaa pɨkꞌa pꞌanadairã. Ma awara mɨmaa neto atátɨ neera pãchi tau–itꞌee. Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõre wãarata pia unudai.
Mɨa ɨtrɨapari mãikꞌaapa miapipari mɨa kꞌinia iru bɨɨrã jõmaweda. Maperã kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa ijãapatáatɨ. Pãchi audua pedee pedee amáatɨ mãikꞌaapa óotɨ mɨa oopi bɨkꞌa.
¡Ũrítɨ! Eperã puerta tꞌaide tꞌɨ̃jaramaa bainɨ̃ beeparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mɨa parã tꞌɨ̃jaramaa bɨ. Chi mɨ pedee ũrikꞌãri, ichi puerta ewaru pɨrã, mɨ tꞌĩutꞌee iru tede mãikꞌaapa tꞌãri a–ba pꞌanadaitꞌee.
Kꞌachia pꞌoyaapataarã mɨa su–akꞌɨ beepiitꞌee mɨ ikꞌaawa, mɨ su–akꞌɨ beeparikꞌa mɨ Akꞌõre ikꞌaawa. Mɨ mama su–akꞌɨ beepari, kꞌachia pꞌoyaapari perã.
Kꞌɨɨrɨ ẽesaa pꞌanátɨ ũridamerã Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa jara bɨ ijãapataarãmaa, ãchi chipꞌepata chaa.
Ma tꞌẽepai awaraa kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌaji. Unuji puerta Tachi Akꞌõre eujãde tꞌĩupata ewa nɨ̃bɨ. Mãpai ũriji ma otau naaweda ũrida golpe pedeeru trompeta jĩwaaparikꞌa. Mãgaji:
—Chéji ɨtꞌaa. Mɨa akꞌɨpiitꞌee ne–inaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa na ewari ooitꞌee bɨ.
Aramata Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa mɨ ateeji. Mama ɨtꞌari mɨa unuji rey su–akꞌɨ beepari bainɨ̃ bɨ. Aɨ ɨ̃rɨ Tachi Akꞌõre su–akꞌɨ baji.
Iru kꞌĩra wãree baji. Urua baji mãu pi–ia bëisãa jaspekꞌa mãikꞌaapa mãu pi–ia pꞌoree cornalinakꞌa. Chi su–akꞌɨ beepari tꞌɨakꞌau baji euma pꞌɨtrɨa pɨkꞌa bɨpa; pꞌãwaraa bɨ mãu pi–ia esmeraldakꞌa.

Ma su–akꞌɨ beepari wapꞌɨra baji awaraa su–akꞌɨ beepari veinticuatropa. Aɨ ɨ̃rɨ su–akꞌɨ pꞌanajida chonaarã poro waibɨarã veinticuatro. Pꞌaru tꞌo–tꞌoo jɨ̃ pꞌanajida mãikꞌaapa poro jɨ̃ra nẽedee ooda jɨ̃ pꞌanajida.

Tachi Akꞌõre su–akꞌɨ beeparideepa pa tau pꞌorepꞌorepari nɨ̃baji mãikꞌaapa pa jĩwaa nɨ̃baji pedee ome. Ma su–akꞌɨ beepari kꞌĩrapite lámpara siete urua pꞌanajida. Mãgɨ́ lámpara Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure siete pɨkꞌa bɨ.
Ichiaba ma su–akꞌɨ beepari kꞌĩrapite mɨa unuji ne–inaa lago bëi–sãakꞌa vidriodee oodakꞌa.
Ma su–akꞌɨ beepari kꞌaitꞌa; aɨ ikꞌaawa, ãpɨte mãikꞌaapa kꞌĩrapite bainɨ̃ pꞌanajida ne–inaa chokꞌai bɨ kꞌĩmari; aba ikꞌaawa chaa. Mãgɨɨrã kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa ekꞌarra eere tau–idaa baji.
Aba león kꞌĩrakꞌa baji; awaraa pꞌakꞌa chakꞌe kꞌĩrakꞌa; awaraa eperã kꞌĩrakꞌa mãikꞌaapa chi apema nejɨ̃pɨ wãabai wãkꞌa baji.
Ma chaachaa paraaji isiakꞌara seis. Ma isiakꞌara ichiaba tau–idaa baji taawaikꞌa eere, edaikꞌa eere paara. Mãɨrãpa ãstaawa, pꞌãrikꞌua pida Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨ̃ida–ee nãga kꞌaripata:
—‘Pꞌekꞌau wẽe, pꞌekꞌau wẽe, pꞌekꞌau wẽe bapari Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨa. Ichita bapachi; ichita bapari; ichita cheitꞌee.’

Mãɨrãpa kꞌaridakꞌãri, jarapata ma rey su–akꞌɨ beeparide su–akꞌɨ bɨ kꞌĩra wãree. Ichiaba jarapata iru ichita bapari mãikꞌaapa jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Mãgá kꞌari pꞌanɨde ichiaba gracias jarapata irumaa.

Mãɨrãpa mãga kꞌariruta chaa, ma chonaarã poro waibɨarã veinticuatro bedabaipata ma rey su–akꞌɨ beeparide su–akꞌɨ bɨ kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata irumaa, iru ichita bapari perã. Mãga oo pꞌanɨde ãchi poro jɨ̃ra ẽradakꞌãri, bɨpata iru kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa jarapata:

—Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨa, pɨmaa aupaita jaradaipia bɨ: Pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara kꞌĩra wãreera bɨ mãikꞌaapa jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Nejõmaata pɨ jua ekꞌari nɨ̃bɨ, pɨa nejõmaata ooda perã. Pɨa kꞌinia bada perã, nejõmaata mãga ooji.
Ma rey su–akꞌɨ beeparide su–akꞌɨ bɨ jua juaraare mɨa unuji joipꞌarukꞌa bɨ pɨratꞌɨda pedee pꞌãda ome. Pꞌã baji taawaikꞌa eere, edajãde paara. Tauchaada siete tauchaa baji jɨrrɨ torrabaidapa.
Ichiaba unuji angeleerã poro waibɨa aba. Mãgɨ́ golpe pedee baji. Iidiji:
—¿Kꞌaipata nãga kꞌĩsia bɨma? “Mɨchia jã tauchaada ogatꞌaai mãikꞌaapa ewai jãgɨ́ joipꞌarukꞌa bɨ.”
Mamĩda apidaapa ma joipꞌarukꞌa bɨ ewada–e pai; ɨtꞌaripemaarã apidaapa, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa pida mãikꞌaapa piudapꞌedaarã eujã ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrãpa pida.
Mãpai mɨ jẽedachi apida wẽ–e pada perã ma joipꞌarukꞌa bɨ ewadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ma pedee pꞌãda leedaitꞌee.
Mamĩda ma chonaarã poro waibɨarã veinticuatrodepemapa mɨmaa mãgaji:
—Jẽenáaji. ¡Akꞌɨ́ji! León apata Judá ëreerãdepema; chonaarãwedapema Rey Daviddeepa uchiadapa kꞌachia pꞌoyaaji. Iruata jã tauchaada siete ogatꞌaai mãikꞌaapa jã joipꞌarukꞌa bɨ ewatꞌaai.

Akꞌɨkꞌãri, mɨa unuji Oveja Chakꞌe apata eperãarãpa peedapꞌedaakꞌa. Ichi bainɨ̃ baji ma rey su–akꞌɨ beepari kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa ma ne–inaa chokꞌai bɨ kꞌĩmari kꞌĩrapite, mãɨrã ma chonaarã poro waibɨarã veinticuatro esajĩakꞌa. Ichia cacho siete iru baji. Ichiaba tau siete iru baji. Ma tau siete jara kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Jaure, jaure siete pɨkꞌa pëida na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõmaade.
Ma Oveja Chakꞌe wãji ma rey su–akꞌɨ beeparide su–akꞌɨ bɨ kꞌaitꞌa mãikꞌaapa mãgɨ́ jua juaraareepa ataji ma joipꞌarukꞌa bɨ pɨratꞌɨda.

Mãga ookꞌãri, ma ne–inaa chokꞌai bɨɨrã kꞌĩmari weda mãikꞌaapa ma chonaarã poro waibɨarã veinticuatro weda bedabaidachida iru kꞌĩrapite. Ma chonaa chaachaa iru baji arpa mãikꞌaapa pꞌaratꞌu nẽedee ooda. Ma pꞌaratꞌu chaa ipuru baji ne–inaa bajũbakꞌa tꞌũa bɨpa. Mãgɨ́ jara kꞌinia bɨ Cristodeerãpa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata.
Mãga nɨde ma bedabaidapꞌedaarã jõmaarãpa kꞌari chiwidi kꞌarijida:
—‘Pɨata ma joipꞌarukꞌa bɨ atai mãikꞌaapa ma tauchaada ogatꞌaai, eperãarãpa pɨ peetꞌaadapꞌedaa perã.
Pɨchi waa mãgá batꞌada kꞌaurepa eperãarã uchiapiji pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jua ekꞌariipa.
Mãgá Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee neto pɨkꞌa ataji eperãarã kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo nãgee chaadepema: ëreerã, pedee, pꞌuuru, eujã, mãgee chaadepema.
Pɨa ãra Tachi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari bɨji pꞌaareerãkꞌa irumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadamerã.
Ichiaba pɨa ãra reyrãkꞌa papiitꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã akꞌɨpataadamerã.’
Mãpai mɨa unuji ma rey su–akꞌɨ beepari, ma ne–inaa chokꞌai bɨ kꞌĩmari mãikꞌaapa ma chonaarã poro waibɨarã angeleerãpa wapꞌɨra ata pꞌanɨ. Audú cho–kꞌara
Mãɨrãpa otau apai pɨkꞌa bɨde golpe pedeejida:
—Oveja Chakꞌe peedapꞌedaa; irumaapaita jaradaipia bɨ:
Jõmaweda pɨ jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata, nejõmaata përé perã.
Pɨ kꞌĩra wãreera bɨ; jõmaarã kꞌãyaara kꞌĩsia kꞌawaara bapari; jõmaarã kꞌãyaara juataura bapari; jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ.
Mapa pɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata, awaraarãmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dai kꞌãyaara.
Mãpai mɨa ũriji jõma ne–inaa chokꞌai pꞌanɨɨrã ɨtꞌaripema, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema, na pꞌekꞌau eujã ekꞌaripema mãikꞌaapa pꞌusadepema; ne–inaa jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa ooda. Mãɨrãpa mãgajida:

—Rey su–akꞌɨ beeparide su–akꞌɨ bɨmaa mãikꞌaapa Oveja Chakꞌemaa jõmaarãpa ichita ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa ichita jaradaipia bɨ parã jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ, ne–inaa jõmaweda parã jua ekꞌari bapari perã.
Mãga jaradakꞌãri, ma ne–inaa chokꞌai bɨ kꞌĩmariirãpa pꞌanaujida:
—¡Amén!
Ma awara ma chonaarã poro waibɨarã veinticuatro waya bedabaidachida ma su–akꞌɨ bɨ kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa Oveja Chakꞌe kꞌĩrapite.
Tꞌẽepai mɨa unuji ma Oveja Chakꞌepa ogatꞌaaru chi naapɨara tauchaada, ma tauchaada siete joipꞌarukꞌa bɨde kꞌara bada. Mãga nɨde ma ne–inaa chokꞌai bɨ kꞌĩmariidepema abaapa pa jĩwaaparikꞌa pedeeji:
—Chepáde aji.
Mɨa akꞌɨkꞌãri, unuji caballo tꞌorroo. Aɨ ɨ̃rɨ su–akꞌɨ badapa ichi juade ematrɨma ateeji. Angelpa teeji chõo pꞌoyaapataarã poro jɨ̃ra irumaa, wãmerã na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee jura pꞌoyaade. Wãji.
Mãpai ma Oveja Chakꞌepa araarepema tauchaada ogatꞌaaji. Mãga ookꞌãri, mɨa ũriji awaraa ma ne–inaa chokꞌai bɨ kꞌĩmariidepemapa jararu:
—Chéji.

Akꞌɨkꞌãri, unuji caballo pꞌoree. Aɨ ɨ̃rɨ su–akꞌɨ bɨmaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa espada choma teeji mãikꞌaapa mãgɨ́ juade bɨji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaweda, mãgɨ́ kꞌaurepa waa eperãarã kꞌãiwee pꞌananaadamerã. Maperã eperãarãpa chĩara pee para beeji.
Mãpai ma Oveja Chakꞌepa omé eerepema tauchaada ogatꞌaakꞌãri, mɨa ũriji awaraa ma ne–inaa chokꞌai bɨ kꞌĩmariidepemapa aukꞌa jararu:
—Chéji.
Akꞌɨkꞌãri, unuji caballo pꞌãimaa. Aɨ ɨ̃rɨ su–akꞌɨ bɨpa netꞌaa chaapari iru baji ichi juade.
Mãpai nãgɨ́ pedee uchiaji ma ne–inaa chokꞌai bɨ kꞌĩmari tꞌãideepa:

—Jarra óoji trigo kilo apai tꞌerabaidamerã ewari aba mimiada pari; maa–e pɨrã cebada kilo õpeepai tꞌerabaidamerã ewari aba mimiada pari. Mamĩda olivo mãikꞌaapa uva tꞌõbaináaji, aceite paraamerã mãikꞌaapa vino paraamerã.
Mãpai ma Oveja Chakꞌepa õpee eerepema tauchaada ogatꞌaakꞌãri, mɨa ũriji awaraa ma ne–inaa chokꞌai bɨ kꞌĩmariidepemapa jararu:
—Chéji.

Akꞌɨkꞌãri, unuji caballo kꞌuarakꞌuaraa bɨ. Aɨ ɨ̃rɨ su–akꞌɨ bada Piuda apachida. Mãgɨ́ tꞌẽe cheda Piudaarã Pꞌanapatamãi apachida. Mãgɨɨrã juade Tachi Akꞌõrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã kꞌĩmariidepema chaa aba bɨji, ma eperãarã piudamerã jura chõo jõnɨpa, jarra oo jõnɨpa, kꞌayaapa mãikꞌaapa ne–animal kꞌachia beerãpa.

Mãpai ma Oveja Chakꞌepa kꞌĩmari eerepema tauchaada ogatꞌaakꞌãri, mɨa unuji altar bainɨ̃ bɨ mãikꞌaapa aɨ ekꞌari unuji jai–idaadapꞌedaarã jaureerã. Ijãadakꞌaa beerãpa ma eperãarã peejida, Cristode ijãapatapꞌedaa perã mãikꞌaapa iru ũraa jarateedapꞌedaa perã.
Mãɨrãpa otau apai pɨkꞌa bɨde golpe pedeejida:

—Tachi Waibɨa, pɨa nejõmaata kꞌawapari. Pɨ kꞌachia wẽe bapari mãikꞌaapa ichita oopari pɨa jara bɨkꞌa. ¿Sãapai akꞌɨitꞌeema eujãdepemaarãpa oopata jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia? ¿Sãapai tai peedapꞌedaarã miapiitꞌeema? ajida.

Mãgɨɨrã chaachaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa pꞌaru teesoo tꞌorroo bɨ teeji. Mãpai jaraji ãchimaa taarãpai ɨ̃idamerã mãikꞌaapa nɨdamerã ãchi ɨ̃pemaarã, chi Cristopa oopi bɨkꞌa oopataarã Tachi Akꞌõrepa awara bɨda ma–itꞌee, aukꞌa piudamerã kꞌachia beerã juapa.

Mãpai ma Oveja Chakꞌepa joisomaa eerepema tauchaada ogatꞌaakꞌãri, unuji na pꞌekꞌau eujã golpe wëre nɨ̃bɨ awẽrachaipa. Akꞌõrejĩru kꞌĩi pɨkꞌadachi. Pꞌãi–maa baji pꞌaru cabra kꞌaradee oodakꞌa; mãgee pꞌaru jɨ̃pata chi–ɨadakꞌãri. Ma awara atane pꞌoreedachi tachi waakꞌa.
Lucero pajãdeepa jurrukꞌoodachida na eujãde, higojõ chikꞌaa jurrupatakꞌa higuera bɨɨrɨdeepa nãumia pꞌuakꞌãri.
Pajã pɨratꞌɨdaji joipꞌaru pɨratꞌɨpatakꞌa. Mãpai wẽpadachi. Ma awara eera, isla ome ãyaa wãjida ma badamãiipa.

Mãga unudakꞌãri, na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema reyrã, eperãarã poro waibɨarã, soldaorã poro waibɨarã, pꞌaratꞌara beerã, juataura beerã, esclavoorã, esclavo–eerã; ma jõmaweda mirudachida mãu te uriade mãikꞌaapa eera jẽra bɨ eujãde mãu–idaa bɨmãi.
Mama pꞌanɨde biajida eemaa mãikꞌaapa mãu–idaa bɨmaa:
—¡Tai ɨ̃rɨ baai chétɨ, rey su–akꞌɨ beeparide su–akꞌɨ bɨpa mãikꞌaapa Oveja Chakꞌepa tai ununaadamerã, tai jɨrɨpata perã miapidaitꞌee!
Tachi Akꞌõre ewari waibɨa ewate paji. Apidaapa iru kꞌĩrau chooda–e payada ajida.

Ma tꞌẽepai mɨa unuji angeleerã kꞌĩmari; aba bainɨ̃ bɨ norte eere; aba sur eere; aba akꞌõrejĩru uchiapari eere; chi apema chi baaipari eere. Mãgɨɨrãpa madepema nãu tꞌɨdɨkꞌa pꞌanajida pꞌuanaamerã eujã ɨ̃rɨ, pꞌusa ɨ̃rɨ wa pakꞌuru ɨ̃rɨ.

Ichiaba unuji ángel awaraa akꞌõrejĩru uchiapari eereepa uchia cheru. Mãgɨpa ne–inaa tauchaa bɨpari iru baji ichi juade. Ma ne–inaapa tauchaa bɨdakꞌãri eperãarã ɨ̃rɨ, jara kꞌinia bɨ ma eperãarã Tachi Akꞌõre ichita chokꞌai baparideerã. Mãgɨ́ ángel golpe pedeeji apema kꞌĩmariirãmaa; mãgɨ́ jɨrɨtꞌeradaarãmaa eujã mãikꞌaapa pꞌusa ãripidamerã:
—Waide ãripináatɨ eujã, pꞌusa mãikꞌaapa pakꞌuru, waide taipa tauchaa bɨda–e perã Tachi Akꞌõredeerã tau bɨɨrɨde.
Mɨa ũriji jaradakꞌãri jõmasaa eperãarã ɨ̃rɨ ma tauchaa bɨdapꞌedaa. Israel pidaarã ëreerãdepemaarã ciento cuarenta y cuatro mil paji.
Judá ëreerãdepema doce mil paji;
Rubén ëreerãdepema doce mil paji;
Gad ëreerãdepema doce mil paji;
Aser ëreerãdepema doce mil paji;
Neftalí ëreerãdepema doce mil paji;
Manasés ëreerãdepema doce mil paji;
Simeón ëreerãdepema doce mil paji;
Leví ëreerãdepema doce mil paji;
Isacar ëreerãdepema doce mil paji;
Zabulón ëreerãdepema doce mil paji;
José ëreerãdepema doce mil paji
mãikꞌaapa Benjamín ëreerãdepema doce mil paji.

Ma tꞌẽepai unuji eperãarã audú chokꞌara nãgɨ́ chaadepema: eujã, ëreerã, pꞌuuru, pedee; mãgɨ́ chaadepema. Bainɨ̃ pꞌanajida ma rey su–akꞌɨ beepari kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa ma Oveja Chakꞌe kꞌĩrapite. Apidaapa ãra pꞌoyaa juasiada–e, audú chokꞌara pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã. Pꞌaru tꞌorroo jɨ̃ pꞌanapachida mãikꞌaapa palma kꞌiru ateepachida ãchi juade akꞌɨpidaitꞌee o–ĩa pꞌanɨ.
Jõmaarãpa golpe pedeejida:
—Tachi Akꞌõre, ma rey su–akꞌɨ beeparide su–akꞌɨ bɨpa mãikꞌaapa Oveja Chakꞌepa eperãarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atajida atuanaadamerã.

Angeleerã, chi wapꞌɨra atadapꞌedaa ma rey su–akꞌɨ beepari, ma chonaarã poro waibɨarã mãikꞌaapa ma ne–inaa chokꞌai bɨ kꞌĩmari; mãgɨ́ angeleerã bedabaidachida tau bɨɨrɨ te jãde tꞌõbairutamaa ma rey su–akꞌɨ beepari kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pachida Tachi Akꞌõremaa.
Mãgapachida:

—¡Amén! apachida. Jõmaarãpa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõremaa mãikꞌaapa jaradaipia bɨ: “Pɨ jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bapari; jõmaarã kꞌãyaara kꞌĩsia kꞌawaara bapari; jõmaarã kꞌãyaara tꞌãri piara; jõmaarã kꞌãyaara juataura; jõmaweda pɨ jua ekꞌari pꞌanapata. Mãga ichita jaradaitꞌee, jõ–ee. ¡Amén!”
Mãpai ma chonaarã poro waibɨarãdepema abaapa mɨmaa iidiji:
—¿Kꞌáirãma na pꞌaru tꞌorroo jɨ̃ pꞌanɨ? ¿Sãmãikꞌaapa chejidama? aji.
Mɨa pꞌanauji:
—Pɨata kꞌawa bɨda aji, mɨ kꞌãyaara.
Irua mãgaji:

—Ãchi jai–idaadakꞌãri, uchiajida audú miapi iru pꞌanadapꞌedaarã juadeepa. Pꞌaru tꞌorroo jɨ̃ pꞌanɨ, ãchi pꞌaru tꞌõdapꞌedaa perã ma Oveja Chakꞌe waade. Mãgapɨ ãchia pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaa wẽpajida.
‘Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõre su–akꞌɨ beepari kꞌĩrapite bainɨ̃ pꞌanɨ.
Ãstaawa, pꞌãrikꞌua pida ãchia oopata Tachi Akꞌõrepa oopi bɨkꞌa ichi ɨtꞌaripema te waibɨade.
Ma rey su–akꞌɨ beeparide su–akꞌɨ bɨpa ãra ichita akꞌɨ bapariitꞌee, ichita ãra ome bapariitꞌee perã.
Waa jarra ooda–e paitꞌee mãikꞌaapa waa opisiada–e paitꞌee.
Ichiaba akꞌõrejĩrupa waa paada–e paitꞌee mãikꞌaapa waa wãsiapa jɨa cheda–e paitꞌee.’
Mãga paitꞌee ma Oveja Chakꞌe, rey su–akꞌɨ beepari kꞌĩrapite bainɨ̃ bɨpa, ãra pia akꞌɨ bapariitꞌee perã.
Ãramaa akꞌɨpiitꞌee pania poatrɨ uchia bɨmãi, mãgɨ́ pania todakꞌãri, ichita pꞌanapataadamerã iru ome.
Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõre ãra ome bapariitꞌee perã, waa tꞌãri pꞌua pꞌanadakꞌaa paitꞌee.
Oveja Chakꞌepa ma seis eerepema tauchaada ogatꞌaakꞌãri, ɨtꞌaripemaarã jõmaweda kꞌĩuu nɨ̃beeji. Mãgá pꞌaneejida perá hora esa–aukꞌa.
Ma tꞌẽepai mɨa unuji angeleerã siete, iru kꞌĩrapite bainɨ̃ pꞌanapataarã. Mãgɨ́ chaa trompeta ãchi chaachaa jitajida.

Mãpai ángel awaraa cheji mãikꞌaapa bainɨ̃ beeji altar kꞌaitꞌa. Ichi juade kꞌuurukꞌa bɨ nẽedee ooda iru baji. Aɨde ne–inaa tꞌũa bapari paapachida Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Awaraapa irumaa ne–inaa tꞌũa bapari waibɨa teeji, pꞌoiramerã Cristodeerã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata ome mãikꞌaapa bɨmerã ma altar ɨ̃rɨ Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Mãgɨ́ bɨji altar nẽedee ooda ɨ̃rɨ; ma altar rey su–akꞌɨ beepari kꞌĩrapite bainɨ̃ bɨ.
Ma ne–inaa tꞌũa bapari paakꞌãri, chi nari Cristodeerã ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pata ome ma ángel juadeepa ɨtꞌaa wãji Tachi Akꞌõre baparimãi.

Mãpai ma angelpa tꞌɨpɨtau atapꞌeda altardeepa, ma kꞌuurukꞌa bɨ ipurutꞌaaji. Mãpai batꞌatꞌaaji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee. Mãga oo bɨde mɨa ũriji pa jĩwaa nɨ̃bɨ pedee ome. Ichiaba unuji pa tau pꞌorepꞌorepari mãikꞌaapa na pꞌekꞌau eujã wëre nɨ̃bɨ awẽrachaipa.
Mãpai ma angeleerã sieteerãpa trompeta iru pꞌanɨ ãchi juade ewaa jirajida chaadaitꞌee.
Chi naapɨara angelpa ichi trompeta chaakꞌãri, angeleerãpa hielo kꞌoi taukꞌa batꞌajida na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee. Ma hielo pꞌoira baji tꞌɨpɨtau ome mãikꞌaapa waa ome. Perá eujã esajĩakꞌa
Araarepema angelpa ichi trompeta chaakꞌãri, mãu choma tꞌɨpɨtau ome urua nɨ̃bɨ batꞌajida pꞌusa jãdee. Mãpai perá pꞌusa jã esajĩakꞌa
Ma awara pꞌusadepema ne–inaa chokꞌai bɨ õpeedepema chaa aba piudachida. Ichiaba barco pꞌusade wã nipadapꞌedaa, mãgɨ́ õpeedepema chaa aba jõdachida.
Ma omé eerepema angelpa ichi trompeta chaakꞌãri, lucero choma tꞌɨpɨtau ome urua nɨ̃bɨ pajãdeepa baaidachi na eujãdepema to mãikꞌaapa pania poatrɨ uchiapata ɨ̃rɨ; ma õpeedepema chaa aba ɨ̃rɨ.
Mãgɨ́ tꞌɨ̃jarapata Lucero Asia. Mãgɨ́ baaikꞌãri, to mãikꞌaapa pania poatrɨ uchiapata õpeedepema chaa aba ɨ̃rɨ, pania asia ũu beeji. Eperãarãpa ma pania todakꞌãri, chokꞌara piujida.

Ma õpee eerepema angelpa ichi trompeta chaakꞌãri, akꞌõrejĩru, atane, lucero ãridachida. Perá akꞌõrejĩru kꞌĩra esajĩakꞌa kꞌĩidachi. Perá atane kꞌĩra esajĩakꞌa aukꞌa kꞌĩidachi. Ichiaba perá lucero esa–aukꞌa
Mãpai mɨa unuji nejɨ̃pɨ pajãde ɨtꞌɨ́ wãabai ni. Ũriji ma nejɨ̃pɨpa golpe pedeeru:
—¡Aai, eperãarã atꞌãri eujãde pꞌanɨ audú chupɨria jõnadaitꞌeeda aji, apema angeleerã õpeerãpa ãchi trompeta chaadakꞌãri!

Mãpai ma kꞌĩmari eerepema angelpa ichi trompeta chaakꞌãri, mɨa unuji lucerokꞌa pajãdeepa baai cheda na eujãde. Mãgɨpa llave jitaji ewaitꞌee arii uria bɨ, chi tꞌai jɨ̃a nɨ̃bada perã. Ma uria audú nãpɨa baji.
Ma uria tꞌai ewakꞌãri, narira uchia nɨ̃beeji, nari waibɨa uchiaparikꞌa tꞌɨpɨtau waibɨadeepa. Ma nari kꞌaurepa pꞌãriudachi. Akꞌõrejĩru mãikꞌaapa pajã perá unu–e paji nari jɨ̃rakꞌawaa nɨ̃bɨpa.

Ma nari ome netuaraarã sisi kꞌapꞌɨakꞌa uchiadachida mãikꞌaapa wãaichoo chejida na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee. Eujãde pa wãdakꞌãri, mɨa unuji ne–inaa Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãɨrãmaa bɨda; mãgɨ́ ne–inaa tusõrepa iru bɨkꞌa eperãarã kꞌaaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãɨrãmaa jaraji pꞌũajara apida; pakꞌuru jida ãrinaadamerã. Jĩpꞌa pꞌua oodaipia bɨda aji, chi Tachi Akꞌõre tauchaa wẽe beerã ãchi tau bɨɨrɨde.
Mamĩda jaraji eperãarã kꞌaa peenaadamerã. Jĩpꞌa pꞌua oodaipia bɨda aji, atane joisomaa wãyaaru misa. Mãɨrãpa kꞌaada golpe pꞌua nɨ̃baji tusõrepa kꞌaada pꞌua nɨ̃baparikꞌa.
Mãgá eperãarã kꞌaa jõnɨde, ma eperãarã audú piu kꞌinia pꞌanadaitꞌee. Mamĩda piuda–e paitꞌee.
Mɨa sisira unuji caballoorã uchiapatakꞌa jura chõode. Ne–inaa poro jɨ̃ra nẽedee oodakꞌa jɨ̃ pꞌanajida ãchi porode. Ãchi kꞌĩra eperã kꞌĩrakꞌa beeji.
Ãchi puda waree beeji; wẽraarãdekꞌa mãikꞌaapa ãchi kꞌida león kꞌidakꞌa beeji.
Ãchi tꞌũade ne–inaa jɨ̃ pꞌanajida armadura hierrodee oodakꞌa. Wãaichookꞌoodaidakꞌãri, ãchi isia jĩwaapachida carro caballopa jidiupata jĩwaapatakꞌa, chokꞌara uchiadakꞌãri jura chõode.
Ãchi trude ne–inaa awapari iru pꞌanajida, tusõreerãpa iru pꞌanapatakꞌa. Mãgɨpa eperãarã kꞌaadaitꞌee atane joisomaa wãyaaru misa.
Ãchi rey Satanapa ãra chokꞌapari. Ichi ma uria nãpɨa bɨ jɨ̃apari. Hebreo pedeede ichi tꞌɨ̃jarapata Abadón; griego pedeede Apolión; jara kꞌinia bɨ Eperãarã Peepari.
Ma naapɨara ne–inaa kꞌachiara wãyaaji. Ne–inaa kꞌachiara omé atꞌãri falta bɨ.

Mãpai ma joisomaa eerepema angelpa ichi trompeta chaakꞌãri, mɨa pedee ũriji altar nẽedee oodadeepa. Ma altar Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite bainɨ̃ baji. Ma altar ãukꞌidaa kꞌĩmariide cacho paraa. Madeepa ma pedee uchia baji.
Jaraji ma angelpa trompeta iru badamaa:
—Kꞌena pë́iji angeleerã kꞌĩmari Éufrates to ide jɨ̃a paraa pꞌanɨ.

Mãgɨ́ angeleerã kꞌena pëikꞌãri, uchiajida peenadaitꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã õpeedepema chaa aba. Aɨ naaweda jɨ̃a paraa pꞌanajida nɨ pꞌanɨ misa año, atane, ewari mãikꞌaapa hora Tachi Akꞌõrepa awara bɨdamaa paru misa.
Mɨa ũriji jaradakꞌãri jõmasaa soldaorã pꞌe atadapꞌedaa caballokꞌa bɨ ɨ̃rɨ wãdamerã ãchi ome. Audú chokꞌara; doscientos millones paji.

Ma caballokꞌa bɨ mãikꞌaapa mãgɨ́ ɨ̃rɨ wãdapꞌedaarã mɨa unuji kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌa bɨde. Ãchi tꞌũade armadura jɨ̃ pꞌanajida. Ma armadura pꞌoree baji, tꞌɨpɨtaukꞌa. Ichiaba pꞌãpꞌãraa baji mãu pi–ia jacintokꞌa. Ichiaba kꞌuaraa baji mãu azufrekꞌa. Ma caballoorãkꞌa beeda poro león porokꞌa beeji. Mãɨrã itꞌaideepa uchiaji tꞌɨpɨtau, nari mãikꞌaapa azufre pꞌora.
Ma ne–inaa kꞌachia õpeepa; tꞌɨpɨtaupa, naripa mãikꞌaapa azufrepa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã õpeedepema chaa aba piuji.
Ma caballoorãkꞌa beerãpa eperãarã mãgá pꞌoyaajida ãchi itꞌaipa mãikꞌaapa ãchi trupa, ãchi tru taama porokꞌa beeda perã. Mãgɨpa aukꞌa eperãarã pꞌua oopachida.

Mãgá eperãarã chokꞌara piujida mĩda ma kꞌachiapa, chi waide peeda–e pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata oo amaa kꞌiniada–e paji. Ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ amaa kꞌiniadakꞌaa paji netuaraarãmaa. Ichiaba ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ amaa kꞌiniadakꞌaa paji ãchia ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite; ne–inaa nẽedee ooda, pꞌaratꞌadee ooda, broncedee ooda, mãudee ooda, pakꞌurudee ooda. Mãgɨ́ kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ kꞌinia pꞌanapachida mãgee ne–inaa pꞌoyaa akꞌɨkꞌaa mĩda, pꞌoyaa ũrikꞌaa mĩda mãikꞌaapa pꞌoyaa tꞌɨakꞌaa mĩda.
Ichiaba awaraarã pee amaa kꞌiniadakꞌaa paji. Jaipanaarãpa oopatakꞌa oo amaa kꞌiniadakꞌaa paji. Pꞌekꞌau oo amaa kꞌiniadakꞌaa paji mãikꞌaapa nechɨa amaa kꞌiniadakꞌaa paji.

Mãpai mɨa unuji angeleerã poro waibɨa awaraa. Mãgɨ́ ɨtꞌariipa cheji jɨ̃arara pɨratꞌɨ nɨ̃bɨde. Euma paraa baji ichi poro ɨ̃rɨ. Chi kꞌĩra urua baji akꞌõrejĩrukꞌa mãikꞌaapa chi jĩru tꞌɨpɨtau urua nɨ̃bɨkꞌa baji.

Ichi juade iru baji joipꞌarukꞌa pɨratꞌɨda kꞌaipee. Mãgɨ́ ewatꞌɨ baji. Ma angeleerã poro waibɨa na eujãde bainɨ̃ ba chekꞌãri, chi jĩru juaraarepema bɨji pꞌusa ɨ̃rɨ. Jõdee chi jĩru juabi eerepema bɨji eujã ɨ̃rɨ.
Golpe biaji león biaparikꞌa. Mãgá biakꞌãri, pa siete jĩwaa nɨ̃beeji pedee ome. Mãgá iru biakꞌãri, papa pꞌanauji.
Mɨa mãga ũrikꞌãri, ma pedee pꞌãitꞌee paji. Mamĩda ɨtꞌariipa pedee ũriji:
—Apidaamaa jaranáaji pɨa ũrida mãikꞌaapa ma pedee apida pꞌãnáaji.

Mãpai ma ángel bainɨ̃ bada pꞌusa ɨ̃rɨ mãikꞌaapa eujã ɨ̃rɨ ichi jua juaraarepema ɨaji pajãmaa. Ooji eperãarãpa oopatakꞌa ne–inaa juraadakꞌãri Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite, awaraarãpa ijãadamerã wãarata jara bɨ.

Mãpai ma angelpa ne–inaa jaraji Tachi Akꞌõre ichita chokꞌai bapari kꞌĩrapite. Iruata ooji pajã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa jõma aɨde nɨ̃bɨ; na eujã mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa jõma aɨde nɨ̃bɨ; pꞌusa mãikꞌaapa ne–inaa jõma aɨde nɨ̃bɨ. Iru kꞌĩrapite ma angelpa mãgaji:
—¡Taarã–ee Tachi Waibɨapa kꞌachia beerã jõpiitꞌeeda! aji.

Angeleerã seis eerepemapa ichi trompeta chaakꞌãri, aupaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bada eperãarã–itꞌee. Jõmaarãmaa mãga kꞌawapi–e paji. Ichi mimiapataarãmaa; ichi pedee jarapataarãmaa aupaita kꞌawapiji ichia kꞌĩsia iru bada.
Mãpai ma naaweda ɨtꞌariipa pedee badapa waya mɨmaa ne–inaa jaraji:
—Atanáji ma joipꞌarukꞌa pɨratꞌɨda kꞌaipee ewatꞌɨ bɨ, jãma bainɨ̃ bɨ pꞌusa ɨ̃rɨ mãikꞌaapa eujã ɨ̃rɨ iru bɨ ichi juade.
Aramãgá mɨ wãji ma angelmaa ma joipꞌarukꞌa bɨ iidide. Ichia pꞌanauji:
—Jitáji mãikꞌaapa kꞌotꞌáaji. Pɨchi itꞌaide kꞌũ–ũa baitꞌee mielekꞌa. Mamĩda pɨchi bimaa pakꞌãri, asia baitꞌee.
Irua jaradakꞌa mɨa ma joipꞌarukꞌa bɨ atanaji mãikꞌaapa kꞌo pëiji. Wãara, mɨchi itꞌaide kꞌũ–ũa baji. Mamĩda mitꞌaapꞌeda, mɨchi bide pakꞌãri, mɨ tꞌãri uratɨ nɨ̃beeji.
Mãpai mɨmaa mãgaji:

ʼPɨa waya jaraipia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapi bɨkꞌa. Jaraipia bɨda aji, irua ooitꞌee bɨ pꞌuuru pidaarã chokꞌara ome, eujãdepemaarã chokꞌara ome, pedee chokꞌara awara–awaraa pedeepataarã ome mãikꞌaapa reyrã chokꞌara ome.
Mãpai pakꞌuru sĩautaa mɨmaa teeji, mãgɨpa ne–inaa chaamerã. Mãgaji:
—Wã́ji chaade Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨa chi altar ome. Ma awara aɨ tede ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataarã juasíaji.

Mamĩda chaanáaji ma te ãtaude tꞌɨakꞌau bɨmãi, mãgɨmãi Tachi Akꞌõrepa awara bɨda perã ijãadakꞌaa beerã–itꞌee. Atane cuarenta y dos wãyaaru misa, mãgɨɨrãpa ãchi jua ekꞌari iru pꞌanadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa pꞌuuru jɨrɨtꞌerada ichi–itꞌee.
Mãpai Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgaji:
—Mɨa omé pëiitꞌeeda aji, chi–ɨapata pꞌaru jɨ̃ pꞌanɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ. Mãɨrãpa jaradaitꞌee mɨa jarapi bɨkꞌa, ma kꞌãima mil doscientos sesenta wãyaaru misa.
Mãgɨɨrã omé olivo bɨɨrɨkꞌa pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa lámpara bɨpatakꞌa pꞌanɨ; Tachi Waibɨa, chi na pꞌekꞌau eujã ooda kꞌĩrapite pꞌanɨ.
Apidaapa ma omé jɨrɨruta pɨrã miapidaitꞌee, tꞌɨpɨtau uchia bɨ ãchi itꞌaideepa paapeeitꞌee ãra kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã. Mãgá piudaitꞌee jõmaweda ãra miapi kꞌinia pꞌanɨɨrã.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo ãramaa oopiji. Mapa ãrapa pajã jɨ̃a pɨkꞌadai kꞌoi chenaamerã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa jarapidakꞌa jara pꞌanɨ misa. Ma awara ãrapa kꞌiniadakꞌãri, pania tachi waa papidai mãikꞌaapa eperãarã miapidai.

Mamĩda jara aupadakꞌãri jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bada jarapiitꞌee ãramaa, nemĩsia uchiaitꞌee ma uria nãpɨa bɨdeepa mãikꞌaapa ãra ome chõo jɨrɨitꞌee. Mãgɨpa ãra pꞌoyaaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa peekꞌooitꞌee.
Ãra kꞌapꞌɨa piuda calle jãde baipꞌaneedaitꞌee pꞌuuru waibɨa Jerusalende; ãchi waibɨa kurusode peedapꞌedaa pꞌuurude. Mãgɨ́ pꞌuuru ichiaba Sodoma maa–e pɨrã Egipto apata.

Mama pꞌaneedaitꞌee kꞌãima õpee apꞌeda esa–aukꞌa. Mama pꞌanɨde eperãarã eujã kꞌĩra tꞌãdoodepema, pꞌuurudepema, pedee kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo pedeepataarã mãikꞌaapa ëreerã kꞌĩra tꞌãdoorãpa ãra kꞌapꞌɨa piuda akꞌɨdaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa jaradaitꞌee ãra ɨanaadamerã.
Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa ãra piuda ũridakꞌãri, o–ĩa pꞌaneedaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa regalo tee para baitꞌee o–ĩapa, ma Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarã omeerãpa ãra miapidapꞌedaa perã.
Mamĩda kꞌãima õpee apꞌeda esa–aukꞌa wãyaapꞌeda, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma omé chokꞌai pꞌanapiji. Mãgá ãra pꞌirabaidachida. Jõmaweda mãga unudakꞌãri, pꞌeradachida.
Mãpai ma omé ũrijida ɨtꞌariipa golpe pedeeru:
—¡Ɨtꞌaa chétɨ!
Aramãgá ɨtꞌaa wãjida jɨ̃ararade, ãra kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanadapꞌedaarã taide.

Aramata awẽrachai golpe wëre nɨ̃beeji. Ma pꞌuuru pidaarã diezdepema chaa aba jõdachi; mãgá eperãarã siete mil kꞌiniidachida. Chi pꞌaneedapꞌedaarã pꞌerarutapa ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata oo amaa kꞌinia pꞌaneejida. Mapa jarajida Tachi Akꞌõre ɨtꞌari baparimaa, iruta wãara jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ.
Ma ne–inaa kꞌachia aba eerepema aupaji. Mamĩda omé eerepema taarã–e paitꞌee.
Mãpai ángel seis eerepemapa ichi trompeta chaakꞌãri, ɨtꞌariipa mɨa golpe pedee ũriji. Chokꞌaraarãpa jara pꞌanajida:
—‘Ɨ̃rá wãara na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã Tachi Akꞌõre jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨ mãikꞌaapa Tachi Waibɨa Jesucristo jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨ. Tachi Akꞌõre ichita jõmaarã rey bapariitꞌee.’
Mãpai ma chonaarã poro waibɨarã veinticuatro su–akꞌɨ pꞌanɨ ãchi rey su–akꞌɨ beeparide Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite bedabaidachida irumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daitꞌee.
Mãgapachida:
—Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨa, pɨta ichita bapari mãikꞌaapa ichita bapachi. Gracias jara pꞌanɨ pɨmaa.
¡Pɨta jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã, jõmaarã rey paru!
Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema pꞌuuru pidaarã tꞌãri kꞌachia pꞌanapachida pɨ ome.
Ɨ̃rá jõdee, pɨ kꞌĩrau baitꞌee ãra ome.
Ɨ̃rapɨ pɨa akꞌɨitꞌee piudapꞌedaarãpa oopatapꞌedaa mãikꞌaapa jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia pɨ kꞌĩrapite.

Ɨ̃rá teeitꞌee ne–inaa pia jõmaweda pɨa kꞌĩsia iru bɨdepema teeitꞌee pɨ mimiapataarãmaa, chi pɨ pedee jarapatapꞌedaarãmaa; pɨchideerã jõmaarãmaa mãikꞌaapa pɨ waaweepataarã jõmaarãmaa, ekꞌariara beerãmaa, waibɨara beerãmaa paara.
Ichiaba ɨ̃rapɨ eujãde ne–inaa kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaarãmaa pɨa kꞌachia ooitꞌee.

Mãpai Tachi Akꞌõre ɨtꞌaripema te waibɨa ewadachi mãikꞌaapa ma edajãde mɨa unuji baaltekꞌa bɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa ũraa Moisemaa pꞌãpida ome. Mãga nɨde pa tau pꞌorepꞌorepari unuji mãikꞌaapa pa jĩwaa nɨ̃baji. Ichiaba paraaji awẽrachai mãikꞌaapa hielo kꞌoi taukꞌa baaiji.
Mãpai mɨa ne–inaa awaraa waide unukꞌaa pada unuji. Pajãde unuji wẽra akꞌõrejĩru urua nɨ̃bɨkꞌa jɨ̃ bɨ. Bainɨ̃ baji atane ɨ̃rɨ. Poro jɨ̃ra lucero docedee ooda jɨ̃ baji.
Mãgɨ́ wẽra biakꞌoo baji. Bi pꞌira baji chi warra ewaa tꞌoitꞌee bada perã. Mapa bia nɨ̃baji.
Mãpai ne–inaa awaraa waide unukꞌaa pada padachi pajãde. Unuji je choma. Pꞌoree baji mãikꞌaapa poro siete iru baji. Ma chaachaa poro jɨ̃ra jɨ̃ baji. Ichiaba cacho diez iru baji.
Mãgɨ́ jepa ichi tru wirawiraarupa pajãde nɨ̃bɨ lucero perá esa–aukꞌa

Mãpai ma wẽrapa ɨmɨkꞌĩra warra tꞌoji. Ma warrapa reykꞌa na eujãdepemaarã ichi jua ekꞌari iru bapariitꞌee. Reypa tuma hierrodee juade iru bɨpa ooparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa irua ooitꞌee. Mãgɨ́ je choma mama baji mĩda, ma warra chai pꞌoyaa kꞌo–e paji, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãyaa ateepida perã ichi baparimaa ichi rey su–akꞌɨ beeparide.
Jõdee ma wẽra mirudachi eperãarã makꞌɨara wẽe jẽra bɨmaa; Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru badamaa. Mama angeleerãpa nekꞌopijida mãikꞌaapa pia akꞌɨ pꞌanajida kꞌãima mil doscientos sesenta.
Mãpai ɨtꞌari jura paraaji. Angeleerã poro waibɨa Miguel awaraa angeleerã ome chõo jɨrɨjida mãgɨ́ je choma bɨ ome. Mãpai jepa ichideerã pꞌe atapꞌeda, chõojida.
Mamĩda ma je choma bɨ eerepemaarã chooda–e paji. Angeleerãpa ãra ɨtꞌariipa jërekꞌoojida.

Mãgá batꞌatꞌaajida ma je choma bɨ na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee. Mãgɨ́ je choma chonaarãwedapema taama; Netuara Poro Waibɨa maa–e pɨrã Satanás apata. Mãgɨ́pata na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã kꞌũrapari. Mãgɨ́ batꞌatꞌaajida na pꞌekꞌau eujãdee ichideerã ome.
Mãpai mɨa ũriji Tachi Akꞌõredeerã ɨtꞌariipa golpe pedee pꞌanɨ:
—Ɨ̃rapɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌachia pꞌoyaaji mãikꞌaapa aupaji tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atada atuanaadamerã.
Ɨ̃rapɨ jõmaarã rey beeji mãikꞌaapa ichia pëida, Cristo jua ekꞌari jõmaweda pꞌaneejida.
Mãga bɨ jëretꞌaadapꞌedaa perã ma ɨmɨateeparipa tachi ɨ̃pemaarã Cristo kꞌaurepa.
Mãgɨ́ ɨ̃i–ee tachi ɨmɨateepachi Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrapite.
Mamĩda tachi ɨ̃pemaarã́pata iru pꞌoyaapachida Cristopa ichi waa batꞌada perã ãra pari.
Ichiaba iru pꞌoyaapachida Cristopa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee awaraarãmaa jaradapꞌedaa perã.
Eperãarãpa ãra peedaitꞌee pakꞌãri, waaweedakꞌaa paji piudaitꞌee ma jaradapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa.
¡O–ĩa pꞌanadáma angeleerã, ɨtꞌari pꞌanapata perã!
Mamĩda chupɨria pꞌanɨ parã eujãde pꞌanapataarã mãikꞌaapa pꞌusade pꞌanapataarã Netuara Poro Waibɨa parã tꞌãide bapari perã.
Ichi audú kꞌĩrau bɨ kꞌawa bairã taarã–e Tachi Akꞌõrepa jõpiitꞌee irua ne–inaa kꞌachia oopari.
Mãgɨ́ je choma bɨpa kꞌawaa atakꞌãri ichi na pꞌekꞌau eujãde bɨ, ichi jëredapꞌedaamãi, ma wẽrapa warra tꞌoda jɨrɨmaa beeji.

Mamĩda Tachi Akꞌõrepa nejɨ̃pɨ tapɨa isiakꞌara omé teeji ma wẽramaa, mãgá ma je choma badamãiipa tꞌɨmɨ́ wãabaimerã ichia kꞌĩsia iru badamaa; eperãarã makꞌɨara wẽ–emaa. Mama nekꞌopidai mãikꞌaapa pia akꞌɨ pꞌanadai año õpee apꞌeda esa–aukꞌa wãyaaru misa.
Mãga unukꞌãri, ma je choma bɨ itꞌaideepa pania jĩchooji to chomadarumaa, to chomaapa ma wẽra to barree ateei jĩakꞌaapa.
Mamĩda eujãpa ma wẽra kꞌaripaji. Ewadachi mãikꞌaapa ma to choma je choma bɨpa jĩchooda weedachi aɨ uriade.

Mãga unukꞌãri, ma je choma bɨ audupɨara kꞌĩraudachi ma wẽra ome. Mapa chõo jɨrɨnaji ma wẽradeepa uchiadapꞌedaarã ome; chi na eujãde atꞌãri nɨ̃bɨɨrã ome. Mãɨrãpa oopata Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraade jara bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa ijãapata Jesupa jarateeda ũraade.
Mãpai mãgɨ́ je choma bɨ bainɨ̃ banaji pꞌusa ide.

Mãpai mɨa unuji nemĩsia uchiaru pꞌusa jãdeepa. Mãgɨpa poro siete iru baji mãikꞌaapa cacho diez. Chi cacho chaa poro jɨ̃ra jɨ̃ baji. Jõdee chi poro chaa tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã baji. Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌɨ̃ chokꞌara made pꞌã jẽra baji, irua mãga unukꞌãri, kꞌĩraudaimerã. Mãgá ma nemĩsiapa iru oo iru baji.

Mãgɨ́ nemĩsia imamakꞌa baji. Mamĩda chi bɨɨrɨ oso realdekꞌa baji. Chi itꞌai león itꞌaikꞌa baji. Je choma bɨpa ma nemĩsia ichi jĩakꞌa papiji, mãgɨpa aukꞌa oomerã ma jepa ooparikꞌa mãikꞌaapa je choma bɨ jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨɨrã aukꞌa iru bamerã ichi jua ekꞌari.
Mãgɨ́ nemĩsia poro aba supeetꞌaa baji espadapa, mamĩda ichia jɨpatꞌaaji. Mapa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaarãpa iru pia unupachida mãikꞌaapa irua oopi bɨkꞌa oo kꞌinia pꞌanapachida.
Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dai kꞌãyaara, je choma bɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pachida, iru juapa ma nemĩsiapa ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopachi perã. Ma awara ma nemĩsiamaa paara ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pachida. Mãgapachida:
—¿Kꞌaita nãgɨ́ nemĩsiakꞌa bɨma? ¿Kꞌaita chõoima iru ome?
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma nemĩsia ichiakꞌau bɨji ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oo wãmerã atane cuarenta y dos wãyaaru misa. Mãgɨpa pedee audua pedeepachi mãikꞌaapa ichi Tachi Akꞌõreda a nipapachi.
Mãgá pedee kꞌachia jara wãpachi Tachi Akꞌõre ãpɨte mãikꞌaapa ichideerã ɨtꞌari pꞌanɨ ãpɨte.

Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ ichiakꞌau bɨda perã, jura chõo beeji Cristodeerã, chi atꞌãri na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanadapꞌedaarã ome, ãra pꞌoyaarumaa. Ichiaba mãgá ichiakꞌau bɨda perã, mãgɨpa ichi jua ekꞌari pꞌe wãji eperãarã ëreerã chaadepema, pꞌuuru chaadepema, pedee chaadepema mãikꞌaapa eujã chaadepema.

Jõmaweda tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã–ee pꞌanɨɨrã Oveja Chakꞌe peedapꞌedaapa Tachi Akꞌõre ome ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌeerã tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã jẽra bɨ librode ɨtꞌari, mãɨrãpa ma nemĩsiamaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃daitꞌee, tachia Tachi Akꞌõremaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patakꞌa. Mãga pꞌanadaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa na eujã ooi naaweda, aɨ pꞌãdade ãchi tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã–ee pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.
Kꞌɨɨrɨ ẽesaa pꞌanátɨ ũridamerã mɨa jararu:
—Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩsia iru bɨ pɨrã ma nemĩsiapa parãdepema aba ãyaa ateemerã carcelde tꞌɨ nɨ̃bɨitꞌee, mãga paitꞌee.
Jõdee kꞌĩsia iru bɨ pɨrã mãgɨpa parãdepema aba peemerã espadapa, mãga paitꞌee.
Maperã Cristodeerã choodaipia bɨ ãchi ijãa pꞌanɨde mãikꞌaapa Cristode ijãapataadaipia bɨ, ma kꞌaurepa piuruta pɨjida.
Ma tꞌẽepai mɨa unuji awaraa ne–animal kꞌachia eujãdeepa uchiaru. Cacho omé iru baji Oveja Chakꞌepa iru baparikꞌa. Mamĩda pedeepachi je choma pedeeparikꞌa.
Mãgɨpa nemĩsia kꞌĩrapite ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopachi irua oo badakꞌa. Jaraji na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaarãmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadamerã ma nemĩsiamaa, chi poro aba supeedapꞌedaa jɨpada.
Ichiaba ne–inaa kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopachi eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa. Eperãarã taide tꞌɨpɨtau paara baaipiji pajãdeepa na eujãde.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichiakꞌau bɨda perã, mãgee ne–inaa ooji. Mãgá ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa oo bɨpa nemĩsia kꞌĩrapite, mãgɨpa na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanadapꞌedaarã jõmaweda kꞌũratꞌaaji. Ma awara jaraji ãchia oodamerã mãgɨ́ nemĩsia espadapa supee pꞌanadapꞌedaa chokꞌai padaida kꞌĩrakꞌa.

Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨ́ ne–animal kꞌachia ichiakꞌau bɨda perã, ma nemĩsia kꞌĩrakꞌa chokꞌai pɨkꞌa beeji mãikꞌaapa pedeeji. Maapꞌeda ma kꞌĩrakꞌa chokꞌai pɨkꞌa padaidapa peepiji jõmaweda ichi waawee kꞌiniada–ee pꞌanadapꞌedaarã.

Ma awara mãgɨ́ ne–animal kꞌachia tꞌẽe uchiadapa tauchaa bɨpiji jõmaarã eperãarã jua juaraarede mãikꞌaapa tau bɨɨrɨde. Ma tauchaa bɨjida ekꞌariara beerãmaa, waibɨara beerãmaa aukꞌa; pꞌaratꞌara beerãmaa, chupɨria beerãmaa aukꞌa; esclavo–eerãmaa, esclavoorãmaa aukꞌa.
Ma tauchaa wẽe apidaapa ne–inaa neto atada–e pai mãikꞌaapa apidaapa ne–inaa neto pëida–e pai. Ma tauchaa ma nemĩsia tꞌɨ̃ maa–e pɨrã ichi número paji.
Kꞌĩsíatɨ mɨa jararude. Chi kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerãpa kꞌawaa atadai ma nemĩsia tꞌɨ̃, ichi número juasiadakꞌãri. Ma número eperã número: seiscientos sesenta y seis.
Mãpai mɨa unuji ma Oveja Chakꞌe bainɨ̃ bɨ Sión ee nokꞌode. Ichi ome pꞌanajida ciento cuarenta y cuatro mil eperãarã. Ichi tꞌɨ̃ mãikꞌaapa chi Akꞌõre tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã baji ãchi tau bɨɨrɨde.
Mãpai ɨtꞌariipa ũriji ne–inaa to kꞌida chaaree jĩwaaparikꞌa maa–e pɨrã pa golpe jĩwaaparikꞌa maa–e pɨrã arpa chaapataarã chokꞌaraarãpa ãchi arpa chaa pꞌanɨkꞌa.

Ma eperãarã Oveja Chakꞌe ome pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa kꞌari chiwidi kꞌari pꞌanajida Tachi Akꞌõre su–akꞌɨ beepari kꞌĩrapite, ma ne–inaa chokꞌai bɨ kꞌĩmari kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa ma chonaarã poro waibɨarã veinticuatro kꞌĩrapite. Awaraarãpa mãgɨ́ kꞌari pꞌoyaa kꞌarida–e paji. Jĩpꞌa ma ciento cuarenta y cuatro mil Cristopa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa atada, mãɨrãpapaita mãgɨ́ kꞌari kꞌawajida.

Mãɨrã wẽraarã ome kꞌãida–e paji, ãchi pꞌanapata awara bɨdapꞌedaa perã Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee. Mapa ãchi wãpata ma Oveja Chakꞌe wãrumaa mãikꞌaapa oopata irua ooparikꞌa. Cristopa ãra na eujãdepemaarã o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji, awaraarã kꞌãyaara naapɨara primisiakꞌa pꞌanadamerã Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee mãikꞌaapa ichi–itꞌee.
Ãchia maarepida seewa jaradakꞌaa paji, pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia jõmaweda oo amaadapꞌedaa perã.

Mãpai mɨa unuji awaraa ángel ɨtꞌari wãabai ni. Mãgɨpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa pedee pia jara pëida atee baji eperãarãpa irude ijãadamerã. Ma pedee ichita bapari, jõ–ee. Ma pedee atee baji jarade na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaarãmaa; ëreerã chaadepema, pꞌuuru chaadepema, pedee chaadepema mãikꞌaapa eujã chaadepema.
Golpe pedeepachi:

—Tachi Akꞌõre waawee pꞌanapatáatɨ mãikꞌaapa irumaa jarapatáatɨ iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ. Ewari paji irua akꞌɨmerã eperãarãpa oopata jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia. Ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patáatɨ irumaa, iruata ooda perã pajã, na eujã pꞌusa ome mãikꞌaapa jõmaweda pania poatrɨ uchia bɨmãi.
Mãpai mɨa awaraa ángel unuji mãgɨ́ uchiada tꞌẽe. Mãgɨpa jaramaa baji:

—¡Jõdachi, jõdachipɨ pꞌuuru waibɨa Babilónia! Ma pꞌuuru kꞌaurepa eperãarã jõmaarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopachida. Eperãpa vino topi bɨkꞌa awaraamaa piudaimerã, mãga pɨkꞌa ma pꞌuuru pidaarãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopipachida awaraarãmaa.
Mãpai mɨa awaraa ángel unuji ma omé uchiadapꞌedaa tꞌẽe. Mãgɨ́pata golpe pedeeji:
—Eperãarãpa ma nemĩsiamaa mãikꞌaapa mãgɨ́ kꞌĩrakꞌa bɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃ruta pɨrã mãikꞌaapa mãgɨɨrã tauchaa bɨpiruta pɨrã ãchi tau bɨɨrɨde wa juade,

Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi kꞌachia ooitꞌee. Mãgɨ́ eperãarãpa Tachi Akꞌõre vinota todaitꞌee. Mãgɨ́ vino jara kꞌinia bɨ iru jĩpꞌa kꞌĩrau baitꞌee ãchi ome; chupɨria kꞌawa–ee. Audú kꞌĩrau baitꞌee perã, ãchi miapiitꞌee tꞌɨpɨtau azufre ome audú wãsia bɨpa. Mãga ooitꞌee ichi angeleerã pia beerã kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa ma Oveja Chakꞌe kꞌĩrapite.

Irua mãgɨɨrã mãgá ɨ̃i–ee miapi bɨpa nari jɨ̃rakꞌawaa nɨ̃baitꞌee ãstaawa, pꞌãrikꞌua pida. Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨɨrã mãgá miapi iru baitꞌee, ãchia ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patapꞌedaa perã ma nemĩsiamaa ichi kꞌĩrakꞌa bɨ ome mãikꞌaapa ichi tꞌɨ̃ tauchaa bɨpidapꞌedaa perã ãchi kꞌapꞌɨade.
Mapa Tachi Akꞌõredeerãpa choodaipia bɨ ãchia oo pꞌanɨde iru ũraade jara bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa ãchi Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨde.
Mãpai mɨa ũriji ɨtꞌariipa nãga pedeeru:
—Pꞌã́ji nãgɨ́ pedee: “Tꞌãri o–ĩa pꞌanɨ Tachi Waibɨadeerã, chi namãikꞌaapa waa piudaitꞌeerã kꞌachia beerã juapa.”
Mãpai Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa mãgaji:
—Wãarapɨ. Mãɨrã piudakꞌãri, waa mimiada–e paitꞌee. Ma kꞌãyaara kꞌãiwee pꞌanadaitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõre o–ĩa baitꞌee ãra ome, ãrapa ne–inaa pia oopatapꞌedaa perã Cristo kꞌapꞌɨa pari.
Mãpai mɨa akꞌɨji mãikꞌaapa unuji jɨ̃arara tꞌorroo. Aɨ ɨ̃rɨ su–akꞌɨ baji Eperã Akꞌõre Truadepema. Mãgɨpa poro jɨ̃ra nẽedee ooda jɨ̃ baji. Ichi juade atee wãji nekꞌo esɨɨrɨ jõree pꞌewedee bɨ.
Mãpai unuji awaraa ángel uchia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre baparimãiipa. Mãgɨpa golpe pedeeji ma jɨ̃ararade su–akꞌɨ bɨmaa:
—Ara eperãarãpa netꞌatau waraa bɨ ewapatakꞌa nekꞌopa, mãga pɨkꞌa jã pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãapataarã pꞌe atáji. Ewari paji mãga oomerã.
Aramãgá ma jɨ̃ararade su–akꞌɨ bɨpa ijãapataarã pꞌe ataji.
Maapꞌeda awaraa ángel uchiaji Tachi Akꞌõre ɨtꞌaripema te waibɨadeepa. Mãgɨpa nekꞌo esɨɨrɨ jõree pꞌewedee bɨ ichiaba atee wãji ichi juade.
Mãga nɨde awaraa ángel uchiaji ɨtꞌaripema altarmãiipa. Mãgɨ́ ma altardepema tꞌɨpɨtau jɨ̃apari paji. Mãgɨpa golpe pedeeji ma ángel nekꞌo esɨɨrɨ jõree pꞌewedee iru bɨmaa:
—Eperãarãpa uva waraa bɨ kꞌɨmɨ tꞌɨapꞌepatakꞌa nekꞌopa, mãga pɨkꞌa jã pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerã pꞌe atáji, ma–itꞌee ewari pada perã.

Aramãgá ma nekꞌo iru badapa na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema ijãadakꞌaa beerã pꞌe ataji uva pꞌe atapatakꞌa. Mãpai mimiapataarãpa uva pꞌe bɨpatakꞌa bõgo tapɨade piartꞌɨdaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa chi ba atadaitꞌee, mãga pɨkꞌa ma angelpa ma ijãadakꞌaa beerã peekꞌooji.
Pꞌuurude taawa mãga ookꞌãri, ma piudapꞌedaarã waa wee nɨ̃beeji trescientos kilometros parumaa; chi nãpɨa caballo tꞌũa ɨtꞌɨa aba parumaa.

Mãpai mɨa ne–inaa awara waide unukꞌaa pada ɨtꞌari unuji. Pꞌera pɨkꞌa beeji mãga unukꞌãri. Unuji angeleerã siete. Ma chaachaa ne–inaa kꞌachia atee wãji pꞌasapiitꞌee eperãarãmaa. Mãgɨ́ ne–inaa kꞌachia siete aupadakꞌãri, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrau bada na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã ome jõitꞌee.

Ichiaba unuji ne–inaa lago bëi–sãa pɨkꞌa, vidriodee oodakꞌa, tꞌɨpɨtau ome pꞌoirada. Aɨ ikꞌaawa bainɨ̃ pꞌanajida chi pꞌoyaadapꞌedaarãpa mãgɨ́ nemĩsia, ichi kꞌĩrakꞌa mãikꞌaapa ichi tꞌɨ̃ maa–e pɨrã número tauchaa bɨdaarã eperãarã kꞌapꞌɨade. Ma bainɨ̃ pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa arpa Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãramaa teeda iru pꞌanajida.
Kꞌarimaa pꞌanajida Tachi Akꞌõre mimiapari Moisepa kꞌaridakꞌa mãikꞌaapa Oveja Chakꞌedeerãpa kꞌaripatakꞌa:
—Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨa, pɨa jõmaarã kꞌãyaara ne–inaa piara oopari.
Pɨta jõmaarã eujãdepemaarã Rey.
Pɨa ne–inaa jõma pia kꞌĩsia iru bɨ mãikꞌaapa ichita wãarata jarapari.
Tachi Waibɨa, ¿kꞌaipa pɨ waawee–e paima?
¿Kꞌaipa pɨ tꞌɨ̃ tꞌo–e paima?
Pɨ aupai kꞌachia wẽe bapari.
Pꞌuuru pidaarã jõmaweda chedaitꞌee ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃de pɨ kꞌĩrapite, pɨa pia oopari perã kꞌachia beerã miapikꞌãri.
Ma tꞌẽepai unuji Tachi Akꞌõre ɨtꞌaripema te waibɨa ewa bɨ. Ma te edajãde unuji iru baparimãi. Mãgɨmãi chonaarãwedapema Akꞌõre te ne–edee ooda edupɨara bɨ cuarto jĩakꞌaa paji.

Mãpai unuji ma te waibɨadeepa angeleerã siete uchia pꞌanɨ. Mãɨrã paji ne–inaa kꞌachia ateepataarã pꞌasapidaitꞌee eperãarãmaa. Pꞌaru linodee jɨ̃ pꞌanajida. Ma pꞌaru maarepida tꞌãu–ee baji. Urua pɨkꞌa baji tꞌo–tꞌoo bada perã. Ne–inaa kꞌɨrrɨde jɨ̃patakꞌa nẽedee ooda nẽrabai jɨ̃ pꞌanajida ãchi tꞌũade.

Mãpai unuji ma Tachi Akꞌõre ikꞌaawa pꞌanɨ ne–inaa chokꞌai bɨ kꞌĩmariidepema abaapa vaso nẽedee ooda teeru ma angeleerã chaachaa. Ma vaso chaa ipuru baji Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩrau bɨpa. ¡Iru ichita baparipɨ!

Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bairã, ichi kꞌĩra wãree uchia baji ichi baparimãiipa ma te ipururumaa. Maapai apida ma tede tꞌĩudakꞌaa paji. Mãga baji ma angeleerã sieteerãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia atee pꞌanɨ jõruta misa.
Mãpai mɨa ũriji Tachi Akꞌõre ɨtꞌari golpe pedeemaa bɨ. Ma pedee uchiaji ichi ɨtꞌaripema te waibɨadeepa. Mãgaji ma angeleerã sieteerãmaa:
—Wã́tɨ mãikꞌaapa eujã ɨ̃rɨ wetꞌáatɨ ma vaso siete ipuru pꞌanɨ mɨ kꞌĩrau bɨpa. Mãgá mɨa eujãdepemaarã miapiitꞌee.

Aramãgá ma naapɨara ángel wãji mãikꞌaapa ichi vasode iru bada wetꞌaaji eujã ɨ̃rɨ. Mãpai eperãarã jõmaweda ma nemĩsia kꞌĩrakꞌa bɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃patapꞌedaarã mãikꞌaapa ichi tauchaa iru pꞌanapatapꞌedaarã kꞌayaadachida ne–inaa kꞌachiapa aida–idaa bɨkꞌa. Mãgɨpa ãchi audú mia pꞌaneepachida, pꞌua nɨ̃bada perã.
Mãpai araarepema angelpa ichi vaso wetꞌaaji pꞌusa jãde. Mãpai pania aɨde nɨ̃bɨ eperã piuda waakꞌa padachi. Mapa ne–inaa chokꞌai pꞌanadapꞌedaarã aɨde nɨ̃bɨ jõmaweda piudachida.
Mãpai ma omé eerepema angelpa ichi vaso wetꞌaaji to bee ɨ̃rɨ mãikꞌaapa pania poatrɨ uchiapata ɨ̃rɨ. Ma pania jõmaweda tachi waa padachi.
Maapꞌeda ũriji ángel awara bɨda pania jɨ̃amerã pedeemaa bɨ. Mãgɨpa mãgaji:
—Tachi Akꞌõre, jõmaarã kꞌãyaara pɨa ne–inaa piara oo bɨ.
Pɨ ichita bapari mãikꞌaapa ichita bapachi.
Pɨa pia ooji mãgá pania waa papikꞌãri, jãgɨ́ eperãarãpa pɨchideerã waa mãikꞌaapa pɨ pedee jarapataarã waa batꞌapidapꞌedaa perã, ãra pee atapëidakꞌãri.
Maperãpɨ jãgɨɨrãmaa waa topimaa bɨ.
Mãgɨ́ todaipia bɨ jãgeerãpa.
Ichiaba mɨa ũriji ángel pedee uchia bɨ altardeepa:
—Wãarapɨ, Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨa.
Pɨa pia oo bɨ, mãga ookꞌãri kꞌachia beerãmaa.
Mãpai ma õpee eerepema angelpa ichi vaso wetꞌaaji akꞌõrejĩrumaa, akꞌõrejĩrupa eperãarã paakꞌoomerã tꞌɨpɨtaupa paaparikꞌa.

Mãgá eperãarã jõmaweda mia pꞌaneepachida ma paada pꞌuapa. Mamĩda ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata oo amaa kꞌiniada–e paji mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre waawee kꞌiniada–e paji. Ma kꞌãyaara ikꞌachia jarapachida Tachi Akꞌõremaa, irua ma kꞌachia ãchimaa pëida perã.

Mãpai ma kꞌĩmari eerepema angelpa ichi vaso wetꞌaaji mãgɨ́ nemĩsia su–akꞌɨ beepari ɨ̃rɨ. Mãpai ma nemĩsia trua, na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõmaweda pꞌãriude beeji. Eperãarã aɨde pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa ãchi kꞌĩrame kꞌaakꞌoopachida, pꞌua chooda–e pꞌanadapꞌedaa perã.

Mãgá mia pꞌanapachida mĩda, oo amaa kꞌiniada–e paji ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata. Ma kꞌãyaara ikꞌachia jarapachida Tachi Akꞌõre ɨtꞌaripemamaa, ãchi pꞌua jõnada kꞌaurepa mãikꞌaapa ãchi aida–idaa pꞌanadapꞌedaa kꞌaurepa.
Mãpai ma joisomaa eerepema angelpa ichi vaso wetꞌaaji Éufrates to waibɨa jãde pꞌoodaimerã. Mãgá reyrã akꞌõrejĩru uchiapari eereepa jĩpꞌa chedai.
Mãpai mɨa unuji jaure kꞌachia beerã õpee, baso kꞌĩrakꞌa bɨ. Mãgɨɨrã uchiajida je choma bɨ itꞌaideepa, nemĩsia itꞌaideepa mãikꞌaapa ma ne–animal kꞌachia; chi seewa jarapari itꞌaideepa.

Mãgɨ́ jaure kꞌachia beerã netuaraarã. Mãgɨɨrãpa oopachida ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa. Wãpachida na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema reyrãmaa mãikꞌaapa ũraapachida chipꞌedaidamerã jura chõode Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨa ome iru ewari waibɨa ewate.
Mãpai Tachi Waibɨapa mãgaji:
—¡Ũrítɨ! Parã atu bɨde mɨ cheitꞌee nechɨapari cheparikꞌa. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌĩra jĩpꞌa nipapataarã pia akꞌɨitꞌee. Mãɨrã kꞌĩra nejasiada–e paitꞌee atu bɨde mɨ chekꞌãri.
Ma reyrã jaure kꞌachia beerãpa ũraadapꞌedaa chipꞌedachida abaamãi, hebreo pedeede tꞌɨ̃jarapachida
Mãpai ma seis eerepema angelpa ichi vaso wetꞌaaji. Mãga nɨde Tachi Akꞌõre golpe pedee uchiaji ichi ɨtꞌaripema te waibɨadeepa; ichi su–akꞌɨ beeparideepa. Mãgaji:
—¡Jõdachida aji, mɨa kꞌĩsia iru bada kꞌachia beerã miapiitꞌee!

Mãga jararude pa baaiji, pa jĩwaa nɨ̃baji mãikꞌaapa awẽrachaipa na pꞌekꞌau eujã golpe wëretꞌaaji. Audú golpe wëreji. Eperãarã na eujãde pꞌaneedakꞌãriipa awẽrachai apida ma kꞌãyaara golpeera wëre–e paji.

Mãgá golpe wërekꞌãri, chi pꞌuuru waibɨa tꞌoodachi tꞌooma õpeede. Apema pꞌuuru na pꞌekꞌau eujãde pꞌanɨ jõdachida. Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌawaji ma pꞌuuru waibɨa Babilónia pidaarãpa oopatapꞌedaa. Audú kꞌĩrau bada perã ãchi ome, mãgɨ́ pꞌuuru miapiji.
Ma awara ma wëre nɨ̃bɨde jõmaweda isla ee ome wẽpadachida.

Mãga nɨde ɨtꞌariipa hielo kꞌoi tau tapɨa bɨkꞌa baai cheji eperãarã ɨ̃rɨ. Ma chaachaa cuarenta kilos waa paji. Mãga bakꞌãri, eperãarãpa ikꞌachia jarajida Tachi Akꞌõremaa ma hielo tau tapɨa kꞌaurepa, audú golpe tee bada perã.
Ma angeleerã sieteerãpa vaso iru pꞌanadapꞌedaa, mãɨrãdepema aba mɨmaa cheji mãikꞌaapa mãgaji:
—Chéji. Mɨa akꞌɨpiitꞌeeda aji, sãga Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌachia ooitꞌee wẽra jõmaarãpa kꞌawa pꞌanɨ. Mãgɨ́ prostitutakꞌa bɨ su–akꞌɨ baparíkꞌapɨ bɨ to kꞌaitꞌakꞌaitꞌaa jẽra bɨmãi.
Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema reyrãpa pꞌekꞌau oopachida, araa padakꞌãri mãgɨ́ wẽra ome. Ma awara na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa ooi awaa pꞌanapachida ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo ichia oodakꞌa.

Maapꞌeda ma kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌa bɨde Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa unupida mɨmaa, ma angelpa mɨ ateeji eujã eperãarã makꞌɨara wẽe jẽra bɨdee. Mama bɨde unuji ma prostitutakꞌa bɨ su–akꞌɨ bɨ nemĩsia pꞌoree bɨ ɨ̃rɨ. Mãgɨ́ nemĩsia kꞌapꞌɨa jõma ɨ̃rɨ Tachi Akꞌõre tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã jẽra baji, oo iru baitꞌee. Mãgɨ́ nemĩsiapa poro siete mãikꞌaapa cacho diez iru baji.

Mãgɨ́ wẽrapa pꞌaru pꞌupꞌuchia pꞌoree ome jɨ̃ baji. Ichiaba nẽe, mãu pi–ia mãikꞌaapa perla jɨ̃ baji. Ichi juade iru baji copa nẽedee ooda. Mãgɨ́ ipuru baji ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoopa; ne–inaa jõmaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa unuamaa iru bɨ.
Ichi tau bɨɨrɨde nãgɨ́ tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã baji:
Eperã apidaapa kꞌawada–e ma tꞌɨ̃ kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨ. Tachi Akꞌõrepapaita kꞌawa bɨ.
Mɨa unuji mãgɨ́ wẽra piu pɨkꞌa bɨ. Eperã itꞌuapa piudaikꞌãri, o–ĩadaiparikꞌa, mãga pɨkꞌa mãgɨ́ wẽra o–ĩadachi Tachi Akꞌõredeerã, Cristode ijãa pꞌanadapꞌedaarã peepida perã.
Mãgá akꞌɨmaa bɨde mɨ pꞌera pɨkꞌa beeji.
Mãpai ma angelpa mɨmaa mãgaji:

—¿Sãapꞌeda pɨ pꞌera pɨkꞌa nɨ̃bɨma? aji. Mɨa jaraitꞌee ne–inaa pɨa waide kꞌawa–e bɨ. Jaraitꞌee kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨ mãgɨ́ wẽra mãikꞌaapa ichi su–akꞌɨ bɨ ɨ̃rɨ nemĩsia; mãgɨ́ poro siete, cacho diez iru bɨ.

Ma nemĩsia pɨa unuda naaweda chokꞌai bapachi mĩda, ɨ̃rá wẽ–e. Mamĩda na ewari uchiaitꞌee ma uria nãpɨa bɨdeepa, wãi naaweda Tachi Akꞌõrepa jõtꞌaaitꞌeemaa. Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã, chi Tachi Akꞌõrepa na eujã ooi naaweda tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã–ee beerã Tachi Akꞌõre ome ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌeerã tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã jẽra bɨ librode ɨtꞌari, mãɨrãpa akꞌɨtrua para baitꞌee mãgɨ́ nemĩsia unudakꞌãri. Mãgɨ́ bapachi mĩda, ɨ̃rá wẽ–e. Mamĩda waya cheitꞌee.

ʼMɨa nãgɨ́ pedee jararu kꞌĩsia kꞌawaa beerã–itꞌee, aɨde kꞌĩsia pꞌanadamerã mãikꞌaapa kꞌawaadamerã wãara kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨ. Ma nemĩsia poro siete jara kꞌinia bɨ ee siete. Mamãikꞌaapa ma wẽrapa eperãarã akꞌɨpari. Ichiaba ma poro chaachaa jara kꞌinia bɨ rey aba.
Ma reyrã sietedepema joisomaa piujida. Ɨ̃rá abaapa eperãarã iru bɨ ichi jua ekꞌari. Chi apema waide uchia–e. Mamĩda mãgɨ́ tꞌẽepema rey uchiakꞌãri, taarã–epai eperãarã iru bapariitꞌee ichi jua ekꞌari.

Mãgɨ́ nemĩsia chokꞌai bada mamĩda ɨ̃rá wẽ–e ma reyrã siete tꞌẽe uchiaitꞌee, aɨ eerepemakꞌa. Mamĩda wãara mãgɨ́ ma sietedepema uchiada paitꞌee. Waya eperãarã iru bapariitꞌee ichi jua ekꞌari. Mãgɨta wãitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa jõtꞌaaitꞌeemaa.
ʼMãgɨ́ cacho diez pɨa unuda jara kꞌinia bɨ reyrã diez waide uchiada–e pꞌanɨ. Mamĩda ma nemĩsia uchiakꞌãri, taarã–e ma reyrã ichi ome eperãarã iru pꞌanadaitꞌee ãchi jua ekꞌari.
Ma reyrã diez aukꞌa kꞌĩsiadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa ma nemĩsia eere tꞌĩudaitꞌee.

Jura chõonadaitꞌee ma Oveja Chakꞌe ome. Mamĩda irua ãchi jõmaweda pꞌoyaaitꞌee. Iru eere pꞌanadaitꞌeeda aji, eperãarã Tachi Akꞌõrepa jɨrɨda irude ijãapataadamerã, chi jɨrɨtꞌeradaarã choopatapꞌedaa perã Cristode ijãa pꞌanɨde. Iru Rey jõmaarã rey mãikꞌaapa iru Poro Waibɨa jõmaarã poro waibɨa.
Ma angelpa ichiaba mãgaji:
—Ma to chokꞌara kꞌaitꞌakꞌaitꞌaa bɨmãi, mãgɨ́ prostitutakꞌa bɨ su–akꞌɨ pɨkꞌa bɨmãi, jara kꞌinia bɨda aji, eujãdepemaarã, pꞌuuru pidaarã, ëreerã kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo mãikꞌaapa pedee kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo pedeepataarã.

Ma reyrã diez pɨa unuda mãgɨ́ nemĩsia ome, mãgɨ́ prostitutakꞌa bɨ kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌaneedaitꞌee. Mapa ãchia jãri atadaitꞌee jõmaweda ma wẽrapa ne–inaa iru bɨ, ãkꞌadaa pɨkꞌa beemerã. Maapꞌeda iru paa jõdaitꞌee.
Tachi Akꞌõrépata ma kꞌĩsia bɨji ãchi tꞌãride mãga oodamerã, ichia naaweda kꞌĩsia iru badakꞌa. Ichiaba ichiata kꞌĩsiapiji mãgɨ́ reyrãmaa ma nemĩsia eere tꞌĩudamerã ichia jarada jõru misa.
Mãgɨ́ wẽra pɨa unuda jara kꞌinia bɨda aji, pꞌuuru waibɨa, aɨ jua ekꞌari na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema reyrã pꞌanapata.
Ma tꞌẽepai mɨa unuji awaraa ángel ɨtꞌariipa baai cheru. Mãgɨ́ angeleerã poro waibɨa paji. Mapa ichi baai cherude eujã ɨ̃daadachi ichi kꞌĩra wãreepa.
Mãgɨpa golpe pedeeji:
—¡Jõdachi; jõdachida aji, jã pꞌuuru waibɨa Babilónia!
Ɨ̃rá mãgɨ́ pꞌuuru badamãi jaure kꞌachia beerã te padachi, netuaraarã aupai mama pꞌanapata perã.
Mama ichiaba pꞌanapata ipanaarã kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo Tachi Akꞌõrepa kꞌiniakꞌaa eperãarãpa kꞌodamerã.
Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarã jõmaarãpa mãgɨ́ wẽra vino topachida piudarutamaa.
Pia jaraitꞌeera, ne–inaa kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌaneejida iru kꞌaurepa.
Ichiaba na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema reyrãpa pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo oopachida mãgɨ́ wẽra kꞌaurepa.
Ma awara na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema netꞌaa netopataarãpa pꞌaratꞌa waibɨa atapachidada aji, mãgɨ́ wẽrapa audú netꞌaa pꞌe wãda kꞌaurepa ichi–itꞌee.
Mãpai ɨtꞌariipa awaraa ũriji nãga pedeeru:
—Mɨchideerã, uchiadapáde aji ma pꞌuurudeepa, aukꞌa oonaadamerã mãgɨ́ pꞌuuru pidaarãpa ne–inaa kꞌachia oopatakꞌa mãikꞌaapa uchiadapáde aji, jõnaadamerã ãchi ome.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa mãgɨɨrã miapiitꞌee ãchia ne–inaa kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa, audú ne–inaa kꞌachia chokꞌara oopatapꞌedaa perã.
Mɨchi angeleerã, ne–inaa kꞌachia óotɨ mãgɨ́ wẽramaa, ichia awaraarãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda pari.
Ne–inaa kꞌachia audú óotɨ irumaa, ichia ne–inaa kꞌachia ooda chaa.
Mãgá parãpa audupɨara kꞌachia oodaitꞌee ichimaa, ichia ooda kꞌãyaara awaraarãmaa.
Ichi audú tꞌãri pꞌuapítɨ mãikꞌaapa miapítɨ audua pedeeda pari mãikꞌaapa netꞌaara iru bɨ pari.
Ichi tꞌãridepai audua pedee jarapari:
“¡Mɨta nama su–akꞌɨ bɨ reinakꞌa!
Eperãarã jõmaweda mɨ jua ekꞌari pꞌanɨ.
Mɨ tꞌãri pꞌua ba–e pꞌẽtrãakꞌa.
Mɨ kꞌima wẽ–e perã, mɨ chi–ɨa–eda” aji.
Ma audua pedee kꞌaurepa kꞌãima abaade ichi atu bɨde nãgee ne–inaa kꞌachia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo pꞌasaitꞌee:
Piutꞌee, tꞌãri pꞌua baitꞌee mãikꞌaapa jarra ooitꞌee.
Tꞌɨpɨtaude paatꞌaadaitꞌee ichia kꞌachia oopata kꞌaurepa.
Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨpata mãga oopiitꞌee.
ʼNa pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema reyrã, ma pꞌekꞌau kꞌachia oopatapꞌedaarã ma wẽra ome mãikꞌaapa pꞌaratꞌara atadapꞌedaarã ichi kꞌaurepa jarajẽedaitꞌee unudakꞌãri nari jɨ̃rakꞌawaa nɨ̃bɨ ichi paadadeepa.
Ichi mãgá jõru misa, ma reyrã tꞌɨmɨ́ bainɨ̃ pꞌanadaitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi aukꞌa miapii jĩakꞌaapa. Mãpai jaradaitꞌee:
“¡Aai, pꞌuuru waibɨa Babilónia; pꞌuuru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ!
Hora abaade, taarã–ee jõpiji Tachi Akꞌõrepa.”
ʼNa pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema netopataarã ichiaba jarajẽedaitꞌee ma pꞌuuru jõda kꞌaurepa. Mãga oodaitꞌee waa wẽ–e paitꞌee perã ãchi netꞌaa netodamerã.
Mama netopachida nẽe; pꞌaratꞌa; mãu pi–ia; perla; pꞌaru linodee mãikꞌaapa sedadee, kꞌĩra pꞌoree pꞌupꞌuchia ome; pakꞌuru tꞌũa; ne–inaa ooda marfildee,

Ichiaba mama netopachida canela awaraa ne–aliño tꞌũa beepari ome; ne–inaa tꞌũa beepari eperãarãpa paapata; mirra kꞌera awaraa kꞌera ome; vino; aceite; harina nãusaa; trigo tau mãikꞌaapa nãgee ne–animalaarã: pꞌakꞌa, oveja, caballo; carro caballopa jidiupata mãikꞌaapa esclavoorã, eperãarã paara netopatapꞌedaa perã.
Ma ne–inaa netopataarãpa jaradaitꞌee ma pꞌuuru jõdamaa:
“¡Ɨ̃rá pɨa chikꞌo pi–ia netꞌaa pi–ia ome wẽe bɨda adaitꞌee!
Pɨa netꞌaara mãikꞌaapa pꞌaratꞌara iru bada atuadachi.
Waa unudakꞌaa paitꞌeeda” adaitꞌee.
ʼMãgɨ́ netopataarã, chi pꞌaratꞌara atadapꞌedaarã ma pꞌuuru kꞌaurepa, tꞌɨmɨ́ bainɨ̃ pꞌanadaitꞌee ma pꞌuuru jõru misa, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ãchi aukꞌa miapii jĩakꞌaapa. Mãpai jarajẽedaitꞌee:
“¡Aai, pꞌuuru waibɨa!
Pɨ wẽra jĩakꞌa bapachida adaitꞌee, pꞌaru pi–ia linodee ooda jɨ̃ bɨ; pꞌaru pꞌupꞌuchia pꞌoree ome.
¡Nẽe jɨ̃ bapachi mãu pi–ia ome, perla ome!
¡Taarã–e nɨde jõmaweda pɨa ne–inaa pi–ia iru bada jõdachida adaitꞌee!”

ʼIchiaba tꞌɨmɨ́ pꞌaneedaitꞌee barco pꞌerapataarã, chi barcode mimiapataarã mãikꞌaapa mãɨrã ome nipapataarã. Jõmaweda pꞌanapataarã ne–inaa pꞌusadeepa ata pꞌanɨ kꞌaurepa tꞌɨmɨɨpa jãgɨ́ pꞌuuru jõru unudaitꞌee.
Nari jɨ̃rakꞌawaa nɨ̃bɨ akꞌɨ pꞌanɨde golpe pedeedaitꞌee: “¿Awaraa pꞌuuru paraajikꞌã nãgɨ́ pꞌuuru waibɨakꞌa?”
Jarajẽe bɨ misa, yooro pꞌora ɨtꞌaa batꞌadaitꞌee baaimerã ãchi poro ɨ̃rɨ. Mãgá akꞌɨpipata ãchi tꞌãri pꞌua pꞌanɨ. Mãpai golpe pedeedaitꞌee:
“¡Aai, pꞌuuru waibɨa!
Pɨchia netꞌaa pꞌe wãda kꞌaurepa pꞌusade nidá barco chipariirã jõmaweda pꞌaratꞌara padachida.
Ɨ̃rá, taarã–e weda, pɨchia iru bada jõmaweda jõdachida adaitꞌee.
O–ĩa pꞌanéetɨ angeleerã, Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma pꞌuuru jõtꞌaada perã.
Ichiaba o–ĩa pꞌanéetɨ parã Tachi Akꞌõredeerã, Cristopa pëida mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõre pedee jarapataarã.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma pꞌuuru jõtꞌaaji, aɨde pꞌanadapꞌedaarãpa parãmaa ne–inaa kꞌachia oodapꞌedaa perã.”
Mãpai ángel juataura bɨpa mãu tapɨa kꞌũrumakꞌa bɨ jira ataji mãikꞌaapa batꞌatꞌaaji pꞌusade. Maapꞌeda mãgaji:
—Jãgá pɨ baaiitꞌee, pꞌuuru waibɨa Babilónia.
Pɨ waa unudakꞌaa paitꞌee.
Pɨchi calle jãde waa ũridakꞌaa paitꞌee arpa chaapata, flauta chaapata wa trompeta chaapata.
Pɨchi jãde ne–inaa oo kꞌawaa bee apida unudakꞌaa paitꞌee.
Ũridakꞌaa paitꞌee eperãarãpa kꞌũrumade ne–inaa bapata.
Pɨchi jãde lámpara ɨ̃daadakꞌaa paitꞌee.
Miakꞌãipata fiestade pedee o–ĩa ũridakꞌaa paitꞌee.
Ma jõma wẽpaitꞌee, pɨchi netopataarã waibɨara pꞌanajida mĩda awaraa netopataarã kꞌãyaara mãikꞌaapa pɨa pꞌuuru pidaarã jõmaweda kꞌũrapachi mĩda, petau tau netꞌaa kꞌawaa bɨ oo bɨpa.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma pꞌuuru jõtꞌaaji, aɨde eperãarãpa peedapꞌedaa perã iru pedee jarapataarã, ichideerã mãikꞌaapa awaraarã.
Ma tꞌẽepai mɨa ũriji eperãarã chokꞌara ɨtꞌari golpe pedeemaa pꞌanɨkꞌa:
—¡Ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dáma Tachi Akꞌõremaa!
¡Iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ!
Iruata tachi o kꞌachiadeepa kꞌaripa ataji atuanaadamerã.
Mapa Tachi Akꞌõre aupaita waaweedaipia bɨ mãikꞌaapa iru jua ekꞌari aupaita pꞌanapataadaipia bɨ.
Irua aupaita wãara jarapari. Irua ne–inaa pia ooji ma prostitutakꞌa bɨ jõtꞌaakꞌãri.
Mãgɨpa eujãdepemaarã kꞌachiade baaipiji, audú ne–inaa kꞌachia ãchimaa oopida kꞌaurepa.
Ma awara Tachi Akꞌõredeerã peepachi.
Maperãpɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa jõtꞌaajida ajida.
Mãpai waya golpe pedeejida:
—¡Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ!
Mãgɨ́ wẽra paa jõda nari jɨ̃rakꞌawaa nɨ̃bɨ ichita kꞌirãpadaitꞌeeda ajida.
Ma chonaarã poro waibɨarã veinticuatro ma ne–inaa chokꞌai bɨ kꞌĩmari ome bedabaidachida Tachi Akꞌõre, ma su–akꞌɨ beeparide su–akꞌɨ bɨ kꞌĩrapite mãikꞌaapa mãgajida:
—¡Amén! ¡Tachi Akꞌõre jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ!
Mãpai mɨa ũriji ma su–akꞌɨ beeparideepa pedeeru:
—Parã jõmaarãpa Tachi Akꞌõremaa jarapatáatɨ iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ.
Parã jõmaarãpa oopata irua oopi bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa iru waaweepata, ekꞌariara beerã, waibɨara beerãpa paara mãga jaradaipia bɨ.
Mãpai waya ũriji ma eperãarã chokꞌara pedeemaa pꞌanɨkꞌa; to kꞌida chaaree jĩwaaparikꞌa maa–e pɨrã pa golpe jĩwaaparikꞌa:
—¡Ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dáma Tachi Akꞌõremaa!
¡Iru jõmaarã kꞌãyaara waibɨara bɨ!
Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨapa ne–inaa jõmaweda bɨru ichi jua ekꞌari.
O–ĩa pꞌanadáma mãikꞌaapa iru waaweedáma, Oveja Chakꞌe miakꞌãiitꞌee fiesta paru perã.
Wẽra ɨmɨkꞌĩra ome miakꞌãiparikꞌa bapariitꞌee chi kꞌima ome, mãga pɨkꞌa Cristode ijãapataarã ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee iru ome.
Ãchia miakꞌãipata pꞌaru jɨ̃ pꞌanɨ.
Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma pꞌaru pi–ia teeji ãchimaa jɨ̃ pꞌaneedamerã iru ome pꞌaneedakꞌãri.
Mãgɨ́ pꞌaru lino nãusaadee kꞌada.
Tꞌo–tꞌoo bɨ maarepida tꞌãu–e bairã.
Mãgɨ́ lino nãusaa jara kꞌinia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõredeerãpa ne–inaa pia oopatapꞌedaa irua oopidakꞌa.
Mãpai ma angelpa mɨmaa mãgaji:
—Pꞌã́ji nãgɨ́ pedee: “O–ĩa pꞌanɨ chi Tachi Akꞌõrepa tꞌɨ̃ pëida eperãarã wãdamerã ma Oveja Chakꞌe miakꞌãi bɨ fiestadee.”
Ichiaba mãgaji:
—Tachi Akꞌõrépata mãgɨ́ pedee jara bɨ wãara.
Mɨa mãga ũrikꞌãri, bedabaidachi ma ángel kꞌĩrapite irumaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃itꞌee. Mamĩda ichia mãgaji:
—¡Jãga oonáaji! Mɨ Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee mimiapari pɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa pɨ ɨ̃pemaarãkꞌa; chi awaraarãmaa jarapataarãpa Jesupa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõremaa aupaita ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃páde aji.
Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepata Jesupa ooda jarapi bɨ iru pedee jarapataarãmaa.

Mãpai mɨa unuji ɨtꞌari ewaraa kꞌobɨ. Aɨde caballo tꞌorroo unuji. Ma caballo ɨ̃rɨ wã nipada tꞌɨ̃jarapata Ichita Oopari Ichia Jara Bɨkꞌa mãikꞌaapa Wãarata Jarapari. Mãgɨ́ tꞌɨ̃ jara pꞌanɨkꞌa ichia akꞌɨpari eperãarãpa oopata jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia mãikꞌaapa chõopari ichi kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanapataarã ome.
Chi tau urua nɨ̃baji tꞌɨpɨtaukꞌa. Poro jɨ̃ra chokꞌara jɨ̃ baji ichi porode. Tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã baji ichi tau bɨɨrɨde. Mamĩda apidaapa kꞌawada–e pai ma tꞌɨ̃ kꞌãata jara kꞌinia bɨ. Ichia aupaita kꞌawa bɨ.
Ichi ɨ̃rɨpema pꞌaru jɨ̃ bada bekꞌee baji waapa. Ichi tꞌɨ̃jarapata Tachi Akꞌõre Pedee.
Angeleerã chokꞌara nipajida iru ome soldaorãkꞌa. Mãɨrã ichiaba wã nipajida caballo tꞌorroo ɨ̃rɨ. Pꞌaru lino nãusaadee jɨ̃ pꞌanajida. Tꞌo–tꞌoo baji, maarepida tꞌãu–ee bada perã.

Ichi itꞌaideepa uchia baji espada choma kꞌĩraichaa weda pꞌewedee bɨ. Mãgɨpa ichia jõpiitꞌee na eujãdepemaarã chokꞌara; iru kꞌĩra unuamaa iru pꞌanɨɨrã. Mãɨrã jõpiitꞌee eperãpa netꞌaa jõpikꞌajikꞌa pakꞌuru hierrodee oodapa. Uva piartꞌɨpatakꞌa chi ba bõgo tapɨadee wãmerã, mãga pɨkꞌa ichia ma kꞌachia beerã bɨitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre juade piukꞌoodamerã, iru kꞌĩrau bairã ãchi ome.
Ichi ɨ̃rɨpema pꞌaru makꞌara ɨ̃rɨ jɨ̃ badamãi nãgɨ́ tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã baji:
Mãpai mɨa unuji ángel bainɨ̃ bɨ akꞌõrejĩru kꞌĩrapite. Mãgɨpa golpe pedeeji ipanaarã ɨtꞌɨ́ wãabaipataarãmaa:
—Chétɨ; cheepurútɨ kꞌodaitꞌee chikꞌo waibɨa Tachi Akꞌõrepa teeru.

Chétɨ piudapꞌedaarã chiara kꞌode: reyrã chiara; soldaorã poro waibɨarã chiara; eperãarã poro waibɨarã chiara; ichiaba caballo chiara mãikꞌaapa aɨ ɨ̃rɨ wãpataarã chiara; eperãarã jõmaarã chiara; esclavo–eerãde, esclavoorãde paara, ekꞌariirãde, waibɨarãde paara.

Mãpai unuji mãgɨ́ nemĩsia na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepema reyrã ome mãikꞌaapa ãchi soldaorã ome. Mãgɨɨrã chipꞌe pꞌanajida jura chõonadaitꞌee ma caballo tꞌorroo ɨ̃rɨ wã nipada ome mãikꞌaapa iru eere pꞌanadapꞌedaarã ome.

Mamĩda ichia ma nemĩsia jita ataji ma ne–animal kꞌachia ome; chi mãgɨ́ nemĩsia kꞌĩrapite oodapa ne–inaa eperãarãpa pꞌoyaa oodakꞌaa ãchi juadoopa. Mãga oo bɨpa ma ne–animal kꞌachia, chi seewa jaraparipa eperãarã kꞌũraji ma nemĩsia tauchaa bɨpidamerã ãchi kꞌapꞌɨade mãikꞌaapa ma nemĩsia kꞌĩrakꞌa bɨmaa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadamerã. Ma caballo tꞌorroo ɨ̃rɨ wã nipadapa ma nemĩsia ma seewa jarapari ome chokꞌai bɨta batꞌakꞌooji lagokꞌa tꞌɨpɨtau azufre ome jẽrajẽraa jira bɨdee.
Mãgɨɨrã ome nipadapꞌedaarã piukꞌoojida mãgɨ́ espada uchiadapa ma caballo ɨ̃rɨ wã nipada itꞌaideepa. Mãpai ipanaarãpa mãɨrã kꞌapꞌɨa piuda jõmaweda kꞌo chejida. Kꞌojida bi jãwaarutamaa.
Mãpai mɨa unuji ángel ɨtꞌariipa baai cheru. Mãgɨpa ma uria nãpɨa bɨdepema llave cadena choma bɨ ome iru baji ichi juade.
Ichia jita ataji mãgɨ́ je choma bɨ; mãgɨ́ chonaarãwedapema taama; Netuara Poro Waibɨa maa–e pɨrã Satanás apata. Ma cadenapa mãgɨ́ jɨ̃ nɨ̃bɨji mil años wãyaaru misa.

Mãpai batꞌatꞌaaji ma uria nãpɨa bɨdee. Jɨ̃a nɨ̃bɨji ma llavepa mãikꞌaapa ma uria pia jɨ̃atꞌaaji apidaapa ewanaadamerã. Mãga ooji ma je choma bɨpa na eujãdepemaarã waa kꞌũranaamerã ma mil años wãyaaru misa. Aɨ tꞌẽepai kꞌena pëiitꞌee, makꞌɨara taarã–eepai.

Mãpai mɨa unuji rey su–akꞌɨ beepari chokꞌara. Tachi Akꞌõrepa jaraji aɨde su–akꞌɨ pꞌanadapꞌedaarãmaa reyrãkꞌa eperãarã akꞌɨpataadamerã. Mãɨrã ome unuji eperãarã jaureerã; chi otau tꞌɨapꞌedapꞌedaa awaraarãmaa jaradapꞌedaa perã Tachi Akꞌõre Ũraa mãikꞌaapa Jesupa ooda eperãarã kꞌaripaitꞌee. Mãgɨɨrãpa ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃dakꞌaa paji ma nemĩsiamaa maa–e pɨrã ichi kꞌĩrakꞌa bɨmaa. Ichiaba mãgɨ́ tauchaa bɨpidakꞌaa paji ãchi tau bɨɨrɨde wa juade. Mãgɨɨrã chokꞌai padaidapꞌeda, Cristo ome eperãarã akꞌɨpachida reyrãkꞌa, ma mil años wãyaaru misa.
Ma chokꞌai padaidaarã naapɨara eperãarã pꞌirabaidapꞌedaa paji ichita chokꞌai pꞌanapataadamerã. Apemaarã piudapꞌedaarã pꞌirabaidaitꞌee ma mil años jõrumaa.

O–ĩa pꞌanɨ Tachi Akꞌõrepa awara bɨdaarã ichideerã pꞌanadamerã. Mãɨrãta naapɨara chokꞌai pꞌirabaidaitꞌee ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌee. Atuada–e paitꞌee. Ma kꞌãyaara pꞌaareerã mimia oodaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõre–itꞌee mãikꞌaapa Cristo–itꞌee. Cristo ome ãrapa eperãarã akꞌɨpataadaitꞌee reyrãkꞌa, ma mil años wãyaaru misa.
Ma mil años wãyaapꞌeda, angelpa Satanás kꞌena pëiitꞌee ichi jɨ̃a badamãiipa.

Mãpai ichi uchiaitꞌee na pꞌekꞌau eujã jõmaade, jõmaarã eujãdepemaarã kꞌũrade. Kꞌũraitꞌee Gog mãikꞌaapa Magog, ãchi soldaorã chipꞌedaidamerã jura chõodaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõredeerã ome. Ãchi soldaorã audú chokꞌara pꞌanadaitꞌee, ipu tau nãusaa audú chokꞌara paraaparikꞌa pꞌusa ide.

Mãgɨɨrã jĩchoojida na eujãde mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõredeerã wapꞌɨrajida; ichia pꞌuuru kꞌinia iru bɨ tꞌɨakꞌauda edajãde pꞌanadapꞌedaarã mãikꞌaapa taawa pꞌanadapꞌedaarã paara. Mamĩda mãga bɨ misa, ɨtꞌariipa tꞌɨpɨtau baai cheji ãchi ɨ̃rɨ mãikꞌaapa ãchi kꞌiniidachida.

Mãpai Tachi Akꞌõrepa Netuara Poro Waibɨa, chi eperãarã kꞌũradapa, batꞌapitꞌaaji ma lagokꞌa tꞌɨpɨtau azufre ome jẽrajẽraa jira bɨdee. Mama ma nemĩsia, ma ne–animal kꞌachia, chi seewa jarapari ome ichita miapi bapariitꞌee, jõ–ee.
Mãpai mɨa unuji rey su–akꞌɨ beepari waibɨa, tꞌorroo bɨ. Aɨde Tachi Akꞌõre su–akꞌɨ baji. Ichi kꞌĩrapite na eujã mãikꞌaapa pajã wẽpadachida. Maarepida unu–e paji ma nɨ̃badamãi, wẽ–e pada perã.

Mãpai mɨa unuji piudapꞌedaarã; waibɨara beerã, ekꞌariara beerã paara. Mãɨrã bainɨ̃ pꞌanajida ma rey su–akꞌɨ beepari kꞌĩrapite. Mãpai angeleerãpa librora ewatꞌɨjida. Ma librode ne–inaa jõma eperãarãpa oopatapꞌedaa pꞌã baji. Awaraa libro ichiaba ewatꞌɨjida. Mãgɨde Tachi Akꞌõre ome ichita pꞌanapataadaitꞌeerã tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã jẽra baji. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma piudapꞌedaarãpa oopatapꞌedaa pꞌãda mãikꞌaapa chokꞌai pꞌanɨɨrã tꞌɨ̃ pꞌãda akꞌɨji jaraitꞌee chisãgɨɨrã wãpii ichi truadee mãikꞌaapa chisãgɨɨrã atuapii.
Ma piudapꞌedaarã pꞌusadeepa pꞌirabai uchiajida. Piudapꞌedaarãmãiipa ichiaba uchiajida. Tachi Akꞌõrepa ma piudapꞌedaarã jõmaarãpa ne–inaa oopatapꞌedaa akꞌɨji jaraitꞌee pia wa kꞌachia.

Mãpai angeleerãpa kꞌachia beerã jõmaweda mãikꞌaapa piudapꞌedaarã pꞌanapatamãi batꞌatꞌaajida ma lagokꞌa tꞌɨpɨtau jẽrajẽraa jira bɨdee. Maadamãiipa apida piuda–e paji. Mãgɨ́ lagokꞌa eperãarã piuda tꞌẽepema apata.
Mamaa ichiaba batꞌatꞌaajida jõmaweda tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã–ee beerã ma libro chokꞌai pꞌanɨɨrã tꞌɨ̃ pꞌã jẽra bɨde.
Mãpai mɨa unuji pajã chiwidi mãikꞌaapa eujã chiwidi, naapema pajã mãikꞌaapa eujã pꞌusa ome jõdarida perã.

Unuji pꞌuuru Tachi Akꞌõrepa ichi–itꞌee jɨrɨtꞌerada. Mãgɨ́ Jerusalén pꞌuuru chiwidi baai cheji ɨtꞌariipa, Tachi Akꞌõre baparimãiipa. Pi–ia baji. Wẽra chi–oo pi–ia jɨ̃parikꞌa miakꞌãiitꞌee pakꞌãri, mãga pɨkꞌa baji ma pꞌuuru.
Mãgá akꞌɨmaa bɨde ũriji ángel Akꞌõre su–akꞌɨ beeparideepa golpe pedeeru:
—Ɨ̃rá Tachi Akꞌõre bapari eperãarã tꞌãide. Bapariitꞌee eperãarã ome. Ichi pꞌuuru padaitꞌee. Tachi Akꞌõre ichi kꞌapꞌɨa bapariitꞌee ãra ome mãikꞌaapa ãra Akꞌõre paitꞌee.
Ichia eperãarã tauba jõmaweda wẽpapiitꞌee. Mãɨrã waa piuda–e paitꞌee; waa jarajẽeda–e paitꞌee; waa pꞌua sentida–e paitꞌee, irua mãgee naawedapema ne–inaa jõmaweda wẽpapiitꞌee perã.
Mãpai chi su–akꞌɨ bɨpa ma rey su–akꞌɨ beeparide mãgaji:
—Ɨ̃rapɨ mɨa ne–inaa jõma chiwidi papiitꞌee.
Ichiaba mɨmaa mãgaji:
—Pꞌã́ji nãgɨ́ pedee, mɨa wãarata jarapari perã.
Maapꞌeda mãgaji:

—Oojipɨ mɨa kꞌĩsia iru bada. Mɨta Alfa; nejõmaata naa. Ichiaba mɨta Omega; nejõmaata tꞌẽe. Apida opisia nɨ̃bɨ pɨrã, mɨa pania pari teeitꞌee eperãarã chokꞌai pꞌanapipari, mãgɨ́ pania poatrɨ uchia bɨdepema. Mãgɨ́ pania tokꞌãri, ichita mɨ ome bapariitꞌee.
Kꞌachia pꞌoyaaparipa mãgɨ́ ne–inaa chiwidi jõmaweda iru baitꞌee. Ma awara mɨta iru Akꞌõre paitꞌee; jõdee iru mɨ warra paitꞌee.

Mamĩda waawee–idaa beerã mɨde ijãadaitꞌee; ijãa amaarutaarã jõmaweda ijãadakꞌaa beerã ome; kꞌachia ooi awaa pꞌanɨɨrã; chĩara peepataarã; pꞌekꞌau oopataarã; jaipanaarã petau tau kꞌawaa beerã ome; ne–inaa juapa ooda kꞌĩrapite ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataarã mãikꞌaapa jõmaweda seewa jarapataarã; mãgeerã pꞌananadaitꞌee ma lagokꞌa tꞌɨpɨtau azufre ome jẽrajẽraa jira bɨde mãikꞌaapa tꞌẽepema piuda apata mama piudaitꞌeeda aji, ichita mãgá mɨ ikꞌaawaapa tꞌɨmɨ́ pꞌanapataadaitꞌee perã.
Mãpai ángel mɨmaa cheji. Mãgɨ́ angeleerã sieteerãpa vaso ne–inaa kꞌachiapa ipuru iru pꞌanadapꞌedaadepema paji. Mãgɨpa mɨmaa mãgaji:
—Chéji. Mɨa ma Oveja Chakꞌe wẽra pɨmaa akꞌɨpiitꞌeeda aji.

Ma kꞌãimokꞌaraa pɨkꞌa bɨde Tachi Akꞌõre Jaurepa unupida mɨmaa, mãgɨ́ angelpa mɨ ateeji ee ɨtꞌɨa bɨ nokꞌodee. Mama pꞌanɨde ichia mɨmaa akꞌɨpiji Tachi Akꞌõre pꞌuuru jɨrɨtꞌerada, Jerusalén, baai cheru ɨtꞌariipa, Tachi Akꞌõre baparimãiipa.
Ma pꞌuuru urua nɨ̃baji Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãreepa. Urua baji mãu pi–ia bëi–sãa jaspekꞌa.

Ma pꞌuuru tꞌɨakꞌau nɨ̃baji muralla waibɨa ɨtꞌɨa bɨpa. Aɨde tꞌĩupata doce paraaji. Ma tꞌĩupata chaa ángel aba bainɨ̃ baji. Ichiaba ma tꞌĩupata chaa Israeldeepa uchiadapꞌedaa ëreerã docedepema tꞌɨ̃ aba pꞌã baji.
Ma muralla i chaa tꞌĩupata õpe–õpee pꞌanajida. Akꞌõrejĩru uchiapari eere tꞌĩupata õpee paraaji; norte eere ichiaba; sur eere ichiaba; akꞌõrejĩru baaipari eere ichiaba.
Ma pꞌuuru tꞌɨakꞌau nɨ̃bada muralla edupema basa doce iru baji. Ma basa mãu pi–iadee ooda paji. Mãgɨ́ basa chaa ɨ̃rɨ Oveja Chakꞌe ome nipapatapꞌedaarã doce tꞌɨ̃depema tꞌɨ̃ aba pꞌã baji.
Ma ángel mɨmaa pedee badapa pakꞌuru nẽedee ooda juade atee wãji. Mãgɨpa ma pꞌuuru chaamaa beeji; chi muralla, chi tꞌĩupatamãi paara.
Ma pꞌuuru kuádria baji. Angelpa mãgɨ́ pakꞌurupa chaakꞌãri, dos mil doscientos kilometros
Ma muralla ichiaba chaaji. Sesenta y cinco metros
Ma muralla mãu pi–ia jaspedee ooda paji. Chi pꞌuuru nẽedee ooda paji; nẽe pi–ia, maarepida nejarra wẽe. Bëi–sãa baji vidriokꞌa.
Ma muralla basadepema mãu, mãu pi–ia ome pꞌoira baji; nãgee mãu pi–ia kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo, chi naapema basa mãu pi–ia jaspe ome; araarepema zafiro ome; omé eerepema ágata ome; õpee eerepema esmeralda ome;

kꞌĩmari eerepema ónice ome; joisomaa eerepema cornalina ome; seis eerepema crisólito ome; siete eerepema berilo ome; ocho eerepema topacio ome; nueve eerepema crisoprasa ome; diez eerepema jacinto ome; once eerepema amatista ome.
Ma murallade tꞌĩupata doce perla docedee ooda paji; tꞌĩupata chaa perla abaadee. Calle jã nẽedee ooda paji; nẽe pi–ia, maarepida nejarra wẽe. Bëi–sãa baji vidriokꞌa.

Mɨa Tachi Akꞌõre te waibɨa unu–e paji ma pꞌuurude, Tachi Akꞌõre Waibɨa mama bapari perã ma Oveja Chakꞌe ome. Ãrata ma pꞌuurudepema Akꞌõre te waibɨakꞌa, ãramaa ɨtꞌari pꞌanɨɨrãpa mama ichita ɨtꞌaa tꞌɨ̃pataadaitꞌee perã.
Ma pꞌuurude pꞌanɨɨrãpa akꞌõrejĩru jẽra wa atane ɨ̃daa faltada–e paitꞌee, Tachi Akꞌõre kꞌĩra wãreepa jẽraitꞌee perã ma pꞌuuru ɨ̃rɨ mãikꞌaapa ma Oveja Chakꞌe ɨ̃daaitꞌee perã lamparakꞌa.
Ma pꞌuuru ɨ̃daade na eujãdepemaarã kꞌĩra tꞌãdoo nipapataadaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa na eujãdepema reyrãpa ãchi netꞌaa pi–ia aneedaitꞌee ma pꞌuurudee, Tachi Akꞌõremaa tee kꞌinia pꞌanadairã.
Ma murallade tꞌĩupata jõmaweda ichita ewa nɨ̃baitꞌee. Jɨ̃adakꞌaa paitꞌee; mama pꞌãrikꞌua wẽ–e paitꞌee perã.
Na pꞌekꞌau eujãdepemaarãpa netꞌaa pi–ia iru pꞌanɨ aneedaitꞌee mãikꞌaapa Tachi Akꞌõremaa teedaitꞌee.

Mamĩda ma pꞌuurude ne–inaa kꞌachia apida unuda–e paitꞌee. Kꞌachia oopataarã apida mãikꞌaapa seewa jarapataarã apida mama unuda–e paitꞌee. Aba unudaitꞌee Tachi Akꞌõrepa tꞌɨ̃ pꞌãpidaarã Oveja Chakꞌe librode.

Mãpai ma angelpa mɨmaa akꞌɨpiji to uchia bɨ Tachi Akꞌõre Oveja Chakꞌe ome su–akꞌɨ beeparideepa. Aɨdepema pania maarepida nejarra wẽe baji. Bëi–sãa baji vidriokꞌa. Ma paniapa eperãarã ichita chokꞌai pꞌanapata.
